We've been carrying Creamy Danish Havarti Cheese for decades because we believe the semi-soft texture and fresh, buttery flavors are a great representation of the hall(den)mark Danish cheese. The story of Danish Havarti is one of a noble 1800s exploit where a farmer based just north of Copenhagen traveled around the European continent in search for knowledge about cheesemaking. When she returned from her travels in 1852, she developed the technique to make the uniquely Danish Harvati Cheese. While this technique yielded a semi-firm cheese dotted with small holes, it is a bit different than what's modernly made as "flødehavarti" or "cream Havarti". Trader Joe's Creamy Danish Havarti Cheese with Dill is made using pasteurized milk that allows whey proteins to stick around that would otherwise be eliminated while processing the curd, giving it a signature creamy texture and taste. Ripened very little, cream Havarti Cheese has a mellow, buttery aroma, much like that of Swiss cheese, and a sweet, creamy, paste with mild saltiness and nutty notes. While we love the simplicity of our traditional Creamy Danish Havarti Cheese [sku 09356], it is a variety of cheese often adorned with added flavors such as the herby, grassy quality of dill. The delicate flavor of dill sings in cheesy harmony with the mellow creaminess of the Havarti, neither too overpowering, opening the world of new flavor combos you can try with a block of our Havarti Cheese with Dill. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing.
072490.name: Havarti With Dill

074688.description: The Triple Crème de la Crème The Triple Crème of the Crop Like the Cat that got the Triple Crème In 1928, crafted by a small-time fromager in the Southern French countryside commune of Villefranche de Rouergue, Saint André Triple Cream Brie can find its roots. This same region, notable for its famed Roquefort cheeses, debuted this beautifully soft-ripened, triple cream cheese we have kept in our cheese refrigerators for years. Taking flavorful cues from equal parts tang and density from sour cream and the sweetness of whipped cream and marrying them together with a classic brie base, Saint André Triple Cream Brie is a cheese for the unyielding connoisseur. Gourmands unite! This Saint André Triple Cream Brie has a bloomy, edible rind surrounding a lusciously smooth, creamy paste made from cow's milk and enriched with pure cream. This cheese has no less than 75% butterfat making every bite full of dreamy creamy delight. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Saint André Triple Cream Brie
074688.name: St Andre Triple Cream Brie
074688.title: Saint André Triple Crème Brie

074953.description: "The Queen of Cheeses" - a regal nickname for a soft cheese with a storied history including being given as a tribute to be paid to French kings in the days of yore. While we don't suggest saving a slice of Trader Joe's Double Cream Brie for any current-day monarchs, we do think its a fitting cheese for the kings and queens of your household and their noble guests. Made in traditional fashion, our Double Cream Brie uses raw pasteurized milk with microbial rennet added, curdled, then cast into a mold, salted, and lightly aged. With a melt-in-your-mouth quality, Trader Joe's Double Cream Brie is a buttery soft-ripened cheese that makes dreaming of a cheesy dessert worth skipping dinner altogether. The second you cut into this creamy wedge, you notice how soft, spreadable, and delicate it is. But don't think the experience stops there! As you get hit with the unmistakably striking scent when you cut through the bloomy rind, you begin to dream of the fruity, subtly nutty flavors to come. After dishing our Double Cream Brie up for dining, all that's left is to pour a glass of your favorite wine to pair it with. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Double Cream Brie
074953.name: Double Cream Domestic Brie
074953.title: Double Cream Brie

078226.description: So often, at least here in the States, Iberico Cheese is overshadowed by its Manchego cheese sibling. And while we love to sell a variety of aged Manchego cheeses, the days of sibling rivalry are nevermore inside a Trader Joe's cheese case! Labeled "Queso Iberico" in its native La Mancha region of Spain, this Iberian delight is one of the most favored cheeses in Spain. Made from a blend of pasteurized sheep, cow, and goat's milk, Trader Joe's Iberico Cheese is already set up for a unique flavor and texture blend achieved only by using the trifecta of these milk sources. The cow's milk lends to a touch of acidity, but just enough to bring complexity. Buttery notes and intense flavor come from the sheep's milk. And last, but not least, a bit of barnyard piquancy is brought to the party with the addition of goat's milk. After this barnyard bash of cheeses join forces, the Iberico Cheese is aged four months to further develop a caramel, nutty flavor and bring out the aforementioned complexities of each milk source. The rich, buttery texture is wonderful for a snacking cheese, grating cheese, or melted cheese. So find your favorite cheesy recipe or bottle of exotic wine and bring Iberian flavors to a dining room near you. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Iberico Cheese
078226.name: Spanish Iberico

080620.description: When it comes to cheese, we don't just talk the talk. We walk the walk. Or rather, we ride the planes, trains, boats, whatever means of conveyance we can, really, to find amazing cheeses from all over the world. We take our cheeses seriously, and we know our customers do too, so we're willing to trek wherever necessary to find the real deal. Take, for instance, one of our favorite English cheeses, Trader Joe's English Coastal Cheddar. It's fantastically rich, sharp, and mature. Now, we sell plenty of Cheddars from outside of England, and they're all quite wonderful as well, but we also know that when you want English Cheddar, there's no substituting the real thing. So, we brought in authentic English Cheddar from the coastal county of Dorset, where the lush grasses are best suited for cows to graze and create the rich, creamy milk that sets our Coastal Cheddar apart from the rest. And because the only thing we love more than great cheese is great value, we offer Trader Joe's English Coastal Cheddar for $7.99 per pound, every day, at your local Trader Joe's.
080620.name: English Coastal Cheddar

081205.description: The birth story of each precious cut of Port Salut begins with its initial conception by Trappist monks during the nineteenth century at Abbey of Notre-Dame du Port du Salut, a monastery in Entrammes, France. Many of these monks were pushed out of France during the French Revolution and chose to learn cheesemaking as a way to support themselves abroad. When they returned following the Bourbon Restoration in France, they brought their cheesemaking talents with them and created Port Salut. But enough with the history lesson, Port Salut cheese is here to make personal history for you and yours. This semi-soft cheese is produced in the form of disks weighing in at a whopping five pounds of the good stuff! While that's enough to keep the party going for ages, it may be more cheese than you're looking to cut, so we go ahead and portion it for you at the vaulting value of $9.99* a pound at each and every Trader Joe's stores. Port Salut is a mild, mellow, and slightly acidic cow's milk cheese with an edible wax rind makes for a French pastoral nosh enjoyed either on occasion as part of a cheese board or with some wine and crackers on any given night at home! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Port Salut
081205.name: Cut Port Salut - France (Bulk 81204)

082807.description: We know, we know, cheese has so much lingo to keep up with. But hey, "Pecorino" simply defines Italian cheeses made from 100% sheep's milk and "Romano" just lets the cheese consumer know that the cheese is from Rome. So this oft grated, hard and salty Italian cheese is, in all respects, a sheep's milk cheese from Rome; Trader Joe's Grated Pecorino Romano, ladies and gentlemen. While this "ewe"phoric ovine cheese is recognized and protected by European law, it doesn't have to be made in Rome; 97% of Pecorino Romano is actually made in Sardinia. Of the four Pecorino cheeses that have Protected Designation of Origin certification, Pecorino Romano is the most ancient as well as the most famous outside of its homeland, Italy. Our supplier uses 100% fresh, unpasteurized sheep's milk for each portion of our Grated Pecorino Romano cheese. Each wheel is dry-salted by hand numerous times, resulting in a fabulously salty flavor. Young Pecorino Romano has a soft, rubbery texture and sweet flavor, but gets progressively sharper and smokier with age. Our Grated Pecorino Romano is aged a minimum of eight months to still have that sweet, young cheese essence, but stacked with sharp and salty notes. Because of its granular, grated texture and saltiness, this cheese works wonders as a dusting over pasta, breads, and casseroles, or possibly in a dish paired with a glass of bold Italian wine or a light beer. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing.
082807.name: Grated Pecorino Romano

086610.description: Trader Joe's Parmigiano Reggiano Stravecchio is the real deal. While you may find similar cheeses produced outside of Italy (and the EU) labeled "Parmesan", these are not the same as authentic Parmigiano Reggiano, which by law may only be made under strict regulations in the regions surrounding Parma and Reggio-Emilia in northern-central Italy. Italian's call true Parmigiano Reggiano the "King of Cheeses" which, for a country known for their cuisine, and specifically cheeses, is not a label they're likely to slap on anything edible. And that's exactly why we source Parmigiano Reggiano Stravecchio that is produced by a century-old cheese company in the province of Parma. Raw (unpasteurized) cow's milk is curdled, drained, and packed into round molds reading for aging. And the aging, itself, is what makes this cheese a cut above. Notice that term you've never heard before: "stravecchio". It means "very old" in Italian (or "very mature" when describing cheese) and is used to let the buyer know that this cheese has been aged a full 36 months before hitting the market. We know what you're thinking, "unaged Parm is already so good, why do I have to wait three more years?" And to that we say just try a bite and you'll understand why. Parmigiano Reggiano Stravecchio is more mellow than a younger Parmesan and lacks the acidity and pale color of a young cheese. The extra aging brings to the cheese a fuller, more complex taste, grainy texture, and plenty of desirable crunchy amino acid crystals found in hard Parmesan. There's a reason this is called the "King of Cheeses", and wouldn't you love to find out why? *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing.
086610.name: Parmesan Reggiano Stravecchio

086962.description: We've all heard it before. An ambitious entrepreneur sees a niche they want to fill with an innovative product. They start a family business and build it up for decades, sometimes centuries. And they all claim to have a special recipe under wraps known by only one person on this planet. While Old Amsterdam Aged Gouda is owned and operated by the Westland family, and it does have a magnificent, proprietary production process, it is surely more than just a run-of-the-mill family-made cheese. Every wedge of Old Amsterdam Aged Gouda is a toothsome blend of firm texture, deep color, and smooth, rich, and robust flavors of nutty-ness and caramel. Made from that secret family recipe, Old Amsterdam Aged Gouda is made relatively similar to other goudas. Pasteurized milk with added rennet and cheese cultures. Old Amsterdam prides itself in having found what they deem the perfect cultures for their Aged Gouda. Where things differ, however, is a secret, unique ripening process that is aged for approximately eight months. But because perfection cannot be rushed, a batch is not released until Old Amsterdam's master cheese makers deem it market ready. Once market ready, we proudly receive and stock Old Amsterdam Aged Gouda in a variety of wedges just waiting to unleash its smooth texture and mildly creamy flavors on our shoppers. Find it pre-sliced and in a variety of weights in our cheese cases for $11.99* a pound, all day every day. Sounds-a-like-a-goud-a deal to me! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Old Amsterdam Aged Gouda
086962.name: Old Amsterdam Gouda
086962.title: Cut Gouda Old Amsterdam - Holland (Bulk 86961)

087175.description: Cotswold is a variation on classic Double Gloucester cheese that has been imbued with chopped onions and chives for added flavor. It begins its life as a pasteurized whole milk cheese that originates in Gloucestershire County, England. It's a golden yellow, semi-hard cheese that is similar to cheddar, but not quite as hard. The "double" variety is aged longer than "Single Gloucester" which lends to a firmer cheese with a stronger, more savory flavor. The flavors of our Cotswold Double Gloucester are creamy, buttery, sweet and mild, yet full-flavoured like a cheddar cheese. With the added onions and chives, each bite has an extra-savory zing guaranteed to satisfy. Double Gloucester is a common pub cheese in England, making an iteration such as our Cotswold Double Gloucester a wonderful pairing with any beer or a bold Zinfandel, Shiraz, or Chardonnay. So remember to stop by the wine and beer section after picking up a block of cheese from our cheese cooler. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Cotswold Cheese
087175.name: Cotswold

088649.description: "There are two types of people who eat truffles: those who think truffles are good because they are dear and those who know they are dear because they are good." Jean-Louis Vaudoyer Oh, truffles. For thousands of years, you've inspired such passion, from ancient Mesopotamia to modern America. You've also inspired Trader Joe's Italian Truffle Cheese, which is definitely dear because it is good. Our Italian Truffle Cheese is made with black truffles from central Italy's Umbria region. Made from pasteurized cow's milk, it's a young cheese, aged for 15 days. Its mild flavor makes it the ideal canvas for the concentrated truffle oil and black truffle pieces that are blended liberally throughout the cheese. The truffles' earthy, woody, musky aroma shines, and on the palate, it delivers with aplomb. The semi-soft nature makes this an excellent melting cheese - it's delicious melted over roasted meats, makes delightful omelets, and adds dynamic dimension to pasta or potato dishes. It also makes a bold statement on a cheese board. We're selling Trader Joe's Italian Truffle Cheese in random-weight pieces of about eight ounces You'll find it in our cheese case. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Italian Truffle Cheese
088649.name: Italian Truffle Cheese

089767.description: "Goûtez les plaisirs du Roquefort" or "taste the pleasures of Roquefort" is the slogan and a tantalizing offer for Société Roquefort cheeses. We consider ourselves lucky to stock this French national treasure of a super fine fromage. Using specific Penicillium roqueforti from the natural caves of Roquefort-sur-Soulzon in France, Société Roquefort achieves an enchanting emerald veining throughout each wedge that is almost as visually mesmerizing as it is on the tastebuds. The emerald Penicillium roqueforti flows through an equally gorgeous cream-colored paste made from 100% ewe's milk. Using sheep's milk brings an intense, buttery flavor with a superbly creamy texture compared to cow's milk, despite the aging process zapping some moisture from the cheese. The tangy mold contrasts with the creamy and salty qualities of the sheep's milk used. Aged at least 90 days, the entire process of maturation, cutting, and subsequent packaging must take place in the commune of Roquefort- sur-Soulzon (the site of the caves and mold used) to abide by production regulation. Société Roquefort is still aged in 12,000 m2 of caves constructed way back in the Middle Ages. After all is said and done and the cheese has aged a few months, Société Roquefort crosses the pond to be available on your neighborhood Trader Joe's shelves ready to enjoy. "Goûtez les plaisirs du Roquefort." And to that we say: don't threaten us with a good time. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Société Roquefort
089767.name: Societe Roquefort
089767.title: Cut Roquefort Societe - France (Bulk 89765)

090798.description: While it may sound like an idea from a neanderthal, aging blue cheese in a cave proves to have a significant impact on the cheese's development and subsequent aged flavors and characteristics. With every passing day, Trader Joe's Cave Aged Blue Cheese is exposed to ideal conditions to make a uniquely aged cheese, full of the blue veins one comes to expect from a visually striking blue cheese. Crafted in Minnesota, there are no artificial additives or flavorings to the cheese, just good ol' fashioned raw milk, starter cultures, microbial rennet, Pennicillium roqueforti, and hand salting prior to aging. However, each wheel of Trader Joe's Cave Aged Blue Cheese is aged in arched caves in Minnesota full of incredibly pure and slightly acidic Saint Peter Sandstone. This slightly acidic sandstone helps mitigate unwanted bacteria and yeasts while still allowing for a remarkably humid environment for the cheese to age. The location of our Cave Aged Blue Cheese is also notable for being produced at the same site as the first produced American blue cheese. Pair with your favorite hoppy IPA or APA, a crisp sauvignon blanc, or top fresh salads and burgers for extra tanginess. Trader Joe's Cave Aged Blue Cheese is a delicious, versatile venture into the world of blue cheeses. Grab a cut today from our cheese section for only $6.99* a pound and you'll surely have no reason to feel blue. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Cave Aged Blue Cheese
090798.name: Cave Aged Blue

091415.description: "The Queen of Cheeses" - a regal nickname for a soft cheese with a storied history including being given as a tribute to be paid to French kings in the days of yore. While we don't suggest saving a slice of Trader Joe's Traditional French Brie for any current-day monarchs, we do think its a fitting cheese for the kings and queens of your household and their noble guests. Made in traditional fashion, our Traditional French Brie uses pasteurized cow's milk with animal rennet added, curdled, then cast into a mold, salted, and lightly aged. With a melt-in-your-mouth quality, Trader Joe's Traditional French Brie is a buttery soft-ripened cheese that makes dreaming of a cheesy dessert worth skipping dinner altogether. The second you cut into this creamy wedge, you notice how soft, spreadable, and delicate it is. But don't think the experience stops there! As you get hit with the unmistakably striking scent when you cut through the bloomy rind, you begin to dream of the fruity, subtly nutty flavors to come. After dishing our Traditional French Brie up for dining, all that's left is to pour a glass of your favorite wine to pair it with. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Traditional French Brie
091415.name: French Traditional Brie

091825.description: "The Queen of Cheeses" - a regal nickname for a soft cheese with a storied history including being given as a tribute to be paid to French kings in the days of yore. While we don't necessarily suggest saving a slice of Trader Joe's Light Brie for any current-day monarchs, we do think its a fitting cheese for the kings and queens of your household and their noble guests. Made in traditional fashion, our Light Brie uses pasteurized milk with microbial rennet added, curdled, then cast into a mold, salted, and lightly aged. With a melt-in-your-mouth quality, Trader Joe's Light Brie is a buttery soft-ripened cheese that makes dreaming of a cheesy dessert worth skipping dinner altogether. The second you cut into this creamy wedge, you notice how soft, spreadable, and delicate it is. But don't think the experience stops there! As you get hit with the unmistakably creamy scent when you cut through the bloomy rind, you begin to dream of the fruity, subtly nutty flavors to come. And by choosing Trader Joe's Light Brie, you get all those wonderful flavors but with 50% less fat and 30% fewer calories than our other brie offerings. After dishing our Light Brie up for dining, all that's left is to pour a glass of your favorite wine to pair it with. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing.
091825.name: Light Brie

092735.description: A Swiss cheese without those famous holes? You must be joking! Well, look again and you'll uncover a dense, firm, pale yellow Swiss cheese that is naturally smooth and devoid of the "eyes" found in its sibling cheese. Trader Joe's Gruyère Cheese is our Gruyère offering, bringing the Alpine cheese all-star to live amongst our cheese cases and be discovered by our shoppers for a creamy, nutty experience they can find nowhere else. An inimitable flavor and made with the utmost regard for quality, Trader Joe's Gruyère Cheese production can be distilled into a few simple parts: the use of high quality cow's milk; curdling of the milk in copper vats; cutting, mixing, and heating the curds; placing the paste into molds; bathing in salt and beginning the cheese's storage; and maturation in aging cellars. The six month aging process for our Gruyère is one of the most important steps. It's done in very humid environments to make for a moist, supple cheese with that intense flavor only achievable by aging. Not every cheese turns to a warm, decadent, ooey gooey pool of delight that you want to dive and dip into, but with Gruyère, we do get that pleasure. It takes a cheese made with rennet (as opposed to a cheese curdled with acid) to be a melting cheese, and then it takes a cheese with a high water-to-fat ratio to be a good melting cheese. Trader Joe's Gruyère is a good melting cheese and goes wonderfully melted into sandwiches or channel your inner 1960s American and get a couple of hip friends together for a fondue Friday! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing.
092735.name: Domestic Swiss Gruyere

094533.description: As far back as the year 1000 AD, asiago cheeses have been produced by farmers in the Asiago Plateau region of the Italian Alps for use by their local communities. Sounds like a great situation if you're living in Italy over a thousand years ago, but luckily for all of us, asiago cheese went global, became a well-loved staple cheese, and paved the way for Trader Joe's Asiago Cheese with Rosemary & Olive Oil. While we love our Italian imported Asiago Cheese [sku 62521], of course, we also love taking funky turns of classic products (Chocolate Hummus [sku 64204] or Peach Salsa [sku 28504] anyone?). It's because of this innovative nature that we sourced an Asiago with a twist. Our Asiago Cheese with Rosemary & Olive Oil is an approachable Asiago with the expected nutty flavor that happens to be hand-rubbed with rosemary and olive oil, making for a sensationally satiating cheese. The herbaceous quality brought by the natural earthiness and added rosemary pairs wonderfully with a hoppy IPA or a bowl of TJ's Olive & Herbs Mixed Nuts [sku 66493] making this the perfect cheese for a nice, nutty nosh. Additionally, this Asiago Cheese will go greatly grated over any number of freshly made pastas (might we suggest our Arugula & Parmigiano Reggiano Ravioli [sku 94346]). *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing.
094533.name: Rosemary And Olive Oil Asiago

094535.description: Over the years, we've offered Toscano Cheese in a number of iterations-some seasonal, some available every day. One of our perennial favorites is Trader Joe's Toscano Cheese with Black Pepper, an exceptional cheese that you don't have to save for a special occasion. As it ages, each wheel of cheese is hand-rubbed with cracked black pepper, so every wedge features a burst of mildly spicy pepper flavor-the closer you get to the outside of the wheel, the more pronounced the flavor becomes, yet it's never overpowering. Serve it on crackers, grated over pasta or shaved onto a freshly prepared steak. It's priced at $9.99 per pound, (random-weight wedges of about eight ounces will be somewhere in the vicinity of $5), so you can serve it often. You'll find it in our cheese case. Note: We suggest letting the cheese breathe at room temperature for about 30 minutes to maximize its flavor potential.
094535.name: Black Pepper Toscano
094535.title: Toscano Cheese With Black Pepper

095552.description: Trader Joe's Sweet Potato Pie Bites are filled with sweet potato, brown sugar, and butter which are topped with candied pecans then filled in a crispy fillo dough crust. Bake in about 25 to 30 minutes in its own tray, they're perfect for the holiday season. We are selling a 7 oz. box of Trader Joe's 12 Sweet Potato Pie Bites for $3.99. 095552.name: Cheddar Melange
095552.title: Cheddar & Gruyere Mèlange Cheese

096032.description: Transport yourself to a European world: frolicking through an emerald field in wooden clogs while beautiful tulips bloom below a gently spinning windmill. Ah, the Netherlands! While that fertile soil and those lush green pastures feel great under the pitter-patter of Dutch clogs, it serves a deeper, culinary purpose. Those luxuriant fields are also great at nourishing cows that produce incomparably rich milk, making traditional goudas (such as our Red Wax Gouda [sku 12603]) the brazenly buttery cheese they are. But with cheeses such as Trader Joe's Double Cream Gouda, additional cream is added to the already rich Hollander milk, creating one of the most luscious beginnings to a batch of cheese found in a turophile's world. A stunning Double Cream Gouda that is produced similarly to our other goudas, again, just with the supplementary cream added to the already rich pasteurized milk. Our supplier uses microbial enzymes making for a vegetarian friendly cheese and it's colored using annatto to help achieve the cheese's beautiful golden-orange color. The super high butterfat content - upwards of 60% - due to the added cream help make this cheese as decadent when snacked on by its lonesome as it is when melted into a hot dish in need of a cheesy companion. So grab a wedge for a number of melty meals or to tack on your next cheeseboard at your neighborhood Trader Joe's for as little as $7.99* a pound today (often cut into half-pound wedges)! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing.
096032.name: Double Cream Gouda Cheese

097196.description: Our creamy Toscano cheese soaked in syrah is a proprietary cheese made specifically for Trader Joe's. We took an award winning cheese and asked the cheese maker to soak it in our very own Trader Joe's Coastal Syrah. The cheese is a rich, creamy cheese with nutty, fruity flavor. It begins in the mouth like a premium parmesan and finishes in an award winning style with hints of melted butter and creamy cheddar. By wedding this rich, creamy cheese to the blackberry and plum jam
097196.name: Coastal Syrah Toscano
097196.title: Cut Creamy Toscano W Tjs Coastal Syrah (Bulk 97193)

097274.description: When it comes to cheese, we don't just talk the talk. We walk the walk. Or rather, we ride the planes, trains, boats, whatever means of conveyance we can, really, to find amazing cheeses from all over the world. We take our cheeses seriously, and we know our customers do too, so we're willing to trek wherever necessary to find the real deal. For one stop in our cheese-fueled world tour, we visited the Netherlands, the iconic home of windmills, tulip booms, and Trader Joe's 1,000 Day Gouda Cheese. It was there that we found the veteran cheese makers who hold the secret to ideal affinage-the art of caring for aging cheese-necessary for aging Gouda for such a prolonged period of time. During the maturation process, the cheese loses close to a quarter of its original weight, as its moisture content slowly but surely evaporates, condensing its naturally salty, caramel-y, and supremely savory flavor profile, without drying out completely. It's an intricate balance, and one that produces an unbelievably flavorful cheese. It's a long journey from the Dutch aging cellars to our cheese case, but it's a journey well worth taking. It's a delicious enough cheese that you may just find yourself idly snacking on it (we certainly won't judge), but if you're in the mood for a more organized setting, we recommend serving this Gouda as part of a dessert cheese plate, paired with a full-flavored Barolo wine, or as part of the most intense grilled cheese sandwich you've ever eaten. You can find Trader Joe's 1,000 Day Gouda Cheese at your neighborhood Trader Joe's for $11.99 per pound-by the far, the best price we've seen for a cheese of this quality and prestige.
097274.name: 1000 Day Aged Gouda
097274.title: 1000 Day Gouda Cheese

097308.description: Our Trader Joe's triple cream brie is a triple crème soft ripened cheese with wild porcini and chanterelle mushrooms. The earthy flavors of the mushrooms mingle happily with the velvety creaminess. The cheese ripens beautifully due to the unique process used to make it. Aromas of traditional brie are typically earthy with hints of mushroom. When you add real wild mushrooms to the mix, the aroma and flavors are magnified. Porcini is by far the more obvious flavor, producing beefy, brothy moist earth flavors. The chanterelles are more subtle and are present on the finish with hints of artichoke. The cheese itself shows the bet characteristics of a triple crème; great mouth feel and smooth creamy buttery flavor. At $8.99 per pound, this decadent triple cream mushroom brie is an all around WOW!
097308.name: Cut Triple Cream Brie With Wild Mushrooms
097308.title: Cut Brie Triple Cream W Wild Mushrooms (Bulk 97307)

097566.description: A Swiss cheese without holes? You must be joking! Well, look again and you'll uncover a dense, firm, pale yellow Swiss cheese that is naturally smooth and devoid of the "eyes" found in its sibling cheese. Le Gruyère Switzerland AOC Cheese is our Gruyère offering, bringing the Medieval Alpine cheese to live amongst our cheese cases and be discovered by our shoppers for a creamy, nutty flavor they can find nowhere else. An inimitable flavor and made with the utmost regard for quality, Le Gruyère AOC's production can be distilled into eight simple parts: the use of high quality, part skim cow's milk; curdling of the milk in copper vats; cutting, mixing, and heating the curds; placing the paste into molds; bathing in salt and beginning the cheese's storage; maturation in aging cellars; taxation by experts to denote that the cheese is of the quality to bear the Le Gruyère AOC name; and additional maturation time, if chosen. Not every cheese turns to a warm, decadent, ooey gooey pool of delight that you want to dive and dip into, but with Gruyère, we do get that pleasure. It takes a cheese made with rennet (as opposed to a cheese curdled with acid) to be a melting cheese, and then it takes a cheese with a high water-to-fat ratio to be a good melting cheese. Trader Joe's Le Gruyère is a good melting cheese and goes wonderfully melted into sandwiches or channel your inner 1960s American and get a couple of hip friends together for a fondue Friday! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Le Gruyère Switzerland AOC Cheese
097566.name: Switzerland Gruyere
097566.title: Raw Milk Le Gruyere Switzerland Cheese

097621.description: A Swiss cheese without holes? You must be joking! Well, look again and you'll uncover a dense, firm, pale yellow Swiss cheese that is naturally smooth and devoid of the "eyes" found in its sibling cheese. Cave Aged Le Gruyère Switzerland AOP Cheese is our Gruyère offering, bringing the Medieval Alpine cheese to live amongst our fridges and be discovered by our shoppers for a creamy, nutty flavor not found in other cheeses. An inimitable flavor and made with the utmost regard for quality, Cave Aged Le Gruyère's production can be distilled into eight simple parts: the use of high quality, part skim cow's milk; curdling of the milk in copper vats; cutting, mixing, and heating the curds; placing the paste into molds; bathing in salt and beginning the cheese's storage; maturation in aging cellars; taxation by experts to denote that the cheese is of the quality to bear the Le Gruyère AOP name; and additional maturation time. The additional maturation of this specific Le Gruyère is a key to the final taste and texture. It's aged in extremely humid "affinage" (maturation) cellars to keep the cheese moist while taking on the strong, bold flavors of a cheese that's been given time alone to age. Not every cheese turns to a warm, decadent, ooey gooey pool of delight that you want to dive and dip into, but with Gruyère, we do get that pleasure. It takes a cheese made with rennet (as opposed to a cheese curdled with acid) to be a melting cheese, and then it takes a cheese with a high water-to-fat ratio to be a good melting cheese. Trader Joe's Cave Aged Le Gruyère is a good melting cheese and goes wonderfully melted into sandwiches or enjoyed at room temp, solid, firm, and delicious! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing.
097621.name: Cave Aged Gruyere In Parchment
097621.title: Raw Milk Cave Aged Le Gruyère

012558.description: "I need to laugh and when the sun is out, I've got something I can laugh about; I feel good in a special way; I'm in love and it's a sunny day - Good day sunshine!" - The Beatles After spending a good day in the sunshine, whether you're at the beach, the lake or the pool, it's important to moisturize your skin. Trader Joe's Moisturizing Gel with Aloe does just that. This Aloe might look a bit different, but all that's changed is what's on the outside: a new name, and a new, blue bottle. Inside, it's the same great formula we sold last year. It's light & non-comedogenic, offering up all the soothing, moisturizing & skin- cooling properties that ingredients like Aloe barbadensis leaf juice, menthol, allantoin, calendula flower extract, & arnica montana flower extract can provide. And unlike other Aloe gels on the market, ours is made without artificial dyes (don't let the blue bottle fool you-it's clear), parabens, or pthalates. For cooling relief on hot, sunny days, store a bottle of Trader Joe's Moisturizing Gel with Aloe in the fridge before using. Ahhhhh...better? We thought so. But you don't need to wait for the sun to come out to apply this classic Gel; for a dewy, refreshed look, apply it liberally every day. Go ahead and enjoy your good day in the sunshine. When you're done, head to TJ's and pick up a 12-fluid ounce bottle of Aloe Vera Gel for the very good price of $2.99. You'll find it in our health & beauty section.

Taking the time to scrub up with a soft, luxuriously fragrant bar of soap can be a methodical, meditative practice: a moment to take pause, take inventory, and, most importantly, take care of yourself. That's why we're so proud to offer Trader Joe's Next to Godliness Oatmeal & Honey Soap, a preeminently pleasant plant-based bar of soap that provides a sense of calm, in addition to a sense of cleanliness. Each pack of our Oatmeal & Honey Soap contains two cream-colored bars of pure vegetable soap, each made with actual oatmeal and honey. After drying off with a towel, you'll then be treated to a luxuriously soft feeling in your hands, and a lovely, lingering scent to carry on into whatever the rest of the day has in store for you. 029649.description: Tea Tree Oil is an essential oil well known for its refreshing scent that lands on the nose somewhere between eucalyptus and fresh mint. Trader Joe's Tea Tree Oil uses pure Melaleuca Alternifolia Oil, also known as tea tree oil, native to Australia. The scent alone is tantalizing with its reviving medicinal, woodsy aroma that makes it a pleasant addition to natural home-cleaning sprays, lotions, and hair and face products. The Oil helps eliminate odors, fight bacteria, and has inherent antiseptic qualities that benefit acne prone skin and inflammation. Add a drop or two in a cotton pad with a little bit of water or other oils to dilute the dominant effects of Tea Tree - just a little will go a long way. If you're experiencing a cold or respiratory symptoms, add the essential oil to your diffuser with cedarwood or lavendar to sooth your congestion. The oil will have your skin looking smooth, your hair and skin feeling polished, and your home smelling delightful. It's time to stock your cabinets with this multi-purpose, 100% Australian Tea Tree Oil for each (one) fluid-ounce bottle for a $6.99*, a value that surely makes us tingle! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Tea Tree Oil

From scalp to strands, from head to toe, Jojoba Oil delivers essential hydration and actually mimics the natural oils found in skin and hair. Need to unclog your pores? Done. Need to freshen up your cuticles? Done. Need to take off your make up? How about moisturize your skin or rejuvenate your hair? Done, done, and done. 056722.description: We are all about kaizen! here at TJ's, so when our Buyer was reviewing our current HABA offerings alongside the latest health and beauty trends, she saw a fantastic opportunity to add a real gem to our lineup: Organic Argan Oil. And while Argan Oil may be all the rage these days, it's more than just a flash-in-the-pan product- it's an age-old Moroccan beauty secret. Allegedly first discovered for use by the Phoenicians in 1550 B.C., Argan Oil has been an Eastern Hemisphere cosmetic (and culinary) staple for centuries. The fruit of the argan tree (Argania spinosa L.) is small, round, fleshy, and anchored by a hard "nut." Each nut contains one to three small argan kernels, and workers must access these kernels in order to extract the oil. Most attempts to mechanize this process have been unsuccessful, so workers typically still peel the fruit and crack the nuts by hand. Our supplier purchases oil from various Moroccan women's cooperatives, and every last drop of it is USDA-certified organic. Unlike other cosmetic oils (Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E Oil, Coconut Oil, etc.), Argan Oil is noticeably silky, lightweight, and non-greasy; it absorbs quickly, and yet is still deeply moisturizing. Use it in place of face and/or body lotion. Smooth it into wet or dry hair to moisturize and tame frizz. Rub it onto dry, chapped hands and cuticles. This vitamin E and fatty acid-rich oil isn't called "liquid gold" for nothing...it does it all. We're selling each 1.7-fluid ounce bottle of Organic Argan Oil for just $6.99. This comes to about $4 per ounce, which is an unheard of value-we've never seen it sold for any less than $7 per ounce, and these versions are often non-organic, chock full of additives, and/or overwhelmed by added fragrance. You'll our Organic Argan Oil sittin' pretty in our health and beauty section. 02.XX. 17
056722.name: Oil Argan Org
056722.title: Argan Oil

059047.description: Refresh Citrus Body Wash is made just for us by a very well-respected maker of high quality beauty care prod- ucts. We can't tell you their name, or the names under which their products sell in other stores, but we can tell you that most of their products sell for much higher prices at other retailers. This is another excellent example of why having our products in the Trader Joe's label is such a winning scenario for you, our Customers. It works like this¿ Because Refresh Citrus Body Wash is in our private label-freeing the supplier from pack- aging, marketing or advertising costs-we're able to negotiate a ridiculously low price for what is a truly great quality product. And by ridiculously low, we really do mean ridiculously low. How low? How about $2.99 for a 16-ounce bottle? We're serious about value, and our seriousness results in an excellent price on this delightful bath product. This intersection of low price and high quality is what we call value. Trader Joe's Refresh Citrus Body Wash is a citrus-y formulation with orange, grapefruit, tangerine and lemon scents to truly "refresh" every time you cleanse. But that's not the only reason it deserves its refreshing moniker. It's made with vitamin C, chamomile, ginseng, ginger, essential oils, and vitamin B5. It was developed to nour- ish, moisturize, and leave your skin clean and silky smooth-refreshed. And don't forget that price of $2.99 for each 16-ounce bottle-that's mighty refreshing, too!
059047.name: Refresh Citrus Body Wash

061136.description: Ah, the epidermis-or, in layperson's terms, skin. As your body's largest and fastest-growing organ, your skin regulates your temperature, permits various sensations, and protects you from microbes and the elements. It puts in overtime for you, so why not return the favor by incorporating Trader Joe's Nourish Hyaluronic Moisture Boost Serum into your skincare routine? One of the greatest challenges to maintaining great skin-particularly on the face-is keeping it moisturized. The game plan here is simple, really: do all that you can to lock in your skin's natural moisture, then add to it as needed. Hyaluronic acid (H.A.) does a little bit of both. A gram of the stuff can attract and hold onto several liters of water., and it helps form a light, non-greasy protective barrier on the skin. Our water-based, unscented, never-tested-on- animals, non-comedogenic Hyaluronic Moisture Boost Serum was formulated by top dermatologists to contain 1% sodium hyaluronate-which is the greatest possible percentage of the pure, salt form of H.A. that we can use without causing the product to bead. Sodium hyaluronate has an even lower molecular weight than hyaluronic acid, so it can penetrate the skin more easily than H.A. can. It's just what your pretty-but-parched visage needs. Hyaluronic Moisture Boost Serum can be used in conjunction with any and all components of your regular beauty regime, but it particularly complements other products from the TJ's Nourish line. Twice a day, cleanse with All-In-One Facial Cleanser [sku 96404], apply a small amount of Serum to your entire face (and Antioxidant Facial Serum [sku 51150] if desired), then follow with a liberal application of Antioxidant Facial Moisturizer [sku 56285]. Luminous skin is right around the corner. We're selling each one-ounce bottle of our fancy Hyaluronic Moisture Boost Serum for the not-so-fancy price of $8.99. We haven't seen a high-end, quality Hyaluronic Serum like this sold for a price this reasonable in any other stores-and similarly-priced versions sold online come with hefty shipping and handling fees. Stop by the health and beauty section of your neighborhood Trader Joe's and take home a bottle today. 01.08. 18
061136.name: Serum Hyaluronic Moisture Boost
061136.title: Hyaluronic Moisture Boost Serum

066712.description: Winter wiping out your end-of-autumn glow? Does your venerable visage lack vibrance & vitality? Trader Joe's Nourish Microdermabrasion Scrub to the rescue! Additionally, each bar is enriched with shea butter, a skin superfood that promotes the healing of dryness, blemishes, and general clarity without clogging your precious pores. 074463.description: Self-care doesn't always have to come in the form of fancy spa days or weekend retreats. Sometimes, it can manifest in the small, simple gifts you give yourself each day. Made for us by a trusted cosmetics supplier in New Zealand, Trader Joe's Lemongrass Moisturizing Shampoo contains a carefully curated suite of botanical oils, including lemongrass, coconut, peppermint, argan, sunflower seed, and lemon myrtle, all to support healthy, clean, and moisturized hair. It's also safe for color-treated hair, and works especially well when used in tandem with our Lemongrass Moisturizing Conditioner [sku 74464]. Lemongrass Moisturizing Shampoo

What it doesn't contain, crucially, are any phthalates, parabens, or silicone. It's also safe for color-treated hair, and works especially well when used in tandem with our Lemongrass Moisturizing Shampoo [sku 74463]. Lemongrass Moisturizing Conditioner
074464.name: Lemongrass Conditioner
074464.title: Lemongrass Moisturizing Conditioner

074744.description: Looking to switch up your usual hair-washing routine? Trader Joe's Cleansing & Conditioning Hair Wash is just the thing! It replaces the typical two-step shampoo and conditioner hair-care ritual with one product that simultaneously cleans and conditions, leaving your hair soft and shiny! Many shampoos contain detergents that strip hair of its natural oils, which often leads to dry strands and itchy scalps. Our Hair Wash doesn't contain any detergents, sulfates, parabens, or silicone-so you're left with clean hair, minus the harsh side effects that result from shampoo overuse. Products like this one are often referred to as "co-washes"-conditioners that are used to both wash and condition hair-and they're becoming a popular alternative for good reason. By co-washing, your hair won't need to be washed as frequently. It will hydrate dry hair and help tame frizz while enhancing texture and adding volume. To use our Cleansing & Conditioning Hair Wash, simply wet your hair and apply it to your hair and scalp. It won't foam up like typical shampoos (that's what detergents do); it will feel more like a creamy conditioner. Enjoy the invigorating grapefruit and minty scent while you massage it into your hair and scalp then rinse thoroughly. Pick up a tube in our health and beauty section. Cleansing & Conditioning Hair Wash
074744.name: Hair Wash Conditioning Cleansing
074744.title: Cleansing + Conditioning Hair Wash

076117.description: Some years back, we carried a particular name-brand Castile Soap in our stores. When the price began to climb, and we could no longer offer it at a value to our customers, we made room on our shelves for new products. We've brought in some great stuff since then, but still, the requests rolled in: "We want Castile Soap!" you said. Well, folks, it's your lucky day-please put your soon-to-be-squeaky-clean hands together for our Castile comeback: Trader Joe's Multi- Purpose Peppermint Castille Soap! For those unfamiliar, Castile Soap has historically been referred to as "true soap." The first versions were made centuries ago in the Castile region of Spain, using local olive oil; however, by the turn of this century, "Castile" had come to reference any vegetable oil-based soap, as opposed to the animal fat-based soaps of the previous era. Today, Trader Joe's Multi-Purpose Peppermint Castile Soap is made with a gentle, nourishing blend of organic olive, coconut, hemp, and jojoba oils, plus organic peppermint oil to invigorate your senses. It's a low-lather soap, free from synthetic dyes and fragrances, and when we say it's Multi-Purpose, we mean it. You can use it as a body wash, shampoo, household cleaner, laundry cleaner, and more. (You'll find instructions for each use right on the bottle.) You'll find this king of the Castile claiming its rightful spot in our bath & body care section. Multi-Purpose Peppermint Castile Soap
076117.name: Soap Liquid Castile Peppermint
076117.title: Peppermint Multi-Purpose Castile Soap

056684.description: "What's in a name? That which we call a rose By any other name would smell as sweet." (From Romeo and Juliet, by William Shakespeare) Will was getting to the bottom of things-their essence. The larger discussion was about people (with last names like Montague), but he chose a rose to make his point. Whatever you call them, Roses draw our noses with sweet perfume, enticing our eyes with bright color. Trader Joe's makes it easy for you to experience and share a variety of Roses this Valentine's Day. For instance, we are offering beautiful bouquets in sundry shades of Pink. Each bouquet has One Dozen Roses-all the same pink-shade-with greens for contrast. The overall assortment of Pinks includes a pale blush, to a bright "hot pink," with several shades inbetween. No matter the shade, Pink Roses convey love, joy, and gratitude. Choose the hue that strikes your fancy, or that matches the personality of the one with whom you'll share it. To the receiver, the particular Pink probably won't matter; not as much as the simple fact that they just received roses. A pink rose of any shade would smell as sweet! We're selling each bouquet of 12 Pink Roses for $12.99. Find them in our stores among our fresh selection of fragrant flowers and fancy plants. 02.01 .16
056684.name: V-Day Pink Roses Dz W/Greens

058033.description: These beautiful flowers are grown for Trader Joe's in the fertile land of the Savannah of Bogota, Colombia and the Andean mountain range of Quito, Ecuador. Our Rainforest certified farms grow this rich assortment of flowers specifically for our Trader Joe's customers. These lovely mixes of long-lasting flowers are sure to dazzle as a gift or accent any home décor.
058033.name: Bouquet Seasonal $9.99
058033.title: Seasonal Bouquet

058308.description: These beautiful flowers are grown for Trader Joe's in the fertile land of the Savannah of Bogota, Colombia and the Andean mountain range of Quito, Ecuador. Our Rainforest certified farms grow this rich assortment of flowers specifically for our Trader Joe's customers. These lovely mixes of long-lasting flowers are sure to dazzle as a gift or accent any home décor.
058308.name: Bouquet Petite $3.99

062512.description: If you're buying roses for the big day, you could buy them anywhere. Of course, depending on where you buy them, you might find that you're paying way more than you need to. Perhaps you're thinking, "But I don't want my beloved to think I'm cheap." That's one way to look at it. The other way to look at it is, "Oh, but my beloved will know I value some things more than money; my beloved will know that I understand the beauty of the flowers is much more valuable than how much I spent on said flowers." Bottom line: when you buy your Valentine's Day flowers at Trader Joe's, you're signaling that you value beauty and a great deal. And that makes you a catch! Just in time for this lovers' holiday, we're offering a glass Vase filled with A Dozen Red Roses and gypsophila, also known as baby's breath. The Roses are big, beautiful, and deep red-an excellent gift for the one you love. Or like a lot. Each clear or red (we have both) frosted glass Vase is presented in a see-through bag with handles, making it infinitely easier to get this gift where it needs to go. You can gift it in or out of the bag, but this ease-of-transportation piece is crucial-have you ever attempted to carry a vase filled with flowers and water in your car or on the subway? The bag helps. We're selling A Dozen Red Roses in a Vase for $17.99. This is a love-ly value you'll find only at your neighborhood Trader Joe's-and only from February 13th to February 14th, while inventory lasts. 02.13.18
062512.name: Roses Dz With Vase In Bag V Day

067424.description: The beautiful flowers that make up this rich bouquet are grown for Trader Joe's on the fertile land of the Savannah of Bogota, Colombia. Our Rainforest Certified farm grows this rich assortment of flowers specifically for Trader Joe's. This lovely mix made up of at least 12 stems of long lasting flowers are an amazing value that is sure to dazzle as a gift, or accent any home décor.
067424.name: Seasonal Bqt $6.99

Our Rainforest certified farms grow this rich assortment of flowers specifically for our Trader Joe's customers. These lovely mixes of long-lasting flowers are sure to dazzle as a gift or accent any home décor.
067425.name: Seasonal Bqt $12.99
067425.title: Seasonal Bouquet, Large

070570.description: We sell a variety of wheat-flour tortillas, including organic wheat and whole wheat options. For those looking for a gluten-free option, we sell tortillas made with quinoa flour. However, while quinoa is gluten free (and technically a seed), it is still classified as a psuedo-cereal grain. This has meant that people seeking a grain-free tortilla option in our stores were out of luck-until the introduction of Trader Joe's Almond Flour Tortillas! Like the name says, these are made with almond flour, supplemented by tapioca starch for better texture & flexibility. In fact, they are quite flexible (an essential quality in a tortilla), so you can easily fold our Almond Flour Tortillas around whatever kind of taco filling you desire. You can even top your tacos with Almond Mozzarella Style Shreds [sku 54764]-or use the Shreds to make an all-almond quesadilla! Aside from the tasty utility of these Almond Flour Tortillas, you also get the benefit of their gluten-free, grain- free status. Find them in our bakery section along with their grain-ful counterparts. Almond Flour Tortillas
070570.name: Tortilla Almond Flour 6 Inch Gf
070570.title: Trader Joe'S Almond Flour Tortillas

073858.description: If you're a regular at your neighborhood deli, you likely already know that a good marble rye is a marvel to behold - and that's exactly how we'd describe Trader Joe's Sliced Marble Rye Bread. It's made for us by an expert baker in Massachusetts, who prepares every loaf by rolling light and dark rye doughs, both dotted with crunchy, anise-esque caraway seeds, into a single harmonious swirl, then bakes it until it forms a gloriously golden crust. Each slice has a light, sourdough-like flavor, accented by distinctly nutty caraway aromas, making it an ideal bread for making a Reuben, tuna melt, or any other stacked-high sandwich you can dream of. In addition to its usefulness in deli-style situations, our Marble Rye also makes a great option for your breakfast toast, especially when served with butter and jam. It also works wonders when used for avocado toast with sliced cherry tomatoes and a light sprinkling of Nutritional Yeast [sku 58871], or even when simply topped with a thin layer of Organic Light Whipped Cream Cheese [sku 44675] and a few pieces of your favorite smoked fish from our deli section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Sliced Marble Rye Bread
073858.name: Bread Rye Marbled

021509.description: Ideal for warm winter meals and early spring soups, Trader Joe's Organic Vegetable Broth is fully cooked, ready to heat and serve. The recipe begins with organically grown veggies like carrots, celery, onion, leeks, and tomatoes. These veggies, along with a carefully selected assortment of herbs and spices, are slow simmered in small batches to create broth that's simultaneously light and incredibly rich in flavor. Use our Organic Hearty Vegetable Broth to make soups or stews, in place of milk & butter in mashed potatoes, or as a substitute for meat-based broths in gravies and sauces. For a quick winter warm-up, heat a cup of Broth and serve with crusty bread or your favorite croutons. It's gluten free and fat free, You'll find each resealable 32-ounce container of Trader Joe's Organic Vegetable Broth in our grocery aisle, every day next to our other soups and broths. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Hearty Vegetable Broth
021509.name: Org Vegetable Broth
021509.title: Organic Hearty Vegetable Broth

029090.description: Trader Joe's Organic Creamy Tomato Soup comes to us from a company that specializes in...(wait for it) ...soup, so they spend an inordinate amount of time thinking about, cooking and eating - you guessed it - soup. They know their soup. And luckily for all of us, their soup is our soup. This one is rich and savory, with a nice tart-sweet balance, courtesy of ripe, organic tomatoes, salt, and organic garlic and onion powders. The Creamy part comes courtesy of farm-fresh organic milk, sourced from a dairy located just a short drive from where they make the soup. Nice! Serve it on its own, with a dollop of sour cream or a few shavings of Parmesan. Pair it with a salad to make a simple, light-ish meal in mere minutes. Or go full classic-comfort-food and serve a cup of Organic Creamy Tomato Soup alongside a gooey grilled cheese sandwich. Can't go wrong here, folks. We're selling each 32-fluid ounce, resealable container of Organic Creamy Tomato Soup for the everyday value price of $2.69. Can't go wrong with this price, either. You'll find it in our grocery aisle.
029090.name: Org Creamy Tomato Soup
029090.title: Trader Joe'S Organic Creamy Tomato Soup

030416.description: Trader Joe's Organic Free Range Chicken Broth is a flavorful broth that's made for us from organically raised chickens and organic vegetables like celery, onions, and carrots. We have this Organic Free Range version as well as an Organic Low Sodium version [sku 87063]. They're virtually identical, except for the salt. Some folks like to have the option to add their own salt (or not), and others like to have it there when they start cooking. Both of our Organic Chicken Broth options add terrific flavor to basics like mashed potatoes or rice, and make great bases for sauces, gravies, and all kinds of soups. They both are gluten free (believe it or not, some broths have added gluten), and the Low Sodium version comes with a mere 50mg of sodium per serving. So whether you're mashing potatoes, boiling rice or making a signature soup creation, you'll find a helping hand in Trader Joe's Organic Free Range Chicken Broth and Low Sodium Chicken Broth. They even come in convenient 32-ounce containers, with resealable pour spouts - no can opener required here. We're selling each one for the excellent everyday price of $1.99. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Free Range Chicken Broth
030416.name: Org Free Range Chicken Broth
030416.title: Organic Free Range Chicken Broth

051011.description: Miso and ginger Simmering savory sweet Enriching recipes now It's not just any product for which we will attempt a haiku, but this new cooking essential feels deserving of poetic introduction (we tried). Broth is the basic base for soups, sauces or gravies. It's also a flavorful cooking medium for grains, vegetables, seafood or meats. Miso Ginger Broth introduces a light, Asian- inspired profile to your recipe repertoire. Miso, soy sauce, ginger, carrots, onions, celery and a selection of umami-imparting seasonings are gently simmered in water to extract the essential savory, lightly sweet flavors with warm hints of ginger. It's just robust enough to welcome tofu, chopped onions and be enjoyed as soup. Pile in vegetables - broccoli, mushrooms, cabbage and carrots - for a heartier vegetarian serving. Use it to cook noodles, rice or lentils. Create seafood stews. Marinate Fish¿ It is ready to enrich your recipes now. Better than a haiku, we present a 32 fluid ounce container of beautiful Miso Ginger Broth for just $1.99.
051011.name: Miso Ginger Broth

057879.description: Making soup from scratch is a lovely, romantic notion. In theory. In practice, it gets a little more complicated. It generally involves spending long hours in the kitchen, plenty of chopping and dicing, copious amounts of stirring, and did we mention long hours standing in the kitchen? If you have the time on your hands, we're all for homemade. We love homemade. But if, like us, you don't always have the time, we have some homey fully- cooked-and-ready-to-heat soups that will warm you inside and out. One of our favorites is Trader Joe's Organic Tomato & Roasted Red Pepper Soup. It's a velvety smooth concoction with a subtle tomato base. Its depth of character comes from the flavorful spices and the slightly sweet finish is courtesy of the Roasted red bell peppers. You can serve it as is, or add big chunks of veggies and some beans to make it even heartier. A dollop of sour cream or crème fraîche never hurts. You'll find each 32-fluid ounce resealable carton of Organic Tomato & Roasted Red Pepper Soup in our grocery aisle. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Tomato & Roasted Pepper Soup
057879.name: Org Tmto & Rstd Rd Pepper Soup
057879.title: Organic Tomato & Roasted Red Pepper Soup

058216.description: We have to admit: when it came to finding a nutrition-dense broth, we had a bit of a bone to pick. After receiv- ing many requests for bone broth (stock made with heavy soup bones to release more gelatin, collagen, and amino acids than occur in everyday broth) from our superfood-friendly customers, our buyers searched the marketplace, but found that much of what was available was either too expensive, not flavorful enough, or both. That is, until we happened upon a small supplier that specializes in organic bone broths that exceeded our expectations of quality and value so much that we knew we had to bring it in. So now, we're pleased to say, our customers can have a new bone (broth) to pick (out), in the form of Trader Joe's Organic Beef Bone Broth. Made with marrow and cartilage-rich bones from organic cattle, our Organic Beef Bone Broth is rich, savory, and delicious. With its marvelously concentrated beef stock flavor, it can be enjoyed perfectly well on its own - many bone broth fans simply enjoy drinking a cup at breakfast with a bit of lemon juice and cracked pepper - or as an extra flavorful substitute for regular beef broth. Bone broth naturally contains high levels of collagen and amino acids like glucosamine and glycine, and as if that wasn't enough, each one-cup serving also contains 10 grams of protein. Not only is Trader Joe's Organic Beef Bone Broth delicious, not only is it a nutritional powerhouse, but at $2.99 for a 17-ounce container, it's a phenomenal value, too. To our eagerly-awaiting bone broth buffs, we just know that you're going to love it. We can feel it in¿well¿our bones. You'll find it in our grocery aisle, with the other broths and shelf-stable soups. 07.30. 18
058216.name: Soup Tetra Bone Broth Beef Org
058216.title: Trader Joe'S Organic Beef Bone Broth

After receiv- ing many requests for bone broth (stock made with heavy soup bones to release more gelatin, collagen, and amino acids than occur in everyday broth) from our superfood-friendly customers, our buyers searched the marketplace, but found that much of what was available was either too expensive, not flavorful enough, or both. That is, until we happened upon a small supplier that specializes in organic bone broths that exceeded our expectations of quality and value so much that we knew we had to bring it in. So now, we're pleased to say, our customers can have a new bone (broth) to pick (out), in the form of Trader Joe's Organic Chicken Bone Broth. Made with marrow and cartilage-rich bones from organic chickens, our Organic Chicken Bone Broth is savory, aromatic, and delicious. With its marvelously concentrated chicken stock flavor (think chicken noodle soup taken to the next level), it can be enjoyed perfectly well on its own - many bone broth fans simply enjoy drinking a cup at breakfast like you would a cup of tea - or as an extra flavorful substitute for regular chicken broth. Bone broth naturally contains high levels of collagen and amino acids like glucosamine and glycine, and as if that wasn't enough, each one-cup serving also contains 10 grams of protein. Not only is Trader Joe's Organic Chicken Bone Broth delicious, not only is it a nutritional powerhouse, but at $2.99 for a 17-ounce container, it's a phenomenal value, too. To our eagerly-awaiting bone broth buffs, we just know that you're going to love it. We can feel it in¿well¿our bones. You'll find it in our grocery aisle, with the other broths and shelf-stable soups. 07.30. 18
058217.name: Soup Tetra Bone Broth Ckn Org
058217.title: Trader Joe'S Organic Chicken Bone Broth

072306.description: As part of our continuing efforts to kaizen our soup selections, we set our sights on an old standby: our Organic Lentil Vegetable Soup [sku 63310]. As hearty, filling, and delicious as this classic veggie soup was, we found ourselves wondering if there wasn't room for improvement. So, we rolled up our sleeves and began working with a supplier to develop an even better version. Just like its previous incarnation, this Trader Joe's Organic Lentil Vegetable Soup is vegan and organic, but this time, it's gluten free, too. And if that weren't enough, it's even more savory and satisfying - our best Lentil Vegetable Soup yet, if we do say so ourselves. Made from a simple, yet elegant, recipe of organic potatoes, onions, carrots, spinach, green beans, and lentils, slowly simmered in a rich, organic tomato-based broth, this Soup has a comfy, homey flavor and a lovely mix of tender, toothsome textures. It's as simple to prepare as pouring into a saucepan and heating until steamy, and takes especially well to toppings like grated Parmesan or crunchy croutons. Plus, it's a great staple to keep in your pantry for a last-minute lunch option, or a pick-me-up when you're feeling under the weather. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Lentil Vegetable Soup
072306.name: Soup Lentil Vegetable Organic
072306.title: Organic Lentil Vegetable Soup

075001.description: It's wedding season at Trader Joe's! Bells are ringing, the flower section is bursting with bouquets, and after a short walk down our grocery aisle, we'd like to introduce you to the newest addition to the TJ's soup family- Trader Joe's Italian-Style Wedding Soup. But before you throw that bouquet into a crowd at the checkout line, this Soup doesn't actually have anything to do with weddings. In Italian, Wedding Soup is called "minestra maritata," meaning marriage soup, referring to the way the flavors of the meat and vegetables harmoniously meld together, not because it's served at Italian weddings. Though, if we were throwing a wedding at Trader Joe's, we'd be happy to be served this soup. Our version has a flavorful chicken broth, with rich, beef meatballs, and a garden-worth of veggies, like kale, carrots, and onions. The flavor is intensified with Parmesan cheese, and for an extra dose of comfort, little pearls of pasta, called acini di pepe, in every bite-sounds worthy of a celebration to us! All you have to do is heat it up. We recommend serving it with a toasted Ciabatta Baguette [sku 96398]. Italian-Style Wedding Soup
075001.name: Soup Italian Wedding
075001.title: Italian-Style Wedding Soup

075721.description: If you were to ask us to name a one-can supper superhero, our answer would be a resounding soup! It's a dish that's cozy, comforting, and filling all on its own, while at the same time managing to be almost-infinitely customizable, should you choose to expand your menu outside the bowl-especially if your starting point is a bowl of Trader Joe's Chicken Noodle Soup. This Soup starts with a base of savory Chicken broth and hearty chunks of white Chicken meat. From there, slightly sweet, orange carrot coins and sliced celery offer colorful contrast, their flavors further amplified with the allium-y goodness of garlic and onion powders. Bringing the classic Chicken Soup vibe full-circle is the generous addition of tender, corkscrew-shaped egg Noodles. Add to all that its impossibly easy prep (it reheats on the stove or in the microwave in mere minutes), and it's easy to see why this Soup received an enthusiastic two spoons up from our tasting panel! For an additional pop of texture, try adding slivered fresh snap peas, sliced green onions, or a scoop of Crunchy Chili Onion-or all three!-to a piping hot bowl of this Soup. A hunk of crusty bread for dipping wouldn't hurt, either. You'll find this Chicken Noodle Soup on our grocery shelves for a super value, every day. Chicken Noodle Soup
075721.name: Soup Chicken Noodle
075721.title: Chicken Noodle Soup

Some folks like to have the option to add their own salt (or not), and others like to have it there when they start cooking. Both of our Organic Chicken Broth options add terrific flavor to basics like mashed potatoes or rice, and make great bases for sauces, gravies, and all kinds of soups. They are both gluten free (believe it or not, some broths have added gluten), and the Low Sodium version comes with a mere 50mg of sodium per serving. So whether you're mashing potatoes, boiling rice or making a signature soup creation, you'll find a helping hand in Trader Joe's Organic Chicken Broth and Low Sodium Chicken Broth. We're selling each one for the excellent everyday price of $1.99 - we haven't seen an everyday price this low anywhere else. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Low Sodium Chicken Broth

039302.description: A rooster's sunrise song. A cow's morning moo. The fresh fruit of a farmer's labor. Trader Joe's Organic Salted Butter harkens a romantic portrait of a vintage farmhouse, whipping together the most natural, freshly churned butter one can dream of. Our suppliers fashion this sweet cream culinary staple by simply churning pasteurized organic cream to separate the butterfat from the buttermilk. From there, they culture the butterfat with lactic acid which allows the butter to enrich its flavor even further while aged in cold storage. Trader Joe's Organic Salted Butter is produced without the use of hormones or antibiotics, sourced from family farms using GMO-free cow feed, and adhering to strict organic standards throughout the production and packaging processes. All of this organic sweet (cream) talk is served up daily in a 16-ounce package for $5.19*. Find Trader Joe's Organic Salted Butter in our refrigerators beside our crop of creamy dairy products! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Trader Joe's Organic Salted Butter
039302.name: Butter Quarters Org Salted
039302.title: Organic Butter Salted

045668.description: From farm to fridge, butter is among the purest and most natural ingredients in the kitchen, so it should be no surprise that our Kerrygold Salted Irish Butter begins with a pure and natural source of dairy. Kerrygold focuses so heavily on their cows that they only use top-tier, lush green Irish grass as fodder for their rBST-free livestock and dedicated farmers to nurture the happiest cows on the planet! We hope this happiness transcends international logistics, the short time in the Trader Joe's refrigerator, and the shorter time in your shopping cart so that you, too, can smile knowing you have the finest salted butter this side of the pond. Kerrygold Salted Irish Butter is a premium, all-purpose, all-natural butter. Spread it on a scrumptious slice of sourdough toast, allow it elevate your holiday baking and cooking, or serve it tableside with every meal. This quality of butter deserves nothing short of being served in grandma's antique butter keeper! Kerrygold Salted Irish Butter is flying out of our dairy shelves for $3.49* per eight-ounce package; available at all Trader Joe's neighborhood stores! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Kerrygold Salted Irish Butter
045668.name: Butter Irish Kerrygold Salted Sweet
