Grab a tub today and take your culinary travels to Italy with a Mascarpone recipe! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Mascarpone
042747.name: Mascarpone

050464.description: The folks at Beecher's are known for making some of the best handcrafted cheese on the market, using only the best ingredients. So naturally, we jumped at the opportunity to carry their Flagship Cheese-a semi-hard cheese made with a proprietary blend of Swiss and Cheddar cheese cultures-in our Pacific Northwest, Mid- Atlantic, and New England stores. Beecher's Flagship Handmade Cheese starts with the milk of Holstein and Jersey Cows, collected from local (local to Beecher's Seattle & Manhattan cheese shops, that is), family-run dairy farms. Carefully trained cheese makers add a proprietary blend of Swiss and Cheddar cheese cultures, salt, and microbial enzymes, then the cheese is left to age for 15 months. The end result is a complex, nutty, robust, and semi-hard cheese with a slight crumble that, frankly, we can't get enough of. Enjoy piece of Beecher's Flagship atop a TJ's Some Enchanted Cracker [sku 94591], possibly with a smear of TJ's Fig Butter [sku 96478] and a handful of TJ's Rosemary Marcona Almonds [sku 90083] on the side. It's also delish in grilled cheese sandwiches, omelets, and homemade mac n' cheese. Plus, the price is right on this Flagship Cheese, so you can slice, shred, and cube to your heart's content without breaking the bank. We're selling hunks of Beecher's Flagship Handmade Cheese for $12.29/lb.-about two dollars per pound less than it sells for anywhere else, including in Beecher's own cheese shops. You'll find it at your neighborhood Trader Joe's.
050464.name: Beechers Flagship Cheddar

050920.description: "Ricotta" is an old Italian word literally meaning "recooked" which is a tell-tale, practical naming, telling you exactly how this fluffy, sweet cheese is produced. Cheesemakers simply take the whey left from whipping up batches of other types of cheese, drizzle in whole milk, an acid of some sort (in our case, acetic acid), and begin cooking the whey mixture. This causes curds to coagulate, grow, and solidify. Finally, the curds are strained of the remaining whey and you're left with freshly made, fluffy, white Whole Milk Ricotta Cheese. The aforementioned process is the "traditional" way (or should we say whey) of making ricotta, and as we're never one to shy away from culinary tradition, Trader Joe's Ricotta Cheese follows this authentic tradition to bring our shoppers a classically Italian cheese able to find its way into tons of recipes! An ideal cheese for lasagna, baked pastas, stuffed shells, and of course dessert recipes such as cannolis and cheese blintzes. In addition to all these mealtime options, our Whole Milk Ricotta Cheese is high in calcium and, for a cheese, light in fat and high in protein. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Whole Milk Ricotta Cheese
050920.name: Traditional Whole Milk Ricotta Cheese

051533.description: Back for its annual, fall-season, limited-run is Trader Joe's Pumpkin Cream Cheese. After a fanfare- filled debut in 2010 this has become one of our Pumpkin Season staples. Why? Glad you asked. Inside the tub is a blend of real pumpkin and an especially rich, tantalizingly tangy cream cheese, with a bit of vanilla, brown sugar, cinnamon & ginger added to ramp up the "pumpkin pie" quotient. It's lightly whipped, so it's easily spreadable, yet it still retains the rich, dense texture of good cream cheese. Like any cream cheese worthy of the mantle "schmear," our Pumpkin Cream Cheese is excellent on bagels, English muffins, or toast. It also makes an excellent dip for cookies (especially our Speculoos Cookies, and Pumpkin Biscotti), a natural mate for pumpkin bread and an imaginative alternative to peanut butter on a sandwich or in celery ribs. No need to imagine a great value with Trader Joe's Pumpkin Cream Cheese. We're selling each eight ounce tub for the everyday price of $2.99, throughout the season.
051533.name: Hol Pumpkin Cream Cheese

052954.description: Translated literally, quattro formaggio means "four cheese" in Italian, which makes it an excellent title for this blend of shredded Italian cheeses. Trader Joe's Quattro Formaggio combines Parmesan cheese, Asiago cheese, Fontina cheese, and mild Provolone Cheese in one convenient re-sealable bag. This power quartet of curds provides a bold alternative to milder mozzarella. It's bene on garlic bread and takes your homemade pizza up a couple notches. Use it layered between our oven-ready Lasagna Noodles [sku 93487], sprinkled on top of baked Rigatoni [sku 95389], or tossed with hot Linguine [sku 47909] and a chiffonade of fresh Organic Basil [sku 67343]. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Quattro Formaggio
052954.name: Shredded Quattro Formaggi

054393.description: "Tillamook" is a Native American word meaning, "Land of Many Waters." If you take a look at Oregon's Tillamook Valley, you'll see why its name makes perfect sense-this green, coastal paradise boasts five rivers, five bays, and the Pacific Ocean. The region's cool, moist climate makes it ideal for dairy farming and, thus, ideal for cheese making, too. Think about it: quality cheese requires quality milk, quality milk comes from healthy cows, healthy cows love nutritious grass, grass loves rain, and rain loves the Tillamook Valley! Phew. Tillamook® Medium Cheddar is made following the very same, four-ingredient recipe that Tillamook® has been following since 1894, when it was first introduced by a guy known as "The Cheese King of the Coast." (Promising nickname, no?) The original-recipe Tillamook® Medium Cheddar, however, isn't kosher-so several decades later, the folks at Tillamook® launched a vegetarian-friendly, taste-alike version: Tillamook® Kosher Medium Cheddar. It's the same, rich and creamy Cheddar-aged for a minimum of sixty days to give it that signature, medium bite-but it's made under rabbinical guidance from OK Kosher, with vegetable enzymes instead of animal rennet. Tillamook® Kosher Medium Cheddar is the perfect "universal" Cheddar. Enjoy it with crackers. Use it in a grilled cheese sandwich. Shred it and host a Tillamook® Taco Tuesday. Slice it and let it melt atop a warm slice of TJ's Apple Crumble Pie [sku 61482]. We've been carrying Tillamook® Kosher Medium Cheddar in our East Coast & Midwest stores for over 15 years, and now, at long last, it's available in Trader Joe's stores nationwide. We're selling each 8-ounce hunk for $3.79-you'll find it in our cheese case.
054393.name: Tillamook Kosher Cheddar
054393.title: Pkg Cheddar Tillamook Kosher & Vegetarian

054764.description: We currently sell three cheese alternatives: Soy Cheese Blend (Cheddar, Mozzarella & Jack Flavors) [sku 71076], Soy Cheese Mozzarella Style Alternative [sku 87781], and Sliced Soy Cheddar [sku 69907]. These are perfect for the cheese lover that wants to avoid lactose... unless they are allergic to soy, which is among the top eight aller- gens. If you crave cheese, but you want to avoid lactose-and you are allergic to soy-we've got an announce- ment: Trader Joe's Almond Mozzarella Style Shreds Cheese Alternative is here for you! This is one of those products resulting from customer requests. You talked, we listened. If Almond Cheese seems a weird concept, just think about how common Almondmilk [sku 94740] has become in recent years. This Almond Mozzarella Style Cheese starts in a similar way-by adding filtered water to crushed, raw, non- irradiated, organic, California almonds. (Tiny flecks of brown almond skin in this cheese assure you that we are using whole, real almonds and not some synthetic, almond-ish alternative.) This almond milk forms the cheese base, to which is added casein (milk protein that coagulates to form curds), along with natural Parmesan cheese flavor. Obviously, this is not a vegan cheese, however it is 99% lactose free, which is great news for those who are lactose intolerant. Maybe the best news of all is the fact that our Almond Mozzarella Style Shreds possess a wonderful nuttiness and a great texture that melts like real cheese. Try it on homemade pizza with our Frozen Organic Pizza Crusts [sku 51242], Giotto's Pizza Sauce [sku 37333], and Volpi Sliced Pepperoni [sku 38491]. The eight ounce bag of Trader Joe's Almond Mozzarella Style Shreds is $3.49, everyday. Find it in our refriger- ated cheese case. 10.19. 15
054764.name: Shredded Almond Cheese

056942.description: The lush, green pastures of New Zealand's organic dairy farms provide the jumping off point for our Sliced New Zealand Organic Cheddar. The milk used to produce this distinctive cheese comes from cows raised on family owned dairies and treated to a diet of the abundant organic clover and grasses that blanket the pastures of New Zealand's dairy lands. Moderate temperatures (60-75ºF), flowing mountain streams, and abundant rainfall mean that there is ample pasture for grazing year round. Because of their diet, the cows produce incredibly rich and flavorful milk, and that milk, in turn, produces incredibly rich and flavorful cheese. Trader Joe's Sliced New Zealand Organic Cheddar is aged for three to six months, enough time to al- low its fresh and creamy profile to fully emerge. It's excellent on burgers, as a quick snack, and of course, on sandwiches, cold or hot - try it on a grilled cheese with arugula and fig butter! We're selling an eight ounce package of about eight slices for $4.99, every day. That's a cheesy value! You'll find it in our cheese case. 01.23. 17
056942.name: Sliced Nz Organic Cheddar
056942.title: Sliced New Zealand Organic Cheddar

060556.description: Way, way, way back in 2008, we introduced a very special product. A product that almost instantly captured the hearts and minds of Crew and customers alike. That product was Chèvre with Honey. To this day it's a Trader Joe's cheese case staple. We've decided, though, to give it a bit of a makeover¿ Trader Joe's Chèvre with Honey Goat's Milk Cheese is the same fantastic cheese we've been selling for ten years, but now in a five-ounce log with an updated label. Crafted using traditional techniques and goat's milk from small family farms in the Midwest, this Chèvre combines the sweet goodness of honey with the tangy temptation of goat cheese. One of the reasons for the enormous popularity of this cheese is not just its deliciousness or uniqueness, but also its versatility. You can enjoy it in the same way we did when we first encountered this product years ago: slathered thick on slices of crusty Organic French Baguette [sku 53835] and popped under the broiler for a couple minutes. Trust us, it's an instant crowd-pleaser. It's equally as wonderful when served with crackers and fruit, or spread on a piece of toast with Raspberry Preserves [sku 87805] in the early a.m. Atop a burger, intrigu- ing in an omelet, crumbled onto a salad, whipped up for a dessert¿ We're selling these slightly smaller five-ounce logs of Trader Joe's Chèvre with Honey Goat's Milk Cheese for $2.99 each, every day. 04.02. 18
060556.name: Honey Goat Log 5 Oz
060556.title: Chevre With Honey

061445.description: This is a product that really makes us want to have a Caprese salad for lunch. Or dinner. And because Trader Joe's Fresh Mozzarella Log is so fresh and so easy to use, making that salad will be easier than ever. Inside the package are slices of fresh mozzarella, perfectly sized to perch atop a substantial slice of tomato, and longing to be topped with a basil leaf. Instant Insalata Caprese, no cheese slicing required. Each package contains 16 ounces of Fresh Mozzarella, crafted with milk from cows - primarily from Idaho's fertile Treasure Valley - not treated with rBST. The cheese is mild and milky and fresh-tasting, as a good Fresh Mozzarella should always be. When it comes time to craft that Caprese, be sure to pick up a Basil Plant [sku 64183]and some Organic Tomatoes on the Vine [sku 97266], and some good olive oil & balsamic vinegar to round out the recipe (you could also choose from the myriad dressing options you'll find on our grocery shelves or in our refrigerator case). Of course, you can also use this pre-sliced Fresh Mozzarella Log for panini, pizza, or cut into smaller pieces to toss into a salad. We're selling each 16 ounce package of about 16 slices for $4.99, every day, a price that's as fresh (and refreshing, really) as the Mozzarella itself. You'll find it in our cheese case.
061445.name: Pre Sliced Mozzarella Log 16 Oz
061445.title: Fresh Mozzarella Cheese Log

061467.description: Translated from the Latin word recocta (recooked), ricotta is made by cooking the whey that is left behind after making other cheeses. Cool, right? We've carried a fat-free version of this classic cheese for quite some time, but as palates and preferences are wont to change when it comes to food trends, we felt the existing product could use a refresh of sorts. Without further adieu, we're pleased to welcome Trader Joe's Part Skim Ricotta Cheese to our cheese case. To find a Part Skim Ricotta Cheese aligned with Trader Joe's standards (tastes excellent, offers amazing value, and made with milk from cows not treated with rBST), our product developer went to Wisconsin, a state that's second to none when it comes to cheesemaking capability. The cheese monger combines pasteurized whey, cream, milk, vinegar and a touch of salt to produce a cheese that's rich, creamy and slightly grainy in texture, with a fresh, slightly sweet flavor. What's more, a one-quarter cup serving of this rich, creamy, kosher (dairy) goodness has just 70 calories, 4.5 grams of fat and 4 grams of protein! The clean, versatile flavor of Part Skim Ricotta Cheese leaves it open to all sorts of culinary interpretation. Enjoy it with a few cracks of salt & pepper, olive oil and chopped fresh herbs. Bake it into a rigatoni casserole with spicy sausage and marinara. Its slight sweetness lends itself to dessert as well-may we suggest a fancy, fresh ricotta parfait with sliced Strawberries [sku 35878] and a drizzle of Turkish Honey [sku 53382]? We're offering 16-ounce tubs of Trader Joe's Part Skim Ricotta Cheese for $3.49-that's a whole dollar lower than retails you'll see elsewhere. You'll find them in our chese case. 02.19. 18
061467.name: Part Skim Ricotta Cheese

062070.description: Some say three's a crowd. We say the more the merrier-especially when it comes to cheese! Our Shredded Three Cheese Blend [sku 16541] is a popular customer favorite, and for good reason. It's a blend of our most popular cheeses (Mozzarella, Monterey Jack and Cheddar) that's got loads of savory, cheesy flavor, and superior meltability. (The convenient resealable pouch doesn't hurt, either.) Never ones to rest on cheesy laurels, we took the "Does it get any better than this?" challenge with this favorite blend of fromages in mind, and our Product Developer emerged with Trader Joe's Organic Shredded 3 Cheese Blend. It's a blend of the same three varieties (low moisture part skim Mozzarella, Monterey Jack and Cheddar Cheeses), all made with organic milk sourced from cows that were never treated with rBST. Even better, inside this bag of Shredded Cheese you'll find the savory, cheesy flavor and maximum meltability you desire for all of your cheese needs. Keep a bag handy for Taco Tuesday. Toss a hearty handful into corn chowder or beer cheese soup. Or go old school and use this Organic 3 Cheese Blend in a grilled cheese sand- wich (feel free to throw some Fire Roasted Diced Green Chiles [sku 54452] in there, if you're so inclined). We're offering 8-ounce resealable pouches of Trader Joe's Organic Shredded 3 Cheese Blend for $4.49, every- day. You'll find them in our cheese case. 06.11. 18
062070.name: Organic Shredded 3 Cheese Blend

062189.description: Start spreading the news - there's a flavored Cream Cheese Spread at Trader Joe's! With spring on the horizon (okay, fine, it's not quite on the horizon, but let's just go with it¿), we felt the time was as right as any to introduce a creamy schmear flecked with some added green to our refrigerated case. And by added green, we mean Onions and Chives. And by creamy schmear, why, we mean Cream Cheese, of course! Made with a bit of garlic powder and plenty of dehydrated onions and chives, Trader Joe's Onion & Chive Cream Cheese Spread is thick, smooth, and perfectly tangy. It's also kosher certified and, like all of our private label dairy products, it's made with milk from cows never treated with rBST. Serve it on a toasted bagel, spread it on a cracker, or use it to thicken sauces. Go cream-cheese crazy. No matter the application, our Onion & Chive Cream Cheese Spread presents an incredible value-we're selling each 8 oz. tub for $1.99. You'll find it in our refrigerators, with our other fine cheeses and cheese spreads.
062189.name: Chive And Onion Cream Cheese
062189.title: Onion & Chive Cream Cheese Spread

062631.description: In the history of cheese (there's a class we'd certainly enjoy!), certain cheeses - like Cheddar, Brie, and Parmesan - will always be associated with their place of origin, no matter where they're actually produced. So, while Cheddar is made around the world, people still think of England when they think of Cheddar. Same with Brie and France, as well as Parmesan and Italy. This place-name association extends to New World cheeses as well, like Monterey Jack (Monterey, CA) and Colby (Colby, WI). You could say, then, that by combining the latter two cheeses into a single Snack Stick, Trader Joe's has introduced a cheese that will forever be construed as a true American original. In this case, the country of origin matches this place-name connotaion - the Sticks are crafted for us in the home of Cheese Heads, Packers, and Badgers... Wisconsin. Trader Joe's Colby Jack Snack Sticks are just that, snackable sticks of a blend of mild Colby and slightly tart Monterey Jack cheeses. Joining the other, single-hued Snack Sticks in our cheese case, these yellow-white marbled curds are certainly conversation starters. Their semi-soft texture makes them easy to enjoy any time at all, really, and they're at home in lunchboxes & backpacks. They also make terrific post-game snacks for active kids - each 90-calorie Stick delivers five grams of protein. We're selling Colby Jack Snack Sticks in 10 ounce packages - each package contains 12 individually-wrapped sticks. You'll find them in our cheese case for $3.99, every day. 09.10. 18
062631.name: Colby Jack Snack Stick
062631.title: Colby-Jack Colby Cheese & Monterey Jack Cheese Snack Sticks

062632.description: When our customers talk, we listen. And organic cheeses have been on our customers' minds. Based on the continued success of crumbled cheeses in our stores, our Product Developer was happy to oblige customer requests, while at the same time creating a first-of-its-kind product (on our cheese shelves, at least). Please welcome Trader Joe's Organic Crumbled Feta Cheese! While traditional feta is made with sheep's milk, our Organic Crumbled Feta is made in Wisconsin with organic, rBST-free cow's milk. The cow's milk offers a milder flavor than sheep's milk, while retaining the pleasant tanginess so favored by feta fans. The curds are bathed in a salty brine (think of it as "pickling" but with cheese!), then drained, gently pressed and dried to allow the saltiness to infuse throughout. This process creates a buttery tanginess and a slightly firm texture that crumbles with ease. Crumbly, briny Cheese made with organic milk? Be still our palates! Although a handful of Crumbled Feta atop a crisp romaine salad is a wonderful thing, there's an endless number of ways to enjoy its salty goodness outside of leafy greens. Stir it into rigatoni with sausage, white beans, and kale. Mix it with TJ's Fresh Bruschetta Sauce [sku 07904] and Steamed Lentils [sku 90240] for a quick cracker dip. Or, gently warm some Giant Chalkidiki Olives [sku 57608] in olive oil with chili flakes and lemon peel, then pour the mixture over a shallow bowl of Organic Crumbled Feta Cheese, and serve with crusty bread for dipping. At $3.49 for six ounces, you may want to grab more than one tub to explore all the possibilities! Find them in the cheese case at your neighborhood Trader Joe's. 11.19. 18
062632.name: Organic Crumbled Feta Cheese

062920.description: It's generally a good idea to keep your wits sharp. And it's always a nice bonus if you can dress sharp, too. But here at Trader Joe's, we make it a point of pride to keep our Cheddar sharp. Indeed, it's hard to beat a piece of perfectly ripened, mildly nutty, sharp Cheddar cheese, but it's not always easy to keep a source of sharp Cheddar handy. That's where Trader Joe's Sharp Cheddar Cheese Snack Pack comes in: ten individually- wrapped, precisely-portioned slices of white Vermont Cheddar that work wonders for lunches, midday snacks, or anytime sharp Cheddar cravings. Vermont Cheddar - recognizable from its trademark white hue, the result of Vermont cheesemakers eschewing the use of anatto to color their Cheddars - is famous for its sharpness, and the Vermont Cheddar used in this Snack Pack is no exception. In addition to being delightfully sharp and flavorful, each .75-ounce slice of Cheddar is pleasantly smooth and slightly creamy in texture, providing an elevated eating experience you wouldn't normally find in a pre-sliced cheese snack. Combine that with the fact that each slice comes pre- wrapped and ready to move, be it in your lunchbox, briefcase, or carry-on, and you'll find that these Snack Packs are sharp in more ways than one. Easy to transport and easy to enjoy, you could call Trader Joe's Sharp Cheddar Cheese Snack Packs the cutting edge of convenience. We think it's enough to call them a great deal: each 7.5-ounce bag of Trader Joe's Sharp Cheddar Cheese Snack Packs (ten pieces per bag) sells for $3.49. Now that's sharp. Find them in our cheese case. 05.06. 19
062920.name: Cheddar Snack Pack
062920.title: Sharp Cheddar Cheese Snack Pack

063082.description: We've long considered feta cheese to be practically synonymous with Mediterranean cuisine. In fact, we can hardly conceive of a Mediterranean meal without it. Can you even imagine a crispy spanakopita sans creamy feta? Wouldn't falafel feel awfully lonely without a few feta crumbles? Wouldn't a feta-less Greek salad be reduced to a salad without a country? Luckily, we don't have to deal in such alarming hypotheticals, because we've got Trader Joe's Israeli Feta at the ready. Since feta has such a long and storied history (records show that feta and feta-like cheeses have been eaten in the Mediterranean region for thousands of years, and even garnered a mention in Homer's Odyssey), we knew we needed a supplier who would respect that history. That's why we reached out to a 4th generation cheesemaker in Israel, whose family has been in the dairy business for over a century. Their feta speaks for itself: creamy, crumbly, and toothsome, with a wonderfully soft texture and a mild, tart tang - exactly how a feta ought to be. While we recommend using this Israeli Feta in all the ways you normally would for a delicious Mediterranean fetas, we also strongly encourage you to enjoy it as a table cheese or part of a cheese plate. A feta of this quality, with its subtle acidity and fine brininess, deserves to be savored, esepcailly with a glass of crisp or off-dry white wine. In addition to its synonymity with all things Mediterranean, you can also consider Trader Joe's Israeli Feta to be synonymous with value: we're selling each 8.8-ounce piece for the remarkably reasonable price of $5.99. You'll find them in our cheese case. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Israeli Feta
063082.name: Israeli Feta In Brine

063956.description: Who doesn't love a midday deli sandwich? Shaved cold cuts, sliced swiss cheese, and your favorite condiments all layered between rye, sourdough, whole wheat, ciabatta - your call! Sometimes, however, we possibly want a little less sodium and processing from the bread and meat, and sometimes we'd like less fat in our hoagies but aren't looking to skimp on the cheese. Sliced Jarlsberg Lite is here to deliver that desired swiss cheese flavor without the typical load of high calories and fat that often tags along. Sliced Jarlsberg Lite is packed with the same mild, nutty flavors as regular Jarlsberg, but with 50% less fat and 30% less calories than regular swiss cheeses. It maintains the characteristic Jarlsberg large round holes which will help you add a little swiss flair to your sandwiches, wraps, and recipe without the added calories. Sliced Jarlsberg Lite is a great alternative for lighter recipes, naturally lactose and gluten free, and is suitable for vegetarians. All of this while keeping the same, mild, nutty flavor one comes to expect when biting into regular Jarlsberg. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Sliced Lite Jarlsberg
063956.name: Sliced Lite Jarlsberg

065005.description: It's no secret that we love cheese. We are known across the nation for having one of the most outstanding cheese cases you ever did see. What makes our cheese section so special? Simple: we offer an outstanding selection of cheeses at truly outstanding prices-prices (and, in some cases, cheeses) that you just won't find anywhere else. Our latest how-the-heck-did-they-do-that? cheese value is 8-ounce wedges of Nuestro Queso® Cotija Cheese. In the last decade, manufacturers of Mexican and Latin American-style cheeses have seen tremendous year- over-year growth, and Cotija just so happens to be the most frequently requested in our cheese case, as well. But, in true Trader Joe's fashion, we didn't just want to bring in any old Cotija-we wanted to bring in the best of the best. And the folks at Illinois-based Nuestro Queso® make some of the finest Cotija we've ever tasted. Often referred to as "Mexican-style Parmesan cheese," Cotija [say: ko-TEE-ha] is a crumbly, white cheese made with fresh whole milk and aged for several months. And, yes, it does taste similar to Parmesan-but it's milder, saltier, and a bit moister. It's a practical, versatile cheese, and while it's certainly not limited to Mexican-inspired applications, it really is fantastic crumbled atop tacos, sopes, chilaquiles, nachos, etc. We also highly recommend using it to make elote, a.k.a. Mexican-style street corn-just grill up a few ears of corn, slather them with butter (or a mixture of mayonnaise & crema), then sprinkle them with TJ's Chili Lime Seasoning [sku 56662] and plenty of grated Cotija. ¡Qué rico! Like we said, though, this Cheese is a great value and won't cost you much cheddar-we're selling each 8-ounce wedge of Nuestro Queso® Cotija for $3.69, every day. De nada. 09.24. 18
065005.name: Cotija Wedge

065062.description: Cashews have been doing some amazing things for non-dairy cheese alternatives, lately. In what can only be described as acts of remarkable faux-fromage ingenuity, we've seen this humble nut transform into all kinds of cheese-like snacks, including our nacho-esque Cashew Fiesta Dip [sku 61494]. Today, we're proud to announce yet another bold leap of progress for the cashew/dairy-free alliance, Trader Joe's Dairy Free Cheddar Style Slices, a handy pack of ready-to-go slices of vegan cultured cashew "cheese" that tastes, feels, and melts just like a slice of regular old Cheddar. How, you ask? Our supplier puts this cashew cheese alternative through a culturating and aging process inspired by traditional cheesemaking techniques. This not only gives each Slice a moderately sharp, Cheddar-like flavor, but mellows its texture to a degree where it melts nice and evenly. Which can only mean one thing: the dream of a satisfyingly melty vegan grilled cheese is now a reality! Trader Joe's Dairy Free Cheddar Style Slices, proudly made from cashews, are just the thing for topping vegan burgers (Protein Patty [sku 65240], anyone?), making dairy-free omelets, or even simply snacking on. We're selling seven ounce packs, each containing nine Slices, for $3.99*. Look for them in our cheese case. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Dairy Free Cheddar Style Slices
065062.name: Slicd Vegan Cashew Cheddar
065062.title: Dairy-Free Cheddar Style Slices

065191.description: Having been around for almost 10 years, our Unexpected Cheddar [sku 96923] is hardly unexpected anymore- at least for our regular Customers. Just to be clear, this is not to say that the extraordinary effect this cheese has on one's taste buds has diminished in any sort of way! On the contrary, the smooth creaminess of finely crafted American Cheddar is still fused with the tangy, crumbly texture of a hard, aged Italian cheese¿ and it's still surprisingly satisfying for the cheese-lover. Knowing the popularity of this cheese and knowing that our Customers are always looking for more ways to enjoy it, we've made the bold (and perhaps unexpected!) move to offer it in handy, Shredded form. This eight- ounce package contains large shreds of Unexpected Cheddar (an ounce more than the cut pieces we sell), ready for topping salads, soups, and open-faced sandwiches. This delicious cheese also works well in (and is now more easily added to) quesadillas, chili, sauces-whatever meal might require the complement of this classic Trader Joe's cheese. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Shredded Unexpected Cheddar Cheese
065191.name: Shredded Unexpected Cheddar Cheese

066262.description: What makes this tasty Trader Joe's Shredded Pizza Seasoned Toscano so perfectly pizza-y? Well, there's no such thing as a Pizza Cow (we checked), so it's gotta be the seasoning! It starts with Wisconsin cheese made in the Toscano tradition by a fourth-generation, Italian-family-owned company. Then, inspired by all the shake-able extras you'd find at a pizza parlor (crushed red pepper, dried oregano, dehydrated garlic, etc.), wheels of carefully aged, creamy Toscano are hand-rubbed with a one-of-a- kind blend of dried herbs, spices & sea salt. The result? A Shredded Seasoned Cheese that lends pizza pizzazz to anything you sprinkle it on-pastas, potatoes, actual pizzas, burgers, salads, and so much more. Find eight-ounce bags of Trader Joe's Shredded Pizza Seasoned Toscano in our refrigerated cheese section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Shredded Pizza Seasoned Toscano Cheese
066262.name: Shredded Pizza Toscano
066262.title: Shredded Pizza Seasoned Toscano Cheese

066299.description: Admittedly, "cheese alternative" isn't the most appealing title. That's why we called our latest product in this vegan vein, Trader Joe's Mozzarella Style Shreds. Not only is this a better name, it really does describe the eating experience of this product! We sampled lots and lots of dairy-free "cheeses" and finally settled on this one from a California-based supplier. They start with a crushed-cashew and water base and fortify it with coconut oil, and potato & corn starches. Sea salt and yeast extract add to the "cheesy" flavor, but it's really the curing of the cashew base over several weeks (a process not too unlike the culturing of real cheese) that gives these Shreds their authentic Mozzarella-Style flavor. In fact, we think this is such a good cheese alternative, you'll find the seven-ounce, re-sealable bag of Trader Joe's Mozzarella Style Shreds hanging in our refrigerators every day, right next to our other shredded cheeses! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Dairy Free Mozzarella Style Shreds
066299.name: Shredded Vegan Cashew Mozzarella Style
066299.title: Dairy-Free Mozzarella Style Shreds

066771.description: Halloumi is certainly not the only cultural or culinary export of Cyprus, but it's definitely one of our favorites. This remarkably unique cheese would be notable for its taste and texture alone, which sit at a curious crossroads between mozzarella and feta. But of course, Halloumi goes the extra mile by having the deliciously unusual trait of browning, rather than melting, when grilled or heated in a pan. Don't get us wrong - melted cheese is undoubtedly wonderful, but there's something about a slice of warm, freshly grilled Halloumi, striped with gloriously caramelized grill marks, that keeps up coming back for more. That's precisely why we're bringing Atalanta® Halloumi Cheese, proudly labeled as "The Cheese That Grills," to our cheese case. Like all Halloumi (or at least all Halloumi that can legally be labled as such), Atalanta® Halloumi is made on the island of Cyprus using sheep's milk. During production, the curds are heated to high temperatures, a process which gives it both its "squeaky" texture and ability to hold its shape when cooked or grilled. Atalanta®'s cheesemakers also include a bit of mint, which adds a slight refreshing counterbalance to Halloumi's natural brininess. We recommend pairing a grilled slice of Atalanta® Halloumi with fresh watermelon and a chilled glass of Freeda Rosé [63104]. We also recommend acting quickly, as supplies are limited. While inventory lasts, you can find 8.8-ounce packages of Atalanta® Halloumi in your Trader Joe's cheese case for $5.99*. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Atalanta® Halloumi Cheese
066771.name: Halloumi

067556.description: It's generally a good idea to keep your wits sharp, but sometimes, it's best to keep your Cheddar mild. Here at Trader Joe's, we consider the breadth of our on-the-go cheese-eating options a real point of pride. No matter what kind of cheesy mood you're in, we've got the perfectly portioned Cheese Snack for you! Right now, we're feeling mild, so we're going to focus in on one of the mellowest megastars of our cheese case: Trader Joe's Mild Cheddar Cheese Snack Sticks. Really, they're not so much "sticks" as they are elongated cubes, or 3-D rectangles... but we digress. Each "Stick" is truly, as they say, a chip off the ol' block... a chip off the ol' block of fresh, creamy, rBST-free Wisconsin Cheddar, that is! You might be wondering, "Wow, Trader Joe's, what could be finer?" Well, we'll tell you - how about a chip off that ol' Wisconsin Cheddar Cheese block that just so happens to come individually-wrapped and ready-to-go? Now that's a WOW! Seriously - thi is a sack full of Snack Sticks that really satisfies. And speaking of sacks full of Snack Sticks, we're selling each 10-ounce bag of twelve Trader Joe's Mild Cheddar Cheese Snack Sticks for $3.99.* (That's around 33¢ per Stick-holy [artificial growth hormone-free] cow, eh?!) *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Mild Cheddar Cheese Snack Sticks
067556.name: Cheddar Snack Sticks
067556.title: 1/40# Monterey Jack Blk

069040.description: A sprinkling of shredded mozzarella is a sure-fire way to add a nice element of savory flavor and smooth texture to all kinds of savory dishes. Like all good things, though, sometimes moderation is called for - sometimes you just want a light bit of cheesiness that won't overwhelm your entrée. For times like these, we have Trader Joe's Lite Shredded Mozzarella, a handy pouch of pre-shredded mozzarella cheese that contains 60% less fat and 25% fewer calories than standard mozzarella. Even with this lower fat content, it has an elegantly firm and chewy texture at room temperature, and becomes gloriously gooey when melted. Delicately buttery in flavor, this Lite Shredded Mozzarella can be subbed in for any application that calls for regular mozzarella, like pizzas, patty melts, lasagnas or casseroles. Try it on salads, mixed into scrambled eggs, or sprinkled over soups to give your meals a little something more. And of course, since this is Trader Joe's, you'll pay a little someting less for each 12-ounce resealable bag. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Shredded Lite Mozzarella Cheese
069040.name: Lite Shredded Mozzarella Cheese
069040.title: Shredded Lite Mozzarella Cheese

069907.description: At Trader Joe's, we love cheese, no question about it. In fact, we love cheese in all of its forms, whether its made from cow's milk, sheep's milk, goat's milk, or, as it happens, not milk! That's why we're proud to carry Trader Joe's Soy Slices, twelve individually packaged slices of soy-based cheese alternative that carry all the texture, meltability, and fun, familiar Cheddar Flavor of its dairy-based equivalents. While not vegan, these slices are 99% lactose free, making them a great choice for those who want to limit their lactose intake. Use Trader Joe's Cheddar Soy Slices for any anything you'd use a slice of standard, dairy-based cheese for: layering into sandwiches, melting on top of a steaming bowl of chili, or, our personal favorite, making a gloriously gooey, melty grilled cheese (or grilled soy cheese, we should say). Just because you want to limit your lactose, you shouldn't have to avoid the comforts of cheese. And just because you want a 99% lactose free cheese alternative, you shouldn't have to pay a huge mark-up for it. That's why eight-ounce packs of Trader Joe's Soy Slices, Cheddar Flavor, each containing 12 individual slices, sell at your neighborhood Trader Joe's for $2.99*, every day. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Soy Slices Cheddar Flavor
069907.name: Sliced Soy Cheddar

070636.description: Certain cheeses can be a real challenge to replicate without the use of dairy, but lucky for all of us, Parmesan is definitely not one of those cheeses. Trader Joe's Dairy Free Shredded Parmesan Cheese Alternative is proof! Made from a base of highly refined coconut oil, our Parmesan Alternative is packed with all the same salty, nutty, and supremely savory notes of traditional, dairy-based Parmesan-but contains only plant-based ingredients. That makes it a great option for sprucing up soups, salads, pasta, potatoes, and everything in between. Since it was designed with vegans and non-vegans in mind, this plant-based Parmesan Alternative can be used in both vegan and non-vegan dishes with equal aplomb. We must admit, though, it does present some especially delicious opportunities for vegan recipes: imagine roasted Brussels sprouts sprinkled with savory, vegan Parmesan, or a luxuriously creamy salad tossed with our Spicy Cashew Butter Dressing [sku 68423] and topped with these shreds for some extra texture. Too good to be true? Hardly - you can find eight-ounce pouches of this Shredded Parmesan Alternative in our cheese case, every day. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Dairy Free Shredded Parmesan Cheese Alternative
070636.name: Shredded Vegan Parmesan
070636.title: Shredded Parmesan Cheese Alternative

070925.description: Maybe you enjoy Trader Joe's String Cheese [sku 30337], or our Organic Light String Cheese [sku 92280]. These individual sticks of milky mozzarella are a great option when you want a little protein boost, or are craving a bit of cheese. Now we've added another option to our family of handy cheese snacks: Trader Joe's Fresh Mozzarella Cheese Snackers. These bite-size balls of fresh mozzarella are made from milk that's freshly collected in the Treasure and Magic Valleys of southern Idaho; and it comes from cows that are not treated with rBST hormones. Making the Mozzarella involves microbial enzymes, which should please any cheese-loving vegetarians. The soft, yet reslient texture of the final product-with its creamy, milky flavor-should please anyone who loves good cheese! Each eight-ounce, resealable package contains eight, smaller, 70-calorie snack pouches that are ideally portioned for whenever that cheese craving creeps up. Enjoy the Fresh Mozzarella by itself and benefit from five grams of protein per pouch. Of course, you can always pair your pouch with other healthy snackables, such as Mini Pearl Grape Tomatoes [sku 26144] and Organic Cut and Peeled Carrots [su 36679]! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Fresh Mozzarella Cheese Snackers
070925.name: Fresh Mozzarella Snackers
070925.title: Fresh Mozzarella Cheese Snackers

070942.description: When you set out to create a vegan version of cream cheese, you better be sure that you're getting the "cream" part right. Luckily, with Trader Joe's Vegan Cream Cheese Alternative, that's exactly what we've done. Made from an ingeniously balanced base of coconut oil mixed with potato starch and chickpea protein, this Vegan Cream Cheese has all the smooth spreadability and silky mouth feel of a standard, dairy-based cream cheese, but non of the dairy - or any other animal-based products, for that matter. Since this Cream Cheese Alternative so perfectly sticks the landing, creaminess-wise, it opens up all kinds of avenues for use: from the simple pleasure of a breakfast bagel, lovingly smeared with Vegan Cream Cheese and topped with sliced red onion and capers, to vegan stuffed manicotti or jalapeño poppers, the sky's the limit. And that's before we get to its boundless baking opportunities: the creamy center of a vegan danish, the swirl in a pan of vegan brownies, or the frosting of a vegan red velvet or carrot cake aren't just possible, they're now all as simple as grabbing a tub of Trader Joe's Vegan Cream Cheese Alternative from your neighborhood Trader Joe's cheese section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Vegan Cream Cheese Alternative
070942.name: Vegan Cream Cheese Alternative

073166.description: Boursin® has dared to go dairy-free! With all the familiar, herby flavors and aromas of longtime Trader Joe's staple Boursin® Garlic & Fine Herbs [sku 18321], and none of the animal-based ingredients, Boursin® Dairy- Free Garlic & Herb offers splendid notes of garlic, parsley, and chive, delivered with a cool, creamy, oh-so- spreadable texture. In addition to being decidedly dairy-free, each six-ounce tub is also made without the use of nuts, soy, or gluten - in other words, it's a great way for even more foodies to enjoy the smooth, savory sensations of Boursin®. Delectable when spread generously over a toasted bagel, a piece of crostini, or even a simple square of our Whole Grain Crispbread [sku 55902], Dairy-Free Boursin® makes a fine addition to vegan charcuterie boards or plant-based snack tables, but its applications don't stop there. In fact, we find its plant-based nature opens it up to a whole host of dairy-free possbilities, like as the base for a creamy vegan alfredo sauce. We also like it as a way to enhance already-vegan recipes: try mixing a dollop into white bean soup, mashed potatoes, or savory, stuffed mushrooms. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Boursin® Dairy-Free Garlic & Herb
073166.name: Dairy Free Boursin

073326.description: A classic American cheese birthed from the combination of Colby and Monterey Jack cheeses by blending both together prior to pressing, Trader Joe's Sliced Colby Jack Cheese is an exemplary blend of flavors and textures from both of its parent cheeses. By taking the sweet and softness of the Colby and mating it with the tang and mild flavors of the Monterey Jack you get a beautifully marbled semi-soft cheese that tastes as good alone or with any of your favorite cheesy applications. The mild and smooth flavor and texture of Trader Joe's Sliced Colby Jack Cheese make it a multifaceted and welcomed addition to deli meats, sandwiches, soups, sauces, burgers, omelettes, casseroles, steamed vegetables, baked potatoes, and even fruits such as apples and pears! Because Colby Jack's soft melting qualities, it makes an ideal companion for many Mexican dishes such as nachos and enchiladas. Pick up a 12-ounce package of Trader Joe's Sliced Colby Jack Cheese right now for $3.99* to get the fiesta started today! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Sliced Colby Jack Cheese
073326.name: Sliced Colby Jack

073328.description: Hailing from its humble beginnings as a derivative of Monterey Jack, the original "American" cheese, when it was invented by the Mexican Franciscan friars of sunny and coastal Monterey, California. Riffing on this creamy, smooth, and sharp Monterey Jack Cheese base, Trader Joe's Sliced Pepper Jack Cheese packs in the classic mix of jalapeños and red bell peppers to up the ante on herbaceous and spicy flavors. You could say we put the 'pepper' in Pepper Jack! The semi-soft Sliced Pepper Jack Cheese is delicate and buttery, yet gives a mild kick in the finish from the jalapeño and red bell peppers. These bold flavors go wonderful with quesadillas, crackers, and used to top hamburger patties. So whether your just finding a sliced cheese for your workweek lunch sandwiches or trying to zest up your summer cookout, Trader Joe's Sliced Pepper Jack Cheese is waiting in its resealable packaging ready to go at a moment's notice. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Sliced Pepper Jack Cheese
073328.name: Sliced Jack With Peppers

073329.description: Imagine yourself as a French immigrant in 1800s Wisconsin, longing for the cheese of your homeland without the convenience of modern express shipping. So you head to the kitchen and begin making it the way you always used to, trying to imitate French Munster cheese. While that may sound like ancient history, think of it as the beginning of American Muenster, and by extension, the birth of Trader Joe's Sliced Muenster Cheese. Our Sliced Muenster Cheese is far from the original French Munster; it doesn't undergo rind-washing or aging, so its flavor is mellow with a pleasant tang-a bit like our Sliced Pepper Jack [sku 73328] without the added peppers. The distinctive red-orange rind you see gets its color from annatto (the same natural vegetable dye used to give Cheddars their vibrant orange hues.) Trader Joe's Sliced Muenster Cheese marries this appearance, texture, and flavor into what is considered one of the great original American cheeses. With a semi-soft texture from the package, the versatility of our Sliced Muenster is unmatched. Use it with cold cuts or take advantage of its flawless melting ability and top a variety of hot dishes. Sliced Muenster Cheese
073329.name: Sliced Muenster Cheese

073333.description: Trader Joe's Sliced Swiss is not blind. Blind cheese has no holes. This Swiss is just like your consumate Swiss- semi-hard, smooth, and mild¿ with plenty of "eyes"! [Incidentally, it's carbon-dioxide gas bubbles resulting from the activity of the good bacteria in the cheese that expand and then burst leaving holes where they once had been.] But, there is one thing different about this Trader Joe's Swiss: we sliced it. Each conveniently re-sealable package contains about a dozen, square, medium-thick slices. If you like Swiss on your sandwich, nothing could be easier than un-zipping this package and pulling out one or two (or three!) slices for your bread-meat- &-cheese masterpiece! And like classic Swiss, it melts nicely-soft and gooey, while still maintaining some of its form. Try it on Chicken Cordon Bleu or an open-faced tuna melt! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Sliced Swiss Cheese
073333.name: Sliced Swiss

073583.description: Start spreading the news-our newest Cream Cheese Spread is celebratorily creamy, super savory, and full of flavor for all your summer schmearing needs. Trader Joe's Red Bell Pepper, Garlic & Parmesan Cream Cheese Spread is a zesty combo with a heavy-handed sprinkle of Parmesan cheese, is flecked with red bell pepper, and studded with minced garlic throughout. It's an instant upgrade to your morning bagel, a delectable dip, and as the name implies, it makes a splendid sandwich Spread. It'll pack your lunch with a pleasant punch when generously spread over a slice of Whole Wheat Bread [sku 64220] topped with Organic Smoked Turkey Breast [sku 81594]. And to really bring the WOW to your next party, serve your guests baked stuffed mushrooms with a dollop of Cream Cheese Spread and a sprinkle of breadcrumbs on top. We're selling each eight-ounce tub for $2.49. This delicately pink-hued Spread is available for a limited time in our refrigerators, with our other fine cheeses and cheese spreads. Red Bell Pepper, Garlic & Parmesan Cream Cheese Spread
073583.name: Red Pepper Garlic & Parmesan Cream Cheese
073583.title: Red Bell Pepper, Garlic & Parmesan Cream Cheese Spread

074219.description: During World War I, trucks carrying meat to French front-line troops bore the logo of a smiling cow drawn by Benjamin Rabier. A French cheesemonger named Léon Bel-founder of Fromageries Bel ("Bel Cheeses")- enjoyed this bovine graphic so much that, after the war, he sketched his own jovial cow and used it to adorn his signature, round cheese boxes. He called his cow (and his product), "La Vache qui rit®," or, in English, The Laughing Cow®. Today, the majority of The Laughing Cow® cheese products are made in Kentucky rather than France, but the classic Creamy Swiss Original Spreadable Cheese recipe remains their crowd-pleasing, top seller just about everywhere. Taking this into consideration, we've decided to bring the Original version into our stores to replace the Garlic & Herb [sku 80048] flavor, whose popularity has been flagging with our customers. The Creamy Swiss Original is mild, creamy, and spreads beautifully atop TJ's Woven Wheat Wafters, TJ's Pretzel Slims, carrot sticks, celery sticks, apple slices, and more. The Laughing Cow® Spreadable Cheese Wedges are sold and enjoyed all the world over, but nowhere are they sold for a better value than you'll find at Trader Joe's. Take home a six-ounce "wheel" (a.k.a., a cool, round box that harkens back to Léon Bel's cheese-making heydey) of eight individually-wrapped, .75-ounce Creamy Swiss Original Spreadable Cheese Wedges For $2.99 today. You'll find them in our cheese case. 12.11. 17
074219.name: Laughing Cow Original

074221.description: During World War I, trucks carrying meat to French front-line troops bore the logo of a smiling cow drawn by Benjamin Rabier. A French cheesemonger named Léon Bel-founder of Fromageries Bel ("Bel Cheeses")- enjoyed this bovine graphic so much that, after the war, he sketched his own jovial cow and used it to adorn his signature, round cheese boxes. He called his cow (and his product), "La Vache qui rit®," or, in English, The Laughing Cow. Today, the majority of The Laughing Cow cheese products are made in Kentucky rather than France, but the classic Creamy Swiss Light Spreadable Cheese recipe remains a crowd-pleasing, top seller. Taking this into consideration, we've decided to bring the Light version into our stores. With 50% less fat and 40% fewer calories than the Original [sku 74219] version, the Creamy Swiss Light is mild, creamy, and spreads beautifully atop TJ's Woven Wheat Wafters, TJ's Pretzel Slims, carrot sticks, celery sticks, apple slices, and more. The Laughing Cow Light Spreadable Cheese Wedges are sold and enjoyed all the world over, but nowhere are they sold for a better value than you'll find at Trader Joe's. Take home a six-ounce "wheel" (a.k.a., a cool, round box that harkens back to Léon Bel's cheese-making heyday) of eight individually-wrapped, 0.75-ounce Creamy Swiss Light Spreadable Cheese Wedges For $2.99* today. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. The Laughing Cow Creamy Swiss Light
074221.name: Light Laughing Cow
074221.title: Pkg Laughing Cow Light

074223.description: Who says there needs to be a complex cheeseboard full of carefully chosen examples of worldly cheeses, specific grapes from some special valley, and vintage wines to enjoy a bite of premium cheese without an entire ceremony. Since 1977, Babybel has been bringing you their Mini Babybel Original and subsequently blessed the world with their Mini Babybel Light just for that special treat that needs no occasion. Mini Babybel Light is a deliciously mild cheese. A balance of sweet and salty flavors with a creamy, semisoft cheesy bite available by just peeling back the signature red wax seal and revealing the individually packaged bite-sized portion of Babybel cheese. Initially created in France as a copy of the Dutch's Edam cheese, Babybel has been gracing the cheese community since 1952. With the later introduction of Mini Babybel Light, Babybel- style cheese has been delivering a calcium and protein packed, reduced fat, anytime snack cheese to the masses for decades. Mini Babybel Light was born as a light calorie run-n-go snack, so go ahead, grab one with one foot out of the door and jazz up your snack routine with a sophisticated cheese on-the-go. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Mini Babybel Light
074223.name: Mini Light Babybel
074223.title: Pkg Babybel Mini Light

074338.description: At Trader Joe's, we endeavor to provide as many plant-based options for our customers as possible, even (and especially!) when the challenge is considerable. Our most recent venture in finding vegan versions of normally non-vegan fare brought us to a supplier in Greece, who specializes in plant-based cheese alternatives. They made for us this Dairy Free Shredded Spicy Mexican Style Blend, which combines a variety of vegan cheese alternatives into a single, peppery, plant-based blend. We were intrigued. Then, when we saw how well it melted (a notoriously difficult feat for non-dairy products), we were hooked. We think you'll be, too. Savory, spicy, and remarkably creamy, Trader Joe's Dairy Free Shredded Spicy Mexican Style Blend is great for any situation that calls for cheese: topping tacos, filling quesadillas, sprinkling over salads-you name it. With its blend of vegan shreds and savory spices, including cayenne, cumin, and dried jalapeño peppers, it brings a pleasant, building heat to any dish it's added to. While it's especially suited for Mexican, Tex Mex, or Southwest cuisines, we certainly wouldn't stop there: try it on a plant based patty melt with Impossible Burger [sku 69857] or a stuffed bell pepper, and you'll see exactly what we mean. Dairy Free Shredded Spicy Mexican Style Blend
074338.name: Shredded Vegan Spicy Mexican Style Blend
074338.title: Dairy Free Shredded Spicy Mexican Style Blend Cheese Alternative

074802.description: As self-proclaimed cheese devotees, there isn't much we won't try. So you can only imagine our excitement at the tasting panel when our buyer presented a sample of what's now known as Trader Joe's Unexpected Cheddar Cheese Spread. That's right, it's that same irresistible, aged Cheddar you know and love-voted favorite fromage year after year in our Customer Choice Awards-now available in spreadable form! (We'll pause for a moment to let these delicious implications set it in.) Our supplier combines our crumbly Unexpected Cheddar [sku 96923] with salted butter and whey to create a superbly savory, creamy Cheese Spread that's ready to enhance sandwiches and glorify grazing boards with the simple flick of a knife. Spread this pub-style cheese on a Raisin Rosemary Crisp [sku 95281] along with a schmear of Fig Butter [sku 96478], and you've got one classy snack on your hands. You might also add it to an appetizer of puff pastry topped with sliced apples to bring out its subtle fruity notes. No matter how you use it, it's guaranteed to be a real crowd-cheeser. You'll find Unexpected Cheddar Cheese Spread in our cheese case every day, exclusively at your neighborhood Trader Joe's. Unexpected Cheddar Cheese Spread
074802.name: Unexpected Cheddar Spread
074802.title: Unexpected Cheddar Cheese Spread

075219.description: What's that? There's a party going on? And you have no cheese? The horror. We can help you ensure you never find yourself in this predicament again, and also guarantee you never accidentally purchase only one type of cheese for your guests (can you say faux pas?). How can we accomplish such great feats in a single cheese? Well, we can't. But we can with Trader Joe's Cheese Party Tray. Neatly wrapped inside each Party Tray are artfully arranged slices of four of our favorite cheeses: Colby Jack, Swiss, Mild Cheddar, and Pepper Jack. Your mission, should you choose to accept it: unwrap that package and put those slices to work! Having a barbecue? Let your guests choose which cheese shall adorn their burger. Making sandwiches for a crowd? Make that Turkey & Swiss and the Ham & Cheddar without having to open multiple packages of cheese. Want to up your grilled cheese game? Make a melt with all four cheeses on the same sandwich! (Talk about turning it up to 11!) How you employ the Cheese Party Tray is entirely up to you. The value is entirely up to us, and we say big value. That translates to $5.49 for each 16 ounce Tray, every day, in our cheese case. What time is it? Cheese Party time! 04.09. 18
075219.name: Cheese Party Tray

075423.description: Where would we be without cream cheese? Could you imagine a world where bagels go bare? Where jalapeño poppers go un-packed? Where cheesecakes are simply... cakes? Well, we at Trader Joe's are doing our part to ensure that such a sorry scenario never becomes a reality, by carrying a number of delectable cream cheeses in our refrigerators, including Trader Joe's Organic Plain Cream Cheese Spread. Made with organic, pasteurized milk and cream, this soft, spreadable, and highly versatile Cream Cheese has a remarkable range of uses, from the extravagant to the everyday. In the morning, this Cream Cheese is excellent on an Everything Bagel [sku 92267] with your favorite smoked salmon, of course, and also adds a luxurious element when mixed into scrambled eggs, omelets, and frittatas. At midday, it's ideal for spreading on veggies sandwiches or enjoying with cucumber slices and celery sticks for a crunchy snack. At night, it works wonders in seafood chowders, savory dips, or mashed potatoes. And for dessert? Trader Joe's Organic Plain Cream Cheese Spread simply excels when swirled into brownies, mixed into fluffy frostings, or baked into moist, delicious pound cake. Organic Plain Cream Cheese Spread
075423.name: Organic Cream Cheese
075423.title: Organic Plain Cream Cheese Spread

075512.description: While it's easy to think of it primarily as a luxurious complement to other foods, cream cheese is actually a suprisingly crucial component within the vast culinary canon. Aside from being a boon to bagels, cream cheese is essential in a wide variety of baked goods, soups, sauces, and so much more-which it makes it all the more challenging to work with if you have a lactose-free diet. That's where Trader Joe's Lactose Free Cream Cheese comes in. Made with lactase, the enzyme that naturally breaks down lactose, it has all the same delicately tart flavor and superb spreadability you'd expect from a Cream Cheese, and absolutely none of the lactose. Just like its lactose-containing cousins, Trader Joe's Lactose Free Cream Cheese can be used in a plethora of rich, delicious recipes, from fantastically full-flavored appetizer dips to consummately creamy chowders, to sweet and fluffy frostings for carrot cake, brownies, or homemade whoopie pies. It adds body and a nice depth of flavor when mixed into a baked macaroni and cheese or casserole, it makes for a marvelous Lactose Free cheesecake, and a spoonful will even elevate a simple pan of scrambled eggs. And, of course, it's also quite delicious as a topping for a bagel, especially when paired with a bit of our Wild Sockeye Smoked Salmon [sku 60442]. Lactose Free Cream Cheese
075512.name: Cream Cheese Lactose Free
075512.title: Lactose Free Cream Cheese

075647.description: The Finger Lakes region of New York is well known for its wine production, and among its vineyards and wineries, a food-explorer can also find a good number of idyllic dairy farms that are producing some very fine cheeses. Trader Joe's Bucheron is one. This Soft Ripened Cheese is handmade with pasteurized milk from local goats. Lactic acid (instead of rennet) forms curds, yielding cheese with a smooth, delicate texture. The curds are first made into logs, which are eventually sliced into six-ounce rounds. The finished piece has a naturally white, pillowy rind. Its slightly salty, buttery interior has a clean taste, along with tangy aromas and faint hints of mushroom. This description could easily refer to a goat's milk brie-and that really is a good comparison for this bloomy, lactic, goat-cheese medallion. Also like brie, Trader Joe's Bucheron is best brought to room temperature and served with crackers or a baguette. It pairs well with fresh fruit, like apples and grapes-or dried fruit, like dates. And our Bucheron's creamy texture and full flavor incorporate well into full-fledged dishes, such as pastas, or salads. For your glass, a bright Sauvignon Blanc from our shelves will fair well, like Daou Paso Robles Sauvignon Blanc [sku 72677]. Bucheron Soft Ripened Goat's Milk Cheese
075647.name: Goat Bucheron

076062.description: Gouda is a cheese with a history nearly as rich as its creamy, buttery flavor profile. The earliest records of Gouda trace back to the late 1200s, making it one of the oldest continuously made cheeses in the world. Fittingly enough, the supplier behind our newest sliced cheese is a Dutch creamery with a considerable history of its own. Over the course of six generations, the folks at Artikaas® have perfected the art of crafting full-flavored Gouda, including (and especially!) their sensationally savory Sliced Smoked Gouda. To make each package, the artisans at Artikaas® suffuse their Gouda with wood smoke (as opposed to smoke- flavored additives) for two hours before slicing and sending our way. This natural smoking process leaves each slice with a subtly smoky character that accentuates, rather than overpowers, the cheese's classically creamy flavor. Ideal for melting over a burger, layering into a grilled cheese, or folding into a chicken cutlet for a super flavorful cordon bleu, Artikaas® Sliced Smoked Gouda is a must-have for any cheese connoisseur, sandwich virtuoso, or appreciator of all things smoky. Artikaas® Sliced Smoked Gouda
076062.name: Sliced Artikaas Smoked Gouda

076317.description: We carry a fine assortment of mozzarella cheeses at our stores-a variety of sizes, shapes and flavors to please any palate and round out any recipe. Our newest addition may just be the jewel of our curated collection of curds-Trader Joe's Fresh Mozzarella Cheese Pearls. These bite-size Pearls of fresh Mozzarella are made from milk that's freshly collected from cows that are not treated with rBST hormones. Making the Mozzarella involves microbial enzymes, which should please any cheese-loving vegetarians. The soft, yet resilient texture of the final product-with its creamy, milky flavor- should please anyone who loves good cheese! Pop a few of these Pearls straight into your mouth for a quick snack. Pile them into your pasta salads, hot or cold. Skewer them with fresh Basil [sku 19576] and Mini Pearl Grape Tomatoes [sku 26144] for appetizer- approved caprese sticks. Position them upon a frozen or homemade pizza. Pro tip: add them before and after baking for a mozz-some array of temperatures and textures. Yum! Fresh Mozzarella Cheese Pearls
076317.name: Fresh Mozzarella Pearls

076839.description: Like the original Unexpected Cheddar Cheese Spread [sku 74802] that inspired it, new Trader Joe's Unexpected Cheddar Cheese Spread with Hatch Chile begins, unsurprisingly, with our storied Unexpected Cheddar [sku 96923]. The Unexpected Cheddar-a perennial customer favorite-is made spreadable by the addition of salted butter, cream, and whey. Then, for this unexpected, turn-up-the-heat take, we've added diced New Mexican Hatch chiles, bell peppers, and a kick of cayenne. The end result? Three letters: W-O-W. No matter how you slice-er, spread-it, it's a real crowd-cheeser. Our tasting panel couldn't get enough of the stuff! While we're on the subject of "WOWs," we're pleased to be offering our Unexpected Cheddar Cheese Spread with Hatch Chile for the exact same price as its unadorned counterpart. You'll find it in our cheese case for a limited time, exclusively at your neighborhood Trader Joe's. Unexpected Cheddar Cheese Spread with Hatch Chile
076839.name: Hatch Chili Unexpected Ched Spread
076839.title: Unexpected Cheddar Cheese Spread With Hatch Chile

076929.description: Could you crumble goat cheese yourself? Absolutely. But why would you want to when we've done the crumbling for you? And packaged it in a conveniently resealable tub? And priced it at $2.49* for four, crumbly- fresh ounces? Hmmm? Made with fresh, pasteurized goat's milk and non-animal rennet (something vegetarians will appreciate), Trader Joe's Crumbled Goat Cheese is just what you need to add a little... je ne sais quoi to your salads, pizzas, pastas, and even pastries. Actually, we take that back. We do "sais quoi" it adds to your salads, pizzas, pastas, and even pastries - fresh, tangy, salty, and ever-so-mildly-musky creaminess. And for heaven's sake, who wouldn't want to add some of to, say, a strawberry & spinach salad? You'll find our Crumbled Goat Cheese in our refrigerated cheese case. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Crumbled Goat Cheese
076929.name: Crumbled Goat Cheese

077726.description: We've heard mumbling that our Fresh Mozzarella is "magical" from the moment we introduced it in our stores, way back in 1995. While we cannot officially ascribe it this designation (the FDA has yet to rule on what foods may be dubbed "magical," you see), we do see what folks are getting at-Trader Joe's All Natural Fresh Mozzarella really is the perfect ball of Mozzarella Cheese. It's moist, mild, and milky-fresh, with that perfect- for-melting, almost "bouncy" mozzarella texture. It's also made from the milk of cows never treated with rBST, so you can feel fantastic about adding it to everything from pizzas & pastas to salads & hors d'oeuvres. Another thing to feel good about: each Trader Joe's Fresh Mozzarella Cheese "ball" (mind the quotes, as it's more like a cross between a ball and a log) is magnificently priced at $2.99.* You'll find them in our cheese case. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Fresh Mozzarella Cheese
077726.name: Fr 8 Oz Chub Mozzarella
077726.title: All Natural Fresh Mozzarella Cheese

077728.description: What's the best thing since sliced bread? Sliced cheese, of course. Sliced cheese like Trader Joe's Sliced Sharp Cheddar. Trader Joe's Sliced Sharp Cheddar is made for us under the supervision of two Wisconsin Master Cheesemakers, using milk from local family farms. It's a traditional Cheddar, made using the time-honored "cheddaring" process first employed in the English village of Cheddar (yes, there is such a place, in Somerset). Traditional cheddaring involves putting the cheese curds through a mill after they've been cut and turned. It's a time and labor intensive process that yields a significantly more complex cheese than you get from more "modern" cheddaring methods like stirring the curds. The flavor and texture of Cheddar changes dramatically as it ages, to our eternal delight. Our Sliced Sharp Cheddar is aged four to six months, just enough time to develop its rich, creamy, nutty flavor and almost-but- not-quite-ready-to-crumble texture. This complexity makes it an ideal mate for a burger, and it's also excellent in cold sandwiches, panini, tuna melts, and omelets. Each slice is separated by parchment, making it easy to use and ideal for anytime at all. We're selling each 12 ounce package of 12 slices for $3.99, every day. This is a verifiable value on a very virtuous cheese.
077728.name: Sliced Sharp Cheddar Cheese

078319.description: At the risk of sounding shallow (oh man, we loath the thought), we admit that we like to look good in our bathing suits. But we certainly don't believe you should compromise good snacking in order to do so. If you're in the mood for cheese - eat cheese. Might we recommend Trader Joe's Light String Cheese, though? There really is no greater snacking cheese than string cheese - it's convenient, simply fun to eat and - yum. But we use part skim mozzarella that's made with milk from cows not treated with rBST, so you get the smooth mozzarella flavor for which string cheese is most famous with 50% less fat and 25% fewer calories than regular string cheese. And at $2.99 for each twelve ounce package (that's about 12 individual cheese snacks) Light String Cheese, makes you feel as good about your wallet as it does about your bathing suit. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Light String Cheese
078319.name: Lite String Cheese

078384.description: Cool, mellow, and just a touch sweet, Monterey Jack is one of those cheeses that pretty much everyone can agree on-why, even its name makes it sound like a fundamentally friendly fellow. One of our favorite aspects of a good Monterey Jack is how well it serves as a canvas to other ¿ avors-Pepper Jack [sku 73328] being one of its most popular permutations. Which lead us to think: what other savory sensations might Monterey Jack mingle well with? ¿ at, in turn, lead to some epicurean experimentation, which happily lead to Trader Joe's Sliced Black Tru¿ e Monterey Jack Cheese. It's cra¿ ed for us by an expert cheesemaker in Wisconsin, who infuses their Jack with bits of black summer tru¿ e before cutting it into sandwich-ready slices. Every bite is savory and satisfying, with a toothsome texture and a distinct touch of tru¿ e-y, umami oomph that makes it especially great for grilled cheeses, patty melts, and quesadillas. Try it on a burger, melted into an omelet, or, if you'd like a little complementary savory-sweet situation, alongisde some Fresh Cut Cantaloupe Chunks [sku 95266]. Sliced Black Truffle Monterey Jack Cheese
078384.name: Sliced Truffle Jack Cheese
078384.title: Sliced Black Truffle Monterey Jack Cheese

078446.description: Every now and then, we introduce a product that attains a kind of instantaneous iconic status. Our Everything But the Bagel Sesame Seasoning Blend [sku 59137] definitely falls into that category. Since its debut back in 2017, it has remained perennially popular, and it's easy to see why: it turns out that garlic, onion, poppy, sesame, and sea salt synergize with a whole lot more than just bagels. Take, for instance, this new addition to our cheese section, Trader Joe's Everything But the Bagel Cheddar Cheese. It's crafted just for us by an expert cheesemaker, who infuses each wheel with the very same seasoning we sell on our shelves, so that each bite is rich with the maximalist mix of aromatic alliums, crunchy seeds, and savory spice you know and love. In addition to making an excellent cheese to simply snack upon, we find that these pops of flavor and texture also make this bold and tangy Cheddar a great choice for a grilled cheese or macaroni bake, or slicing and serving atop a nice burger on a Brioche Bun [sku 61752]. Try it on your next cheese board or charcuterie spread the next time you have company over. And if you feel like bringing everything full circle, try melting a slice over a toasted bagel with a fried egg and bacon for an unbeatable breakfast sandwich. Everything But the Bagel Cheddar Cheese
078446.name: Everything But The Bagel Cheddar Cheese

079681.description: Provolone Cheese is an age-old Italian creation that brings a mildly creamy flavor to plenty of dishes. Trader Joe's Sliced Provolone Cheese makes this exemplar cheese variety available in a pre-sliced form ready to enjoy atop sandwiches, wraps, and other cold cut classics a plenty. A cousin of mozzarella, Provolone Cheese is a cow's milk, semi-hard formaggi a pasta filata (Italian for "spun paste cheese"). It undergoes kneading of the fresh curd in hot water to give that famously elastic, rubbery texture that Provolone Cheese is known for. This mass of curd created from the stretching process is then aged to harden, and therefore differentiate, the Provolone from its mozzarella cousin. Like all pulled curd cheeses, a bit of Sliced Provolone Cheese is wonderful, and arguably more flavorful, when melted. This should direct your mind to the world of paninis, casseroles, baked pasta, and hoagies as a perfect pairing for our Sliced Provolone Cheese. Each slice was made for two slices of fresh bread, to be flashed in heat, and to evoke images of ooey gooey goodness. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Sliced Provolone Cheese
079681.name: Sliced Provolone Cheese

079857.description: Feta is one of those cheeses that makes you think of a particular geographic region (in this case, the Mediterranean), yet is actually made all around the world. In much the same way Swiss cheese is made outside of Switzerland, and you can find delicious Brie made both in and out of France, great-tasting Feta is crafted by cheesemakers the world over. The cheese inside every tub of Trader Joe's Fat Free Crumbled Feta Cheese is made for us by a fourth generation Wisconsin cheesemaking family, still making cheese where their founding father created the family creamery in the late 19th century. The recipe for our Fat Free Crumbled Feta Cheese is simple. It begins with high quality Wisconsin milk from cows that haven't been treated with synthetic growth hormones. That milk is expertly transformed into firm, crumbly, salty, tangy Fat Free Feta Cheese, crumbled into bite-sized (or smaller!) pieces, and packed in a resealable tub. Our suppliers manage to squeeze in all that tangy, milky flavor while squeezing out all of the fat in the final product. The process is simple; the result is magical. The process may be magical, but the real wonder comes when you put the Fat Free Crumbled Feta to use. Sprinkle it onto salads or pizzas for a tangy, creamy addition. Stuff it into sandwiches with hummus and Falafel [sku 93935] or melt it atop a freshly grilled burger. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Fat Free Crumbled Feta Cheese
079857.name: Fat Free Crumbled Feta Cheese

079858.description: Feta Cheese is undeniably one of the most famous cheeses produced across the world. As a matter of fact, feta cheese makes up approximately 70% of its homeland's, Greece's, total cheese consumption. This soft and pasteurized cow's milk cheese is a salty, tangy, and unique offering, unmatched in the wide world of cheeses. While across the feta world, each cheese maker may have minor differences in taste and texture, but on the whole, feta is a curd cheese that has a salty flavor and crumbly texture that is sometimes moistened by a salty brine once in its packaging. However, Trader Joe's Feta Cheese isn't packaged in a saline brine, making for a dry and tangy, but more neutral and less salty cheese than its brined siblings. Grab a package to bring a soft, sliceable cheese to your next charcuterie tray or Mediterranean-tinged meal! Feta Cheese
079858.name: Feta Cheese

080632.description: What's the best thing since sliced bread? Well, sliced cheese, of course. Sliced cheese like Trader Joe's Sliced Lite Cheddar Cheese, that is! Trader Joe's Sliced Lite Cheddar Cheese is made for us under the supervision of two Wisconsin Master Cheesemakers, using milk from local family farms. At its foundation, its a traditional Cheddar, made using the time-honored "cheddaring" process first employed in the English village of Cheddar (yes, there is such a place, in Somerset). Traditional cheddaring involves putting the cheese curds through a mill after they've been cut and turned. It's a time and labor intensive process that yields a significantly more complex cheese than you get from more "modern" cheddaring methods like stirring the curds. Where this specific Sliced Lite Cheese deviates is the reduction of fat and calories, 50% and 25% fewer, respectively, than TJ's regular Sliced Sharp Cheddar [sku 77728]. The flavor and texture of Cheddar changes dramatically as it ages, to our eternal delight. Our Sliced Lite Cheddar is aged four to six months, just enough time to develop its rich, creamy, nutty flavor and texture. This complexity makes it an ideal mate for a burger, but it's also excellent in cold sandwiches, paninis, tuna melts, and omelettes. Each slice is separated by parchment, making it easy to use and ideal for anytime at all. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Sliced Lite Cheddar Cheese
080632.name: Sliced Lite Cheddar Cheese

081085.description: We have no guilt in admitting a freshly opened bag of Trader Joe's Shredded Mozzarella Cheese is a tempting shortcut to eschew any skinned knuckles and wasted time grating your own mozzarella. While taking the time to make it yourself has its place, we really try our best to deliver you the freshest, softest, and stretchiest Shredded Mozzarella Cheese we can find! Whether oozing off of a slice of pizza or layered in a pan of lasagna, Trader Joe's Shredded Mozzarella Cheese is ready to include in many dishes for a melted, stringy, and flavorful cheese addition. Our mozzarella fior di latte, the Italian terminology for cow's milk mozzarella, is made with pasteurized part-skim milk, bacterial cheese cultures, vegetable rennet, and just a few other preservative ingredients. Pasta filata, again, an Italian term, but this time for the mozz making process, is as simple as starting with fresh whey and cheese cultures, adding the vegetable rennet, and then heating in water to form a stringy and elastic cheese that can be kneaded and then shredded; ready for you to sprinkle and melt on whatever you'd like! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Shredded Mozzarella Cheese
081085.name: Shredded Mozzarella Cheese

082338.description: How do I love thee? Let me count the shreds. ~Joe Shakespeare Trader Joe's Fancy* Shredded Mexican Cheese Blend is our ideal blend for dishes with a Mexican flair, with sharp Cheddar, Monterey Jack, Asadero and Queso Blanco cheeses. It's a blend that's unique to Trader Joe's, and it boasts a unique flavor profile. The Jack, Asadero and Queso Blanco are mild, while the sharp Cheddar adds a bit of a bite. All of the cheeses are well-known for their meltability, which makes them particularly well-suited to dishes like burritos, enchiladas, quesadillas and tacos. And don't let the name make you feel like you need to limit yourself to Mexican dishes. This blend is excellent in salads and atop soups, and makes a distinctively flavored grilled cheese sandwich. We're selling each 12-ounce, resealable package of Trader Joe's Fancy Shredded Mexican Cheese Blend for $3.49, a price that's not fancy at all. *Fancy is not us being cheeky-it's a cheese industry term that refers to the thin size of the shred.
082338.name: Shredded Mexican Blend
082338.title: Finely Shredded Mexican Style Cheese Blend

082771.description: Ever find yourself staring down the deli aisle not knowing what type of cheese you need that night? While we won't help you select just one variety, we will hit you with Trader Joe's Lite Shredded 3 Cheese Blend which is bound to fit in with an assortment of different dishes. Whether your crafting an Italian themed dinner, a Mexican tinged meal, or just looking for a pre-made blend for your casseroles and pizzas, Trader Joe's has your cupboard covered. This quick-melting blend gives a wonderful variety of cheesy charm to your cooking, all ready-to-rock in a bagged Lite Shredded 3 Cheese Blend. We take three of the most popular and most combined cheese varieties to create this harmonious blend of flavor while trimming the edges and bringing you 50% less fat and 20% calories than our regular Shredded 3 Cheese Blend [sku16541]. We start the blend with the velvety and stretchy quality of shredded mozzarella; then we toss in a piquant pop of Monterey jack for a tangy and tart twist; and then finish off with a dash of cheddar cheese to melt together the sharpness of the Monterey jack with the creaminess of the mozzarella.
