We find that its a versatile blend for an array of dishes in your cookbook, but don't just take our word for it, come grab a 12-ounce bag of Trader Joe's Lite Shredded 3 Cheese Blend any day of the week for only $3.99*. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing.
082771.name: Shredded Lite 3 Cheese Blend

083140.description: Trader Joe's Shaved Parmigiano Reggiano is the real deal. While you may find similar cheeses produced outside of Italy (and the EU) labeled "Parmesan", these are not the same as authentic Parmigiano Reggiano, which by law may only be made under strict regulations in the regions surrounding Parma and Reggio-Emilia in northern- central Italy. And that's exactly why we source Parmigiano Reggiano that is produced by a century-old cheese company in the province of Parma. Raw (unpasteurized) cow's milk is curdled, drained, and packed into round molds reading for aging. The resulting "wheels" are then soaked in high-salinity brine for about 3 weeks, then aged until the desired dryness is achieved. Finally, the Parmigiano Reggiano is shaved into convenient flakes to impart their famously piquant flavors to any dish you'd like at moments notice. Packaged in a resealable tub to keep the shavings fresh for next time. The finished cheese shavings are dense and hard, with a granular texture and sharp flavor that presents fruity, nutty, savory notes. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Shaved Parmigiano Reggiano
083140.name: Shaved Parmesan Reggiano
083140.title: Shaved Parmigiano Reggiano Cheese

085325.description: "The King of Cheeses". Ah, a fitting name for the age-old Parmesan cheese that has been blessing bowls of pasta and charcuterie boards alike for centuries. We offer multiple takes on this royal cheese, but today we're talking about our Shredded Parmesan Cheese variety. Made to mix in, garnish, and embellish dishes-a-plenty to bring that world famous and well-loved piquancy home with you! Like all other cheeses, Parmesan, also known as Parmigiano-Reggiano, starts its life as a cultured milk mixture that is heated to create a hard, granular cheese. However unlike all others, Parmesan typically includes added salt as a preservative and is aged for at least a few months. We age Trader Joe's Shredded Parmesan Cheese for a minimum of ten months to enhance that sharp and strong savory flavor and create the characteristic dry, gritty texture Parmesan is known for. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Shredded Parmesan Cheese
085325.name: Shredded Parmesan Cheese

086232.description: Authentic Greek Feta is undeniably one of the most famous cheeses produced across the world. As a matter of fact, feta cheese composes a 70% slice of its homeland's, Greece's, cheese-consumption-pie. This soft and brined pasteurized sheep's milk cheese is a salty, tangy, and unique offering, unmatched in the wide world of cheeses. What makes Trader Joe's Authentic Greek Feta so authentic is that protected designation of origin badge you see on the packaging indicating that the cheese has been processed in one of a specific area, protected by European Union legislation. While anyone can make a similar cheese, it would legally have to be called "white cheese", and therefore not an authentically Grecian feta. While those separate specific areas may have minor differences in taste and texture, on the whole, feta is a curd cheese that has a salty taste and crumbly texture that is enhanced and moistened by a salty brine once in its packaging. However, this salinity can be partially removed if drained and rinsed with water from the packaged brine. Grab a container today to bring a soft, sliceable cheese to your next charcuterie tray! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Authentic Greek Feta
086232.name: Greek Feta In Brine

088544.description: Making a cheese board for guests who have a low tolerance for cheese from cow's milk? Looking for that tangy flavor that can only be described as "goaty"? Well, Trader Joe's Chevre Fine Herbs Goat Cheese has the perfect little log of creamy, fresh goodness for you! And with the added herb blend throughout the log, its an elevated version of our Chevre Goat Cheese [sku 19751] without you even needing to lift a finger! Chevre, French for goat cheese, is made in similar fashion to many cheeses made from cow's milk. The finished product, though, delivers a whole new world of flavors, texture, and nutrition profile that works wonders for people who prefer to stay away from traditional cheeses or anyone looking to add a slice of adventure to their cheese spreads. Trader Joe's Chevre Fine Herbs Goat Cheese has a uniquely herbaceous, tangy taste that separates it from just a traditional log of goat cheese and especially from cow's milk cheeses. This lovely Chevre is fresh, soft, and unaged - lower in fat, calcium, but higher in vitamin A than cheese from cow's milk. And with a lower lactose content, makes it more tolerable for many children and elderly people who may have a tougher time processing lactose. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing.
088544.name: Herb Goat Log
088544.title: Goat Cheese

088622.description: We carry a fine collection of mozzarella cheeses at our stores - we have logs, shreds, chubs, sticks, and we have mozzarella that's marinated too. These are all great in their own way and along with our collection, we have Trader Joe's Sliced Part Skim Mozzarella that's great in its very own way. This cheese is multifunctional, but we admit it's absolutely best for sandwich making. Since it's pre-Sliced into perfect squares to place on a nice piece of bread between turkey, ham, pastrami, roast beef or whatever your heart desires. This Mozzarella is of course delicious cold, right out of the fridge, or melted. You can melt a Slice or two for turkey melts, atop chicken, or in 8 Mini Croissants [sku 65467] with Uncured Black Forest Ham [sku 86863]. Fold this cheese between corn or flour tortillas for a cheesy, quesadilla and top it with a dollop of sour cream and Mild Pico de Gallo Salsa [sku 93920]. Made with fresh, pasteurized part-skim milk and non-animal, microbial rennet (something vegetarians will appreciate), Trader Joe's Sliced Part Skim Mozzarella Cheese is again a great match between bread, including croissants and tortillas. Each 12-ounce resealable package contains 12 square-cut slices. You'll find it in our refrigerated cheese case. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Sliced Part Skim Mozzarella Cheese
088622.name: Sliced Mozzarella
088622.title: Sliced Part Skim Mozzarella Cheese

090748.description: How do I love thee? Let me count the shreds. ~ Joe Shakespeare Trader Joe's Fancy* Shredded Lite Mexican Blend is our ideal blend for dishes in need of a little Mexican flair, with Lite Sharp Cheddar, Lite Monterey Jack, Lite Asadero and Lite Queso Blanco cheeses. It's a blend that's unique to Trader Joe's, and because of this boasts a flavor profile just as unique as our brand. The Jack, Asadero and Queso Blanco are mild, while the Sharp Cheddar adds a bit of a bite with every mouthful. All of the cheeses are well-known for their meltability, which makes them a particularly potent pairing to dishes like burritos, enchiladas, quesadillas and tacos. And don't let the name make you feel like you need to limit yourself to Mexican dishes. This blend is excellent in plenty of salads, atop any of our boxed soups, and makes a distinctively flavored grilled cheese sandwich. And while we're at it, with TJ's Fancy Shredded Lite Mexican Blend, we are giving you this meltable delicacy with 50% less fat and 25% fewer calories than TJ's Shredded Mexican Blend [sku 82338]. *Fancy is not us being cheeky-it's a cheese industry term that refers to the thin size of the shred. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Fancy Shredded Lite Mexican Blend
090748.name: Shredded Lite Mexican Blend
090748.title: Finely Shredded Lite Mexican Style Cheese Blend

091611.description: The "King of Cheeses". Trader Joe's Grated Parmesan Reggiano is the real deal. While you may find similar cheeses produced outside of Italy (and the EU) labeled "Parmesan", these are not the same as authentic Parmigiano Reggiano, which by law may only be made under strict regulations in the regions surrounding Parma and Reggio-Emilia in northern- central Italy. And that's exactly why we source Parmesan Reggiano that is produced by a century-old cheese company in the province of Parma. Raw (unpasteurized) cow's milk is curdled, drained, and packed into round molds reading for aging. The resulting "wheels" are then soaked in high-salinity brine for about 3 weeks, then aged to perfection. Finally, the Parmigiano Reggiano is grated into a convenient dusting to impart their famously piquant flavors to any dish you'd like at moments notice. Packaged in a resealable tub to keep the gratings fresh for next time. The finished cheese flakes are light and airy, with a granular texture and sharp flavor that presents fruity, nutty, savory notes. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Grated Parmigiano Reggiano
091611.name: Grated Parmesan Reggiano
091611.title: Grated Parmigiano Reggiano Cheese

092280.description: It's no secret that kids love string cheese. It may surprise you that adults are as smitten with this stringable snack as their progeny. Like our Organic String Cheese [sku 34435], Trader Joe's Light String Cheese has a mild mozzarella flavor and creamy, smooth texture. It of course pulls apart, like string cheese should, but the difference is, this one is Light - it contains 50 % less fat and 25% fewer calories than our regular organic string cheese. It comes to us from the same fourth generation, family-owned, Wisconsin cheese company. And when you discover that the entire cheese making process - from fresh-from-the-farm milk (from cows raised without the use of rBST) to packed-and-ready-to-ship cheese - takes only about three hours, you will be so filled with love that you're sure to find yourself with a craving for this mild, mozzarella-style cheese that's portable and pulls apart with such ease. We think Organic Light String Cheese is an excellent snack for anyone, really, whether you're a kid or just a kid at heart - for a mid-morning pick-me-up, a boost before a workout or anytime at all. We're selling each nine-ounce package of Trader Joe's Organic Light String Cheese (with nine individually-wrapped pieces) for $4.99*. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Light String Cheese
092280.name: Organic Lite String Cheese
092280.title: Pkg String Cheese Light Organic- Nfl - (Saputo Cheese Usa, Inc.)

092526.description: Enclosed is a secret. There is a secret production method that allows this Pub Cheese to spread on a cracker or chip but it's spread without breaking! It's made this way so we don't have to go through the tragedy of an awful "chip breakup". Essentially Pub Cheese Sharp Cheddar is a gourmet spread packed with actual cheddar made into a smooth, creamy, and luscious texture. However, you're probably wondering, where's the beer? Although Pub cheese traditionally got its name from adding beer to it around the bar, at Trader Joe's we have no beer in this Pub. It is perfectly enjoyable for all ages. So, grab the crackers, grab the chips, and call your kids. This Cheese is great with crackers and all, but we recommend dipping TJ's Big Soft Pretzels [sku 60876] in a bowl of melted, creamy Pub Cheese Sharp Cheddar or mix into hot soup, stew, or chili. Here's an idea - try making loaded baked potatoes or mashed potatoes by adding a few scoops out of the tub and sprinkle chives, bacon bits, and paprika. Delish! You'll find each 8-ounce tub of Pub Cheese Sharp Cheddar in our refrigerated cheese section at your neighborhood Trader Joe's. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Pub Cheese Sharp Cheddar
092526.name: Pub Cheese Sharp Cheddar

092527.description: Enclosed is a secret. There is a secret production method that allows this Pub Cheese to spread on a cracker or chip but it's spread without breaking! It's made this way so we don't have to go through the tragedy of an awful "chip breakup". Essentially Pub Cheese with Jalapeño is a gourmet spread packed with actual cheddar made into a smooth, creamy, and luscious texture. However, you're probably wondering, where's the beer? Although Pub cheese traditionally got its name from adding beer to it around the bar, at Trader Joe's we have no beer in this Pub. It is perfectly enjoyable for nearly all ages (if they don't mind the Jalapenos). So, grab the crackers, grab the chips, and call your kids. This Cheese is great with crackers and all, but we recommend dipping TJ's Big Soft Pretzels [sku 60876] in a bowl of melted, creamy Pub Cheese or mix into hot soup, stew, or chili. Here's an idea - try making zesty loaded baked potatoes or mashed potatoes by adding a few scoops out of the tub and sprinkle chives, bacon bits, and paprika. Delish! You'll find each 8-ounce tub of Pub Cheese with Jalapeño in our refrigerated cheese section at your neighborhood Trader Joe's. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Pub Cheese with Jalapeño
092527.name: Pub Cheese With Jalapenos

092653.description: A brick, or a block: what's the difference? It seems like a negligible distinction, but we take such distinctions seriously - especially when it comes to Trader Joe's Light Cream Cheese. Within the cheese biz, this particular presentation of cream cheese is known as a "brick." Brick, however, sounds heavy, and this creamy creation is anything but. Each "brick" has 50% less fat and 20% fewer calories thank regular cream cheeses. Made for us using fresh milk and cream from cows not treated with rBST, it's everything you want cream cheese to be - rich, creamy, and when softened, quite spreadable. So, rather than "brick," we'd like to refer to our Light Cream Cheese as a "block," as in "building block," since it can be a building block in so many delicious dishes. What's that? You want examples? Sure. A simple appetizer idea: set it on a plate, top with salsa or sweet chili sauce and serve with tortilla chips or crackers for a Mexican or Thai inspired dip. How's that for instant versatility? And speaking of dips, cream cheese is the star of any number of creamy dips. Don't forget bagels - how could you forget about the heavenly cream cheese and bagel pairing? Perhaps our favorite usage for this particular building block is cheesecake. If you're up to the challenge of making a cheesecake from scratch, you won't find a better foundation. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Light Cream Cheese
092653.name: Lite Cream Cheese Brick
092653.title: Pkg Cream Cheese Brick Lite Tj

093635.description: We have no guilt in admitting a freshly opened bag of Trader Joe's Organic Shredded Mozzarella Cheese is a tempting shortcut to eschew any skinned knuckles and wasted time grating your own mozzarella. While taking the time to make it yourself has its place, we really try our best to deliver you the freshest, softest, and stretchiest Organic Shredded Mozzarella Cheese we can find! Whether oozing off of a slice of pizza or layered in a pan of lasagna, Trader Joe's Organic Shredded Mozzarella Cheese is ready to include in many dishes for a melted, stringy, and flavorful cheese addition. Our mozzarella fior di latte, the Italian terminology for cow's milk mozzarella, is made with pasteurized organic part-skim milk, some cheese cultures and vegetable based rennet. Pasta filata, again, an Italian term, but this time for the mozz making process, is as simple as starting with fresh whey and cheese cultures, adding the vegetable rennet, and then heating in water to form a stringy and elastic cheese that can be kneaded and then shredded; ready for you to sprinkle and melt on whatever you'd like! You'll find each 8-ounce bag of Organic Shredded Mozzarella in our refrigerated, cheese section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Shredded Mozzarella Cheese
093635.name: Shredded Organic Mozzarella Cheese

093701.description: Our new Trader Joe's Le Delice de Bourgogne is a decadent triple cream soft ripened cheese from France. This cow's milk cheese has a pungent, bloomy rind with straw and mushroom aromas. The interior is sweet and creamy with a rich buttery flavor. Le Delice has a voluptuous mouth- coating texture that is soft and creamy with a salty, earthy finish. Serve this new triple cream cheese with crusty bread, crackers, seasonal fruit, berries, breads, chutneys and jams. It pairs excellent with champagne and other sparkling wines. It also goes nicely with dry rieslings and other crisp whites. If you are in the mood for beer, pair it with a light beer such as a lager. You must try this cheese¿ the tasting panel loved its delicious decadent flavor.
093701.name: Le Delice De Bourgogne

093847.description: We've never said this about any other product, but this Blend is Yodelicious. Get it? Yodel? Delicious? Yo-del- icious? We know it's a stretch, but we are talking Swiss cheese. And this blend is so good it makes us want to celebrate. What better way to celebrate a Shredded Swiss-Gruyère Cheese Blend than by yodeling. We rest our case. And now we'd like to tell you about the cheese. We've combined domestically produced Gruyère and Swiss, shredded them for convenience (and yo-del-icious-ness), and packed them into a resealable bag. The Swiss is creamy and mild; the Gruyere has a nuttier, more distinctive flavor - these two cheeses make a great pair. Melted atop a burger, as a main component of a grilled ham & cheese sandwich, as the pinnacle of French onion soup, made into mac & cheese, in fondue¿ versatile and, well, yo-del-icious. You'll find it in 12 ounce bags in our cheese case, every day. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Shredded Swiss & Gruyère Cheese Blend
093847.name: Shredded Swiss Gruyere Blend
093847.title: Shredded Cheese Blend Swiss Cheese & GruyãRe Cheese

093848.description: Hailing from its humble beginnings as a derivative of Monterey Jack, the original "American" cheese, when it was invented by the Mexican Franciscan friars of sunny and coastal Monterey, California. Our Pepper Jack Cheese uses a mild, creamy and Shredded Monterey Jack cheese as its base - it is, afterall, where it gets the name "Jack". However, instead of allowing the Monterey Jack to fully mature and turn into the well-loved, semi-soft cheese that it is, peppers are added during the cheesemaking process. This is where the "Pepper" part of the name comes in. Jalapeño peppers, habanero peppers, and red bell peppers are diced and added into the cheese resulting in perfectly spicy and incredibly herbaceous cheese. You could say we put the 'pepper' in Pepper Jack! These bold flavors go wonderful with quesadillas, and used to top hamburger patties. Whether you're just finding a shredded cheese to top your salads with a little kick or trying to zest up your summer cookout, Trader Joe's Shredded Pepper Jack Cheese is waiting in its resealable bag ready to get swept at a moment's notice. You'll find it in our refrigerated cheese case. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Shredded Pepper Jack Cheese Blend
093848.name: Shredded Pepper Jack Blend
093848.title: Shredded Cheese Blend Pepper Jack

093850.description: Enclosed in each container of Pub Cheese Cheddar with Horseradish is a secret. There is a secret production method that allows this tub of Pub to spread on a cracker or chip, but without the fear of snapping the chip in the container! It's made this way so we don't have to go through the tragedy of an awful "chip breakup". Essentially, Pub Cheese Cheddar with Horseradish is a gourmet spread packed with actual cheddar made into a smooth, creamy, and luscious texture. However, you're probably wondering, where's the beer? Although pub cheeses traditionally got their name from adding beer to it around the bar, at Trader Joe's we have no beer in this Pub Cheese. It is perfectly enjoyable for all ages. So, grab the kids and grab the chips because the Pub is now open for business. What makes this Pub Cheese different than our Jalapeno [sku 92527] and Sharp Cheddar [sku 92526] varieties is the addition of horseradish, making for a potent flavor full of spice and peppery notes. We recommend pouring up a refreshing Josephsbrau PLZNR [sku 97321] and dipping TJ's Big Soft Pretzels [sku 60876] in a bowl of melted, creamy Pub Cheese Cheddar with Horseradish. Here's an idea - try making loaded baked potatoes or mashed potatoes by adding a few scoops out of the tub and a sprinkle chives, bacon bits, and paprika. Delish! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing.
093850.name: Pub Cheese Horseradish

094175.description: What makes a good side dish even better? Cheese, that's what. And what's better than one cheese? Why, three cheeses, made with raw milk from cows not treated with rBST, of course! Made for us in Wisconsin using authentic Italian cheese-making techniques, Trader Joe's Shaved Parmesan, Romano & Asiago Cheese turns dishes you could eat into dishes you must eat. It's aged a minimum of five months, resulting in an umami-rich blend that's perfectly salty and slightly nutty. It's shaved into wafer-thin slices that melt wth ease. It's also priced to sell-pick up a five-ounce tub of Trader Joe's Shaved Parmesan, Romano & Asiago Cheese for just $2.99, only at your local Trader Joe's.
094175.name: Shaved Parmesan Romano Asiago Blend
094175.title: Shaved Parmesan, Romano & Asiago Cheeses

095426.description: Can you find a savory, delicious hunk of Sharp Cheddar in the cheese case at your neighborhood Trader Joe's, then take it home and slice it for yourself, for use in all sorts of applications? Absolutely. But when you know that cheese and crackers are on the menu, Trader Joe's Sharp Cheddar Cheese Cracker Cuts are the way to go. Made with milk from cows not treated with rBST and microbial (non-animal) enzymes, this Sharp Cheddar comes conveniently sliced into quintessentially cracker-sized quadrilaterals and packaged in a convenient, resealable container. When company comes calling (or when the kids get home from school, or when your favorite TV show beckons, etc.), all you need to do is pop off the lid, grab a sleeve of your favorite TJ's crackers, and-presto!-snacks are served! Sharp Cheddar Cheese Cracker Cuts
095426.name: Sharp Cheddar Cracker Cuts
095426.title: Sharp Cheddar Cheese Cracker Cut

095463.description: Making a cheese board for guests who have a low tolerance for cheese from cow's milk? Looking for that tangy flavor that can only be described as "goaty"? How about all that, with some sweet flavors? Well, Blueberry Vanilla Chevre Goat Cheese has the perfect little log of creamy, tangy and sweet goodness for you! Chevre, French for goat cheese, is made in similar fashion to many cheeses made from cow's milk. The finished product, though, delivers a whole new world of flavors, texture, and nutrition profile that works wonders for people who prefer to stay away from traditional cheeses or anyone looking to add a slice of colorful adventure to their cheese spreads. This Goat Cheese has a uniquely sweet, tangy taste that separates them from their ungulate cow-nterparts. This lovely Chevre is infused with vanilla and rolled in sweet, dry wild blueberries. The cheese is fresh, soft, and unaged - lower in fat, calcium, but higher in vitamin A than cheese from cow's milk. And with a lower lactose content, makes it more tolerable for many children and elderly people who may have a tougher time processing lactose. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Blueberry Vanilla Chevre Goat Cheese
095463.name: Blueberry And Vanilla Goat Log

095740.description: Let's begin with the cheese itself. It's not "Brie-flavored" or "Brie-like." This is Brie. The real deal, from France even, made with fresh milk and under the supervision of skilled cheesemakers. It's creamy and buttery - everything you expect from quality Brie. Instead of being crafted in a traditional-size wheel, these are crafted in two-bite size, .9 ounce mini rounds. Other than their size, however, there is no difference between our Mini Brie Bites and the Brie you'd normally enjoy. A big advantage of the Mini Brie Bites is portion control. Each Mini contains a scant 70 calo-ries, so you can indulge in Brie without the need to actually indulge. This is a win! Enjoy them as snacks, in sandwiches or salads or even on a cheese tray with nuts and dried fruit - they may be more than just cute, but you're more than welcome to play up their cuteness an-yway. You'll find 4.4 ounce packages - each containing five Mini Brie Bites, in our cheese case, every day. The "cute" will get your attention. The cheese will keep you coming back for more. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Mini Brie Bites
095740.name: Trader Joe'S Mini Brie Bites

096923.description: Trader Joe's Unexpected Cheddar looks like an aged Cheddar. At first bite, it tastes like an aged Cheddar. And then something entirely unexpected happens. The smooth creaminess of the Cheddar gives way to a tangy flavor and slightly crumbly texture, a subtle hint of salt crystallization is discovered, and it begins to taste like an aged Parmesan. Unexpected indeed! Our cheese makers, based in Wisconsin, have origins in Valdastico, in Italy's mountainous, Northeastern Veneto region. In this cheese, they've combined the best qualities of hard Italian cheeses like Parmesan with the best qualities of finely crafted American Cheddar and created a semi-hard cheese that pairs well with lighter- bodied red wines (think Pinot Noir) or pale ales. Joined by crusty bread, a slice of your favorite salami, and Fig & Olive Crisps [sku 53273], this cheese is unexpectedly perfect. As with most cheeses, we suggest letting Unexpected Cheddar breathe at room temperature for about 30 minutes prior to serving. If you're prepping a platter, unwrap the cheese and resist the temptation to cut right in. Your patience will be rewarded with cheese that really lives up to its flavor potential. It really is worth the wait. Anywhere else, its price of $3.99 for each seven ounce piece of this exquisite cheese would be an unexpected value. At Trader Joe's, though, value is one thing you can always expect.
096923.name: Unexpected Cheddar Cheese

097350.description: Sheep, cows, and goats are grazing on a myriad of plateaus and valleys in mountainous Spain producing a broad variety of cheeses -- many of which may be a new experience for your palate. The goats bring us a bone-white cheese that is marinated in wine, called Cabra al Vino. Cabra al Vino is a semi-firm pasteurized goat's milk from Spain's Mediterranean coast. It is cured for 48-72 hours in Spanish red wine. The paste remains nearly pure white and the rind absorbs a lovely violet hue. The paste is sweet and smooth, delicately grapey, with a gentle, pliable texture and mild fruity flavor. Sheep's milk makes up the dominant cheeses in Spain, due to centuries of vast herds of sheep covering much of Spain. The most popular cheese is Manchego, produced in La Mancha. Manchego has a firm and compact consistency and a buttery texture with a distinctive flavour. It is well developed but not too strong, creamy with a slight piquancy. It is a classic flavor of Spain. Iberico is a blend of cows' sheep's and goats's milk which gives this cheese its smooth and complex flavor. It is a popular Spanish cheese often enjoyed with a selection of fresh fruit, quince paste (Membrillo) or savored with a young red wine.
097350.name: Spanish Tapas Sampler
097350.title: Spanish Cheese Tapas Sampler

098607.description: Our new Trader Joe's shredded mild cheddar cheese is perfect for smothering over your favorite nachos or melting over any meal to deliver an extra burst of flavor. The possibilities are endless. Because it's a mild cheddar cheese, you get a milky, mild, slightly salted, creamy and sweet flavor with a moist texture. This is an ideal melting cheese. This cheese is approachable, versatile and at $2.99, it's a great value!! Trader Joe's Company Bulletin8/15/2012 page 36 of 41 Confidential
098607.name: Shredded Mild Cheddar Cheese

098671.description: For fans of the stuff, seeing Burrata on a restaurant menu is known to elicit shrieks of excitement and anticipation. With its fresh aroma and utterly creamy texture, this soft Italian cheese is the ideal counterpoint to other appetizer favorites like salty prosciutto and tangy bruschetta. And when said fans find the stuff in the cheese case at their neighborhood Trader Joe's, for a fraction of the menu price? Let's just say if you're not yet a fan of Burrata, you soon will be! Trader Joe's Burrata is hand-formed in the States using traditional Italian production methods (fun fact: burrata translates to "buttery" in Italian). At first glance, this bright white orb of creamy cows' milk cheese resembles its cousin, the mighty Mozzarella ball; in fact, you might have walked right past the tub in the eight or so years we've carried it on our shelves for that very reason. But break open a ball of Burrata, and you'll be delighted to discover soft, stretchy curds comingling with rich cream in its center, with a touch of sea salt to balance its slightly sweet, milky aroma. Creamy and almost cloud-like, it's a cheese-lover's dream, with only the simplest accompaniment needed to allow it to shine. Looking for palatable partners? How about fresh cantaloupe slices and balsamic vinegar? Perhaps some grilled peaches and mixed greens? Or maybe on pizza, with slow roasted tomatoes and basil, a glug of extra virgin olive oil, and a few cracks of sea salt¿ We're offering kosher-certified, eight-ounce tubs of Trader Joe's Burrata for $4.99, everyday. Each tub contains two generously sized balls of Burrata, so there's plenty to share with the other Burrata fans in your life (if you're so inclined). Find them in our cheese case.
098671.name: Burrata

098824.description: The Netherlands are rapidly building a great reputation for making wonderful goat cheeses. Now we've gone and done the unthinkable and took a high quality, imported goat's milk cheese, sliced it up and made it available to use for sandwiches, wraps, and more! Be prepared to have the most cultured (get it, because of the cheese?) lunch at work or school with Trader Joe's Sliced Goat's Milk Dutch Cheese. Whether you are intolerant of lactose or just enjoy the flavor differences and complexity of goat cheeses, our Sliced Goat's Milk Dutch Cheese is a wonderful product to switch up your sliced cheese routine. It has a creamy mouthfeel, tastes sharp, and is vaguely sweet all coming together to make a cheese that's great when chilled or wonderful when melted. Try a few slices on your next grilled cheese or to top a casserole! Styled as a Dutch cheese, our Sliced Goat's Milk Dutch Cheese has those recognizable Gouda-esque flavors with hints of sweet vanilla and tanginess from the goat's milk in each pale ivory slice. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Sliced Goat's Milk Dutch Cheese
098824.name: Sliced Dutch Goat
098824.title: Goat Milk Sliced Cheese

098825.description: By its very nature, goat's milk is a ideal for making tart, creamy cheeses. Part of that is due to the fact that goat's milk is naturally rich with distinctive fatty acids, that give it a uniquely tart-yet-rich flavor that some even describe as "goaty." That's why we thought it only natural to bring in this Goat's Milk Creamy Cheese, a delightfully spreadable cheese that uses goat milk's essentially soft and tangy qualities to produce a remarkably cream cheese-like flavor and texture, with a savory, "goaty" twist. Made for us by a renowned fromager in France, Trader Joe's Goat's Milk Creamy Cheese makes for a great addition to cheese plates and charcuterie boards, as well as a spread for crackers, toast, or bagels. Try pairing it with fresh fruit like grapes and figs, dried fruit like Slab Apricots [sku 67325], or salty, savory fare like our Jumbo Pitted Greek Kalamata Olives [sku 25155]. Of course, since this is a Trader Joe's cheese we're talking about, in addition to being a delightfully spreadable Goat's Milk Creamy Cheese, it's also a delightfully good value: you can find 4.5-ounce tubs in our cheese section for the everyday price of $3.29*. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Goat's Milk Creamy Cheese
098825.name: Goat Cream Cheese
098825.title: Goats Milk Creamy Cheese

099183.description: With one look at a wrapped up slice of an Organic American Single, one immediately is transported back to their childhood and having their parents making grilled cheese and tomato soup. Or maybe even remembering their first head chef memories crafting a grilled cheese without any help from the ol' 'rents. Either way, we're here to bring your Trader Joe's Organic American Singles for all of your creamy, melty, American cheesy needs! American Singles are a processed cheese product that is made from a blend of organic pasteurized milk, milk fats and solids, cultures, and annatto extract (like that used to color Cheddar cheeses) for that vivacious orange hue that is instantly recognizable and to be expected of American Singles. High in protein, calcium, and vitamin A, and with a wonderfully ooey gooey melting quality, our Organic American Singles are great for grilling burgers, grilled cheese, baking cheesy casseroles, or slapping on a hot breakfast sandwich. Grab a pack today and enjoy Trader Joe's Organic American Singles just as the young child in your parent's kitchen used to. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic American Singles
099183.name: Sliced Organic American
099183.title: Organic American Slices

018415.name: Eggs Jumbo White Dozen
018415.title: Rw Sauder 12 Grade A Jumbo Eggs

018416.name: Eggs Large White Dozen
018416.title: Sauder Eggs Fresh Grade A Large White Eggs

067043.description: Spicy is all the rage these days. Whether you're enjoying poultry dishes inspired by the cuisines of India or China, or indulging in some Nashville Hot Chicken, spicy chicken is always in vogue. And the granddaddy of all the spicy chicken - at least here in the U.S. - is most definitely Buffalo style chicken, which first hit the scene (in Buffalo, NY... go figure) way back in 1964. Trader Joe's Buffalo Style Chicken Sausage is an homage to this classic flavor profile. Rather than tossing deep-fried chicken wings in a spicy sauce and serving them with a cheesy dressing, we've added the sauce to the sausage, and stuffed it with Cheddar and Monterey Jack Cheeses. these Sausages are super on the grill, served on a hot dog bun. They're also delish pan-fried and tossed with even more hot sauce, to really amplify those hot notes. We're offering them in one pound packages of five links for a limited time. They're in our fresh meat case. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Buffalo Style Chicken Sausage
067043.name: Sausage Nat Buffalo Chicken
067043.title: Buffalo Style Chicken Sausage

075087.description: Trader Joe's is committed to developing products with the very best attributes to satisfy all the desires of our Customers. Of course, this commitment includes our fresh meat selection! We now have several fresh sausage offerings that not only cook up juicy and full of flavor, but that also possess some very attractive characteristics when it comes to how the meat is raised and processed. In the case of Trader Joe's Sweet Italian Chicken Sausage, for instance, our U.S. supplier uses chicken raised on all vegetarian feed, which have never been given antibiotics-ever. Aside from those estimable attributes, of course, they're also quite delicious: they're made in the style of a classic, Sweet Italian Sausage. Each link is seasoned with aromatic spices like mild anise and fennel seed, and contained in a natural pork casing to ensure a satisfyingly snappy texture once cooked through. They can be enjoyed simply on their own, as part of a delectably elevated hot dog, or incorporated into pasta dishes, sauces, soups, or even hearty breakfast hashes. For a true treat, try crumbling the contents of a Sausage or two into a pan and sautéeing before using as a prime pizza topping. Sweet Italian Chicken Sausage
075087.name: Sausage Chicken Nae Sweet Italian
075087.title: Sweet Italian Chicken Sausage

071299.description: Chili is a hearty, filling meal that takes considerable time to create from scratch. For this reason alone, it's extremely convenient when it comes in a can, ready to heat and eat. We offer an assortment of canned chili, including Beef Chili with Beans [sku 17186], Turkey Chili with Beans [sku 47936], and until recently, a meatless version called Organic Vegtarian Chili [sku 50846]. This vegetarian version was a best-seller... until our supplier was no longer able to produce it for us. Seeing this as an innovation opportunity, we replaced the textured soy protein of the original version with textured pea protein. In line with the latest vegetarian trends, this change maintains the 'meaty' texture of the original version, while also making Trader Joe's Organic Vegetarian Chili (now, in a green can) available to customers who are avoiding soy. Otherwise, the new iteration is similar to the previous recipe. It's still chock full of red beans and onions, with bell peppers, garlic, jalapeños, and seasonings that include chili powder, cumin, cayenne, and black pepper. Altogether, it's a zesty meal that makes meatless chili a satisfying choice for vegetarians and meat-eaters, alike! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Vegetarian Chili
071299.name: Chili Vegetarian Organic
071299.title: Organic Vegetarian Chili

078285.description: Returning to our shelves after a brief (but certainly not unnoticed!) hiatus, Trader Joe's Turkey Chili with Beans is back, brought to us by a new supplier with a new recipe that, dare we say, improves upon the already- estimable original. They start with a base of ground turkey, crushed tomatoes, and red beans, then season it all with diced green chile peppers and jalapeños, onions, and a suite of classic chili seasonings including garlic powder, cumin, and oregano. It all results in a superlatively hearty and satisfying home-style Chili that's equally excellent as an entrée or topping. Ready in mere minutes when heated in the microwave or on the stovetop, our Turkey Chili with Beans might be one of the easiest (and most cost-effective) options for a quick weekend lunch that you'll ever find on our grocery shelves. It can be enjoyed totally on its own, or accessorized with all sorts of condiments and toppings: we're particularly partial to a nice dollop of Sour Cream [sku 06223], some diced onions or sliced scallions, and, for those with a flair for the fiery, plenty of Chunky Garlic & Jalapeño Hot Sauce [sku 74550]. Speaking of toppings, this Chili's chunky consistency and mix of meaty and tender textures also makes it great for ladling over hot dogs and hamburgers-you can even pair it with a Spicy Jalapeño Chicken Sausage [sku 28285] or Ground Turkey [sku 16574] patty if you want to keep things poultry-specific. Turkey Chili with Beans
078285.name: Chili Ground Turkey
078285.title: Turkey Chili With Beans

055085.description: The Quindío region of Colombia is part of the so-called "coffee triangle" (Triángulo del Café), widely considered one of the best places to grow coffee beans. It is less widely considered one of the best places to grow plantains¿ but this doesn't make that fact any less true! The volcanic soil, altitude, proximity to the equatorial line, and consistent climate make this region an exceptional environment for growing this banana cultivar. Trader Joe's Sweet Plantain Chips start with plantains grown in this very region. Bunches are harvested by hand to reduce bruising. After harvest, the plantains are allowed extra time to ripen to a sweetness of 24 brix (natural sugar content level), as opposed to only 12 brix-a more typical number for other plantain growers. The profoundly sweet, ripe plantains are also exceedingly soft at this point-almost too soft to cut. Our Colombian supplier carefully peels each plantain by hand, and hand-feeds each one into a cutting machine to further protect the fruit. The sweet plantain slices then take a quick dip in hot sunflower oil, just until perfectly crisp. When your hand reaches into the bag, you'll pull out a handful of crunchy, gluten free "chips" with a sweetness all their own (absolutely no sugar is added). While they're a superb standalone snack, they also synergize spectacularly with all kinds of dips, but especially ones that have a bit of sweet and savory to them, like our Pineapple Salsa [sku 06602]. Sweet Plantain Chips
055085.name: Sweet Plantain Chips

055294.description: For a few years (2007-2012) the Ghost chili was classified as the world's hottest chili pepper, with an average of more than 1,000,000 Scoville heat units-that's about 417 times hotter than the average jalapeño! And while it has been knocked to third place (Carolina Reaper and Trinidad Moruga Scorpion in first and second, respec- tively), it still packs a ghostly punch. When something this spicy comes along, our first instinct is almost always how to eat it without injuring our- selves or others. And so we created Trader Joe's Ghost Chili Lattice Cut Potato Chips, of course. Ghost Pepper Potato Chips are seriously spicy chips, but if you're a lover of all things spicy, these will bring pure joy and bliss rather than pain and suffering. Their spiciness is also balanced by the naturally sweet profile of the potatoes themselves-the chili enhances, rather than overwhelms the potato. Crafted exclusively for Trader Joe's, these are lattice cut chips, so they really hold to their spicy seasoning. Hauntingly crispy, these treats evoke the spookiness of Halloween. In that spirit, by the time the goblins have disappeared from your neighborhoods, Ghost Pepper Lattice Cut Chips will have disappeared from your neighborhood Trader Joe's. Don't let the specter of missing them cause you to cry "Boo!" Come in for yours soon, before they're mere phantoms of what used to be. Each seven-ounce bag is $2.29, while they last. 9.28.1 4
055294.name: Ghost Pepper Potato Chips

058073.description: You might say that we're tortilla chip aficionados. We are huge fans of these corn-based comestibles, and we're in constant pursuit of the best possible tortilla chips the world has to offer. In fact, we are so dedicated to this pursuit that we decided to revamp our existing Restaurant Style White Corn Tortilla Chips [sku 57560] because we had a feeling they could be even better. And if you'll allow us to toot our own horn for a moment, our new Restaurant Style White Corn Tortilla Chips really hit the mark. We start with fresh, white corn tortillas (yes, actual tortillas-we're working far and above the tortilla chip standard here, folks) that are cut into slightly larger, slightly thicker triangles and fried in vegetable oil until they're ultra-crispy. The frying process creates a durable crunch that stands up to the even the chunkiest of guacs and heartiest of nacho fixings. And it's not just their heartiness that makes our White Corn Tortilla Chips "restaurant style"-we also add a touch of sea salt and lime juice concentrate. ¡Qué auténtico! Enjoy Restaurant Style White Corn Tortilla Chips straight out of the bag or alongside some fresh ceviche. Use them in your abuela's famous chilaquiles recipe or in a classic chicken & tortilla chip casserole. Or, take the road most traveled and use 'em as a vehicle for your favorite TJ's dip-Chunky Spicy Guacamole Auténtico [sku 96621], Homestyle Salsa Especial [sku 57152], Three Layer Hummus [sku 80867], etc.¿ We're selling each 9-ounce bag of Restaurant Style White Corn Tortilla Chips for just $1.99-you'll find them in our snack aisle. 01.09. 17
058073.name: Tortilla Chips Truly
058073.title: Truly Tortilla Chips White Corn Seasoned With Sea Salt And Lime =========== Note To Design: "Corn Tortilla Chips" Is The Soi And Shall Be In At Least 1/2 The Height Of The Largest Type On The Pdp.

061016.description: Finding a truffle must cause quite a kerfuffle. That's because truffles, as fungi that grow in the wild near tree roots, can't be planted and cultivated-only foraged. The truffle's rarity, paired with its unique and coveted fla- vor, combine for an ingredient some have called "the diamond of the kitchen." As one would expect such "diamonds" tend to stud gourmet cuisine-fancy pasta dishes and such. That's why for some people, our Organic White Truffle Potato Chips might, cause their own kerfuffle at first. Truffles? On Potato Chips? Yes, and again, yes. Our Chip makers take heritage varieties of organic potatoes, grown on family farms in Oregon and Washing- ton, and slice them thinly before cooking them to a crisp texture in a blend of organic oils. They add a simple yet sensational seasoning that includes Organic White Truffles from Italy (secret foraging location undisclosed) and Fleur du sel (sea salt) from western France, not-so-secretly found in the marshes of Guerande. The finished chip is ivory in color with black specks. It presents a heady aroma, familiar to truffle aficionados, and a delicate crunch that yields a light, earthy, umami-focused flavor. Snack on them one-by-one with a glass of cold Peak Organic IPA [sku 95856] by your side. Pile them on your grilled burger for extra umami and crunch. Or, serve on a silver platter with Charles de Marques Brut Champagne [sku 97069] for an ironically fancy hors d'oeuvre. We're selling Trader Joe's Organic White Truffle Potato Chips as a seasonal offering-available for a limited time in six-ounce bags for $2.99. 09.18. 17
061016.name: Potato Chips Org White Truffle
061016.title: Organic White Truffle Potato Chips With Italian White Truffles And Fleur De Sel Sea Salt

061420.description: Trader Joe's Chili & Lime Flavored Rolled Corn Tortilla Chips are spicy, ire-zest-tible little scrolls made from stone ground corn masa. Compared to similar snacks available elsewhere, these Chips are cut & rolled a little thicker for additional crunch. They're also crispier, since we've reduced the amount of water in them before they hit the fryer. Paired with this captivating crunchiness is a generous dusting of hot Chili & Lime Flavored seasoning. This makes for a tastefully tangy, definitely spicy profile-though we didn't get too silly with the chili, so you'll keep coming back to the bag for another handful. (We should also mention that the vibrant orange hue is naturally derived from vegetable juice, and paprika and turmeric extracts-another trait that sets this snack apart!) While our Rolled Corn Tortilla Chips are super satisfying as a stand-alone snack, they are also the ideal shape for dipping in Avocado's Number Guacamole [SKU 65355], or Trader Joe's Roasted Garlic Hummus [SKU 29911]-if you feel the need to invite garlic to the flavor-party. We're selling nine-ounce bags of Trader Joe's Chili & Lime Flavored Rolled Corn Tortilla Chips for $2.49, everyday. Roll on, spicy Snackers!
061420.name: Tortilla Rolled Chili Lime
061420.title: Chili & Lime Flavored Rolled Corn Tortilla Chips

062904.description: While there's a fair bit of contention as to the precise origins of jerk cooking (some argue that it was invented by the indigenous Taino and Arawak peoples of Jamaica, while others assert that escaped slaves created the cuisine after establishing their own communities on the island), one thing is indisputable: jerk seasoning is savory, spicy, and certifiably sensational. Based primarily on the flavors of allspice and hot red peppers, jerk seasoning is traditionally used on milder-flavored proteins like chicken or pork, but we find that it works equally well as a snack-enhancer. Need proof? Look no further than Trader Joe's Jerk-Style Plantain Chips. Drawing inspiration from classic Jamaican cooking, our Jerk-Style Plantain Chips pair the satisfying crunch of a plantain chip with the multitude of flavors of jerk seasoning. Each individual Chip is covered in a generous dusting of jerk cooking-inspired herbs and spices, including allspice, garlic powder, cinnamon, coriander, nutmeg, and ginger extract. What you'll likely notice above all other flavors, however, is the increasing heat of spicy red chili pepper powder. As you snack, the spice builds steadily (but not altogether overwhelmingly) to an exhilarating crescendo of heat, making it a perfect treat for the real spice fans out there (you know who you are.) Indeed, Trader Joe's Jerk-Style Plantain Chips are big when it comes to spice, but they're actually quite modest when it comes to price: we're selling each six-ounce bag for $1.79, an especially great value when you consider that most other flavored plantain chips out there sell for $3 and up. You'll find them in our snack section. 04.15. 19
062904.name: Plantain Chips Jerk Style
062904.title: Jerk-Style Plantain Chips

062910.description: We've been trying to come up with a catchy jingle for our new Sea Salted Saddle Potato Crisps. So far, here's what we've got: TJ's Saddle Potato Crisps/Make really excellent duck-bill lips/They look like saddles and taste like chips/Oooh, la-ti-da-di-da, dum-di-dum, dips! Ok, so maybe it won't be a hit. But there is good reason to believe the snack, itself, will become a blockbuster with our Customers. That's because it's made from a combination of dried potatoes, corn meal, and rice flour formed into perfectly mouth-shaped Crisps. Saddles, if you will. They are cooked in sunflower oil to an addictive crispiness then Sea Salted just right for a snacking experience that will have you singing a sanguine tune of your own. We're selling each 5.2-ounce, tall, lidded canister (you know the one) of Sea Salted Saddle Potato Crisps for $1.49. Find them in our snack aisle with the rest of our chippy snacks. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Sea Salted Saddle Potato Crisps
062910.name: Chips Saddles Salted
062910.title: Sea Salted Saddle Potato Crisps

062954.description: Twice-fried plantains go by many names in Latin America and the Caribbean. You may have heard of tostones, patacones, or tachinos, but if you're lucky enough to have tried them, then you know that they're delicious, crispy, and phenomenally savory, no matter what they're called. We drew inspiration from this curiously crunchy treat to create our newest snack creation. Feel free to call them what you like - we call them Trader Joe's Plantain Crisps. To make each Crisp, our supplier takes slices of green plantains (of the plátanos machos variety, to be specific), cooks them in oil, smashes them flat until they're around two to three inches in diameter, then cooks them again. These last two steps are where we depart most from tradition - our Crisps are much thinner than a typical tostone, and fried for a little longer, so that they're even crunchier, more chip-like, and ready to scoop up your favorite guacamole or dip. Here's where we don't part from Trader Joe's tradition: our Plantain Crisps are a certified value at $2.49* for a five-ounce bag. Keep an eye out for them in our snack aisle. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Plantain Crisps
062954.name: Plantain Crisps

065123.description: The crispiness. The crunchiness. The savory, craveable cheesiness of it all. The iconic nacho cheese tortilla chip is a beloved fixture of school lunches, snack tables, and party provisions, but how often is this snack legend given the recognition it deserves? We aimed to change that with our newest addition to the snack section, Trader Joe's Organic Nacho Cheese Flavored Corn Tortilla Chips, an edible ode to nacho chips that just happen to be made entirely with organic ingredients. Starting with a blend of stone ground organic white and yellow corn, our supplier models this masa into their familiar triangular form before lightly frying them to a perfect crisp. They're then flavored with a blend of organic Cheddar and Romano, rendering each Chip into a veritable vehicle of zesty, delicious, nacho cheese flavor. After all that, they're packed in individual bags for easy portioning, making them an ideal choice for picnics, packing in lunches, or simply grabbing as a nostalgically nacho-y anytime snack. We're selling six ounce packs of Trader Joe's Organic Nacho Cheese Flavored Corn Tortilla Chips, each containing six one-ounce bags, for $3.49*, every day. Look for them in our snack aisle. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Nacho Cheese Flavored Corn Tortilla Chips
065123.name: Tortilla Chips Org Nacho Cheees Snack Bag (6-1 Oz)
065123.title: Organic Nacho Cheese Flavored Corn Tortilla Chips ----------- Note To Design: The Smallest Letter In "Flavored" Must Be At Least 1/2 The Size Of Largest Letter In "Nacho Cheese". It Must Be Immediately After The Word Cheese (Similar To Sku# 61420).

069082.description: It's no secret that our Customers go gaga over our Everything But the Bagel Sesame Seasoning Blend [59137]. It's become a pantry staple in households across the country, practically pushing it to instant "TJ's Hall of Fame" status back when we introduced it in January of 2017. Now, on the cusp of E.B.T.B.'s 3rd TJ-a-versary, we're elevating the essence of "everything" to even greater heights, with new Trader Joe's Everything But the Bagel Seasoned Kettle Cooked Potato Chips. Made with Lady Clair and Dakota Pearl potatoes grown in western Canada, our supplier fries these Chips in small batches, then kettle-cooks them until they're ready to be seasoned and cooled. This method-as opposed to the typical "continuous fry" method of chip-making-results in extra-flavorful chips with a harder, crunchier bite. But let's not pretend the potatoes are the star of this show-as they say, "It's the seasoning, silly!" We're talking salt, sesame seeds, poppy seeds, onion powder, garlic powder, and black pepper (plus a pinch of sugar, a splash of sesame oil, and additional natural flavors), a.k.a. all that and a bag of chips¿literally. At TJ's we talk a whole lot about value, so instead of charging a pretty penny for these scrumptious specialty Chips like another store might, we're selling TJ's Everything But the Bagel Seasoned Kettle Cooked Potato Chips for $2.49* per seven-ounce bag. You'll find them in our snack section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Everything But the Bagel Seasoned Kettle-Cooked Potato Chips
069082.name: Potato Chips Everything But The Bagel Seasoning
069082.title: Everything But The Bagel Seasoned Potato Chips

070915.description: Let's put it plainly: Trader Joe's has proudly packed a peck of pickles into these pouches of potato chips. That's a bit of a tongue-twister, but it's nothing compared to the tongue-twisting taste of Trader Joe's Chips In A Pickle, a fantastically flavorful snack that combines the resounding crunch of a kettle-cooked potato chip with the tangy tartness and aromatic herbaceousness of a deli-style dill pickle. In the proud tradition of our summertime staple Popcorn in a Pickle [sku 55428], Trader Joe's Chips In A Pickle are bold, flavorful, and in their own way, surprisingly refreshing. While they certainly make a superb standalone snack, Chips In A Pickle are truly at their peak when paired up with a highly-stacked sandwich, fully dressed burger, or freshly grilled hot dog. They also make a capital companion to light, easy-drinking ales or crisp, tangy white wines, like our Espiral Vinho Verde [sku 47536]. For satisfying crunch, tantalizing tanginess, and distinctly delicious dose of dill, put Trader Joe's Chips In A Pickle into your grocery cart. We're selling six-ounce bags in our snack aisle, every day. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Chips In A Pickle
070915.name: Potato Chips Dill Pickle
070915.title: Chips In A Pickle

074044.description: When you've been around in the tortilla chip game for as long as we have, you end up learning a thing or two. And one of those things we've learned is to keep things simple. That's why Trader Joe's Organic Yellow Corn Tortilla Chip Rounds are made from just a handful of simple ingredients: organic stone ground yellow corn (that's been flavored with just a hint of lime), organic vegetable oil, and a bit of sea salt. That's it. In keeping our ingredient deck so minimalist, we've allowed ourselves to focus on the finer points of chipcraft: the resounding crunch, the lightly toasted corn flavor, even the disctinctly round shape, all work to elevate the chip-eating experience. Their geometry is particularly adept at holding thicker, chunkier salsas (like our aptly- titled Organic Thick & Chunky Salsa [sku 62789]) and creamy, cheesy dips - which also happens to make them a natural choice for making good, old-fashioned nachos. Take it from some folks who've been around - these Organic Yellow Corn Tortilla Chip Rounds have earned a spot in the winner's circle. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Yellow Corn Tortilla Chip Rounds
074044.name: Org Yellow Corn Tort Chip Rnd
074044.title: Organic Yellow Corn Tortilla Chip Rounds Gluten Free

078301.description: Our supplier built this special bag of Trader Joe's Vegetable Root Chips from the ground up, literally. They specially pick a unique, colorful collection of exotic root vegetables, an exciting mix with old favorites like sweet potato, and for some color variety, we used more sweet potato, colored with beet juice. We included more Root vegetables, of course - taro, a sweet, pale colored root native to Asia, and batata, basically a white sweet potato, and last but most definitely not least, parsnips, a root vegetable closely related to carrots, but faint in color. The Vegetables are picked and reconstructed into the form of tasty Chips. They are crunchy, crispy, and naturally pretty sweet too. We are seriously "rooting" for these chips! From the first bite, you'll transform any occasion into a gourmet snacking experience. The elegant colors and distinctive flavors are the perfect complement to any meal. Pair alongside any of our other veggie snacks and protein options for an all-inclusive BBQ or everyday lunch or dinner. But also feel free to start the veggie root party for one, by cracking open your own bag and digging in as they are for an anytime snack. You'll find each 7.5-ounce bag of Trader Joe's Vegetable Root Chips in the snack section, along with our other chips. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Vegetable Root Chips
078301.name: Vegetable Root Chips

089894.name: 50% Less Fat Potato Chip Salt
089894.title: Trader Joe'S Reduced Guilt Kettle Cooked Potato Chips Lightly Salted

091053.description: Trader Joe's Reduced Guilt Pita Chips with Sea Salt, though with a mere two and a half grams of fat per serving, dramatically reduce any guilt you may feel about enjoying these treats. That's a 50% decrease in fat and it doesn't stop there! They also contain 20% fewer calories than their conventional counterparts, so go ahead and grab a handful. Not only is the "Reduced Guilt" moniker going to make you feel better about indulging in our Reduced Guilt Pita Chips with Sea Salt, but they're kosher, vegan, and did we mention delicious? These crunchy, appetizing snackers are made from fresh pita bread that is splashed with sea salt, drizzled with sunflower and safflower oil, and baked to a beautifully flaxen colored crisp. This simple process ensures a satisfying snack directly from the bag, but feel free to scour the fresh dips section for a nearly endless list of possible flavor combinations for Trader Joe's Reduced Guilt Pita Chips with Sea Salt! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Reduced Guilt Pita Chips with Sea Salt
091053.name: Pita Chips With Sea Salt

091628.description: The true name for corn is maize, or in scientific nomenclature, Z. mays. Known to have been used as a staple food for Olmec, Maya, and Aztec cultures, food historians believe this originally wild plant was first cultivated on a broad scale in Mexico. We bow and give thanks to those early corn cultivators, for without them, our lives, quite sadly, would be lacking a current staple, Trader Joe's Unsalted Organic White Corn Tortilla Chips. These are triangle-shaped chips made with organic corn grown on farms in New Mexico and the Texas panhandle. They're cooked in organic vegetable oil, and like any good tortilla chip, these are ideal with any number of salsas and dips, especially guacamole. Don't, however, let tradition hem you in here. Dip these wedges in hummus, tapenades, or yogurt-based dips. Go even further in your maizeperimentation and use the Chips as carriers for chicken salad. Allow these Unsalted Organic White Corn Tortilla Chips to be the keys to your chipdom. Parties, picnics, beach days, work days, every day¿ there's always an occasion that calls for Tortilla Chips, so it's good to always have a bag on hand. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Unsalted Organic White Corn Tortilla Chips
091628.name: Org No Salt White Tortilla Chip
091628.title: Organic Unsalted White Corn Tortilla Chips

091749.description: There was a time, in the not-so-distant past (yet sometimes it feels like a lifetime ago), that we sold quite a number of potato chips in bags bearing national brand names. Whatever were we thinking? In fact, at one stage, we offered two entirely different rippled, ridge cut potato chips with the same flavor profile. Why would we do such a thing? Well, we remedied that situation by doing what we do-we held a blind tasting to determine which was best, and the winner got a packaging facelift. Actually, the winner got a packaging face transplant-it won its way into the world of Trader Joe's private label, and has been winning fans ever since. Trader Joe's Ridge Cut Potato Chips with Sea Salt were the winners then, and they remain winners today. They're thick slices of Arizona and Minnesota grown potatoes, cooked in small batches in expeller pressed sunflower oil, then lightly salted. They're simple chips, with three simple ingredients, and they're simply delicious. On their own, dipped in virtually any dip, or even crushed and used as a breading for chicken (trust us here: yum!), these Chips are the real deal. One of the benefits of the Trader Joe's label versus a national brand label is we're able to negotiate better pricing when we package products in our label. That holds true here. Have you shopped for chips elsewhere? They're crazy expensive! But ours aren't. We're selling Trader Joe's Ridge Cut Potato Chips with Sea Salt in a 16-ounce bag for $2.99, every day. That's a value that's a chip off the old Joe.
091749.name: Ridge Cut Potato Chips Sea Salt
091749.title: Ridge Cut Potato Chips With Sea Salt

091750.description: A ridge can be a geological formation, a meteorological expanse, or even an architectural meeting point. It can also be that thing that gives a chip its gastronomical gusto, which, from our perspective, is the very best thing a ridge can be. And when you combine that ridge with the classic pairing of salt & pepper to create Trader Joe's Ridge Cut Salt & Pepper Potato Chips, well, you've hit the proverbial ridge-pot! It's not just their ridges that make Trader Joe's Ridge Cut Salt & Pepper Potato Chips so durable; it's the fact that they're handcrafted in small batches from whole, unpeeled potatoes, giving them a figurative and literal edge over the competition. On their own, dipped in TJ's Organic Thick & Chunky Salsa [62789], TJ's Caramelized Onion Dip [96454], and/or TJ's Spinach & Kale Greek Yogurt Dip [97915]-or even crushed & used as a "breading" for chicken (trust us here: yum)-our Ridge Cut Salt & Pepper Potato Chips are the real deal. They're also a real deal-we're selling 16-ounce bags for $2.99 each.
091750.name: Ridge Cut Potato Salt & Pepper
091750.title: Trader Joe'S Ridge Cut Potato Chips Salt & Pepper =============== Note To Design: "Potato Chips" Is The Soi, Which Should Be At Least 1/2 The Height Of The Largest Type On The Pdp.

094337.description: Trader Joe's orange, green, and red Veggie & Flaxseed Corn Tortilla Chips are a variety of vegetable flavors. Don't worry, they're still made out of your typical stone ground white corn but powdered with colorful, carrot & tomato, spinach & garlic, and red beet & onion seasoning. Oh, and let's not forget. The Chips are sprinkled with nutty, Flaxseeds and even a little lime n' salt to complete the ultimate, savory and sweet chip! Enjoy Corn Tortilla Chips straight out of the bag or alongside some fresh ceviche. Use them in your abuelita's famous chilaquiles recipe or chicken tortilla soup. Or, take the road most traveled and use 'em as a vehicle for your favorite TJ's salsa- Homestyle Salsa Especial [sku 57152] or TJ's dip - Chunky Spicy Guacamole Auténtico [sku 96621] or Black Bean Dip [sku 61705] or Three Layer Hummus [sku 80867], etc.¿ You'll find each 12-ounce bag of colorful, Veggie & Flaxseed Corn Tortilla Chips in our snack aisle. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Veggie & Flaxseed Corn Tortilla Chips
094337.name: Veggie & Flaxseed Tort Chips
094337.title: Veggie & Flaxseed Tortilla Chips Carrot & Tomato - Spinach & Garlic - Red Beet & Onion

094583.description: Trader Joe's Organic Blue Corn Tortilla Chips aren't just good; they're consistently good, offering up a reliable, high-quality snacking experience in every bag. In other words, these Blue Chips have earned their blue chip reputation. Our supplier scours the stalk market for the finest organic, stoneground blue corn that money can buy, then adds a bit of water to it to make masa (dough). Once the masa is rolled flat and machine-cut into uniform triangles, the chips take not one, not two, but three passes through an open-flame conveyer oven. After a quick dip in the fryer and a few rolls through a giant salt tumbler, these chips are crisped & ready for whatever fixins they're asked to face-from heaps of chunky salsa, to bowls of creamy guac, to piles of melt-y cheese, and beyond! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Blue Corn Tortilla Chips
094583.name: Org Blue Corn Tort Chips
094583.title: Organic Blue Corn Tortilla Chips

095347.description: Trader Joe's Organic White Corn Tortilla Chips provide a nice alternative to conventional yellow chips. It all starts with white corn cultivated in New Mexico and Texas on organic farms that have been growing organic corn for generations. The corn is stone ground and made into dough, then cut into three-sided shapes. The triangles are finally fried in organic vegetable oil and treated to a generous sprinkling of sea salt. The finished snack is significantly lighter in color than yellow chips with a delicate crunch and a hint of lime (a remnant of the traditional pre-grinding process that employs limewater). Dip our Organic White Corn Tortilla Chips in your favorite TJ's salsa. Spread them out on an oven tray and bake them topped with shredded cheese and all your favorite fixings. Or simply contemplate their triangular beauty and organic awesomeness as you crunch them one by one. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic White Corn Tortilla Chips
095347.name: Org White Corn Tortilla Chips
095347.title: Organic White Corn Tortilla Chips

095417.description: The rich, aromatic taste of olive oil has been a time-tested favorite for thousands of years, so it seemed natural to create an olive oil potato chip. Our olive oil kettle cooked potato chips are crunchy, with a bold flavor that stands up to dips and spreads. And they taste just great on their own. 2
095417.name: Olive Oil Potato Chips

096695.description: Ode to the Classic Potato Chip There's nothing better than a classic¿like your parent's old station wagon (you know the one)- with the wood paneling; or those great chips you used to eat when you were growing up. Well, because you asked for it, you got it. The perfect chip! Trader Joe's Ode to the Classic Potato Chip. These chips are lightly fried, seasoned with salt, and full of that great potato taste. Just like you remember them. We're selling each 10oz bag of Trader Joe's Ode to the Classic Potato Chip for $1.99.
096695.name: Trader Joe'S Ode To The Classic Potato Chips

097208.description: Plantains are a close relative to the banana we all know and love. While you normally eat bananas raw, plantains are almost always cooked before eating to take the more firm, harder edge off of the fruit. Where bananas are sweet, plantains are on the starchy side and though plantains are technically a fruit, they're commonly eaten like root vegetables. When you think of them this way, Trader Joe's Plantain Chips make perfect sense to be added to our collection of snackable chips. Our Plantain Chips come from Peru, where the plantains are picked when they're just ripe enough to be slightly sweet. They're sliced and cooked in sunflower oil, then dusted with salt. They eat like sort-of-sweet, thick-cut potato chips, but with half the fat of typical potato chips. So while you may say we've gone bananas offering each six-ounce bag of Trader Joe's Plantain Chips for a measly $1.79*, we'd really like if you'd say "we've gone plantains". *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Plantain Chips
097208.name: Plantain Chips

097226.description: These tortilla chips were inspired by ingredients used South of the Border¿REALLY! This special blend of white corn, red quinoa, black beans and garlic was developed to make you daydream of places like Mexico, Bolivia and Peru. The only places these tortillas will really take you, though, is to the bottom of the bag because you won't be able to stop at one or two chips! We are selling each 12 oz bag of Trader Joe's Quinoa and Black Bean infused Tortilla Chips for only $2.69!
097226.name: Quinoa & Black Bean Tort Chips
097226.title: Quinoa And Black Bean Infused Tortilla Chips

057070.description: Though nuttily named, the coconut is technically a drupe (or "stone fruit"), not a nut. It is widely believed that the coconut originated in the islands of the south Pacific, but pinpointing the exact location has been difficult, as it's a fruit that has the uncanny ability to travel on its own. That's right; the coconut floats. This means that it likely dropped from palms on one island and traveled unaccompanied to neighboring islands, over and over again, growing wild on every island it visited along its travels. Fifteenth century Portuguese explorers gave it its name, and the coconut, in every imaginable form, has been enjoyed around the world ever since. Trader Joe's Organic Unsweetened Coconut Chips present coconut in a simple, delicious, snack and recipe- ready form. Our supplier in Sri Lanka harvests the mature organic coconuts, then cracks, slices, and dries the coconut. They add nothing during this process other than time and care. The result is a coconut chip that's ideal for all of those recipes (we're talking to you, Pinterest!) calling for unsweetened coconut. Don't get us wrong; this is sweet coconut¿ naturally sweet, without any of the added sugars found in sweetened coconut chips/shreds. Inside each bag of Organic Unsweetened Coconut Chips you'll find a single ingredient-organic coconut. Use the Chips for baking and cooking, add them to home-blended trail mixes (they're especially good paired with our Candy Coated Milk Chocolate Drops [sku 56854]), use them to top salads, or snack on them by the handful, right out of the bag. They're crunchy and captivatingly coconutty. We're selling each eight ounce resealable bag of Organic Unsweetened Coconut Chips for $1.99. You'll find them in our dried fruit and nut section. 09.26. 16
057070.name: Org Unsweetened Coconut Chips
057070.title: Organic Unsweetened Coconut Chips

093832.description: ¿ There is something about the cut of Trader Joe's Coconut Strips which helps them to have a fantastic and irresistible texture. Thailand, where we have sourced this item, specializes in knowing just the right version of coconut, among the many, to use for each finished coconut product. Much of the sweetened coconut available elsewhere is so sweet that the coconut flavor is masked. We've kept the added sugar low enough on this version to allow the coconut flavor to shine. Customers are clamoring for all things coconut; we are doing our best to oblige. Trader Joe's Coconut Strips are $1.99 for a 6 ounce bag.
093832.name: Coconut Strips Lightly Sweetened

098186.description: ¿ Crafted in small batches in Thailand, where the coconuts grow, Trader Joe's Roasted Coconut Chips are dry roasted (dry roasting = no oils), lightly sweetened and dusted with a bit of salt. These are made using three types of coconut; mature coconuts, coconut milk and coconut juice, which gives these chips intense coconut flavor, bite after bite. Perfect for snacking, salad topping or even ice cream adornment, Trader Joe's Roasted Coconut Chips are a must for coconut lovers. We are selling a 56 gram bag of Roasted Coconut Chips for $1.99. Trader Joe's Company Bulletin9/12/2012 page 40 of 44 Confidential
098186.name: Roasted Coconut Chips

050759.description: When it comes to brewing, what's the difference between hot and cold? Yes, temperature, of course, but also bite. Cold brewed coffee is never heated. As a result, the oils and acids that are released commonly with heat, don't pass through to the brew. No longer masked by the compounds that give coffee its famous bitter bite, the nuanced lush, fruity flavors of the beans becomes strikingly more perceptible and, some would argue, more enjoyable. With more than 50% less acid than a hot brewed cup, cold brew is truly smooth. Cold brewing is hot. While we're pro-DIY, the actual percolation and filtration can take somewhere between 12-24 hours. Don't know about you, but our cup of coffee can't always wait, so; we bottled it! Working with craft coffee roasters in Texas, we start with a half a pound, medium roast, 100% Arabica beans from the world's finest growing regions. The beans are ground coarsely and specially filtered to create 32 ounces of delicious, naturally sweet, ready-to-pour Trader Joe's Cold Brewed Coffee Concentrate. That's equivalent to about 96 ounces of coffee beverages when reconstituted with water, milk, etc. If you like it strong and steamy, mix it with a bit of hot water for a smooth cup. Or pour it over some ice for a cold cold brew. If you want to keep the coffee as concentrated as possible, you can use it to make coffee ice cubes for your iced coffee. And since it's ideal for adding coffee flavor without the acid bitterness, it's even great for use in baking, marinating, making cocktails or served Affogato-style over ice cream. We're selling each 32 ounce container of Cold Brew Coffee Concentrate for $7.99, which is equal to about 66¢ a cup! Serving Suggestion
050759.name: Cold Brew Concentrate
050759.title: Cold Brew Coffee Concentrate

050976.description: Colombia's famed Popayan region is home to the Supremo Arabica beans found within each 28-ounce canister of Trader Joe's Colombia Supremo Coffee. Supremo beans are larger and more flavorful than other Colombian beans making them the most prized and desirable of the South American nation's coffee crop. Otherwise speaking, these are some supremely satisfying beans. Medium roasted for a balance of sweet and rich classic coffee aromas and flavor. While an accessible roast, indeed, this is no garden variety can of beans. We take pride in distilling a balanced blend of acidity and smoothness into each batch of Columbia Supremo Coffee beans. And with 100% arabica whole beans filling each nitrogen flushed canister, we bring them in the freshest fashion available to our stores and you. With classic coffee notes of caramel and chocolate, waking up with a cup of Trader Joe's Colombia Supremo Coffee should be the first thing you check off of your to-do list every morning. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Colombia Supremo Coffee
050976.name: Colombia Supremo Coffee 28 Oz

051032.description: For so many, coffee is an essential part of the morning. So much so, that our "pre-coffee" personas can be sorely lacking-not only in personality, but also in the hand-eye coordination and basic math skills it takes to grind, measure, scoop, and pour. It's a bit of a Catch-22, really¿ we need the coffee to help us make the coffee, but we can't drink the coffee until we make it. Although Trader Joe's can't help you with all of life's conun- drums-we can help you with this one: Medium Roast Coffee Cups to the rescue! If you already drink Trader Joe's Joe Medium Roast Coffee [sku 93015], you'll recognize the package right away. It may be a 5.8-ounce box instead of a 14-ounce cylinder, but it's still that rust-colored cityscape and golden skyline, inhabited by Victorian-era coffee enthusiasts. The coffee inside is the same medium-roasted, 100% Arabica coffee you're used to getting in our stand-by cylinder. But it's different. It's different because this coffee is sealed into twelve, single-serving cups for use with your Keurig K-Cup® coffee maker. Each individual cup- package is nitrogen flushed and sealed for freshness. Our unique mesh system allows you to see and smell your coffee, the moment that seal is opened. One "cup" yields one regular serving of hot coffee. It's easy. It's fast. It's 100% recyclable. And, the taste? Fantas- tic! You get twelve cups of coffee for $4.99. If our calculations are correct, that's just $0.41 per cup. Find a café, or even a diner, with that price! Even if you do, you'll still be missing the exceptionally smooth, sweet and rich flavor of Trader Joe's Medium Roast Coffee. Gift your "pre-coffee" self with a box of these Coffee Cups today. Your "post-coffee" self will thank you. 6.28.1 3
051032.name: Joe Coffee Medium Roast K Cup
051032.title: Coffee Cups 12 Single Serve Cups

051484.description: Some denounce the practice of flavoring coffee, saying that it's mostly a ruse to make bad beans taste better. Apparently, it is true that some sellers take their aging inventory and mask the spoils with flavored oils. While this may be the case with some shady purveyors, be assured that Trader Joe's approaches every cup of Joe with excellence and integrity. And, our French Vanilla Coffee is certainly no exception! We start with 100% Arabica beans from Brazil. Our San Francisco roaster gives them a medium-dark roast for a cup that is full-bodied and rich. The beans are then ground and infused with a natural flavor oil that imparts fragrant and sweet-tasting vanilla notes. But, why call it "French"? It's about ice cream. The basic French recipe for vanilla ice cream includes egg yolks (not present in all vanilla ice creams). The addition of eggs yields a more custard-like result. Consequently, other foods with the same buttery, caramelly flavor profile and aroma are also dubbed "French Vanilla." Of course, you'll find similar custard characteristics in Trader Joe's French Vanilla Coffee. Still wondering why we flavored this coffee-if not to mask bad beans? A single sip should wash your wonder away! Pick up our 14-ounce bag of ground, 100% Arabica, vanilla-flavored beans for just $6.99-that's at least $0.17 less per ounce than competing brands. 2.19.1 4
051484.name: French Vanilla Coffee Ground
051484.title: French Vanilla Coffee Medium Dark Roast Ground Coffee 100% Arabica Beans
