062781.description: Just because you don't drink milk doesn't mean you take your coffee black. For those who are avoiding dairy for one reason or another, but still want something "creamy" to put in their cup of joe, Trader Joe's Coconut & Almond Vanilla Creamer is one of the best options around. With ingredients that include full-fat coconut cream, almond butter, and cane sugar-it's thick, rich, and slightly sweet. And, it's vanilla flavored with other natural flavors, making it the ideal partner for your strong, dark coffee. In addition to being dairy free and lactose free, this Coconut & Almond Vanilla Creamer is also vegan, kosher, and just 20 calories per tablespoon serving. Find the one pint carton every day in our refrigerators next to our other non-dairy (and not-so-non-dairy) creamers and beverages. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Coconut & Almond Vanilla Creamer
062781.name: Creamer Almond Coconut Vanilla Pint

072300.description: Trader Joe's Organic Heavy Whipping Cream is a simple, unmodified staple provided for all of our chef shoppers. A house brand product always stocking our refrigerators and looking to always be stocked in yours! Heavy cream is the thick, fat-rich portion of milk that rises to the top of fresh milk and can be skimmed off. Mandated by law, heavy cream can have a fat content of no less than 36%. A higher milkfat content adds moisture and makes for a more gentle, tender texture to any baked good. The ability of heavy cream to hold its structure while whipped or thickened in a sauce, yet also create a featherweight lightness to any baked dessert means there is truly no substitute for it in the kitchen. Because of this, we're selling each one-pint carton of Trader Joe's Organic Heavy Whipping Cream for $3.99* every day of the week. Find them in our dairy refrigerators next time you're looking to impress your friends and family with your baking inspiration! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Heavy Whipping Cream
072300.name: Heavy Cream Organic Pint
072300.title: Organic Heavy Whipping Cream

050931.name: Gloves Vinyl X-Large Ultragard V3000I-Xl
050931.title: Gloves Vinyl Xlarge Ultragard V3000I Xl

075710.description: The famous pain Poilane that has been sold in Paris since the early 1930s inspired this bread. After the war, white bread became more popular than brown bread, which symbolized difficult years. But the Poilâne firm refused to change anything as he felt that using organic stone ground flour was wholesome and the "right" thing to do! This bread is made in the tradition of Mr. Poilane: with stone-ground flour, natural fermentation using leaven and a wood-fired baking oven. Each beautifully wrapped 14.5 oz Pain Gaspard retails for $3.29. NEW ITEM Trader Joe's Pain Gaspard
075710.name: Paper Napkins One Case Of 6000 Unbleached

092847.name: 2 Oz. Demo Cups (5000 Cups Per Cs)

013337.name: Synergistic C
013337.title: Sfl Vit C Synergistic Ec - Nfl - (Puretek Corporation)

061525.description: There's a well-known saying that claims you can't teach an old dog new tricks. We aren't in the dog-training business, so we can't validate this assertion, but we do know something else: you can give an old dog new treats! You can even give a young pup new treats. Really, you can give any canine, at any age, new treats. And Trader Joe's Salmon Sweet Potato Dog Treats are some new treats that will certainly get tails wagging. Our Salmon Sweet Potato Dog Treats are made with antibiotic-free salmon from the cold waters of north- ern Scotland. The salmon is mixed with cooked sweet potato and then smoked over natural hardwood. That's it! Those are the only two ingredients in these doggone good treats. Thanks to the top-notch quality of these Treats, you'll feel great about giving them to your four-legged friends. Feed your dog a Treat as a between-meal snack, a treat, or as a training reward. Nothing encourages good be- havior better than a scrumptious treat. Larger dogs can eat these whole, or break apart these circular treats for the smaller pups out there. For $3.99, pick up a four-ounce resealable bag of Trader Joe's Salmon Sweet Potato Dog Treats. Your pup will be more excited than a dog with two tails. 04.16. 18
061525.name: Salmon Sweet Potato Dog Treat
061525.title: Salmon & Sweet Potato Recipe Dog Treats - Notes To Design: All The Words In "Salmon & Sweet Potato Recipe" Must Be Printed In The Same Size, Style And Color Print. "Dog Treats" Must Appear Conspicuously On The Label As This Is The Product Name.

037994.description: ¿ Introducing, Trader Joe's Organic Turkish Apricots. You already know our best-selling Turkish Apricots. This year we were able to find some great Organic Apricots out of Turkey - sweet, moist, but grown organically, and without the sulfur dioxide added. Trader Joe's Organic Turkish Apricots are a healthy treat your customers will love. And they will love the price too! $4.49 for a 1 lb. bag.
037994.name: Org Turkish Apricots
037994.title: Organic Turkish Apricots - Dried Fruit

067325.description: Blenheim variety apricots are rare and slowly disappearing. Brought to California from England in the 1880s (and named for the gardens at Blenheim Palace where Winston Churchill was born), this variety is currently grown in only a few places around the world-including California where just about 800 acres of Blenheim apricot trees remain. These apricots are coveted for their complex flavor displaying a delicate balance of acidity and sweetness. In fact, many connoisseurs consider Blenheims to be the consummate ideal of apricot flavor. This is why Trader Joe's is happy to deliver these California Blenheim Variety Slab Apricots to our Customers. Slab apricots are made from extremely ripe fruit. This means they've stayed on the tree longer, raising the sugar content and resulting in soft, almost "gooey" fruit. When dried on a tray, they tend to lose their shape and flatten into 'slabs.' And as you might assume, they taste extra-sweet with intense apricot flavor! When available, each eight-ounce resealable bag of Trader Joe's Blenheim Variety California Slab Apricots is $4.99*. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. California Blenheim Variety Slab Apricots
067325.name: Apricot Slab
067325.title: Df Apricots Exch/Ch

067326.description: Blenheim variety apricots are rare and slowly disappearing. Brought to California from England in the 1880s (and named for the gardens at Blenheim Palace where Winston Churchill was born), this variety is currently grown in only a few places around the world-including California where just about 800 acres of Blenheim apricot trees remain. These apricots are coveted for their complex flavor displaying a delicate balance of acidity and sweetness. In fact, many connoisseurs consider Blenheims to be the consummate ideal of apricot flavor. This is why Trader Joe's is happy to deliver these Extra Choice/Choice Blenheims to our Customers. Grown in California, these Apricots are harvested earlier than so-called slabs (compare to our California Slab Apricots [sku 67325]). As a result, they are less sticky with more tartness to match the sweetness. When available, each eight-ounce resealable bag of Trader Joe's Blenheim Variety Extra Choice/Choice Apricots is $4.99*. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Blenheim Variety Extra Choice/ Choice Apricots
067326.name: Apricot

078443.description: Turkey is known for its apricots. So is Trader Joe's, some might say. We sell lots of them in dried form, including Organic Turkish Apricots [sku 37994], and conventional Dried Apricots [sku 32350]. Now, we've added another option that brings a Simply Amazing profile to our dried apricot line up. Large, Dried Apricots-of the juicy, Suphany variety-ripen in the sun to a blush-orange hue, while also developing a rich, honey-like sweetness. Once harvested, they're carefully dried in the summer sun by our trusted Turkish apricot supplier (and by Mother Nature, of course). What really makes these Dried Apricots Simply Amazing is the final step, which involves a gentle steaming. This unique method yields unbelievably Soft Apricots with a tender, chewy, almost velvety texture. Each bite of these reddish gems presents a floral, candy-like quality that is tempered by a pleasant tang. Because they are harvest-dependent, we're offering Trader Joe's Simply Amazing Soft Dried Apricots only for a limited time. When in season, you'll find them on our shelves alongside our simply amazing assortment of dried fruits and nuts. Simply Amazing Soft Dried Apricots
078443.name: Apricot Soft Dried
078443.title: Simply Amazing Soft Dried Apricots

026505.description: Grown in Michigan and Utah, two of the leading areas for cherry production in the United States, Trader Joe's Dried Montmorency Cherries are deep red in color, which comes from flavonoids called anthocyanins. Of course, because they're cherries, this probably isn't terribly surprising. If you're familiar with Montmorency Cherries, though, you know they're quite tart, almost pucker-worthy. In search of balance, we've added just enough sugar to sweeten the naturally sharp profile of these little drupes - we'll go out on a limb and say perfect equilibrium is achieved with every handful. A great snack right out of the bag; they're also a stellar addition to a cheese tray. Try them alongside our Triple Crème Brie [sku 55406] - that combo is a brilliant balance of tart, sweet, tangy, creamy, and chewy. Dried Montmorency Cherries will dress up pretty much any salad, they're delicious in baked goods - use them in place of raisins to very flavorful effect. They also make quite a good impression blended with something as plain as oatmeal or granola - ensuring they'll be plain no more. We're selling sweet-tart Dried Montmorency Cherries in an eight ounce bag for $4.99. You'll find them in our dried fruit section.
026505.name: Dried Pitted Tart Montmorency Cherries

067670.description: Dried cranberries are well-loved at Trader Joe's. You can find them in tons of our Trek mixes and in our prepared salads and salad kits. You'll also find them in TJ's cookies, breads, bars, and cereals. We could go on! However, not everyone realizes that the dried cranberries in their favorite foods are almost always sweetened. For those who love dried cranberries as much as we do-but who are also watching their sugar intake- we thought it would be really nice to have a no-added-sugar alternative. This is where Trader Joe's Organic Unsweetened Cranberries come in. These Organic, ruby-red gems are soft and plump with that familiar chew. They are classically tart, as cranberries should be, with a little hint of sweetness that comes naturally from the sugar inherent in the fruit. But still, that's just 2g of sugar (0g added) in each quarter-cup serving. Compare this with regular sweetened Dried Cranberries [sku 26621], which contain a whopping 27g of sugar per quarter cup! We're selling each 5.5-ounce bag of Organic Unsweetened Dried Cranberries every day in our dried fruit section. Organic No Sugar Added Dried Cranberries
067670.name: Cranberries Org No Sugar Added

096422.description: ¿ Trader Joe's Whole Organic Sweetened Cranberries, as the name states, are whole sweetened dried cranberries. Most dried cranberries are cut pieces of cranberry, the leftover bits of cranberry from pressing cranberry juice. These are different. These are not leftovers from juice making. The whole organic cranberry is kept intact, dried and sweetened. The result is a plump, delicious, juicy cranberry, full of rich tart cranberry flavor, balanced with by the addition of organic cane sugar. Yum! Rich, juicy, tart and sweet. The price is sweet too. Trader Joe's Whole Organic Sweetened Cranberries are just $2.99 for an 8 ounce bag! ¿ Trader Joe's Company Bulletin10/05/2011 page 54 of 60 Confidential
096422.name: Org Whole Cranberries Sweetened
096422.title: Organic Whole Sweetened Dried Cranberries

020118.description: Prunes are dried plums. Non-sorbate prunes are dried plums that have had no potassium sorbate added-an ingredient sometimes applied to dried fruit to extend its shelf-life. Trader Joe's Non-Sorbate Pitted Prunes are sorbate-free, dried plums that have also had their pits removed. In other words, they are nature's candy delivered in dark black-brown, shriveled bites that are soft, chewy, and naturally sweet (with no sugar added). Enjoy our Pitted Prunes regularly (to keep things regular!), and whenever you need a simple snack that satisfies. And don't forget to reseal the bag after each serving to keep these unpreserved Prunes fresh until they're gone! Find them in the dried fruit section of your neighborhood store. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Non-Sorbate Pitted Prunes
020118.name: Non-Sorbate Pitted Prunes

032350.description: Lightly sweet, but not cloyingly candy-like, Trader Joe's Dried Apricots make a flawless on-the-go snack or addition to many recipes in the kitchen. Fresh apricots, while packed with nutrients and a juicy bite, can get fruity mush all over your important papers when stowed away in the 'ole briefcase for a business day snack, however, with our Dried Apricots, you can have those health benefits and fruity flavors without the fragility of handling fresh fruit! Trader Joe's Dried Apricots imported right out of Turkey are the succulent fruits of the apricot tree (Prunus armeniaca) which have been naturally sun dried, pitted, and sulphur dioxide infused to promote retention of their beautiful deep-orange hue. We stuff our one-pound packages of Dried Apricots with two basic varieties known as the Malatya and Urgup. These names identify the fruit by their primary growing areas within their Anatolian origin. Low in fat, sodium, calories, and cholesterol while being high in fiber, potassium, and sweet natural sugars, Dried Apricots make a much more conscious choice when it comes time to hit the vending machine for a workplace afternoon snack. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Dried Apricots
032350.name: Dried Apricots Product Of Turkey

051166.description: Trader Joe's Dried Wild Blueberries are sweet little blue gems loaded with antioxidants and other nutritional benefits. They're even relatively low in calories. Wild Blueberries have one of the highest antioxidant levels among other berries, such as raspberries, blackberries, strawberries, and cranberries. We're in favor of any health benefits they might provide, but honestly, we're most concerned with how they taste. Trader Joe's Dried Wild Blueberries come out winners there, too - wild blueberries are known for being smaller, juicier, and sweeter than their cultivated cousins. These sweet-tart berries are even smaller because they're dried, so a lot of juices are sucked out, shrinking each berry. Nonetheless, they still remain a juicy and pleasing chewy texture in every bite. Some may prefer these over the fresh ones at times because you can carry these anywhere for a much longer period of time. Throw a handful in your backpack for long hike or camping trip with trail mix or eat them instantly with ice cream or yogurt. The choice is yours, go wild! You'll find each 8-ounce bag of Dried Wild Blueberries, every day in our dried fruit section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Dried Wild Blueberries
051166.name: Dried Wild Blueberries

059460.description: Figs, figs, figs. They're delicious, and sweet, but they often fall by the wayside in favor of other fruits. If you've only ever encountered figs in their renowned cookie form, you're missing out-especially now that Trader Joe's Organic Turkish Dried Figs are within your grasp. Our Organic Turkish Dried Figs are of the Smyrna variety, a type of fig whose origins can be traced back to Ancient Greece and are named after an ancient city. Slightly larger than their Dried Mission Figs [sku 21142] counterparts, golden-brown Turkish Dried Figs have an unmatched sweetness. They're grown in an ideal fig- growing climate, which produces their thin skins and exceptionally sweet fruit. And, they're organic! Once per- fectly ripe, the figs are picked, sun-dried, and washed before being packaged and ready for all your figgy needs. While these Dried Figs are tasty enough to eat right out of the bag, there are other options for your consider- ation. Like served on toast with Ricotta [sku 50920] and honey. Or added to salads. Or in a fig and prosciutto sandwich. Or chopped and tossed on your morning oatmeal or after-dinner bowl of French Vanilla Ice Cream [sku 78576]. See what we mean? So many options! We're selling each 10-ounce bag of Trader Joe's Organic Turkish Dried Figs for $2.99. That value is no figment of your imagination. You'll find them with our other dried fruits. 06.19. 17
059460.name: Org Turkish Dried Figs
059460.title: Organic Turkish Dried Figs

062323.description: During a time of year when everyone's focused on dates-like, say, an approaching new year-we'd like to draw your attention to another kind of date. No, sorry, we won't be taking you on a romantic, candle-lit dinner date, but we will be offering Organic Pitted Halawi Dates for a limited time. Next best thing, right? Named from the word for "sweet" in Arabic, Halawi Dates are semi-dry dates originating from Israel. They're the amber-colored cousin of the well-known Medjool and Deglet Nour varieties, but they're smaller and have quite a distinct flavor. While these Halawi Dates are sweet like most dates, their sweetness is caramel-y and buttery-and they even have the soft texture to match. The buttery sweetness of Halawi Dates makes them especially perfect partners to cheeses and savory foods. Serve on a cheese plate alongside Double Cream Brie [sku 74953] or Gorgonzola [sku 32859]. Or, stuff 'em with Goat Cheese [sku 14730] and wrap them in bacon for an enticing appetizer. They're easy to use in smoothies, baking , dressings, or sauces-and, of course, they're perfect to blend with French Vanilla Ice Cream [sku 45883] for a tried-and-true Date Shake. You'll find 10.58-ounce boxes of Organic Pitted Halawi Dates for the outstanding value of $3.99 each, while they last. Maybe dinner next time¿
062323.name: Date Pitted Org
062323.title: Dates Pitted Org

051753.description: The first mangoes that Americans ever tasted were pickled. Had the fruit not been preserved in that briny liquid, it would not have survived the voyage from the East Indian tropics to the northeastern coast of the colonial United States. Of course, had Trader Joe's been in Boston in the late 17th century, colonists most certainly would have ignored the vinegary version in favor of our sweet (yet, unsweetened) Organic Dried Mangoes. Our Dried Mangoes are made from several different mango varieties-Kent, Haden, Ataulfo, and Keitt-grown in the Mexico. The fresh fruit is delivered to the nearest of a number of Mexican plants where it is simply washed, peeled, and sliced by hand, before being carefully placed on multi-layered racks for drying. Once dehydrated, the mangoes are hand-sorted (to remove the less than perfect pieces) and packed into the attractive, see-through bags you find on the shelf at your neighborhood Joe's. We call them "unsweetened" because we've added no sugar to these naturally sweet mangoes. They're "unsulfured" because their lovely orange color is pretty enough-and because we want everyone with sulfur allergies to enjoy them, too. Certified kosher and organic, this natural snack is so "clean," it bears the exact same name as its short ingredients list: Organic Dried Mango. That's it! You won't be seeing Trader Joe's pickled mangoes anytime soon, but these Organic Unsulfured Unsweetened Dried Mangoes are available now for just $3.99 each 6-ounce bag. 4.24.1 4
051753.name: Org Dried Mango
051753.title: Organic Dried Mango Unsulfured & Unsweetened

075253.description: We sell mucho mango, especially the dried kind. Customer favorites include Trader Joe's Just Mango Slices [sku 94329], Organic Dried Mango [sku 51753], Soft & Juicy Mango [sku 98941], and Chile Spiced Mango [sku 81702]. These are made from different varieties, depending on availability, including: Kent (green/red skin), Haden (red/yellow skin), Keitt (green skin), and Ataulfo (golden yellow). But Trader Joe's Organic Dried Atualfo Mango Slices is made exclusively from Ataulfo mangoes. Here's why this is exciting... Ataulfo mangoes, sometimes called "honey mangoes" or "champagne mangoes," are indeed a special breed. Underneath their golden-yellow skin, these oblong-shaped mangoes have a much-less-fibrous flesh (compared with those other varieties), along with a very smooth, buttery texture. The fruit is naturally sweet and juicy. Our supplier in Mexico (the land where Ataulfos originate) takes advantage of these traits by peeling, pitting, and thinly slicing fully ripe Ataulfos, then expertly drying them. That's it! Nothing else is added to these Organic Mango Slices, so you get to enjoy pure, authentic Dried Ataulfo Mango, with its pleasantly chewy texture, and honey-sweet flavor. And like our other dried mango offerings, these make a delicious anytime snack that can even satisfy your candy cravings. They're also really tasty paired with something salty and crunchy, such as Trader Joe's Pretzel Sticks [sku 12564]. Organic Dried Ataulfo Mango Slices
075253.name: Org Mango Ataulfo
075253.title: Organic Dried Ataulfo Mango Slices

081702.description: We've been selling Trader Joe's Chile Spiced Mango for nearly a decade and a half. (Wow.) When it first arrived on our shelves, it made an enormous splash (metaphorically, it was a cannonball in the pool that is Trader Joe's), and its ripples have continued to this very day. Its story begins in Thailand with perfectly ripe, flavorful mango that's been specially selected for drying - it's sliced, sweetened, and dried carefully so that it retains enough of its moisture to be easy-eating. Once it hits the States, the dried mango is delivered to another longtime Trader Joe's supplier, where it is combined with a spicy but not-too-hot blend of paprika, cayenne pepper, sugar, and salt, then packed and delivered to us. It's a little sweet and packs some heat, so if you like sweet and spicy, say hello to your new best friend. And if you're looking for the perfect - and likely unexpected - snack food to serve with beer at a summertime soirée, there's nothing we can recommend as highly as our Chile Spiced Mango. Have faith in us on this one; we wouldn't steer you wrong. We're selling this super snack in eight ounce bags for $2.49 each. It's in the dried fruit and nut section.
081702.name: Chile Spiced Mango

094329.description: When we named this product Just Mango Slices we weren't messing around. Inside the bag you will find Just Mango Slices, and nothing else. Our supplier dries several varieties of mango for us, so depending on what's most ripe when it's drying time, you could find slices of Kent, Haden, Keitt, or Ataulfo mangoes inside the bag. Still, that's all you'll find. No additives, no preservatives, no colors. Just Mango Slices. Trader Joe's Just Mango Slices are dried and packed for us by a supplier that's been in the business of drying tropical fruit for more than 20 years. The fruit is peeled, seeded, and sliced by hand - the slices aren't uniform in size or shape, but they are loaded with fresh, naturally-sweet mango flavor. Fun fruit fact: it takes five pounds of tree-ripened, fresh mangoes to make each six ounce bag of Trader Joe's Just Mango Slices. And that makes our price of $2.99 for that six ounce bag pretty darn impressive. Even more impressive? That's the same price we've offered on these Slices for at least four years running. You'll find them in our nuts & dried fruit section.
094329.name: Just Mango Slices

095105.description: A hidden gem of our dried fruit aisle, Trader Joe's Sweetened Green Mango (which is more of an electric yellow, but we digress) offers the same Soft & Juicy sweetness as its more obviously orange counterpart, except this Mango packs a punch. Well, not a punch, per se, but a pleasant tartness that goes swing-for-swing with the sweetness. And just how does this glorious Green Mango get its tangy twist? It's pretty simple, actually. Our Thai supplier picks their mangoes early, before they're ripe. The mangoes are peeled, sliced into strips, and sweetened with cane sugar, then dried using a unique process that uses vegetable-based glycerin to keep the Mango soft, but never mushy. Man-go get yourself a package today! Sweetened Green Mango
095105.name: Dried Green Mango
095105.title: Sweetened Green Mango

098741.description: Because we live in a world of contradictions, it's sometimes easy to accept things that seem at odds to be simultaneously true. But still, it's not uncommon for us to get the question, "How can mango be simultaneously soft, juicy, and dried?" It's a good question, and one that deserves an answer. So we'll give it a go. This is Chokanan mango, grown in Thailand, where it is harvested at the peak of ripeness, then peeled and sliced into strips (it's the same type of mango you'll find in our Chile Spiced Mango [sku 81702]). The drying process is unique in that it uses vegetable-based glycerin to keep the mango soft - but never mushy - and mango juice is added in to give it a little extra moisture and further intensify the mango flavor. If you like the taste of mango, but find peeling a fresh mango a hassle, or you're not a fan of the typically tougher texture of traditional dried mango, Trader Joe's Soft & Juicy Mango is right on the money for you. We're selling it in six ounce bags for $1.99, not very much money for such a satisfyingly sweet treat. You'll find this Soft & Juicy Mango only at your neighborhood Trader Joe's.
098741.name: Soft & Juicy Mango

025880.description: In the Hindi language, basmati translates to "perfumed one," an excellent, though incomplete description of the aromatic rice that bears the name. Basmati Rice has been grown for centuries near the foothills of the Himalayas in Northern India, where the soil conditions produce rice that is famous around the world for its nutty flavor, firm consistency and, most of all, its spectacular aroma. Trader Joe's Basmati Rice is fluffy, soft, and has distinctive nutty flavors. And of course, there's that famous Basmati aroma! Trader Joe's Basmati Rice is right at home in Indian-inspired dishes like curry or chicken tikka masala. It also makes delicious pilaf or Spanish rice and pairs well with all kinds of fish and stews. You'll find it in our grocery aisle. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Basmati Rice
025880.name: Rice Basmati From India
025880.title: White Basmati Rice

050765.description: One of the oldest cultivated crops in the world, Lentils are legumes with legacy. According to one ancient tale, an individual abandoned his birthright but for a mere bowl of lentils. Yep, they're that good! Earthy, savory and satisfying, lentils are a plentiful protein source - in fact, a serving of lentils supplies more protein ¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿"¿ vitamins. And, when dried, they cook rather quickly in relation to their other bean brethren - there is NO soaking required. We've carried brown lentils fully cooked & curried, red lentils split in half... and now we have Small Whole Green Lentils in our grocery section. They are distinguished by their greenish/brown color and robust, nutty #¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿ ¿ ¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿%¿¿ ¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿'¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿¿¿'¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿(¿¿¿¿¿¿¿(¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿¿ ¿¿ ¿¿¿¿ ¿¿ ¿¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿(¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿¿¿¿¿¿'¿¿¿¿¿¿ ¿¿¿'¿¿¿¿ other vegetables. Grown for us in Canada, Trader Joe's Whole Green Lentils are a great value at $1.69 for a one pound bag. Did you know? The word "lens" came from the Latin name of the lentil plant - Lens culinaris. It was named after the legume because double-convex lenses look just like lentils! Trader Joe's Company Bulletin2/20/2013 page 37 of 38 Confidential
050765.name: Trader Joe'S Small Whole Green Lentils

052252.description: Did you know that there are somewhere in the neighborhood of 7,000 varieties of rice grown in the world? We have a decent-sized rice section at Trader Joe's, but it's unlikely you'll ever see all 7,000 kinds of rice at your neighborhood Trader Joe's. After all, we don't have anywhere near that number of total products in our stores! You will, however, see a terrific value on Jasmine Rice from Thailand, where it is known as hom mali. Also known as "fragrant rice," Jasmine Rice is a curved, long-grain rice with a subtle, jasmine-like fragrance and soft, nutty flavor. It's simple to prepare - 20 minutes or so on your stovetop or in a rice cooker yields soft, fluffy, full-flavored rice. Serve it as a side dish, add it to soups, use it to make fried rice or cook it with Coconut Milk instead of water to make a richly flavored dish that will complement an array of main courses. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Jasmine Rice From Thailand
052252.name: Rice Jasmine From Thailand
052252.title: Jasmine Rice From Thailand

059941.description: Farmers harvest Trader Joe's White Quinoa in May at an altitude of about 12,000 feet, then they carefully wash, rinse, dry, clean again and sort the crop by color, before packing it to ship to our stores. Organic White Quinoa is a protein rich alternative to rice, couscous or pasta and is gluten free. This ancient grain has more than 5,000 years of history, and was so prized by the ancient Incas that it earned the designation "the mother grain." Unlike most grains, Quinoa is a complete protein, meaning it contains all the essential amino acids in a balanced protein. It is often cited as one of the best protein sources in the vegetable kingdom. Use Organic White Quinoa like you'd use rice. It's that easy, and it cooks faster, too. Combine it with black beans, corn, avocado and a bit of freshly squeezed lime juice for a quick, light, satisfying salad. You'll find each 16-ounce resealable bag in our grocery aisle. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic White Quinoa
059941.name: Org White Quinoa
059941.title: Organic White Quinoa

070996.description: Celebrated for its delicately sweet flavor, soft texture, and rich, almost buttery fragrance, Thai Jasmine rice is considered by many to be the best rice in the world - it's been awarded such a title multiple times at the annual World Rice Conference, in fact. That's a rather lofty distinction, but it's one that Trader Joe's Organic Jasmine Rice proudly aspires to. It's grown and harvested for us in Thailand using organic farming practices, ensuring that every bite lives up to its world-renowned reputation. Once cooked - we recommend a ratio of one cup rinsed rice to two cups boiling water, by the way - this Organic Jasmine Rice is fluffy, a little sticky, and redolent with aromatic notes that are often compared to buttered popcorn. It's delectable enough to eat on its own, perhaps with just a touch of melted butter, sprinkled with crispy garlic, or topped with a fried egg, but it truly sings when acting as a starch for soaking up flavorful sauces, curries, and condiments. Serve it alongside your favorite stir fries and sticky-glazed proteins, like teriyaki salmon, marinated flank steak, or, of course, Mandarin Orange Chicken [sku 66563]. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Jasmine Rice From Thailand
070996.name: Rice Jasmine Organic
070996.title: Trader Joe'S Organic Jasmine Rice From Thailand

075005.description: Our latest grain alternative comes straight from the heart¿ hearts of palm, that is. We think the Hearts of Palm Pasta [sku 67844] on our grocery shelves is a pretty impressive pasta substitute, so we set out to discover if it could be a suitable stand-in for another beloved grain, rice-and dazzle us, it did! For a simple, versatile, and convenient replacement for rice, Trader Joe's Riced Hearts of Palm is just hearts of palm, that has been¿ well¿ riced. It's gluten free, vegan, and kosher, too. Tender, mild-tasting, hearts of palm come from the center of palm trees. Our Ecuadorian supplier takes the harvested Hearts and processes them, so it comes out looking like rice. Nothing is added to this mild- flavored Rice, so you can use as a blank canvas for a variety of dishes and flavors. Make a grain-free grain bowl, by adding sautéed veggies, a protein (maybe tofu or chicken) to the prepared Rice, and dress it with Green Goddess Salad Dressing [sku 59991]. Since our Riced Hearts of Palm takes five minutes or less to prepare on the stove or in the microwave, so you can have a homemade fried rice ready in under 20 minutes. Talk about a weeknight dinner game changer! Riced Hearts of Palm
075005.name: Rice Hearts Of Palm
075005.title: Riced Hearts Of Palm

077993.description: To call couscous a staple of North African cuisine would be something of an understatement. While the first recorded recipes for couscous date back to the 11th century CE, some archaeological evidence suggests that ancient cultures in the region may have enjoyed couscous (or foods very similar to it) as far back as the third century BCE. So, how should we honor a dish with such a superlatively storied history? We're starting by introducing Trader Joe's Organic Couscous to our grocery shelves. Now, all that separates you from this marveously mild-flavored and delicately-textured side dish is a cup of water or broth, a microwave or stove, and a few minutes of your time. Our supplier makes and mills this Couscous from organic wheat grown right here in the United States. It can be prepared a number of different ways, including in the microwave, but if you ask us, our favorite method is to bring a cup of your favorite broth, combined with two tablespoons of butter, to a boil, remove it from heat, then stir in one cup of this Organic Couscous, cover, and let sit. After only five minutes, you should have a hearty, fork-fluffable side that's ideal for serving alongside grilled salmon, Shawarma Chicken Thighs [sku 60667], or any other protein you'd prefer. Organic Couscous
077993.name: Couscous Organic
077993.title: Organic Couscous

094506.description: ¿ Farro, also known as spelt, is an "ancient cereal grain" which dates back as far as 20,000 years, when it was the primary grain cultivated by early Egyptians. It is a very dense, hearty, healthy and nutty tasting member of the wheat family. As a result, this ancient grain has become quite popular at trendy restaurants. Trader Joe's Quick-Cook Farro is grown in central Italy, where farro is still widely grown. Farro typically needs to be soaked overnight, then cooked for 30-45 minutes. Our supplier uses an innovative process to partially pre-cook it, so that Trader Joe's Quick-Cook Farro can be ready in about 10 minutes -which means a quick and convenient, healthy and delicious dish Trader Joe's Quick-Cook Farro is $1.79 for 8.8 ounce bag.
094506.name: 10 Minute Farro
094506.title: 1O Minute Farro

096689.description: ¿ Introducing, Trader Joe's Organic Tricolor Quinoa. At this point you are all pretty familiar with quinoa. Our white quinoa is one of our most- popular grocery items. And why not, quinoa is loaded with protein, vitamins and fiber. It's extremely nutrient dense, and for all that, it cooks up quickly and easily. Oh¿and it tastes great! Look out rice. And if you thought the white (and red, when we can get it) tastes great, try the Tricolor. Quinoa plants yield white, red or black edible seeds, or in some cases, a plant will produce all three at once. The blend is the best of all worlds, each bite has the flavor of all three seeds, it tastes terrific. It looks cool too. We know you'll try it and love it! We've had Trader Joe's Organic Tricolor Quinoa packed into 16 ounce resealable bags. And because we're Trader Joe's you can have all the good looks, great taste and outstanding nutrition that is Trader Joe's Organic Tricolor Quinoa for just $4.99 per 16 ounce bag.
096689.name: Org Tricolor Quinoa
096689.title: Organic Tricolor Quinoa

056021.description: Bananas are one of our most popular items. We sell boatloads of them, both conventional [sku 48053] and or- ganic [sku 50116]. We also sell them sliced and covered with chocolate as Gone Bananas [sku 95341]-one of our most popular frozen treats. Of course, we also carry a variety of dried banana snacks to enjoy, from our crisp Organic Banana Chips [sku 87395]; to our crunchy Freeze Dried Banana Slices [sku 92071]; to our famously chewy, Dried and Flattened Banana [sku 64665]. Not too many gaps in our banana offerings¿ unless you're talking about Baby Bananas. Now, we don't mean bananas that are especially suitable for babies. Regular bananas already have that covered. No, the Baby Ba- nanas of which we speak are of the Kluay Leb Mue Nang variety from Thailand. Also known as "Lady Finger Bananas," these are smaller, sweeter, and thinner-skinned than the larger, more common varieties. Our Thai supplier takes these Babies and removes much of their moisture. This yields a dried banana snack that is soft, chewy, very cute, and even another shade sweeter; and that's with no added sugar. In fact, there is nothing else added to our Dried Baby Bananas! What they do have (naturally) is 600mg of potassium per serving, with no fat, no cholesterol, and no sodium. We're selling each six ounce reclosable package of Dried Baby Bananas for $1.99-a price that sweetens this snack another notch-as if that were even possible. 02.18. 16
056021.name: Dried Baby Bananas

056317.description: Oranges are succulent, juicy fruits perfect for eating and snacking. But what do you do when you're doing an activity that isn't conducive to eating oranges? It would be quite difficult to eat an orange while bike riding, or walking your dog, or rock climbing. Well, we've solved these problems with Trader Joe's Sweetened Dried Orange Slices! We know Dried Orange Slices are different from their sweet fruits of origin, but these slices bring their own commendable qualities to the table-or the bag. After choosing the best and brightest oranges around, our ven- dor washes, slices, and then boils the oranges for one to two hours, until they reach the ideal tenderness. The slices are then soaked in a sweet syrup before finally drying in a hot air oven for 10 to 12 hours-and by then, they've been dried to perfection. The final product packs all of the beloved orange flavor into a chewy, dried, mouthwatering slice. These dried wheels of sweet, orangey chewiness are as versatile as they are delicious (and round). Eat whole slices from the bag during the aforementioned activities listed above-or any other activity you might enjoy. Decorate cakes and other baked goods. Or, coat in white or dark chocolate for an extra sweet and appealing treat. Orange you glad Trader Joe's Sweetened Dried Orange Slices are just $1.99 for a 5.28 ounce bag?! You're prob- ably also glad we waited until the end of the story to make that pun¿ 07.21. 16
056317.name: Sweetened Dried Orange Slices

057078.description: The evolution of the disk over the years is an extraordinary one. The Frisbee disk, the compact disc, the UFO (it's a flying disk of sorts)¿ all have been important contributors to society. The evolution of our nut & dried fruit offerings could be described in a similar manner-different recipes, large bags, leathers, handfuls¿all contributing to the satiation of our customers' appetites. The next player in that evolution, which happens to be shaped like a disk, is Trader Joe's Nothing But Fruit & Nuts-Fig Walnut. On a trip to Turkey, our Product Innovator discovered a supplier that was not only packaging dried fruit and nuts, but grinding them together. They extrude the ground nuts & fruit through a cylinder and slice it into disks (about two inches in diameter), which are individually wrapped to preserve their freshness and flavor. The tight seal around these disks means nothing needs to be added to extend shelf life, so you get earthy walnuts and sweet, chewy figs in every bite-and nothing else. Another benefit of their packaging is portability at any temperature. Drop a few into your purse or backpack for a delicious, on the go treat. Pop them into your lunchbox or stash a few in your desk drawer and you'll always have a sweet, chewy snack on hand. One thing that hasn't change in the evolution of our nut & dried fruit offerings is our commitment to carrying fresh, quality product at a great value. We're offering Nothing But Fruit & Nuts-Fig Walnut in 7.04-ounce bags (that's eight disks) for the out-of-this-world price of $3.99, everyday. 05.29 .17
057078.name: Nothing But Fruit Nuts Fig Walnut

068138.description: As far as flavor combinations go, it's hard to beat sweet and spicy. There's a distinct dynamism to it, where the more you crank up the sweetness and the spiciness, the more interesting the flavor profile becomes. In the case of Trader Joe's Chile Spiced Pineapple, for example, we've taken something super sweet and succulent (dried rings of pineapple from Ghana) and paired it up with something truly spicy (a bold chili powder blend with cayenne and traditional chamoy powder), plus a little extra cane sugar and salt to make a snack that hits that special mix of sweet and heat that leaves you craving more with every bite. Great for bringing along on road trips, keeping on hand at work, or simply enjoying at home, our Chile Spiced Pineapple is great for practically any snacking occasion. It's hot enough to warrant a pairing with a crisp, refreshing drink, like our Sparkling Coconut Water with Yuzu [sku 63261] or a bottle of Trader José Lager [sku 96728], but not so hot that it will scare off non-heat-seekers. Its hottest feature may yet be its price: we're selling each six-ounce resealable pouch of Trader Joe's Chile Spiced Pineapple for the sizzling retail of $3.69*, every day. They'll be waiting for you in our dried fruit section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Chile Spiced Pineapple
068138.name: Pineapple Chile Spiced
068138.title: Chile Spiced Pineapple

073991.description: When the chips are down... it's time to buy some more! But which kind? It's not a simple question when you have Trader Joe's Chips in mind. That's because we sell so many different kinds: Potato, Pita, Plantain, Cassava, Corn, Lentil... Now, here are some new TJ's Chips to add to your options: Trader Joe's Apple Chip Duo! These Chips are not pommes de terre, but just plain pommes-only there's nothing plain about what you're about to taste. Our Washington-state supplier takes Red Apples with their natural sweetness (that means there's no sugar added), and Green Apples with their inherent tartness, and gives them a crinkle-cut, then carefully dries them until they're pleasantly crisp and crunchy. What you get is a study in flavor contrasts that will ensure there's no apple left behind in the resealable, two- ounce pouch; a pouch that also delivers 8g of fiber and 10% of your daily recommended potassium. How do you like them apples? Apple Chip Duo
073991.name: Apple Chip Duo

075064.description: As a matter of principle, we are proudly, pronouncedly, and profoundly passionate about passion fruit in all its forms. Recently, one of our buyers found a form of passion fruit that took us by surprise: dried passion fruit. Never before had we tried something that so captured the experience of enjoying a jubilantly juicy passion fruit, while remaining rather un-juicy-and, we might add, un-messy. We knew right away that it was destined for our shelves, in the form of Trader Joe's Passion Fruit Rounds. Our supplier in Vietnam-an expert in all things dried fruit-makes each bag of our Passion Fruit Rounds by taking passion fruit seeds, along with the sweet, tart, and delighftully tropical pulp that surrounds them, and combines them with a bit of apple juice and sugar to provide some extra body. They then pour the whole mixture into disc-shaped molds, and dehydrate the whole mix it until it reaches a charmingly chewy texture. Together, the combo of sweet and sour, chewy and crunchy (courtesy of the generously-studded seeds throughout) create a harmonious balance that's as unique as the passion fruit itself is. We recommend enjoying them as a quick, fruity snack, as a sweet treat to munch while watching a movie, or as a fun bit of cocktail decor, affixed to the rim of something sweet and tangy. Passion Fruit Rounds
075064.name: Passion Fruit Rounds

075072.description: Originally hailing from Central America, red papaya trees are now ubiquitous in Australia. This is particularly so in Far North Queensland, where the warm, tropical climate makes for prolific papaya-producing conditions- and Trader Joe's Dried Australian Red Papaya happens to hail from this very region. Made from only the finest, sweetest Red Papayas (which are inherently sweeter than their yellow-fleshed counterparts), it's a simple snack, to be sure-simple, yet supremely satisfying. Unlike much of the dried papaya on the market, our Dried Australian Red Papaya contains just one ingredient: Red Papaya-no added sugars or preservatives here, folks! It's just unsweetened, unsulfured, tropical-tasting Red Papaya, which our supplier carefully hand-picks, slices, and dries to chewy-not tough-perfection. So go ahead, papay-ile a few slices on your snack plate. Add them to homemade trek mixes. Use them to add bursts of tropical flavor to your morning oatmeal or yogurt¿ or simply snack on 'em straight out of the bag! Dried Australian Red Papaya
075072.name: Papaya Red
075072.title: Dried Australian Red Papaya

087395.description: Oh, the banana! The botanical berry we love to buy in bountiful bunches! Well, with one look at this packaging, you may notice it isn't the elongated, curved fruit you're accustomed to peeling and preying upon with your palate, but a pre-peeled, parched, and portioned piece of the fresh fruit. Trader Joe's Organic Banana Chips are a dried fruit snack that allow you to get that sweet, irreplaceable banana flavor as a preserved snack in a resealable bag anytime, for use in a homemade trek mix, or any number of dessert recipes. Our chips come to us from the Philippines, where banana trees thrive in their hot and humid climate all year round, ideal for the banana plant's growth. The bananas are picked and peeled at peak ripeness, sliced into coin- sized medallions, and lightly fried in organic coconut oil, with a bit of organic evaporated cane juice mixed in to amount to the scrumptiously sweet flavor you have before you. Our Organic Banana Chips surely have a sensationally crunchy bite that'll make you go bananas and have you keeping a bag on your person at all times. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing.
087395.name: Org Banana Chips
087395.title: Organic Banana Chips

072507.description: When the panel first-tasted the Deccolio Moscato, we were impressed. The wine comes to us from Italy, from one of our favorite winery partners. The wine is pleasantly sweet and satisfying, with a beautiful, refreshing flowery bouquet and a crisp finish. This is a lovely, lower-alcohol, refreshing treat of a wine, for customers that are looking for a fruitier, floral white. It's lovely! Great on its own or with spicier Asian cuisine.
072507.name: Deccolio Moscato Low Alc

074328.description: Simpler Wines Apple? Yes! Once you taste it, you'll understand. It's the best of everything. It's wine-based, a blend of Chardonnay and Trebbiano, with good acidity and body. But it's crisp, with juicy apple flavor, and balanced sweetness. And it's lightly sparkling. And lighter in alcohol. And conveniently packed in cans. Don't take our word for it, you'll see. Delicious! And perfect for the next picnic, brunch or party.
074328.name: Simpler Wines Apple

054077.category: Flavored Seltzers and Sparklings with Fruit Juice
054077.description: Spindrift® Seltzers are the seltzers to end all seltzers. Refreshing, all natural, and made with real fruit juices. We've offered a variety of Spindrift® flavors, and now we're adding flavor to our shelves: Spindrift® Raspberry Lime Seltzer. When you think about it, Spindrift® Raspberry Lime Seltzer and Trader Joe's go together like... like...well, like a really great beverage and a really great grocery store. What we're trying to say is that it makes sense for us to carry this stuff. Spindrift® doesn't use any artificial flavors (sound familiar?), artificial sweeteners (what about now?), or added sugar in their seltzers. Spindrift® Raspberry Lime Seltzer contains 6% real raspberry & lime juices-the perfect amount for a tart, refreshing flavor to come through. It's also worth noting that spindrift is a term for the whitewash of a breaking wave... and, as traders on the culinary seas, we're pretty into the whole nautical thing. If you hadn't noticed. Seltzer's not just for summer: enjoy a can of Spindrift® Raspberry Lime Seltzer any time of year. It's timelessly refreshing when chilled over ice or when as the base of a cocktail-but the possibilities are endless. Try mixing it with TJ's Vodka of the Gods [sku 01720] for a fruity vodka soda. We're selling each pack of eight 12-fluid ounce cans of Spindrift® Raspberry Lime Seltzer for $6.99, everyday.
054077.name: Spindrift Rasp Lime Can

062206.category: Flavored Seltzers and Sparklings with Fruit Juice
062206.description: Flavored seltzers have truly popped off recently, and it's not hard to see why. These bright and bubbly bever- ages are an easy antidote to a hot summer's day, and with their subtle, fruity flavors that don't overpower (or over-sweeten) the palate, they're just the thing to add some sparkle to the everyday act of hydration. So when the time came for us to get into the business of fizziness, we knew we couldn't just do with any ordinary seltzer. No, to reach a new caliber of carbonation, we eschewed flavor agents and sweeteners and used real, organic fruit juices to create Trader Joe's Seltzers With A Splash, the new standard for effervescent excellence. Made with only three simple ingredients (carbonated water, organic lemon juice, and organic ginger juice), Selt- zers With A Splash Of Lemon and Ginger Juice harmoniously combines the refreshing fizz of a seltzer water with the lightly sweet taste of lemon juice and unmistakeable flavor of ginger. The blend of ginger and lemon creates a delightfully aromatic, but never overpowering, drinking experience that's truly invigorating. Striking a sensational balance between fullness of flavor and easy-going drinkability, it makes for a great companion for mid-morning hikes or outdoor summer concerts. No doubt, one of the best aspects of flavored seltzer is its anytime versatility. Thirsty after a long day of work? Make like the hip kids and crack open a can, right out of the refrigerator. Need a non-alcoholic, but still-fancy- feeling drink to serve at a gathering? You're all set with this snappy lemon-ginger spritzer. A-OK with alcohol? Try adding a bit of TJ's Art of the Still Organic Vodka [sku 57854] for a quick-and-easy all-organic cocktail. Join the carbonated craze with our elevated, organic, Trader Joe's Seltzers With A Splash Of Lemon and Gin- ger Juice today! We're selling four-packs of 12-ounce cans for $2.99-a value that's sure to make a splash. 08.06. 18
062206.name: Seltzer With Lemon And Ginger Organic
062206.title: Seltzers With A Splash

062207.category: Flavored Seltzers and Sparklings with Fruit Juice
062207.description: Flavored seltzers have truly popped off recently, and it's not hard to see why. These bright and bubbly beverages are an easy antidote to a hot summer's day, and with their subtle, fruity flavors that don't overpower (or over- sweeten) the palate, they're just the thing to add some sparkle to the everyday act of hydration. So when the time came for us to get into the business of fizziness, we knew we couldn't just do with any ordinary seltzer. No, to reach a new caliber of carbonation, we eschewed flavor agents and sweeteners and used real, organic fruit juices to create Trader Joe's Seltzers With A Splash, the new standard for effervescent excellence. Made with only three simple ingredients (carbonated water, organic blood orange juice, and organic orange juice), Seltzers With A Splash Of Blood Orange and Orange Juice harmoniously combines the refreshing fizz of a seltzer water with the classic flavors of orange juice and ruby-sweet blood orange juice. The mix of orange and blood orange synergizes into a profile that's lightly sweet, but never cloying, and delightfully tart, but never bitter. Think of it as a kind of easy-going, non-alcoholic mimosa, a sprightly citric sparkler that'll give any brunch or summer picnic an extra special twist. No doubt, one of the best aspects of flavored seltzer is its anytime versatility. Thirsty after a long day of work? Make like the hip kids and crack open a can, right out of the refrigerator. Need a non-alcoholic, but still-fancy- feeling drink to serve at a gathering? You're all set with this snappy orange spritzer. A-OK with alcohol? Try add- ing a bit of TJ's Art of the Still Organic Vodka [sku 57853] for a quick-and-easy all-organic cocktail. Join the carbonated craze with our elevated, organic, Trader Joe's Seltzers With A Splash Of Blood Orange and Orange Juice today! We're selling four-packs of 12-ounce cans for $2.99-a value that's sure to make a splash. 08.06. 18

It's also worth noting that spindrift is a term for the whitewash of a breaking wave... and, as traders on the culinary seas, we're pretty into the whole nautical thing. If you hadn't noticed. Seltzer's not just for summer: enjoy a can of Spindrift® Raspberry Lime Seltzer any time of year. 052367.description: Black raspberry is a fairly popular flavor for specialty ice creams and frozen yogurt, but it's a berry hard to find in non-frozen yogurt. Leave it to Trader Joe's to bring you an uncommon product that is uncommonly good! Are you ready for our Nonfat Black Raspberry Greek Yogurt? It all begins with Grade A skim milk from cows that have not been treated with rBST. While some Greek "styled" yogurt is created purely with thickening agents, our authentic process involves the traditional method of straining the curdled milk to remove the whey. This method yields a thick and creamy curd, into which we turn some coveted Oregon black raspberries. These dark-pigmented "aggregate" fruits are extremely high in antioxidants-about three times more than blueberries. Though research into the health-boosting potential of antioxidant-rich foods is ongoing, it won't take any ongoing research (just one bite!) for you to discover the favorable flavor of these black beauties. They are less tart and less sweet than blackberries, bearing a pleasant fruitiness, which blends exquisitely with the soft tang of our yogurt. The black raspberry picking season may be very short-only three weeks in July-but for 99-cents you can pluck a 5.3-ounce container of Trader Joe's Nonfat Black Raspberry Greek Yogurt from our dairy case any old time you please.
052367.name: Yogurt Greek Black Raspberry
052367.title: Greek Nonfat Yogurt Black Raspberry

053649.description: Ever wonder how Greek yogurt is crafted? Do we culture the milk by reading each batch some epic Hellenic poetry? It couldn't hurt, however that's not quite how we do it... Each batch of Trader Joe's Coconut Cream Nonfat Greek Yogurt begins with grade A pasteurized skim milk-sourced from cows not treated with rBSt-and cane sugar-sweetened coconut cream. Then, the blend is heated, cooled to a desirable fermentation temperature (approximately 110° F), and blended with live & active bacterial cultures. While this bacteria grows and produces lactic acid, we prepare for the final step: straining. A thorough straining is ultimately what separates the mere mortals from gods of Greek yogurt, if you will. By carefully eliminating nearly all of the liquid from the whey, we're left with nothing but creamy, concentrated yogurt packed with a veritable Parthenon of pleasant texture & tang-which are, after all, what Greek yogurt is known for. Our Greek Yogurt is also known for its price. We're selling each 5.3-ounce cup of Trader Joe's Coconut Cream Nonfat Greek Yogurt for 99¢,* every day. Look for it in our dairy fridge. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Coconut Cream Nonfat Greek Yogurt
053649.name: Yogurt Greek Coco Cream Nf 0%
053649.title: Greek Nonfat Yogurt Coconut Cream 5.3Oz

056545.description: Kefir is yogurt's drinkable, slightly fizzy cousin with an ancient, storied origin. Legend says that the prophet Mohammad first gifted the rare Kefir "grains" required to make this drink to the people of the Caucasus re- gion. Thankfully, it was eventually shared with the Russian people, and the world's been Kefir-keen ever since. Something that could make the world even more Kefir-keen? Trader Joe's Whole Milk Mango Kefir, of course! We offer a few Kefir products already, like Low Fat Blueberry Kefir [sku 54006] and Low Fat Plain Kefir [sku 58236], but this Kefir stands out for its flavor-Mango-and its milkfat content-whole. Whole milk provides a thicker, creamier consistency than milks with fat removed. Our Mango Kefir is fermented, or cultured, for 14 to 16 hours; for comparison, most yogurts are cultured for just two to three hours. Those twelve-plus extra hours allow the twelve active cultures (named on the bottle) to feast on the natural milk-sugars (lactose) present in the whole milk. The result is a dairy drink that's creamy, smooth, slightly tart, and just a little bit fizzy. The natural mango flavor that turns this Kefir tropical makes it a great companion to our Organic Mango Pas- sion Granola [sku 81804]. Add it to a smoothie with other tropical fruits, or drink it straight. Whichever way you choose, your taste buds will surely love the bright mango flavor, and your gut will surely love the probiotic benefits. Each 32 fluid-ounce bottle of Trader Joe's Whole Milk Mango Kefir is just $2.99. Go Kefir crazy, we dare you. 10.03. 16
056545.name: Yogurt Kefir Mango Whole
056545.title: Trader Joe'S Kefir

056692.description: Our customers like to eat Greek yogurt, and we like to sell them Greek yogurt-it works out well. Such a suc- cessful symbiotic relationship requires, at times, change; in this case, it means supplying new, exciting, and desirable products. Like Trader Joe's Vanilla Bean Greek Whole Milk Yogurt. One spoonful and you'll be delighted by the exquisite vanilla flavor imbued in this whole milk yogurt. Greek yo- gurt, best known for its tart flavor and thick texture, becomes all the more velvety when made with whole milk. Whole milk has risen as a trend in the dairy scene, mainly for its creamier texture and less processed nature. A Vanilla Bean base is mixed with Grade A pasteurized milk to result in this delectable yogurt high in protein. Since we use real vanilla bean, you'll see those characteristic little black specks throughout the product. Flavor you can see and taste (but especially taste). Mix our Vanilla Bean Greek Yogurt with a healthy serving of Just the Clusters Vanilla Almond Granola Cereal [sku 81814] for an extra crunch and an easy breakfast or snack. Or, use this Yogurt in place of ice cream and sprinkle in some Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chips [sku 04529] for a sweet, dessert-y treat. We're selling each 5.3 ounce container of Trader Joe's Vanilla Bean Whole Milk Greek Yogurt for 99¢, every single day. A price-and a yogurt-we're proud to offer. 11.07. 16
056692.name: Yogurt Greek Vanilla Whole
056692.title: Whole Milk Greek Yogurt Vanilla Bean Naturally Flavored

058235.description: Our Low Fat Strawberry Kefir starts with prized kefir grains-basically yeast and "good" bacteria clumped together with casein (milk proteins) and complex sugars-that are added to low fat milk (1% milkfat). Fermented (cultured) for 14-16 hours, about 12 hours more than the culturing time for most yogurt, the 12 active cultures have ample time to feast on the natural lactose in the milk, resulting in a drink that's creamy, smooth, a little tart, and just a bit on the fizzy side. With natural strawberry flavor (and other natural flavors) added, it makes a delightful drink. Enjoy a cup with breakfast, serve it with your favorite granola, blend it into a smoothie, or freeze it into a tart, tangy ice pop (mix in frozen strawberries for more brightness). *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Low Fat Strawberry Kefir
058235.name: Yogurt Kefir Strawberry Lf
058235.title: Trader Joe'S Low Fat Kefir

060430.description: Yogurt. Such a strikingly simple snack. A natural beauty, if you will. But even a natural beauty likes to play dress up every once in a while... So, with that in mind, we've taken a timeless, between-meals classic (Greek Yogurt) and dressed it up a little. Introducing Trader Joe's Coconut Greek Lowfat Yogurt with Almond Granola. It's yogurt¿with a little extra flair. Each package of Trader Joe's Coconut Greek Lowfat Yogurt with Almond Granola contains exactly what its name would imply: thick, Greek-style, coconut-flavored yogurt and generously-sized handful of almond granola. The yogurt is made with 1.5%-milkfat milk-which comes from cows never treated with rBST-and is flavored (and thickened) with real coconut cream. The granola contains bits of sliced almonds and offers a welcome, nutty crunch. But fear not, soggy toppings are never acceptable at Trader Joe's; we've conveniently packaged the yogurt and the granola in separate-but-attached compartments. All you have to do is dump said granola into said yogurt and-voilà!-snack (or breakfast, or dessert¿) is served! We're selling each 5.3-ounce, perfectly portable package of Trader Joe's Coconut Greek Lowfat Yogurt with Almond Granola for $1.29, every day. You'll find them in our dairy cases. 09.26.18
060430.name: Yog Greek Coco Almond Granola
060430.title: Coconut & Almond Coconut Greek Lowfat Yogurt 1.5% Milkfat With Almond Granola

062235.description: Kefir is yogurt's drinkable, slightly fizzy cousin with an ancient, storied origin. Legend says that the prophet Mohammad first gifted the rare kefir "grains" required to make this drink to the people of the Caucasus region. Thankfully, it was eventually shared, and the world's been kefir-keen ever since. Something that could make the world even more kefir-keen? Trader Joe's Plain Goat Milk Kefir, of course! We offer a few Kefir products already, like Whole Milk Mango Kefir [sku 56545] and Low Fat Plain Kefir [sku 58236], but this Kefir stands out from the rest: it's made with goat milk! Because of this, those who find goat milk easier to digest than cow's milk can now hop on the kefir trend. Our Goat Milk Kefir is fermented, or cultured, for several hours to allow the seven active cultures (found in the ingredient list) to feast on the natural milk-sugars present in the milk. The result is plain, unsweetened Kefir that's creamy, smooth, tart, and just a little bit fizzy. Pour over your favorite cereal or granola (Just the Clusters Chocolate Almond Granola [sku 50843], perhaps?), mix into your morning smoothie, use instead of yogurt with fresh fruit, or drink it all on its own. We're sell- ing each 32 fluid-ounce bottle of Trader Joe's Plain Goat Milk Kefir for $5.49, every day. Go Goat Milk Kefir crazy, we dare you. 04.19. 18
062235.name: Yogurt Kefir Goat
062235.title: Cultured Goat Milk Kefir Plain Unsweetened

062905.description: Humans love yogurt, as evidenced by the fact that many cultures have developed their own, unique version. The Greeks, for instance, have their straggisto, which literally means, "drained." What they drain is the watery whey, leaving behind a thicker, richer yogurt that is also higher in protein.* Trader Joe's has sold Greek-style yogurt in a number of everyday and seasonal flavors-with varying milkfat levels, and in a variety of sizes. However, what we haven't done is offer a plain, nonfat, single-serve option¿ until now! Trader Joe's Greek Plain Nonfat Yogurt starts with Grade A, skim milk from cows that have never been given rBST hormones. (Fun fact: It takes 3 lbs. of milk to make 1 lb. of Trader Joe's Greek Yogurt!) The milk is pasteurized, and then cultured with the same live and active cultures we use in our 16 oz. [SKU 86450] & 32 oz. [SKU 95732] sizes. Finally, it's strained, yielding velvety-textured yogurt with a pleasingly tangy taste. It's also high in protein (15g per serving), and a good source of calcium, providing 15% of the daily recommended value. We're selling 5.3-ounce cups of Trader Joe's Greek Plain Nonfat Yogurt for just 99¢ each. That's an ideal size and price for a quick breakfast-or for an anytime, protein-packed snack. Find it in our refrigerators.
062905.name: Yogurt Greek Plain 5.3 Oz Fat Free 0%
062905.title: Nonfat Plain Greek Yogurt

064312.description: Yogurt is such a yummy, convenient snack. Whether you enjoy those individual-serving containers, or you buy the big tub for daily breakfasts-tangy, creamy, yogurt is tough to beat¿ unless you can't have dairy. Then it's just tough luck! Or, is it??? Don't despair dairy dodgers-your luck is about to change with Trader Joe's Organic Strawberry Creamy Cashew Cultured Yogurt Alternative. It's called "Yogurt Alternative" because there's absolutely no dairy in this product. What is in it includes a base made from organic cashews, crushed and mixed with filtered water. That mixture is sweetened with cane sugar and made dreamily creamy with coconut cream and tapioca starch (plus a couple other thickeners). A little organic lemon juice promotes the tang, while actual organic strawberries add fruity flavor. And the pale-red color is naturally derived from vegetable juice. And lest you think we'd mimic that yogurt flavor and leave out the probiotics, think again! After pasteurizing this Creamy Cashew Yogurt Alternative, our supplier adds six, live and active probiotics-just like dairy yogurt has-so you can still reap those good-bacteria benefits. We're selling single-serving 5.3-ounce containers of dairy-free, vegan, kosher Trader Joe's Organic Strawberry Creamy Cashew Cultured Yogurt Alternative for $1.69 each. Find them in our refrigerators.
064312.name: Yogurt Strawberry Cultured Cashew Milk Organic
064312.title: Organic Creamy Cashew Cultured Yogurt Alternative Strawberry With A Hint Of Coconut Cream

064401.description: Our customers love to eat Greek yogurt, and we love to offer them Greek yogurt. It works out quite well, but such a successful, symbiotic relationship requires consistency and innovation on our part. So, from time to time, we like to infuse our reliably delicious Greek yogurt with all-new flavors. The latest? Trader Joe's Guava Passion Fruit Greek Whole Milk Yogurt. That's right-Guava Passion Fruit Greek Whole Milk Yogurt. When we sampled this particular flavor combo, it was Passion-Fruity love at first spoonful. Greek yogurt, best known for its tart flavor and thick texture, becomes all the more tangy, creamy, and craveable with the addition of real, sweet guava and bright, tropical passion fruit concentrate. It's a live-and-active-cultures-lover's dream come true. Know what else is a dream come true? The price. We're selling each 5.3 ounce cup of Trader Joe's Guava Passion Fruit Whole Milk Yogurt for 99¢, every single day-find it in our dairy cases. 01.07. 19 JAN. - MAR.

069169.description: Trader Joe's Plain Greek Yogurt Made with Whole Milk is a deceptively simple addition to our dairy case. Yogurt is definitely a trend-driven category, and, no surprise, Greek yogurt is still the top trend. But that doesn't mean that it hasn't evolved. When we first got into the Greek yogurt business years ago, there wasn't much variety. Plain, fat free, 2%, and maybe a honey option. But that was more or less the range. Then came the flavors. So many flavors. Delicious flavors. Whole milk was suddenly on trend. And then whole milk without the flavors was in vogue. That brings us to now, and this Plain Greek Yogurt Made with Whole Milk. Here we have the utmost in Greek Yogurt simplicity - thick and creamy, smooth and tangy, strained to get that rich, luxurious texture that's kept Greek Yogurt on trend for so many years. It's high in protein and a good source of calcium, delcious on its own or topped with your favorite granola or fresh fruit. Use it as an alternative to sour cream in dips or on baked potatoes. Add it to your smoothie for a thick & creamy protein boost. We're offering Trader Joe's Plain Greek Yogurt Made with Whole Milk iin a 5.3 ounce cup, every day. You'll find it in our dairy case. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Plain Greek Yogurt Made with Whole Milk

069169.title: Plain Whole Milk Greek Yogurt

075086.description: Iceland is home to some of the most wondrous and awe-inspiring terrain we've ever seen. It's also home to some of the most wondrous and awe-inspiring yogurt we've ever tasted! Icelanders call this yogurt skyr (pronounced "skeer"). We call it delicious. It's so delicious, in fact, that after experiencing it for ourselves in its land of origin, we decided to develop our very own version. Trader Joe's Icelandic Style Skyr Lowfat Raspberry Yogurt is made from milk that comes from cows never treated with rBST hormones. Being Lowfat, it contains 1.5% milkfat. It's also cultured after pasteurization, in order to preserve those live and active probiotics. And just like traditional skyr, our Icelandic Style Lowfat Raspberry Yogurt is strained so it becomes exceptionally thick & creamy. It's reminiscent of nonfat Greek yogurt-but even smoother and with slightly less bite. While our Icelandic Style Yogurt does have sour notes, our supplier also lightly sweetens it, which, along with its natural, residual sweetness, creates a beautiful balance. Plus, it's flavored with bits of raspberry to provide an extra pop of ripe, fruity fun into every bite. Enjoy Trader Joe's Raspberry Skyr by itself or mixed with even more berries and Muesli [sku 56580]. Use it in a smoothie for a calorically sound, protein boost-each 5.3-ounce serving contains 130 calories and 15 grams of protein. Or, if you're craving something sweeter, blend it with a bit of cream cheese & sugar, then layer it in a parfait with Raspberry Preserves [sku 87805] and chopped Unsalted Macadamias [sku 90035]. Icelandic Style Skyr Lowfat Raspberry Yogurt
075086.name: Yogurt Skyr Raspberry 5.3 Oz Low Fat 1.5%
075086.title: Icelandic Style Skyr Lowfat Raspberry Yogurt

078444.description: Good news, Vanilla Bean Greek Whole Milk Yogurt fans! The Trader Joe's dairy section staple now comes in a generously sized 32-ounce tub with a resealable lid. If you're not yet a fan, after one spoonful you'll be delighted by this Whole Milk Yogurt imbued with exquisite Vanilla flavor. Greek Yogurt, best known for its tart flavor and thick texture, becomes all the more velvety when made with Grade A Whole Milk, and boasts an impressive 12 grams of protein per serving. You'll notice those characteristic little black specks throughout the product-those are pieces of Vanilla Bean that deliver flavor you can see as well as taste (heavy on the taste), further buoyed by the addition of natural vanilla flavor. Mix our Vanilla Bean Greek Yogurt with a hearty scoop of Just the Clusters Vanilla Almond Granola Cereal [sku 81814] for an extra crunch and an easy breakfast or snack. Or, use this Yogurt in place of ice cream and sprinkle in some Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chips [sku 04529] for a sweet, dessert-y treat. We're offering 32-ounce tubs of Trader Joe's Vanilla Bean Whole Milk Greek Yogurt in our dairy case, every day. Vanilla Bean Greek Whole Milk Yogurt

078444.title: Vanilla Bean Whole Milk Greek Yogurt

078613.description: By now you know the story of Greek yogurt - most of the liquid has been strained out, making its texture more like that of sour cream. But did you know that's only part of the story? There's a dark secret behind much of what's marketed today as "Greek" yogurt. You see, to save both time and money, many yogurt manufacturers skip that all-important straining process, instead choosing to add thickeners to regular yogurt to achieve a similar, creamy texture. We find that more than a little disingenuous for a couple of reasons. One, real Greek plain yogurt has no thickeners. And two, real Greek yogurt is significantly higher in protein than its yogurt relatives, specifically because of that straining process. You can be sure the Greek Yogurt in every tub of Trader Joe's Greek Yogurt with Honey is the real dea. This Greek Yogurt with Honey is smooth and creamy, super rich, and delivers an ideal balance of yogurt-y tart and honey sweet. Each eight ounce serving - one container - has eight grams of protein, and contains live, probiotic cultures including s. thermophilus and l. acidophilus, which have the potential to aid in healthy digestion. We're selling each eight ounce tub for $1.29*, a verifiable value for "real" Greek Yogurt. You'll find it in our dairy case. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Greek Yogurt with Honey
078613.name: Yogurt Greek Honey 5.3 Oz Whole
078613.title: Greek Yogurt Honey Made With Whole Milk

090589.description: Trader Joe's Organic European Style Plain Nonfat Yogurt is made for us by experts in the dairy field (pun totally intended), using only two ingredients here: pasteurized organic nonfat milk-collected from cows that consume a 100% organic diet and never receive hormones or antibiotics-and live, active cultures. That's it. To keep Trader Joe's Organic European Style Plain Nonfat Yogurt truly "old-world," we've left out the extra thickeners, stabilizers, and milk powders that are often added to nonfat yogurt to make them smoother & creamier. Instead, our supplier allows the milk & live cultures to set slowly, taking great care in their extra- gentle stirring process. The result? A smooth & creamy yogurt of the finest European tradition, made right here in the U.S.A. We're selling each 32-ounce tub of Organic European Style Plain Nonfat Yogurt for $3.99*, every day. Find this unbelievable everyday value with our other refrigerated dairy products. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic European Style Plain Nonfat Yogurt

090589.title: European Style Organic Plain Nonfat Yogurt

090617.description: ¿ Trader Joe's 5.3 Ounce Nonfat Greek Yogurts We have updated the packaging on our three 5.3 ounce Nonfat Greek Yogurts but have left everything else the same! The ingredients, recipe, and supplier for all three items remain the same as before, there has been no change to what goes into the cup; only the cup itself has changed. High in protein with a thick velvety texture these yogurts remain the same great tasting products they have always been just with a new great look!
090617.name: Yogurt Greek Blueberry Nf 0%
090617.title: Greek Nonfat Yogurt Blueberry

093081.description: To clear up any misconceptions, when you see the term "Greek Yogurt," that usually doesn't mean "yogurt that comes from the country of Greece." Rather, it refers to a specific style of making yogurt, where, after the milk and bacterial cultures are left to ferment and solidify, the liquid whey and lactose are strained out, leaving a thicker, more protein-rich yogurt. With their significantly more substantial texture and delightfully concentrated tart flavor, Greek Yogurts offer a broader variety of uses and greater culinary possibilities than traditional yogurt, and nowhere is that more clear than in Trader Joe's Nonfat Greek Yogurt with Natural Vanilla Flavor, a longtime favorite of our dairy case. Made with grade-A pasteurized milk, our Nonfat Vanilla Greek Yogurt has the texture of sour cream with the flavor of a light, delicious dessert. Its creamy structure and lightly sweet-tart flavor profile make it a natural choice for parfaits and baking (most recipes that call for sour cream can be substitued 1:1 with Greek yogurt), or as a quick, effortless breakfast treat - especially when paired with some sliced bananas. You can find 16-ounce tubs of Trader Joe's Nonfat Greek Yogurt with Natural Vanilla Flavor at Trader Joe's for $2.99*, every day. Look for them in our dairy case. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Vanilla Nonfat Greek Yogurt
093081.name: Yogurt Greek Vanilla 16 Oz 0%
093081.title: Trader Joe'S Nonfat Greek Yogurt Vanilla 16Oz

095732.description: Greek Style Plain 0% Yogurt Quarts All of our Greek Style Yogurts are strained which is a process through which the watery-whey is removed resulting in a naturally thickened yogurt with the consistency of sour cream. Straining makes Greek yogurts richer in protein than other types of yogurts and lower in lactose. The straining process also makes Greek yogurts creamier than other types of yogurts and it is great as a cooking ingredient because it is less likely to curdle up and separate when heated. Serve Trader Joe's Greek Style Plain 0% Yogurt with fresh berries or granola for breakfast, or sweeten it up with a bit of honey for a satisfying snack anytime. We're selling Trader Joe's Greek Style 0% Yogurt in a 32oz tub for $4.99. 2
095732.name: Yogurt Greek Plain 32 Oz Nf 0%
095732.title: Greek Nonfat Yogurt Plain

096726.description: Greek Nonfat Vanilla Bean Yogurt Trader Joe's Greek Vanilla Bean 0% yogurt is a thick, creamy concoction with the consistency of sour cream that has a rich creamy taste and great vanilla flavor. Loaded with protein this yogurt is also a good source of calcium as well as contains probiotics that aid the digestive system. Great on its own or add berries or granola for a satisfying snack. We're selling Trader Joe's Greek Nonfat Vanilla Bean Yogurts in 5.3oz cups for $0.99.
096726.name: Yogurt Greek Vanilla Bean 0%
096726.title: Greek Nonfat Yogurt Vanilla Bean 5.3Oz

096890.description: Trader Joe's Peach and Mango Yogurt 6 Packs Trader Joe's Peach and Mango 6 Pack Yogurt is made with rBST free whole milk and has a rich and creamy taste that is simply delicious. Not only do these yogurts taste great but they also contain five active cultures to help keep you fit. Enjoy them for breakfast, as a snack or as a healthy treat. We're selling each 24 oz 6 pack of Trader Joe's Peach and Mango Yogurt for $2.99.
096890.name: Yogurt Peach Mango 4Oz 6 Pack
096890.title: Peaches & Cream, Mango & Cream Yogurt Cups

097347.description: The popularity of whole milk dairy shows no signs of slowing down. Neither does the popularity of Greek yogurt. And why should it? Whole milk dairy products offer unparalleled creaminess, and Greek yogurt offers an unparalleled tanginess. Trader Joe's Strawberry Vanilla Greek Yogurt Made with Whole Milk offers both. Dedicated purveyors of haute culture, we were way ahead of the trend when we first brought Strawberry Vanilla Greek Yogurt Made with Whole Milk to our stores back in 2012. Made with strawberries, vanilla bean extractives, and whole milk from cows never treated with rBST (and other ingredient, like live & active cultures), it's sweet, creamy, and berry-licious, with five grams of protein per 5.3-ounce cup. Although a yogurt of this caliber commands attention on its own, it's also a sharp pairing partner. Picture it atop a bed of berries, or folded into granola, or frozen into a popsicle, or... so many options.
