And although trends may change, one thing that never goes out of fashion is a good value-which is why you'll find 5.3-ounce cups of Trader Joe's Strawberry Vanilla Greek Yogurt Made with Whole Milk in our dairy cases for the WOW price of 99¢ each, everyday.
097347.name: Yogurt Greek Strawberry Vanilla 5.3 Oz Whole
097347.title: Greek Yogurt Strawberry Vanilla Made With Whole Milk

097860.description: Greek Nonfat Strawberry and Mango Yogurt Trader Joe's Greek Strawberry and Mango 0% yogurts are a thick, creamy concoction with the consistency of sour cream that have a rich creamy taste and great fruit flavor. Loaded with protein these yogurts are also a good source of calcium as well as contain probiotics that aid the digestive system. Great on its own or add berries or granola for a satisfying snack. We're selling Trader Joe's Greek Nonfat Mango and Strawberry Yogurts in 5.3oz cups for $0.99.
097860.name: Yogurt Greek Mango Nf 0%
097860.title: Greek Yogurt Nonfat Mango 5.3Oz

097861.description: Greek Nonfat Strawberry and Mango Yogurt Trader Joe's Greek Strawberry and Mango 0% yogurts are a thick, creamy concoction with the consistency of sour cream that have a rich creamy taste and great fruit flavor. Loaded with protein these yogurts are also a good source of calcium as well as contain probiotics that aid the digestive system. Great on its own or add berries or granola for a satisfying snack. We're selling Trader Joe's Greek Nonfat Mango and Strawberry Yogurts in 5.3oz cups for $0.99.
097861.name: Yogurt Greek Strawberry 0%
097861.title: Greek Nonfat Yogurt Strawberry 5.3Oz

097926.description: By now you know the story of Greek yogurt-most of the liquid has been strained out, making its texture more like that of sour cream. But did you know that's only part of the story? There's a dark secret behind much of what's marketed today as "Greek" yogurt. You see, to save both time and money, many yogurt manufacturers skip that all-important straining process, instead choosing to add thickeners to regular yogurt to achieve a similar, creamy texture. We find that more than a little disingenuous for a couple of reasons. One, real Greek plain yogurt has no thickeners. And two, real Greek yogurt is significantly higher in protein than its yogurt relatives, specifically because of that straining process. We make this vow to you: all of the Greek yogurt at Trader Joe's is made using the traditional method of straining the majority of the whey from the yogurt. In addition to the single-serving size of Greek Yogurt with Honey-made with whole milk from cows not treated with rBST-we also offer that same delicious yogurt in a 32-ounce size, equal to at least four individual servings. It's smooth and creamy, super-rich, and an ideal balance of yogurt-y tartness and honey sweetness. Each eight ounce serving has eight grams of protein and contains live, probiotic cultures including s. thermophilus and l. acidophilus which have the potential to aid in healthy digestion. We're selling each 32-ounce container with a resealable lid for $4.99, a verifiable value for "real" Greek Yogurt, and the same price it's been since we introduced it back in 2012. You'll find it in our dairy case.
097926.name: Yogurt Greek Honey 32 Oz Whole
097926.title: Greek Yogurt With Honey

077519.description: While many taquerias across the Americas tend to default to corn tortillas, Sonoran cuisine is famed for its use of flour-and if you've ever had a Sonora-style street taco, you'll know exactly why. Perfectly pliant in texture, and with a mild, just slightly sweet flavor, a warm, Sonora-style flour tortilla can be a true revelation when paired with the right protein. After carrying Mini Sonora Style Tortillas [sku 73586] in our West Coast stores for a few years, we felt the time was right to bring this celebrated tortilla style to all our stores, which is why we're introducing these larger-sized Trader Joe's Sonora Style Flour Tortillas nationally. Prudently proportioned for making hearty, filling fajitas, or marvelously melty quesadillas, our Sonora Style Flour Tortillas are a must-have for making all your favorites within the Mexican and Tex Mex culinary canon. And since each package contains 12 Flour Tortillas, that leaves a lot of room for experimentation, whether you choose to go elegantly simple (like a mini burrito with beans, rice, and grilled Carne Asada [sku 75977]) or more complex (like a shrimp quesadilla with Jalapeño Monterey Jack Cheese [sku 09359] and blistered Shishito Peppers [sku 54173]). Sonora Style Flour Tortillas
077519.name: Tortillas Sonora Style Flour
077519.title: Sonora Style Flour Tortillas

068992.description: Trader Joe's Organic Freeze-Dried Berry Medley contains a mixture of organic blueberries, organic strawberries, and organic raspberries-only these berries have all been dried at a very low temperature, which tends to preserve flavor better than heat drying. You can definitely taste the blueberry-ness of the blueberries and the strawberry-ness of the strawberries. Even the raspberries retain their raspberry-ness! Of course, while the naturally sweet & tart flavors remain true, the soft juiciness of non-dried fruit is replaced by a wonderfully light crunch. This means the Berry Medley is ideal for snacking, or for topping yogurt. Mix it with your favorite nuts to create a berry-licious trail mix. Sprinkle a handful over your bowl of Strawberry Non-dairy Oat Frozen Dessert [sku 67830]. You might even throw some in your smoothie for a formidable fruit boost. Notably, it takes about 7.6 ounces of fresh fruit to make all of what's contained in this 1.2-ounce bag of Organic Freeze-Dried Berries. This equals about 3.5 servings of fruit, including 9g of fiber and just 120 calories! You'll also appreciate that we've added no sugar and no sulfur. It's just fruit! Find it in our nuts & dried fruit section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Freeze Dried Berry Medley
068992.name: Freeze Dried Org Berry Medley Blend
068992.title: Organic Freeze-Dried Berry Medley

077798.description: With the popularity of Trader Joe's 100% Tart Cherry Juice [sku 41747], it's only natural that mouth-puckering Freeze Dried Tart Cherries have landed on our shelves! Freeze Dried Tart Cherries start as whole cherries that are hand-picked and pitted in the Kutahya region of Turkey. When fresh, the fruit is large and heart-shaped with firm flesh, reddish-purple coloring, and a tart taste. Their size may shrink to the size of a marble after 48-60 hours of drying, but their color and flavor? They're amplified to their most sour, deep garnet-red form with newly crisp texture. Free from preservatives like sulfur dioxide, each resealable bag only contains Tart Cherries in tip-top, Freeze Dried form. When eaten on their own, Freeze Dried Tart Cherries make for a naturally tart alternative to sour candy. Add delightful bursts of sourness to morning meals and desserts by sprinkling over Organic Plain Yogurt [sku 13187], overnight oats, or French Vanilla Ice Cream [sku 78576]. Or, incorporate them into syrups and baked goods when you want notable Tart Cherry flavor without adding extra water. Freeze Dried Tart Cherries
077798.name: Freeze Dried Cherries
077798.title: Freeze Dried Tart Cherries

080665.description: Trader Joe's Freeze Dried Strawberries are strawberry slices that have undergone a special freeze-drying process so they remain extremely flavorful, but unlike so many conventionally dried berries, they're free of added sugar and they pack a bit of a crunch. They're great for snacking anytime - we've discovered that kids, especially, find them not only delicious but fascinating as well. Lest you think they're only for kids, we'll go on record as grown-up fans of these crunchy little berries - they're especially delightful added to cereals for a little extra flavor and crunch. Of course, given their history as a backpacking staple, they're perfectly at home on the trail, as part of a mix or on their own. Trader Joe's Freeze Dried Strawberries come in a 1.2 ounce resealable bag - that may not sound like much, but it takes ten times that amount (12 ounces) of fresh, ripe strawberries from California's coastal growing regions to produce this much freeze dried fruit. We recommend that you keep the bag tightly sealed after opening to preserve the crunch, though in the spirit of full disclosure, we'll admit they don't usually last long enough that this ever becomes an issue. We're selling each 1.2 ounce bag for $3.49. You'll find them in our dried fruit section.
080665.name: Freeze Dried Strawberries

085374.description: Grown in the eastern region of Thailand, sweet flavorful mangos are picked at the peak of ripeness, sliced then frozen. The frozen slices are placed in a super-charged vacuum that causes the water in the fruit to sublimate, transforming from ice into vapor. What remains are brightly sweet, crunchy, lightweight, and full-flavored mango slices. Our Unsweetened & Unsulfured Freeze Dried Mango slices are really mango-y and will hold onto the peak of bold-flavored sweetness whether you pack 'em in your pantry for a quick snack, in you're backpack to fortify yourself over a fortnight or in your shuttle's locker tray for a much longer, out-of-this-world stay. Freeze Dried Mango is much more convenient than trying to bring the fruit fresh, especially given the fact that to make the 1.7 ounces contained in this bag, more than 10 ounces of ripe, fresh-cut mango are freeze dried. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Freeze Dried Mango
085374.name: Freeze Dried Mango

096844.description: The process of freeze drying is a rather fascinating one-especially when applied to fresh fruit. In the case of Trader Joe's Freeze Dried Raspberries, for example, it's done by freezing ripe raspberries, then lowering the atmospheric pressure around them to near-vacuum levels. After this, they're heated, which causes a curious reaction where the frozen water within the berries instantly transitions to a vapor, skipping the liquid phase entirely. And since raspberries are mostly water, what remains of each raspberry is super concentrated with their signature, sweet-tart flavor-in fact, it takes more than a half a pound of fresh raspberries to make each 1.2-ounce pouch of our Freeze Dried Raspberries. But you didn't come here for a science lesson-you came here because you love sweet, crisp, fruity snacks! And that's precisely what Trader Joe's Freeze Dried Raspberries are. Every bite is bursting with bright, ever-so- slightly floral raspberry notes, making them an an excellent, anytime snack, and an ideal inclusion for school lunches. We also find that they make an excellent accessory to other dishes-try them as a baking ingredient, a fruity boost for smoothies, or as topper for a bowl of cereal, oatmeal, or yogurt. Freeze Dried Raspberries
096844.name: Freeze Dried Raspberries

056660.description: "Dispatch the cock!" One might alternatively say, "Expedite the chicken!" The theory goes that some hungry Irishman came up with this poultry preparation method that involves the splitting and flattening of a chicken, thus accelerating the rate of cooking, since more of surface area is in touch with the grill or other cooking sur- face. In short, cooking time is shortened, and the done bird is moister (breasts don't overcook while the rest of the bird finishes), with lots of nice, evenly crisp skin. While Spatchcocking isn't necessarily brain surgery, it does take some extra work in the kitchen, which some feel negates the time you save actually cooking the bird. Trader Joe's negates this negation by providing a fully Spatchcocked Chicken, ready to grill or roast. Not only is it already 'butterflied' for you, it is also pre-seasoned; soaked in a brine with orange and lime juices, and marinated in extra virgin olive oil, vinegar, garlic, rosemary, parsley, and lemon slices. Remove Trader Joe's Spatchcocked Lemon Rosemary Chicken from its package (leave the lemon slices in tact and don't rinse it), and put it on a pre-heated grill skin-side down until it's well-browned and its internal temperature reaches 165ºF on a meat thermometer. Alternately, you can lay it skin-side up in a shallow baking pan and cook at 375ºF in your oven for about an hour. (Cooking time varies according to the size of your bird.) We've enthusiastically dispatched two-and-a-half to three-pound Spatchcocked Lemon Rosemary Chickens to all our Trader Joe's locations, where you can snatch your own for $3.99 per pound. (That puts a three pound, ready-to-cook Chicken at under $12.00.) Only at Joe's. 05.16. 16
056660.name: Lemon Spatchcocked Chicken
056660.title: Spatchcocked Lemon Rosemary Chicken

060667.description: Yes, shawarma is typically cooked on a vertical spit (those rotisserie-like skewers that hold impressive amounts of meat). But the especially important part of shawarma is the delicious, savory spice blend that's used on meats cooked in this way. It's this crucial component that makes our new Trader Joe's Shawarma Chicken Thighs so wondrously good. Boneless, skinless chicken thighs are seasoned with a shawarma spice marinade made of onion, garlic, sea salt, cumin, cinnamon, coriander, paprika, turmeric, and parsley. Yes, we used almost the entire spice rack, but each one is vitally important, adding just the right amount of flavor to create glorious Shawarma Chicken Thighs. Though it'd be handy, you do not need to have a vertical spit installed in your home to cook this Shawarma Chicken; a grill or an oven will do just fine. More than fine, actually. Grilling leaves you with perfectly charred chicken thighs, while baking results in tender, moist meat. Slice thin and serve with any number of Middle Eastern-inspired products: pita, hummus, Tzatziki [sku 20405], Tahini [sku 54978], Grecian Style Eggplant [sku 53896], tomatoes, sliced cucumbers, olives, feta¿ Chicken Shawarma is, in its own right, fantastic, but it's even better when it's also a value. Each random weight package (1.5 pound average) of Trader Joe's Shawarma Chicken Thighs is $4.49 per pound, every day. 01.28. 18
060667.name: Shawarma Chicken Thighs

061046.description: Ahhh, summer. The days are long, the sun is out, the grill is fired up¿and now you'll have Trader Joe's All Natural Bone-In Skin-On Chicken Thighs to throw onto that fired-up grill! Our new Bone-In Skin-On Chicken Thighs just might be the ultimate choice for summertime cooking. Sourced from family-owned farms where the chickens are fed a 100% vegetarian diet and never given antibiot- ics or growth hormones, these Thighs are all but ready to throw on the grill. Thigh meat is incredibly flavorful, and it's even more so when the bone and skin are left intact. A little seasoning (salt & pepper, TJ's Seasoning Salt [sku 59138], maybe a shake of 21 Seasoning Salute [sku 07344]?), a marinade like our Soyaki [sku 78555], or a basting of Organic Sriracha & Roasted Garlic Barbecue Sauce [sku 53799] will go a long way with this particular piece of chicken. Once you've done your desired prep, those Thighs are ready for the grill! You can also bake 'em in the oven for an equally juicy, flavorful entrée. (You can even crisp the skin on the stove top for about 10 minutes before baking-and you will want to do this.) We're selling each random-weight package of All Natural Bone-In Skin-On Chicken Thighs for $1.99 per pound. That's an outstanding value for this summer-friendly product that you'll surely want to become friendly with this summer. You'll find it in our fresh meat case, but only during these summer months. 04.30. 18 SUMMER
061046.name: Natural Bone In Ckn Thigh
061046.title: All Natural Bone-In Skin-On Chicken Thighs

061299.description: Organic, free-range chicken is the most popular type of chicken we sell, so when presented with the chance to expand upon our existing organic chicken offerings, we were very intrigued. Then, when our fresh meat Buyer presented our tasting panel with a new, rarely-before-seen "Strip" cut, we were sold. Trader Joe's Organic Boneless & Skinless Chicken Breast Strips couldn't be more convenient. Sure, you could buy a bunch of breasts and slice 'em yourself, but if Strips are what you're after, why not save yourself the hassle? Our Chicken Breast Strips come already boneless, skinless, and pre-cut into perfectly sized, even strips. They're USDA-certified organic, and they're from free-range chickens that are raised on an all-vegetarian diet and never given antibiotics. Trust us when we say that this is one versatile cut of poultry-Organic Chicken Breast Strips can be cooked and used however you fancy. Whether you prefer to bake or to boil, to simmer or to sauté, they make a perfect addition to stir-fries, salads, pastas, rice dishes, and more. They also lend themselves beautifully to battering and frying (or breading and baking) and/or can easily stand alone as a center-of-the-protein. In addition to being versatile, this cut is also new-to-market and hard-to-find. Still, we believe that hard-to-find shouldn't equal hard-to-afford, so we're offering Trader Joe's Organic Boneless & Skinless Chicken Breast Strips for $6.99 per pound-a fantastic, everyday value that you'll find in our fresh meat cases. 02.26. 18
061299.name: Organic Chicken Breast Strips
061299.title: Organic Boneless Skinless Chicken Breast Strips

063550.description: When it comes to value, we don't mess around here at Trader Joe's. So, when we get the opportunity to offer an even better value on items we've carried for awhile, we jump on it. Though Trader Joe's Organic Chicken Breasts aren't new to our shelves, the price is-and it'll impress. Trader Joe's Organic Chicken Breasts come from chickens raised specifically for us primarily on family farms, under the strict USDA guidelines for Organic Certification. In accordance with these guidelines, the chickens are fed a vegetarian diet of only a certified organic corn and organic soybean meal, and they are never given antibiotics or fed animal fats or by-products. Because these Breasts are boneless and skinless, they're low in fat, super convenient, and very versatile. Grill or pan-fry them to use in salads. Dust them with seasoned flour and "oven fry" for a quick & healthier take on fried chicken. Include them in soups and stir-frys, make Chicken Parmesan, use them in casseroles, make tacos, cook up some chicken chili or skewer some kebabs. Talk about adaptable! We're selling these Organic Chicken Breasts for $6.49 a pound, every day, an excellent value for organic chick- en, and 50¢ a pound lower than it's been since October 2007! Now that's a WOW value. You'll find them in our fresh meat section.
063550.name: Organic Chicken Breast
063550.title: Organic Free Range Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts

067086.description: With increasing requests from our Customers for organic poultry-and given the way our Organic Ground Turkey [sku 58741] has been so well-received-we've decided to add an organic ground chicken option. Trader Joe's Organic Ground Chicken is made from free-range, U.S. chicken that is raised on all-vegetarian feed with no added hormones and no antibiotics, ever. And of course, it's certified organic. Similar to our All Natural Ground Chicken [sku 68185], this Organic version is excellent for cooking up all kinds of chicken dishes... Make chicken burgers. Roll chicken meatballs. Cook chicken chili or make chicken tacos. You can even emulate your local Chinese restaurant's Chicken Lettuce Wraps (recipe on traderjoes.com). We're selling one-pound packages of Organic Ground Chicken every day in our stores. Find it in our refrigerators among our expanding selection of organic chicken. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Ground Chicken
067086.name: Chicken Org Ground 92/8 (9/Pk)
067086.title: Organic Ground Chicken Contains Up To 1% Solution Of Buffered Organic Vinegar, Organic Sunflower Oil And Organic Rosemary Extract

070735.description: Trader Joe's All Natural Boneless Skinless Chicken Thighs are ideal for summertime cooking. Sourced from small, family-owned chicken farms where the chickens are fed a 100% vegetarian diet and never given antibiotics or growth hormones, these Thighs are pretty much ready to throw on the grill. Thigh meat is incredibly flavorful, and by removing the skin, we've eliminated a good deal of the fat usually associated with this part of the bird. A little seasoning-salt & pepper, TJ's Seasoning Salt [sku 59138], a bit of garlic?-or maybe a marinade like our Soyaki [sku 78555] or a basting of Organic Sriracha & Roasted Garlic Barbecue Sauce [sku 53799] will go a long way with this particular piece of chicken because of its inherently robust nature. Serve our All Natural Boneless Skinless Chicken Thighs as a center-of-the-plate entrée, on skewers, on buns as a burger alternative, or sliced atop a bed of salad greens. We're selling them for $3.99 a pound, which is fifty cents a pound less than they were when they appeared in our Fearless Flyer back in 2011. You'll find them in our fresh meat case.
070735.name: Natural Bnls Sknls Ckn Thighs
070735.title: Boneless Skinless Chicken Thighs

074014.description: Chicken is a staple in many an omnivore's diet: it's easy, high in protein, and has less cholesterol than red meats. At Trader Joe's, we strive to offer a variety of chicken options that are both high-quality and a stand-out value. One such product is Trader Joe's Organic Free Range Whole Chicken. Our Organic Whole Chickens come from chickens raised specifically for us primarily on family farms, under the strict USDA guidelines for Organic Certification. In accordance with these guide- lines, the chickens are fed a vegetarian diet of only a certified organic corn and organic soybean meal, and they are never given antibiotics or fed animal fats or by-products. Because we're talking about a whole chicken here, you've got the opportunity for quite a versatile main dish. Roast the Chicken in a cast iron skillet or roasting pan and an impressive center-of-the-table dish is at the ready. Dress it up with your preferred rub or spice mixture. Chop some potatoes and car- rots to roast alongside. If you're feeling ambitious, you could even spatchcock and grill it. And, if you have leftovers, include them in soups and stir-frys, casseroles and salads. Talk about adaptable. Your uses for Trader Joe's Organic Chicken may change, but one thing that doesn't change is our WOW value. We're offering Organic Whole Chickens for $2.69 per pound, every day. You'll find them in our fresh meat section.
074014.name: Organic Whole Chicken
074014.title: Organic Free Range Young Chicken

074040.description: "Anyone can make a good roast chicken." - Chef Thomas Keller At Trader Joe's, we love roast chicken not in spite of its simplicity, but because of it. Indeed, as Chef Keller states, the simple joy of a perfectly roast chicken is truly accessible to anyone. All one needs is a few extra ingredients and seasonings, a nice, hot oven, and, of course, a fresh, tender chicken. And for our money, you can't go wrong with Trader Joe's Young Whole Chicken, a simple, delicious bird that's suitable for all your particular poultry needs, but that's especially great for roasting. Minimally processed, and prepared with no artificial colors or flavors, Trader Joe's Whole Young Chicken can be used for roasts, soups, broths, and slow cooker recipes. It can be spatchcocked and grilled, chopped and tandoori-baked, or quartered and fried. And on top of all of this versatility, it remains a truly remarkable value: at Trader Joe's, you can find our Young Whole Chickens for the phenomenal price of $1.49* per pound. To paraphrase Chef Keller, anyone can appreciate that. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Young Whole Chicken
074040.name: Trader Joe'S Butcher Shop Whole Chicken For Roasting

077563.description: In the latest contest for "The greatest thing since sliced bread," allow us to present Trader Joe's Organic Free Range Boneless Skinless Thin Sliced Chicken Breast Fillets (whew!) for your consideration¿ Like our best-selling Organic Free Range Chicken Breasts [sku 635550], these Breast Fillets come from free range chickens raised on 100% vegetarian feed. They're raised per USDA Organic standards, and never given antibiotics or added hormones-ever. The convenience factor of their Boneless and Skinless preparation is taken one step further, in that these Breasts are thinly Sliced into pan-ready portions prior to packing, making meal prep easier than ever. Bake them with Sliced Mozzarella [sku 88622] and Organic Tomato Basil Marinara [sku 10111] for a lighter take on Chicken Parm, or sauté them with Soyaki [sku 78555] for a speedy stir fry, or roast and stack them on a hearty sandwich of Multigrain Bread [sku 99248] slathered with Tirokafteri [sku 73653], or¿ you get the idea. They put a world of quick-cooking, protein-powered meal possibilities at your fingertips, at a value you won't find anywhere but your neighborhood Trader Joe's. Organic Free Range Chicken Boneless Skinless Thin Sliced Breast Fillets
077563.name: Chicken Organic Breast Thin Sliced (15/Pk)
077563.title: Organic Free Range Boneless Skinless Thin Sliced Chicken Breast Fillets

090594.description: Have you ever walked into one of those "club stores" or "super centers" and seen an absolutely amazing price on something like chicken drumsticks? Have you ever gotten really excited about that price, only to find out you'd have to buy the equivalent of six month's supply of said chicken drumsticks to get that amazing price? Been there, done that, time for something different. We don't think you should have to fill your freezer or join a club just to get a great value. Take those chicken drumsticks, for example. At Trader Joe's, you'll find All Natural Chicken Drumsticks, top-quality, all natural, antibiotic-free, vegetarian-fed chicken that cooks up moist and tender whether prepared on the grill, in the oven or battered and deep-fried. Best of all, we sell these Drumsticks in packages of about five, weighing somewhere in the neighborhood of a pound and a half, so you can get what you need for today, at a fantastic price, without being stuck with enough to feed the whole neighborhood. And if you do want enough to feed the neighborhood? We'll be happy to help you carry it all out to your car. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. All Natural Chicken Drumsticks
090594.name: All Natural Chicken Drumsticks

090595.description: Chicken is a staple in many an omnivore's diet: it's easy, high in protein, and has less cholesterol than red meats. At Trader Joe's, we strive to offer a variety of chicken options that are both high-quality and a stand-out value. One such product is Trader Joe's Organic Free Range Chicken Tenders. Our Organic Chicken Tenders come from chickens raised specifically for us primarily on family farms, under the strict USDA guidelines for Organic Certification. In accordance with these guidelines, the chickens are fed a vegetarian diet of only a certified organic corn and organic soybean meal, and they are never given antibiotics or fed animal fats or by-products. No, Chicken Tenders are not just finger food found on the kid's menu; you've actually got the opportunity to make quite versatile main dishes. Grill and use them in salads or creamy pasta dishes. Bread them with Panko Breadcrumbs [sku 81614] and relive your favorite childhood food, or use them in stir-frys with noodles and lots of veggies. Talk about adaptable. Your uses for Trader Joe's Organic Chicken may change, but one thing that doesn't change is our WOW value. We're offering Organic Free Range Chicken Tenders for $7.49 per pound, every day. You'll find them in our fresh meat section.
090595.name: Organic Chicken Tenders
090595.title: Organic Boneless Skinless Chicken Breast Tenders

092607.description: According to the folks at Empire¿, the country's largest Kosher Chicken producer, their kosher empire all started back in 1938, when founder Joseph Katz, observed that the Jewish population in suburban & rural America couldn't find kosher foods. Looking to change that, Katz started a company a shoestring budget and named it after New York... a.k.a. the Empire State. Practicing sustainable farming and observing all Jewish dietary laws under strict rabbinical supervision, Empire¿ is known to produce some of the highest-quality, best-tasting Kosher Chicken around. And it's not just for those who keep kosher. Many of our Customers tell us they prefer to buy Empire Kosher¿ Natural Chicken because of the company's definition of "Natural ," which states that all Empire¿ products "[meet the] brand's humane policy for raising chicken on family farms in a stress-free environment." (The birds are also vegetarian fed, never given any hormones or antibiotics, and U.S.-hatched, raised, and harvested.) We offer a variety of Empire Kosher¿ Natural Chicken cuts in our stores, but their bone-in, skin-on Chicken Leg Quarters-a "quarter" being a thigh, a drumstick, and part of the back-are a natural choice for flavorful dishes and BBQ-ing. It's an all-dark-meat cut that's especially tender & tasty, and we're selling random-weight packages (approx. 1.75 lbs. each) of Empire Kosher¿ Natural Chicken Leg Quarters for $3.49 per pound.* Find them in our fresh meat case. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Empire Kosher¿ Natural Chicken Leg Quarters
092607.name: Empire Kosher Ckn Leg Quarters

092614.description: This might just be the perfect item for the barbecue - or anywhere you want a vareity of options. Empire 8 Piece Cut-Up Kosher Chicken has something to satisfy every chicken lover, no matter what part of the chicken you like best. There are eight pieces in the package - two each of thighs, breasts, wings, and drumsticks. Whether you prefer dark meat or light, you'll be satisfied with the selection here. Easiest way to prepare: baste the pieces with your favorite Trader Joe's barbecue sauce, grill and enjoy the delicious (and yes, perhaps a bit messy) results. Empire Chicken is raised and processed according to strict Kosher guidelines, and the result is very high quality chicken. At Trader Joe's, we take pride both in our selection of kosher meat and poultry, and also in the prices we offer - we haven't seen a better value on Empire Kosher Chicken than we've seen anywhere else. We're selling random weight packages of Empire 8 Piece Cut-Up Kosher Chicken for the everyday low price of $3.49* per pound. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Empire 8 Piece Cut-Up Kosher Chicken
092614.name: Empire Kosher 8 Pc Cut Up Ckn

096047.description: Chicken Wings are the perfect finger food. Ideal as an appetizer or snack these all white meat wings are as versatile as they are tasty. You can grill them, fry them or even bake them. Add your favorite sauce and you are good to go! These wings are all natural which means no antibiotics or growth hormones were ever used and the chickens were fed an all vegetarian diet absolutely no animal by-products. We are selling Trader Joe's Butcher Shop All Natural Chicken Wings for $2.49 per lb. Trader Joe's Company Bulletin03/16/2011 page 40 of 41 Confidential
096047.name: Natural Chicken Wings

096763.description: Thin Sliced Chicken Breasts are convenient and delicious. They cook up quickly, you can pan fry one in about 10 minutes. Since they are so thin and the chicken cooks up so fast they stay moister than plain chicken breasts. You can season them to taste and serve them with pasta and a salad for a meal that you can make in 15 minutes! We are selling Trader Joe's All Natural Thin Sliced Chicken Breasts for $5.49 per lb. Trader Joe's Company Bulletin07/13/2011 page 37 of 41 Confidential
096763.name: Boneless Skinless Thinly Sliced Chicken Breast

097236.description: With Trader Joe's Organic Chicken Family Pack you can feed four people for under $9.00 now that is a WOW value! Each pack contains two split breasts and four drumsticks. Great on the grill this chicken is certified organic meaning the chickens were never ever treated with antibiotics or hormones and fed only certified organic feed. Always tender and juicy our chicken comes from a best in class supplier that manages and controls every step of the process to ensure consistently great tasting chicken. We are selling Trader Joe's Organic Chicken Family Pack for $2.79 per lb.
097236.name: Organic Six Piece Family Pack
097236.title: Organic Chicken Grill Pack

098615.description: Chicken is a staple in many an omnivore's diet: it's easy, high in protein, and has less cholesterol than red meats. At Trader Joe's, we strive to offer a variety of chicken options that are both high-quality and a stand-out value. One such product is Trader Joe's Organic Boneless & Skinless Chicken Breasts. Our Organic Chicken Breasts come from chickens raised specifically for us primarily on family farms, under the strict USDA guidelines for Organic Certification. In accordance with these guidelines, the chickens are fed a vegetarian diet of only a certified organic corn and organic soybean meal, and they are never given antibiotics or fed animal fats or by-products. Because these Chicken Breasts are individually packaged, they're ideal for weekday lunches or solo dinners: you only open what you'll use. They also freeze easily if you'd like to keep them longer. Grill or pan-fry them to use in salads. Dust them with seasoned flour and "oven fry" for a quick & healthier take on fried chicken. Include them in soups and stir-frys, make Chicken Parmesan, or use them in casseroles. Talk about adaptable. Your uses for Trader Joe's Organic Chicken may change, but one thing that doesn't change is our WOW value. We're offering individually wrapped Organic Boneless & Skinless Chicken Breasts for $7.49 per pound, every day. You'll find them in our fresh meat section.
098615.name: Organic Chicken Breast
098615.title: Organic Boneless & Skinless Chicken Breasts With Rib Meat - Individually Wrapped - Fff

098648.description: One of the many reasons we love the pre-marinated options in our fresh meat section is their utter simplicity of preparation. With all the chopping, slicing, and seasoning done for you, all that separates you from a juicy, flavorful, center-of-the-plate protein is a few minutes of grilling, roasting, or sautéeing. Take Trader Joe's Sun- Dried Tomato & Basil Chicken Tenders, which are making their grand comeback to our refrigerators, for instance. Made with a base of boneless, skinless Chicken Breast tenders and a creamy, savory, Mediterranean- style marinade, prepping this dish from scratch would normally be a labor-intensive endeavor. But since all the work is done for you, you're free to focus on the finer details, like what kind of side to serve alongside them-or what kind of wine... Speaking of which, we find the tart and tangy notes of the Sun-Dried Tomato, along with the bright aromatics of the Basil, garlic, and onion make this is an ideal protein to pair with pasta, roasted veggies, and a dry, yet fruity, red wine. We find something like our Fior di Vino Chianti Classico [sku 62763] or our Rosa dell'Olmo Barbera d'Asti [sku 98304] make great companions. For something a little different, try pan-frying these Tenders and placing them in a sandwich with Pesto [sku 75825] and slices of Fresh Mozzarella [sku 77726]. Sun-Dried Tomato & Basil Chicken Tenders
098648.name: Tomato/Basil Chicken Tenders
098648.title: Sun-Dried Tomato & Basil Chicken Tenders

099264.description: Drumrolls announce exciting events or occurrences, and drumsticks are used to create this commotion. Trader Joe's Organic Chicken Drumsticks are not the type of drumsticks you use for a drumroll, but thanks to their many attributes and excellent value, they are worthy of one. Our Organic Drumsticks come from chickens raised specifically for us in the United States, under the strict USDA guidelines for Organic Certification. In accordance with these guidelines, the chickens are fed a vegetar- ian diet, and they are never given hormones or antibiotics-ever. These Drumsticks contain both bones and skin, and the dark meat, when cooked, is juicy and flavorful. They're also incredibly easy to prepare: choose your favorite sauce, your preferred cooking method, and have at it. Pair with Organic Sriracha and Roasted Garlic BBQ Sauce [sku 53799], General Tsao Sauce [sku 57473], or Soyaki Sauce [sku 78555]. Then grill, bake, or fry. The options are nearly endless, but there's no wrong way to go. We're selling Trader Joe's Organic Chicken Drumsticks for $1.99 per pound, every single day. That's an excel- lent value for organic chicken -certainly deserving of its introductory drumroll.
099264.name: Organic Chicken Drumsticks
099264.title: Organic Free Range Chicken Drumsticks

099265.description: Chicken is a staple in many an omnivore's diet: it's easy, high in protein, and has less cholesterol than red meats. At Trader Joe's, we strive to offer a variety of chicken options that are both high-quality and a stand-out value. One such product is Trader Joe's Organic Free Range Chicken Thighs. Our Organic Chicken Thighs come from chickens raised specifically for us primarily on family farms, under the strict USDA guidelines for Organic Certification. In accordance with these guidelines, the chickens are fed a vegetarian diet of only a certified organic corn and organic soybean meal, and they are never given antibiotics or fed animal fats or by-products. These Chicken Thighs provide flavorful, dark meat that presents the opportunity for quite a versatile main dish. Put them in a slow cooker with your favorite sauce (maybe Bold & Smoky Kansas City Style BBQ Sauce [sku 31314]?) and you'll have tasty pulled chicken in no time. They cook quickly when roasted or pan-fried, and they're great in casseroles. Talk about adaptable. Your uses for Trader Joe's Organic Chicken may change, but one thing that doesn't change is our WOW value. We're offering Organic Free Range Chicken Thighs for $5.49 per pound, every day. You'll find them in our fresh meat section.
099265.name: Organic Bnls Sknls Ckn Thigh
099265.title: Organic Boneless Skinless Chicken Thighs

026366.description: For fine, high quality meats, look no further than Trader Joe's Butcher Shop and amongst all your lean ground beef options, look no further than Trader Joe's Extra Lean Ground Beef. A simple and straightforward pack of pure beef makes this a versatile and multi-talented star of our meat refrigerators. Just give the Extra Lean Ground Beef a toss in the pan and you're ready for a tender, meaty addition to many a meal. Meatloaf Monday, Taco Tuesday, Stir-Fry-day-you get the idea! Nutritionally appealing, yet still satisfyingly rich and beefy, it's especially ideal for forming lightly marbled patties for the grill. In the summer, try tossing in a lil' rosemary, salt, and pepper, or any of our savory seasoning blends for a wonderfully rich, yet nutritionally lean backyard-bash-of-a-burger. Once winter hits, Trader Joe's Extra Lean Ground Beef becomes the foundation for stews, chilies, or even a large pan of lasagna with a meat- packed red sauce. Extra Lean Ground Beef
026366.name: Ground Beef 96/4
026366.title: Extra Lean Ground Beef 96% Lean / 4% Fat

053808.description: "Carré d'agneau", or "rack of lamb" in French, is a timeless and tantalizing cut of lamb drawn perpendicularly to the spine that includes 16 total ribs. At your local Trader Joe's, we sell our French Lamb Rack 'single' racks of eight ribs, 'Frenched'. No, this doesn't mean the lamb will reanimate and dine on your Bordeaux and baguettes, but simply that the fat and some rib meat has been trimmed, exposing a few extra inches of the rib bones. Our supplier farms grass fed, free range, antibiotic free livestock that altogether amounts to an exquisitely tender rack of lamb. Roasted Frenched Lamb Rack makes a brilliant centerpiece dish because of an impressive presentation paired with shockingly easy preparation. Traditionally, a rack such as this is prepared with a 'persillade' - a seasoning mixture of parsley, garlic, herbs, oil, vinegar, and often bread crumbs - and the bones capped with 'manchettes' - decorative paper frills - for a classy presentation. But don't let tradition dictate your lamb rack layout! Roast however you'd like, just remember that it all begins with Trader Joe's Frenched Lamb Rack available day in, day out for $16.49* per pound at your nearest Trader Joe's. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Frenched Lamb Rack
053808.name: Rack Of Lamb
053808.title: New Zealand Lamb Racks

055562.description: Ground beef is so passé. Okay, maybe not so passé-cheeseburgers will never go out of style. But ground beef isn't the only player now, at least on the shelves of Trader Joe's. We also sell Ground Turkey [sku 16574], and now we're adding yet another choice to our offering: All Natural Ground Chicken. Our All Natural Ground Chicken offers an excellent and exciting new option when shopping for ground meat-yes, we think Ground Chicken is exciting. Especially ours, which is gluten free, antibiotic free, and from chickens fed all-vegetarian diets. The meat, a blend of white and dark meat, is 92% lean and 8% fat, giving it a mild flavor and moist profile. Another hallmark of our All Natural Ground Chicken? Its versatility is unmatched. Form it into patties and serve with all the classic burger fixings. Cook up a pot of chicken chili. Use it as the key ingredient for casseroles, pot pies, meatballs, meatloaf, lettuce wraps, tacos, pasta sauces, chicken stuffed peppers¿ Okay, you get the idea. When we say versatile, we do mean versatile. We're selling each one-pound package of Trader Joe's All Natural Ground Chicken for just $3.49. We love you, cheeseburgers, but we also love choices. Like ground chicken. 10.03. 16
055562.name: Natural Ground Chicken 92/8
055562.title: All Natural Ground Chicken

057721.description: When you think of steak, you more likely than not think of a thick, juicy filet mignon, or ribeye, or strip steak served with mashed potatoes and roasted vegetables. You wouldn't be wrong, because that is steak. But it's not exactly the kind of steak we're talking about when we talk about the newly introduced Trader Joe's Shaved Beef Steak. This is quite the opposite of a thick cut (but no less tasty)¿ Shaved steak normally comes form the round, which is tougher, but our Shaved Beef Steak comes from the cap of the rib eye, making it especially tender and flavorful. In addition to the quality cut, the beef is all natural, meaning it comes from cows never treated with antibiotics, ever. Because the slices are so thin, pieces of this Shaved Steak cook up very quickly-no need to worry about un- der- or overcooking! And its easy preparation might only be matched by its versatility. In the mood for stir fry? Shaved Steak makes the perfect protein addition. Fajitas? No problem. Beef soup on a cold day? Sure. Or maybe you're far away from Philly, the cheesesteak capital. No need to worry: grill up some onions and peppers, grab some Sliced Provolone [sku 79681], and use this Steak for the tastiest homemade steak sandwich. We're selling random weight packages of Trader Joe's Shaved Beef Steak for $8.99 per pound, every day.
057721.name: Shaved Steak
057721.title: All Natural Shaved Beef Steak

059461.description: Among the common cuts of meat, chicken thighs might just make the most compelling canvas for seasonings, sauces, and marinades. Since chicken thighs have a relatively higher fat content, they're typically more juicy and flavorful from the start, which tends to create all the more exciting interactions with other flavors. Case in point: Trader Joe's Savory Herbed Chicken Thighs. Each package contains boneless, skinless cuts of Chicken Thigh that have been seasoned with a sublimely savory marinade that's made with aromatic herbs like basil, cilantro, and mint, along with garlic, shredded lemon peel, crushed chili peppers, and even a bit of fish sauce for an extra umami kick. This mix of bold herbs, seasonings, and aromatics, combined with the natural juiciness and richness of the Chicken Thighs, creates a uniquely delicious flavor profile once they're fully cooked. Speaking of which, since they're pre-marinated and ready to go, cooking is a breeze: simply grill, roast, or pan-fry until a thermometer in their internal temperature reads 165°F on a meat thermometer. After that, it's simply a matter of picking a side to serve them with: we like them with a bit of Organic Cauliflower Rice [sku 54241], some steamed veggies, or a fully-loaded baked potato, ourselves. Savory Herbed Chicken Thighs
059461.name: Savory Herbed Chicken Thighs

061152.description: Want a hot tip? Or rather, hot Tips? Here's what you do: Go to your neighborhood Trader Joe's and pick up a package of Balsamic Rosemary Beef Steak Tips. Heat your grill to medium-high, then open the package and empty the chunks of choice beef (cut from the upper two-thirds portion of the bottom sirloin) onto a large plate or tray and lightly spray the meat with Avocado Oil Spray [sku 70738]. Then, simply grill the meat 7 to 8 minutes, until it reaches an internal temperature of 145°F. Pull it off the grill and let it rest it for a few minutes before serving. The tasty result is tender, sweet and savory Steak Tips, owing their flavor to the Balsamic vinegar and Rosemary marinade with which they were prepared-ahead of time, by us! Here's another tip: if you'd rather not use the barbecue, these Beef Steak Tips are just as sweet and savory (and simple) when cooked in a stovetop skillet, or broiled in your oven. Balsamic Rosemary Beef Steak Tips
061152.name: Meat Beef Rosemary Balsamic Steak Tips
061152.title: Balsamic Rosemary Beef Steak Tips

069980.description: Trader Joe's All Natural Chicken Breast Tenders go beyond the USDA definition of "all natural." They're not only minimally processed with no artificial ingredients, as defined by federal regulations; but we also work hard to source chicken that has never been given antibiotics, taking our chicken tenders above and beyond most of our competitors. The tender is an aptly named cut from the chicken due to the delicate, tender texture when cooked properly. Found directly behind the breast, it has a very similar texture and flavor profile to the breasts themselves, making them a versatile tool for any recipe that has boneless chicken on the menu. Because Trader Joe's All Natural Chicken Breast Tenders are already sectioned into smaller strips than whole breasts, they are perfect for recipes that would need your chicken to be deboned and thinly sliced. They make a great cut to create savory skewers or marinate and lay over a caesar salad. Think beyond just a simply fried Chicken Breast Tender, but also don't shy away from them when the dippable craving calls! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. All Natural Chicken Breast Tenders
069980.name: Natural Chicken Tenders
069980.title: Chicken Breast Tenders

074036.description: Trader Joe's All Natural Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts go beyond the USDA definition of "all natural." They're not only minimally processed with no artificial ingredients, as defined by federal regulations; but we also work hard to source chicken that has never been given antibiotics, sailing our poultry above and beyond most. The most important test is taste, and Trader Joe's Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts score top marks on all of their exams. They cook up plump and juicy, very tender, and quite flavorful. Versatility is the name of the game for these Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts. A laundry list of preparation methods can have you grilling these breasts outdoors with a marinade midsummer or slow-roasting them in a stew deep into winter. We may just like them best gently seasoned with just a bit of salt and pepper. You will be surprised at how flavorful lightly seasoned, well-prepared our All Natural Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts can be! And at $4.49* a pound, they'll be flying off the shelves for days to come at your local Trader Joe's. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. All Natural Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts
074036.name: Chicken Nat Breast Bnls (12/Pk)
074036.title: Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts With Rib Meat

074038.description: If you are a meat-eater, chicken is one of the best options. That's because compared to other meats, such as beef or pork, chicken tends to be lower in fat. It also delivers plenty of protein and zero carbs. For instance, each quarter-pound serving of Trader Joe's Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts with Rib Meat serves up 24g protein, with just 3g fat and 130 calories. Our Chicken Breasts come from chickens hatched, raised and harvested in the U.S.A. They are minimally processed with no artificial colors or flavors. And, the bones and skin have been removed (with the rib meat left on), which means you can go from refrigerator to skillet, oven, or grill in very little time! Find the approximately 2 lb. package (weight varies) of our conventional Chicken Breasts in our refrigerators, every day. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts with Rib Meat
074038.name: Bnls Sknls Chicken Breasts (12/Pk)
074038.title: Boneless & Skinless Chicken Breast Fillets With Rib Meat

076895.description: Trader Joe's Individually Wrapped All Natural Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts go beyond the USDA definition of "all natural." They're not only minimally processed with no artificial ingredients, as defined by federal regulations; but we also work hard to source chicken that has never been given antibiotics, elevating our poultry above and beyond most. The most important test is taste, and Trader Joe's Individually Wrapped All Natural Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts score top marks on each and every taste test. They cook up plump and juicy, very tender, and exquisitely flavorful. Versatility is the name of the game for these Individually Wrapped Chicken Breasts. A laundry list of preparation methods can have you grilling these breasts outdoors with a marinade midsummer or slow-roasting them in a stew deep into winter. We may just like them best gently seasoned with just a bit of salt and pepper. You will be surprised at how flavorful lightly seasoned, well-prepared our Individually Wrapped All Natural Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts can be! And the best part? Because they're individually wrapped, you can enjoy some now and freeze the rest for later. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Individually Wrapped All Natural Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts
076895.name: Natural Chicken Breast

081293.description: A Friday night Fiesta or a Taco Tuesday twist, Trader Joe's Pollo Asado Autentico brings the party to any dining room. A delectably juicy chicken breast in a generously peppered, spiced, and seasoned authentic asado marinade such as this will have you saying "maña-naahhh" to typical beef burritos and "hello" to a Latin American poultry potluck! Hailing from traditional Mexican and Cuban recipes, our authentic asado recipe is a bountiful blend of paprika, black pepper, crushed red pepper, cayenne, garlic, and citrus juices slowly soaking a chicken breast that's determined to make your mouth water. Slap it on the grill outdoors or pan-fry while indoors, either way the thinly sliced and tender breast cutlets are bound to bring the fiesta flavor to any meal. ¡Arriba, arriba! ¡Ándale, ándale! to your neighborhood Trader Joe's to snag a cut of our Pollo Asado Autentico; sold daily for $5.99* per pound. You can find them nestled in our selection of pre-marinated meats in our refrigerators. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Pollo Asado Autentico
081293.name: Pollo Asado Autentico

091082.description: Burger-meisters say that if you want to make a great burger, you should start with 80/20 ground beef. Of course, we recommend this one-pound package of Trader Joe's 80% lean, 20% fat Ground Beef from our refrigerators... While you can surely find ground beef with different lean/fat ratios (we also sell 90/10 and 85/15), experts claim that 20% is just the right amount of fat for a moist, juicy burger. The fat renders (or melts down) as the burger cooks on your hot grill or in your skillet, ensuring you don't end up with a dry puck of a patty! Our Ground Beef is sourced from a number of countries renowned for their excellent beef production, including Australia, New Zealand, and the United States-and it's processed and inspected in the U.S. to ensure only the best quality. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. 80/20 Ground Beef
091082.name: Ground Beef 80/20
091082.title: Ground Beef 80% Lean /20% Fat

091100.description: For fine, high quality meats, look no further than Trader Joe's Butcher Shop and amongst all your ground beef options, look no further than Trader Joe's Ground Beef 85% Lean/15% Fat. A simplistically straightforward pack of pure beef makes this a flexible and multi-talented star of our meat refrigerators. Just give the Ground Beef a toss in the pan and you're ready for a tender, meaty addition to many-a-meal. Meatloaf Monday, Taco Tuesday, Stir-Fry-day, Beef Stew Sunday - you get the idea! Basking in the summer sun, you can form beautifully marbled and juicy patties for the grill - we're thinking about tossing in a lil' rosemary, salt, and pepper - for a wonderfully rich backyard-bash-of-a-burger. Once winter hits, Trader Joe's Ground Beef 85% Lean/ 15% Fat becomes the foundation for stews, chilies, or even a large pan of lasagna with a meaty red sauce. The 15% fat content of this ground beef makes it perfect for applications where you need a little bit of a luscious, juice-packed bit of burger. An everyday value - $4.99* per pound - Trader Joe's Ground Beef 85% Lean / 15% Fat will be a constant in our refrigerators, so why not bring it home to yours? *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Ground Beef 85% Lean / 15% Fat
091100.name: Ground Beef 85/15
091100.title: Ground Beef 85% Lean / 15% Fat

091872.description: At Trader Joe's, beef with an "All Natural" designation goes beyond the minimally processed, no artificial ingredients definition set out by the USDA. It comes from cattle that are raised without the use of antibiotics, synthetic hormones, or other growth stimulants-ever. And by "ever," we mean "never." The cattle are fed a 100% vegetarian diet, resulting in meat that's tender and flavorful. Trader Joe's All Natural Ground Beef 90% Lean/10% Fat is a high quality, straightforward pack of pure beef. Bolognese, burgers, chili, tacos-it's great for them all. With only 10% fat, it's also great when you are mixing with a fattier meat, say ground pork, to create mouth-watering meatballs or meatloaf. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. All Natural Ground Beef 90% Lean / 10% Fat
091872.name: Natural Ground Beef 90/10
091872.title: All Natural Lean Ground Beef 90% Lean / 10% Fat

092615.description: Being offered kosher, natural chicken breasts that have been hatched, raised, and harvested in the USA should be a simple pleasure that all shoppers can enjoy. To achieve this, we have worked to provide our shoppers with Empire Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts each and every day for a steal-of-a-deal: $6.99* per pound. Empire Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts are meaty and great tasting however you should chose to prepare them; baked in sauces, taken to the grill, broiled - whatever you desire! Made to satisfy kosher requirements, Empire Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts don't stop there; they provide us with premium chicken that was humanely raised on family farms with a vegetarian diet, no antibiotic treatment, no added growth hormones, minimally processed, and with no artificial ingredients sharing the label. With naturally raised Empire Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts as the tools in your arsenal, you can create any protein-packed dish you please ranging from a simple, elegantly roasted chicken breast and veggies or use it to doctor up pastas and salads galore! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Empire Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts
092615.name: Empire Kosher Bnl/Sknl Breast

093617.description: Somewhere between ready-made meals and from-scratch feasts, there lies a middle ground. This space is for the busy person who doesn't have time to do all the prep work, but who doesn't want to relinquish the cooking entirely. For these folks, there's Trader Joe's Pesto Chicken Breast. We've taken boneless, skinless Chicken Breast and sliced it scallopini style, then submerged it in a traditional Pesto made with basil, Parmesan, pine nuts, parsley, pepper, garlic, and extra virgin olive oil. This gloriously green marinade not only infuses the Chicken with irresistibly herby flavor; it helps tenderize it, too. Your part, should you choose to accept it: open the package and cook the contents. That's it. Pair the Pesto Chicken with a salad and some quinoa, rice, or Organic Striped Farfalline [sku 74547], and you've got dinner! Follow this simple plan, and despite your crazy schedule, you'll be crushing it-with just a little help from Trader Joe's. Pesto Chicken Breast
093617.name: Pesto Chicken Breast

020669.description: Cantaloupes are members of the cucurbit family of plants (Cucurbitaceae) that also includes cucumbers, pumpkins, squashes, gourds, and a long list of melons. They are great in salads, topped with seasoning, or added to dishes. It is important to wash and scrub cantaloupes before cutting and eating.
020669.name: Melon Cantaloupe

026276.description: - Trader Joe's organic navel oranges come from groves located in San Joaquin Valley, California which are tended to the finest standards. Picked at optimum harvest point, these are fresh, juicy, and perfect for enjoying a little bit of citrus sunshine especially during the winter months. 4lb size great for diet season juicing. Enjoy a burst of refreshing citrus on salads, or eaten out of hand.
026276.name: Orange Bag Navel 4Lb

036745.description: ¿ Growing area: Oxnard CA, Central CA, Baja CA, Mexico area. Product Info: Just 8 strawberries give you 140% of the Vitamin C you need each day. One of the major antioxidant vitamins, Vitamin C may protect against immune deficiencies, heart disease, cancer, inflammation, macular degeneration and aging of the skin. While strawberries lead the pack, blackberries, raspberries and blueberries are also all good sources of Vitamin C. Uses: Strawberries can be used in a variety of salads, appetizers, snacks, and beverages. Try slicing off the top layer of brie and layer sliced strawberries, slivered almond, and a drizzle of honey and serve with warm bread. Combine arugula with sliced strawberries, crumbled feta, pistachios, and finish with lemony vinaigrette. Handling/ Storage: Strawberries should be stored between 32°F and 36°F and kept at 90 to 95% humidity. The fruit should not be washed until it will be used. Shelf life can vary depending on how ripe the fruit was when harvested.
036745.name: R-Strawberries Organic 2Lb
036745.title: Organic Strawberries 2 Lb

039884.description: A symbol of hospitality, a tantalizing tropical fruit, a master marinator¿the pineapple has been called many things, but "easy to prepare" is not one of them. Trader Joe's Fresh Cut Pineapple solves this problem by packing 16 ounces of fresh cut, ready-to-eat, generously-sized chunks of pineapple into a handy reclosable tub. This sweet, brightly flavored fruit has a vivid yellow hue to match, making it an eye-catching addition to a fruit salad or upside-down cake. Its slight acidity and naturally-occurring enzyme content make it a tasty, tenderizing addition to a marinade for steak skewers. And its price of $3.49* per tub will have you reaching for a few of these convenient tubs of Fresh Cut Pineapple Chunks to get you through the week. Find them near our other fresh cut fruit and veggies. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Fresh Cut Pineapple Chunks
039884.name: R-Cut Fruit Pineapple Chunks 1
039884.title: Fresh Cut Pineapple Chunks

048053.description: About 25 years ago, our Top Banana (a.k.a. our CEO)-came across a long-time customer in our Sun City, Arizona store. After observing her pass on a pre-packaged bunch of bananas, he said, "Excuse me, ma'am, but why aren't you buying those bananas?" With the confidence of a customer who'd been around the banana-block, she shared with him that it would make her life much easier if we sold bananas individually, rather than in pre-packaged bunches. At her age, she explained, she wanted to take life one banana at a time. Well, we listened, and that's why Trader Joe's sells bananas one banana at a time. (You can hear him tell this story on the very first of episode of the Inside Trader Joe's Podcast.) Decades later, Bananas are still a tremendous value and a customer favorite product, every day, in every store. If you're one of the few still on the fence, may we suggest an experiment to determine your preferred banana preparation? Use them according to the color of the peel! Yellow bananas with green tips are excellent when deep-fried or added to curries; full-yellow bananas are great for slicing into cereal, fruit salads, or banana splits; and yellow & brown-speckled bananas are ideal for mashing into banana bread, pudding, pancakes... Bananas
048053.name: Banana Each
048053.title: Bananas

050968.description: Starfruit, or carambola, is a sweet and tangy fruit. Its edible skin has a waxy sheen and turns from green to yellow during the maturation process. The taste is similar to that of a tart apple when green, and turns sweeter when the fruit becomes yellow. Browning on the edges is a sign of ripeness. Starfruit gets its name from its star-shaped appearance when cut. The unique shape of the Starfruit makes for quite the conversation piece! The tasting panel loved the Starfruit and made delicious salsas! We included a salsa recipe for your culinary enjoyment! They are not only a great fruit to cook with, but perfect for garnishing on top of salads or as a topper to your favorite cocktail! Starfruit Kiwi Salsa Ingredients (Makes 3 cups) 3 Florida starfruit, seeded and diced 1 pear, diced, 2tbs lime juice, 2 tbs soy sauce, 2 kiwis skinned and diced Directions (Prep time: 20 mins) 1. In a small bowl, mix the lime juice and soy sauce. 2. In a small bowl, lightly toss the fruit ingredients. 3. Just before serving, add the lime and soy sauce and toss to coat.
050968.name: A-Starfruit Each

051316.description: - Trader Josie's come from groves located in San Joaquin Valley, California. A mandarin is a variety of the orange family. When the fruit was first exported from Asia, it was named "mandarin" referring to the bright orange robes worn by ancient Chinese court officials. AKA "Christmas Orange" for their popularity during the holidays. These gems are the perfect snack, great for lunches, kid friendly and a great addition to salads.
051316.name: Mandarin Bag Josie'S 2Lb
051316.title: Josie'S Mandarins

052590.description: The Florida organic Orlando Tangelo is one of Florida's fastest growing and popular varieties in the Sunshine State. It is a hybrid cross between a Florida Dancy Tangerine and a Duncan Grapefruit dating back to 1911 and was originally known as the Lake Tangelo. The size is slightly larger than traditional tangerines but typically smaller than oranges. The fruit has a nice orange color and is easy to peel with medium to low seeds. Great to section and eat, or use in salads. Many people juice them as well for their flavorful juice. Perfect size for lunch boxes too! Tangelos are very low in Saturated Fat, Cholesterol and Sodium. They're also a good source of Dietary Fiber and an excellent source of Folate and Vitamin C. One Medium Tangelo is about 60 calories. A perfect snack for diet season
052590.name: Tangelo Bag Org Orlando 3Lb

052688.description: If an apple a day keeps the doctor away (sorry, doctors), imagine what an Opal could do! Imagine it, a bright yellow gem of an apple, grown in eastern Washington, in fertile farmland near the crystal clear waters of the Snake River. A cross between Golden Delicious and Topaz apples, Opal Apples first appeared in 1999, but it wasn't until 2010 that they made their first appearance in the United States. Even now, years later, supply of these sunshine-yellow apples is so limited that Trader Joe's is one of the few retailers in the entire country where you will find them. What's so special about these pommes? They're enticingly sweet, pack serious crunch, and perhaps most miraculously, they are naturally resistant to browning when cut. What that means for you is that you can cut them up and serve them in a salad - no browning. You can slice them and add them to a lunchbox - no brown- ing. You can present wedges on a cheese tray - no browning. This makes them almost as appealing when cut as they are when left whole. Almost. We're selling conventionally grown Opal Apples for $1.19 each in our East Coast, Midwest, and Southeast store locations. In our Texas and West Coast stores, we're selling Organic Opal Apples for $1.29 each. Both are shining values ripe for the picking.
052688.name: Apple Each Opal

053210.description: Available for a woefully short stint during late summer, Fresh Figs are among the last truly seasonal produce items around, and, thus, their appearance is cause for unbridled enthusiasm. If you have yet to enjoy the simple beauty of a ripe fig, with just one bite, you'll understand why fervent fig fans are known to text one another in triumph at the first sighting of the season. Figs' delicate skins conceal a tender, soft pink flesh within that boasts a slightly jammy texture and mouthwatering, honeyed sweetness. Figs are natural foils for savory summer cheese boards, juicy burgers, and crisp salads. Their sweetness can be further concentrated when featured in baked goods. You can also capture their proverbial lightning-in-a-bottle essence and cook them down into a jam to enjoy all year long. However you choose to get your fig on, don't delay-the time is now, and the place is your neighborhood Trader Joe's! We're offering one-pound packages of Fresh Figs in our produce section, until the end of the season. Literally. Not fig-uratively. Fresh Figs
053210.name: Figs Fresh 1 Lb
053210.title: Fresh Figs

053378.description: Developed in New Zealand, Pacific Rose¿ is named for its rosy complexion and the ocean that surrounds the island nation of its birth. This pink beauty made its North American debut in 1996, when the first imports arrived. Washington State in commercial volumes, Pacific Rose¿ thrives in the rich, fertile soil of the Pacific Northwest and is delighting apple lovers everywhere. The distinctive rosy-red blush makes this apple too pretty to resist. A natural Gala/Splendour cross, Pacific Rose¿ gets its signature pink hue from Splendour (a heritage apple variety from New Zealand), and its unique taste profile combines both parents' flavors to perfection. Refreshing, sweet and crisp-Pacific Rose¿ is more than just good looks.
053378.name: Apple Bag Pacific Rose 2 Lb

054658.description: With a more complex taste, the Temple Orange peels easily to reveal, the juicer than a standard navel, plump segments. A tangy punch finishes each bite. This variety does have a shorter shelf-life, about 2 weeks tops from shipping to consumption. A cross between the mandarin orange and the sweet orange, it is believed to have come from the West Indies early in the 20th century to Florida, where it was named for William Chase Temple. Planted widely and advertised as the "Ten Dollar a Box Orange," the temple orange alarmed farmers of other, more costly oranges. This holds true to today at a retail of $1.99 for a 3lb bag, it's sure to get snapped up fast.
054658.name: Orange Bag Temple 3Lb

054806.description: The blood orange is a variety of orange with a crimson, blood- colored flesh. The fruit is typically smaller than an average orange and its skin can be pitted. The distinctive dark flesh color is due to the presence of anthocyanins, a family of pigments common to many flowers and fruit, but uncommon in citrus fruits. The degree of coloration depends on light, temperature and variety. Sometimes there is dark coloring on the exterior of the rind as well, depending on the variety of blood orange.
054806.name: Orange Bag Org Blood 1Lb

054991.description: Trader Joe's Fresh Cut Fruitful Medley is the fresh cut fruit embodiment of "the whole is greater than the sum of its parts"-but it's worth mentioning that its individual parts are pretty great, too! Juicy chunks of sweet cantaloupe, fragrant honeydew, and tropical pineapple commingle with plump, red grapes to create an array of fruit flavors that's ready to enjoy right out of its recloseable tub. This makes it unbelievably easy to incorporate more fruit into your daily diet, whether that means meticulous meal planning, or simply eating it right out of the aforementioned tub while standing in front of the refrigerator. We're offering 16-ounce tubs of this Fruitful Medley for $3.99*-an excellent value among the many available in our selection of fresh cut fruit & veggies. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Fresh Cut Fruitful Medley
054991.name: Cut Fruitful Medley 16 Oz
054991.title: Cut Fruit Medley Cantaloupe, Pineapple, Honeydew Melon, And Red Seedless Grapes

055555.description: The first Medjool palms came to the United States in 1927, when Walter Swingle, an American horticulturist rescued nine offshoots from Moroccan crops then threatened by disease. It is considered the oldest cultivated fruit, with evidence of its consumption by ancient cultures in the Middle East dating back to around 6,000 B.C. It was enjoyed exclusively by royalty and reserved for lavish celebrations, thus inspiring the titles "The King of Fruits" and "The Diamond of Fruits". The Medjool date is considered the premiere variety of dates. Its larger size, chewy texture, and decadently sweet flavor have made the Medjool prized above others for millenniums.
055555.name: Dates Medjool 16 Oz

055833.description: The pairing of words has never been more spot-on, Sugar + Crunch. Literally, this new variety of grapes is exactly that, Sugar Crunch -large globes of crunchy, sugary perfection. It is a premium variety over the standard Sugar One variety of green grapes, masterfully grown just for that very reason. This premium variety is vibrant green, seedless, and is super crunchy, a texture preferred with grapes. A sweet infusion to the daily offerings, they're available for a limited time.
055833.name: Grapes Sugar Crunch 2Lb

056910.description: The juiciest bite around¿ The Kanzi apple is full-flavored with perfect sweet-tart balance. It has a vibrant pinkish red color with a yellow blush. The aroma is as tempting as the flavor. It's a hybid of one of the most popular apple varieties, the Gala, and the Braeburn. It was first grown in Belgium and recently made its debut in the United States. 2lb Apple Tote bags are a great way to introduce exciting new varieties. The bag provides an enticing description of the apples.
056910.name: Apple Bag Kanzi 2 Lb

058040.description: Every summer, our California tree-fruit growers supply us with some of the best stone fruits we've ever tasted. This is an especially exciting arrival, one we long for during those times of the year when farm-fresh peaches are more fantasy than reality: two pounds of big, beautiful, flavorful Yellow Peaches packed in an easy-to-carry bag, for an excellent price. These Yellow Peaches are shipped to our stores very cold, so they stay as fresh as possible. This keeps the fruit firm-don't make the mistake of thinking the fruit isn't ripe. It's really ripe. Just leave it out at room temperature for 24-36 hours to let the fruit soften and allow the bright aromas to shine through. We promise it's worth the wait. Use these Peaches for pies, cobblers, smoothies, and salads, or throw them on the grill for a super-simple summer dessert. Enjoy them often, while they last. Yellow Peaches
058040.name: Peaches Yellow 2 Lb
058040.title: Yellow Peaches

058248.description: Apples are often the objects of envy in the larger fruit community. Bananas can't imagine what it'd be like to pos- sess such crispness. Oranges are jealous of the apple's milder acidity. Grapes feel insecure about their size, even next to the smallest of crab apples. But there is one apple varietal in particular that has even the other apples coveting: It's the Envy¿ Apple, and we're stocking it now at Trader Joe's. Indeed, there is much to envy of the Envy¿ Apple¿ beautiful rosy-red skin; lots of crispness and crunch; loads of full, sweet flavor; flesh that remains white, even after being cut. The Envy¿ Apple, originally cultivated in Hawke's Bay, New Zealand, is a cross between a Braeburn and a Royal Gala. Officially patented in 2009, it's non- GMO, and naturally stores well; making for a fresher apple, by the time it makes its way to your mouth. Recently, there's been quite a customer-clamor for these Apples, which also serves to stoke the jealousy of the other fruits. While we're not ones to intentionally stir up envy, we are compelled to stock up on Envy¿ to provide these enjoyable, enviable Apples to our deserving customers. We're now selling Envy¿ Apples for $1.29 each. 06.13. 16
058248.name: Apple Each Envy

059186.description: While "Awe how cute!" was our first reaction to the 8.8oz Baby Banana Bag, we quickly realized how perfect these would look in a lunch box, or snack for kids-of-all- ages. These are a great back-to-school Opportunity Buy and will be available only for a few weeks. The Baby Banana, aptly named for its mini stature, is a sweeter variety of banana. This is due to the higher starch content which turns into sugar. The Baby Banana is sold in a 8.8oz Bag. It's important to note these bananas ripen in the bag. It is best to eat the Baby Banana when it's fully yellow. Please do not refer to your standard Banana color charts for this specialty item.
059186.name: Banana Bag Baby 8.8Oz

059817.description: Every year-and-a-half, a pineapple is born. Sounds dramatic, but that's really how long it takes for an Ananas comosus plant to grow this spiky, juicy, yellow-fleshed fruit (which is technically 100 -200 fused "fruitlets"). But you know what they say: all good things take time. And pineapples are most certainly good things. Finding the perfect pineapple can be somewhat of a treasure hunt, but at Trader Joe's, you'll strike gold every time. Grown for us in Costa Rica, our Pineapples are harvested at the peak of ripeness, when the golden fruit is heavy with bright, sweet-tart juice. To really unlock the Pineapple's potential, peel it, core it, and slice it into rounds, spears or chunks. Then serve those slices alone, in a fruit salad, in a smoothie, in a cocktail, blended with yogurt, etc. Pineapple also happens to be one of those fruits that's delicious fresh and cooked, so don't be afraid to grill or broil those slices. Or to add them to a pizza-if that's what floats your boat, never mind the naysayers! We're selling large, whole Pineapples for $2.99 each. You'll find these good-sized, golden-hued beauties in our fresh produce section.
059817.name: Pineapple Each

059839.description: Papayas have a lot of health benefits, and are one of our most popular tropical fruits. The organic Formosa Papaya variety is a yellow-skinned, red-fleshed fruit, with a sweet tropical flavor and a mild fruity aroma. They are ready to eat when the skin is a smooth yellow color, and it gives to gentle pressure.
059839.name: Papaya Each Org

059840.description: Our category leader came across this small but mighty melon on a vendor visit. Although quite small, the Bonsai melon packs a lot of flavor! Bonsai is descended from the French Charentais melon, a version of European cantaloupe related to the Tuscan Cantaloupe that is known for its sweet flesh and delicious aroma. The Bonsai has all of the flavor and aroma, but in a smaller size! The Bonsai is ready to eat when there is a slight give on the stem end and it gives off its signature fragrance.
059840.name: Melon Bonsai

059881.description: You know what they say-when life hands you lemons, make lemonade¿ and when life hands you a 1-lb bag of Trader Joe's Organic Lemons, you can make all kinds of things-tangy lemon salad dressing, lemon-y grilled chicken, lemon ricotta pancakes, lemon simple syrup for cocktails...you can even add lemon juice to a sugar scrub for a hit of energizing citrus aroma! Our Organic Lemons are grown for us in the U.S.A. and Mexico-the location varies depending on the season. The varieties in the bag vary throughout the year, but they'll always be juicy, tangy and full of flavor, with vibrant yellow peels and a fresh, citrusy aroma. At $1.69-$1.99 per bag (price varies by region), this is an impressive value on organic fruit that you won't want to pass up. You'll find them with our other citrus fruit.
059881.name: Lemon Bag Org 1Lb

061959.description: You've likely been introduced to regular Thompson Seedless Grapes-but have you met their Sweet Baby siblings? If not, we're here to make the introduction! Sweet Baby Thompsons are essentially regular Thompsons that have grown on ungirdled grapevines. Girdling is the practice of carving out a thin ring of bark around the main vine trunk, effectively preventing water and nutrients from traveling back down the plant to the roots-while still allowing water to rise from the roots to the fruit, up through the center artery of the tree. Girdled vines cause grapes to retain more water, producing larger, less sweet fruit. But since Sweet Baby Thompsons grow as nature intended on uncut vines (probably why this variety is also called "Natural Thompson Grapes"), they don't swell as much with excess water, thus remaining smaller-and also wonderfully sweet! Our Sweet Baby Thompsons are grown in California and we're selling a one-pound pack for $2.49. It's a really grape deal.
061959.name: Grapes Sweet Baby Thompson Sdless 1Lb
061959.title: Sweet Baby Thompson Seedless Grapes

064778.description: If you're a fan of dates, you're going to love Trader Joe's Organic Pitted Medjool Dates. And, if you're not date- fan, all the wonderful qualities of these just might make you a convert. These Dates are grown organically in the Coachella Valley of Southern California. They are characteristic of the best Medjools, since we've only selected dates that are large in size (about two inches long) with very little loose skin. Each one is pitted by hand, ensuring that we deliver a snack-ready gem that is as beautiful to behold, as it is easy to eat. And since a pit accounts for 6% to 10% of a date's weight, you're getting more for your money with our Pitted Medjools. We're selling each 12-ounce package of Organic Pitted Medjool Dates for $4.99*. They're available every day in our produce section, so you can never be late for these very important Dates! *Prices may change. Please check QIL to confirm most up-to-date price before creating signage. Organic Pitted Medjool Dates
064778.name: R-Dates Pitted Organic Medjool
064778.title: Organic Pitted Medjool Dates

066061.description: The smooth, buttery texture of a ripe avocado is pretty irresistible to us. We think the avocado is one of nature's most perfect foods.
