What a simple bag of Trader Joe's Organic Supersweet Cut Corn can do. And its price of just $1.79* a bag will have you stocking your freezer. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Supersweet Cut Corn
029963.name: Corn Super Sweet Cut Organic
029963.title: Organic Super Sweet Cut Corn

037944.description: Often thought of as vegetables, artichokes are actually the flower buds of a large, perennial thistle plant that produces bright purple flowers. If you have the patience to pull apart the artichoke's thorny outer leaves, you are rewarded with the tender "heart." We're willing to wager that patience is a virtue many of us lack - we know we have a habit of being hasty. Thankfully, you have easy access to Trader Joe's Artichoke Hearts in a frozen bag. They're cooked, peeled, cleaned, cut and ready to use artichokes from Peru. No patience required. The benefit of frozen artichokes is that you can take what you need and save the rest for later. When you're ready, toss these Hearts into pasta or salads. Use them as a pizza topping. Blend them into dips. Marinate them in olive oil and herbs and serve them on an antipasto platter for a summertime cookout. All in minutes, with no pulling, peeling or cutting. And with no pain to your pocketbook, either. We're selling each 12-ounce bag for $3.29*, every day. We heart value. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Artichoke Hearts
037944.name: Fzn Artichoke Hearts

044180.description: In need of a quick veggie side dish or entreé? Something with a blend of vibrant vegetables and a downright delicious sauce to go with it? Have we got the dish for you. Trader Joe's Asian Vegetables with Beijing Style Soy Sauce is a colorful mixture of sugar snap peas, broccoli, baby corn, petite green beans, water chestnuts, red bell peppers, carrots and Kikurage mushrooms. The mixture cooks quickly, so the vegetables stay firm and retain their bright colors. The soy-based sauce comes in a separate packet so you can add it at the last minute to achieve that intriguing flavor profile. This stir fry is a great all-vegetable entrée, or you can make a heartier meal out of it by serving it as a side with our Bool Kogi [sku 79354/71476] or alongside our Chicken Cilantro Mini Wontons [sku 99085]. The vegetable mix is naturally fat free and is prepared for us with no artificial flavors. We're selling each 16-ounce package for the excellent price of $2.99*, every day. You'll find it in our freezers. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Asian Vegetables with Beijing Style Soy Sauce
044180.name: Asian Style Vegetables With Stir Fry Sauce

049663.description: Peas were among the earliest vegetables (although, technically, they are legumes) to be frozen - around the 1920s. For that, we rejoice. Promptly after picking, peas are known to deteriorate in a matter of hours versus days. Quick freezing preserves their tender sweetness and extends the pleasure of peas. Our Organic Peas are grown in various regions (U.S., Belgium, Holland, Denmark, or Italy) depending on peak pea harvest and production, then expertly picked, shelled, blanched, and quickly flash frozen. To capture only the most crisp, sweet, and tender peas, they are graded using a small sieve. The result - garden-fresh tasting and tender peas ready to pick up from our freezers. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Peas
049663.name: Fzn Organic Peas

051063.description: If you've ever gone out to a restaurant that specializes in sushi, chances are you've been served a bowl of edamame as an appetizer. There's a good reason for that: the relative simplicity and mild nuttiness of lightly cooked soy beans make them an ideal amuse bouche to the vivid flavors of sushi and sashimi. Of course, those very same qualities also make them an ideal addition to salads, soups, and stir-fries, and a superb standalone snack, too. That's why we offer Trader Joe's Lightly Salted Edamame, so you can enjoy edamame in any situation you want - not just when you're able to make the trek to the sushi bar. Hand-picked in Southeast Asia, our supplier prepares each pod by giving them a light sprinkling of salt, then blanching until it's just done, and finally flash freezing them to retain their snappy, semi-firm texture. Once thawed, our Edamame is totally ready to serve on its own, but there's plenty you can do to enhance it, if you're so inclined: try heating things up with a dash of chili powder, poured directly over the pods: you'll get a nice, but not overwhelming, bit of spice as you squeeze the beans directly into your mouth. Or, you can shell the beans and add them to fried rice, succotash, or pasta. No matter how you enjoy them, you're in for a treat - and an impressive nine grams of protein per serving, to boot. We're selling 16-ounce bags of Trader Joe's Lightly Salted Edamame for the out-of-this-world price of $1.99. You'll find them in our freezers.
051063.name: Edamame With Salt
051063.title: Salted Edamame Fully Cooked Soybeans In Pod

051759.description: We'd like to think that if Trader Joe's was around in prehistoric times, our fearless Crew would have func- tioned as the front-lines fungi-eaters-those culinary cavemen (and women) who risked their lives tracking down the tastiest and least toxic toadstools. These days our lives may not be at stake, but we are just as pas- sionate about yummy fungi as our imaginary prehistoric counterparts would have been. If there's any ques- tion, Trader Joe's Mushroom Medley should settle the debate! Our Italian supplier is situated in the shadow of the Dolomites of northeastern Italy, where foraging for wild mushrooms is an age-old practice. The Medley comprises four favorite mushroom varieties-Champignon, Oyster, Boletus, and Slippery Jack-all sautéed together with garlic and parsley. The cooked batch is quick- frozen in pieces, ensuring lovely, light-brown colors and firm, but not fibrous, textures upon re-heating. Three to five minutes on the stovetop or in the microwave is all it takes to deliver a hot and flavorful portion. Try it atop your favorite pizza or burger. For quicker Chicken Marsala, add this mushroom blend to breasts that have been browned in butter and poached in Marsala wine. Or, why not serve these 'shrooms with po- lenta and sausage, as is traditional in the region from which these tender toadstools stem. You get all this marvelous mushroomery and culinary versatility for the near pre-historic price of $3.99 per 12-ounce bag! No treacherous foraging or dangerous tasting required.
051759.name: Veg Mushroom Medley

053155.description: Trader Joe's Roasted Corn is grown in the sunny valleys of Washington State and harvested at the peak of ripeness. It's then roasted over an open flame, adding a smoky dimension to the corn's natural sweetness. After roasting, the corn is individually quick frozen to ensure freshness and allow you to use what you like now and save the rest for another time. If you're looking for a versatile side dish, our Roasted Corn may just fit the bill. The corn is great by itself and fits great with a variety of other combinations, especially in ethnic dishes. Once cooked, toss the amount of Corn you would like to use for a Mexican-style salad with Organic Black Beans [sku 50262], quinoa, cilantro, topped with sweet peppers, onions, avocado and creamy, Cilantro Dressing [sku 36420] with crumbled cotija cheese. The Corn makes for a delicious Elote in a cup, also known as Esquites. Just like you would on a corn on the cob, add Real Mayonnaise [sku 01482], grated Cotija Cheese [sku 65005], chili powder, and a Trader Joe's touch with our crushed Elote Chips [sku 60564]. You'll find each 16-ounce bag of Trader Joe's Roasted Corn in our freezers. *Please check QIL to confirm current Roasted Corn
053155.name: Roasted Corn

054241.description: The Italian supplier who makes our Grilled Cauliflower [sku 54482] (non-organic) also makes a number of organic cauliflower products. In the process, they end up with lots of left over florets and trim. Rather than waste these perfectly good organic vegetables, we put our heads together and came up with a new product made from this extra cauliflower... but we wouldn't describe our new Organic Riced Cauliflower as "leftovers." With some restaurants now serving what they're calling "cauliflower couscous," many people have been attempting to make their own version at home. This is certainly doable, but it's difficult if you only have a cheese- grater. And even with a food processor on hand, it can be time consuming. Thankfully, we've done the work for you, grating this 100% Organic Cauliflower to a couscous-like consistency, so you can focus your brainpower on what to serve with it! Pour some frozen Organic Riced Cauliflower into a non-stick pan and heat it over medium heat, just until any residual water has cooked off. After that, the sky's the limit¿ Mix it with fresh-chopped cilantro and a squeeze of lime for Baja-style "rice." Top it with spicy curry or beef bourguignon. Serve it with Kung Pao Chicken or in a burrito with black beans and cheddar cheese. Make a low-carbs "risotto" by sautéing onions in olive oil and white wine, and then reducing the mixture before adding in your Riced Cauliflower. Heat until it reaches the desired consistency and finish with grated parmesan cheese and butter. The only thing "leftover" about Trader Giotto's Organic Riced Cauliflower will be the wad of change you hold in your hand after only paying $1.99 for the twelve-ounce bag. 5.27.1 5
054241.name: Organic Riced Cauliflower

054278.description: Roman farmers called broccoli "the five green fingers of Jupiter." Why? We don't really know, but we sure think it sounds awe-inspiring. It's broccoli, after all, and there really is nothing quite like it. Except, of course, for Brussels sprouts, cabbage, cauliflower, kohlrabi, and kale, as all of these vegetables descend from the same Brassica oleracea, also known as wild mustard. Broccoli specifically was selectively cultivated from the flowers and stems. Getting back to the point, there is something incredibly compelling about broccoli. And we sell a lot of it. Take, for instance, our frozen Organic Broccoli Florets. Organically grown, trimmed, washed, and ready to use, these quality florets add valuable culinary convenience. Thaw and toss with olive oil, salt, pepper, and a bit of Parmesan cheese, then roast them in the oven for about 10-15 minutes. Toss them in with our Kung Pao Tempura Cauliflower [sku 55739] to add a bit of green. Or include them in omelets or stir-frys. All it takes is your five fingers to get cooking with our Organic Broccoli Florets, and we are over the Jupiter for it! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Broccoli Florets
054278.name: Fzn Organic Broccoli Florets

055879.description: Trader Joe's Organic Chopped Spinach packs a double punch - superior nutrition and great taste. It also has the distinction of being grown in rich, fertile soil without the use of chemicals. We work directly with farmers who harvest the spinach by hand, ensuring that only healthy spinach leaves are picked and brought into the production facility. The end result of this process (other than a healthier eco-system) is super-fresh spinach, picked at precisely the right moment, then washed, cut, blanched, frozen and packed in less than 24 hours, preserving all the color, flavor and goodness of fresh-from-the-field greens. We think it's so fresh tasting that you'd really have to go out and pick it yourself to get fresher spinach. But really, why do that when ours is right there in our freezers¿ Trader Joe's Organic Chopped Spinach is excellent for omelets or frittatas and brings a big burst of color - and fresh flavor - into dips and casseroles. We're selling each 16 ounce bag for the big value price of $1.99*. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Chopped Spinach
055879.name: Fzn Organic Spinach
055879.title: Trader Joe'S Organic Chopped Spinach

059065.description: Although mashed potatoes are considered a culinary sidekick, it's difficult to deny how crucial they are to their pairing partners. Where, for example, would bangers be without mash? And the Thanksgiving turkey without mashed potatoes? Unthinkable. If you're looking to lessen the nutritional impact that accompanies said side dish, however, it can be tough to find a creamy replacement that stands up to the might of the mashed potato on a dinner plate. Enter Trader Joe's Mashed Cauliflower. To give this dish dimension, our supplier utilizes not one, but two different cuts of cauliflower-in fact, cauliflower accounts for more than 70% of the recipe! Blanched cauliflower bits are simmered with skim milk, half & half and butter for creaminess, and then rice flour, garlic, salt and pepper are added to create a velvety purée. Finally, larger chunks of cauliflower florets are added to give this Mash toothsome texture. When the mixture has cooled, it's punctiliously portioned into petite pucks, so you can prepare what you need when you need it, and save the rest for later. Mashtastic! Serve Mashed Cauliflower alongside a hot-off-the-grill, bone-in ribeye steak. Pair it with Green Jackfruit [sku 58772] simmered in TJ's Kansas City BBQ Sauce [sku 31314]. With just 50 calories, two grams of fat and seven grams of carbs per one-cup serving, it makes for a low-impact-yet flavorful-savory side dish. We're selling 16-ounce bags of Trader Joe's Mashed Cauliflower for the mashtastic price of $2.99, everyday. You'll find them in our freezer case. 05.15. 17
059065.name: Mashed Cauliflower

060024.description: While there's a certain satisfaction that comes from cooking a meal from scratch, there's equal enjoyment when something tastes like it was made from scratch, but cooks in a fraction of the time. The plethora of meal options in our freezer cases is a testament to this convergence of convenience and enjoyment-why stand over a hot stove or cutting board (and later, the kitchen sink) when you have tasty, pre-prepped meal components, ready to heat and eat at a moment's notice? Trader Joe's Riced Cauliflower Stir Fry is the newest addition to our user-friendly frozen lineup. A boon to the home cook, it starts with a base of blanched, toothsome cauliflower crumbles seasoned with savory tamari sauce and nutty sesame oil. Green peas, red bell peppers, grilled corn, and spring onions are added for fresh, vegetal flavor and vibrant color. On top of its careful composition, this veggie-party-in-a-bag offers impressive nutrition to boot, with just 50 calories, two grams of fat and seven grams of carbs in a one-cup serving. Were you to create this dish from scratch, you'd be looking at close to an hour of prep & cook time. With a bag of this Stir Fry in hand, however, you're mere minutes away from a filling, flavorful side dish. Simply heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a non-stick skillet, add stir fry and cook until warmed through, 6 to 7 minutes. Top with the cooked protein of your choice, and that side dish becomes a hearty meal (we especially like it topped with a fried egg, sliced avocado and a generous squirt of Sriracha Sauce). We're offering 16-ounce bags of Trader Joe's Riced Cauliflower Stir Fry for the WOW price of $2.99, everyday. You'll find them in our freezers. 08.28. 17
060024.name: Riced Cauliflower Stir-Fry
060024.title: Riced Cauliflower Stir Fry

060987.description: In Greek Mythology, the rainbow is considered to be the path between Earth and heaven. In a similar fashion, Trader Joe's mythology dictates that Roasted Rainbow Potatoes are considered to be the path between heaven and the perfect holiday dinner plate. Roasted Rainbow Potatoes are seasonal sensations whose colorful array and earthy tastiness exceed all potato prophecies. Grown and hand-harvested in France, Trader Joe's Roasted Rainbow Potatoes add a beautiful burst of bright fall colors to your table. A mix of earthy yellow, red, and blue-hued potatoes are drizzled with extra virgin olive oil and sprinkled with a blend of oregano, thyme, rosemary, and basil. Rich and robust in flavor, these Roasted wedges are sure to be a standout seasonal favorite. Roasted Rainbow Potatoes are pre-cooked and pre-seasoned-so by the time you're ready to make dinner all you have to do is pop 'em in the oven. Little adornment is needed-add a drizzle of TJ's Spanish Extra Virgin Olive Oil [sku 98485] or a pinch of salt and pepper. Serve as a radiant side dish with your holiday dinner or pair them with Colorful Carrot Coins [sku 60988] for a vibrant root veggie masterpiece on your Thanksgiving table. Oh, the possibilities! There might not be gold at the end of this rainbow, but who needs gold when you have potatoes? We're selling a 16-ounce package of Roasted Rainbow Potatoes for $2.99. 10.30 .17 OCT. - DEC.
060987.name: Potatoes Roasted Rainbow
060987.title: Roasted Rainbow Potatoes

063160.description: As any chef (amateur or professional) will tell you, it's always handy to have a variety of herbs, spices, and other essential seasoning ingredients at the ready when you're cooking. Dorot® Gardens has taken this to heart, making a name for themselves as a purveyor of frozen, prepared, & pre-portioned herbs. Their Crushed Garlic [sku 38411] is a customer favorite, and after endless requests, we've added a hotly anticipated newbie to the lineup: Crushed Ginger. Based in Israel, Dorot® grows and harvests their Ginger themselves. Like the rest of the product line, the ginger is processed and flash-frozen into convenient, freezer-ready trays within 90 minutes of harvest. And these trademark trays are impossibly convenient, as they allow you to use the cubes one at a time, only as you need them. (Picture a teeny-tiny ice tray, where each one-teaspoon slot is filled with gluten free, kosher-certified, crushed ginger...) Add a cube of Dorot® Crushed Ginger to a delicious stir-fry. Use them to liven up baked goods, soups, sauces, marinades, and more. Blend one in your morning smoothie, afternoon lemonade, or 5-o'clock cocktail. Under the weather? Dissolve a cube in a mug of hot tea before bed! You'll get so much mileage out of these Ginger cubes that you'd be wise to keep a tray in your freezer at all times. Ginger at-the-ready. We're selling each 2.5-ounce tray of Dorot® Gardens Crushed Ginger (20 cubes per tray) for $2.29-that's over a dollar less than you'll find elsewhere, which is something we're quite proud of. You'll find them in our freezers. 07.09. 18
063160.name: Herbs Ginger Dorot

066031.description: Ah, cauliflower. Is there anything this cruciferous wonder can't do? It's certainly a tasty alternative to some of its more carb-heavy comrades-which is precisely why we've skipped the potatoes and made Cauliflower Tots the base of this traditional-with-a-twist TJ's Casserole. Each cheesy, creamy, craveable TJ's Cauliflower Tot Casserole is made with firm & tasty Tots (made from cauliflower, of course), shredded Cheddar cheese, chopped green onions, & a special seasoning blend, all bound together in a sour cream & béchamel sauce. One cheesy, creamy bite, and you'll be a cauli-convert, too! We're selling each one-pound TJ's Cauliflower Tot Casserole for $5.99, available in our freezers for a limited time.
066031.name: Cauliflower Tot Casserole Golden Cauliflower Tots With Creamy Bã©Chamel Sauce And Shredded Cheddar Cheese

069856.description: Cauliflower has become a stand-out stand-in for all kinds of carb-laden products-pizza (think: TJ's Cauliflower Pizza Crust), pasta (TJ's Cauliflower Gnocchi), rice (TJ's Organic Riced Cauliflower), potatoes (TJ's Mashed Cauliflower, TJ's Cauliflower Pancakes, etc.), and even tortillas (TJ's Cauliflower Thins)... And since the country's cauli-craze shows no signs of slowing down, so neither will we! Seasoned with a blend of cumin, cayenne, and lime and flavored with tomato concentrate, Trader Joe's Spicy Mexican-Style Riced Cauliflower delivers all the flavors you'd want in a Mexican-inspired dish. We also add diced tomatoes, tri-colored bell peppers (red, yellow, and green), and pickled jalapeños for some good crunch & kick. It makes a scrumptious side dish or a bomb-diggity base for a burrito bowl, and at just 50 calories, 2.5g of fat, and 5g of carbs per one-cup serving, it's a nutritional bargain. It's also a literal bargain-we're selling one-pound bags of Trader Joe's Spicy Mexican-Style Riced Cauliflower for $2.99* each. Find them in our freezers today! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Spicy Mexican-Style Riced Cauliflower
069856.name: Cauliflower Riced Mexican Style
069856.title: Mexican-Style Riced Cauliflower

070700.description: Let's talk texture for a moment, because, frankly, texture can make or break a dish. Case in point: Brussels sprouts. Back when most people tended to prepare them by boiling them, Brussels sprouts had a general reputation for being mushy and unpleasant - and frozen Brussels sprouts fared even worse. It was only after crispy, roasted and skillet-fried Brussels sprouts proliferated in restaurants nationwide that this brassica's star began to rise again. Working hand in hand with a trusted supplier in France, we set out to capture that same satisfyingly crisp texture in a frozen format, and we're proud to say that Trader Joe's Roasted Seasoned Brussels Sprouts passes the textural test with flying colors. It turns out the secret is deceptively simple: our supplier slices the Sprouts in half, roasts them to a fine, toothsome texture, then individually flash freezes them at the height of crispness before adding a suite of savory seasonings including garlic, parmesan, olive oil, salt, and pepper. With all that prep out of the way, effectively all that's separating you and this hearty side is heating it back up, either in the skillet or in the oven. After that, they make a prime, steakhouse-style side for practically any protein. We find that they make a compellingly convenient component for weekly meal prepping, too. Boy, what a difference a bit of texture makes! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Roasted Seasoned Brussels Sprouts
070700.name: Brussels Sprouts Roasted Seasoned
070700.title: Roasted Seasoned Brussels Sprouts With Parmesan Cheese

073466.description: Call us corny if you must, but we've always been big fans of corn on the cob. Not just on a culinary level either- we've always found the act of eating corn on the cob to be a lot of fun, in and of itself. So when we found out there was a way to make that treasured activity even more fun (and even more delicious, to boot!), we jumped at the opportunity (and for joy) to bring in Trader Joe's Seasoned Corn Ribs to our freezers. Made with plant- based butter and just the right amount of salt, these deliciously buttery, and decidedly vegan "Ribs" are as corny as you can get, in all the best ways. They're made for us by a supplier in Italy, who slices cobs of corn into quarters and then lightly cooks them until they naturally take on a slightly curved, barbecued rib-like shape. After that, they season them with salt and an olive oil and cocoa butter-based vegan butter, before flash freezing them and sending them our way. They can be prepared in a manner of minutes in your microwave, or a little longer in the oven or air fryer, and make a fantastic plant-based side for all kinds of fare, barbecue or otherwise. For some extra flavor and elotes- inspired fun, try customizing them with lime juice, chili powder, and Cotija [sku 65005] just prior to serving. Seasoned Corn Ribs
073466.name: Corn Ribs Seasoned Vegan & Gluten Free
073466.title: Seasoned Corn Ribs

073594.description: We've got quite a cache of prominant potato products populating our freezers at present. From fries to hashbrowns to tots, we've got tubers totally covered¿ or so we thought. Recently, after a trip to a favorite fast-food joint, our Buyer was struck by a spud-tacular realization: we. need. Waffle. Cut. Fries. So, she reached out to the Italian supplier of our revered Roasted Potatoes, Peppers & Onions [sku 55969], and the rest is French-fried history. Allow us to introduce the latest tater on the block: Trader Joe's Seasoned Waffle Cut Fries. Our supplier starts with sliced potatoes, then gives said slices that wonderful Waffle Cut. We can't share the top-secret technology behind this marvel of geometry (a spud never reveals its secrets), but we can say that the cut itself adds a certain je ne sais quoi to the overall fry-eating experience. Next, these waffle-like potatoes are coated in a flour-based batter, fried in vegetable oil, and, finally, seasoned with a blend of salt, paprika, black pepper, yeast extract, and garlic, onion & chili powders. (Bonus: there's seasoning in the batter, too!) Whether you bake them in the oven or crisp them in the air-fryer, enjoy them solo or dip 'em in your favorite sauce¿ Trader Joe's Seasoned Waffle Cut Fries are where it's at. So don't wait, don't waiver, and don't waffle- grab a bag at your neighborhood TJ's today! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Seasoned Waffle Cut Fries
073594.name: Fries Seasoned Waffle Cut Potato
073594.title: Seasoned Waffle Cut Fries

074158.description: Creamy, buttery, luscious potatoes. No washing. No peeling. No mashing. No, really! Trader Joe's Mashed Potatoes are prepped for your time-saving convenience and the entire bag can be heated in the microwave or stovetop in under 10 minutes. But what if you don't want to heat the whole bag at once? No problem! These Mashed Potatoes have been frozen and portioned into little cylinders, making it easy to prepare as much or as little as you'd like. And when it comes to the ingredients-potatoes, milk, butter, and salt-that's it. Our Mashed Potatoes are made with the same, simple ingredients you'd use if you made them from scratch. While our Mashed Potatoes make an ultra-comforting side dish on their own, if you want to add some oomph, they present an exemplary canvas for a variety of toppings. Turkey Flavored Gravy [sku 93173] is a classic, and a pat of Salted Butter [sku 6252] can never be beat. Gourmet Fried Onion Pieces [sku 28909] add a pleasant crunch and pop of umami to every bite. And a light drizzle of Fresh Cranberry Orange Relish [sku 34244] offers a surprisingly citric element that is both completely unexpected and absolutely yummy. Mashed Potatoes
074158.name: Potatoes Mashed
074158.title: Mashed Potatoes

074892.description: Are you in a perpetual state of trying to figure out what's for dinner? Us, too. Our latest frozen fare is a simple, ultra-versatile, heat-and-eat side that packs a big punch of flavor, making it our new go-to building block for weekday meals. Introducing, Trader Joe's Stir Fried Garlicky Cabbage. Inspired by the Thai dish, Galam Plee Pad Nam Pla-a simple stir-fry of cabbage, a whole lot of garlic, and fish sauce-our version is deliciously similar, but instead of fish sauce, we season the cabbage with a vegan stir-fry sauce made with yeast extract and kombu. It imparts a similar umami boost that fish sauce usually brings to dishes, without the fish! Ready in under 10 minutes, you can heat it up in the microwave or on the stovetop. And because it's easy to prepare, we think it will solve your "what's for breakfast and lunch?" quandary, too. Try topping the Cabbage with a fried egg for breakfast or toss it with rice for a quick lunch. It goes splendidly with a variety of proteins and makes a grand addition to soups. If you're feeling particularly ambitious, try our Stir Fried Garlicky Cabbage as an easy filling for homemade dumplings. Stir Fried Garlicky Cabbage
074892.name: Stir Fry Cabbage Garlicky
074892.title: Stir Fried Garlicky Cabbage

076298.description: Side-dish ideas are sometimes put on the back burner while we spend the majority of our menu-planning on main dishes. Thankfully, your neighborhood Trader Joe's offers scores of sides that are both delicious and ready to enjoy in just minutes-no planning required. Trader Joe's Garlic Shiitake Green Beans is an excellent example. Our supplier in Thailand, who also makes our Lightly Salted Edamame [sku 51063], knows a thing or two about preparing high-quality, frozen legumes. In this case, they start with Thai-grown green beans, par-cook them, and season them with a seriously umami-licious, soy-based sauce that's amped up with garlic & shiitake mushrooms. The dish is flash-frozen, packaged, and delivered to our stores, where you can pick it up any day of the week. Getting these Garlic Shiitake Green Beans ready for their supporting supper role is a swift, five-minute affair. It requires just a quick sauté & steam on the stovetop-or a handful of microwave minutes. The still-firm beans, with their garlic-forward flavor and delicious mushroom undertones, pair well with Trader Joe's Beef Bulgogi [sku 75283] and your favorite TJ's rice... but there are many more mains that would be happy to call this savory bean dish their sidekick! Garlic Shiitake Green Beans
076298.name: Green Beans Garlic Shiitake
076298.title: Garlic Shiitake Green Beans

090867.description: After months of searching and vetting (because it's only the best for our customers), we've found the perfect, Belgium-based vendor to supply us with a product that our customers have sorely missed since it temporarily left our freezers last year: Trader Joe's Organic Foursome Vegetable Medley. Now here is a vegetable medley that transcends the ordinary in every way. Not content to offer the usual veggie blends you can find just about anywhere, we set out to put together extraordinary vegetables that you and your family can enjoy every day. Our Organic Foursome is a blend of super sweet corn, green peas, julienne-sliced carrots and green beans- all organic, all wonderfully fresh-tasting. Trader Joe's Organic Foursome is the kind of vegetable blend you can serve to even the pickiest kids without fear that they'll turn away in defiance-there's something there for everyone, right? It's also flavorful enough that you'll want to enjoy it with them. Of course, you can serve these veggies just as they are and be quite pleased with the results. You could also mix things up a bit. Add them to a pasta salad, toss them into fried rice in a wok or skillet, or build a vegetarian village-we're picturing buildings made of corn and colorful little people made of green beans (body), peas (head) and carrots (arms & legs). Okay, it was just a suggestion. We're selling each 16-ounce bag of Trader Joe's Organic Foursome Vegetable Medley for a mere $1.99, every day. You'll find it in our freezers. 07.31. 17
090867.name: Foursome Organic Vegetable Medley
090867.title: Organic Foursome Vegetable Medley A Medley Of Organic Supersweet Corn, Green Peas, Julienned Carrots & Green Beans

092157.description: Nowadays, Sweet Potato Frites are ubiquitous (okay, sure, most folks call them fries); from gastropubs to fast food joints, and yes, grocery store freezer cases. When we first introduced them, however, they were much less common - so uncommon in fact, that there were some that called us foolhardy (that can happen). We do like a good risk, yet questions remained: Would the traditionalists bite? Would the non-fry folks even consider entering the fry fray? Years on, we have our unequivocal answers: yes and yes! We won't attempt to take credit for any kind of trend-setting here, but we will boast of having the best sweet potato fries you can get out of a freezer (and it's worth noting, most of the sweet potato fries you've had in restaurants have come from the freezer, too). Trader Joe's Sweet Potato Frites are bright, golden-orange spears of sweet potato with the skins removed. They're steam blanched and par-fried before being frozen, so they retain their fresh flavor and vibrant color. They bake to a crisp exterior that yields to a creamy-yet-still-slightly-firm interior. They're mildly sweet (naturally), excellent with all kinds of dips - ketchup, mustard, ranch, sriracha, barbecue sauce, mayo, chili sauce¿ We're selling each 15 ounce bag of Sweet Potato Frites for $1.99, every day, a terrific value you'll find only at your neighborhood Trader Joe's. They're in our freezers.
092157.name: Fries Sweet Potato
092157.title: Sweet Potato Fries

093346.description: Way back in 1275, a Buddhist priest wrote a thank-you note to a parishioner for a gift left at the temple. What was this gift? Edamame! Edamame has been gaining popularity ever since. If Trader Joe's had been around in 13th century Japan, we're pretty sure our fully-cooked Shelled Edamame would have been a hit. Edamame, which means "stem bean" in Japanese, is loved for its mild, slightly nutty taste and good source of protein. Our Shelled Edamame comes to us from Thailand, Indonesia, and Vietnam, where the pods are hand picked and removed from their pods, then lightly blanched and quick frozen, ensuring fresh and perfectly crunchy beans in every bag. Edamame makes a great anywhere-or-anytime snack, served hot or cold. To serve cold, defrost overnight under refrigeration and it's ready to go. To serve hot, pour pods into microwave-safe dish and heat for 3-4 minutes at 50% power (depending on microwave). Season to taste and enjoy! You'll find 12 ounce bags of Shelled Edamame in our freezers. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Shelled Edamame
093346.name: Shelled Edamame Fully Cooked Shelled Soybeans

093984.description: Join us on a trip to France - a flavor trip that is - specifically to enjoy the wonderfully, fancy flavors of French County Potatoes. The dish brings pre-fried potatoes with tasty wild, Button mushrooms, and lively, vibrant green, haricots verts to the table. It's combined with savory sauce made out of vegetable broth from the flavors of carrots, onions, leeks, and enhanced with garlic. To finish, the Country Potatoes are garnished with parsley. French-style, Trader Joe's Country Potatoes with Haricots Verts and Wild Mushrooms are made in France, so they are the real deal. Try them with grilled steak, chicken, or fish alongside toasted slices of French Baguette [sku 92501] and a glass of French Market Sparkling Lemonade [sku 31737]. In the mood for breakfast? Combine the Potatoes with scrambled eggs and serve with warm Brioche French Toast [sku 65428] or 8 Mini Croissants [sku 65467] with a hot cup of your favorite French roast. Now that's a flavor trip to France. We're bringing France to you though, in a 16-ounce bag filled with TJ's Country Potatoes in our frozen aisle. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Country Potatoes with Haricots Verts & Wild Mushrooms
093984.name: Country Potatoes W/Green Beans
093984.title: Country Potatoes With Haricots Verts & Wild Mushrooms

094904.description: Trader Joe's Trader Potato Tots are made for us using real Northwest potatoes. They're made without artificial flavors, colors or preservatives. We are selling each 32 oz. Trader Joe's Trader Potato Tots for $1.99.
094904.name: Trader Potato Tots

096143.description: Trader Joe's Handsome Cut Potato Fries are no ordinary frozen fries. They actually have the texture of potatoes with skin on. We are selling each 24 oz. bag of Trader Joe's Handsome Cut Potato Fries for $1.99.
096143.name: Handsome Cut Potato Fries

099437.name: Roasted Bell Pepper & Onions
099437.title: Fire Roasted Bell Peppers And Onions With Red, Yellow & Green Bell Peppers

058732.description: We firmly believe that dried fruit and nuts are a winning pair-simply check out our various trail mixes for proof. There's just something about the combination of crunchy, savory nuts and sweet, chewy fruit that makes for a simple, but blissfully satiating snack. Which is why we were elated upon discovering Cashew Apricot Date & Nut Bites. Savory, crunchy cashews and sweet, chewy dried apricots and dates form the base of these Date & Nut Bites. A bit of dried coconut, lemon zest and orange zest round out the flavor profile with lightly sweet, tropical citrus notes. Blissful, indeed. Made in small batches in a gluten free facility in New Zealand, each individually wrapped Cashew Apricot Date & Nut Bite weighs about half an ounce. And per serving (two Bites!), you get two grams of fiber, three grams of protein and just nine grams of sugar. They're perfect for midday snacking or enjoying after a meal as a dessert alternative. We're selling 5.3-ounce bags of Trader Joe's Cashew Apricot Date & Nut Bites for the blissful price of $3.99, everyday. You'll find them near our other nut & dried fruit products. 06.12 .17
058732.name: Cashew Apricot Date Nut Bites
058732.title: Cashew Apricot Date & Nut Bites

042973.description: We offer four Organic Fruit Wrap flavor variations of Apple - Strawberry [sku 42974], Wild Berry [sku 43026], Blueberry [sku 97560], and this one, Trader Joe's Organic Apple Raspberry Fruit Wrap. It contains simple organic ingredients: apple puree, apple juice, raspberry puree, and additional natural fruit juices and flavors for extra fruity emphasis. To make them, the two fruit (Apple Raspberry) purées are blended together, poured into flat pans, and dried until they are just the right moisture level. Then, they are cut into the thin Fruit Wraps you find in each individual package. The Wraps are a fun way to incentivize your kids to eat more fruit and easy to travel to school, on road trips, picnics, hikes, beach trips, and easy to stalk in your pantry. It's handy dandy fruit that you don't necessarily have to worry about going rotten in less than a week and without the need to wash, peel, and slice to enjoy a quick snack. Trader Joe's Organic Apple Raspberry Fruit Wrap is an exquisite balance between sweet & tart flavors and is a fruity and pleasantly chewy treat all packed in thin 0.50-ounce Fruit Wrap for $0.49*. So feel free to try all the flavors - that's four for two bucks! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing Organic Apple Raspberry Fruit Wrap
042973.name: Org Apple Raspberry Fruit Wrap
042973.title: Trader Joe'S Organic Apple Raspberry Fruit Wrap

052414.description: There's a whole range of healthy snack bars out there. An examination of the available wrapper evidence seems to indicate that "healthy" simply means: 'There are some good things in here.' But, not necessarily fewer things. Most snack bar ingredients lists are long and littered with words that even a college English professor would find hard to pronounce. If you are of the mind that truly healthy snacks should not only contain good ingredi- ents, but also fewer of them-have we got the perfect snack for you! Trader Joe's Apple + Banana Fruit Bars are filled with a whole lot of two things: Apples and Bananas. That's all. Literally. No additives. No preservatives. No synthetic colors. No artificial flavors. No unpronounceable words. Just two whole servings of natural, non-GMO fruit in every single bar. And, it gets even better¿ Each 30g bar has just 90 calories, with zero fat, and zero cholesterol. Our Apple + Banana Fruit Bars are gluten-free, vegan, and certified kosher. They've got a raisiny aroma with the soft and chewy texture of dried apples. They taste like sweet apples with a hint of banana. Very tasty and verrrrrr-y simple! In a world of processed and artificially preserved foods, we believe you only need two ingredients to make a snack bar that's truly good for you. Pick up one (or ten!) Apple + Banana Fruit Bars today. At just $0.99 each, your wallet and your body can definitely afford it! 5.22.1 4
052414.name: Apple + Banana Fruit Bar
052414.title: Df Fruit Bar Apple - Banana - Nfl - (That'S It Nutrition)

061390.description: Fruit leathers have historically taken up a variety of physical shapes: strips, shreds, wraps¿ Now, Trader Joe's is bringing Buttons to the dried-fruit party! Each individual package contains eight, small circles of flattened, dried Fruit Leather. The Buttons are laid out in a row between two, long strips of paper that have been folded in fourths to fit the cute-as-a-button package. But there are a few additional ways our Buttons are not like other dried-fruit snacks you've seen. First, they are made with fruit-puree concentrate, instead of the juice concentrates that form the base of other products. Second, our supplier dries the Buttons for eight hours using a special warm-air drying process to create their smooth, soft, slightly sticky texture. There is no comparison to those waxy, tough-textured fruit leathers that are formed with a high-heat process. And third, when it comes to taste, our Mango Fruit Leather Buttons are also a cut above. Being mango-based (instead of apple-based, like most other leathers), our Buttons are bursting with sweet, subtly tart, Mango flavor that beats any non-Button varieties we've tested. The 0.5-ounce packages of Trader Joe's Organic Mango Fruit Leather Buttons are just 59¢ each. Buy a bunch of Buttons and you'll have snack time all buttoned up!
061390.name: Org Mango Buttons
061390.title: Organic Mango Peel Away Fruit Leather Buttons

065586.description: We sell a number of dried Fruit Bars and they are very simple. Whichever fruit they feature, it is paired with dried apple. Take, for example, our Apple + Strawberry Fruit Bar [sku 52417]; just two ingredients, that's it! If you thought it couldn't get any simpler, think again... Trader Joe's Organic Mango Fruit Bar has just one ingredient: mango. That mango is grown in Mexico and is dried and unsulfured. It's also certified organic, which sets this Fruit Bar apart from those other conventional Fruit Bars. And, how does it taste? It's soft and chewy with sweet, tart mango flavor-just as expected. Any simpler and you'd be plucking that mango from the tree yourself! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Mango Fruit Bar

065586.title: Organic Mango Fruit Bars ----------- Note To Design: "Fruit Bar" Should Be At Least 1/2 The Size Of "Mango"

Apple + Coconut Fruit Bars today. At just $0.99 each, your wallet and your body can definitely afford it! 5.22.1 4
152415.name: Apple + Coconut Fruit Bar
152415.title: Df Fruit Bar Apple - Coconut - Nfl - (That'S It Nutrition)

152416.description: There's a whole range of healthy snack bars out there. An examination of the available wrapper evidence seems to indicate that "healthy" simply means: 'There are some good things in here.' But, not necessarily fewer things. Most snack bar ingredients lists are long and littered with words that even a college English professor would find hard to pronounce. If you are of the mind that truly healthy snacks should not only contain good ingredi- ents, but also fewer of them-have we got the perfect snack for you! Trader Joe's Apple + Mango Fruit Bars are filled with a whole lot of two things: Apples and Mango. That's all. Literally. No additives. No preservatives. No synthetic colors. No artificial flavors. No unpronounceable words. Just two whole servings of natural, non-GMO fruit in every single bar. And, it gets even better¿ Each 30g bar has just 90 calories, with zero fat, and zero cholesterol. Our Apple + Mango Fruit Bars are gluten-free, vegan, and certified kosher. They've got a raisiny aroma with the soft and chewy texture of dried apples. They taste like sweet apples and tangy-tart mango. Very tasty and verrrrrr-y simple! In a world of processed and artificially preserved foods, we believe you only need two ingredients to make a snack bar that's truly good for you. Pick up one (or ten!) Apple + Mango Fruit Bars today. At just $0.99 each, your wallet and your body can definitely afford it! 5.22.1 4
152416.name: Apple + Mango Fruit Bar
152416.title: Df Fruit Bar Apple - Mango - Nfl - (That'S It Nutrition)

An examination of the available wrapper evidence seems to indicate that "healthy" simply means: 'There are some good things in here.' But, not necessarily fewer things. Most snack bar ingredients lists are long and littered with words that even a college English professor would find hard to pronounce. If you are of the mind that truly healthy snacks should not only contain good ingredi- ents, but also fewer of them-have we got the perfect snack for you! Trader Joe's Apple + Strawberry Fruit Bars are filled with a whole lot of two things: Apples and Strawber- ries. That's all. Literally. No additives. No preservatives. No synthetic colors. No artificial flavors. No unpro- nounceable words. Just two whole servings of natural, non-GMO fruit in every single bar. They've got a subtle berry aroma with the soft and chewy texture of dried apples. Strawberry seeds give them a pleasant crunch. They taste like sweet apples and bright strawberries. Very tasty and verrrrrr-y simple! In a world of processed and artificially preserved foods, we believe you only need two ingredients to make a snack bar that's truly good for you. Pick up one (or ten!) Apple + Strawberry Fruit Bars today. At just $0.99 each, your wallet and your body can definitely afford it! 5.22.1 4
152417.name: Apple + Strawberry Fruit Bar
152417.title: Df Fruit Bar Apple - Strawberry

165586.description: We sell a number of dried Fruit Bars and they are very simple. Whichever fruit they feature, it is paired with dried apple. Take, for example, our Apple + Strawberry Fruit Bar [sku 52417]; just two ingredients, that's it! If you thought it couldn't get any simpler, think again... Trader Joe's Organic Mango Fruit Bar has just one ingredient: mango. That mango is grown in Mexico and is dried and unsulfured. It's also certified organic, which sets this Fruit Bar apart from those other conventional Fruit Bars. And, how does it taste? It's soft and chewy with sweet, tart mango flavor-just as expected. Any simpler and you'd be plucking that mango from the tree yourself! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Mango Fruit Bar
165586.name: Mango Org Bar Box
165586.title: Organic Mango Fruit Bars ----------- Note To Design: "Fruit Bar" Should Be At Least 1/2 The Size Of "Mango"

031737.description: In France, lemonade takes on a different meaning. As long as it's carbonated and lemon-flavored, it qualifies as lemonade. We found a supplier in France that makes one of the best French lemonades, who now makes Trader Joe's Sparkling Lemonade for us, right from the French Market. Everything about this French drink will have you do a double take - from the fancy curves of the bottle, to the subtle lemon-colored drink, to the elegant labeling - you won't be able to resist picking up a bottle or two (or more, we won't judge). We'll say though, this version of lemonade is different than the classic, fresh squeezed lemonade we're used to, it's less citrusy than you would expect and it's bubbly. You'll have to try for yourself - it's just simply good, delicious, and a great value for just $2.99* a bottle. See that guy holding up that glass of lemonade? That'll be you, toasting to the folks surrounding your dinner table, thankful to have such a fine glass of Trader Joe's Sparkling Lemonade. I mean seriously, don't be surprised if you find yourself just start to raise the glass after your first few sips... appreciating the sweet, lemony flavors and bubbly, carbonated fizz. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Sparkling Lemonade
031737.name: Sparkling French Lemonade
031737.title: French Market Sparkling Lemonade

036334.description: In France, lemonade takes on a different meaning. As long as it's carbonated and lemon-flavored, it qualifies as lemonade. We found a supplier in France that makes one of the best French lemonades, who now makes Trader Joe's Sparkling Lemonade for us, right from the French Market. Everything about this French drink will have you do a double take - from the fancy curves of the bottle, to the light blush colored drink, to the elegant labeling - you won't be able to resist picking up a bottle or two (or more, we won't judge). We'll say though, this version of lemonade is different than the classic, fresh squeezed lemonade we're used to, it's less citrusy than you would expect and it's bubbly. You'll have to try for yourself - it's just simply good, delicious, and a great value for just $2.99* a bottle. See that guy holding up that glass of lemonade? That'll be you, toasting to the folks surrounding your dinner table, thankful to have such a fine glass of Trader Joe's Sparkling Pink Lemonade. I mean seriously, don't be surprised if you find yourself just start to raise the glass after your first few sips... appreciating the sweet, lemony flavors and bubbly, carbonated fizz. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Sparkling Pink Lemonade
036334.name: Sparkl French Pink Lemade
036334.title: French Market Sparkling Pink Lemonade

041747.description: Have you ever tried to count all the songs that have been written about cherries? We have. There were too many. Songwriters, it seems, love cherries. We love songwriters. Right now, we'll admit, even more than songwriters and songs about cherries, we love Trader Joe's 100% Tart Cherry Juice. If we were songwriters, and not Flyer writers, we'd probably write a song about it. So we'll stick to what we do best; tell you all about this tartastic juice, Flyer-style. In days of yore, we sold a Tart Cherry Juice made "from concentrate." These days, we're sourcing this juice from a supplier who makes it from freshly-pressed, whole, red, tart Montmorency cherries. That's what's in the bottle; nothing else is added. In every sip, you're enjoying 100% freshly pressed juice from 100% fresh tart cherries. It's pucker-worthy, makes a great mixer, and is loaded with healthful antioxidants known as anthocyanins. Making Trader Joe's 100% Tart Cherry Juice even more appealing is our price of $4.99 for each 32-ounce glass bottle-plus deposit where applicable. Kind of makes us want to sing¿
041747.name: Cherry Juice Tart 100% 32 Oz
041747.title: Trader Joe'S 100% Red Tart Cherry Juice

041907.description: It should come as no surprise that we're tremendous fans of mango, here at Trader Joe's. Our love for this stupendous stone fruit extends to mango-enhanced cookies, cereals, desserts, and snacks of all kinds, but we hold a particularly special place in our heart for mango-based drinks. Trader Joe's Organic Mango Nectar, for instance, blends together a mix of organic mango purée and organic white grape juice from concentrate to create one exceptionally smooth, exceptionally mango-y juice cocktail that provides any kind of hydration situation with a little boost of mango magnificence. Super smooth and soft in texture, and bursting with fruity mango flavor, our Organic Mango Nectar is just the juice to turn to when you're looking to make things a touch more tropical. Try it out in lieu of orange juice at breakfast - or even take things one step further by making your own mango mimosa at brunch with a bit of Cecilia Beretta Prosecco [sku 98097]. Mix it with lemonade, seltzer, or incorporate it into your next fruit smoothie. You might expect to pay pretty dearly for an organic juice of this magnitude, but Trader Joe's Organic Mango Nectar, available in 64 fl. ounce bottles, sells for the magnanimous price of $4.49*, every day. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Mango Nectar
041907.name: Mango Nectar Juice Org 64 Oz
041907.title: Certified Organic Pasteurized Mango Nectar - Mango Nectar Blended With Grape Juice From Concentrate

045104.description: The day we first tried the juice that would eventually become Trader Joe's Country Peach, close to two decades ago, there happened to be a special "guest of the tasting panel" present. This individual carried a refreshing "Emperor's New Clothes" kind of perspective, and after one sip of juice declared, "it's a hard to find juice and I love it. Just the kind of thing that makes Trader Joe's unique." The panel pondered the child, swallowed the juice, and had no more words - Country Peach was, indeed, a winner. The fact that we're selling it still speaks for itself. As fragrant as a peach grove, this juice blends pure peach puree with the juice concentrates and fruits of apple, white grape, pear and pineapple. It's smooth, thick (not at all a watery juice), bright, and sweet as a Country Peach. Some savor the sweetness, enjoying it chilled, over ice. Others appreciate the peach persuasion and use it as a mixer with unsweetened iced tea, lemonade or Cecilia Beretta Prosecco [sku 98097]. We're selling each 64 ounce bottle of Country Peach for $3.99* - "just the kind of thing that makes Trader Joe's unique." *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Country Peach
045104.name: Country Peach Juice 64 Oz
045104.title: Trader Joe'S Country Peach

047847.name: Sparkling French Berryade
047847.title: French Market Sparkling Berry Lemonade Naturally Flavored With Other Natural Flavor

050235.description: Trader Joe's 100% Cherry Juice comes to us from the Caucasus Mountains/Black Sea region of Georgia - the country that lies at the intersection of Eastern Europe and Western Asia, not the state that lies in the heart of the southeastern United States. This area is home to some of the world's finest cherries - they're generally referred to as "sour" or "tart." We find the juice significantly sweeter than our Tart Cherry Juice, yet not as sweet as other black cherry juices we've tried. This is a very easy juice to drink. One of the sippers on our tasting panel described it as tasting "like a good, not overly sweet, cherry pie." We'll go with that. We'll also go with our excellent price of $3.99 for each 32 ounce glass bottle. You'll find 100% Cherry Juice on the shelves with our other bottled juices and teas.
050235.name: Cherry Juice 100% 32 Oz
050235.title: 100% Cherry Juice From Concentrate

053187.description: Over time, the number seven has garnered some very positive associations. Ancient spiritual gurus considered it "the number of perfection." Modern-day chance-takers consider it "lucky." Now, we won't go as far as to call our new To The Power of Seven Green Organic Juice Blend "lucky" (and perfection is subjective), but one thing we will call it is "powerful"... To The Power of Seven packs a punch with its blend of juices from seven fruits and veggies-all organic, and none from concentrate. Count 'em - it's a blend of pomegranate (27%), tart cherry (27%), black mulberry (20%), red grape (10%), purple carrot (10%), cranberry (5%), and blueberry (1%) juices. The flavor is 100% fruity and delightfully sweet-even in the absence of any added sweeteners. While the taste-experience is powerful, this power proceeds beyond the tongue. Our To The Power of Seven contains essential vitamins, like A and C. It also contains a variety of phytonutrients-those natural plant chemicals (like antioxidants) that are increasingly understood to promote human health and strength. Serve it chilled. Add it to your smoothies. Freeze it into yummy pops, or fruity ice cubes. You can even mix it with your favorite spirits for a cocktail hour of power. Luck may have nothing to do with it, but we think that if you take a chance on this Organic Juice Blend, you'll be quite pleased with everything about it, starting with its price-we're selling each 33.8 fl oz, shelf-stable bottle of pasteurized Trader Joe's To The Power of Seven Organic Juice Blend is only $3.99. Perfect. 10.13. 14
053187.name: Power Of 7 Juice Org Purple 1 Lt
053187.title: To The Power 7 Of Seven Organic Juice Blend A Blend Of Organic Pomegranate, Tart Cherry, Black Mulberry, Red Grape, Purple Carrot, Cranberry And Blueberry Juice.

056349.name: Cran Apple Juice Org 64 Oz
056349.title: Certified Organic Pasteurized Cranberry Apple Juice

058823.description: Great news: we've given classic carrot juice some extra character! (You have had your fingers crossed for that, now haven't you?) Turmeric has long been valued for its unique taste and versatility-we've seen it in every- thing from soups to lattes to cakes as of late-and its notable presence in our new Organic Carrot Turmeric Juice Blend creates a distinct, enjoyable beverage that is sure to have everyone talking. To concoct Trader Joe's Organic Carrot Turmeric Juice Blend-a mighty fine elixir if we've ever sipped one- we take rich, naturally sweet organic carrot juice, blend it with organic turmeric powder and a bit of organic lemon juice, then add a bit of organic black pepper and organic chili pepper powder. Fear not, though-the pepper lends it just the right amount of spice to make it interesting, not set your mouth on fire. Have a glass of Organic Carrot Turmeric Juice Blend every morning with breakfast. Add some TJ's Lemon Sparkling Water [sku 34532] (and perhaps some vodka if you're in the mood¿) for an extra-refreshing fizz. Or get more creative and use it as a base in a smoothie or a wintery-y, root vegetable soup. We're selling each 32-ounce bottle of Organic Carrot Turmeric Juice Blend for $3.99, every day. You'll find in our beverage aisle. 04.24. 17
058823.name: Carrot Turmeric Juic Org 32 Oz
058823.title: Organic Carrot Turmeric Juice Blend

058825.description: For those not too keen on heat, the word "jalapeño" might incite some combination of wariness and dread. Its bite lends flavor and heat to many Mexican dishes-and now to Trader Joe's Organic Jalapeño Limeade. But fear not! The spiciness of this Jalapeño Limeade is mild enough for even the weariest spicy food consum- ers-and will be pleasantly enjoyable for those who seek heat. Our Jalapeño Limeade might sound elaborate, but it's actually quite simple. It's made with water, organic lime juice that's not from concentrate, organic cane sugar, and organic jalapeño powder. The burst of tart lime pairs perfectly with a kick of jalapeño flavor for a mighty refreshing drink. Is there a better drink to enjoy during the height of summer-or to remind you of summer on those less-than- summery days? Probably not. Serve this spicy Limeade served over ice with your choice of garnish: fresh lime, basil, mint, or cilantro are all excellent options. A splash of TJ's Distinqt Tequila Reposado [sku 80390] isn't a bad idea either¿ We're selling each 32-ounce bottle of Trader Joe's Organic Jalapeño Limeade for $2.29. You'll find it with our other shelf-stable beverages, waiting for you to enjoy its spicy sweetness. 05.01. 17
058825.name: Limeade Jalapeno Org 32 Oz
058825.title: Organic Jalapeño Limeade

059522.description: Over time, the number seven has garnered some very positive associations. Ancient spiritual gurus considered it "the number of perfection." Modern-day chance-takers consider it "lucky." Now, we won't go as far as to call our new To The Power of Seven Green Organic Juice Blend "lucky" (and perfection is subjective), but one thing we will call it is "powerful"... Like its berry-and-pomegranate, Power of Seven predecessor [sku 53187], Trader Joe's To The Power of Seven Green Organic Juice Blend packs a punch with its blend of seven key ingredients: organic kale juice (32%), organic spinach juice (26%), organic green apple juice (18%), organic cucumber juice (10%), organic celery juice (10%), organic lemon juice (2%), and organic ginger powder (2%). We don't add anything else to the blend, in- cluding sweeteners of any kind. Even in the absence of added sugars, this Juice Blend strikes the perfect balance between sweet and earthy, with strong, greens-forward flavor and bright notes of lemon and ginger. Its power proceeds beyond the tongue; this juice happens to contain plenty of phytonutrients-a.ka. those natural plant chemicals (like antioxidants) that are increasingly understood to promote optimum health and resilience. Serve it chilled. Add it to your smoothies. Freeze it into yummy pops, or fruity ice cubes. You can even mix it with your favorite spirits for a verdant cocktail. Luck may have nothing to do with it, but we think that if you take a chance on this Green Organic Juice Blend, you'll be quite pleased with everything about it. Starting with its price: we're selling each 33.8 fl oz, shelf-stable bottle of pasteurized To The Power of Seven Green Organic Juice Blend for $3.99. Perfect. 09.03. 18
059522.name: Power Of 7 Juice Org Green 1 Lt
059522.title: To The Power^7 Of Seven Green Organic Juice Beverage A Juice Beverage Blend Of Organic Kale, Spinach, Green Apple, Celery, Cucumber, And Lemon Juice With Added Ginger Powder.

064431.description: What can't apple cider vinegar do? Some folks use it in marinades, others use it to pickle produce, some even use it as a cleaning agent. As it happens, you can now add "use it to make a remarkably refreshing soda" to the list, with the introduction of Trader Joe's Organic Sparkling Ginger + Lemon Apple Cider Vinegar Beverage. This tart and tangy sparkler combines pleasantly pucker-y organic lemon juice and bright, bracing organic ginger with (you guessed it) organic apple cider vinegar to create one curiously cool and crisp drink. Best enjoyed nice and cold, our Organic Sparkling Ginger + Lemon Apple Cider Vinegar Beverage at once offers all the thirst-quenching qualities of a lemonade, the exhilarating bite of spicy ginger, and the playful mix of juicy and tangy that only apple cider vinegar can supply. It makes for an especially delicious anytime drink, though we find that its unique flavor profile makes it especially amenable to pairing with rich or spicy foods. As if that weren't enough, each cool, crisp 12-fl. ounce can of Trader Joe's Sparkling Ginger + Lemon Apple Cider Vinegar Beverage sells for the red hot price of $1.69*. Look for them with our other sparkling waters and sodas. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Sparkling Ginger + Lemon Apple Cider Vinegar Beverage
064431.name: Apple Cider Vinegar Lemon Ginger Beverage
064431.title: Organic Sparkling Ginger + Lemon Apple Cider Vinegar Beverage

064432.description: What can't apple cider vinegar do? Some folks use it in marinades, others use it to pickle produce, some even use it as a cleaning agent. As it happens, you can now add "use it to make a remarkably refreshing soda" to the list, with the introduction of Trader Joe's Organic Sparkling Lemon + Strawberry Apple Cider Vinegar Beverage. This tart and tangy sparkler combines pleasantly pucker-y organic lemon juice and delightfully fruity organic strawberry juice with (you guessed it) organic apple cider vinegar to create one curiously cool and crisp drink. Best enjoyed nice and cold, our Organic Sparkling Lemon + Strawberry Apple Cider Vinegar Beverage at once offers all the sweet, easy-drinking qualities of a strawberry lemonade with the playful mix of juicy and tangy that only apple cider vinegar can supply. It makes for an especially delicious anytime drink, though its unique flavor profile makes it especially amenable to pairing with herby and aromatic foods. As if that weren't enough, each cool, crisp 12-fl. ounce can of Trader Joe's Sparkling Lemon + Strawberry Apple Cider Vinegar Beverage sells for the red hot price of $1.69*. Look for them with our other sparkling waters and sodas. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Sparkling Lemon + Strawberry Apple Cider Vinegar Beverage
064432.name: Apple Cider Vinegar Strawberry Lemon Beverage
064432.title: Organic Sparkling Lemon + Strawberry Apple Cider Vinegar Beverage

065504.description: Nothing calls upon a summer's day quite like a ripe, juicy watermelon, and Trader Joe's Sparkling Watermelon Juice is like a summer's day in a can! Made with fresh, not-from-concentrate watermelon juice, plenty of bubbles, and zero grams of added sugar, Trader Joe's Sparkling Watermelon Juice is the sweet and sparkling beverage of your warm-weather dreams. And each can contains just 60 calories, so if need be, don't hesitate to reach for this light, refreshing fizz to buoy you through your day several times a day. Enjoy our Sparkling Watermelon Juice chilled, straight from the can or over ice. Add it to a cocktail, garnished with slices of fresh cucumber and a sprig of mint or rosemary. Make it the base of a fancy ice cream soda or a fruity float¿ The sun is shining, and the sky is the limit! We're selling each four-pack of 8.45-ounce cans of Sparkling Watermelon Juice for $3.99. Hurry in and snag one today, before the sun sets on this sizzling, seasonally-available value...
065504.name: Sparkling Watermelon Juice With Added Ingredients

067582.description: Made with not-from-concentrate strawberry juice, plenty of bubbles, and absolutely no added sugars, Trader Joe's Sparkling Strawberry Juice sips like a sweet, strawberry daydream on a sparkling spring day. It's a perfect pick for picnics, great for packing in lunches, and berry, berry good for satisfying a sudden craving for something sweet, sensibly. (There are just 60 calories per can!) Enjoy TJ's Sparkling Strawberry Juice Beverage chilled, straight from the can or over ice. Create a signature cocktail by combining it with vodka and muddled basil, plus some fresh basil for garnish. For an absolutely dreamy strawberries-n-cream float, pour a can into a chilled glass or frosty mug and add a scoop of TJ's Premium French Vanilla Ice Cream [sku 78576]. Let your imagination sparkle! We're selling each four-pack of 8.45 fluid-ounce cans for $3.99.* Look for it in our beverage section, every day. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Sparkling Strawberry Juice Beverage
067582.name: Sparkling Strawberry Juice

068064.description: True pomegranate fans know that pure pomegranate juice isn't just a drink, it's an experience. Without the addition of sugar or other fruit juices, a glass of 100% pomegranate juice is a powerful thing: each sip is bursting with rich, condensed pomegranate flavor in a sensational mix of sweet, tart, and dry. We're all about facilitating phenomenal flavor experiences here at Trader Joe's, which is precisely why we're introducing Trader Joe's 100% Organic Pomegranate Juice to our shelves. Pomegranate fans, prepare yourselves accordingly. Every bottle of Trader Joe's 100% Organic Pomegranate Juice is made from entirely organic pomegranates and nothing else - as in, no added sugar, no preservatives, no other fruit juices, just pure pomegranate-tude. In fact, this Juice is so flavorful, that one of our favorite uses for it is to provide a nice splash of flavor to other drinks and recipes. Try mixing a few ounces in with a bit of sparkling or seltzer water for a quick and easy soda, pair with your favorite spirits and mixers for a pom-powered cocktail, even marinades and salad dressings can be enhanced by the addition of Trader Joe's 100% Organic Pomegranate Juice. We're selling 32-ounce bottles for $4.69*, every day. Look for them with our other shelf-stable fruit juices. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. 100% Organic Pomegranate Juice
068064.name: Organic Pomegranate Juice
068064.title: Organic 100% Pomegranate Juice From Concentrate ----- "From Concentrate" Shall Be In A Type Size No Less Than One-Half The Height Of The Letters In The Name Of The Juice

068099.description: Aloe vera is often used as a post-beach-day panacea for stinging, sun-saturated skin. In gel form, the extract from this succulent plant provides soothing qualities for burns of all kinds. But did you know you can also drink the juice of the aloe vera plant? A number of our Customers enjoy aloe vera juice, which is why we sell Aloe Botanicals Organic Aloe Vera Juice. This gallon jug contains 99% Aloe Vera Juice extracted from whole leaves of the aloe vera plant. (The other 1% is purified water and organic lemon juice to balance the pH.) The flavor is unique and might be described as 'plant-y', with some citrusy tang-but people don't usually drink it for its wonderful flavor profile. Some people claim that the juice of the aloe vera plant aids in digestion and supports their immune and joint health. While Trader Joe's can't vouch for those health claims, we can say that those who drink aloe as a dietary supplement like this Organic Aloe Vera Juice! Find it on our shelves with our other non-refrigerated juices. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Aloe Botanicals Organic Aloe Vera Juice
068099.name: Aloe Juice Gallon Organic

068349.description: What do you get when you infuse crisp, black tea with a splash of peach juice and an abundance of invigorating bubbles? You get Trader Joe's Sparkling Black Tea with Peach Juice Beverage, that's what! Perfectly peachy, ultra-fizzy, and subtly sweet, this bold beverage sips like a sparkling summer afternoon. Even on the dreariest of days, it'll add spring to your step and leave you feeling peachy-keen. And remember: when life hands you lemons¿ ask for peaches instead. Enjoy it chilled, over ice or straight from the can. Add it to a cocktail or mocktail, garnished with a sprig of mint. Make it the base of a creamy, pitch-perfect peach float. Let your imagination sparkle! We're selling 8.45-fluid-ounce cans of our Sparkling Black Tea with Peach Juice Beverage in a four-pack for the peachy-keen price of $3.99* each. You'll find them with our other shelf-stable beverages. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Sparkling Black Tea with Peach Juice Beverage
068349.name: Sparkling Black Tea Peach
068349.title: Sparkling Black Tea With Peach Juice Beverage

070308.description: What do you get when you infuse earthy green tea with a splash of vibrant pineapple juice and an abundance of invigorating bubbles? You get Trader Joe's Sparkling Green Tea with Pineapple Juice Beverage, that's what! Pleasingly pineapple-y, ultra-fizzy, and subtly sweet, this bold beverage sips like a sparkling summer afternoon. While the complex, verdant tones of green tea give this beverage its backbone, it's the vividly sweet and slightly tart pineapple whose flavors steal the spotlight. And the bubbles? Well, the bubbles are your indication that celebrations are in order! Whether it's a special day, a holiday, or just a random weekday, when you crack open a can of Sparkling Green Tea with Pineapple, it's time to party! Enjoy it chilled, over ice or straight from the can. Add it to a cocktail or mocktail, garnished with a sprig of rosemary or a pineapple wedge. Make it the base of a tropically-tinged pineapple float. It's gluten free and vegan, contains no added sugar, and each can contains a mere 12 calories! We're selling it in four packs of 8.45 ounce cans. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Sparkling Green Tea with Pineapple Juice Beverage
070308.name: Sparkling Green Tea Pineapple
070308.title: Sparkling Pineapple Green Tea

072312.description: What can't apple cider vinegar do? Some folks use it in marinades, others use it to pickle produce, and some even use it as a cleaning agent. Now, with Trader Joe's Organic Sparkling Elderberry & Pomegranate Apple Cider Vinegar Beverage, you can go ahead and add "use it to make a remarkably refreshing soda" to the list! Made with organic elderberry juice, organic pomegranate juice, and organic natural flavors (plus some organic apple juice and organic grape juice for additional sweetness), our Organic Sparkling Elderberry & Pomegranate Apple Cider Vinegar Beverage combines all the depth of flavor you'd find in an ordinary elderberry or pomegranate-flavored fizzy drink with the playful, tangy pucker that only apple cider vinegar can supply. It makes for an especially delicious anytime drink on its own, or you can mix in a shot of rum or vodka for a brisk and extra-unique cocktail. Bottoms up! Organic Sparkling Elderberry & Pomegranate Apple Cider Vinegar Beverage
072312.name: Apple Cider Vinegar Elderberry Pom Beverage

072790.description: Trader Joe's To the Power of Vitamin C Organic 100% Juice Blend is no ordinary juice blend. For starters, it's not from concentrate, which means you won't find any weak, watered-down flavors here, folks. Instead, you get the bright, refreshing, and uninterrupted flavors of organic orange juice, organic pineapple juice, organic mango purée, and a splash of organic lemon juice. On its own, this balanced, bright-orange blend already offers up plenty of vitamin C. But to really take this juice To the Power of C, we've added acerola cherry powder, too, bringing the total Vitamin C count to 90mg per eight-fluid-ounce serving. That's 100% of the recommended daily value right there! Now, we freely acknowledge that there's no "M.D" after "Trader Joe's" (although "Doctor Joe" does have a ring to it, doesn't it?), but we'd say that's something you can feel good about. Literally and figuratively. Quick-To the Power of C! To the Power of Vitamin C Organic 100% Juice Blend
072790.name: Power Of C Juice Org
072790.title: To The Power Of C Organic Juice Blend

073084.description: As much as we love an ice-cold glass of lemonade, we don't always want all the sugar and calories that go along with it. That's why, for years, we carried a Low Calorie Lemonade [sku 94244] that ticked all the boxes of a classic, thirst-quenching lemonade, but with a fraction of the calorie count. It was also made almost entirely from organic ingredients - everything but a sweetener derived from conventionally grown stevia, to be precise. Recently, however, our supplier was able to secure a source of organic stevia, which means we can now relaunch this long-adored libation as Trader Joe's Organic Low Calorie Lemonade! Made for us by the same supplier as our previous version, this Organic Low Calorie Lemonade delivers all the same satisfyingly sweet and tart flavors as its predecessor, but now does so while being totally organic, too. Its carefully balanced ratio of organic cane sugar and sweetener extracted from organic stevia leaves makes it an ideal drink for enjoying on its own, over ice, but it also works wonders when mixed with sparkling water for an easy, lemony spritzer. And if you're looking for a mixer for a cocktail, this Organic Low Calorie Lemonade is as smart a choice as it is refreshingly sweet. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Low Calorie Lemonade
073084.name: Organic Lemonade Low Calorie 64 Oz
073084.title: Organic Low Calorie Lemonade

That's why, for years, we carried a Low Calorie Pink Lemonade [sku 94628] that ticked all the boxes of a classic, thirst-quenching lemonade, but with a fraction of the calorie count. It was also made almost entirely from organic ingredients - everything but a sweetener derived from conventionally grown stevia, to be precise. And if you're looking for a mixer for a cocktail, this Organic Low Calorie Pink Lemonade is as smart a choice as it is refreshingly sweet. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Low Calorie Pink Lemonade
