099438.description: Jelly Beans have a rich, intricate history that relates to both the ancient, jelly-centered Turkish Delights and the 17th century creation, candy-coated Jordan almonds. At what point or how the two merged into the sweet, brightly flavored jelly beans of today is anyone's guess. Could it have been as simple as pure luck? Speaking of luck, Trader Joe's Gourmet Jelly Beans come from a wee candy factory nestled in the Irish countryside. These colorful Beans are made just for us using fruit and vegetable extracts for color. They're bright with naturally vibrant, sweet flavors and 18 distinct profiles, from pomegranate to pink grapefruit. Close your eyes and take a lucky guess on which flavor is which; or combine two or three Beans to mix flavors like strawberry & banana or coconut & lemon. You have plenty Gourmet variations to choose from. Our Jelly Beans are flavored through and through, so you get more flavor in every bean. Lucky indeed. We're selling each five-ounce box of Gourmet Jelly Beans for $1.99* in our candy aisle. This really is your lucky day! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Gourmet Jelly Beans
099438.name: Jelly Beans Gourmet
099438.title: Gourmet Jelly Beans

006219.description: At Trader Joe's, we truly depend on Customer feedback to inform our new product development. We also depend on it to let us know when an existing product might benefit from a small kaizen or two. Typically, products that fall into the latter category are products that our Customers already love, but that they might love even more "if¿" In the case of Trader Joe's Small Curd Cottage Cheese, a staple in our dairy box since 1993, Customers have told us (and showed us, in hard-earned dollars spent) that they love it. But they've also told us that they would love it even more if we were to remove certain ingredients from its recipe. So as of next week, in a classic TJ's case of, "You asked-we listened!," Trader Joe's Small Curd Cottage Cheese will be the same smooth, creamy, lightly sweet & slightly tangy Cottage Cheese you love, minus the xanthan gum, the guar gum, and, most notably, the carrageenan. For clarification: carrageenans (or carrageenins) are a family of algae and seaweed-based thickeners, emulsifiers, and stabilizers, often used in dairy products to maintain textural consistency. We have no evidence to suggest that the carrageenan in this or any other private label product could be harmful - We don't sell products that we know to be unsafe, ever. But we also don't presume to make our Customers' dietary and shopping decisions for them. So, while arguments for a proposed kaizen are always valuable & considered, the simple fact that Customers are asking for it is reason enough to move forward and explore our options. Some more great news? Our Cottage Cheese might be better than ever, but our price for a 16-ounce tub is the same as it's always been-$1.99 in the West & in Texas, and $2.19 in the East & Midwest.
006219.name: Cottage Cheese Pint Whole
006219.title: Small Curd Cottage Cheese

006220.description: At Trader Joe's, we truly depend on Customer feedback to inform our new product development. We also depend on it to let us know when an existing product might benefit from a small kaizen or two. Typically, products that fall into the latter category are products that our Customers already love, but that they might love even more "if¿" In the case of Trader Joe's Small Curd Low Fat Cottage Cheese, a staple in our dairy box since 1993, Customers have told us (and showed us, in hard-earned dollars spent) that they love it. But they've also told us that they would love it even more if we were to remove certain ingredients from its recipe. So as of next week, in a classic TJ's case of, "You asked-we listened!," Trader Joe's Small Curd Low Fat Cottage Cheese will be the same smooth, creamy, lightly sweet & slightly tangy Low Fat Cottage Cheese you love, minus the xanthan gum, the guar gum, and, most notably, the carrageenan. For clarification: carrageenans (or carrageenins) are a family of algae and seaweed-based thickeners, emulsifiers, and stabilizers, often used in dairy products to maintain textural consistency. We have no evidence to suggest that the carrageenan in this or any other private label product could be harmful - We don't sell products that we know to be unsafe, ever. But we also don't presume to make our Customers' dietary and shopping decisions for them. So, while arguments for a proposed kaizen are always valuable & considered, the simple fact that Customers are asking for it is reason enough to move forward and explore our options. Some more great news? Our Low Fat Cottage Cheese might be better than ever, but our price is the same as it's always been-$1.99 for a 16-ounce tub. You'll find it in our dairy case.
006220.name: Cottage Cheese Pint Lf
006220.title: Small Curd Low Fat Cottage Cheese 1.5% Milkfat Minimum

021256.name: Heavy Cream Pint
021256.title: Heavy Whipping Cream Grade A Pasteurized

042890.description: At Trader Joe's, we truly depend on Customer feedback to inform our new product development. We also depend on it to let us know when an existing product might benefit from a small kaizen or two. Typically, products that fall into the latter category are products that our Customers already love, but that they might love even more "if¿" In the case of Trader Joe's Small Curd Cottage Cheese, a staple in our dairy box since 1993, Customers have told us (and showed us, in hard-earned dollars spent) that they love it. But they've also told us that they would love it even more if we were to remove certain ingredients from its recipe. So as of next week, in a classic TJ's case of, "You asked-we listened!," Trader Joe's Small Curd Cottage Cheese will be the same smooth, creamy, lightly sweet & slightly tangy Cottage Cheese you love, minus the xanthan gum, the guar gum, and, most notably, the carrageenan. For clarification: carrageenans (or carrageenins) are a family of algae and seaweed-based thickeners, emulsifiers, and stabilizers, often used in dairy products to maintain textural consistency. We have no evidence to suggest that the carrageenan in this or any other private label product could be harmful - We don't sell products that we know to be unsafe, ever. But we also don't presume to make our Customers' dietary and shopping decisions for them. So, while arguments for a proposed kaizen are always valuable & considered, the simple fact that Customers are asking for it is reason enough to move forward and explore our options. Some more great news? Our Cottage Cheese might be better than ever, but our price is the same as it's always been-$3.19 for a 32-ounce tub. You'll find it in our dairy case.
042890.name: Cottage Cheese Quart Whole
042890.title: Small Curd Cottage Cheese

058113.description: Once upon a time, there was a whole vegan village of discouraged, dairy-averse dessert-lovers. While these generally genial folk frequently feasted upon pies, cakes, and cookies a-plenty, something was missing. Something...extra. A tantalizing topping. A fluffy finisher. A whimsical whip. Given her own proclivity for ducking dairy products, our Product Developer sympathized with these villagers. So, when she caught sight of Sweet Rose® Coconut Whipped Topping at a national food expo, she knew what she must do: take this vegan Topping to Trader Joe's. And-villagers rejoice!-that's exactly what she did. Sweet Rose® Coconut Whipped Topping is sweet, creamy, airy, and fluffy. It's everything you'd want in a whipped cream-that memorable mouthfeel! that titillating texture!-minus the cream. Instead of lactose-laden "regular" heavy cream, we use a thick & rich coconut cream as the base of this Whipped Topping. Its distinctly coconut-ty flavor & aroma are suitable for any Whipped Topping-lover, not just the dairy-dodgers and animal- product-avoidants. Now that Sweet Rose® Coconut Whipped Topping has arrived, dessert knows no bounds. Cover your cakes, smother your soufflés, and inundate your ice cream with this fluffy stuff. Pile it on pies, pudding, or pancakes; heap it in hot cocoa; squirt it on your sundae. The possibilities are endless-and at $3.29 per 6.5-ounce can, you can afford to stock up. You'll find this indulgent little miracle chillin' in our refrigerators, ready to make its way to yours.
058113.name: Whip Cream Coconut Can 6.5Oz
058113.title: Whipped Cream Coconut Can 6.5 Oz

072480.description: Organic Cottage Cheese Trader Joe's Organic Cottage Cheese comes from certified organic farms. The cows are never ever treated with any hormones or antibiotics and are primarily grass fed on pastures that have not been treated with any synthetic fertilizers or pesticides Trader Joe's Cottage Cheese is great right out of the container as a snack, or with raw vegetables, or ripe fruits, it also enhances meals as a side dish, or can be used as a recipe ingredient. We're selling each 16 ounce tub of Trader Joe's Cottage Cheese for $3.49.
072480.name: Cottage Cheese Organic Pint Ff
072480.title: Organic Fat Free Cottage Cheese

073798.description: Who could have guessed that oats would become such a game-changer for non-dairy beverages? It turns out that these normally unassuming grains make a pretty miraculous milk alternative, as evidenced by the mild, subtly sweet flavor profile and rich, yet silky-smooth consistency of our very own Non-Dairy Oat Beverage [sku 65333]. It should come as no surprise, then, that oat-based beverages also make a great base for a plant-based coffee creamer, as our new Non-Dairy Brown Sugar Oat Creamer demonstrates. Dairy-free, lactose-free, and even gluten-free, we're happy to report that this Non-Dairy Oat Creamer changes the non-dairy game further still. Its relatively smoother, creamier consistency is pitch-perfect for stirring into coffees and teas, both hot and iced, and its delectable note of rich Brown Sugar is present enough to provide a pleasant flavor boost, but not so potent as to overpower whatever you've poured it into. Keep a carton in your fridge for the next time you're craving a homemade vegan milk tea or easy iced latte with our Cold Brew Concentrate [sku 50759]. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Non-Dairy Brown Sugar Oat Creamer
073798.name: Creamer Oat Brown Sugar Pint
073798.title: Non-Dairy Oat Creamer Brown Sugar Flavor

094231.description: If you like cream in your coffee-but you don't like the lactose-Trader Joe's Coffee Creamers are the answer! Instead of having a milk base, our Coffee Creamers are foundationally filtered water, organic cane sugar, and vegetable oil. In order to still provide authentic dairy flavor and texture we've included sodium caseinate-one of the proteins derived from milk curds. Sodium caseinate is 100% lactose free (though as a milk derivative, it is not suitable for vegans.) Our Vanilla version has natural vanilla flavor added for those who want a little something extra special. All together you get a creamy, vanilla-y substitute for actual cream-minus the lactose. Our Coffee Creamers are also gluten free and cholesterol free. (Compare this to regular half & half cream, which typically contains about 6mg cholesterol per 1 Tbsp. serving.) Pour some in your coffee, stir, and enjoy! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Lactose Free Vanilla Flavor Coffee Creamer
094231.name: Creamer French Vanilla Quart
094231.title: Trader Joe'S Coffee Creamer

094970.name: Half & Half Organic Pint
094970.title: Creamer Pint Trader Joe'S Organic Half & Half.

079971.name: Sunboy Spiked Coconut Water Variety Pack

179971.name: Sunboy Spiked Coconut Water Variety Pack

009146.description: Mild, sweet, amber-colored Trader Joe's Mostly Mesquite Honey is truly the bee's knees. This honey is called Mostly Mesquite because most of the honey is collected (almost) exclusively from bees who source nectar and pollen from Mesquite trees, named for its sweet honey-producing flowers, located in the Desert of Northern Mexico. Native Americans relied on the pods of Mesquite trees as a dietary staple for tea, syrup, and baked goods. We recommend doing just that, add TJ's Mostly Mesquite Honey to your cup of tea or to sweeten any beverage, drizzle over baked goods, spread toast with butter, cream cheese, or even a replacement for jelly in PB & J. Although it takes more than 5,000 individual flower-visits for bees to produce a single teaspoon of honey, it shouldn't take you more than a single Joe's visit to procure your $6.49*, 24-ounce bottle of Mostly Mesquite Honey. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing Mostly Mesquite Honey
009146.name: Mostly Mesquite Honey
009146.title: 100% Desert Mesquite Honey From The Desert Of Northern Mexico

030296.description: The iconic honey bear we've all seen in our pantry for years was inspired by a beloved classic cartoon character. You might know him. He's a cute, yellow teddy bear - short and stout and wears a little red t-shirt, who has an endless love for honey. Something like "Pinnie-the-Wooh" sound familiar? Oh, how he would adore Trader Joe's Multi-Floral and Clover Honey... so do we, and you will too! It's luscious, mildly sweet and amber-colored honey. We used to call this stuff simply "Clover Honey," but the bees can pollinate & forage the nectar of whatever plants they choose. So, on account of the fact that a different species of flora could lure the bees out of their beloved clover fields from time to time, we've added "Multi-Floral" to its moniker. It's very similar to our 24-ounce Multi-Floral & Clover Honey [sku 47195], but this one is in a classic 12-ounce squeezable bear, so cute you just want to squeeze 'em. You'll find each bear-shaped bottle of Trader Joe's Multi-Floral and Clover Honey, every day on our grocery shelves. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Multi-Floral and Clover Honey
030296.name: Multi-Floral And Clover Honey
030296.title: Multi-Floral & Clover Honey

047195.description: You know what they say... You catch more flies with honey than you do with vinegar! In other words, being sweet will get you much farther in life than being... vinegary. Or something like that. (We're not really sure how vinegar got selected for that old adage, but we sure do love honey... and we carry quite a lot of it.) Mild, sweet, amber-colored Trader Joe's Multifloral & Clover Honey honey is truly the bee's knees. We used to call this stuff simply "Clover Honey," but the bees can pollenate & forage the nectar of whatever plants they choose. So, on account of the fact that, a different species of flora could lure the bees out of their beloved clover fields from time to time, we've added "Multifloral" to its moniker. We're selling each 24-ounce squeezable bottle of Trader Joe's Multifloral & Clover Honey for $5.99,* every day. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing Multi-Floral & Clover Honey
047195.name: Multi-Floral And Clover Honey
047195.title: Multi-Floral & Clover Honey (24Oz) Clover Blossom Honey (12Oz)

062197.description: When was the last time you thought about the amazing origins of honey? This sweet treat is the product of hard-working bees that spend their lives sucking nectar from flowers; converting those complex sugars into simple sugars using enzymes from their bodies; and fanning the stored honey with their wings (after its been deposited in the honeycomb) until the water content is reduced just enough to resist fermentation and thicken into rich, flavorful food. We think something so precious should be delivered as simply and naturally as possible, and that's what we've attempted with our Organic Unfiltered Honey from Uruguay. It's carefully gathered from Uruguayan beehives, where the bees are living in proximity to eucalyptus and a variety of forest wildflower blooms. The harvested Honey is gently warmed to reverse any crystallization that has occurred, then loosely strained-just to remove foreign material, such as pieces of honeycomb. What remains is golden-hued honey that's cloudier than full- filtered honey. It's thick & sticky with mild, sweet honey flavor. It's delicious! Considering the hard work of the bees, we would be justified in charging a lot for this Organic Honey. However, considering our Customers-and their preference for value-we've decided to sell each 16-ounce squeeze bottle of Trader Joe's Organic Unfiltered Honey from Uruguay for $5.99, while our supply lasts. Bee-lieve it!
062197.name: Honey Org Unfiltered Squeeze
062197.title: Organic Unfiltered Honey

062962.description: Forget the apple. A spoonful of Manuka Honey each day carries some serious, health-promoting sway. Highly- valued and widely-used for its stable and powerful non-peroxide antibacterial activity, this honey is something special. The exorbitant pricing (a small jar can run from $20 - $50 dollars and up!) on Manuka, however, has been a barrier for some folks. Until now. While traveling in New Zealand, our buyers discovered the only Manuka Honey producer who is 100% vertically integrated. From the hives to the honey jar lid, they tend to it all. This structure allows for consistent production, as well as successful cost management-which leads to our exceptional price of $10.99 for a 8.8-ounce jar. Of course, it's what's in the jar that makes the real difference, and the quality of Mother Earth® New Zealand Manuka Honey is exceptional. The hives are located in a remote valley on the North Island of New Zealand, where the bees collect nectar exclusively from the flowers of the Manuka bush (also known as the "Tea Tree"). This singular pollen source is responsible for the robust flavor, which is sweet, with notes of menthol and eucalyptus. The monofloral pollen source is also responsible for the sought after health-promoting potency, indicated by a Unique Manuka Factor (UMFTM) classification of: 10+. (The UMFTM is a trademark of the Active Manuka Honey Organization, which has derived an internationally recognized testing and ranking process to verify the existence and strength of the non-peroxide antibacterial activity (10+ is good!). It is a designation that cannot appear on product packaging without licensure to do so, and since we know our customers are specifically looking for this attribute, we made the decision to replace our private-label TJ's Manuka Honey [sku 50760] with our vendor's branded version: Mother Earth® New Zealand Manuka Honey. It's the exact same honey that meets the exact same standards, only these standards are now more clearly noted. Honey, it's legit! You'll find it in our grocery aisle.
062962.name: Honey Manuka Mother Earth Umf 10+

076116.description: When sweet and savory come together successfully, it's always magical. If you can combine sweet and spicy, specifically, that's an entirely different level of magic. A few years ago, we achieved such sorcery with a delicately spiced Organic Spicy Honey Sauce [sku 69094]. However, it was difficult to source a steady supply; switching to a conventional honey base allows us to ensure consistent availability, and offer it in a larger format. Win-win! This new iteriation of Trader Joe's Spicy Honey Sauce delivers a harmonious intermingling of rich, aromatic honey and a thrilling kick from chili extract, held together with a bit of vinegar. It has the transformative power to augment sweet and savory dishes alike, turning merely delicious meals into transcendent ones. From something as simple as a baked sweet potato to something as rich as a slice of New York Cheesecake [sku 31185], a drizzling of Spicy Honey Sauce instantly gives anything it's added to an extra element of complexity. Try it on sandwiches, pizza, or tacos for an elevated everyday eating experience. Give it a go over freshly baked Organic Biscuits [sku 73768], air-fried Breaded Chicken Tenderloin Breasts [sku 88109], roasted veggies, or barbecued shrimp skewers for a bit of epicurean experimentation. Add some oomph to salad dressings, BBQ glazes, and marinades with a generous squeeze. And if you're really adventurous, you can even try it with pancakes, parfaits, or mixed into tequila- and rum-based cocktails. Magical, indeed. Spicy Honey Sauce
076116.name: Honey Spicy Sauce
076116.title: Spicy Honey Sauce

001911.description: Trader Joe's Pop-Up Sponges may seem indiscreet and compact at first glance, but there are 12 large 4¿-inch x 3¿-inch and 1 inch high sponges in each package! Great for storing when you have limited available space. When you are ready to see one in action, just soak in water and watch them expand in all their spongy glory. Trader Joe's Pop-Up Sponges are made from natural vegetable cellulose, so they are biodegradable in landfills - or better yet, diced up and tossed in the 'ole compost pile. They are highly absorbent, and sturdy enough for tough jobs so you can scour the messiest of dishes after preparing your other groceries from your Trader Joe's haul. Despite their ruggedness, our Pop-Up Sponges remain gentle on your cookware and tableware. And when they get a little dingy, don't be afraid to toss them on the top shelf of your dishwasher and breathe new life for a second wind! One of Trader Joe's many innovative household staples, our Pop-Up Sponges deserve a place under your kitchen sink today! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Pop-Up Sponges
001911.name: Pop Up Sponges
001911.title: Pop-Up Sponges

022902.description: It's easy to ignore what you can't see, but the truth is, fruits and vegetables that come home with you from the store may have residual chemicals on their skin. It's always a good idea to rinse off your produce, but it's an even better idea to take the extra step of washing your produce with Trader Joe's Fruit & Vegetable Wash. This Wash has been specially formulated to remove waxes (like what is sometimes applied to apples), and remnants of pesticides or other chemicals used in the growing process. Our Fruit & Vegetable Wash is made with simple, non-toxic ingredients, including purified water, natural cleansing agents derived from coconut and corn oils, grapefruit seed extract, and lemon-orange extract. By applying a few drops directly to your fruit or vegetable, massaging for a half-a-minute, and then rinsing thoroughly with water, you'll have readied your produce for carefree eating. If you've got a several pounds of produce to clean, simply add 1 Tbsp. of Trader Joe's Fruit & Vegetable Wash to 32 ounces (4 cups) of water. With this amount you can effectively wash up to 10 lbs. of produce. Find the 16 fluid-ounce bottle in our aisle with other TJ's household products. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Fruit & Vegetable Wash
022902.name: Cleaner Fruit & Veg Wash
022902.title: Veg & Fruit Wash

040298.description: Most bath tissue out there is not all that great for the environment, so we decided to change that and use 100% recycled material, 80% of which is post consumer content, for our Bath Tissue. Additionally, we sought to slap a Forest Stewardship Council badge on it meaning that the wood used has been harvested from responsibly managed, socially beneficial, environmentally conscious, and economically viable forests. Aside from being environmentally conscious, Trader Joe's Bath Tissue is also safe for sceptic tanks and manufactured using no chlorine bleach. With 12 rolls of 250 2-ply sheets per package, and each roll amounting to 350 sq ft, Trader Joe's Bath Tissue deal is a steal for $4.99* each day! It feels great; not distractingly luxurious, but none of that 1-ply thin feeling here. A happy medium of comfort for you and your guests to be properly equipped to tackle your Bath Tissue- needing bathroom business. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Bath Tissue
040298.name: Recycled Bath Tissue 2Ply

044191.description: Civilizations have been making messes since Ancient Mesopotamia, and while Trader Joe's Paper Towels haven't been around quite as long as civilization itself, we look to help clean the clutter for ages to come. A laundry list of possible uses makes these terrific towels a wonderful partner in clean-up-crime for any slew of sticky situations you find for you and yours. Rarely needing more than a single sheet, our Paper Towels are an elegantly simple and absorbent answer to many-a-life's-messes. But wait, there's more than meets the eye to Trader Joe's Paper Towels! We use 100% recycled material, 80% post consumer content, no frills recyclable packaging, and received Forest Stewardship Council sustainability certification to ensure we aren't creating any environmental mishmash with our paper towel production. With 3 rolls of 80 2-ply sheets per package, Trader Joe's Paper Towels may not be able to go back and clean the clutter of yesterday, but it'll be here to help you sop up the spilt organic free range goat milk of tomorrow. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Paper Towels
044191.name: Recycled Paper Towel 2Ply
044191.title: Slim Size Paper Towels

052206.description: Dear Customer, At Trader Joe's, there are certain everyday Values in our stores that we are especially proud of and, at least in some circles, known for. Like our 19¢ Bananas. And our $1.99 Peanut Butters. And our $3.99 Petite Bouquets. And our 3[ish]-Buck-Chuck Charles Shaw Wines¿. And our 99¢ Greeting Cards, a Value that's greeted our Customers for 15 years and counting. When you purchase a Greeting Card at Trader Joe's, you'll walk away with even more to celebrate than the birthday/ engagement/anniversary/etc. at hand. That's because you'll also be walking away with the knowledge that Trader Joe's Greeting Cards are printed on recycled paper (up to 30% of which is post-consumer waste) with soy-based inks and are-as of this summer-packaged in compostable protective sleeves. Plus, the paper itself is milled in Canada and Wisconsin, by two Forest Stewardship Council (FSC)®-certified sustainable operations. Pretty cool, eh? Once the Cards are printed and ready to go, each one is paired with an envelope and carefully hand-placed into its protective sleeve-a small but important step in the card-making process that creates employment opportunities for over 400 intellectually and physically disabled adults every year. Also pretty cool, eh? Now, let's talk design. TJ's 99¢ Greeting Card enthusiasts have called the art that appears on our Cards everything from "cute & creative" to "hip & trendy" to "seriously frame-able." True story. Then there's the sheer variety of the designs we offer-our Minnesota-based Greeting Card printer licenses art from an average of 300 different independent artists per year. These artists hail from all over the world, and many have been designing our cute, clever, & creative Cards for years now. Again, pretty darn cool¿ We're selling each single-fold, standard-sized Greeting Card for just 99¢, every single day of the year. ¿, TJ's
052206.name: Celebration Card

053386.description: Like supportive friend, a loyal family member, or a beloved pet, Trader Joe's Facial Tissues are always in your corner. Sure, they remain eerily silent & stoic most of the time, but, boy, are they there when you need them. It even says so on the box. They're there when you're sad. They're there when you're sick. They're there when you have to pick up icky things. Heck, they're even there when you run out of toilet paper how many friends can you say that about? Now, more than sixteen years after we first introduced the two of you, Trader Joe's Facial Tissues are also here when it's time to improve your interior design. Yup, you read that right: interior design-and that's in addition to the ultra-glamorous tasks of wiping tears, catching sneezes, etc. We know what you're thinking. How can TJ's Facial Tissues enhance entry-hall ambiance, liven up the latrine, or boost a bedroom's beauty when they're housed in such a dull, taupe box? Well...dull, taupe box be gone! In the spirit of Kaizen, we've reissued our tissues (or have we re- tissued our issues? #discuss) in six colorful, new boxes! Now, no matter the color, look, or "feel" of your room, we've got just the tissue box to complement it, from bright pink, green, & teal to pastel peach, purple, & mint. TJ's Tissues may be sporting jazzy new outfits, but as always, it's what's on the inside that counts. Luckily, in this case, what's on the inside is arguably even better-each box of FSC®-certified Trader Joe's Facial Tissues houses 95 absorbent, unbleached, two-ply Tissues made from 100% recycled & 80% post-consumer content. Not bad, eh? And if all of that wasn't enough to have you feeling taken with our Tissues, let our price win you over: we're selling each box for just 99¢, every day. That's ninety-five Tissues for ninety-nine cents. Now, go hurry on down to your local Trader Joe's before those tears of joy make a mess of your mascara¿
053386.name: Facial Tissues 2Ply

058328.description: At Trader Joe's, we're suckers for a Kaizen opportunity, and when our household products Buyer noticed that our now-former Dish Soaps [skus 65394 and 53967] weren't suds-ing up like they once did, she knew we could do better. So we did-and our new and improved Liquid Dish Soap is a plant-based, grease-cutting, kitchen- cleaner-upper's dream. Trader Joe's Liquid Dish Soap is highly efficacious (i.e., you can use less soap and get more suds), and, unlike its predecessors, it's free from unnecessary artificial colors and synthetic fragrances. Instead, this Dish Soap is crystal-clear and scented with nothing but soothing Lavender and Tea Tree oils. It's also formulated to be phosphate-free and hypoallergenic (so it's gentle on skin), and it's biodegradable. In fact, our Dish Soap happens to be a USDA Certified Biobased product, which means that a certain percentage of its content comes from renewable biological sources-87%, to be exact. Finally, per usual, it's never tested on animals. Trader Joe's Liquid Dish Soap may be new and improved, but the price remains the same-just $2.99 for a 25-ounce bottle. You'll find it in our household products section, ready to inspire your dish to run away with your spoon... 01.29. 18
058328.name: Lavender Dish Soap
058328.title: Liquid Dish Soap Lavender Tea Tree Scent

058329.description: At Trader Joe's, we're suckers for a Kaizen opportunity, and when our household products Buyer noticed that our now-former Dish Soaps [skus 65394 and 53967] weren't suds-ing up like they once did, she knew we could do better. So we did-and our new and improved Liquid Dish Soap is a plant-based, grease-cutting, kitchen- cleaner-upper's dream. Trader Joe's Liquid Dish Soap is highly efficacious (i.e., you can use less soap and get more suds), and, unlike its predecessors, it's free from unnecessary artificial colors and too-heavy fragrances. Instead, this Dish Soap is crystal-clear and scented with nothing but a light, naturally-derived Citrus fragrance. It's also formulated to be phosphate-free and hypoallergenic (so it's gentle on skin), and it's biodegradable. In fact, our Dish Soap happens to be a USDA Certified Biobased product, which means that a certain percentage of its content comes from renewable biological sources-87%, to be exact. Finally, per usual, it's never tested on animals. Trader Joe's Liquid Dish Soap may be new and improved, but the price remains the same-just $2.99 for a 25-ounce bottle. You'll find it in our household products section, ready to inspire your dish to run away with your spoon... 01.29. 18
058329.name: Citrus Dish Soap
058329.title: Liquid Dish Soap Citrus Scent

063302.description: Oh, hello there-we didn't see you come in¿ You'll have to excuse us; you've caught us right in the middle of "Joe time." But please, pull up a chair! Relax with us. We're big fans of relaxing. And, these days, we're closer than ever to peak Zen, thanks to our new, world-class Essential Oils Collection, available for a limited time this holiday season at your neighborhood Trader Joe's. With this Collection, you'll have the essentials covered. Each boxed set comes with three pure, additive-free, highly fragrant Oils-Lavender to soothe, Lemon to energize, & Eucalyptus to invigorate-plus an innovative diffuser made from colorful New Zealand wool, dyed only with naturally available ingredients. Place 3-4 drops of Lavender Essential Oil on the wool diffuser balls to scent your space and soothe you to sleep. Add 2-3 drops of the Lemon Essential Oil to a spray bottle filled with warm water to create a non-toxic household cleaner; sprinkle 3-4 drops of Eucalyptus Essential Oil in a hot, relaxing muscle (or sinus) recovery bath... the possibilities are endless. And oily. Some popular "oil clubs" charge anywhere from $6 to $16 per bottle for oils this pure. At Trader Joe's, however, we skip the middleman and buy directly from the source-which means that we're able to offer you three 10mL bottles of Essential Oils (plus a nifty diffuser) for $11.99. But hurry! A gift set this good won't last long...
063302.name: Essential Oils & Diffuser Set

064254.description: Some folks loathe laundry day. Trader Joe's, however, has a ball on laundry day-literally, thanks to Trader Joe's Wool Dryer Balls! We love these fuzzy, spherical dryer-sheet alternatives, and we suspect you will, too. You know what they say-dryer sheets are temporary, but dryer balls are forever¿ Soft, off-white, and about the size of a tennis ball, each Trader Joe's Wool Dryer Ball is hand-made in Nepal, using 100% New Zealand sheep's wool. In a process known as "felting," skilled workers wrap the wool into loose balls, wet them with warm water, hand-roll them while applying significant pressure, then lay them in the sun to dry. (The combination of moisture and warmth works to compact and stiffen the wool fibers-if you've ever had the misfortune of accidentally tossing your favorite wool sweater in the wash, you're familiar with this phenomenon¿) Finally, once the Wool Balls are completely dry, they're grouped into sets of four, packaged in cotton drawstring bags (no plastic packaging here, folks!), and shipped to your neighborhood TJ's. Trader Joe's Wool Dryer Balls can be reused for years on end-they really are the perfect, eco-chic replacement for those waxy, disposable dryer sheets you've been using. Simply toss all four Balls in the dryer with your laundry, and they'll reduce static, decrease dry time, make clothes fluffier, and keep fabrics softer. Unlike others on the market, our Wool Dryer Balls are free from dyes and fragrances. But that said, if you would like to scent your laundry, just add a few drops of your favorite essential oil (time to break out the TJ's Essential Oils Collection!) to one of the Dryer Balls, and you'll have laundry that's lightly scented but still free from chemical fragrances. Speaking of being unlike others on the market, perhaps the most unique feature of our Wool Dryer Balls is their price: we're selling each set of four for $5.49. That's an incredible value; these very same Dryer Balls are sold for two (or three!) times as much elsewhere. You'll find them with our household products. 09.17. 18
064254.name: Dryer Balls Wool

065312.description: "Odor, odor in the air; TJ's Room Spritz shall banish thee from my lair!" -Snow White...in the oft-overlooked epilogue to her original story If you've ever been stuck in a stinky space, you know what a difference an air-freshener can make. (Snow White definitely knew-she bunked with seven male miners, for Pete's sake!) Most space & air-freshening sprays, however, contain a myriad of harsh, synthetic fragrances-and for many, that's more like a migraine-in-the- making than a breath of fresh air. But once upon a time, our Buyer knew that we could do better... After a few false starts, she sucessfully sniffed out a solution: Trader Joe's Super Lemon Room Spritz. Made with nothing but water, lemon myrtle oil, spearmint oil, & a sorbitol-based emulsifier (to keep the oil & water from separating), it's truly the air-freshening alternative you've been waiting for. It's light, it's lemony-Super Lemon-y, in fact-and it's ready drive out the funk! A single spritz o' Spritz goes a long way, but our Buyer keeps a bottle in every room-least no bathroom, kitchen, or closet go un-freshened. We're selling each 1.69-fluid ounce bottle of TJ's Room Spritz for an incredible $1.99, so you can follow suit, stock up, and live happily ever after. Look for it with our household & hygiene items.
065312.name: Super Lemon Room Spritz

065400.description: At Trader Joe's, we love a good kaizen opportunity when we see one. And recently, after reviewing our private label household products lineup, we saw one-specifically, an opportunity to improve our much-loved Multi- Purpose Cedarwood & Sage Cleaner. New Trader Joe's Multi-Purpose Cleaner delivers the same crisp, clean scent and gentle-yet-effective, plant- based cleaning power that our Customers have always loved-minus the synthetic dye, the methylisothiazolinone, and the laureth/myreth-5. Made with real Cedarwood & Sage oils and coconut-derived surfactants, it's a biodegradable, never-tested-on-animals, multi-use solution that's perfect for cleaning any water-safe surface in your home, from walls & countertops to tile & mirrors. We're selling each 34-ounce bottle of Trader Joe's Multi-Purpose Cleaner for $2.99, the same great price we've held since we introduced it in our stores more than fifteen years ago. You'll find it in our household products section.
065400.name: Zen Multipurpose Cleaner
065400.title: Multi-Purpose Cleaner Cedarwood & Sage

065404.description: Eighteen years ago, when we first introduced our Lavender Scent Liquid Laundry Detergent [now sku 65405] to the world, it was one of just a few "eco-friendly" liquid detergents on the market. With its dye-free formula and coconut-derived surfactants, it was actually kind of... cutting edge. But science marches forward, and times change-as do the ingredients that our Customers do & do not want to see in their household products... which for some folks, as it turns out, includes added fragrance of any kind, natural or not. For these folks, we've added Trader Joe's Free & Clear Liquid Laundry Detergent. It has the same "new & improved" formula as its lavender-scented counterpart-i.e., it's also made with coconut-derived surfactants, contains stain-fighting enzymes, and is free from optical brighteners-but instead of essential oil-based fragrance, it contains no added fragrance. Even without the essential oils, it's still impressively effective at removing odors. But don't take our word for it-grab a load of your dirtiest, stinkiest laundry and put it to the test! We're selling each 50-fluid-ounce jug of TJ's Free & Clear Liquid Laundry Detergent of for $5.99.* Find it in our household products section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Free & Clear Liquid Laundry Detergent
065404.name: Liquid Laundry Detergent Free & Clear

065405.description: Eighteen years ago, when we first introduced our Lavender Scent Liquid Laundry Detergent to the world, it was one of the few "eco-friendly" liquid detergents on the market. With its essential oil-based fragrance and coconut-derived surfactants, it was actually kind of... cutting edge. But science marches forward, and times change-as do the ingredients that our Customers do & do not want to see in their household products. This revamped Trader Joe's Lavender Scent Liquid Laundry Detergent still cleans with coconut-derived surfactants and is still hypoallergenic and made without dyes or chemical fragrances (essential oils for the win!), but now, it's also free from optical brighteners. Instead, we've added stain-fighting enzymes (protease, amylase & mannanese) to the formula, improving its overall efficacy. But don't take our word for it-grab a load of your dirtiest, stinkiest laundry and put it to the test! We're selling each 100-fluid-ounce jug of new & improved TJ's Lavender Scent Liquid Laundry Detergent of for $9.99.* Find it in our household products section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Lavender Scent Liquid Laundry Detergent
065405.name: Liquid Laundry Detergent Lavender Scent

065582.description: First created in the late 17th century, right in the middle of Japan's Edo period of history, Binchotan Charcoal has remained a fundamental part of artisan grilling in Japan ever since. Made from hard, dense ubame oak, Binchotan is considered one of the highest quality charcoals commercially available, lauded both for its intensely hot and long-lasting burn, and its ability to absorb odors. It's also the star of Trader Joe's Japanese Binchotan Charcoal Infused Cloth, an innovative, luxurious, and altogether extremely handy cloth, for all your cooking, cleaning, scrubbing, or sports-related needs. Made for us by a company in Japan who originally used the material to create mosquito netting, each 13.5 inch by 13.5 inch Cloth is made from a blend of 18% cotton and 82% rayon (which is made from wood pulp), the threads of which have been expertly infused with Binchotan Charcoal. Upon first opening the package, you may notice that the dry Cloth is relatively stiff. However, once you give it a quick soak in some warm water, and allow the rayon/cotton blend to absorb a bit, it quickly becomes delightfully soft. In fact, each Cloth will only grow softer with each use, making it a perfect candidate for use as a washcloth or gym towel, as well as being great for the kitchen and other cleaning purposes. In addition to being luxuriously soft, its Binchotan Charcoal infusion helps absorb odors in whatever you're using it on - a trait that's particularly helpful if you happen to use it as a gym towel¿ You might expect to pay top dollar for such luxury and innovation, but at Trader Joes, you can find our Japanese Binchotan Charcoal Infused Cloths for $4.99, every day. Find them with our household goods.
065582.name: Japanese Cloth

066998.description: Trader Joe's Lavender Dryer Bags leave linens and laundry with the relaxing scent of lavender for a relaxing sensory experience beginning the second you pop one in your dryer. With four sachets ready to relax and soothe, you'll never be able to go back to a "plainly" scented fresh linens again. There's nothing like the comfort of wrapping up in a clean, lavender-scented bath sheet on a chilly morning, or curling up in soft, lavender-scented bedsheets after a stressful day. Toss a Lavender Dryer Bag in your dryer and when the buzzer rings, you'll have a basketful of clean laundry teeming with those coveted floral and herbal notes. And after several dryer cycles, you'll have yet another use for these sachets-simply sprinkle the florets on your carpet and vacuum them up for an instant room freshener! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Lavender Dryer Bags
066998.name: Lavender Dryer Sachet
066998.title: Reusable Lavender Dryer Bags

068581.description: Take a moment to consider the simple, peaceful comforts of lighting a nice scented candle for yourself. Everything from the lighting of the wick, providing both light and a bit of heat, to the time spent in quiet consideration as the fragrance slowly fills the room gives you a pronounced sense of feeling safe and sound at home. Trader Joe's Citronella Candle takes that feeling one step further with an infusion of citronella and lemon eucalyptus oil, two essential oils that provide a remarkably relaxing, citrusy scent, and help keep flying insects at bay. What's more peaceful than that? Each brightly-scented, 9.5-ounce Citronella Candle is made from a blend of soy wax, beeswax, and coconut oil, which is poured into a recyclable, pull-top can and fitted with two cotton wicks. All in all, you should get about 28 hours of burn time from each Candle, a remarkable figure considering our retail of $4.99*. That said, we're only selling these now through the end of summer, so make sure to grab one soon - deals like these tend to burn the wick at both ends, so to speak. While supplies last, you can find Trader Joe's Citronella Candles in our household section, along with our other scented candles. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Citronella Candle
068581.name: Candle Citronella In A Can

072876.description: Dear Customer, At Trader Joe's, there are certain everyday Values in our stores that we are especially proud of and, at least in some circles, known for. Like our 19¢ Bananas. And our $1.99 Peanut Butters. And our $3.99 Petite Bouquets. And our 3[ish]-Buck-Chuck Charles Shaw Wines¿. And our 99¢ Greeting Cards, a Value that's greeted our Customers for 15 years and counting. When you purchase a Greeting Card at Trader Joe's, you'll walk away with even more to celebrate than the birthday/ engagement/anniversary/etc. at hand. That's because you'll also be walking away with the knowledge that Trader Joe's Greeting Cards are printed on recycled paper (up to 30% of which is post-consumer waste) with soy-based inks and are-as of this summer-packaged in compostable protective sleeves. Plus, the paper itself is milled in Canada and Wisconsin, by two Forest Stewardship Council (FSC)®-certified sustainable operations. Pretty cool, eh? Once the Cards are printed and ready to go, each one is paired with an envelope and carefully hand-placed into its protective sleeve-a small but important step in the card-making process that creates employment opportunities for over 400 intellectually and physically disabled adults every year. Also pretty cool, eh? Now, let's talk design. TJ's 99¢ Greeting Card enthusiasts have called the art that appears on our Cards everything from "cute & creative" to "hip & trendy" to "seriously frame-able." True story. Then there's the sheer variety of the designs we offer-our Minnesota-based Greeting Card printer licenses art from an average of 300 different independent artists per year. These artists hail from all over the world, and many have been designing our cute, clever, & creative Cards for years now. Again, pretty darn cool¿ We're selling each single-fold, standard-sized Greeting Card for just 99¢, every single day of the year. ¿, TJ's
072876.name: Birthday Card

072884.name: Greeting Card

074545.description: Let's face it: keeping your house clean is a dirty job. Even aside from the actual dirt and grime involved, many cleaning supplies tend to use harsh-smelling, lung-irritating chemicals like chlorine bleach. Which is precisely why we're introducing Trader Joe's Fresh Citrus All Purpose Disinfectant Cleaner to our shelves. Not only does it kill 99.9% of common household bacteria and viruses on all sorts of surfaces, it does so without the use of chlorine bleach, phosphates, or sodium laureth sulfate-and leaves behind a refreshingly sweet Citrus scent, to boot. Made with a 2.4% solution of hydrogen peroxide as its active ingredient, this Cleaner truly is All Purpose, adept at dealing with everything from tough grease stains in the kitchen, to mold and mildew in the bathroom. An excellent choice for both big projects and everyday tidying-up, all it takes to effectively clean, deodorize, and disinfect is to spray the affected area with Cleaner until thoroughly wet, allow to sit for 20 minutes, then wipe away. Clean and simple-just how we like it. Fresh Citrus All-Purpose Disinfectant Cleaner
074545.name: Disinfectant Cleaner Citrus
074545.title: All Purpose Disinfectant Cleaner

075091.description: Spills are one of life's less-than-pleasant inevitabilities, to be sure. Lucky for you and for household surfaces everywhere, even the soggiest of spills and messiest of messes are no match for Trader Joe's Reusable Sponge Cloths. Made with a feel-it-to-believe-it, soft-yet-sturdy blend of 70% cellulose and 30% cotton, these Cloths are highly - impressively - absorbent, making them excellent, eco-friendly alternatives to paper towels. Whether you're sopping up spilled apple juice or scrubbing down crumb-y countertops, watching our Sponge Cloths in action is truly a sight to behold. They're also magnificently low-maintenance; once you've finished tidying up, rinse them out, lay them flat to dry, and they're ready to reuse. If the Cloths themselves need a little cleaning, simply toss them in your washing machine or dishwasher with a normal load, and - presto! Good as new. Just be sure to skip the dryer afterwards to preserve the integrity of the material. Reusable Sponge Cloths
075091.name: Sponge Cloth 5/Pkg
075091.title: Reusable Sponge Cloths

075552.description: One of the best ways we've found to reduce waste is to find alternatives to single-use plastics, and one of the best ways we've found to do that is through the use of these Reusable Silicone Food Storage Bags! They're made with super premium, food-grade, platinum silicone, which in addition to being the highest quality of silicone available in the U.S., is definitely the silicone with the coolest name available in the U.S. They're microwave, freezer, and dishwasher safe, and each package contains three bags, each in one of three different sizes: small, which can hold up to 8.45 fluid ounces in volume (enough to hold a couple servings of trail mix), medium, which can hold up to 23.67 fluid ounces (enough to hold a well-stacked sandwich) and large, which holds up to 33.81 fluid ounces (enough to hold roughly 3-4 slices of pizza). Super functional (and, if you ask us, rather fashionable), these Reusable Bags improve on their single-use counterparts in practically every way: they're super durable, they zip open and closed like a dream, and they even stand up on their own for ease of filling. In short, they're great for storing everything from leftovers to pre-prepped ingredients, school lunches, and afternoon snacks. The next time you bring a sandwich on a hike, picnic, or road trip, take it in one of our Reusable Silicone Food Storage Bags and let it travel in style. Reusable Silicone Food Storage Bags
075552.name: 3 Silicone Food Storage Bags
075552.title: Reusable Silicone Food Storage Bags

075664.description: Ever since we added a "Home, Bath & Beauty" category to our annual Trader Joe's Customer Choice Awards ballot, our seasonal Scented Candles have collectively nabbed the top spot. Between their natural soy wax, coconut oil, and beeswax blend, their lead-free cotton wicks, their totally travelable tin packaging (lid included!), and-of course-their impressively realistic scents, they simply can't be beat! Right now, there's a new beacon on the block: Trader Joe's Woodlands Scented Candle. In candle-speak, "throw" is the term used to describe how well a candle's scent circulates throughout a space, and folks, this Candle has great throw. With just the flick of a match, you'll feel like you're walking through, well, a magical Woodland, enveloped by the lush, earthy warmth of cypress, jasmine, moss, vetiver, and cedar. Oh, and did we mention that this Scented Candle comes in a limited-edition, matte black tin? Très chic. Like the other luminaries in this lineup, we're selling 5.7-ounce Woodlands Scented Candles for a limited time only. You'll find them in our household products section. Woodlands Scented Candle
075664.name: Candle Woodlands
075664.title: Woodlands Scented Candle

078022.description: Unless you dine out every day (or you've figured out some trick that we haven't yet), you're eventually, inevitably, going to have to do the dishes. So why not make the job a little simpler with Trader Joe's Automatic Dishwasher Detergent Packs? Proudly available in plastic-free packaging, our convenient, single-use Dishwasher Detergent Packs employ the power of potent enzymes like protease and amylase, as well as plant- based surfactants like corn-derived caprylyl/capyrl glucoside, to leave all kinds of dishwasher-safe kitchenware sparkling and spotless. Use one Detergent Pack for each load of your automatic dishwasher, making sure that your hands are dried off before handling (the wrapper for each Pack is made of a water soluble material, and you won't want them to open up and spill their contents before they're ready!). For best results, we find that turning your dishes so that the soiled side is facing the center of the machine lets the Detergent do its job most efficiently. Lastly, if you're going to be washing aluminum, silver, or stainless steel items, separating them into their own loads will keep them looking their best-a little like doing separate light and dark loads for your laundry. Automatic Dishwasher Detergent Packs
078022.name: Dish Detergent Packs
078022.title: Automatic Dishwasher Detergent Packs Free & Clear

082604.description: You've picked up a bottle of wine, your favorite cheese and perhaps a loaf of fresh, crusty bread. The stage is set for a perfect evening, if only you had a corkscrew. We now have a reliable, affordable wine opener that you can keep in your purse, briefcase, backpack or picnic basket. Actually, at $1.99, it's so affordable, you might want to buy a bunch and keep one in all of these places. Our new wine opener uses a sturdy double lever system that allows for controlled, vertical cork extraction which prevents bending, breaking or cracking the cork. It has a serrated knife and a blade for cutting capsules and a built in bottle opener too!
082604.name: Favorite Cork Puller

098207.description: Given the success of our other paper products in the household category, we thought a soft and strong, super absorbent napkin that was perfect for any meal would be a natural winner! And our napkins are made of 100% recycled paper which is another value added benefit. Our napkins are 2 ply which gives them lots of strength and added absorbency. And the best part is that they are only $1.99 for 100 napkins, so a little goes a long way with our new all occasion napkins!!
098207.name: All Occasion Napkins 2 Ply

099131.description: "What's in a name? That which we call a rose By any other name would smell as sweet" We like to think Juliet meant that because Trader Joe's Super Soft Bath Tissue has "Super Soft" in the name that she was agreeing that a roll of this feels just like what it says - and maybe even leaves a rosy scent? While the later may not be true, this lavatory luxury is deserving of the 'super soft' title. And it doesn't just cater those currently in the restroom! We've gone to create a chlorine bleach free, FSC and Rainforest Alliance certified, septic safe, and recyclable bath tissue that is as kind to your behind as it is to the environment. With six gigantic rolls of 350 2-ply sheets per package, Trader Joe's Super Soft Bath Tissue is a steal-of- a-deal for $3.99* each and every day! If you, too, keep this stocked each and every day, you'll be spoiling yourself and guests for years of bathroom visits to come. An extravagant comfort such as this will leave you equipped to tackle any and all Super Soft Bath Tissue-needing bathroom business. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Super Soft Bath Tissue
099131.name: Bath Tissue 6 Double Rolls
099131.title: Super Soft Bath Tissue

045883.description: Trader Joe's French Vanilla Ice Cream is a super premium vanilla ice cream that talks the talk - we don't mean French; we mean the language of flavor! Our rich French Vanilla Ice Cream has an unmistakably creamy-custard texture that can be enjoyed plain or used as a companion for any combination of cookies, candies, and chocolates. What makes a half-gallon of French vanilla ice cream "French", you ask? It has nothing to do with the vanilla bean itself (which is only grown near the equator, not near France at all); it merely means that the ice cream begins with a base that contains egg yolks, unlike regular vanilla ice cream. Trader Joe's French Vanilla Ice Cream is made in this French tradition, which ultimately lends a pale-yellow color and a richer, smoother consistency than traditional vanilla ice cream. Notice that super premium designation? To get there, an ice cream must have less than 50% overrun, meaning that one gallon of mix would create no more than one and a half gallons of finished ice cream. Trader Joe's French Vanilla Ice Cream has 26% overrun - aka dense, super SUPER premium ice cream! We're selling each half-gallon container of French Vanilla Ice Cream for $5.99*. Find it in our freezers and fill your favorite cone today! *Please Check QIL to confirm current pricing French Vanilla Ice Cream
045883.name: Vanilla Ice Cream 1/2 Gallon
045883.title: French Vanilla Ice Cream

053340.description: Trader Joe's Speculoos Cookie Butter and our variations on the theme (i.e. Speculoos Crunchy Cookie But- ter [sku 97846], Speculoos Cookie and Cocoa Swirl [sku 51129]) are irresistible and easy to spread on waffles, pancakes, toast, apples, and even other cookies. But butter isn't so easily "spread" on ice cream. (Actually, in a recent feature on our Dig In blog, we imagined and constructed 16 different sundaes using our products, one of which included a sauce of heated Cookie Butter¿ tasty, but not the most effortless medium for drizzling!) If you've been dreaming, like us, of that no-brainer combination of ice cream and Speculoos Cookie But- ter, you can wake up now¿ it's here! This food-fantasy-come-true is churned exclusively for us in Cleveland, Ohio using only the freshest Midwest cream. It's flavored with the finest vanilla extract from Madagascar, and speckled with actual pieces of Speculoos-the original Belgian cookie that started it all. Of course, our famous Cookie Butter, itself, is swirled throughout. How to serve it? Easy. Get a spoon and a bowl. Or, fill your favorite cone. Top a fresh made brownie, or toasted waffle. Put a scoop next to your birthday cake. We've yet to create a Speculoos Pie, but you can make your own by softening two quarts of Cookie Butter Ice Cream in the refrigerator for about 20 minutes, and spoon the softened ice cream into a graham cracker or chocolate cookie crust. Smooth it out with a knife or spatula and decorate the top with shaved chocolate. Yum! The one-quart (32-ounce) carton is $4.49. You'll find it in our freezer case¿ that is, assuming we can keep it stocked! 8.08.1 4
053340.name: Speculoos Cookie Butter Ice Cream

057185.description: When we first introduced our Hold the Cone! Mini Ice Cream Cones back in 2011 [skus 95433 & 95434], they were an instant hit with our customers. Who could resist these adorably miniature and satisfyingly indulgent little Cones? Very few, it seemed. Very few. But at Trader Joe's, we are always interested in improving upon a good thing-so last year, our buyer set out to see if we could "build a better cone," as it were. As it would turn out, we could. And we did. Our new Hold the Cone! Mini Ice Cream Cones begin with a crispier, crunchier cone, lined with fine European- sourced and U.S.-made chocolate; the chocolate is notably richer and more flavorful than in our previous incarnation. Next, these mini, chocolate-lined treasures are piped full of thick, creamy Vanilla ice cream. The Ice Cream our new vendor makes is so deliciously dense because it contains only around 50% overrun (that's ice cream lingo for the amount of air whipped into the ice cream to expand its volume), which is impressive when you consider that most ice cream used in frozen novelties contains around 90% overrun. Finally, the Cones are dipped-upside down, no less!-in more of that fine, fine chocolate. Snatch a Mini Cone (or three) out of the freezer whenever your sweet tooth calls-at under 100 calories each, they are easily worth the indulgence. If you're in the mood to share, serve these Mini Ice Cream Cones at parties- they're perfect for a simple-but-highly-Instagram-able baby shower, birthday party, graduation banquet, etc. Plus, they're an incredible value. We've increased the overall weight of the product by a third (from 5.9 to 7.89 ounces, to be exact), but we haven't increased the price-each box of 8 Mini Vanilla Ice Cream Cones is still just $2.99. You'll find them along with their Chocolate [sku 57186] counterparts in our freezers. 05.22. 17
057185.name: Hold The Cone! Vanilla
057185.title: Hold The Cone! Mini Ice Cream Cones - Vanilla

But at Trader Joe's, we are always interested in improving upon a good thing-so last year, our buyer set out to see if we could "build a better cone," as it were. As it would turn out, we could. And we did. Our new Hold the Cone!
