057186.name: Chocolate Hold The Cone! Mini Ice Cream Cones

058761.description: When you eat ice cream, it's best to put it in a bowl. When you drink coffee, it's best to put it in a cup. What if we told you it was possible to enjoy both ice cream and coffee without a bowl or a cup-and also with some brownies added into the mix? It seems like something only achievable in dreams, but Trader Joe's Brownie Crisp Coffee Ice Cream Sandwiches make those dreams a reality. We first take two TJ's Brownie Crisps [sku 55092]. Then, we take coffee ice cream-made with coffee syrup, Colombian coffee extract, and espresso grounds-and put a scoop between the brownies. The best part? The ice cream softens up the crisps just enough to give them a deliciously fudgy texture-no soggy sandwiches here. The chocolaty chunks in the brownie crisps and the espresso grounds in the ice cream make for some sophisti- cated flavors you might not expect in an ice cream sandwich-but ones you'll be overjoyed to encounter. Though these lil' Sandwiches are bursting with coffee flavor, we don't blame you if you want to pair it with even more coffee. What could be better than an ice cream sandwich and a glass of TJ's Coffee Cold Brew Concentrate [sku 50759]? We're selling each 10-ounce package of four Brownie Crisp Coffee Ice Cream Sandwiches for $3.99-a sweet value for an even sweeter, chocolaty, crispy, coffee delight. 06.05. 17
058761.name: Brownie Crisp Ice Crm Sandwich
058761.title: Brownie Crisp Coffee Ice Cream Sandwiches

061854.description: If we placed a bowl of our new, very purple Trader Joe's Ube Ice Cream in front of you, what flavor would you guess it is? Grape? Blackberry? Blueberry, perhaps? Well, if you were to guess "Yam," you'd be right! Some might be surprised by the idea of a Yam Flavored Ice Cream, but those familiar with Ube [OO-beh]-the name Purple Yams are known by in the Philippines-know that it's actually a very popular flavor in jams, cakes, candies...and Ice Cream! But what does it taste like, you ask? It's creamy. It's sweet. It's nutty. Some liken it to a cross between vanilla and pistachio, with hints of coconut mixed in. And unlike most ube-flavored ice creams, ours contains real ube purée. Trust us, you're gonna like it. Plus, you can rest easy knowing that its purple hue is from naturally derived ingredients like grape extract and beet juice, not artificial dyes. You know what else is naturally derived? The pure joy you'll experience as you sample your first scoop (or polish off your first pint) of Ube Ice Cream. Serve it in a bowl, flanked by TJ's Vanilla Batons [sku 63485] and sprinkled with TJ's Roasted Coconut Chips [sku 98186] or crumbled TJ's Benne Wafer Cookies [sku 60493]. Sandwich a small scoop between two TJ's Belgian Butter Waffle Cookies [67004]. Toss the whole pint in a blender along with 1/2 cup of whole milk and pulse until you've got yourself an Ube milkshake...and thank us later. Whatever you do, if you've got an appetite for ube, you best u-bey that craving immediately-because we're selling Trader Joe's Ube Ice Cream for a limited time only, priced to sell at $2.99 per purply pint.
061854.name: Ice Cream Ube Pint
061854.title: Ube Ice Cream

062834.description: Identical in size and shape to their Chocolate and Vanilla cousins, Chocolate Chip Hold the Cone! Mini Ice Cream Cones are nonetheless unique - and uniquely delicious. Rather than traditonal sugar cones, these feature chocolate cones, and rather than a simple, smooth, ice cream filling, these feature ice cream studded with rich chocolate chips. Another Hold the Cone! hallmark are the lined cones. Here, the chocolate cones are lined with the same chocolatey coating that tops the ice cream - that creamy cone-lining not only tastes great, it also keeps the ice cream from leaking out as you enjoy your Mini Cone. Win! These treats, like their relatives in the freezer case, are made exclusively for Trader Joe's, so if it's a Mini Ice Cream Cone fix you desire, a trip to Trader Joe's is the stuff of dreams made real. We're selling Trader Joe's Chocolate Chip Hold the Cone! Mini Ice Cream Cones in a 7.9 ounce box of eight. You'll find them in our freezers, next to the other Hold the Cone! varieties. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Chocolate Chip Hold The Cone!
062834.name: Hold The Cone! Choc Chip
062834.title: Chocolate Chip Hold The Cone

064499.description: Trader Joe's Mochi is back & better than ever! When we say "better than ever," we're not kidding. With delightfully chewy rice-dough exteriors and high butterfat ice-cream interiors, Trader Joe's Mochi are the cream of the crop, literally and figuratively. They're being made for us by a new supplier (a much-loved U.S. mochi-maker), and this time, the Mochi are being produced under our private label. What does this mean, you ask? This means that, by definition, Trader Joe's Mochi are free from the undesirable ingredients you'd find in most mass-produced mochi-like high fructose corn syrup, artificial flavors, & synthetic colors. Instead, Trader Joe's Mochi are sweetened with cane sugar, flavored with natural flavors, and colored with naturally available ingredients. Trader Joe's Strawberry Mochi, for example-which just so happens to be the final (for now) flavor back on the freezer scene-is flavored with real strawberry purée. Also by definition, these magnificent, mouthwatering, small-but-mighty Mochi are a terrific value-we're selling each 6.8-ounce box of six kosher-certified, gluten-free Trader Joe's Mochi for $4.49. Find them in our freezers. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Strawberry Mochi
064499.name: Mochi Strawberry
064499.title: Strawberry Mochi

064500.description: Where's the Mochi, Trader Joe's?! If you had asked us this question a month ago (and you did ask us a month ago, and the month before that, and the month before that¿), we would have said, "Coming soon, Dear Customer- coming soon." But if you ask us this question now, well, you might just get a different answer. Scratch that-you will get a different answer. So, go ahead, ask us! Because we're just dying to shout¿that CLASSIC MOCHI IS BACK AND BETTER THAN EVER AT YOUR NEIGHBORHOOD TRADER JOE'S! When we say "better than ever," we're not kidding. With delightfully chewy rice-dough exteriors and high butterfat ice-cream interiors, Trader Joe's Mochi are the cream of the crop, literally and figuratively. They're being made for us by a new supplier (a much-loved U.S. mochi-maker), and this time, the Mochi are being produced under our private label. What does this mean, you ask? This means that, by definition, these Mochi are free from certain undesirable ingredients you'd find in most mass-produced mochi, such as high fructose corn syrup, artificial flavors, and synthetic colors. Instead, Trader Joe's Mochi are sweetened with cane sugar, flavored with natural flavors, and colored with naturally available ingredients. (Our Vanilla Mochi, for example-which just so happens to be the second mochi flavor back on the freezer scene-is flavored with real vanilla extract & vanilla bean seeds.) Also by definition, these magnificent, mouthwatering, small-but-mighty Mochi are a terrific value-we're selling each 6.8-ounce box of six kosher-certified, gluten-free Trader Joe's Mochi for $4.49. Find them in our freezers.
064500.name: Mochi Vanilla
064500.title: Vanilla Mochi

064669.description: Where's the Mochi, Trader Joe's?! If you had asked us this question a month ago (and you did ask us a month ago, and the month before that, and the month before that¿), we would have said, "Coming soon, Dear Customer- coming soon." But if you ask us this question now, well, you might just get a different answer. Scratch that-you will get a different answer. So, go ahead, ask us! Because we're just dying to shout¿that CLASSIC MOCHI IS BACK AND BETTER THAN EVER AT YOUR NEIGHBORHOOD TRADER JOE'S! When we say "better than ever," we're not kidding. With delightfully chewy rice-dough exteriors and high butterfat ice-cream interiors, Trader Joe's Mochi are the cream of the crop, literally and figuratively. They're being made for us by a new supplier (a much-loved U.S. mochi-maker), and this time, the Mochi are being produced under our private label. What does this mean, you ask? This means that, by definition, these Mochi are free from certain undesirable ingredients you'd find in most mass-produced mochi, such as high fructose corn syrup, artificial flavors, and synthetic colors. Instead, Trader Joe's Mochi are sweetened with cane sugar, flavored with natural flavors, and colored with naturally available ingredients. (Our Green Tea Mochi, for example-which just so happens to be the first flavor back on the freezer scene-is flavored with real green tea leaf powder and colored with turmeric extract & spirulina.) Also by definition, these magnificent, mouthwatering, small-but-mighty Mochi are a terrific value-we're selling each 6.8-ounce box of six kosher-certified, gluten-free Trader Joe's Mochi for $4.49. Find them in our freezers.
064669.name: Mochi Green Tea
064669.title: Green Tea Mochi

069861.description: Inspired by the cheerful bells of the summertime ice cream truck, Trader Joe's Tangerine Cream Bars are classic creamsicle treats, with a twist-a tempting, tangerine twist! Most creamsicles offer up oodles of orange and not much else, but ours boast an icy sorbet shell made from a blend of orange and tangerine juices with rich, creamy vanilla ice cream inside. Enjoy a Tangerine Cream Bar on your front porch, licking a lazy summer day away. On a hot day, get creative and place one into a glass filled with sparkling water, then watch it melt down into a memorable mocktail, a la an "ice cream soda." (Or swap out that sparkling water for a vodka soda, if that's more your speed.) But hurry! If you want to turn your tangerine dreams into reality this summer, you'll have to act fast-we're selling 15-fluid ounce box of six, kosher-certified TJ's Tangerine Cream Bars for a limited-time only. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Tangerine Cream Bars
069861.name: Bar Tangerine Cream
069861.title: Tangerine Cream Bars

071119.description: We'll admit it: our Hold The Cone! Mini Ice Cream Cones [skus 62834, 57186, 57185, & more] totally have a hold on us. What's more fun than grabbing a mini Cone out of the freezer for a sweet, chilly thrill, after all? As with most things, the answer is making sure that even more folks can join in on the fun. With Trader Joe's Hold The Dairy! Chocolate Mini Cones, now that fun isn't just limited to those who eat dairy. They're made with a Non Dairy Frozen Dessert made primarily from coconut milk and vegan chocolate, neatly pre-scooped into a crisp, crunchy, and slightly sweet wafer cone. While these Hold The Dairy! Cones were designed with those avoiding dairy in mind, the truth is that anyone who enjoys a good chocolate ice cream cone will enjoy the comfy creaminess and satisfying crunch of Hold The Dairy!, too. They make a great after-work or after-school pick-me-up, a nice dessert option for potlucks and dinner parties, or even a good pick for a light and nimble anytime snack. If our mini cones haven't gotten a hold of you, now's a great time to get on board, with Trader Joe's Hold The Dairy! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Hold The Dairy! Chocolate Mini Coconut Non-Dairy Frozen Dessert Cones
071119.name: Hold The Dairy! Vegan Choc Mini Cones
071119.title: Hold The Dairy! Vegan Chocolate Mini Cones

071519.description: There's nothing quite like the feeling of coming home after a long day, nonchalantly peeking into your freezer, and suddenly remembering that you've got a box of ice cream sandwiches waiting for you. Or, rather, we should say that there used to be nothing quite like that, because with Trader Joe's Vanilla Oat Non-Dairy Frozen Dessert Sandwiches, that very same feeling can now be experienced with a veritably vegan version of that classic sweet treat! Each Sandwich is made with sweetened, vanilla-flavored, frozen oat beverage that's nestled between two sumptuously soft chocolate wafer cookies to deliver that satisfying, long-day-salvaging sensation with every bite. A classic delight for kids and adults alike, these creamy and delicious Non-Dairy Frozen Dessert Sandwiches were made to be appreciated by vegans and non-vegans alike. They can be enjoyed straight out of the freezer as a spur-the-moment, individual indulgence, or brought out for the whole group to enjoy during a movie night, sleepover, or any other kind of get-together. We recommend keeping a box in your freezer as a just-in-case measure: you never know when the need for something sweet and nostalgia-inducing will arise, after all! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Vanilla Oat Non-Dairy Frozen Dessert Sandwiches
071519.name: Sandwiches Vanilla Oat
071519.title: Oat Non-Dairy Frozen Dessert Sandwiches

074184.description: The popular Latin American beverage called horchata [or-cha-ta] is creamy and sweet, like ice cream. With no good excuse not to, we decided to take it all the way there-from smooth beverage to frozen dessert! Trader Joe's Horchata Inspired Ice Cream delivers all the delicious flavors of horchata in every spoonful. Like many ice creams, its rich base includes cream, milk, egg yolks, and cane sugar. We horchatized it by adding cinnamon and brown rice flour, plus a touch of sea salt. And since inclusions are fun, we also added pieces of horchata-flavored cookies, contributing a nice textural variation. Unlike the beverage, you probably won't be having Horchata Ice Cream right alongside your taco plate- though we wouldn't dare stop you! Instead, may we recommend it as a wonderful, post-Mexican-meal treat? Of course, you could really shake things up by blending a couple scoops with milk to make this Horchata Ice Cream drinkable, in homage to its inspiration. Whatever you do, do it quickly since our supply of Trader Joe's Horchata Ice Cream is limited, and probably won't last all summer! Horchata Inspired Ice Cream
074184.name: Ice Cream Horchata
074184.title: Horchata Ice Cream

074869.description: Creamy, fruity, frozen bars are so fun and yummy for summer. This season, our customers have already enjoyed TJ's Tangerine Cream Bars [sku 69861] and TJ's Blueberry Dream Bars [sku 74250]. Normally, Trader Joe's Mango & Cream Bars [sku 92373] (available year-round) would have been part of this polar produce party- except our Australian supplier announced earlier this year that they were unable to keep up, after more than a dozen years of meeting our mango bar demand. Without skipping a beat we sought a new supplier, this time, closer to home. We also took the opportunity to make some minor improvements before presenting our latest Mango Cream Bars. Flavor-wise, these are similar to the previous iteration-a combination of creamy vanilla and sweet-tart mango. What sticks out here as different is... the stick. (Previous version was sans stick.) And rather than the flavors existing side-by-side, in this version, the creamy vanilla ice cream is entirely surrounded by sweet, fruity mango sorbet. It's the same format as our Tangerine Cream Bars, only with Mango. You might also find that Trader Joe's Mango Cream Bars are a bit richer overall. That's because the first ingredient is vanilla ice cream (it was water in the original version). Plus, the fruity part is made with purée of both Magdalena and Alphonso mango varieties, delivering a tart & sweet, totally tropical taste! Mango Cream Bars
074869.name: Bar Mango Cream
074869.title: Mango Cream Bars

075231.description: The neighborhood soda fountain. It's a thing of nostalgia, where egg creams, milk shakes, and ice cream floats were the rule. You can be sure to count us in for any situation in which rules call for ice cream floats. Make it a root beer float, with a scoop of rich vanilla ice cream, and we've potentially found paradise in a mug. For those moments where a mug is unavailable, and the draw of a root beer float remains strong, we're delighted to introduce Trader Joe's Root Beer Float Inspired Bars. Akin to the classic orange-and-cream bars of childhood memories (there we go with the nostalgia again!), these frozen dessert Bars feature an icy, root beer-flavored outside, and a creamy, vanilla ice cream center. The stick-based delivery system allows you to ditch the glassware and enjoy a root beer float on the go. By the pool, at a picnic, after a post-dinner game of freeze tag with the neighbors... whenever a craving for a root beer float strikes, simply reach into your freezer (or an ice-packed cooler) and grab a Root Beer Float Inspired Bar. Or get meta with it and blend it up with... you guessed it, root beer, for a frothy, creamy, icy treat you can drink with a straw. We're offering these kosher (dairy) certified Bars in a 15-fluid ounce box of six, for a limited time. You'll find them in our freezer case, for as long as we can keep them in stock. Root Beer Float Inspired Bars
075231.name: Bar Root Beer Float
075231.title: Root Beer Float Bars

075602.description: Made for us by the same supplier as some of our other (widely celebrated, if we do say so ourselves) seasonal pints, Trader Joe's S'Mores Ice Cream expertly evokes the taste of the classic, campfire confection from which it takes its name. It's a strikingly simple concept, really-just like the genuine article. We start with a base of rich, graham cracker-flavored ice cream, imbue it with marshmallow & chocolatey swirls, add a pinch of sea salt, sound the bugle, and call it a day! Although our S'Mores Ice Cream makes an excellent anytime treat, we find that it's best enjoyed as a satisfyingly sweet reward at the end of a hot summer's day. And if you really want to earn your dessert-making merit badge, you can top it with crushed Graham Cracker Squares [sku 71089], a few Marshmallows [sku 56661], and a drizzle of Organic Midnight Moo [76710] for a scrumptious s'mores sundae. Remember, though, just like summer camp, the season for S'Mores Ice Cream will eventually come to a close, so if this stuff makes you want to sing along, hurry to your neighborhood Trader Joe's and grab s'more before it's gone! S'Mores Ice Cream
075602.name: Ice Cream S'Mores
075602.title: S'Mores Ice Cream

075851.description: In Italian, "gelato" is the word for "ice cream" in general. Most Italian ice cream, however, is made in a certain style-so when stateside treat-seekers are referring to gelato, they are typically talking about an Italian-style ice cream. An ice cream that's intensely creamy, yet surprisingly refreshing. An ice cream that's wondrously light, yet velvety and dense. An ice cream like Trader Joe's Chocolate & Vanilla Bean Swirl Gelato. Like our seasonal Strawberries & Cream Gelato [sku 75375], TJ's Chocolate & Vanilla Bean Swirl Gelato is made for us by an Italian supplier using more milk than cream, yielding a lower butterfat content than you'd find in American-style ice cream. This gives the Gelato a light, refreshing quality while still remaining delectably smooth and creamy, and allows its Chocolate and Vanilla Bean flavors (courtesy of cocoa, semisweet chocolate, and actual vanilla bean specks) and its sweet, chocolate-sauce Swirl to really shine. Instead of a traditional pint, we've very intentionally packed our Chocolate & Vanilla Bean Swirl Gelato in a 1.8-pint (850mL) tub. Peel off the lid, and the Gelato's dazzling peaks and swirls will conjure up all the beautifully decorated, sumptuous ripples you'd find in an authentic, Italian gelateria! It's such a pretty sight that you'll want to serve it at all your summer soirées, out in the open for all to admire. Chocolate & Vanilla Bean Swirl Gelato
075851.name: Ice Cream Choc Vanilla Swirl Gelato
075851.title: Chocolate & Vanilla Bean Swirl Gelato

076269.description: You, our customers, have definitively spoken: when it comes to creamy, non-dairy alternatives, Oat is still very much in. In celebration of this happy fact, we've brought Trader Joe's Non-Dairy Vanilla Bean Oat Frozen Dessert into our freezers-what better way to showcase just how rich, velvety, and delectably sweet an Oat-based dessert can be? Made totally without the use of any dairy-derived products, this visibly Vanilla Bean-flecked Frozen Dessert nonetheless scoops, serves, and, most importantly, eats just like a dairy-based ice cream. A true treat for any fan of frozen sweet treats, regardless of their dairy preference, our Non-Dairy Vanilla Bean Oat Frozen Dessert can be enjoyed totally as is, adorned with your favorite toppings, or mixed into all kinds of other dessert applications. Really, anything you can think of that would call for a scoop of our French Vanilla Ice Cream [sku 78576], this Oat Frozen Dessert will also excel at: try it in a root beer float, served over a warm brownie, sandwiched between two cookies, or blended with our Non-Dairy Chocolate Oat Beverage [sku 69585] for a delightfully non-dairy Oat-shake. Non-Dairy Vanilla Bean Oat Frozen Dessert
076269.name: Oat Vanilla Frozen Dessert
076269.title: Non-Dairy Vanilla Bean Oat Frozen Dessert

076295.description: When contemplating celebrations, we tend to think "the more the better." And when we include the limited- edition Trader Joe's Celebration Cake Gelato in our contemplations, we quickly adapt and lean headlong into a mindset of "let's get this party started!" Celebration Cake Gelato arrives in our freezers on the heels of our Chromatic Celebration Cake Mix, a limited- edition baking mix that wowed customers earlier this year. If you're a fan of the classic cake-and-ice-cream combo, this Gelato will be your jam. Cake-batter-flavored gelato sets the stage, while pieces of cake (yes, actual cake!) and rainbow-hued sprinkles take on supporting roles to round out the performance, er, container. Our supplier really knows their stuff - they're Italian gelato experts, now making their creations stateside - and you'll taste their expertise in every bite. Scoop some onto one of our Organic Sugar Cones [sku 68942], enjoy some in a bowl with crumbled cookies or Organic Midnight Moo [sku 76710] on top, or make a Celebration Cake Gelato milkshake! (We're happy to help you drink that if you'll be so kind as to invite us.) Celebration Cake Gelato
076295.name: Ice Cream Celebration Cake Gelato

077908.description: We didn't just name our brand-new sorbet flavor "Super Strawberry Sorbet," for the alliteration. (Although, it is fun to say.) In fact, we called it super because we think that's the best word to describe Trader Joe's latest, fruity, frozen treat! Even beyond the "super-fruit" status of strawberries, this Sorbet has other superb qualities going for it. Our supplier in Thailand starts with locally harvested strawberries that have a balanced, sweet & tart flavor, which translates sensationally when blended with water & cane sugar to form the smooth Sorbet base. Then, they add Strawberry pieces to amp up the texture and augment the Super Strawberry flavor. We're confident that anyone who gets their hands on (and their spoons in) Trader Joe's Super Strawberry Sorbet is going to love it. In particular, those who avoid animal products will definitely be assigning superlatives to this vegan dessert. But you can't love it if you never try it... so grab a pint from our freezers while supplies last! Super Strawberry Sorbet
077908.name: Sorbet Strawberry
077908.title: Super Strawberry Sorbet

078549.description: Something's brewing in the Trader Joe's Freezer section. They're bite-sized, handheld, and elliptically shaped. They've got a chewy exterior and lush ice cream center. They taste like your morning cup of joe. Why, they're Coffee Mochi, here for a limited time! Unlike other Mochi on the market made with synthetically derived flavors and high fructose corn syrup, the frozen filling in Trader Joe's Coffee Mochi gets its bold Coffee flavor and color from Coffee itself, and possesses a balanced sweetness thanks to real cane sugar. A hint of cocoa gives the sweet, chewy rice flour dough its rich brown hue, and adds a touch of chocolate on the palate to round out the robust Coffee notes. Coffee Mochi make for a delightful handheld pick-me-up that's best enjoyed after thawing for 3-4 minutes. That may seem like a long time, but you'll be hard pressed to eat just one anyway, so why not assemble a variety platter of these gluten free treats while you're at it? Reach for Vanilla [sku 64500], Strawberry [64499], and Green Tea [sku 64669] for a sweet, fruity, and aromatic Mochi mix! Coffee Mochi
078549.name: Mochi Coffee
078549.title: Coffee Mochi

078576.description: Trader Joe's French Vanilla Ice Cream is a super premium vanilla ice cream that talks the talk - we don't mean French; we mean the language of flavor! Our rich French Vanilla Ice Cream has an unmistakably creamy-custard texture that can be enjoyed plain or used as a companion for any combination of cookies, candies, and chocolates. What makes a quart of French vanilla ice cream "French", you ask? It has nothing to do with the vanilla bean itself (which is only grown near the equator, not near France at all); it merely means that the ice cream begins with a base that contains egg yolks, unlike regular vanilla ice cream. Trader Joe's French Vanilla Ice Cream is made in this French tradition, which ultimately lends a pale-yellow color and a richer, smoother consistency than traditional vanilla ice cream. Notice that super premium designation? To get there, an ice cream must have less than 50% overrun, meaning that one gallon of mix would create no more than one and a half gallons of finished ice cream. Trader Joe's French Vanilla Ice Cream has 26% overrun - aka dense, super SUPER premium ice cream! We're selling each one quart container of French Vanilla Ice Cream for $3.99*. Find it in our freezers and fill your favorite cone today! *Please Check QIL to confirm current pricing French Vanilla Ice Cream
078576.name: Vanilla Ice Cream Qt
078576.title: French Vanilla Ice Cream

078580.description: This is why people scream for ice cream. Trader Joe's Coffee Bean Blast Ice Cream is, in our most humble opinion, the very best coffee ice cream available anywhere on planet Earth. Or beyond, on other planets whose populations value ice cream. Lest you think we hyperbolize - which we would never, ever do - we're about to tell you exactly what makes this ice cream so special. First and foremost, our Coffee Bean Blast Ice Cream has very low overrun. Overrun, in ice cream speak, is the amount of air that's whipped into the ice cream - the higher the overrun, the lower quality the ice cream. (This one comes in at 25.56% overrun.) Because there is so little air in this ice cream, it is thicker, richer and creamier than lesser quality ice creams, a direct result of its 15% butterfat content. And then there's the flavor. Big WOW here. Some coffee ice creams have a little coffee flavor - some don't even use actual coffee. Our Coffee Bean Blast Ice Cream features big, bold, intense coffee flavor that comes from brewed Colombian coffee and bits of very finely ground French Roast Colombian coffee beans in every bite. You'll find each quart of Trader Joe's Coffee Bean Blast in our freezers. Have a blast! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Coffee Bean Blast Ice Cream
078580.name: Coffee Blast Ice Cream
078580.title: Coffee Bean Blast Ice Cream

086986.description: In France (and the Netherlands, Germany, & Hungary, among other nations), bon bon is a common term synonymous with "candy," or "treat." Ours' are definitely "candy" and a "treat," with the added delight of premium vanilla ice cream inside. Trader Joe's Vanilla Ice Cream Bon Bons have a chocolate cookie bottom, a rich Vanilla Ice Cream center, and a generous shell of bittersweet chocolate. Each Bon Bon is a little bigger than a bite-size. This is great portion control - get your sweet fix and move on without indulging too much. Now, how could anybody turn that down? Straight out of the freezer, these treats are ideal for sharing with friends or that someone special. You're possibly going to want to stuff these away and hope nobody finds them at the back of your freezer. You'll find each 7.6-ounce box of 12 Bon Bons in our freezers. Bon appétit! *Please check QIL to confirm current Vanilla Ice Cream Bon Bons
086986.name: Vanilla Ice Cream Bon Bons
086986.title: Ice Cream Bon Bons Vanilla With Chocolate Cookie Crust

090987.description: Nothing subliminal about it; these ice cream sandwiches more than live up to their name. Trader Joe's Sublime Ice Cream Sandwiches came to fruition some years back, when we had an ice cream epiphany and realized we could do better-way better-than most of the ice cream sandwiches we found in freezers around the country. Not to insinuate that it was easy. Not at all. It took months and months of tasting and re-tasting by our panel. (Yes, it's a messy job, but someone had to do it!) When the chocolate chip cookies finally reached the proper crunchy-chewy ratio (which changed, by the way, depending on how long they'd been frozen), we moved on to the ice cream; it had to be truly transcendent. After a few go-rounds, we landed on the ideal balance of cookie and ice cream. Then, of course, we had to make them even better, so we rolled the sides in mini, semi-sweet chocolate chips. In case you were curious, this is the kind of task we can always be counted on to undertake with vigilance. Not only do these Ice Cream Sandwiches taste Sublime, they're sublimely priced at $4.49 for a package of four (20 ounces). A little hint to maximize enjoyment¿ remove them from the freezer a few minutes before you eat them-this will ensure the texture is just perfect! You'll find them - where else? - in our freezers.
090987.name: Sublime Ice Cream Sandwiches

092493.description: From now on, you can forego standing in your local Trader Joe's, pondering which go-to treat to get this week. Will it be the Mint Chip Ice Cream [92805] or Chocolate Vanilla Joe-Joe's [sku 82756]? Well, how about instead you grab 'em both in one fell swoop with Trader Joe's Mini Mint Ice Cream Mouthfuls. Whether the mouthful is your description of these tasty treats to your friends and family or the puffy-cheeked look on your face, knee deep in the box you hide in the freezer, these ice cream sandwiches are surely something to scream about. Starting with one of the stars of our frozen section, our Mint Chip Ice Cream with its sweet mint flavor and clean, refreshing finish creates the creamy filling to our Mini Mint Mouthfuls. This soft and smooth ice cream with crunchy and rich chocolate chips sprinkled throughout is sandwiched between another star of our aisles, Joe-Joe's style cookies. Even when frozen, these crunchy cookie endcaps have an incredibly crumbly, delightfully cocoa-filled flavor and mouthfeel that only enhances each Mouthful. With each box having 12 Mini Mint Mouthfuls, be prepared to share if you're caught with a box, or stow away and work your way through each Mouthful throughout the week. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Mini Mint Ice Cream Mouthfuls
092493.name: Mini Mint Ice Cream Mouthfuls
092493.title: 12 Mini Mint Mouthfuls Ice Cream Mouthfuls (Now That'S A Mouthful)

092805.description: We've never understood why most mint chip ice creams have a ridiculous green hue that doesn't appear to be naturally derived, let alone from mint plants. Trader Joe's, for one, doesn't need fluorescent green coloring to tell you that our Mint Chip Ice Cream is packed with pleasing peppermint flavor and melt-in-your mouth chocolate chips. We love to focus on quality ingredients with all of our products, and Trader Joe's Mint Chip Ice Cream does not deviate. A simple mixture of cream, milk, sugar, egg yolks, fudge chips, peppermint extract, and just two thickening agents make up this decadent dessert, which basically means if we happened to make a batch directly in your home, it'd be as pure as homemade churned ice cream! And notice that super premium designation? To get there, an ice cream must have less than 50% overrun, meaning that one gallon of mix would create no more than one and a half gallons of finished ice cream. Trader Joe's Mint Chip Ice Cream has 26% overrun - in other words a dense, super SUPER premium ice cream! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Mint Chip Ice Cream
092805.name: Mint Chip Ice Cream

093871.description: We love France in springtime. And summertime. And, well, all the time. Really, what's not to love? The Louvre, the Eiffel Tower, the Normandy coast. It's the food that intrigues us more than anything else France has to offer. Just when you think you have French food all figured out (it's heavy, richly sauced, not so healthful), along comes a French creation that defies all expectation (it's light, great to eat on the go, and loaded with fruit). We're talking about Trader Joe's Fruit Frenzy Bars, the epitome of fresh French, only frozen. Years ago, on a trip to France, our buyers spied some vibrant, multi-colored ice pops. They were intrigued, only to find out that the pops were loaded with artificial flavors and synthetic colors. That didn't stop our intrepid travelers, though. They put out the word and found a supplier to make an exclusive version of these colorful treats just for Trader Joe's. Fruit Frenzy Bars look a bit like our Fruit Floes [sku 08344], but with three colors & flavors per pop instead of one. Each pop features individual strawberry, lemon and raspberry sections - all made using actual fruit, and color boost from turmeric. You'll find each 16-ounce box with four Bars in our freezers. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Fruit Frenzy Bars
093871.name: Fruit Frenzy Bars Rasp Lemon
093871.title: Trader Joes Fruit Frenzy Bars

094996.description: Trader Joe's Non-Dairy Frozen Dessert is like ice cream-without the cream. It's made with coconut milk and it's free of dairy and soy, as well as artificial flavors, colors and preservatives. It's thick and creamy with rich flavor. We are selling each pint of Trader Joe's Chocolate and Strawberry non-dairy frozen dessert made with coconut milk for $2.99 each.
094996.name: Coconut Chocolate Ice Cream
094996.title: Chocolate Non Dairy Frozen Dessert Made With Coconut Milk

076570.category: Ice Cream Cones and Novelty Ice Cream
076570.description: If someone were to ask Trader Joe's for "ice cream cone tips," they might expect us to say something like: "Keep your cone upright at all times," or "Better to buy two cones, than to try to share one with a friend." While these are definitely excellent cone tips, perhaps the most excellent cone tips we could possibly provide for our customers would be Trader Joe's Hold the Cone Tips. Of course, now we're talking about a product, not a piece of advice. Patently styled after our iconic Hold the Cone! Mini Ice Cream Cones [skus 57185, 57186, 62834, etc.], which are found in our freezers, these Cone Tips are cookies, not ice cream. In effect, we've removed the entire top portion of the cone (including the ice cream), leaving behind a conical nugget, the crunchiest part or the Waffle Cone, where the seam comes to a point. Their colossal crunch is complemented by a rich filling of smooth, dark chocolate-not unlike what you find at the bottom of our Mini Ice Cream Cones. Another point we'd like to make-and what may really tip the scales for serious serial snackers-is the fact that these Cones Tips require no refrigeration. That's right, they're 100% portable, and ready to eat anytime you need a Tip to top-off a meal, or to counter a savory snack with the crunch of something sweet. One final pointed tip: You'll find Trader Joe's Hold the Cone Tips every day in our stores, stocked with our collection of cookies. Hold the Cone Tips
076570.name: Hold The Cone Tips

018044.description: Is there anyone that doesn't immediately recognize the iconic Heineken star and green packaging? Heineken is the worlds 3rd largest brewer (Behind Anheuser Busch/Inbev & SAB Miller) & sells more beer outside of its home market than any other beer brand in the world. Heineken is famous for its consistent high quality, attributed to barley, hops, proprietary yeast, and brewing acumen. It has become the international gold- standard for imported beers. At $6.99 everyday, this is a spectacular value.
018044.name: Heineken

023842.description: Who does not recognize that unique, stubby brown bottle, with the painted label and smile? Red Stripe has embodied the spirit, rhythm and pulse of Jamaica with its mellow, balanced flavor. It is malty sweet, lightly hopped and finishes smooth. Red Stripe pairs well with all seafood, chicken, pork and especially all spicy foods. Served ideally very cold (40degrees or so) and traditionally is enjoyed straight from the bottle. At $6.99, it is easy to say "Hooray Beer!"
023842.name: Red Stripe Lager

052115.description: The folks at Carlsberg found themselves a little too long on the inventory of their 16.9oz cans. We were able to negotiate a terrific price allowing the unbelievable retail of $3.99 per 4pk of 16.9oz cans. This is nearly 50% off the normal retail. Just the Facts...

069851.description: The Stella Artois brewery can trace its history back to 1366 to the town of Leuven, Belgium. It was originally brewed as a special Christmas beer. Due to the beers enormous popularity, it was soon made available all year. Today, it is still brewed in Leuven with only the finest malted barley, non-malted cereal grains, hops and yeast. Stella is pleasantly bitter with a refreshing finish. The bitterness also makes it a natural pair for creamy, semi-soft cheeses such as Havarti, Morbier and Port Salut. Stella Artois unique taste and drinkability help it stand out from other heavier European lagers and at $6.99 everyday, this is an exceptional value.
069851.name: Stella Artois

098877.description: How is that for 3 bullet points? Here is one more: of every 10 imported beers sold in the United States, 3 are a Corona. Corona delivers a unique fun, sun and beach state of mind. It is hard to not think Corona and beach vacation in the same sentence. It is defined by a laid back image and delivers to beer lovers a smooth taste that bridges the gap between heavier European imports and lighter domestic beers. At $6.99, this is an outstanding everyday price.

They thrive in bright light, especially in winter, making them an excellent colorful plant for sunny locations of your house.

Blooming can last several months and once bloomed out, these hardy plants with their thick dark green leaves will compliment ordinary house plants.

Any way you display it be primed to get lots of queries and accolades from curious onlookers.

Southwestern and tribal influences combine with the intriguing features in each succulent, to help these spaces foster a deeper connection and appreciation for nature.

058601.name: Succulent Garden

058635.description: Tell the plants story - Succulents include a wide variety of genus and species and therefore come in a variety of colors, shapes, and textures. Ten different varieties will be available. Succulents thrive in bright light indoors, full to partial sun outdoors.
058635.name: Mini Succulent
058635.title: Mini Asst Succulents In Terra Cotta

059040.description: Anywhere in the world, cascade orchids represent a positive thing, and oftentimes, something related to love, luxury, and beauty. Our cascade orchids are hand-grown with love and care. Premium cascade orchid makes excellent gift for family and friends. Their blooms are beautiful and will often bloom repeatedly for many years, ideal décor for your home, office, and even adds glamour to any occasion.
059040.name: Orchid Phal Planter
059040.title: Orchid Planter 2 Phals

060246.description: Enjoy this lovely hanger as an addition to a frost-free outdoor patio, or in any bright indoor location to add interest to your home décor. Also makes a wonderful gift for any occasion. Fun varieties like String of Raindrops, String of Bananas, String of Dolphins, String of Pearls, Ruby Necklace and Donkey Tails. As it matures, it might need a "haircut" just to tidy up and maintain a neat appearance. Plant your trimmings in another small pot and start a whole new plant to enjoy yourself, or to share with a friend. Research the variety of your new trailing succulent you may be rewarded with a hidden surprise. Some varieties, with time and maturity can also offer up interesting blooms when you least expect it! We're selling each of these Succulent Hanging for $8.99.
060246.name: Succulent Hanging

061080.description: When the weather has cooled and winter is on the horizon, the thought of freshly blooming flowers in your house may seem impossible to conjure. Per usual, Trader Joe's is here to make the impossible not only possible, but simple and affordable, too. Presenting our latest grow-it-yourself holiday offering: Paperwhite Bulbs. Native to the western Mediterranean region, Paperwhites are members of the Narcissus family-the daffodil's paler, more fragrant cousin. But unlike some Narcissus varieties, Paperwhites can't tolerate cold weather, so they'll gladly seek refuge from the winter's chill in a cozy, indoor space. No green thumb? No problem. Getting your Bulb to bloom couldn't be easier. Each bulb comes lodged in a slender, 9" tall, clear Glass Vase and is ready to be taken home (or gifted away) and grown hydroponically, without soil. Place the Vase in a sunny window, add water, and 3 - 5 weeks later, your whole room will smell like sweet, sweet springtime. This holiday season, you won't have to spend a bunch of paper to get a bunch of Paperwhites-we're selling each Paperwhite Bulb in a Glass Vase for $3.99. You'll find them in our plants and flowers section. 11.20.17
061080.name: Paperwhite Vase Bulb

061126.description: Air Plants-or tillandsias-are definitely having a moment. Once considered novel and hard to come by, these soil-free, desert gems can now be found sitting pretty in corner cafés, hipster hotels, and stylish sitting rooms all the world over. Heck, at this point, these plants are so popular that even your not-too-trendy Aunt Trudy probably has tillandsia or two. Why all the ado about Air Plants, you ask? Simple: they're easy to grow and almost impossible to kill. Requiring no soil and very little water, Air Plants gather their moisture and nutrients from-you guessed it-the air. They prefer warmer temperatures and indirect light, so they're perfect for folks looking to liven up an indoor environment. At Trader Joe's, they're our go-to plant for fun, kitschy designs. This year, in the wake of our Tillandsias in Ceramic Sugar Skulls' year-over-year popularity, we're offering a new incarnation of the concept: Trader Joe's Tillandsia Ceramic Ornaments. Because why not hang a plant on a tree? It's greenery upon greenery, people! This time, instead of a skull (which wouldn't be very Christmas-y), we've secured a single tillandsia plant atop a red, green, or gold ceramic sphere. Each Ornament features a loop of clear fishing line at the top and a slightly flat impression at the bottom, so you can place your Ornament in your window or hang it on your tree-your choice. Either way, the only thing you have to do to keep your Air Plant alive is dunk it water for about five seconds, twice a week. Easy-peasy. We're selling each Tillandsia (Air Plant) Ornament for $3.99 each, so you can enjoy a little bit of this greenery without spending a whole lot of that greenery. You'll find them in our plants and flowers section, while they last. 11.20.17
061126.name: Air Plant Ornament

061130.description: When the weather has cooled and winter is on the horizon, the thought of freshly blooming flowers in your house may seem impossible to conjure. Per usual, Trader Joe's is here to make the impossible not only possible, but simple and affordable, too. Presenting our latest grow-it-yourself holiday offering: the Giant Amaryllis Bulb in a Glass Vase. Amaryllis, which translates from Greek to "sparkling", is a bright-red, vivacious flower that is sure to brighten even the darkest of winter days. Each 9" tall, 4.5" wide Glass Vase comes with one bulb and is filled about 1/3 of the way with smooth, white pebbles. Simply fill the vase with water (just to the bottom of the bulb), place it in a bright location away from direct heat (we'd recommend a sunny window), and watch the magic unfold. No green thumb? No problem. As long as you can follow these instructions, keep a semi-watchful eye on the water level, and remain somewhat patient, your Bulb will produce at least one tall, beautiful Amaryllis stem with multiple large, red blooms in about 6 - 10 weeks. This is the must-have plant of the season. Strikingly presented in a extra-large, reusable glass vase, a Trader Joe's Giant Amaryllis Bulb makes a cheerful, elegant gift for just about anyone on your list. We're selling each Giant Amaryllis Bulb in a Glass Vase for the not-so-flowery price of $9.99, throughout the season. You'll find them in our plants and flowers section. 11.20.17
061130.name: Amaryllis In Vase

CARE Instructions: Water: Once per month ¿ Light: Bright naturally window¿ Temperature: Performs well at an average indoor temperate (65-75°F). ¿ USDA Zones: 4-10 Continuing Care: Do not allow cactus to sit in water.¿
065122.name: Cactus In Ceramic

065183.description: Anthuriums are native to South and Central America and grow at altitudes from sea level to 10,000 feet. They can be planted outdoors in Zone 10 in a partly shaded area with most, well-drained soil. Prefers home temperatures at 65-75°F in a well-lit area away from direct sunlight and drafts. Keep the soil moist but not wet. Apply fertilizer during the growing season.
065183.name: Anthurium Large Premium In Deco Pot
065183.title: Anthurium Large In Ceramic

065187.description: Foliage hanging baskets extend a touch of the garden to the home, porch, or patio. Long lasting and easy to care for, foliage baskets make the perfect addition for any home or office. Bring nature indoors. Any room is prettier with a spider plant, ivy, philodendron or pothos. It's also healthier. NASA research shows that indoor plants like these act as living air purifiers -- the foliage and roots work in tandem to absorb chemical pollutants released by synthetic materials.

066868.name: Succulent Beer Bottle Planter

067180.description: Mix of Sea-Shells and Drift wood - Tillandsia is a genus of plant found in the Bromeliad family. There are over 500 different species of Tillandsia, and while they have many common characteristics, they also vary greatly in range, size and needs. They are found throughout southern North America, Central America and South America. Tillandsia are referred to as air plants because of the unique way they grow. Most are epiphytes meaning they grow attached to other plants, such as trees. They are not parasitic as they gather all of their own nutrients and water and cause no harm to their host plants. The plants will need good clean air circulation to survive and live a healthy life. It's important that after watering the plants have enough air circulation to dry within 4 hours. While Air Plants will do well in containers, it is recommended that they do not be displayed in enclosed containers, and that they are completely dry before they are put back into a container that might restrict air circulation. CARE ¿ Water: Mist every 3 days or soak in water weekly. ¿ Light: Place the plant in bright but indirect light. ¿ Temperature: Performs well at an average indoor temperature (65-75°F). ¿ Fertilizer: Bromeliad fertilizer can be used monthly in small quantities ¿ Continuing Care: Trim off yellow leaves
067180.name: Fairy Castle Cactus In Clay

067392.description: Sea oats, rocky shorelines and scattered sea weed inspired our Curious Life design. Offered in two design varieties, the Curious Life sports a lovely Tillandsia juncifolia in unique variations to mimic nature enclosed within a glass capsule. Finished with rocks and moss and other natural elements. Tillandsia juncifolia is one of the easiest plant varieties to care for, requiring just a minimal amount of care to sustain - they are perfect for all age groups.
067392.name: Curious Life

067601.description: The Venus Fly Trap creates excitement, wonder by adding a unique plant to your décor or as a fun gift for family and friends! This fascinating carnivorous plant attracts, traps and digest small insects to supplement photosynthesis. This is one with trigger hairs inside each trap that close after they're touched a few tomes and edged teeth to keep their meal from escaping! Not only are they fun, but the movement of the Venus Flytrap is very rate in the plant world, making them a great educational tool too!
067601.name: Dionaea -Venus Fly Trap

067627.description: Mums the word! Available in an autumnal rainbow of colors like purple, red, orange, and yellow, mums make a statement indoors or out. Liven up your space with these pops of color, whether or not you're ready to get spooky with your decor. Prune regularly to keep your mums blooming for the season!

068474.description: Foliage extends a touch of the garden to the home, porch, or patio. Long lasting and easy to care for, foliage make the perfect addition for any home or office. 068495.description: The Ponytail Palm is a desert- dwelling relative of plants like the Yucca and has a water- retaining bulb topped with curly spirals of foliage. These hair-like leaves that grow atop the thick, bulbous trunk resembles a voluminous, curly ponytail. The plant acts like a succulent by holding onto water in its trunk. With plenty of indirect light, warmth, and minimal water this unique plant will reward you with cascading layers of spiraling leaves. This draught tolerant houseplant is a great way to add a visually striking piece to any bright corner of your home. Dress up your ponytail palm but keep it casual! Natural woven pots are laid back, lovely and the perfect accessory for your latest plant find. Crafted from natural jute and meticulously woven to form a flexible, yet structured pot that will support and compliment any leafy beauty you add to it. These tan pots are rimmed with contrasting colors in jute. Who knew jute could be so cute?!
068495.name: Pony Tail Palm

069117.description: There are many varieties in this assortment including: Balloon, Blue Barrel, Golden Barrel, Grafted, and Pincushion. Cactus is one of the hardiest plants around. It requires little care and adds texture and architectural interest in any home. A cactus garden is a great way to bring a beautiful desert landscape indoors. Whimsical and fun, these gardens are carefully designed to coordinate with each plant. CARE ¿ Water: Water once a month depending on the dryness of your home ¿ Light: In a brightly naturally lit window. ¿ Temperature: Performs well at an average indoor temperature. (65-75°F). ¿ Soil: 1 part peat moss, 1 part garden soil and 1 part soil ¿ Continuing Care: Do not allow cactus to sit in water and only feed them in the spring through fall with a 5-10-10 fertilizer every two to three months. ¿ USDA zones: 4-10
069117.name: Mini Asst. Cactus Succulent

069638.description: Our Monstera Deliciosa is known for it's large glossy green leaves with detailed splits. A lovely and truly unique crop which makes a statement by adding life & personality to any environment!
069638.name: Premium Monstera

071997.description: This beautiful Phalaenopsis orchid is grown Central California, where all the surroundings are suitable for high quality orchid blooming. The Phalaenopsis orchid is world famous orchid, which implies dignity, loyalty, and honor. Our growers are proudly introducing this trendy orchid to valuable Trader Joe's customers! $17.99
