071997.title: Orchid Garden In Deco Pot

072483.description: There's no drama with this dracaena! With spiky tropical foliage and a trunk-like stem, this striking plant is easy-going and easy to care for. The origins of this popular houseplant's name are as cool as its appearance. Coming from the Greek word dracaena or "female dragon" this plant gets its name from the dark red resin found in the stem that is likened to dragon blood. Dress up your plants but keep it casual! Natural woven pots are laid back and lovely and the perfect accessory for your latest plant find. Crafted from natural jute and meticulously woven to form a flexible, yet structured pot that will support and compliment any leafy beauty you add to it. The tan colored pots are rimmed with a contrasting colored jute. Who knew jute could be so cute?!
072483.name: Dracaena Plant

072982.description: - Aloe Vera is an easy to grow succulent that helps to clear formaldehyde and benzene out of the air you breathe. These toxins can be created through chemical-based cleaners, paints and more. Beyond its air-cleaning properties having aloe plants in your home can; ¿ Increase mood and productivity ¿ Enhance concentration and memory ¿ Reduce stress and fatigue - And it is most commonly known for the gel inside your aloe plant helping to heal cuts and burns
072982.name: Organic Aloe Vera

073590.description: Dress up your plants but keep it casual! Natural woven pots are laid back and lovely and the perfect accessory for your latest plant find. Crafted from natural jute and meticulously woven to form a flexible, yet structured pot that will support and compliment any leafy beauty you add to it. The tan colored pots are rimmed with a contrasting colored jute. Who knew jute could be so cute?! The Fiddle Leaf Fig is gaining popularity as a new "it plant" in interior design, television, and movies. Its upright cascade of wide, fiddle shaped leaves make it an interesting and aesthetically pleasing choice.
073590.name: Fiddle Leaf Fig In Woven Deco

074277.description: The Moose is home to our beautiful, unique green plants. These Lil' Foliage add an element of FUN to your everyday and are known to eliminate toxins in the air. All while bringing happiness & joy to any environment. Perfect for the holiday season!
074277.name: Mini Foliage In Seasonal Deco
074277.title: Mini Foliage In Moose

075063.description: Hyacinths are one of the most popular bulbs for indoor blooms. These spring- flowering bulbs put forth a bold burst of color that lasts for about two weeks--and better yet, they're delightfully scented. Most hyacinth bulbs for indoor use are forced to flower; this means they're chilled for a period of time to mimic the conditions of overwintering, which stimulates them to produce blooms. If you buy naked bulbs, as opposed to blooming plants, you'll have to provide several months of chilling to coax the flowers out. Growing Conditions ¿ Light: Bright ¿ Water: Keep the potting media lightly wet, but not soaked. Overwatering can cause root rot. If you're growing your hyacinth in water, as in a decorative vase, only let the roots dangle into the water. ¿ Temperature: Keep hyacinth plants cool during the growing season to prolong the bloom. Recommend temperatures range from about 45 degrees F to 65 degrees F. https://www.thespruce.com/planting-bulbs-in-a-lawn-1402230 https://www.thespruce.com/planting-bulbs-in-a-lawn-1402230
075063.name: Euro Hyacinths In Candle Glass

075595.description: Make a statement with the 8" Ficus Elastica! Commonly known as the Rubber Tree Plant, the Ficus Elastica is another indoor plant that likes to reach great heights. Continually determined to grow upwards, it will only take a few years to fill that empty corner space in your room! Related to the Banyan tree, in its native environment of Southeast Asia, the Ficus Elastica can grow up to 100 feet tall. However, when enjoyed as a houseplant, this tropical tree can reach heights up to 6 feet tall- making it a stately addition to any room. With plenty of indirect light, moisture and warmth, this unique plant will reward you with layers of large, deep emerald, green leaves.
075595.name: Jumbo Ficus Elastica In Pot Cover

075622.description: Aloe vera is commonly known as a topical gel used to sooth and treat sunburn. Fun fact ~ Aloe Vera Plant Symbolism Since Cleopatra credited aloe vera for her well-nourished beautiful skin, it symbolizes beauty, healing and protection Beautiful and drought tolerant - aloe vera attracts hummingbirds and can be grown in almost any garden. Succulents look great with minimal care; they will not wilt if you forget to water them and are delightful to collect and use in gardens and containers. The more you know about these intriguing plants, the more you'll enjoy growing them! Plant size: 20/22 inches tall x 10/12 inches wide
075622.name: Large Premium Aloe In Deco Pot

075683.description: Enjoy the beautiful succulent gardens as décor in your home, patio, office or as an amazing gift. The vessels are filled with all shapes, textures and colors of captivating succulents. Succulents look great with minimal care; they will not wilt if you forget to water them and are delightful to collect and use in gardens and containers. The more you know about these intriguing plants, the more you'll enjoy growing them!
075683.name: Large Succulent Garden

075727.description: Tell the plants story - Native to Brazil, these cool cactus are bred to be spineless! They are a great choice in any indoor and outdoor space due to their interesting upward growing habit and friendly to touch aesthetic.
075727.name: Large Cuddly Cactus

076183.description: The Philodendron Imperial Red is a beautiful, tropical plant that many plant collectors put on their "must have list" once they see one. The Philodendron Imperial Red's large oval leathery leaves change colors throughout its lifetime. Young leaves emerge as a bright red, then transform to a burgundy red- purple, and ultimately mature a dark glossy green. This hardy houseplant will add a little colorful excitement to your plant collection. It is a self- header philodendron, meaning that it has large leaves that are close together on one stem.
076183.name: Jumbo Philodendron Imperial Red In Jute Basket

076932.description: Native to Southeast Asia, this exotic-looking houseplant will add a touch of drama to any room with its glossy, dark leaves. While it may look delicate, this plant is quite easy to care for. Prefers rich, well- draining soil that is high in organic matter. In the wild, they grow in the tropical forests of Southeast Asia, under a canopy of trees, so avoid direct sunlight. Dress up your alocasia in natural woven basket pots. These oversized woven basket pots are laid back and lovely making them the perfect accessory to your latest plant find.
076932.name: Premium Alocasia In Deco
076932.title: Premium Alocasia In Woven Basket

078488.description: Why Roses for Valentine's Day? Roses were considered love tokens in ancient Egypt. Each petite rose is presented in an elegant ceramic cup featuring a Polka Dot Felt Bow. There are three variations of this design in classic Valentine's Day colors of red, pink and purple. http://www.bloomritecs.com/cs_share/tjoes/Tjoes_VDay_Confirmed_Items/content/index.html
078488.name: Rose 2" Hearts Ceramic

079248.description: Native to tropical areas, bromeliads make excellent houseplants and add an exotic touch to your decor. They require little care, are easy to grow and produce long-lasting colorful leaf crowns. There are more than 2,700 species of bromeliads. Producing both the Guzmania and Vriesea bromeliad species, our plants come in many colors. The plants feature rosettes of spiny, stiff leaves, and they thrive in consistent, warm indoor temperatures. Dress up your plants but keep it casual! Natural woven pots are laid back and lovely and the perfect accessory for your latest plant find. Crafted from natural jute and meticulously woven to form a flexible, yet structured pot that will support and compliment any leafy beauty you add to it. The tan colored pots are rimmed with a contrasting colored jute. Who knew jute could be so cute?!
079248.name: Bromeliad In Deco
079248.title: Bromeliad In Woven Deco

079712.description: Phalaenopsis are very popular because of it long lasting flowers and low maintenance. Our Orchid Phal White in Ceramic is a pure white phal option in pink, white, and mint ceramics. For questions, please go to www.colororchids.com. http://www.colororchids.com/
079712.name: Orchid Phal White Medium In Ce

090330.description: Hardy Garden Mums are easy growing beauties that fill autumn scenery with the classic colors of the season. Hardy Garden Mums will bring instant color to anyone's door step. Enjoy on a sunny porch or patio.
090330.name: Mum Hardy Large

093114.description: Phalaenopsis Orchids are commonly known as "moth orchids" because the flowers of some species resemble moths in flight. These orchids are some of the most popular orchids in the market place. They are recognizable for their broad, dark green leaves and their arching stems which have large, rounded flowers in solid colors, stripes, and even spots. Phalaenopsis are native to Southeast Asia and today are one of the most extensively cross- fertilized plants, producing a great number of hybrids in all colors and variations for us to enjoy.
093114.name: Orchid Phal Medium In Ceramic

094317.description: The Kalanchoe is a succulent plant that is a member of the Crassulaceae family - closely related to the jade tree and sedum. Our double-flowering Kalanchoe is a new hybrid variety from Denmark. Kalanchoe are very consumer friendly plants. They truly require minimal care. They prefer bright, indirect light and very little watering. The Kalanchoe has been the number one selling potted plant in Europe over the past decade. These Kalanchoe plants are very rewarding with their beautiful colors and long lasting double-flowers.
094317.name: Kalanchoe Plant

094600.description: We are offering white mums wrapped in a red and white gingham pot cover. This will be a great addition to any barbeque or picnic table.
094600.name: Chrysanthemum Seasonal Plant
094600.title: Chrysanthemum Plant

094777.description: Chili peppers originated in the Americas and have been cultivated for over 6,000 years and are classified as a vegetable or a spice. Widely used for food and medicinal purposes as Capsicum is known to have anti-inflammatory and pain relief benefits. Trader Joe's Macho Peppers pack some heat with a Scoville rating higher than a jalapeno to provide a little bite to your meal. They are excellent for pickling, frying, roasting, or just eating fresh off the plant!
094777.name: Pepper Chili Edible Organic

098292.description: Spice up your life with living herbs! Fresh herbs are valued for their flavor, aroma, and benefits to a healthy lifestyle. We've selected 4 popular culinary herbs to include in each box. Assortment includes: Parsley, Cilantro, Mint, and Rosemary. Enjoy fresh or add to your dish in the final moments of cooking. Harvest leaves as needed for your favorite recipes. This living herb will continue to grow with bright light and once-a-week watering. Care ¿ Water: Water thoroughly once a week until the water runs through the soil. Do not allow to stand in water. ¿ Light: Place in a brightly lit location. ¿ Temperature: 65°F - 85°F, never below 50°F
098292.name: Herb Organic Assortment
098292.title: Herb Organic Small Asst Plant

098747.description: Lithops originate from South Africa, and are named for their stone like face. They are very slow growing, taking 3-4 years to mature. They remain small their entire lives, but will 'split' and produce new leaves every year or so. They like well draining soil, very little water, and lots of direct light.
098747.name: Lithops Succulent Living Stone

048085.description: You could say we have a thing for Indian flavors. We would wholeheartedly agree with you. Whether it comes to us directly from India, or from a continentally closer creator, we just can't get enough. You'll find Indian and Indian-inspired dishes in our grocery aisle-such as direct-from-India Madras Lentils, which features lentils and kidney beans in a buttery tomato sauce, seasoned with onions, ginger and cumin. Trader Joe's Madras Lentils is a vegetarian friendly product of India, and it pairs beautifully with some fluffy TJ's Organic Basmati Rice [sku 79172], TJ's Tandoori Naan [sku 77677], and/or TJ's Malabari Paratha [sku 95252]. Each 10-ounce, microwavable pouch is $1.99. Find it everyday, on our grocery shelves.
048085.name: Meal Indian Madras Lentils

060410.description: It's hard to overstate the sheer culinary dexterity that ramen possesses. Its very name conjures in our imagina- tions the quick convenience of college fare and the high cuisine of traditional ramen houses. And one simply can't deny the satisfying effect of slurping up a great tangle of noodles in a savory, steaming broth, be it from a bowl or an instant ramen cup. In that spirit, we're introducing Trader Joe's Chicken Flavor Instant Ramen Soup, the perfect bridge between the convenience of instant ramen and the expansive flavors and aromas of a noodle shop shoyu bowl. What truly sets our Chicken Flavor Ramen Soup apart from other instant ramens, aside from its impeccably crafted blend of seasonings, is the inclusion of a packet of blended sunflower and sesame oil. By adding both the packet of seasonings and the packet of oil to your cup of dry noodles before preparation, you ensure not only a delightfully savory broth, rich with flavors of chicken stock, garlic, onion, and soy sauce, but a silky-smooth texture for your noodles-the days of dry-textured instant noodles are over. From there, it's simply a matter of either adding boiling water up to the cup's fill line (or adding room temperature water up to the fill line and microwaving the entire cup for one minute, 30 seconds), stirring, and letting it sit for about six minutes before serving. Whether served straight out of the cup for a quick lunch, or transferred to a bowl with a few more traditional fixings (we recommend adding a few slices of Pork Tenderloin [SKU 51195] and a few shredded Roasted Seaweed Strips [sku 92743 or 62584]), Trader Joe's Chicken Flavor Ramen Soup will deliver a ramen house experience at a student-housing price-$1.29 per 1.5-ounce cup, to be exact. You'll find it in our grocery aisle. 08.02. 18
060410.name: Meal Instant Ramen Cup Chicken 1.5Oz
060410.title: Trader Joe'S Chicken Ramen Soup

060411.description: It's hard to overstate the sheer culinary dexterity that ramen possesses. Its very name conjures in our imagina- tions the quick convenience of college fare and the high cuisine of traditional ramen houses. And one simply can't deny the satisfying effect of slurping up a tangle of noodles in a savory, steaming broth, be it from a bowl or instant ramen cup. In that spirit, we're introducing Trader Joe's Miso Ramen Soup, the perfect bridge between the convenience of instant ramen and the expansive flavors and aromas of a noodle shop miso ramen bowl. What truly sets our Miso Ramen Soup apart from other instant ramens, aside from its impeccably crafted blend of seasonings, is the inclusion of a packet of sunflower oil. By adding both the packet of seasonings and the packet of oil to your cup of dry noodles before preparation, you ensure not only a delightfully savory broth, rich with flavors of miso, garlic, notes of umami and seaweed, but a silky-smooth texture for your noodles-the days of dry-textured instant noodles are over. From there, it's simply a matter of either adding boiling water up to the cup's fill line (or adding room temperature water up to the fill line and microwaving the entire cup for one minute, 30 seconds), stirring, and letting it sit for about six minutes before serving. Whether served straight out of the cup for a quick lunch, or transferred to a bowl with a few more traditional fixings (we recommend adding a few slices Sriracha Flavored Baked Tofu [sku 56423] and a few shredded Roast- ed Seaweed Strips [sku 92743 or 62584]), Trader Joe's Miso Ramen Soup will deliver a ramen house experience at a student-housing price-$1.29 per 1.5-ounce cup, to be exact. You'll find it in our grocery aisle. 08.06. 18
060411.name: Meal Instant Ramen Cup Miso 1.5Oz
060411.title: Trader Joe'S Miso Instant Ramen Soup

062742.description: It's generally a smart idea to keep some noodles in your pantry. But if they're fully-cooked, ready-to-eat, and shelf-stable, too? Now that's really using your noodle. That's precisely the promise of Trader Joe's Thai Wheat Noodles, a three-pack of ready-to-use noodle packets that's as simple to eat as heat, serve, and enjoy. They're made for us, by scratch, by a supplier in Thailand, who cooks them to soft, chewy perfection, then vacuum- seals them to keep them preserved at room temperature until the very moment you need them for a soup, curry, or stir-fry. We're not kidding about the convenience factor on these Noodles: simply open up a packet, mix it into your dish, and you're good to go. Without all that extra time boiling and draining dried noodles, you can afford to experiment with oodles of other ingredients, like a chow-mein inspired stir fry spiced with Chili Onion Crunch [sku 62480], a cold noodle bowl flavored with sesame seeds and Crunchy Peanut Butter [sku 01488], or a savory soup spiked with Thai Style Red Curry Sauce [sku 57474]. When you're ready to explore, check out our 21-ounce boxes of Thai Wheat Noodles, each containing three 7-oz. packs of Noodles. You'll find them in our grocery aisle. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Thai Wheat Noodles
062742.name: Meal Thai Wheat Noodles (3Pk)

062743.description: If you're craving authentic Thai noodles, what should you do? Well, the easiest thing might be to contact your local Thai restaurant and place an order for delivery. Or, is it? We'd like to make the case that reaching into your cupboard and pulling out a package of Trader Joe's Thai Noodles (provided you've stocked up) is easier and quicker than placing a restaurant order. And, it's just as tasty! Trader Joe's Peanut Satay Thai Noodles are made for us by a supplier in Thailand who conjures the flavors found in a traditional Chicken Satay sauce (minus the chicken). This authentic recipe includes ingredients such as: coconut milk, peanuts, chili peppers, lemon grass, curry powder, and garlic. Each 11.64-ounce microwaveable bowl contains a packet of noodles and a packet of sauce. You simply empty both packets into the bowl, replace the lid, and microwave according to the instructions on the package. In about five minutes, you'll be enjoying hot, thick, chewy Thai Noodles in a creamy, peanutty, sweet & savory Peanut Satay sauce¿ no internet ordering or tipping required! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Peanut Satay Thai Noodles
062743.name: Meal Peanut Satay Noodles & Sauce
062743.title: Peanut Satay Thai Noodles

062744.description: If you're craving authentic Thai noodles, what should you do? Well, the easiest thing might be to contact your local Thai restaurant and place an order for delivery. Or, is it? We'd like to make the case that reaching into your cupboard and pulling out a package of Trader Joe's Thai Noodles (provided you've stocked up) is easier and quicker than placing a restaurant order. And, it's just as tasty! Trader Joe's Garlic Sauce Thai Noodles are made for us by a supplier in Thailand who conjures the flavors found in a traditional Thai garlic sauce. This authentic recipe includes ingredients such as: garlic (of course!), chili peppers, scallions, and soy sauce. Each 11.64-ounce microwaveable bowl contains a packet of noodles and a packet of sauce. You simply empty both packets into the bowl, replace the lid, and microwave according to the instructions on the package. In about five minutes, you'll be enjoying hot, thick, chewy Thai Noodles in a rich, sweet & savory Garlic Sauce¿ no internet ordering or tipping required! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Garlic Sauce Thai Noodles
062744.name: Meal Garlic Noodles & Sauce
062744.title: Garlic Sauce Thai Noodles

062745.description: If you're craving authentic Thai noodles, what should you do? Well, the easiest thing might be to contact your local Thai restaurant and place an order for delivery. Or, is it? We'd like to make the case that reaching into your cupboard and pulling out a package of Trader Joe's Thai Noodles (provided you've stocked up) is easier and quicker than placing a restaurant order. And, it's just as tasty! Trader Joe's Red Curry Thai Noodles are made for us by a supplier in Thailand who conjures the flavors found in a traditional Thai red curry sauce. This authentic recipe includes ingredients such as: coconut milk, bamboo shoots, garlic, kaffir lime leaves, and red chilies. Each 11.64-ounce microwaveable bowl contains a packet of noodles and a packet of sauce. You simply empty both packets into the bowl, replace the lid, and microwave according to the instructions on the package. In about five minutes, you'll be enjoying hot, thick, chewy Thai Noodles in a creamy, aromatic, slightly spicy Red Curry¿ no internet ordering or tipping required! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Red Curry Thai Noodles
062745.name: Meal Red Curry Noodles & Sauce
062745.title: Red Curry Thai Noodles

068421.description: While gluten free breakfast options are definitely trending, it's difficult to find single-serve baked goods that fit the gluten free bill-which is why we're doubly excited about our new Trader Joe's Protein Muffin Mixes. Our Dark Chocolate Protein Muffin starts with cassava flour and coconut flour, with plenty of chocolate chips and cocoa powder to lend rich chocolate flavor to the finished Muffin. Think of TJ's Protein Muffins as a healthier take on the classic mug cake, packaged in their own cooking vessel and ready for you to personalize and enjoy. Remove the lid and add one-quarter cup of cool water, milk, or your favorite milk alternative (we like TJ's Non-Dairy Oat Beverage [sku 65333]), stir, and microwave for 60 seconds. You'll be rewarded with a warm, moist, gluten free muffin, with a whopping 12 grams of protein, making it ideal for a quick breakfast or filling snack when busting out the bakeware is not an option. Pick up a 2.08-ounce Dark Chocolate Protein Muffin for $1.99 each, on our grocery shelves. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Dark Chocolate Protein Muffin
068421.name: Meal Protein Muffin Double Chocolate
068421.title: Dark Chocolate Protein Muffin

068462.description: Broadly speaking, ramen can be categorized into one of two types: the kind you get a big, steaming bowl of at a restaurant, and the kind you make at home with a kettle of hot water or a microwave. Trader Joe's Spicy Miso Instant Ramen is our humble endeavor to merge these two categories. What's our secret? In addition to the noodles and packet of delightfully savory seasonings, each 1.76-ounce Ramen Soup cup includes a packet of blended sunflower and toasted sesame oil, which gives the noodles a fine, silky texture that's normally exclusive to ramen found in noodle shops. In fact, we drew direct inspiration from the hot and spicy options at most noodle shops for our vegan Spicy Miso flavor. Once mixed with hot water, the included seasoning packet creates a rich, savory, and pleasantly spicy broth - one that's hot enough to satisfy most heat-seekers out there, but not so hot as to turn away those with milder tastes. We like to dress ours up simply, with a quick garnish of seaweed, scallions, or cilantro, but you could certainly go all out and add some protein with a soft-boiled egg, marinated tofu, or even some roasted pork, if you'd like. However you go about it, Trader Joe's Spicy Miso Instant Ramen is quick, convenient, and top quality, while also remaining a real value at $1.49* per cup. Look for it in our grocery aisle. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Spicy Miso Instant Ramen Soup
068462.name: Meal Instant Ramen Cup Spicy Miso 1.8Oz
068462.title: Trader Joe'S Spicy Miso Instant Ramen Soup

077740.description: They're squiggly, they're chewy, and now they're spicy: Trader Joe's fan favorite Squiggly Knife Cut Style Noodles with Soy and Sesame Sauce [sku 74472] get a fiery sibling in Squiggly Knife Cut Style Noodles with a Spicy Garlic Sesame Sauce! Inspired by Knife Cut Noodles originating in the northern Chinese province of Shanxi (roughly "shan-tsee" in English), our Knife Cut Style Noodles are air-dried into wavy ribbons with thin and silky ruffled edges and thick and chewy centers. Soy sauce and garlic give the Sauce its aromatic and umami-laden profile, while red and cayenne chili powder pack notable heat. Rich sesame paste lends nutty flavor and density for a thick Sauce that clings to every bouncy Noodle. Each individually wrapped serving comes with pre-portioned Noodles and one packet each of spicy soy garlic sauce and sesame paste. Cook the Noodles in boiling water for four minutes, drain, place in a bowl, stir in the sauce packets, and get to noshing! If you're feeling fancy, the Noodles make quite the canvas for customization. Mix in cabbage, carrots, and scallions to get your veggies in, and top with fried eggs, ground beef, or Organic Firm Tofu [sku 41911] for extra protein. Squiggly Knife Cut Style Noodles with a Spicy Garlic Sesame Sauce
077740.name: Meal Squiggly Noodles With Spicy Garlic Sesame Sau
077740.title: Spicy Squiggly Knife Cut Noodles

074228.name: La Vieille Ferme Cotes Du Ventoux Rouge 1.5L

074417.name: Domaine Chanson Le Bourgogne Pinot Noir

074447.name: Finca Decero Owl And Dust Devil Cab

063886.name: Z Demo Hand Sanitizer W/ Pumps

069892.name: Mask Hi Pleated Nose Bridge Regular

069894.name: Mask Hi Pleated Nose Bridge Xlarge

076904.description: Scarlet, shiny, and bursting with tartness-cranberries have brightened the North American landscape for hundreds of years. And Trader Joe's 100% Cranberry Juice has graced our store shelves since 2005! This Cranberry Juice is made exclusively from whole cranberries that are grown and harvested at the peak of bouncy ripeness in the Pacific Northwest. That's it. Nothing added. It's just the cranberries! And like the color of the berries, this juice will make you take notice-it's quite tart and strongly-flavored. That said, a splash of sparkling water or sweet juice companion (or even spirits) will temper the provocative pucker. We should also mention that numerous studies have been published praising the health-promoting properties of cranberry juice. While we can't confirm its specific benefits, we will certainly tout the excellent value of our version: The 32 fluid-ounce bottle of 100% Cranberry Juice is $2.99* (plus deposit where required). *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. 100% Cranberry Juice
076904.name: Cran Juice Nfc 100% 32 Oz
076904.title: Trader Joe'S 100% Cranberry Juice

079497.description: When life gives us lemons at Trader Joe's, we imagine all of the wonderful lemon bars, poultry marinades and garnishes, cocktails, and of course, lemonade we can get started on. And when life gives us strawberries and lemons, we make Trader Joe's Organic Strawberry Lemonade, a tasty and refreshing juice that can be enjoyed anytime! Our Organic Strawberry Lemonade sources natural, certified organic ingredients to make each half-gallon of this tangy and tart beverage. Free of high fructose corn syrup, preservatives, and artificial flavors, Trader Joe's Organic Lemonade also delivers you a boost of vitamin C, 25% per eight fluid ounce serving to be exact. Whether you're setting up a lemonade stand with your children, hosting a summertime BBQ in need of refreshments, or enjoying a sweet afternoon pick me up, Trader Joe's Organic Lemonade has a home on your shopping list! And for only $3.99* per 64 fluid-ounce bottle, it's a value of an organic refreshment that can be found any day at your local Trader Joe's. Organic Strawberry Lemonade
079497.name: Strawberry Lemonade Org 64 Oz
079497.title: Organic Strawberry Lemonade

037482.name: Eggs Large Cage Free Brown Doz
037482.title: Sauder Eggs Extra Large Grade A

084237.name: Eggs Extra Large Cage Free Bro
084237.title: Sauder Eggs Extra Large Grade A

091909.description: Sometimes taking your time in the kitchen is the most appetizing and rewarding precursor to a meal, but just as often, convenience and time saved is just as appetizing to us! With Trader Joe's Cage Free Hard Cooked & Peeled Eggs, any shopper can enjoy both the delight of convenience and a pre-cooked, handy snack that is available anytime for a crafty addition to salads, sandwiches, or whatever possible recipe ideas have hatched in your noggin. Trader Joe's Cage Free Hard Cooked & Peeled Eggs have their beginnings with cage free hens that are free to perch, scratch, and nest as they please. With an origin like that, these Hard Cooked & Peeled Eggs are bound to flock to our shelves with nothing short of fresh, flying flavors. With six medium sized hard cooked eggs in their resealable bag-of-a-hen-house, you can spend your time enjoying your meal and less time preparing it! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Cage Free Hard Cooked & Peeled Eggs
091909.name: Eggs Hard Cooked Cage Free
091909.title: Trader Joes Cage Free Fresh Hard-Cooked Peeled Eggs

037756.description: When life gives us lemons at Trader Joe's, we imagine all of the wonderful lemon bars, poultry marinades and garnishes, cocktails, and of course, lemonade we can get started on. Trader Joe's Organic Lemonade puts those newfound lemons to use by crafting a tasty and refreshing juice that can be enjoyed anytime! Our Organic Lemonade sources natural, certified organic ingredients to make each half-gallon of this tangy and tart beverage. Free of high fructose corn syrup, preservatives, and artificial flavors, Trader Joe's Organic Lemonade also delivers you a blast of vitamin C, 140% of your daily value per eight fluid ounce serving to be exact. Whether you're setting up a lemonade stand with your children, hosting a summertime BBQ in need of refreshments, or enjoying a sweet afternoon pick me up, Trader Joe's Organic Lemonade has a home on your shopping list! And for only $2.99* per 64 fluid-ounce bottle, it's a value of an organic refreshment that can be found any day at your local Trader Joe's. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Lemonade
037756.name: Lemonade Org 64 Oz
037756.title: Organic Lemonade

012663.description: Clif 's son, Gary Erickson, was on a long bike ride in 1990 when he realized he had finally had it with "unappetizing, sticky, hard-to-digest" bars. That moment sparked some inspiration, leading Gary to innovate in his mother's kitchen and create the very first Clif Bar. Trader Joe's understands the Clif Bar story. It is one of opportunity, inspiration, and innovation - three words we embrace as we search for and develop our own products. This resonance, plus the broad popularity of Clif Bars, is why we've carried a wide variety of their bars for a long time. We've been carrying their Chocolate Chip Clif Bar since the near-conception of the company. It brings to mind the smell and taste of fresh, warm chocolate chip cookies straight out of the oven. Like all their original Clif Bars, this one is crafted for sustained energy with 100% organic rolled oats and chocolate chips. In particular, this Chocolate Chip Clif Bar is a good source of protein at 9g per bar, and a good source of dietary fiber at 4g per bar. It contains only 4.5g total fat and 0g trans fat, with no partially-hydrogenated oils, high fructose corn syrup, artificial flavors or synthetic preservatives. But the best part is the delicious flavor and how it's superconvenient to take on all of your adventures. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Chocolate Chip Clif Bar
012663.name: Bars Clif Choc Chip

012995.description: Crunchy Peanut Butter Clif Bars are great to have on hand whenever you would normally enjoy an energy bar: hiking, after a workout, for a quick breakfast, as an afternoon pick-me-up, etc. Don't feel confined by these scenarios, however. Take a Clif Bar to the movies, out walking the dog, after your weekly badminton game, after watching other people burn energy¿ what we're saying is these Crunchy Peanut Butter Clif Bars are always enjoyable. By adding even more crunchy, craveable peanuts, each Crunchy Peanut Butter Clif Bar is a peanut butter lover's dream. Like all of their original Clif Bars, this one uses 100% organic rolled oats and smooth organic peanut butter. Additionally, this Crunchy Peanut Butter Clif Bar is a good source of protein at 11g per bar, and a good source of dietary fiber at 4g per bar. It contains only 7g total fat and 0g trans fat, with no partially- hydrogenated oils, high fructose corn syrup, artificial flavors or synthetic preservatives. All this sounds great, but the best part is the delicious flavor and its convenience to take on all of your future adventures. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Crunchy Peanut Butter Clif Bar
012995.name: Bars Clif Crunchy Peanut Butter

054581.description: It can be hard to eat well when you're always on the go. Or at least that's what Think!® founder Lizanne Falsetto found herself bumping up against some 20+ years ago, when, in simply tinkering with protein bar recipes in her home kitchen, she laid the groundwork to become a future wellness phenomenon. A single mother and former fashion model, Lizanne knew there had to be a "better bar" for busy folks. One with plenty of protein. One without sugar, gluten (which Lizanne is allergic to), or genetically modified ingredients. And, most importantly, one that didn't taste like some wretched amalgamation of sawdust and cardboard. The Think!® High Protein Bar is that bar, and we're pleased to offer the Creamy Peanut Butter flavor in our stores. Soft and chewy, these whey-and-soy-based Protein Bars bars boast a smooth, peanut-butter interior and a chocolate-dipped exterior. They're kosher certified, gluten free, and contain 20g of protein and 0g of sugar per bar-a superb snack to satisfy a sweet tooth, a potential small meal replacement, and great for a pre-or- post-workout energy boost. Keep on on hand in your purse, desk drawer and/or gym back to stave off hunger whenever and wherever it strikes. Here's something else that'll give you a boost: we're selling each 2.1-ounce Think!® Creamy Peanut Butter High Protein Bar for $1.49. You'll find them in our bars section.
054581.name: Think Thin Pb Lite
054581.title: Bars Think Thin Creamy Peanut Butter

057091.description: At Trader Joe's, we love value, and we love quality ingredients. We also love protein bars. How about a protein bar made with quality ingredients offered at a great value? Even better. Enter: Blueberry RXBARs®. One glance at these bars, and you'll understand why we just had to carry 'em. As soon as you pick up an RXBAR®, you'll know what it's made with-it's right there on the front! The four core ingredients (egg whites, almonds, cashews, and dates) can be found in big, bold letters, so you know what you'll be eating without having to investigate that tiny-print ingredient list with a magnifying glass (we can't all be Sherlock Holmes). RXBAR® strives to create a product that's "simple and delicious without compromising nutrition," and they live up to this promise. These whole food bars contain no added sugars, artificial ingredients or preservatives, as well as no gluten, dairy, or soy. In fact, each 1.83-ounce (52 gram) RXBAR® contains only six to eight ingredients and still has 12 grams of protein. In addition to the loud-and-proud core ingredients, the Blueberry RXBAR® contains-yep-blueberries. Whole blueberries along with essential oils extracted from the fruit create the enticing, fruity flavor reminiscent of a blueberry muffin. No baking required here, though. 059000.description: It can be hard to eat well when you're always on the go. Or at least that's what Think!® founder Lizanne Falsetto found herself bumping up against some 20+ years ago, when, in simply tinkering with protein bar recipes in her home kitchen, she laid the groundwork to become a future wellness phenomenon. A single mother and former fashion model, Lizanne knew there had to be a "better bar" for busy folks. One with plenty of protein. One without sugar, gluten (which Lizanne is allergic to), or genetically modified ingredients. And, most importantly, one that didn't taste like some wretched amalgamation of sawdust and cardboard. The Think!® High Protein Bar is that bar, and we're pleased to offer the Brownie Crunch flavor in our stores. Soft and chewy, these whey-and-soy-based Protein Bars bars boast a smooth-but-crunchy (thanks to the inclusion of roasted almond pieces) chocolate interior and a chocolate-dipped exterior. They're kosher certified, gluten free, and contain 20g of protein and 0g of sugar per bar-a superb snack to satisfy a sweet tooth, a potential small meal replacement, and great for a pre-or-post-workout energy boost. Keep on on hand in your purse, desk drawer and/or gym back to stave off hunger whenever and wherever it strikes. Here's something else that'll give you a boost: we're selling each 2.1-ounce Think!® Brownie Crunch High Protein Bar for $1.49. You'll find them in our bars section.
059000.name: Bars Think Thin Brownie Crunch Lite

The four core ingredients (egg whites, almonds, cashews, and dates) can be found in big, bold letters, so you know what you'll be eating without having to investigate that tiny-print ingredient list with a magnifying glass. RXBAR® strives to create a product that's "simple and delicious without compromising nutrition," and they live up to this promise. These whole food bars contain no added sugars, artificial ingredients or preservatives, nor do they contain gluten, diary, or soy. In addition to the loud-and-proud core ingredients, the Chocolate Sea Salt RXBAR® contains-you guessed it-cacao and sea salt. It's an insanely addictive combination of 100% pure chocolate with a savory hint of sea salt. There's just something about that sweet-savory combo¿ You'll find Chocolate Sea Salt RXBAR®s for only $1.89-the lowest price around-at your local Trader Joe's. A straightforward bar for a straightforward price. 12.05. 16

Now that fall has come around again, we thought it only made sense to offer another seasonal flavor: Apple Cinnamon RXBAR®. This familiar-flavored Apple Cinnamon RXBAR® also comes with the admirable attributes of the other RXBARs® we sell. As always, the four core ingredients (egg whites, almonds, cashews, and dates) can be found in big, bold letters on the front of the bar, so you know what you'll be eating without having to investigate that tiny-print ingredient list with a magnifying glass (we can't all be Sherlock Holmes). The only other ingredients added to this bar are apples, cinnamon, and natural apple flavor. Simple. RXBAR® strives to create a product that's "simple and delicious without compromising nutrition," and they live up to this promise. Just as appealing as what these bars do contain is what they don't contain. RXBARs® don't contain any added sugars, artificial ingredients, preservatives, gluten, dairy, or soy. Grab 'em they last, because the season will be over before you know it. 09.25. 17
061198.name: Rx Apple Cinnamon
061198.title: Rxbar Apple Cinnamon

062589.description: Gold nuggets, nuggets of wisdom, chicken nuggets¿ These are all fantastic things that come in rather small, unassuming sizes. Trailnuggets Pro Bars fall in line with these other nuggets, but they have one specific job to do: provide energy and protein in one convenient and delicious nugget. They really are nugget shaped, but don't think these bars are any less energizing because of it. Trailnuggets Pro Energy & Protein Bars were designed with any and all energy-burning folks in mind. Each simple, easily recognizable ingredient has a specific purpose and earns its place in a Bar. The recipe for Cranberry Orange Beet Pro Bars isn't complicated: dates, almonds, pea protein, dried cranberries, beet powder, water, salt, and orange oil. That's it! Because pea protein is used, these Bars are vegan while still providing 10 grams of protein. One look at the packaging of a Cranberry Orange Beet Pro Bar and you'll fall in love with the sweet little beet, orange, and cranberries hanging out together. One bite into a Cranberry Orange Beet Pro Bar, though, and you'll be blown away. It's perfectly soft and chewy (not dry or gooey like other protein bars), and you'll find whole dried cranberries studding the bar. Have one on hand to curb a mid-day snack attack, provide a quick boost of energy while traveling, or to enjoy while hiking or after a workout. Each 2.1-ounce Trailnuggets Pro Cranberry Orange Beet Energy & Protein Bar is $1.49, every day. 02.19. 18
062589.name: Trail Nuggets Beet
062589.title: Trailnuggets Pro Beet

096677.description: If we may, for a moment, let's get practical about procuring protein: it's not always easy to get all your protein in over the course of a day, and sources of concentrated protein aren't always the tastiest things on the menu. That's why we love Power Crunch Bars so much: these light, crispy Bars offer a potent punch of candy-like flavor in addition to a sizable 13 grams of protein per serving. Power Crunch Triple Chocolate Bars, in particular, deliver that protein between three layers of chocolate surrounding crunchy wafer cookies. Perfectly proportioned for prime portability, Power Crunch Triple Chocolate Bars fit smartly in your gym bag or purse, making them ideal for taking pre- or post-workout. With their remarkably chocolate-y flavor and captivating crunch, though, you might just prefer to keep them on hand for snacking purposes - which makes the fact that each Bar only has five grams of sugar all the sweeter. And then, of course, there's the price: other retailers may sell Power Crunch Bars for two dollars and up, but at Trader Joe's, you can find individual Power Crunch Triple Chocolate Bars for $1.49, every day. Talk about practical! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Power Crunch Protein Energy Bar Triple Chocolate
096677.name: Bars Power Crunch Triple Chocolate

112663.description: Clif 's son, Gary Erickson, was on a long bike ride in 1990 when he realized he had finally had it with "unappetizing, sticky, hard-to-digest" bars. That moment sparked some inspiration, leading Gary to innovate in his mother's kitchen and create the very first Clif Bar. Trader Joe's understands the Clif Bar story. It is one of opportunity, inspiration, and innovation - three words we embrace as we search for and develop our own products. This resonance, plus the broad popularity of Clif Bars, is why we've carried a wide variety of their bars for a long time. We've been carrying their Chocolate Chip Clif Bar since the near-conception of the company. It brings to mind the smell and taste of fresh, warm chocolate chip cookies straight out of the oven. Like all their original Clif Bars, this one is crafted for sustained energy with 100% organic rolled oats and chocolate chips. In particular, this Chocolate Chip Clif Bar is a good source of protein at 9g per bar, and a good source of dietary fiber at 4g per bar. It contains only 4.5g total fat and 0g trans fat, with no partially-hydrogenated oils, high fructose corn syrup, artificial flavors or synthetic preservatives. But the best part is the delicious flavor and how it's superconvenient to take on all of your adventures. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Chocolate Chip Clif Bar
112663.name: Clif Choc Chip Box
112663.title: Bars Clif Choc Chip

112995.description: Crunchy Peanut Butter Clif Bars are great to have on hand whenever you would normally enjoy an energy bar: hiking, after a workout, for a quick breakfast, as an afternoon pick-me-up, etc. Don't feel confined by these scenarios, however. Take a Clif Bar to the movies, out walking the dog, after your weekly badminton game, after watching other people burn energy¿ what we're saying is these Crunchy Peanut Butter Clif Bars are always enjoyable. By adding even more crunchy, craveable peanuts, each Crunchy Peanut Butter Clif Bar is a peanut butter lover's dream. Like all of their original Clif Bars, this one uses 100% organic rolled oats and smooth organic peanut butter. Additionally, this Crunchy Peanut Butter Clif Bar is a good source of protein at 11g per bar, and a good source of dietary fiber at 4g per bar. It contains only 7g total fat and 0g trans fat, with no partially- hydrogenated oils, high fructose corn syrup, artificial flavors or synthetic preservatives. All this sounds great, but the best part is the delicious flavor and its convenience to take on all of your future adventures. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Crunchy Peanut Butter Clif Bar
112995.name: Clif Crnchy Pb Box
112995.title: Bars Clif Crunchy Peanut Butter

060114.description: If you're lactose intolerant, it's quite difficult to enjoy a cookie with a glass of milk, or a bowl of cereal. Luckily, Trader Joe's Lactose Free Whole Milk is here to save the day. Trader Joe's Lactose Free Whole Milk has all the magnificent qualities-and taste-of milk, but without the lactose! In addition to our other two types of Lactose Free Milk (Reduced Fat [sku 60115] and Fat Free [sku 60116]), this Whole Milk offering is new to our set-we didn't offer this option at all in our previous, branded line of lactose free milk. Lactase enzyme is added to the milk, making it easier to digest. This is the perfect milk of choice for those sensitive to lactose. Each serving contains 20% of your daily value of calcium and eight grams of protein. Pour Lactose Free Milk over cereal, dip cookies into a glass, or enjoy it on its own-worry free! Yes, you now can enjoy TJ's Crispy Crunchy Chocolate Chip Cookies [sku 10727] or Almond Windmill Cookies [sku 98744] with a big, cold glass of milk. You can also include milk in your morning bowl of Coconut Cran- berry Granola [sku 51131]. Even baking becomes a breeze when you substitute in Lactose Free Milk. Another reason to feel great? Our value. Each 64-fluid-ounce carton of Trader Joe's Lactose Free Whole Milk is $3.69. Not all heroes wear capes; some come in cartons. 11.24. 17
060114.name: Milk Lactose Free Hg Whole
060114.title: Lactose Free Whole Milk Vitamin D * Ultra Pasteurized *Vitamin D And Ultra Pasteurized Must Be Immediately Adjacent To And At Least Half The Height Of The Words "Whole Milk".

Luckily, Trader Joe's Lactose Free Reduced Fat Milk is here to save the day. Trader Joe's Lactose Free Reduced Fat Milk has all the magnificent qualities-and taste-of milk, but without the lactose! Lactase enzyme is added to the milk, making it easier to digest. This is the perfect milk of choice for those sensitive to lactose. Each serving contains 25% of your daily value of calcium and ten grams of protein. Pour it over cereal, dip cookies into a glass, or enjoy it on its own-worry free! Yes, you now can enjoy TJ's Crispy Crunchy Chocolate Chip Cookies [sku 10727] or Almond Windmill Cookies [sku 98744] with a big, cold glass of milk. 060115.title: Milk Lactose Free Half Gallon Low Fat 2%

061673.description: Contrary to popular belief, not all chocolate milks are equal. It might seem that all you need is chocolate (in some form) and milk. If you want phenomenal chocolate milk, though, you need to go all out. And all out we went with Trader Joe's Chocolate Whole Milk made with Fair Trade Cocoa. We did not source this Chocolate Whole Milk from chocolate cows. (If only they existed¿) Instead, we started by sourcing fair trade cocoa from small family farms in Northern Peru. This cocoa is then mixed with whole milk and cane sugar. The resulting concoction is what you'll find in the charming cartons of Chocolate Whole Milk. It's truly the most rich, creamy, dreamy Chocolate Milk we could find. In a glass with a straw. Blended with Golden Caramel Swirl Ice Cream [sku 96760] into a milkshake. With Crispy Crunchy Chocolate Chip Cookies [sku 10727] for dessert before bed. Don't ask us to pick a favorite way to enjoy this Chocolate Whole Milk-they're all the best. Someday, there might be chocolate cows that produce the most delicious, rich chocolate milk. Until that day comes, you can enjoy Trader Joe's Chocolate Whole Milk made with Fair Trade Cocoa. Each half gallon (64 fluid ounce carton) is $3.99, every day. 03.01. 18
061673.name: Milk Choco Half Gallon Whole
061673.title: Chocolate Milk Made With Fair Trade Cocoa

063768.description: Behind every glass of milk is a cow with a story. The unique story behind the cows that produce Trader Joe's Organic Whole Milk from Grass Fed Cows is that they hail from a lush, expansive Colorado farm, where they spend a minimum of 150 days out of the year freely grazing upon organic pastures. During that time, foraged grass is obviously the main thing on the menu, not grains or grain byproducts. (And these cows never receive any hormones or antibiotics-that's true 365 days per year, per organic standards!) Now that you now the story behind your glass of Milk, let's talk about the Milk in your glass¿ Our Grade-A, USDA-certified Organic Milk from Grass Fed Cows is filtered, homogenized, and ultra-pasteurized (held at high temperature for a short time), and contains added Vitamin D3. Beyond all these terrific technical traits, its flavor is also rather special. At 3.5% milkfat, it's thick, creamy, and smooth, with an almost buttery taste. It's perfect for drinking chilled & "straight up," but it's equally suited to star in many other milk moments. Take your cup of TJ's coffee to another silky, milky level. Buoy up your bowl of TJ's Organic Corn Flakes [sku 92331]. Add a splash to scrambled eggs or pancake batter for some added final fluff. We're selling each half-gallon carton of TJ's Organic Whole Milk from Grass Fed Cows for $4.99-now that's a story worth repeating! You'll find it in our dairy fridge.

013651.description: Introduced in 1780, The Original Celebrated Altoids Mints, originally used to relieve stomach discomfort. Now, used to relieve breath discomfort, since introduced at Trader Joe's in 1996. There really is no good time for bad breath. Altoids Peppermints are not called "Curiously Strong Mints" for no reason - they're so strong, they may leave you curious as to how a mint can be that strong. These iconic Altoids freshen your breath, cool the palate and can save the day before the important meeting or big date, so keep these mints within a quick reach. No need to skip that TJ's Chicken Burrito [sku 01215] with loaded onions or tasty TJ's Garlic Naan [sku 77678]. Each Mint is sweet, and made from the finest Peppermint ingredients. So, go ahead and load up on the onions and garlic¿ you're covered. We're selling each 1.76-ounce tin of Altoids Peppermint, curiously strong mints for $1.99*. You can find these at the register. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Altoids Peppermint
013651.name: Altoids Peppermint Regular

032991.description: The "Mintyist" of our Breathmints, WinterMynt Blast Myntz has just the right burst of icy, cool freshness that can save the day before the important meeting or big date, so keep these Myntz within a quick reach. No need to skip that TJ's Chicken Burrito [sku 01215] with loaded onions or tasty TJ's Garlic Naan [sku 77678]. Each Mynt is sweet, not because of the sugar, but because of the natural sugar substitute, sorbitol, found in fruit and natural peppermint extract. And, that's not all. Not only are WinterMyntz tasty, they're also dentist recomended - they promote good oral hygiene and help prevent tooth decay. What a Blast! We're selling each 1.75-ounce tin of sugar free, WinterMynt Blast Myntz! for $1.69*. You can find these at the register for a cleaner, fresher, and healthier mouth. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Wintermynt Blast Myntz!

032991.title: Candy Mints Wintermynt Sf

057478.description: We love being able to give the people what they want, and we think it's fair to say that the people want¿ gum. Specifically, mint gum. More specifically, mint gum that's available for sale at their local Trader Joe's. So, when the folks at Velamints¿ (whose Blood Orange [sku 56778], Mango [sku 57378], and Coconut Lime [sku 58623] Sugar Free Mints have all been well-received in our stores this year) asked us if we would be interested in carrying their Peppermint Gum, we saw an opportunity to fulfill a long-standing customer request. In the words of Marie Antoinette, "Let them chew gum*¿" Velamints¿ Peppermint Gum isn't just any peppermint gum-it's kind of like a mint n' gum sandwich. Actually, it is a mint n' gum sandwich: squares of pleasantly pepperminty, satisfyingly sweet chewing gum positioned between a carefully bisected Velamints¿ classic peppermint. Is it gum? Is it a mint? It's both! And it's sugar free, to boot. Your dentist would surely approve. Pop a piece of Velamints¿ Peppermint Gum whenever you need fresher breath or a minty pick-me-up. It comes in a slim, durable tin, so you can carry it in your purse (or on your person) at all times. If you feel like sharing, circulate a tin around your dinner party after serving up a veggie platter replete with TJ's Roasted Garlic Hummus [sku 29911] and TJ's Garlic Spread-Dip [sku 54173]-your guests will take the hint. We're selling each 1.12 ounce tin (that's 16 pieces) of Velamints¿ Peppermint Gum for $1.99. Currently, this gum isn't available at any other U.S. retailers-so snag a tin today and enjoy your moment as a member of the chewing gum elite! (*Not quite what she said-but close.) 10.10. 16
057478.name: Candy Velamints Gum Peppermint

058623.description: Let's face it-there are times when you just need a mint. At Trader Joe's, we like to keep you prepared for these times. This may not come as a surprise, but at Trader Joe's, we also have a penchant for all things tropical-so, really, Velamints¿ Coconut Lime Sugar Free Mints just make sense to us. A product that creates both fresh breath and a tropical oasis in your mouth? We're all about it! And, if the back-to-back successes of Velamints¿ Coconut Lime Sugar Free Mints' predecessors-Blood Orange [sku 56778] and Mango [sku 57378]-are any indication, we think our customers will be all about these Mints, too. Distinctly coconutty with a splash of lime and a hint of mint, Velamints¿ Coconut Lime Sugar Free Mints are both minty and fruity. They are sweetened with Truvia¿ Natural Sweetener rather than sugar (or aspartame), so in addition to freshening your breath, Velamints¿ satisfy a passing sweet tooth without all the calories of a heavier indulgence. And if that wasn't enough, they happen to come in a pretty darn cute, collectable tin to boot. There is no wrong time to enjoy Velamints¿ Coconut Lime Sugar Free Mints, but they do come in particularly handy after polishing off a tub of our TJ's Mediterranean Hummus [sku 90642], or a generous piece of our new TJ's Tarte à l'Oignon [sku 55316]. You can even use these little gems to win friends and influence people; After all, nothing sparks up a conversation or inspires confidence in your abilities quite like, "Care for a mint?" Like the Velamints¿ flavors that graced our shelves before them, Velamints¿ Coconut Lime Sugar Free Mints are only available for a limited time, so snag a tin while you can. We are selling each 0.7 ounce tin for $1.49, which is a small price to pay for fresh breath and a little piece of paradise, if you ask us. 09.26 .16
058623.name: Candy Mints Velamints Coconut Lime

074888.description: One sunny summer afternoon, as our Buyer was checking out at her neighborhood Trader Joe's, she was struck by a fresh idea, inspired by the assortment of mints before her: why not try chai? Specifically, if TJ's Green Tea Infused Mints [sku 96004] are our best-selling breath mints, why not try translating another Tea into Mint form? And thus, Trader Joe's Chai Tea Mints were born. Much like the real McCoy, Trader Joe's Chai Tea Mints are made with black tea and crushed cardamom seeds, plus cinnamon, clove, and ginger natural flavors. We've also added a bit of peppermint oil for a cooling, freshening effect, because, you know... breath mints. Like their Green Tea counterparts, they're shaped like tiny tea leaves and come packed in conveniently portable tins. Pick one up today, put it in your purse or pocket, then pop a Mint whenever your mouth needs a touch of sweet, cooling-yet-cozy Chai Tea flavor. Chai Tea Mints
074888.name: Chai Tea Mints

096004.description: Trader Joe's Green Tea Mints aren't just flavored; they're Infused with actual green tea. That's right, infused. We don't use any old green tea, though. We use organic matcha green tea that's sourced from single-estate tea farms in Japan. The matcha here is the real deal and its combined with peppermint oil, made with real cane sugar and honey for the making of an appropriately sweet and lingering peppermint treat. Furthermore, the combination of matcha and mint will leave your breath smelling fresh and clean. That's a winning combination, right there! Also winning is our price of $1.99* for each perfectly portable, 1.2-ounce tin of Trader Joe's Green Tea Infused Mints. You'll find these only at your neighborhood Trader Joe's near the other handy treats and candies at the register. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Green Tea Infused Mints

056801.description: The word "vitamin" was coined in the early 20th century, from the Latin word vita (meaning "life") and the word "amine"-as vitamins were originally thought to contain organic compounds known as amines. It was discovered long ago that not all vitamins, in fact, contain amines, but the name stuck¿ Even today, our understanding of vitamins, minerals, and dietary supplements only continues to evolve, and so, too, do our product offerings. Spurred on by customer feedback, updated industry research, and the spirit of Kaizen, we have made some exciting changes and additions to the category. One such addition is Trader Joe's Chewable Melatonin - 3mg. We currently carry a Chewable Melatonin [sku 48140] in a 500mcg format (for comparison, 500mcg = .5mg), but our customers have let us know that they would like the option to purchase a stronger dosage of this popular sleep aid. Chewable Melatonin - 3mg is synthesized via a proprietary process and, even though it is not sourced from animals, it is molecularly identical to the melatonin derived from the pineal gland of animals. We're selling each 100-tablet bottle of pleasantly peppermint-flavored Trader Joe's Chewable Melatonin - 3mg for $3.99-you'll find it on the shelves with our other dietary supplements. 06.19. 17
056801.name: Melatonin 3 Mg

056802.description: The word "vitamin" was coined in the early 20th century, from the Latin word vita (meaning "life") and the word "amine"-as vitamins were originally thought to contain organic compounds known as amines. It was discovered long ago that not all vitamins, in fact, contain amines, but the name stuck¿ Even today, our understanding of vitamins, minerals, and dietary supplements only continues to evolve, and so, too, do our product offerings. Spurred on by customer feedback, updated industry research, and the spirit of Kaizen, we have made some exciting changes and additions to the category. One such addition is Trader Joe's Vitamin D3 - 125mcg (5000 IU), which is derived from lanolin (sheep's wool) and formulated in 200mg of flaxseed oil. We currently carry a Vitamin D3 [sku 92846] in a 1000 IU format, but our customers have let us know that they would like the option to purchase a stronger dosage, as the most commonly recommended dosage nowadays is 3000 - 5000 IU daily. (Humans get Vitamin D from food and exposure to light, and now that many of us work indoors, we're exposed to less and less light... hence the desire to supplement.) We're selling each bottle of 90, easy-to-swallow Trader Joe's Vitamin D3 - 125mcg (5000 IU) softgels for $4.99-you'll find it on the shelves with our other dietary supplements. 06.19. 17
056802.name: Vitamin D3 5000 Iu
056802.title: Vitamin D3 Dietary Supplement

056845.description: The word "vitamin" was coined in the early 20th century, from the Latin word vita (meaning "life") and the word "amine"-as vitamins were originally thought to contain organic compounds known as amines. It was discovered long ago that not all vitamins, in fact, contain amines, but the name stuck¿ Even today, our understanding of vitamins only continues to evolve, and so, too, do our product offerings. Spurred on by customer feedback, updated industry research, and the spirit of Kaizen, we have made some exciting changes and additions to the category. One such addition is Trader Joe's Advanced Strength Probiotic. Often taken to support digestive balance and immune health, Probiotics are still all the rage in the world of dietary supplements. Since we introduced it some years back, our Super Acidophilus Complex [sku 92582] has done quite well. Lately, however, our customers have been asking for an even more potent Probiotic option. Well, ask and ye shall receive! Whereas our Super Acidophilus Complex contains 10 billion colony-forming units (CFUs) per dose, Trader Joe's Advanced Strength Probiotic contains 30 billion CFUs per dose. It also happens to contain 8 different probiotic strains. Speaking of strains, we're pleased to report that a purchase of Trader Joe's Advanced Strength Probiotic won't strain your wallet. We're selling each 30-capsule bottle for $12.99-a fantastic value you'd be hard-pressed to find anywhere else. You'll find our Advanced Strength Probiotic on the shelves with our other dietary supplements. 10.16. 17
056845.name: Probiotic Advanced Strenght
056845.title: Advance Strength Probiotic Dietary Supplement

Spurred on by customer feedback, updated industry research, and the spirit of kaizen, we've made some exciting changes and additions to the category. One such addition is Trader Joe's Probiotic Women's Formula Dietary Supplement. Each one-tablet serving of this supplement contains 150mg of a proprietary probiotic blend (2.5 billion CFUs per tablet) and 250mg of a "women's blend" - a.k.a. a blend formulated specifically for women's health needs that contains d-mannose and cranberry juice extract. Our Probiotic Women's Formula is gluten free, and it operates on an intestinal delivery system to achieve gastric bypass and release directly into the intestines, where it helps maintain digestive balance. As always, we suggest that you consult with your healthcare professional prior to taking any dietary supplement. 066601.description: We love giving our Customers what they want, and what they want is Sambucus, a.k.a. Elderberry! Or that's what many of them have told us over the course of the last few cold & flu seasons. Nature's Way®, a respected brand, happens to make cream-of-the-crop Sambucus Gummies in their line of nutritional supplements, so it made perfect sense to introduce them into our stores. These sweet, tangy, dark purple Gummies (which are shaped like cute little bunches of elderberries) deliver 90mg of Vitamin C, 7.5mg of zinc citrate, and 50mg of Sambucus nigra (black elderberry) extract per two-gummy serving. Nature's Way® Sambucus Elderberry Gummies are also gluten free, gelatin-free, and made without artificial flavors, artificial colors, or yeast. As always, we suggest that you consult with your healthcare professional prior to taking any dietary supplement. Then, once you get the go ahead, stroll on down to your neighborhood Trader Joe's, where we're selling each 60-gummy bottle of Nature's Way® Sambucus Elderberry Gummies for $16.99, which is less than we've seen it sold for at any other national retailer. You'll find it on the shelves with our other nutritional supplements. 05.06. 19
066601.name: Nature'S Way Elderberry Gummies
066601.title: Natures Way Elderberry Gummies

074458.description: The idea for woman-owned, bee-based wellness brand Bee & You® came from founder & food scientist Dr. Asli Samanci's quest to boost her son's weakened immune system. His pediatrician suggested propolis, and the rest is history... history in the form of a Bee & You® Propolis Shot. But just what is Propolis, you ask? Also known as "bee glue," propolis is a natural, resinous substance that honeybees produce by blending saliva, beeswax, and the fluids they collect from leaves, buds, and stems. Bees use propolis to effectively coat and protect their hives from bacteria, fungi, and other invaders. Humans may not have hives, but we do have bodies to protect and maintain, and lucky for us, Propolis is packed with antioxidants-hence why folks today are positively buzzing about this stuff! And in addition to 500mg of propolis (sourced exclusively from Turkey's Anatolian region), each Bee & You® Propolis Shot also offers up 1000mg of vitamin C, 1000 IU of vitamin D3, and 10mg of zinc. Bottom's up! Bee & You® Propolis Shot
074458.name: Propolis C,D & Zinc Shot

083736.description: Drawing a direct connection between dietary fat and the look of your waistline is a common pitfall when planning for a conscious diet. However, there are so-called "good fats" that we need in our diets, and Trader Joe's Omega-3 Fatty Acids Dietary Supplement is here to serve them up to you - one softgel, fish oil capsule at a time! While we're no ancient apothecary, we do love to keep essential vitamins and nutritional supplements on our shelves to help shoppers get in the nutrition they may be missing. And while all of our Omega-3s are molecularly distilled to remove heavy metals, mercury, and PCBs, many shoppers are still put-off by the distinct "fishy" aftertaste. These Omega-3 Fatty Acids undergo steam deodorization to eliminate the elements found in the oils that cause this aftertaste, thereby effectively making these little guys odorless and leaving no lingering fishiness in your mouth. These softgel capsules are free of any gluten, however, they include anchovies, sardines, and soy. Shoppers with medical concerns should check with their physician before using this or any other dietary supplement. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Omega-3 Fatty Acids Dietary Supplement
083736.name: Omega 3 Odorless
083736.title: Omega-3 Fatty Acids Odorless

096377.description: CoQ10, aka Ubiquinone, is natural substance found in the body and converted naturally into a powerful antioxidant. Studies have shown that as we age, our bodies produce less CoQ10 - thus, people concerned with their overall health have historically taken a CoQ10 supplement to help make up for the loss. In recent years, though, research has shown that not only does CoQ10 production slow in the body, but the body's ability to convert it into that powerful antioxidant, known as Ubiquinol, diminishes as well. Get that Ubiquinol directly, that's what. With Trader Joe's Ubiqinol* you can do just that. Because it has already been converted from CoQ10 (Ubiquinone), Trader Joe's Ubiquinol is ready to be used by your body in the fight against free radical damage. We are selling 60 softgels of Trader Joe's Co-Enzyme Q 10 Ubiquinol for $19.99.
096377.name: Co Q 10 Ubiquinol 100 Mg

040217.description: We carry a bunch of beverages to quench your thirst at Trader Joe's, but none so thirst-quenching as our Natural Mountain Spring Water. The water in these mini, one-cup o' water bottles comes directly from natural sources from all around the U.S. including springs in Olancha, California; Shasta, California; Moultonbourough, New Hampshire; and Benton Tennessee. The exact origin of the water you find at your neighborhood Trader Joe's depends on the region in which you shop. Our Natural Mountain Spring Water is non-carbonated, sodium free, and all natural-which is just another way of saying it tastes clean and pure. And, these mini bottles are a great size for a quick refreshment while on the go. Take them for some speedy hydration during hikes, stow a few in your car, pack some in your 'go bag' for emergencies... or anywhere else you can imagine yourself craving a swig of refreshing Spring Water! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Natural Mountain Spring Water

057681.description: Food trends have been moving towards all natural, organic, whole food diets and meals over the last several years. So it makes sense that vitamins, an extension of the food and nutrition world, would follow suit. MyKind Organics Women's Once Daily Multivitamin is the first of its kind-literally-to provide nutritional supple- ments from whole food ingredients. What makes MyKind so special, when there are hundreds of multivitamins to choose from? Glad you asked. Garden of Life, MyKind's maker, spent years perfecting this tablet so only organic, whole foods are used in its creation. In addition to being USDA Certified Organic and Non-GMO Project Verified, these multivitamins are also vegan, gluten free, and kosher certified. Talk about impressive. The Women's Once Daily formula of mykind has been designed specifically to meet the needs of "women seek- ing the convenience of a one-a-day organic multivitamin" by supporting healthy metabolism as well as healthy skin and nails. It's made from over 30 powdered organic fruits, vegetables, and herbs including guava, curry leaf, apple, lemon, beet, tomato, strawberries-and that's not even half of the ingredients! It also boasts impressive recommended daily values (DV) for vitamins A (100%), C (100%), D (250%), and B12 (200%), in addition to containing 2mg of natural plant iron for blood support. What better way to supplement your diet than with a vitamin made from the same whole foods that you would eat on a daily basis? There isn't one! Head to your local Trader Joe's and try MyKind Women's Once Daily Mul- tivitamin-only $19.99 for 30 tablets. 07.11. 16

053214.description: Fans of medieval literature are familiar with the sign that appears above the entrance to Hell in Dante Alighieri's Inferno: "All hope abandon, ye who enter here!" What most Dante fans don't know is that the inspiration for this sign was the real-life notice posted above the entrance to the lavatory in the author's Florentine flat. You see, Dante was horribly lactose intolerant. Lucky for him, a non-dairy "milk" made from almonds and water had become wildly popular across much of medieval Europe. Today, the average Trader Joe's customer-not being that different from the typical medieval shopper (except, perhaps, in the tendency to bathe more frequently)-is naturally a fan of almond beverages. In fact, our refrigerated versions have been so favored of late, we've decided it's nigh time we offered a shelf-stable version. Trader Joe's Unsweetened Original Almond Beverage is made by mixing crushed almonds with water and straining the liquid-just as they would have in the Middle Ages (except that our almonds are exclusively from California). The smooth, creamy, slightly-nutty, slightly-sweet "milk" that results has no added sugar, and is free of lactose, cholesterol, soy, and gluten. It's also entirely vegan, kosher certified, and fortified with calcium, and vitamins D & E. Best of all, it can be enjoyed all the same ways one would enjoy cow's milk. When it comes to quality products at low prices, other retail grocers might as well have "All hope abandon, ye who enter here!" above their door. But, Trader Joe's aims to provide heavenly values in an environment where you'd be willing to spend eternity-or at least long enough to complete your shopping list. In that spirit, our 32 fluid-ounce, shelf-stable Unsweetened Original Almond Beverage is $1.79-a hopeful value, to say the least! 2.17.1 5
053214.name: Orig Unswt Almond Bev Qt
053214.title: Nd Almond Tj'S Unsweetened Original Qt - Nfl - (Jasper Products, Llc)

061942.description: Why have one nut when you can have three? This question, posed by one of our intrepid Product Developers, was the driving force that spurred her to seek out a nut-based beverage for the ages-one that would rise above the rest, the creamiest, dreamiest, nut-based beverage on the market. (It may sound dramatic, but we're serious about nut beverages around here.) Thankfully, her tireless tasting efforts paid off, in the form of Trader Joe's Unsweetened Almond, Cashew & Macadamia Nut Beverage. Our supplier has packed not one, but three different types of Nuts into this Beverage: fragrant Almond, buttery Cashew, and creamy Macadamia. A touch of sea salt is added to enhance these inherently nutty flavors. Free of dairy, gluten, lactose, and soy, this vegan, kosher-certified Beverage also happens to be incredibly tasty. And each one-cup serving clocks in at just 30 calories and 120 milligrams of sodium! To experience the best this Nut Beverage has to offer, we recommend chilling it, and giving the container a good shake before serving. Come to think of it, it would be delicious in a shake, with TJ's Chocolate Ice Cream [sku 78572]. Or use it in place of water when whipping up a batch of Toasted Coconut Pancakes [sku 53170]. The usual suspects (cereal, oatmeal, baked goods, et al.) would get a beneficial, non-dairy boost from the nutty flavors of this Beverage, no doubt. What's almost as nutty as Trader Joe's Unsweetened Almond, Cashew & Macadamia Nut Beverage? The price. We're selling 32-fluid ounce containers for the WOW value of $2.29, everyday. You'll find it with our other shelf-stable beverages. 06.04. 18
061942.name: Almond Cashew Macadamia Beverage Unsweetened 1 Qt
061942.title: Unsweetened Almond, Cashew & Macadamia Nut Beverage

065148.description: We live in an age when dairy substitutes have become so tasty, you don't have to be sad about missing milk! Case in point: Trader Joe's Non-Dairy Oat Beverage. This is a milk-like drink that's made solely from water and hydrolyzed, whole, rolled oats. Hydrolysis is the breaking down of the starches in the oats into proteins and sugars. This simple process results in an off-white beverage that is smooth & creamy in texture, and slightly sweet to the taste-without the addition of cane sugar. Not only is it good to drink (or to enjoy in coffee, tea, cereal, smoothies¿), it is also gluten free, lactose free, kosher (pareve), and vegan! We're selling each 32 fluid-ounce, shelf-stable container of Non-Dairy Oat Beverage for $2.29*. Find it in our grocery aisle among our other shelf-stable beverages. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Non-Dairy Oat Beverage
065148.name: Non-Dairy Oat Beverage

069585.description: We live in an age when dairy substitutes have become so tasty, you don't have to be sad about missing milk! Case in point: Trader Joe's Non-Dairy Chocolate Oat Beverage. Inspired, of course, by the success of our original Trader Joe's Non-Dairy Oat Beverages [skus 65148 & 65333], it's a milk-like drink that's made from water and hydrolyzed, whole, rolled oats. (Hydrolysis is the breaking down of the oats' starches and conversion into proteins & sugars.) For this Chocolate version of our oat-ally awesome classic Oat Beverage, we also add cocoa & cane sugar, a pinch of salt, a few natural flavors, and a bit of gellan gum to further flavor & thicken the beverage-naturally. The end result is a chocolatey-brown beverage that's smooth & creamy in texture, and sweet to the taste. Not only is it good to drink (or to enjoy in coffee, protein shakes, or even cereal), it's also gluten free, lactose free, kosher (pareve), and vegan! We're selling each 32 fluid-ounce, shelf-stable container of TJ's Non-Dairy Chocolate Oat Beverage for $2.49*. Find it in our grocery aisle among our other shelf-stable beverages. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Non-Dairy Chocolate Oat Beverage
069585.name: Non-Dairy Chocolate Oat Beverage

086099.description: There's never been a better time to be a fan of non-dairy beverages. At Trader Joe's, you can find a whole wall of plant-based milk-alternatives in every size, flavor, or source ingredient you can think of. Whether you're lactose intolerant, vegan, or just prefer the taste of non-dairy beverages, we've got you covered. Take, for instance, Trader Joe's Organic Unsweetened Rice Drink, a highly versatile beverage with no added flavors or sweeteners - just the natural light sweetness and mild flavor of rice. Made via a process of grinding rice through a mill, then filtering the ground rice and dissolving it in water, this Organic Rice Drink offers a smooth, milk-like consistency and flavor, but contains no lactose, gluten, soy, or animal products of any kind. We particularly like it as a vegan alternative for using in cereal, baking, or for giving smoothies a nice, creamy quality. And for extra convenience, we offer Trader Joe's Organic Unsweetened Rice Drink in a Half-Gallon (64 fl. ounces) size. Keep an eye out for it in our non-dairy, shelf stable beverage section for $3.49*. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Unsweetened Rice Drink 1/2 Gallon
086099.name: Orig Rice Bev Org Enrch .5 Gal
086099.title: Trader Joe'S Rice Drink Non-Dairy Beverage Organic

096067.description: ¿ Trader Joe's Unsweetened Original and Vanilla Coconut Milks are made from real coconut. While it may sound exotic and would probably make a fantastic pina colada, we think this is a great milk substitute for everyday things like smoothies, coffee, cereal and baked goods - without the dairy. It's an excellent source of calcium and vitamins D and B12 and a good source of vitamin A. So, raise your glass and celebrate a creamy and delicious dairy alternative! We are selling each 32 oz tetra of Trader Joe's Unsweetened Original or Vanilla Coconut Milk for $1.99. Trader Joe's Company Bulletin07/20/2011 page 36 of 43 Confidential
