Over the last year or so, some of our customers have expressed concern regarding the use of gestation and/or farrowing crates in the pork supply chain. With the desire to deliver on any commitment we make in mind, our Product Developers spent the better part of this year working with suppliers to source a consistently available, quality array of All Natural Crate Free Pork products. We offer this at the value our customers expect from Trader Joe's products (as a refresher, value = quality + price). We're excited to introduce the products that meet these exacting standards to the Fresh Meat case (and in turn, to you!) at your neighborhood Trader Joe's. Let's start with the quality. Trader Joe's All Natural Crate Free Pork Tenderloin comes from pigs that are born, raised and harvested in the U.S.A.; that are never given antibiotics or added hormones; and that-as we've noted-are never restrained in gestation or farrowing crates. Lean and delicately flavored, this Tenderloin cut is ideal for marinades and quick cooking- simply bake, grill or pan-fry to an internal temperature of 145°F, and allow to rest three minutes before digging in. While it cooks, microwave some TJ's Organic Brown Rice, toss an Organic Caesar Salad Kit, and you'll have dinner on the table in no time. Now, how about that price? Each random-weight package of Trader Joe's All Natural Crate Free Pork Tenderloin is $5.99 per pound-that's close to $2 less than prices we've seen elsewhere. You'll find these great pork values in our Fresh Meat case. 09.03. 18

063396.title: Pork Tenderloin

With the desire to deliver on any commitment we make in mind, our Product Developers spent the better part of this year working with suppliers to source a consistently available, quality array of All Natural Crate Free Pork products. Trader Joe's All Natural Crate Free Pork Loin Baby Back Ribs come from pigs that are born, raised and harvested in the U.S.A.; that are never given antibiotics or added hormones; and that-as we've noted-are never restrained in gestation or farrowing crates. They're tender, juicy, and clean-tasting; brush 'em with your favorite TJ's BBQ sauce, toss 'em on the grill, and you've got dinner! Now, how about that price? Each random-weight package of Trader Joe's All Natural Crate Free Pork Loin Baby Back Ribs is $5.49 per pound-that's over $1 below prices we've seen elsewhere. You'll find these great pork values in our Fresh Meat case. 09.03. 18
063397.name: Pork Nat Crate Free Back Ribs (12/Pk)
063397.title: Pork Loin Baby Back Ribs

082937.description: Pork Baby Back Ribs Ribs are always a big hit, whether for a casual get together or dinnertime. Luckily, the end of grilling season doesn't mean that you can't make great ribs-just use your oven instead. Our favorite way to cook them is to boil them first (cut the rack in two if it won't fit in your pot)-fill pot with water to cover ribs, bring to a boil, reduce heat, cover and simmer about an hour or until the ribs are fork tender. Then place ribs in a broiler pan, meat side down, brush with your favorite sauce, broil for 6 to 7 minutes, turn, repeat. Eat. We're selling raw, plain, unadorned Trader Joe's Pork Baby Back Ribs for $4.99/lb.
082937.name: Pork Baby Back Rib Rack
082937.title: Pork Loin Baby Back Ribs

090272.description: Ready to bring a tender and magically marinated experience to your grill or stovetop? Look no further than Trader Joe's Peppercorn-Garlic Boneless Pork Tenderloin! We know that sometimes you just need a luscious hunk of marinated meat ready to rock for yourself or your guests, and so we aim to take care of as much preparation for you beforehand as we possibly can. After one peek at the marinade ingredients and easy cooking methods you'll be singing, "with a little bit of tenderloin in my life, a little bit of garlic by my side, a little bit of pepper is all I need, a little bit sugar is all I see," as you dance your way through the kitchen. Starting with nothing short of a premium pork tenderloin cut, we add a wonderfully peppered, garlic, and sweet blend of seasonings to marinade this lovely roast. All of this before you even step foot into your neighborhood Trader Joe's! So all you have to worry about is checking out, getting home, grilling your Peppercorn-Garlic Boneless Pork Tenderloin, and cracking open another Josephbrau Bavarian Hefeweizen [sku 78158] to pair it with. Consider serving alongside roasted or mashed Gold Potatoes [sku 93671] and a serving of Trader Joe's Broccoli & Kale Slaw [sku 55386]. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Peppercorn-Garlic Boneless Pork Tenderloin
090272.name: Garlic Peppercorn Pork Tndrln
090272.title: Peppercorn-Garlic Boneless Pork Tenderloin

000691.description: There are certain products that come to mind when people talk about Trader Joe's. We won't list them because, really, everyone has his or her own list. We know how it goes. It does seem, though, that right up there near the top of everyone's lists are Trader Joe's Peanut Butter Filled Pretzels. These iconic nuggets ranked in the top ten when we asked our own Captains (that's "Manager," to us) for their favorites. Judging from the number of bags that fly through our stores (figurative flying; the bags are not meant to be airborne), the love is near-universal. Made for us in Pennsylvania (properly prodigious pretzel pedigree), each real-peanut-butter-filled pretzel nugget is coated with coarse salt, and delivers crunchy and creamy and salty. They're great party nibbles with cocktails or beer, juice or even sparkling water, and they make satisfying snacks for lunchboxes or after-school. There's a whole pound of these delicious little gems in each bag, and we're selling each bag for $2.99. Like everything at Trader Joe's, this is no sale price; it's our everyday price that you'll find in every Trader Joe's, every day. You'll find Peanut Butter Filled Pretzels in our snack section.
000691.name: Peanut Butter Pretzel Salt
000691.title: Peanut Butter Filled Pretzel Nuggets

012564.description: Did you know? While they're often associated with medieval German monks, modern evidence seems to point to either southern France or northern Italy, circa 600 CE as the true point of origin for the pretzel. Today, however, we'd like to give kudos to the nameless, faceless, timeless creators of that prized pretzel variation, the Stick. Easy to fit in a shirt pocket, captivatingly crunchy, and helpful in any Groucho Marx impersonation, pretzel sticks are perhaps the ultimate interpretation of this ages-old snack. And Trader Joe's Pretzel Sticks may be the ultimate interpretration of that ultimate interpretation. Golden brown, slightly salty, and tinged with just a hint of baked-in honey sweetness, Trader Joe's Pretzel Sticks are equally great on their own or dipped in your favorite mustard, cheese dip, or even salsa. That's just for starters: we find that they dazzle when dunked in everything from hummus to fondue, Chunky Artichoke & Jalapeño Dip [sku 54698] to Fleur de Sel Caramel Sauce [sku 95214], your favorite nut butter to our very own Speculoos Cookie Butter [sku 96761] and everything in between. And, of course, we'd be remiss if we didn't mention their status as a consummate companion to beer of all kinds. Pretzel Sticks
012564.name: Honey Wheat Pretzel Sticks

070721.description: For years, customers and Crew Members alike have pondered the smashing success of our Peanut Butter Pretzels [skus 00690 & 00691] and wondered why we haven't capitalized on that by stuffing crunchy pretzel nuggets with other nut-based butters. The reality is, we have pondered this question, and we have been busy for quite a while making sure we got it right. With the introduction of Trader Joe's Almond Butter Filled Pretzel Nuggets, we're quite certain we got it right. In other words, if nut butter and pretzels are your jam, you're going to find these little Nuggets irresistible. Like their PBP cousins, these feature about-an-inch long, crunchy pretzel nuggets whose exterior is generously crusted wtih rock salt. Inside, it's an almond butter abondanza. Really. More than 35% of the recipe here is almond butter, made from almonds grown in California's Central Valley. Every bite is crunchy (outside) and creamy (inside); salty (outside) and a little sweet (inside). Pair them with a cold lager or a glass of lemonade. Enjoy them on their own or as part of a trail mix. We recommend keeping a bag in your desk drawer for mid- afternoon snacking emergencies - we recommend opening the 12 ounce bag before you need it for quickest, easiest access. For in-store access, you'll find them in our snack section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Almond Butter Filled Pretzel Nuggets
070721.name: Pretzel Almond Butter Salt
070721.title: Almond Butter Filled Pretzel Nuggets

075556.description: One might say that it's impossible to improve upon the sublime simplicity of a crisp, cracker-y breadstick. Well, to that, we say: that's not never stopped us from trying before! Made for us by a supplier in Italy, Trader Joe's Pretzel Breadsticks takes the basic form of a breadstick (the kind you might find as an appetizer at a cloth napkin Italian restaurant, rather than the softer kind you might get at a pizzeria) and properly pretzel-izes it. Each stick starts as a bit of rustic, sourdough-esque dough, which is rolled into a twisty, approximately eight- inch-long baton, then baked to a perfect golden brown before being studded with cruncht crystals of sea salt. Much like their combined, namesake inspirations, Trader Joe's Pretzel Breadsticks make a fantastic appetizer or anytime snack, all on their own. Where we think they really excel, however, is in their use as a dipping and dunking snack. We recommend trying them in everything from spicy mustards and tart, tangy aiolis (like our very own Aioli Garlic Mustard Sauce [sku 27677]) to bubbly fondues and savory-seasoned dips of all kinds, like our Crunchy Chili Onion Hummus [sku 76277], Creamy Spinach & Artichoke Dip [sku 78032], or Pimento Cheese Dip [sku 71595]. Pretzel Breadsticks
075556.name: Pretzel Breadsticks

077824.description: Trader Joe's Pizza Seasoned Crackers are the mini, snackable version of pizza you didn't know you needed! Originating in Naples, pizza marinara is likely the oldest variety of tomato-topped pizza, and is the flavor profile we draw from for these unique Crackers. True to the source material, they're generously seasoned with the pizza marinara trinity of tangy tomatoes, aromatic oregano, and a kick of garlic. Thin, wheat-based Crackers stand in for pizza crust to facilitate satisfying crispiness, optimal snackability, and an uncanny resemblance to the real deal. To make the Crackers extra pizza-like, we recommend swinging by our cheese section and scooping up your cheese of choice-we're partial to All Natural Fresh Mozzarella Cheese [sku 077726]. Add cold cheese slices for a lighter feel, or melt them slightly for peak pizza replication. Pour a glass of Italian red wine (like Villa Cerrina Montepulciano D'Abruzzo [sku 048838]), or a pint of pilsner for elevated snackage during evening wind-downs and cozy gatherings with family and friends. Any way you slice it, Pizza Seasoned Crackers make for fun and flavorful munchies whenever you're feeling peckish! Pizza Seasoned Crackers
077824.name: Crackers Pizza
077824.title: Pizza Seasoned Crackers

087777.description: How's this for a twist? We've turned pretzels into a chip! Trader Joe's Pretzel Slims take the same salty, crunchy, hard mini-pretzels you love as a bar snack, and flattens them into a chip-like "Slim" shape. Each one-two-bite- sized Pretzel Slim is thin, crispy, and studded with coarse crystal of salt, just like a classic pretzel. Unlike your everyday pretzel, however, their increased surface area allows them to be used as a vehicle for a wide variety of dips, cheeses, spreads - even salsas, if you so choose - meaning these Pretzel Slims aren't just delicious, they're postively practical. Made from just four simple ingredients (wheat flour, sugar, salt, and barley malt syrup), we reccomend dunking your Pretzel Slims into Pub Cheese with Jalapeños [sku 92527], Organic Buffalo Style Hummus [sku 63040], or even a jar of Aioli Garlic Mustard Sauce [sku 27677]. Dip averse? They're still quite delicious on their own, especially when paired with a frosty glass of Josephsbrau PLZNR [sku 97321]. We're selling eight ounce bags of Trader Joe's Pretzel Slims for the unbeatable price of $2.29*, every day. How's that for a twist? *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Pretzel Slims
087777.name: Pretzel Slims

055128.description: We love it when our Customers come to us with product suggestions. If it's something that doesn't exist, there's a good chance we'll develop it. If it does exist-and it's an item that meets our standard of value-we just might begin carrying it in our stores. One great example of the latter? Quest® Protein Bars, which we began carrying in our stores in 2015 in response to some serious Customer demand. Five years later, and our Customers still seem to love them. It makes perfect sense-Quest® Bars not only hit the nutritional mark, but they also do it without sacrificing flavor. Each bar contains 21 grams of protein (from milk, whey, and plant sources) and 15g of fiber, yet only 4g net carbs and 1g sugar. They're some of the most popular 'low-carb' bars on the market. More importantly, though, they taste good; they're softer and chewier than your average protein bar, and the Cookies & Cream flavor even features real cookie crumbles and delicious, vanilla-y "cream" flavor throughout! We're now offering Quest® Cookies & Cream Protein Bars for just $1.99* each-a full 40 cents less than we did back in 2015. Your quest for craveable, protein-packed, on-the-go sustinance ends today, in the protein & snack bars section of your neighborhood Trader Joe's... *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Quest® Cookies & Cream Protein Bar
055128.name: Quest Cookies & Cream

055422.description: We've been accused of nuttiness before. Our witty banter sometimes borders on insanity (or brilliance, depend- ing on your point-of-view), and our low-priced products suggest at least a low-level of loco-especially when one considers their high quality. Call us crazy, but we believe that neither our words, nor our penchant for value, seal our nutty reputation more than does our new line of snack bars. Three different bars (with three unique flavor profiles) have one thing in common¿ they are all Simply Nutty. Take, for instance, our Dark Chocolate, Nuts and Sea Salt Bar. Nutty, crunchy, mostly-whole peanuts, al- monds, and walnuts are spiked with sea salt, in balance with sweet honey and crisp rice (made from pea protein and brown rice flour). Dark chocolate-dipped on one side, drizzled on the other-finishes the bar, creating an irresistible nut/salt/chocolate flavor-combo that will drive you nuts, if you're not already. Even crazier, this yummy bar contains 7 grams of dietary fiber and 7 grams of protein. Each 1.4 ounce bar is the perfect snacking size (especially at just 200 calories), and each one is individually wrapped so you can take them with you, wherever you roam. Nut Not to be outdone by the rest of the insane values in our store, we made sure you can secure a seven ounce box of five Simply Nutty - Dark Chocolate, Nuts and Sea Salt Bars for $4.99, everyday. That's less than a dollar- a-bar. Find them on our shelves among our wide selection of private label and branded snack and energy bars. 01.18. 16
055422.name: Tj'S Nuts & Sea Salt 5 Pk
055422.title: Dark Chocolate Nuts And Sea Salt Bar

The nuttiness and crunch of mostly-whole peanuts and almonds is balanced with sweet honey and crisp rice (made from pea protein and brown rice flour). 057819.description: "Go big, or go home," is a phrase used to describe that attitude of living life to the fullest. People apply it to sports, vacations, purchases... even food. GoMacro® is a family-owned protein bar company in Wisconsin that has "gone big" in our estimation. They're making yummy bars from sustainably sourced, organic ingredients; using recipes that are as clean and balanced as can be. This 'all-in' approach makes sense to us (and to many of our customers), so that's why Trader Joe's is now carry- ing GoMacro's® Protein Pleasure Macrobar in our stores. Like GoMacro's® other bars that prioritize protein, Protein Pleasure is high in protein with 11g of it in each 2.4 ounce, 290 calorie bar. And we're talking organically grown, plant-based protein, made from a blend of sprouted brown rice and peas. The peanut butter-colored bar is rich, moist, crispy, and chewy. It's speckled with organic, fairly traded peanuts from Nicaragua; and loaded with organic, vegan, dark chocolate chips, which have been sweetened with organic coconut sugar. This all gives Protein Pleasure a clean, sweet aroma, and a full-bodied, nutty-chocolaty taste. When it comes to price, other retailers who sell GoMacro® bars have chosen to stick to the "Go big¿" philoso- phy. Not us. Price is where Trader Joe's draws the 'go big' line. We believe high quality, doesn't always require high prices. You might even say, "Go low..." is our price philosophy. That's why we're selling Protein Pleasure Macrobars for the lowest price we've seen: $2.29 for each 2.4 ounce bar. Go big and go buy some today! 07.18. 16
057819.name: Gomacro Pb Choc Chip
057819.title: Bars Gomacro Peanut Butter Choc Chip

062142.description: Developed to be just another tasty energy bar offering from the folks at OhYeah!® Nutrition, ONE® Bars became so popular so quickly that OhYeah!® decided to make ONE® a brand unto itself, with its own unique packaging, flavors, and website. Why so popular? As devotees will tell you, ONE® Protein Bars might just be the perfect combination of a killer* nutritional profile and a killer flavor profile. Once you sink your teeth into a dense, soft, chewy ONE® Protein Bar, you'll see what all the fuss is about. Each bar is dipped in a sweet, white coating, and the bar itself chews like a denser, chewier cookie dough. It's sweet, filling, and indulgent, yet each bar contains just over 200 calories and only one gram of sugar - hence the name. You'll also get 20 grams of whey-based protein and, in the ONE® Maple Glazed Doughnut Flavored Protein Bar, you'll reap the benefits of 10 grams of fiber, as well. That's right: a protein and fiber-filled snack that just so happens to taste like a maple glazed doughnut. You're welcome. We're selling each 2.12-ounce ONE® Protein Bar for $1.99, so you can afford to stock up and have ONE® on hand whenever and wherever you need an energy boost - in the morning, at the office, in the car, after school, pre-workout, post-workout, etc., etc. You'll find them on the shelves with our other energy and protein bars. *This is us experimenting with slang; we mean killer as in "good," not as in "it'll kill you"... how did we do? 11.27 .17
062142.name: One Bar Maple Glazed Doughnut

066223.description: ONE® Bars (formerly OhYeah! Bars) are primarily known for two things: supplying 20g of protein (per 60g Bar), and delivering only 1g of sugar. With super nutritional stats like this, how good could they taste? Surprisingly, ONE® Bars are also known for a third thing... great taste! This Iced Gingerbread ONE® Bar contains a protein blend of whey protein isolate and milk protein isolate. The combination of ingredients presents a spiced-holiday-bread flavor, enrobed in confectionery icing, and topped with crunchy, chopped almonds. We're selling each 2.12-ounce (60g) Iced Gingerbread ONE® Bar for $1.99*. Find them on the shelves with our wide selection of every day and seasonal bars. 068561.description: They may not be Trader Joe's branded products, but ALOHA Bars are right at home on our shelves. That's because their profile fits what many of our Customers are looking for in a protein bar. For instance, the 1.98 oz. Chocolate Fudge Brownie ALOHA Bar is made from organic, plant-based ingredients, starting with an organic protein blend that includes organic brown rice protein and organic pumpkin seed protein. Organic cocoa powder, organic cocoa extract, and organic dark chocolate provide a rich, chocolatey taste. And the inclusion of organic sunflower and cashew butters help provide the appealing texture. Instead of being tough and chewy like so many other protein bars, this ALOHA Bar is tender to the tooth with a pleasant mouthfeel more akin to a candy bar. And though you may feel like you're eating a candy bar, your body will know it's getting so much more in this 1.98-ounce, 220 calorie Chocolate Fudge Brownie ALOHA Bar-including 14g protein and 20% of your daily recommended value for iron. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Chocolate Fudge Brownie ALOHA Bar
068561.name: Aloha Choc Fudge Brownie

069092.description: Inspired by a 10-day health retreat in 2004, Jeremy Dixon returned to his home in Auckland, New Zealand and opened up a new kind of café-one that focused more on healthy foods. He called it Revive Vegan Café. It's in this environment that Dixon invented Frooze Balls. Frooze Balls are a "frooze-sion" of whole-food and plant-based goodness. They are bite-sized vegan Balls made from different combinations of fruits and nuts. Trader Joe's is now selling Peanut Butter & Jelly Frooze Balls with a soft, outer shell made from a combination of dates & peanuts, rolled in coconut. Inside you'll find a center made of freshly made peanut butter and 100% fruit-based jelly. Five Peanut Butter & Jelly Frooze Balls come in each 2.5-ounce package. It's ideal for before or after your gym workout, or anytime you feel the need for a little hit of plant-based power! Find them in our bars section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Peanut Butter & Jelly Frooze Balls

069485.description: A barbell is a long metal bar used for lifting various weights that are attached to the ends. A Barebell, on the other hand, is a short (relatively speaking) protein bar used for lifting to your mouth when you need something yummy to give you a boost! The Barebells brand of protein bars was launched in Sweden in 2016. Since then, the company has been doing the 'heavy lifting' when it comes to developing high-protein snack bars that really deliver on the flavor. It's also notable that none of their bars include added sugar or palm oil. Nevertheless, they are touted as some of the best-tasting bars you can buy. This is definitely the case with the Barebells Caramel Cashew Protein Bar. Real milk chocolate is studded with crunchy pieces of cashews. Each bite gives you the rich flavor of chocolate, caramel, and nutty cashews. Equally important, each 1.94-ounce, 200-calorie Caramel Cashew Bar delivers 20g of protein. 073845.description: A single mother and former fashion model, Think!® founder Lizanne Falsetto knew there had to be a "better bar" for busy folks. One with plenty of protein. One without gluten (which Lizanne is allergic to), or genetically modified ingredients. One that would work on a keto diet. And, most importantly, one that didn't taste like some wretched amalgamation of sawdust and cardboard. The Think!® Keto Protein Bar is that bar, and we're pleased to offer the Creamy Peanut Butter Pie flavor in our stores. Soft and chewy, these Keto-friendly Protein Bars bars boast a remarkably light and fluffy whipped peanut butter interior and a rich, chocolate-dipped exterior. Each Bar is gluten free and contains 10g of protein, as well as only 4g of net carbs. They make a superb snack to satisfy a sweet tooth, and great source of protein for a pre-or- post-workout boost, or even an on-the-go breakfast, in a pinch. We recommend keeping a few on hand in your purse, desk drawer and/or gym back to stave off hunger - whenever and wherever it strikes. The Barebells brand of protein bars was launched in Sweden in 2016. Since then, the company has been doing the 'heavy lifting' when it comes to developing high-protein snack bars that really deliver on the flavor. None of their bars-which are now made in Croatia-include added sugar, and each bar packs an impressive 20g of protein. Plus, they are touted as some of the best-tasting bars you can buy. Barebells Chocolate Dough Protein Bar is the latest in the lineup-and we're jazzed to welcome it aboard. It boasts a soft, chewy, "chocolate dough" interior, a smooth, chocolatey coating, and crispy rice-like puffs embedded in said smooth, chocolatey coating. Prepare for (a) lift-off! Barebells Chocolate Dough Protein Bar
074206.name: Barebells Chocolate Dough

074371.description: When the folks at Fulfil® say that their Bars have more to offer than your average protein bar, that's not just talk: they have the numbers to back it up. Because Fulfil®'s delectably sweet and savory Chocolate Salted Caramel Vitamin & Protein Bars don't just contain an impressive 15 grams of protein and only three grams of net carbs and one gram of sugar per serving, they're also an excellent source of eight essential vitamins, including vitamins A, B6, B12, C, and E. Which means that they're a great way to help you get through your workout and your day, all in one charmingly chewy, snack-sized Bar. Each Fulfil® Chocolate Salted Caramel Bar is made with a soft, nougat-y, salted caramel-flavored center, which is double-enrobed in a rich, chocolatey, outer layer, then rolled in satisfyingly crunchy bits of crisped rice flour. The resulting candy-bar like flavor profile makes fueling up for a workout feel like treating yourself to dessert. Keep a stash on hand in your laptop case, backpack, or gym bag, just in case you're ever in need of a proteinaceous (and vitamin-rich!) pick-me-up. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Fulfil® Chocolate Salted Caramel Flavor Vitamin & Protein Bar
074371.name: Fulfil Chocolate Salted Caramel

075414.description: At Trader Joe's, we love value, and we love quality ingredients. We also love protein bars. So when we find a protein bar made with quality ingredients, offered at a great value, we know we've really got something special. Enter: the Honey Cinnamon Peanut Butter A.M. RXBAR®, a superb addition to our already-stellar RXBAR® lineup. One bite of these bars and you'll understand why we just had to carry 'em. Made with mornings in mind, each Honey Cinnamon Peanut Butter RXBAR® proudly lists its four base ingredients-3 tbsp oats, 14 peanuts, 2 egg whites, & 2 tsp honey per bar-in big, bold letters on the front of the package, so you know what you'll be eating without having to investigate that tiny-print ingredient list with a magnifying glass. On their own, the combination of sweet honey, savory peanut butter, and rich cinnamon would be more than enough to make a simple, delicious breakfast treat, but add in the fact that you also get 10g of protein per bar from the egg whites? Now we're really talking! RXBAR® strives to create a product that's "simple and delicious without compromising nutrition," and they live up to this promise. Honey Cinnamon Peanut Butter RXBAR®s are gluten free, kosher, and make a powerful (and powerfully tasty!) on-the-go breakfast, snack, or source of pre/post-workout fuel. Honey Cinnamon Peanut Butter A.M. RXBAR®
075414.name: Rx Honey Cinnamon Peanut Butter

075918.description: When we first introduced Trader Joe's Rainbow's End Trail Mix [sku 36825] to our shelves back in 2000, it truly set the bar for how sublimely simple a trail mix could be. With just a minimalist mix of peanuts, almonds, raisins, and candy-coated milk chocolate gems, every bite contains a remarkable medley of flavors and textures, which is why it's remained a solid gold hit with our customers for nearly 25 years. So how does one celebrate such a bar-setting snack? How about by recontextualizing it into a new setting: a highly snackable Bar? Proudly made with the same constituent components as the Trail Mix that inspired it, Trader Joe's Rainbow's End Trail Mix Bars are held together with a bit of tapioca syrup and a rich coating of dipped dark chocolate on the base. Like its predecessor, each Bar offers a nice mix of crunchiness from the roasted peanuts and almonds, a bit of tenderness from the plump raisins, and some fun, flavorful sweetness from the candy-coated milk chocolate, all of which is captivatingly complemented by the dark chocolate layer. We find it's ideal for enjoying before work or school, during a hike or long car ride, or after a run or gym day. Rainbow's End Trail Mix Bars
075918.name: Tj'S Rainbow'S End Trail Mix Bar
075918.title: Rainbow'S End Trail Mix Bars

077486.description: It wasn't all that long ago that one's options for protein bars and supplements were relatively limited-and, in many cases, what was available almost always contained animal-derived products. Luckily, that's all changed, thanks to dedicated protein professionals, like the folks at Misfits. Back in 2020, they set out on a mission to create tasty, chocolatey, and decidedly vegan Plant-Powered Protein Bars that anyone could enjoy-not just those that follow an exclusively plant-based diet. Now, we're proud to add their soft, chewy, and scrumptiously cookie-butter-y Chocolate Cookie Butter Protein Bars to our shelves. Funnily enough, these Misfits ought to fit in just right at Trader Joe's. Each Bar's interior is made with a blend of pea protein and peanut paste, studded with crisy bits of cocoa- flavored soy protein to add some crunch to every bite. Layered on top of that, there's a generous spread of sweet, vegan cookie butter (a bit like a vegan variation of our Speculoos Cookie Butter [sku 97671]) for even more flavor. Then, on top of that (and indeed enrobed the entire Bar), there's a final, exterior layer of cacao-powered confectionary coating. All together, this combo of chewiness, crunchiness, vegan Chocolate and vegan Cookie Butter makes one sweet and texturally satisfying eating experience, made all the more impressive by the fact that each Bar contains 15 grams of protein, and only a single gram of sugar. We recommend keeping one on hand (or in your bag, or your desk, etc.) for the next time you need a post-gym protein boost or Chocolate and Cookie Butter-powered midday pick-me-up. Misfits Plant-Powered Chocolate Cookie Butter Protein Bar
077486.name: Misfits Cookie Butter

077487.description: It wasn't all that long ago that one's options for protein bars and supplements were relatively limited-and, in many cases, what was available almost always contained animal-derived products. Luckily, that's all changed, thanks to dedicated protein professionals, like the folks at Misfits. Back in 2020, they set out on a mission to create tasty, chocolatey, and decidedly vegan Plant-Powered Protein Bars that anyone could enjoy-not just those that follow an exclusively plant-based diet. Now, we're proud to add their soft, chewy, and caramel-gooey Chocolate Caramel Protein Bars to our shelves. Funnily enough, these Misfits ought to fit in just right at Trader Joe's. Each Bar's interior is made with a blend of pea protein and peanut paste, studded with crisy bits of cocoa- flavored soy protein to add some crunch to every bite. Layered on top of that, there's a generous spread of sweet, vegan caramel for even more flavor. Then, on top of that (and indeed enrobed the entire Bar), there's a final, exterior layer of cacao-powered confectionary coating. All together, this combo of chewiness, crunchiness, vegan Chocolate and vegan Caramel make one a sweet and texturally satisfying eating experience, made all the more impressive by the fact that each Bar contains 15 grams of protein, and only a single gram of sugar. We recommend keeping one on hand (or in your bag, or your desk, etc.) for the next time you need a post-gym protein boost or Chocolate Caramel-powered midday pick-me-up. Misfits Plant-Powered Chocolate Caramel Protein Bar
077487.name: Misfits Chocolate Caramel

077812.description: Frooze Balls first came to be when company founder Jeremy Dixon attended a ten-day health retreat in 2004. Inspired by the ideas and delicacies shared there, he returned to his home in Auckland, New Zealand and opened up a café focused on healthy foods for a plant-powered diet. It's in this environment that Dixon began to work on creating a bite-sized, vegan alternative to energy bars that would eventually be known the world over as Frooze Balls. A "frooze-sion," if you will, of whole-food and plant-powered goodness, Caramel Chocolate Peanut Butter Frooze Balls are crafted with a soft, chewy, outer shell that's made from a combination of dates & peanuts, and rolled in dried coconut. Inside, you'll find a center made of rich, smooth, and caramel-y peanut butter that's also been flavored with a bit of cocoa powder. Each 2.5-ounce package contains five Frooze Balls, which all together contain seven and a half grams of protein. Ideal for before or after a workout, or anytime you feel the need for a little extra boost of plant-powered energy, we recommend bringing a pack along to the gym, on a hike, or stashing one at work, so you'll always have access to a sweet, caramel-y pick-me-up. Caramel Chocolate Peanut Butter Frooze Balls
077812.name: Frooze Balls Caramel Choc Pb
077812.title: Frooze Balls Caramel Choc Peanut Butter

077819.description: When the folks at Fulfil® say that their Bars have more to offer than your average protein bar, that's not just talk: they have the numbers to back it up. Fulfil®'s deliciously nutty and crunchy Chocolate Peanut Caramel Flavor Vitamin & Protein Bars aren't just impressive on the macros front-15 grams of collagen-based protein, one gram of sugar, and two grams of "net" carbs per bar- they're also excellent sources of eight essential vitamins, including vitamins A, B6, B12, C, and E. All of this adds up to a great way to help you get through your workout and your day, all in one charmingly chewy, snack-sized Bar. Each Fulfil® Chocolate Peanut Caramel Bar features a soft, peanut butter nougat-y center, topped with a caramel-flavored crème; it is is double-enrobed in a rich, chocolatey, outer layer, then rolled in roughly chopped, roasted peanuts for a nice, satisfying crunch. The resulting candy-bar like flavor profile makes fueling up for a workout feel like treating yourself to dessert. Keep a stash on hand at the office, in your purse, or in your gym bag-you never know when you'll be in need of a proteinaceous (and vitamin-rich!) pick-me-up. Fulfil® Chocolate Peanut Caramel Flavor Vitamin & Protein Bar
077819.name: Fulfil Choc Peanut Caramel

095087.description: Let's face it: it's not always easy to get the daily recommended value of protein in over the course of a day, and sources of concentrated protein aren't always the tastiest things on the menu. That's likely why our customers love Power Crunch Bars® so much: they're light, they're crispy, and they offer a potent punch of candy bar-like flavor in addition to a sizable 14 grams of protein per serving. Power Crunch® French Vanilla Crème Protein Energy Bars, in particular, deliver that protein-whey protein, to be specific-between three layers of Vanilla Crème and crunchy wafer cookies. Perfectly proportioned for prime portability, Power Crunch® French Vanilla Crème Protein Energy Bars fit smartly in your gym bag or purse, making them ideal for taking pre-or-post-workout. With their remarkably Vanilla-y flavor and captivating crunch, though, you might just prefer to keep them on hand for snacking purposes-which makes the fact that each Bar only has five grams of sugar all the sweeter. Protein-packed and practical? Now that's Power-ful. Power Crunch® French Vanilla Crème Protein Energy Bar
095087.name: Power Crnch French Van Creme
095087.title: Bars Power Crunch French Vanilla Creme

095088.description: Let's face it: it's not always easy to get the daily recommended value of protein in over the course of a day, and sources of concentrated protein aren't always the tastiest things on the menu. That's likely why our customers love Power Crunch Bars® so much: they're light, they're crispy, and they offer a potent punch of candy bar-like flavor in addition to a sizable 14 grams of protein per serving. Power Crunch® Peanut Butter Fudge Protein Energy Bars, in particular, deliver that protein-whey protein, to be specific-between layers of Peanut Butter, Fudge, and crunchy wafer cookies. Perfectly proportioned for prime portability, Power Crunch® Peanut Butter Fudge Protein Energy Bars fit smartly in your gym bag or purse, making them ideal for taking pre-or-post-workout. With their Peanut Butter Fudge-y flavor and captivating crunch, though, you might just prefer to keep them on hand for snacking purposes-which makes the fact that each Bar only has five grams of sugar all the sweeter. Protein-packed and practical? Now that's Power-ful. Power Crunch® Peanut Butter Fudge Protein Energy Bar
095088.name: Power Crunch Pb Fudge
095088.title: Bars Power Crunch Peanut Butter Fudge

096494.description: In 1999, LUNA® was launched with a singular goal: to create a delicious bar with a nutritional profile (and taste) that women would love. They're certainly not "just for women," but, according to the company, LUNA® still operates with women's empowerment in mind. We've carried different LUNA® Whole Nutrition Bars in our stores over the years, and we always like to keep the flavor offerings current. In this case, our Customers have spoken, and Chocolate Dipped Coconut is what the people want! LUNA® Chocolate Dipped Coconut Whole Nutrition Bars are chewy, crispy oat-and-soy-protein-based bars made with organically grown shredded coconut & natural coconut flavor-drizzled with and bottom-dipped in a sweet, chocolate coating. Each 190-calorie, gluten-free bar boasts 8 grams of protein, making it an excellent snack anytime of the day. Each 1.69-bar also boasts an excellent price tag-we're selling each one for 99¢. That's right, Chocolate Dipped Coconut bliss can be yours for a mere ninety-nine pennies! Look for them in our nutrition bars section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. LUNA® Chocolate Dipped Coconut Whole Nutrition Bar
096494.name: Luna Chocoloate Coconut

155128.description: We love it when our Customers come to us with product suggestions. If it's something that doesn't exist, there's a good chance we'll develop it. If it does exist-and it's an item that meets our standard of value-we just might begin carrying it in our stores. One great example of the latter? Quest® Protein Bars, which we began carrying in our stores in 2015 in response to some serious Customer demand. Five years later, and our Customers still seem to love them. It makes perfect sense-Quest® Bars not only hit the nutritional mark, but they also do it without sacrificing flavor. Each bar contains 21 grams of protein (from milk, whey, and plant sources) and 15g of fiber, yet only 4g net carbs and 1g sugar. They're some of the most popular 'low-carb' bars on the market. More importantly, though, they taste good; they're softer and chewier than your average protein bar, and the Cookies & Cream flavor even features real cookie crumbles and delicious, vanilla-y "cream" flavor throughout! We're now offering Quest® Cookies & Cream Protein Bars for just $1.99* each-a full 40 cents less than we did back in 2015. Your quest for craveable, protein-packed, on-the-go sustinance ends today, in the protein & snack bars section of your neighborhood Trader Joe's... *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Quest® Cookies & Cream Protein Bar
155128.name: Quest Cookies & Cream Box

155422.description: We've been accused of nuttiness before. Our witty banter sometimes borders on insanity (or brilliance, depend- ing on your point-of-view), and our low-priced products suggest at least a low-level of loco-especially when one considers their high quality. Call us crazy, but we believe that neither our words, nor our penchant for value, seal our nutty reputation more than does our new line of snack bars. Three different bars (with three unique flavor profiles) have one thing in common¿ they are all Simply Nutty. Take, for instance, our Dark Chocolate, Nuts and Sea Salt Bar. Nutty, crunchy, mostly-whole peanuts, al- monds, and walnuts are spiked with sea salt, in balance with sweet honey and crisp rice (made from pea protein and brown rice flour). Dark chocolate-dipped on one side, drizzled on the other-finishes the bar, creating an irresistible nut/salt/chocolate flavor-combo that will drive you nuts, if you're not already. Even crazier, this yummy bar contains 7 grams of dietary fiber and 7 grams of protein. Each 1.4 ounce bar is the perfect snacking size (especially at just 200 calories), and each one is individually wrapped so you can take them with you, wherever you roam. Nut Not to be outdone by the rest of the insane values in our store, we made sure you can secure a seven ounce box of five Simply Nutty - Dark Chocolate, Nuts and Sea Salt Bars for $4.99, everyday. That's less than a dollar- a-bar. Find them on our shelves among our wide selection of private label and branded snack and energy bars. 01.18. 16
155422.name: Tj'S Nuts & Sea Salt Bar
155422.title: Dark Chocolate Nuts And Sea Salt Bar

Our witty banter sometimes borders on insanity (or brilliance, depend- ing on your point-of-view), and our low-priced products suggest at least a low-level of loco-especially when one considers their high quality. Call us crazy, but we believe that neither our words, nor our penchant for value, seal our nutty reputation more than does our new line of snack bars. Three different bars (with three unique flavor profiles) have one thing in common¿ they are all Simply Nutty. Take, for instance, our Dark Chocolate, Peanut & Almond Bar. The nuttiness and crunch of mostly-whole peanuts and almonds is balanced with sweet honey and crisp rice (made from pea protein and brown rice flour). Dark chocolate-dipped on one side, drizzled on the other-finishes the bar, creating that irresistible nut/chocolate flavor-combo that will drive you nuts, if you're not already. Even crazier, this yummy bar contains 7 grams of dietary fiber and 7 grams of protein. Each 1.4 ounce bar is the perfect snacking size (especially at just 200 calories), and each one is individually wrapped so you can take them with you, wherever you roam. Nut Not to be outdone by the rest of the insane values in our store, we made sure you can secure a seven ounce box of five Simply Nutty - Dark Chocolate, Peanut & Almond Bars for $4.99, everyday. That's less than a dollar-a-bar. Find them among our wide selection of private label and branded snack and energy bars. 01.18. 16
155423.name: Tj'S Pnut & Almnd Bar
155423.title: Dark Chocolate, Peanut & Almond Bar

157819.description: "Go big, or go home," is a phrase used to describe that attitude of living life to the fullest. People apply it to sports, vacations, purchases... even food. GoMacro® is a family-owned protein bar company in Wisconsin that has "gone big" in our estimation. They're making yummy bars from sustainably sourced, organic ingredients; using recipes that are as clean and balanced as can be. This 'all-in' approach makes sense to us (and to many of our customers), so that's why Trader Joe's is now carry- ing GoMacro's® Protein Pleasure Macrobar in our stores. Like GoMacro's® other bars that prioritize protein, Protein Pleasure is high in protein with 11g of it in each 2.4 ounce, 290 calorie bar. And we're talking organically grown, plant-based protein, made from a blend of sprouted brown rice and peas. The peanut butter-colored bar is rich, moist, crispy, and chewy. It's speckled with organic, fairly traded peanuts from Nicaragua; and loaded with organic, vegan, dark chocolate chips, which have been sweetened with organic coconut sugar. This all gives Protein Pleasure a clean, sweet aroma, and a full-bodied, nutty-chocolaty taste. When it comes to price, other retailers who sell GoMacro® bars have chosen to stick to the "Go big¿" philoso- phy. Not us. Price is where Trader Joe's draws the 'go big' line. We believe high quality, doesn't always require high prices. You might even say, "Go low..." is our price philosophy. That's why we're selling Protein Pleasure Macrobars for the lowest price we've seen: $2.29 for each 2.4 ounce bar. Go big and go buy some today! 07.18. 16
157819.name: Gomacro Pb Choc Chip Box
157819.title: Bars Gomacro Peanut Butter Choc Chip

162142.description: Developed to be just another tasty energy bar offering from the folks at OhYeah!® Nutrition, ONE® Bars became so popular so quickly that OhYeah!® decided to make ONE® a brand unto itself, with its own unique packaging, flavors, and website. Why so popular? As devotees will tell you, ONE® Protein Bars might just be the perfect combination of a killer* nutritional profile and a killer flavor profile. Once you sink your teeth into a dense, soft, chewy ONE® Protein Bar, you'll see what all the fuss is about. Each bar is dipped in a sweet, white coating, and the bar itself chews like a denser, chewier cookie dough. It's sweet, filling, and indulgent, yet each bar contains just over 200 calories and only one gram of sugar - hence the name. You'll also get 20 grams of whey-based protein and, in the ONE® Maple Glazed Doughnut Flavored Protein Bar, you'll reap the benefits of 10 grams of fiber, as well. That's right: a protein and fiber-filled snack that just so happens to taste like a maple glazed doughnut. You're welcome. We're selling each 2.12-ounce ONE® Protein Bar for $1.99, so you can afford to stock up and have ONE® on hand whenever and wherever you need an energy boost - in the morning, at the office, in the car, after school, pre-workout, post-workout, etc., etc. You'll find them on the shelves with our other energy and protein bars. *This is us experimenting with slang; we mean killer as in "good," not as in "it'll kill you"... how did we do? 11.27 .17
162142.name: One Bar Maple Glazed Doughnut Caddy

Like Go- Macro's® other bars that prioritize protein, Everlasting Joy is high in protein with 10g of it in each 2.3-ounce, 270-calorie bar. And we're talking organically grown, plant-based protein, as this bar is 100% vegan. (It's also gluten-free, soy-free, certified kosher, certified organic... need we go on?) When it comes to price, other retailers who sell GoMacro® bars have chosen to stick to the "Go big¿" phi- losophy. Not us. Price is where Trader Joe's draws the 'go big' line. 165317.title: Bars Gomacro Coconut+ Almond Butter + Chocolate Chips

166223.description: ONE® Bars (formerly OhYeah! Bars) are primarily known for two things: supplying 20g of protein (per 60g Bar), and delivering only 1g of sugar. With super nutritional stats like this, how good could they taste? Surprisingly, ONE® Bars are also known for a third thing... great taste! This Iced Gingerbread ONE® Bar contains a protein blend of whey protein isolate and milk protein isolate. The combination of ingredients presents a spiced-holiday-bread flavor, enrobed in confectionery icing, and topped with crunchy, chopped almonds. We're selling each 2.12-ounce (60g) Iced Gingerbread ONE® Bar for $1.99*. Find them on the shelves with our wide selection of every day and seasonal bars. 166223.name: One Bar Gingerbread Caddy
166223.title: One Bar Iced Gingerbread

168561.description: They may not be Trader Joe's branded products, but ALOHA Bars are right at home on our shelves. That's because their profile fits what many of our Customers are looking for in a protein bar. For instance, the 1.98 oz. Chocolate Fudge Brownie ALOHA Bar is made from organic, plant-based ingredients, starting with an organic protein blend that includes organic brown rice protein and organic pumpkin seed protein. Organic cocoa powder, organic cocoa extract, and organic dark chocolate provide a rich, chocolatey taste. And the inclusion of organic sunflower and cashew butters help provide the appealing texture. Instead of being tough and chewy like so many other protein bars, this ALOHA Bar is tender to the tooth with a pleasant mouthfeel more akin to a candy bar. And though you may feel like you're eating a candy bar, your body will know it's getting so much more in this 1.98-ounce, 220 calorie Chocolate Fudge Brownie ALOHA Bar-including 14g protein and 20% of your daily recommended value for iron. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Chocolate Fudge Brownie ALOHA Bar
168561.name: Aloha Choc Fudge Brownie Caddy

He called it Revive Vegan Café. It's in this environment that Dixon invented Frooze Balls. Frooze Balls are a "frooze-sion" of whole-food and plant-based goodness. Made with whey protein isolate and milk protein isolate, the cleverly-nicknamed "Fire It Up" ONE® Bar tastes like S'Mores, but performs like a nutrtion bar. Much like a marshmallow, it's exceedingly soft, but much like the good nutrition bar that it is, it's also delightfully dense. 169485.description: A barbell is a long metal bar used for lifting various weights that are attached to the ends. A Barebell, on the other hand, is a short (relatively speaking) protein bar used for lifting to your mouth when you need something yummy to give you a boost! The Barebells brand of protein bars was launched in Sweden in 2016. Since then, the company has been doing the 'heavy lifting' when it comes to developing high-protein snack bars that really deliver on the flavor. It's also notable that none of their bars include added sugar or palm oil. Nevertheless, they are touted as some of the best-tasting bars you can buy. This is definitely the case with the Barebells Caramel Cashew Protein Bar. Real milk chocolate is studded with crunchy pieces of cashews. Each bite gives you the rich flavor of chocolate, caramel, and nutty cashews. Equally important, each 1.94-ounce, 200-calorie Caramel Cashew Bar delivers 20g of protein. Find them in the bars section of your neighborhood Trader Joe's. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Barebells Caramel Cashew Protein Bar
169485.name: Barebells Caramel Cashew Caddy

The Barebells brand of protein bars was launched in Sweden in 2016. Since then, the company has been doing the 'heavy lifting' when it comes to developing high-protein snack bars that really deliver on the flavor. It's also notable that none of their bars include added sugar or palm oil. Nevertheless, they are touted as some of the best-tasting bars you can buy. This is definitely the case with the Barebells Cookies & Cream Protein Bar. Inspired by the most beloved cookie in history (Trader Joe's Joe Joe's, of course!) these Bars are crazy creamy with real milk chocolate and soy crisps for a contrasting crunch. Equally important, each 1.94-ounce, 200 calorie Cookies & Cream Bar delivers 20g of protein. Find them in the bars section of your neighborhood Trader Joe's. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Barebells Cookies & Cream Protein Bar

170233.description: People apply the phrase "go big, or go home" to all kinds of situations: sports, vacations, purchases... even food. GoMacro® is a family-owned protein bar company in Wisconsin that has "gone big" in our estimation. They're making yummy bars from sustainably sourced, organic ingredients; using recipes that are as clean and balanced as can be. This "all-in" approach is precisely why we've started carrying GoMacro's® Smooth Sanctuary Macrobar in our stores. Soft chewy, and positively full of rich dark chocolate and peanut butter chips, GoMacro's® Smooth Sanctuary bars definitely go big on flavor, but go even bigger on protein - each 2.3-ounce, 280-calorie bar contains 11g of it, in fact. And we're talking organically grown, plant-based protein, as this bar is 100% vegan. (It's also gluten-free, soy-free, certified kosher, certified organic... need we go on?) When it comes to price, other retailers who sell GoMacro® Bars may have chosen to stick with the "Go big..." philosophy, but not us. Price is where Trader Joe's draws the "go big" line. We believe that high quality doesn't require high prices, which is why we're selling GoMacro® Smooth Sanctuary Bars for the lowest price we've seen: $2.29* for each 2.3-ounce bar. Look for them in with our other protein bars. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. GoMacro® Smooth Sanctuary Macrobar
170233.name: Gomacro Double Choc Pb Chip Caddy

The Barebells brand of protein bars was launched in Sweden in 2016. Since then, the company has been doing the 'heavy lifting' when it comes to developing high-protein snack bars that really deliver on the flavor. None of their bars-which are now made in Croatia-include added sugar or palm oil, and each bar packs an impressive 20g of protein. Plus, they are touted as some of the best-tasting bars you can buy. Barebells Holiday Crisp Protein Bar is the latest in the lineup-and unfortunately for us (because it's delicious) it's a limited-edition lineup addition. With a sweet and fluffy, nougat-like base and Barebells' signature second layer of gooey, salted caramel, this bar gets its holiday kick from the crispy rice-like puffs embedded in its smooth, chocolatey coating and from its subtle holiday flavoring. (The exact details of said flavoring is a secret¿ but it's very merry.) Get ready to be blasted into holiday orbit! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Barebells Holiday Crisp Protein Bar
172437.name: Barebells Creamy Crisp Caddy
172437.title: Barebells Holiday Crisp

173009.description: A barbell is a long metal bar used for lifting various weights that are attached to the ends. A Barebell, on the other hand, is a short (relatively speaking) protein bar used to fuel said weight-lifting sessions... or simply for lifting to your mouth when you need something yummy to give you a boost! The Barebells brand of protein bars was launched in 2016. Since then, the company has been doing the 'heavy lifting' when it comes to developing high-protein snack bars that really deliver on the flavor. The latest addition to their lineup is a series of Plant-Based bars, including this sweet, chocolatey, and markedly multi-textured Hazelnut & Nougat Protein Bar. Its flavorful mix of creamy nougat and crunchy, chocolate-covered hazelnuts make it a great snack, while its plant-based blend of soy, pea, and rice proteins make it an equally great pre- or post-gym pick-me-up, boasting an impressive 15 grams of protein per Bar. We recommend keeping one or two on hand at the office, in your bag, or even in the glove compartment in your car - you never know when or where a bit of plant-based protein might come in handy, after all. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Barebells Plant Based Hazelnut & Nougat Protein Bar
173009.name: Barebells Plant Based Hazelnut Nougat Caddy

173845.description: A single mother and former fashion model, Think!® founder Lizanne Falsetto knew there had to be a "better bar" for busy folks. One with plenty of protein. One without gluten (which Lizanne is allergic to), or genetically modified ingredients. One that would work on a keto diet. And, most importantly, one that didn't taste like some wretched amalgamation of sawdust and cardboard. The Think!® Keto Protein Bar is that bar, and we're pleased to offer the Creamy Peanut Butter Pie flavor in our stores. Soft and chewy, these Keto-friendly Protein Bars bars boast a remarkably light and fluffy whipped peanut butter interior and a rich, chocolate-dipped exterior. Each Bar is gluten free and contains 10g of protein, as well as only 4g of net carbs. They make a superb snack to satisfy a sweet tooth, and great source of protein for a pre-or- post-workout boost, or even an on-the-go breakfast, in a pinch. We recommend keeping a few on hand in your purse, desk drawer and/or gym back to stave off hunger - whenever and wherever it strikes. Mighty convenient, don't you Think!®? *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Think!® Chocolate Peanut Butter Pie Keto Protein Bar
173845.name: Think Keto Chocolate Pb Pie Caddy

174206.description: A barbell is a long metal bar used for lifting various weights are attached to its ends. A Barebell, on the other hand, is a short (relatively speaking) protein bar used to fuel said weight-lifting sessions¿ or simply for lifting to your mouth when you need something yummy to give you a boost! The Barebells brand of protein bars was launched in Sweden in 2016. Since then, the company has been doing the 'heavy lifting' when it comes to developing high-protein snack bars that really deliver on the flavor. None of their bars-which are now made in Croatia-include added sugar, and each bar packs an impressive 20g of protein. Plus, they are touted as some of the best-tasting bars you can buy. Barebells Chocolate Dough Protein Bar is the latest in the lineup-and we're jazzed to welcome it aboard. It boasts a soft, chewy, "chocolate dough" interior, a smooth, chocolatey coating, and crispy rice-like puffs embedded in said smooth, chocolatey coating. Prepare for (a) lift-off! Barebells Chocolate Dough Protein Bar
174206.name: Barebells Chocolate Dough Caddy

174371.description: When the folks at Fulfil® say that their Bars have more to offer than your average protein bar, that's not just talk: they have the numbers to back it up. Because Fulfil®'s delectably sweet and savory Chocolate Salted Caramel Vitamin & Protein Bars don't just contain an impressive 15 grams of protein and only three grams of net carbs and one gram of sugar per serving, they're also an excellent source of eight essential vitamins, including vitamins A, B6, B12, C, and E. Which means that they're a great way to help you get through your workout and your day, all in one charmingly chewy, snack-sized Bar. Each Fulfil® Chocolate Salted Caramel Bar is made with a soft, nougat-y, salted caramel-flavored center, which is double-enrobed in a rich, chocolatey, outer layer, then rolled in satisfyingly crunchy bits of crisped rice flour. The resulting candy-bar like flavor profile makes fueling up for a workout feel like treating yourself to dessert. Keep a stash on hand in your laptop case, backpack, or gym bag, just in case you're ever in need of a proteinaceous (and vitamin-rich!) pick-me-up. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Fulfil® Chocolate Salted Caramel Flavor Vitamin & Protein Bar
174371.name: Fulfil Chocolate Salted Caramel Caddy

175414.description: At Trader Joe's, we love value, and we love quality ingredients. We also love protein bars. So when we find a protein bar made with quality ingredients, offered at a great value, we know we've really got something special. Enter: the Honey Cinnamon Peanut Butter A.M. RXBAR®, a superb addition to our already-stellar RXBAR® lineup. One bite of these bars and you'll understand why we just had to carry 'em. Made with mornings in mind, each Honey Cinnamon Peanut Butter RXBAR® proudly lists its four base ingredients-3 tbsp oats, 14 peanuts, 2 egg whites, & 2 tsp honey per bar-in big, bold letters on the front of the package, so you know what you'll be eating without having to investigate that tiny-print ingredient list with a magnifying glass. On their own, the combination of sweet honey, savory peanut butter, and rich cinnamon would be more than enough to make a simple, delicious breakfast treat, but add in the fact that you also get 10g of protein per bar from the egg whites? Now we're really talking! RXBAR® strives to create a product that's "simple and delicious without compromising nutrition," and they live up to this promise. Honey Cinnamon Peanut Butter RXBAR®s are gluten free, kosher, and make a powerful (and powerfully tasty!) on-the-go breakfast, snack, or source of pre/post-workout fuel. Honey Cinnamon Peanut Butter A.M. RXBAR®
175414.name: Rx Honey Cinnamon Peanut Butter Box

175918.description: When we first introduced Trader Joe's Rainbow's End Trail Mix [sku 36825] to our shelves back in 2000, it truly set the bar for how sublimely simple a trail mix could be. With just a minimalist mix of peanuts, almonds, raisins, and candy-coated milk chocolate gems, every bite contains a remarkable medley of flavors and textures, which is why it's remained a solid gold hit with our customers for nearly 25 years. So how does one celebrate such a bar-setting snack? How about by recontextualizing it into a new setting: a highly snackable Bar? Proudly made with the same constituent components as the Trail Mix that inspired it, Trader Joe's Rainbow's End Trail Mix Bars are held together with a bit of tapioca syrup and a rich coating of dipped dark chocolate on the base. Like its predecessor, each Bar offers a nice mix of crunchiness from the roasted peanuts and almonds, a bit of tenderness from the plump raisins, and some fun, flavorful sweetness from the candy-coated milk chocolate, all of which is captivatingly complemented by the dark chocolate layer. We find it's ideal for enjoying before work or school, during a hike or long car ride, or after a run or gym day. Rainbow's End Trail Mix Bars
175918.name: Tj'S Rainbow'S End Trail Mix Box
175918.title: Tj'S Rainbow'S End Trail Mix Bar

177486.description: It wasn't all that long ago that one's options for protein bars and supplements were relatively limited-and, in many cases, what was available almost always contained animal-derived products. Luckily, that's all changed, thanks to dedicated protein professionals, like the folks at Misfits. Back in 2020, they set out on a mission to create tasty, chocolatey, and decidedly vegan Plant-Powered Protein Bars that anyone could enjoy-not just those that follow an exclusively plant-based diet. Now, we're proud to add their soft, chewy, and scrumptiously cookie-butter-y Chocolate Cookie Butter Protein Bars to our shelves. Funnily enough, these Misfits ought to fit in just right at Trader Joe's. Each Bar's interior is made with a blend of pea protein and peanut paste, studded with crisy bits of cocoa- flavored soy protein to add some crunch to every bite. Layered on top of that, there's a generous spread of sweet, vegan cookie butter (a bit like a vegan variation of our Speculoos Cookie Butter [sku 97671]) for even more flavor. Then, on top of that (and indeed enrobed the entire Bar), there's a final, exterior layer of cacao-powered confectionary coating. All together, this combo of chewiness, crunchiness, vegan Chocolate and vegan Cookie Butter makes one sweet and texturally satisfying eating experience, made all the more impressive by the fact that each Bar contains 15 grams of protein, and only a single gram of sugar. We recommend keeping one on hand (or in your bag, or your desk, etc.) for the next time you need a post-gym protein boost or Chocolate and Cookie Butter-powered midday pick-me-up. Misfits Plant-Powered Chocolate Cookie Butter Protein Bar
177486.name: Misfits Cookie Butter

177812.description: Frooze Balls first came to be when company founder Jeremy Dixon attended a ten-day health retreat in 2004. Inspired by the ideas and delicacies shared there, he returned to his home in Auckland, New Zealand and opened up a café focused on healthy foods for a plant-powered diet. It's in this environment that Dixon began to work on creating a bite-sized, vegan alternative to energy bars that would eventually be known the world over as Frooze Balls. A "frooze-sion," if you will, of whole-food and plant-powered goodness, Caramel Chocolate Peanut Butter Frooze Balls are crafted with a soft, chewy, outer shell that's made from a combination of dates & peanuts, and rolled in dried coconut. Inside, you'll find a center made of rich, smooth, and caramel-y peanut butter that's also been flavored with a bit of cocoa powder. Each 2.5-ounce package contains five Frooze Balls, which all together contain seven and a half grams of protein. Ideal for before or after a workout, or anytime you feel the need for a little extra boost of plant-powered energy, we recommend bringing a pack along to the gym, on a hike, or stashing one at work, so you'll always have access to a sweet, caramel-y pick-me-up. Caramel Chocolate Peanut Butter Frooze Balls
177812.name: Frooze Balls Caramel Choc Pb Caddy

177819.description: When the folks at Fulfil® say that their Bars have more to offer than your average protein bar, that's not just talk: they have the numbers to back it up. Fulfil®'s deliciously nutty and crunchy Chocolate Peanut Caramel Flavor Vitamin & Protein Bars aren't just impressive on the macros front-15 grams of collagen-based protein, one gram of sugar, and two grams of "net" carbs per bar- they're also excellent sources of eight essential vitamins, including vitamins A, B6, B12, C, and E. All of this adds up to a great way to help you get through your workout and your day, all in one charmingly chewy, snack-sized Bar. Each Fulfil® Chocolate Peanut Caramel Bar features a soft, peanut butter nougat-y center, topped with a caramel-flavored crème; it is is double-enrobed in a rich, chocolatey, outer layer, then rolled in roughly chopped, roasted peanuts for a nice, satisfying crunch. The resulting candy-bar like flavor profile makes fueling up for a workout feel like treating yourself to dessert. Keep a stash on hand at the office, in your purse, or in your gym bag-you never know when you'll be in need of a proteinaceous (and vitamin-rich!) pick-me-up. Fulfil® Chocolate Peanut Caramel Flavor Vitamin & Protein Bar
177819.name: Fulfil Choc Peanut Caramel Caddy

195087.description: Let's face it: it's not always easy to get the daily recommended value of protein in over the course of a day, and sources of concentrated protein aren't always the tastiest things on the menu. That's likely why our customers love Power Crunch Bars® so much: they're light, they're crispy, and they offer a potent punch of candy bar-like flavor in addition to a sizable 14 grams of protein per serving. Power Crunch® French Vanilla Crème Protein Energy Bars, in particular, deliver that protein-whey protein, to be specific-between three layers of Vanilla Crème and crunchy wafer cookies. Perfectly proportioned for prime portability, Power Crunch® French Vanilla Crème Protein Energy Bars fit smartly in your gym bag or purse, making them ideal for taking pre-or-post-workout. With their remarkably Vanilla-y flavor and captivating crunch, though, you might just prefer to keep them on hand for snacking purposes-which makes the fact that each Bar only has five grams of sugar all the sweeter. Protein-packed and practical? Now that's Power-ful. Power Crunch® French Vanilla Crème Protein Energy Bar
195087.name: Power Crnch Fr Van Creme Box
195087.title: Bars Power Crunch French Vanilla Creme

196494.description: In 1999, LUNA® was launched with a singular goal: to create a delicious bar with a nutritional profile (and taste) that women would love. They're certainly not "just for women," but, according to the company, LUNA® still operates with women's empowerment in mind. We've carried different LUNA® Whole Nutrition Bars in our stores over the years, and we always like to keep the flavor offerings current. In this case, our Customers have spoken, and Chocolate Dipped Coconut is what the people want! LUNA® Chocolate Dipped Coconut Whole Nutrition Bars are chewy, crispy oat-and-soy-protein-based bars made with organically grown shredded coconut & natural coconut flavor-drizzled with and bottom-dipped in a sweet, chocolate coating. Each 190-calorie, gluten-free bar boasts 8 grams of protein, making it an excellent snack anytime of the day. Each 1.69-bar also boasts an excellent price tag-we're selling each one for 99¢. That's right, Chocolate Dipped Coconut bliss can be yours for a mere ninety-nine pennies! Look for them in our nutrition bars section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. LUNA® Chocolate Dipped Coconut Whole Nutrition Bar
196494.name: Luna Chocoloate Coconut Box

077804.description: Macronutrients-such as protein, carbohydrates, and fat-provide your body with energy, and are the foundation of any diet. While it's fairly easy to get your recommended amount of carbs & fats each day (hello TJ's potato chips!), it can sometimes be a challenge incorporating enough protein-rich foods to acquire what your body really needs. If you're looking for an enjoyable way to boost your protein, we recommend Orgain® Organic Protein¿ Boost, now available at your neighborhood Trader Joe's. We're selling a little over one-pound containers of this Powdered Drink Mix. Each 140-calorie serving of Orgain® Protein Boost (two scoops) provides 21g of protein. (That's approaching half of the FDA's recommended 50g protein per day.) And for those with other dietary concerns, this vegan Drink Mix includes pea-derived protein, with no soy or dairy ingredients. It's also gluten free, kosher, and of course, certified Organic. For those asking, But is it good?-rest assured, Orgain® is committed to better nutrition that does not compromise on taste. Compared to other protein powders, you can totally taste the difference when you add this Drink Mix to the recommended 10 fl. oz. of water or non-dairy beverage-or blend it into your morning smoothie. It's formulated with natural Vanilla Bean flavor, and just the right amount of sweetness (from cane sugar & Stevia extract) to make boosting your protein as delicious as it is convenient & effective! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Orgain® Organic Protein¿ Protein Boost Vanilla Bean Flavored Powdered Drink Mix
077804.name: Orgain Org Pea Protein Vanilla
077804.title: Orgain® Vanilla Bean Organic Protein Boost Powder

043326.description: California's San Joaquin Valley is the largest raisin-producing region in the world. It's also the region from which our Trader Joe's Thompson Seedless Raisins come! Our supplier grows Thompson seedless grapes near Fresno, California. The grapes are sun-dried and processed without sulfur dioxide, or anything else. This is why the package lists the ingredients as simply: Thompson Raisins. Incidentally, it takes about four-and-a-half pounds of fresh Thompson seedless grapes to make just one pound of raisins. And this is exactly what you get in each 16-ounce, resealable bag of Trader Joe's Thompson Seedless Raisins! Find it in our dried fruit section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Thompson Seedless Raisins
043326.name: Natural Thompson Seedless Raisins

098682.description: Though the pistachio tree originated thousands of years ago in the Middle East, early production in the United States didn't begin until the 1930's, when a determined botanist journeyed to Iran and brought cuttings back to California's Central Valley. The fertile soil, dry climate and moderate winters in the Southwest proved to be ideal conditions for growing pistachios. After years of trials, production spread from California to Arizona and New Mexico in the 1960s, and the first "official" commercial crop was harvested in 1976. Trader Joe's Raw Pistachio Nutmeats Halves & Pieces are grown for us in California, where US production first began. Thanks to strides in modern technology and food safety, these kosher (pareve) Nutmeats undergo a steam treatment, just long enough to make them safe-but not long enough to make them soggy. The result is raw nuts that are safe to eat and positively bursting with fresh flavor. Because these Raw Pistachio Nutmeats are unsalted and uncooked, their distinct, earthy, sweet taste is simply unmasked-they're surprisingly addicting! A one-quarter cup serving provides three grams of fiber and six grams of protein, making them a filling snack on their own. Their shelled state makes it a cinch to pour them atop salads or add them to a recipe. We're offering eight-ounce bags of Trader Joe's Raw Pistachio Nutmeats Halves & Pieces for $5.99, everyday. You'll find them with our other nut products. 04.24. 17
098682.name: Raw Pistachio Nutmeats Whole Kernels
098682.title: Raw* Pistachio Nutmeats

029898.description: Tejava is one of a limited number of brand-name products we sell in our stores. It's also a portmanteau, combining the words "tea" and "Java." The java stands for the Indonesian island of Java. The Te(a) represents Camellia sinensis leaves grown on this island and used to make Tejava Original Black Tea. Using only select Javanese tea leaves, skilled brewers employ a unique microbrewing method to create this full- bodied, black tea beverage. In fact, it's only tea leaves and water-with nothing else added. Keep some bottles of Tejava in your pantry or fridge for the next time you're craving high quality, ready-to-drink tea. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Tejava Original Black Tea
029898.name: Tejava 1 Lt
029898.title: Tejava Original Black Tea

091580.description: When creating our Trader Joe's Blueberry & Pomegranate Green Tea, our philosophy was to keep it simple. No added sugars, no artificial flavors or colors, and no calories too! Instead, we mixed freshly brewed green tea with a splash of actual fruit flavors, resulting in a well-balanced beverage brimming with natural phytonutrients. So, sit back, relax and enjoy the flavorful fusion of sweet blueberries and tart pomegranates in this delightfully and refreshing tea. In whatever season, TJ's Blueberry Pomegranate Tea can be served hot in a mug just like any other tea, or chilled over ice for a refreshing beverage. Remember the Tea is unsweetened, so enjoy as is, add a bit of honey to your cup o' tea, or a little Organic Cane Sugar [sku 27042] to your iced tea. You'll find each liter bottle of Trader Joe's Blueberry & Pomegranate Green Tea in our Shelf Stable Beverages section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Blueberry & Pomegranate Green Tea
091580.name: Green Tea Unswt Blue Pom 1 Lt
091580.title: Green Tea Blueberry & Pomegranate Unsweetened Beverage

053631.name: Tj Res Rhodes Vineyard Zin Lot 114

038767.description: Our Black Bean & Jack Cheese Burrito has been a staple on the West Coast for years, so we are excited to feature it in our East Coast stores as well. Black beans are slowly cooked with tomatoes, garlic, cumin, Guajillo chiles and jalapeno powder. Monterey Jack Cheese is added for a final flavor boost before all is wrapped inside a fresh flour tortilla. It heats in just less than two minutes, making it a convenient meal or snack for any time of day. We are selling our Trader Joe's Black Bean & Jack Cheese Burrito in a 10 ounce format for $2.99.
038767.name: Black Bean & Cheese Burrito
038767.title: Black Bean & Monterey Jack Cheese Burrito In A Flour Tortilla

057822.description: Depending on what you have in mind, the Spanish word burrito can mean "little donkey," or it can refer to a delicious dish of Mexican origin. Specifically, it's a word that's been used in the Guanajuato region of Mexico for over 100 years to refer to a rolled tortilla filled with meat and other ingredients. Those "other ingredients" can constitute any number of things, but we've stuck to using classic fillings in Trader Joe's Pollo Asado Burrito. The construction of our hefty, flavorful Pollo Asado Burrito is relatively simple. We take tender, pulled chicken (puttin' the pollo in pollo asado!), black beans, red rice with a bit of a kick, pepper jack cheese, and TJ's Corn & Chili Salsa [sku 79614], and we hand-roll all of it in a fresh, flour tortilla to ensure sturdy burrito craftsmanship. Grab a Pollo Asado Burrito, pop it in the microwave for just under 2 minutes, let it stand for one, and call it lunch. Or dinner. Or grab one for lunch and dinner-we're selling each 10-ounce Burrito for the olé-worthy price of $3.99. You'll find it in the refrigerated section with our other fresh, prepared foods. 05.22. 17
057822.name: Pollo Asado Burrito Tender Chicken With Black Beans, Corn Chili Salsa, Pepper Jack Cheese And Rice In A Flour Tortilla

057823.description: Depending on what you have in mind, the Spanish word burrito can mean "little donkey," or it can refer to a delicious dish of Mexican origin. Specifically, it's a word that's been used in the Guanajuato region of Mexico for over 100 years to refer to a rolled tortilla filled with meat and other ingredients. Those "other ingredients" can constitute any number of things, but we've stuck to using classic fillings in Trader Joe's Carnitas with Salsa Verde Burrito. The construction of our hefty, flavorful Carnitas with Salsa Verde Burrito is relatively simple. We take tender, spicy pork, salsa verde (that's "green salsa," for those who need a translation), black beans, cilantro lime brown rice, and pepper jack cheese, and we hand-roll all of it in a fresh, flour tortilla to ensure sturdy burrito craftsmanship. Grab a Carnitas with Salsa Verde Burrito, pop it in the microwave for just under 2 minutes, let it stand for one, and call it lunch. Or dinner. Or grab one for lunch and dinner-we're selling each 10-ounce Burrito for the olé-worthy price of $3.99. You'll find it in the refrigerated section with our other fresh, prepared foods. 05.22. 17
057823.name: Carnitas Salsa Verde Burrito
057823.title: Carnitas With Salsa Verde Burrito Tender, Spicy Pork, Black Beans And Cilantro Lime Brown Rice & Pepper Jack Cheese In A Flour Tortilla

061771.description: It's a not-exactly-demonstrable but nonetheless probably-true fact that burritos are one of the tastiest, handi- est food creations. Take, for instance, our oh-so-popular Black Bean and Jack Cheese Burrito [sku 38767]: the tortilla perfectly hugs the beans and cheese, keeping them safe until you're ready to enjoy. Now, when you use breakfast ingredients instead of beans and cheese, it's a real game-changer (or breakfast-changer). Our Trader Joe's Chicken Sausage Breakfast Burrito aptly contains all the important breakfast ingredients necessary to deem this breakfast-worthy. We went after tradition: chicken sausage flavored with sage and thyme, scrambled eggs, potatoes, sautéed onions, and white cheddar cheese live inside a chewy flour tortilla. The proportions are just right, so you'll get a little bit of everything in each bite. And, though it is a Breakfast Burrito, you don't have to restrict the time of day in which you enjoy it-it's always delicious. Maybe the best part about this Breakfast Burrito (after the Burrito itself, of course) is the endless condiment possibilities that lay before you. Do you like Ketchup [sku 55860] to accompany your breakfast? If you're from the southwest, you're probably reaching for the Salsa Autentica [sku 01535] the second you hear "breakfast." Or maybe you like a spicier version, a lá Ghost Pepper Habanero Salsa [sku 59417]. Then there's Sriracha [sku 50828], Green Dragon [sku 54861], Avocado's Number Guacamole [sku 65355], Harissa [sku 55841]¿ As far as burritos go, Trader Joe's Chicken Sausage Breakfast Burrito lives up to the "tastiest, handiest food creation" designation, and it's got a value to match. Each eight-ounce Burrito is $3.99, every day. You'll find it with our other fresh burritos. 01.29. 18
061771.name: Burrito Breakfast Chicken Sausage And Egg
061771.title: Chicken Sausage Breakfast Burrito

073034.description: Most of us have enjoyed our fair share of cheeseburgers and burritos in our time, but chances are you've never enjoyed them in one singular eating experience. Well, Trader Joe's Cheeseburger Burrito is here to change all that! To create this momentous meeting of two casual culinary collossi, our supplier takes all the constituent ingredients of a juicy, fully-loaded cheeseburger, including savory-seasoned ground beef, sharp, shredded Cheddar cheese, chopped tomato & onion, and classic condiments like ketchup, mustard, and pickle relish, then wraps them tightly in a flour tortilla.
