When we lined up each version of our fresh Sour Cream Spinach Dip and tasted each one (the exact recipe varied from region to region), we felt a bit like goldilocks. One was too soupy. One was too herby. Immediately, we knew what we must do. And now, allow us to reintroduce you to Trader Joe's Sour Cream Spinach Dip. It's a nod to nostalgia-just ask virtually anyone who attended a party in the 1960s & '70s-made with spinach, sour cream, and mayo, plus a touch of lemon juice, roasted garlic, and minced onion. It's creamy, herby (but not too herby), and completely craveable. It also has an extended fridge-life, thanks to High Pressure Processing (HPP)-a cold, chemical-free, water-pressure processing method that guarantees food safety without heat-pasteurization. So slice up a TJ's Sourdough Baguette [sku 92510], bust open a bag of TJ's Organic Blue Corn Tortilla Chips [sku 94583], and crack open the Sour Cream Spinach Dip. We're selling each 11-ounce tub for $3.49-that's new and improved Dip at the same great price. Look for it in our refrigerators.
006136.name: Spinach Sour Cream Dip
006136.title: Sour Cream Spinach Dip

065624.description: A now-classic recipe that reaches peak search-engine status during football season, Buffalo Chicken Dip combines the lip-smacking tang of chicken wings with oozing, melty cheese in an easy-to-scoop dip. Our version includes bite-sized pieces of white meat chicken breast anchored with a cayenne pepper sauce, with notes of vinegar and savory garlic flavor. Cream cheese, sour cream, and Monterey Jack meld the savory spiciness, and when microwaved, this Dip tackles your taste buds in the best way possible (we recommend having your favorite TJ's tortilla chips on hand for maximum scooping). If you're scrambling to get out of your same old chip and dip rut this season, call an audible and grab a tub of Trader Joe's Buffalo Chicken Dip. The 12-ounce tub contains enough to go around, so you (hopefully) won't be accused of holding. Find them for $4.99* each in our refrigerated cases. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Buffalo Chicken Dip
065624.name: Buffalo Chicken Dip

076968.description: Where does one even begin to recommend occasions for Trader Joe's Roasted Hatch Chile & Jalapeño Cheese Dip? Perhaps one starts from the premise that any occasion can be vastly improved by the addition of a superlatively creamy, remarkably cheesy, and sensationally spicy appetizer Dip, and goes from there. Even with that in mind, we must say that this particular Dip surpasses all expectation. Made with a base of sour cream, cream cheese, and Cheddar, and flavored with fiery, roasted Hatch chiles and jalapeños, it heats up to a magnificently molten texture after just a few minutes in the microwave (or a smidge longer in your conventional oven), at which point it scoops spectacularly well with tortilla chips, baguette slices, or your favorite fresh veggies. Available in our refrigerators for a limited time, this savory and superbly peppery Hatch Chile & Jalapeño Cheese Dip makes an easy hors d'oeuvres for a dinner party, and a great group snack when you've got folks over to watch the big game. With its tart, creamy, and cheesy base (courtesy of the sour cream, cream cheese, and Cheddar) and exhilarating-but not overwhelming-heat (thanks to its one-two punch of Hatch chile and jalapeño, naturally), it's especially apt for serving with something like a Kono Sauvingon Blanc [sku 94120], or a crisp, thirst-quenching lager. Roasted Hatch Chile & Jalapeño Cheese Dip
076968.name: Dip Roasted Hatch Chile & Jalapeno Cheese
076968.title: Roasted Hatch Chile & Jalapeño Cheese Dip

077488.description: Where does one even begin to recommend occasions for Trader Joe's Garlic & Asiago Cheese Dip? Perhaps one starts from the premise that any occasion can be vastly improved by the addition of a superlatively creamy, remarkably cheesy, and deeply, aromatically garlicky appetizer Dip, and goes from there. Even with that in mind, we must say that this particular Dip surpasses all expectation. Made with a base of sour cream, cream cheese, mozzarella, and Asiago, it heats up to a magnificently molten texture after just a few minutes in the microwave (or a smidge longer in your conventional oven), at which point it scoops spectacularly well with tortilla chips, baguette slices, or your favorite fresh veggies. Available in our refrigerators for a limited time, this phenomenally rich and savory Garlic & Asiago Cheese Dip makes an easy hors d'oeuvres for a dinner party, a sensational snack for when you've got a group over to watch the game, and a pitch-perfect pairing with a bottle of crisp white wine during a movie night. We find that its delicately tart tanginess (courtesy of the sour cream and cream cheese) and slightly nutty edge (thanks to the Asiago) make it especially apt for serving with something like our Growers Reserve Sauvingon Blanc [sku 94120], or an easy-drinking blonde ale. Garlic & Asiago Cheese Dip
077488.name: Dip Cheesy Garlic Asiago
077488.title: Garlic & Asiago Cheese Dip

106136.description: At Trader Joe's, we love improving upon a good thing. After all, a good thing is good, but a better good thing is better. (That kaizen life, though.) When we lined up each version of our fresh Sour Cream Spinach Dip and tasted each one (the exact recipe varied from region to region), we felt a bit like goldilocks. One was too soupy. One was too herby. Immediately, we knew what we must do. And now, allow us to reintroduce you to Trader Joe's Sour Cream Spinach Dip. It's a nod to nostalgia-just ask virtually anyone who attended a party in the 1960s & '70s-made with spinach, sour cream, and mayo, plus a touch of lemon juice, roasted garlic, and minced onion. It's creamy, herby (but not too herby), and completely craveable. It also has an extended fridge-life, thanks to High Pressure Processing (HPP)-a cold, chemical-free, water-pressure processing method that guarantees food safety without heat-pasteurization. So slice up a TJ's Sourdough Baguette [sku 92510], bust open a bag of TJ's Organic Blue Corn Tortilla Chips [sku 94583], and crack open the Sour Cream Spinach Dip. We're selling each 11-ounce tub for $3.49-that's new and improved Dip at the same great price. Look for it in our refrigerators.
106136.name: Spinach Sour Cream Dip
106136.title: Sour Cream Spinach Dip

020278.description: A selection of salami is a bold, versatile, and downright delicious deli slice to have in your shopping cart. Between releasing the aroma from the second you open the package to the sweet and smoky sensation after you've enjoyed a serving, Columbus Reduced Sodium Sliced Salame has nothing but quality and flavor in mind. Our supplier starts this lovely salami with select cuts of pork, a healthy serving of cracked black pepper, a proprietary blend of warm, bold spices, and a hint of burgundy wine. If that wasn't quite enough to whet your appetite, Columbus then slow cures their salami for around one month before slicing, packaging, and delivering us the final product you've been waiting patiently for. With 45% less sodium than the traditional Columbus sliced salami, Columbus Reduced Sodium Sliced Salame is great for a crowd looking to watch their salt intake while still enjoying the wonderful world of Italian cured meats. Fill your picnic baskets with your favorite wine and cheese, but whatever you do, make sure to include Columbus Reduced Sodium Sliced Salame today! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Columbus Reduced Sodium Italian Dry Salame
020278.name: Sliced Salami Rs Columbus
020278.title: Salami Sliced Columbus

026864.description: Simply put, prosciutto is aged ham. More specifically, it is meat from a pig's hind leg that is dry cured with salt until most of the moisture has been sucked out. (The Italian word prosciutto derives from the Latin for "to suck out.") This produces a delicately textured cold cut with a rich, complex flavor profile. At Trader Joe's, we offer a premium prosciutto from a crate-free supplier in the Westphalia region of Germany-a region known for meat specialties. Stockmeyer Prosciutto is cured with salt in the traditional way, but it is also gently smoked over beechwood that comes from the nearby by forests. This thinly sliced, slightly sweet, mildly smoky Prosciutto is ideal for hors d'oeuvres, salads, sandwiches, or pizza. Find it in our deli section among our selection of charcuterie. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Stockmeyer Prosciutto
026864.name: Slcd Prosciutto Stockmeyer

028285.description: Jalapeño. Sausage. Chicken. Spicy. Rearrange those words, put them together, and you get Trader Joe's Spicy Jalapeño Chicken Sausage, a singular sausage with the fiery bite of jalapeño peppers in every mouthful. We know that spicy sausages are nothing new. What you'd find in most stores, when looking for spicy sausages, are spicy Italian sausages. We have those, too. But look closely at our sausage section (we have such a thing), though, and you'll find an array of spicy choices that go beyond the usual suspects. Choices like TJ's Spicy Ja- lapeño Chicken Sausage, which employ medium-hot jalapeño peppers, rather than the typical Italian season- ings, to produce the heat. They're lower in fat and calories than traditional pork sausage-each link has a mere 100 calories with only six grams of fat! They're produced without the use of added nitrites, nitrates or MSG; and they're fully cooked, so all you need to do is heat 'em and eat 'em-on the grill or stovetop, under the broiler, or even in the microwave. Try one on a bun, the traditional way, or slice them into chunks and add them to enchiladas or even omelets. Trader Joe's Spicy Jalapeño Chicken Sausage is $3.99 for each 12-ounce package of five sausages-that's about 80¢ a link, a great deal for this spicy, juicy treat. And remember, this is no sale price. This has been our price since 2008 -that's what we call a value!
028285.name: Sausage Chicken Jalapeno
028285.title: Spicy Jalapeño Chicken Sausage

050143.description: ¿ Trader Joe's new Braised Beef Roast with Demi Glace is our newest addition in a line of deliciously moist, flavorful and ready to heat and enjoy meat entrees. We have taken generous pieces of well marbled, raw beef chuck roast, seasoned and marinated them to perfection and then braised them low and slow for over 12 hours! That's precisely the amount of time that it takes to make the meat as moist and as tender as you'll find it will be in each and every package. The braised meat is then covered in a deliciously rich demi glace that compliments it wonderfully. There's no need to spend hours (literally an entire day or night) in the kitchen preparing an entrée like this when we've done all the work for you! NEW ITEM Braised Beef Roast with Demi Glace
050143.name: Beef Rst Brsd W/ Demi Glace
050143.title: Beef Roast Braised With Demi Glace Fully Cooked

050207.description: ¿ If you LOVE bacon as much as we do, then this product just might be a new favorite. It is definitely one of the very BEST bacons we have ever tried! This all natural bacon has never seen or felt a single speck of nitrite/nitrate, has been smoked low and slow over hickory wood coals and dry rubbed, so it's not at all wet or watery in the package, like many other bacon products¿which means you get more bacon for your money (not water/brine that is pumped into most bacons)! The dry rub is reminiscent of that on a high quality Black Forest Ham, made up of raw sugar, sea salt, malted barley and a myriad of savory spices. The slices are thick and the bacon is moist and delicious - perfectly capable of creating the absolute best BLT sandwich ever known to man.
050207.name: Bacon Black Forest Uncured
050207.title: Uncured Black Forest Bacon

051460.description: Is Pork Belly the next bacon? Trick question. Pork Belly is basically bacon. It comes from the same part of the animal - the underside (belly) of a hog, after the loin and spareribs have been removed. Unlike bacon, though, the Pork Belly cut is considered fresh in that it is not smoked or cured. This variant makes a big culinary difference. Typically, raw Pork Belly requires hours and hours and hours of slow cooking. Who has the time, right? Not many, and that's why Bacon has been the talk of the belly, until¿ In recent years, Pork Belly has become ubiquitous on restaurant menus. Exuding rich texture and taste, it stars in everything from salads and soups to buns and tacos. Working our way through many a popular Pork Belly serving, we pondered the possibility of making the preparation more manageable to the everyday chef. We started by looking at just how the restaurants were able to plate it with such ease. As it turns out, for the many restaurants, they purchase Pork Belly that is pre-cooked. Well, hey - we can do that! We started by identifying a great supplier in the Midwest, the heart of the U.S. pork industry, with the capabilities to both cook and package the prime belly cut. They take the "chunks" of Pork Belly, lightly season it with salt and braise it low-and-slow for 12 hours. Each piece is then cryovaced, so the succulent meat stays fresh and ready to get cooking. Then we bring you 12 ounce packages of quality Fully Cooked Pork Belly for the exceptional trading price of $4.99. That's what we call living high on the hog!
051460.name: Pork Belly Fully Cooked
051460.title: Fully Cooked Pork Belly

053479.description: While grocers' first vacuum-sealed deli meats in the 1940s, it wasn't until 1971 that Dr. Bruno Goussault de- veloped sous-vide cooking. French for "under-vacuum," sous-vide a process that involves vacuum-sealing food in a specially designed pouch and slow-cooking it at a precise, low temperature to maintain the integrity of flavor and nutrients, while sealing in moisture to ensure tender texture. Sous-vide is quite possibly one of the most significant innovations in modern cuisine, so naturally our buyers have made a point of acquainting themselves with the pioneers of the culinary art. In fact, on a recent visit to the kitchens of the sous-vide savvy, our buyers tasted this Grass Fed Beef Sirloin Roast. Delicious! Perfectly pink and tender, rich with mouthwatering flavor - this best-in-class slice of beef is something for which we would like to be known. Done. Trader Joe's Grass Fed Beef Sirloin Roast - Fully Cooked & Sliced - starts with a cut of top sirloin from Australian-raised grass fed cows. Seasoned simply (with sea salt and pepper), it's seared on both sides, sliced evenly and then cooked sous-vide by the vanguards in Virginia! The result is the most consistent, beautifully tender slices of beef that are ready to enjoy straight out of the package, cold or warm (easy to do in the micro- wave or oven). Serve it in a sandwich with roasted red peppers and horseradish mayonnaise. It's also great for use in fajitas, pizzas, salads, pastas¿ From it's grass fed, sous-vide pedigree to its incredible culinary versatility, this beef is definitely something we are proud to call our own, especially at $10.99 per pound! 11.13. 14
053479.name: Beef Sirloin Grass-Fed Slcd
053479.title: Grass Fed Beef Sirloin Roast Fully Cooked And Sliced

053893.description: Whether or not you believe that "breakfast is the most important meal of the day," at least we can all agree that the traditional morning mix of savory (eggs, bacon, buttered toast), and sweet (pastries, jams, fruit) makes breakfast the best meal of the day. And, who hasn't sneakily inched their breakfast sausages nearer to the pancake stack, anticipating that unorthodox-yet technically non-taboo-taste of sausage, doused in syrup? Being big fans of breakfast (and of such classically contrasting flavors) ourselves, we're adding Maple Chicken Breakfast Sausages to our list of cockcrow offerings-an irresistible item that delivers savory and sweet in every single bite. These all-natural, minimally processed sausages have no casings, and no hormones or antibiotics added. They come fully cooked and ready to heat. A quick pan-fry or broil brings to life savory tastes (salt, paprika, spices), and sweet flavors (maple syrup, brown sugar, caramelized sugar). It's a profile that pairs well with eggs of any style. Halved and layered on an English Muffin [sku 90558] with cheddar and eggs, these Maple Chicken Sausages make for a delectible breakfast sandwich. Diced and combined in a flour tortilla with eggs, Black Beans [09636], and cheese, these dulcet sausages call for a dose of your favorite piquant sauce [like, TJ's Double-Roasted Salsa, sku 57059]. However they're prepared, Trader Joe's Maple Chicken Sausages provide an excellent excuse to serve breakfast at any hour of the day! Our twelve-ounce package of 12 links is $4.49, and can be found in our refrigerated deli section. 12.26. 14
053893.name: Sausage Chicken Breakfast Maple Fully Cooked
053893.title: All Natural Fully Cooked Maple Chicken Breakfast Sausage

055277.description: While we thoroughly enjoy a gyro out, there are definitely times we just want to gyro in-cozying up with the richly seasoned strips of beef or lamb, enfolded in a flatbread with tomatoes, red onions, and a seductive dollop of creamy, cucumber-y tzatziki-mmm. Our obstacle: cooking gyro (say: "YEE-ro") meat is no joke. Just consider the presumed roots of this dish, back to the time of Alexander the Great, when soldiers used their long swords to skewer meat, which they arduously rotated over open fires. Cooking methods may have modern- ized (a bit), but bottom line-it's an intense process. Luckily, we are in the business of banishing barriers to truly tender, savory meat. Enter: Trader Joe's Gyro Slices. Traveling to Chicago-a hotbed of gyro production-we sought out masters of this Mediterranean-style meat. The midwest meat mavins we found, expertly season their fusion of ground beef, breadcrumbs, and lamb, with garlic, oregano, and lemon. Then, they rotate and roast it until it yields. Lastly, they slice it thin, as though on a swords edge, so the meat remains supple, with edges that crisp when heated. Our Fully Cooked Gyro Slices come ready to heat and dish. While the flatbread wrap is a natural fit (traditional recipe is on the package), it's also delectable on a Mediterranean pizza or salad. And diced into an omelet with sundried tomatoes and crumbly feta... mmm, again. Gyro in, without any obstacles-each eight-ounce package of Gyro Slices is $3.99. 04.08. 16
055277.name: Slcd Gyro Fully Cooked
055277.title: Gyro Slices

055478.description: "¿to sleep, perchance to dream - ay, there's the rub¿"-Hamlet The "rub" to which Hamlet was referring didn't exactly involve bacon-but if it did, we think his dreams would have been the better for it. The truth is, there are plenty of delicious dishes out there that are made better with bacon. To put it simply, we're big fans of the stuff. So you can imagine our delight when our Buyer dreamed up a dry rubbed version to delight bacon enthusiasts everywhere. Trader Joe's Uncured Sliced Bacon is Dry Rubbed by hand with spices, sea salt, raw sugar & celery powder, and slowly smoked for several hours over natural hardwoods, for deep, smoky flavor. It's made with pork raised on all-vegetarian feed, and no antibiotics ever, and there are no artificial ingredients, nitrates or nitrites added. The proprietary Dry Rub process accomplishes two things that make this Bacon even more excellent than most, if we do say so ourselves: 1) the spiced rub imbues the bacon with a mouthwatering, smoky sweetness, and 2) because the rub does not contain added water (hence, "dry"), it boasts less shrink and splatter during the cooking process-which ultimately means more bacon for you to enjoy. And enjoy it you will, with pancakes & eggs for breakfast, in BLTs for lunch, crumbled into cornbread with dinner¿ We're offering 12-ounce packages of the bacon of your dreams¿er¿ Trader Joe's Uncured Dry Rubbed Sliced Bacon for the incredible value of $5.49, everyday. You'll find them near our other bacon products.
055478.name: Bacon Abf Uncured Dry Rubbed
055478.title: Uncured Dry Rubbed Sliced Bacon

057632.description: Bratwurst is enjoyed, especially, during Oktoberfest-a German celebration that begins in September. That's why we're introducing Trader Joe's Uncured Bavarian Bratwurst in August. Makes total sense! Such premature fanfare does have a pivotal purpose; and that's to make sure you are well aware of this new sensational sausage before the kick-off of Oktoberfest (and whichever other fall fests you plan to commemorate with sausages). Our Uncured Bavarian Bratwurst is modeled after the most traditional sausages served at the Oktoberfest in Munich. In fact, it's made for us in Germany of pork sausage, well-seasoned with spices like marjoram, black pepper, nutmeg, mace, ginger, coriander, and pimento. Like the best of the sausages served at such German celebrations, ours is made without added nitrates or nitrites. This means it won't last for months in your fridge, but these fully-cooked links will taste incredibly fresh when you serve them. If you want to go full-on traditional, serve these sausages with mashed potatoes or sauerkraut, or both! And yes, a stein of your favorite beer-Märzen is the most common, but any lager will complement these Brats. We're selling each 12 ounce package of four links for $3.99. You'll find them in our refrigerated case. 08.15. 16
057632.name: Sausage Bavarian Bratwurst
057632.title: Fully Cooked Uncured Bavarian Bratwurst

058124.description: As snacking trends veer away from the sugary carb-bombs of yesteryear, protein seems to be the nutrient du jour. Of-the-moment diet regimes aside, protein commands respect for good reason-it's one of the building blocks of our body tissue and serves as a crucial fuel source. Boasting 12 grams of protein each, Volpi® Roltini® Mozzarella & Prosciutto Snacks present the snacker with an opportunity for both energy replenishment and maximum satisfaction. Volpi® Roltini® Mozzarella & Prosciutto Snacks are simple in their construction. What you see is what you get: a delicate, salty slice of prosciutto ham lovingly wrapped around a stick of not-so-stringy mozzarella cheese. What you can't see, however, is that unlike most standard prosciutto ham, the prosciutto Volpi uses is free from added nitrates and nitrites-except for those naturally occurring in sea salt. Most excellent, we say. Grab a Volpi® Roltini® Mozzarella & Prosciutto Snack to quiet a rumbling stomach at any hour of the day or night. If you really want to go big on this whole protein thing, pair a Mozzarella & Prosciutto Snack with a bag of our Just A Handful of Raw Almonds [sku 91920]. Or, since fruit traditionally complements cheese and cured meats (think: fancy cheese plate), chase your Mozzarella & Prosciutto Snack with a few Organic Turkish Apricots [sku 37994] or Cantaloupe Spears [sku 95266]. This product is typically only found in convenience stores, priced at around $1.69 and up. But since value is everything at Trader Joe's, we are selling each 1.5-ounce Volpi® Roltini® Mozzarella & Prosciutto Snack for $1.29-an extraordinarily low price for an extraordinarily satisfying snack. 06.27. 16
058124.name: Prscto & Mozz Chse Snck Volpi

059152.description: Have you ever wondered why high-end Italian-made salumi tastes so very good? Has it ever struck you that using traditional methods to make those same meats stateside should produce the same results, but often doesn't? We know why. All other inputs being equal, it's the quality of the meat delivered to the salumi artisan that determines the quality of the finished product. Seems simple enough, right? Perhaps strangely, then, there are numerous producers of Italian-style meats that don't take this into proper consideration. For Trader Joe's Uncured Applewood Smoked Salami, we are working with a vendor who's well aware of the correlation between quality raw pork and quality salami. This Uncured Applewood Smoked Salami uses a combination of smoking and salt curing, thus combin- ing the best of traditional Italian techniques with those of Northern Europe. Formed with high quality cuts of pork raised in the U.S. without antibiotics, the sausage is seasoned and aged for a minimum of 12 weeks, a time-honored practice that allows the flavors to develop. The Salami is then cold smoked with applewood, imparting a distinctive taste we haven't found in other salami. It's produced without added nitrates or nitrites (except those naturally occurring in celery juice and sea salt), and available only at your neighbhorhood Trader Joe's. We're selling each four ounce Uncured Applewood Smoked Salami for $3.69, a phenomenal value. You'll find it in our refrigerated case. 09.25. 17
059152.name: Salami Smkd Abf
059152.title: Uncured Applewood Smoked Salami

060185.description: We love deli meat. Whether we're putting it between bread and calling it a sandwich, pairing it with sliced cheeses on a platter, or simply enjoying a slice as a lean-protein-laden snack, it brings smiles to our faces. For even happier faces, we choose deli meats without added preservatives like nitrites or nitrates. And for the happiest faces of all, we look for organic deli meats made from turkeys that haven't been treated with hormones (per federal regulations) or antibiotics - ever. Trader Joe's Organic Oven Roasted Turkey Breast fits into all these categories, so please forgive us if we can't seem to wipe the smiles from our faces. Trader Joe's Organic Oven Roasted Turkey Breast is sliced and "shingled" in an easy-to-open-and-reseal package, so they're a snap to use/eat. These thin, lightly salted, oven-roasted slices come from turkeys raised on an all-vegetarian diet in a free range environment. While we can't prove it, we'd like to postulate that happier turkeys lead to tastier deli meat. But don't take our word for it - pay a visit to our refrigerated cases and put this Organic Oven Roasted Turkey Breast to the test. We're selling each six-ounce package for $4.99. 01.01. 18
060185.name: Slcd Turkey Rsted Org
060185.title: Organic Oven Roasted Turkey Breast

060335.description: At Trader Joe's, we're somewhat known for our diverse, flavorful assortment of fully-cooked sausages. From Chicken Jalapeño [sku 28285] to Bavarian Bratwurst [sku 57632], we've got quite the assortment, but we did notice an area of oversight: Organic. Trader Joe's Organic Sweet Italian Chicken Sausage is here to fill that void with flavor and style. These Sausages are made with ground chicken, sweet Italian seasoning, basil, garlic, and celery powder. The mixture is stuffed by hand into natural casing and hung on racks, where it cooks at a low temperature for a long period of time. After cooking to perfection, the casing is removed and the sweet-smoky sausages are ready to enjoy. With its fairly versatile profile, our Sweet Italian Chicken Sausage is prepared to complement any and every meal you have in mind-all you'll have to do is heat and serve. Add it to Spinach Tortellini [sku 95231] and Marinara Sauce [sku 01628] for a quick yet impressive Italian meal. Grill and serve on a bun with your favorite condiments, use to stuff squash or mushrooms, or slice and cook in a skillet with potatoes, peppers, and onions. Despite its "organic" attribute, you'll still find Trader Joe's Organic Sweet Italian Chicken Sausage at a Trader Joe's value. We're selling each 12-ounce package of five sausages for $5.99, every day. 12.04. 17
060335.name: Sausage Org Ital Chicken
060335.title: Organic Sweet Italian Chicken Sausage

060520.description: Let's get to the meat of the matter: your choice of deli meat can make or break a sandwich. That's why we find ourselves turning, time and time again, to the Columbus line of lunch meats. Savory, flavorful, and perfectly textured, each pack feels like it's been carved fresh from the deli counter. Take Columbus Calabrese Salame, for example: it's soft-textured, finely marbled Salame made from coarsely ground pork, generously spiced with crushed red pepper in the traditional Calabrese style. In other words, precisely the kind of hot Salame you'd want to turn an ordinary sandwich into a dynamic deli experience. You can use Columbus Calabrese Salame to accentuate the flavors of your other sandwich ingredients, or go all the way with the spice and make s a sandwich with just this Salame (perhaps with some added Hot & Sweet Jalapeños [sku 56688] to really turn up the heat). You can use it to top a pizza for an even-spicier riff on pepperoni. Whatever you choose to do with it, you can find 5-ounce packs of Columbus Calabrese Salame in the deli section of your neighborhood Trader Joe's, every day. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Columbus® Calabrese Salame
060520.name: Slcd Hot Calabrese Columbus
060520.title: Salami Sliced Hot Calabrese Columbus

062666.description: We love deli meat. Putting it between bread and calling it a sandwich, pairing it with sliced cheeses on a platter, or simply enjoying a slice as a lean-protein-laden snack... we see a win in each of these scenarios. Our commitment to quality means that for deli meats with the Trader Joe's name on them, we choose meats without added preservatives like nitrates or nitrites, and when we can, we source organic meat raised without hormones (federal regulations prohibit added hormones in poultry) or antibiotics. Trader Joe's Organic Oven Roasted Chicken Breast is a perfect fit here; plus, it tastes great! This Organic Oven Roasted Breast is sliced and "shingled" in a resealable package for ease of use. The delicately flavored meat is thinly sliced, ideal for piling high on a sandwich. This is firm, full muscle chicken; no overly processed poultry here... No matter how you enjoy it, you're geting a great deal. We're selling each six ounce package of six slices for $4.99*, every day. You'll find it in our refrigerated case. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Oven Roasted Chicken Breast
062666.name: Sliced Chicken Organic Roasted
062666.title: Organic Oven Roasted Chicken Breast

062667.description: We love deli meat. Putting it between bread and calling it a sandwich, pairing it with sliced cheeses on a platter, or simply enjoying a slice as a lean-protein-laden snack... we see a win in each of these scenarios. Our commitment to quality means that for deli meats with the Trader Joe's name on them, we choose meats without added preservatives like nitrates or nitrites, and when we can, we source organic meat raised without hormones (federal regulations prohibit added hormones in poultry) or antibiotics. Trader Joe's Organic Hickory Smoked Turkey Breast is a perfect fit here; plus, it tastes great! This Organic Hickory Smoked Turkey Breast is sliced and "shingled" in a resealable package for ease of use. The delicately smoky meat is thinly sliced, ideal for piling high on a sandwich. You could even gild the turkey with a slice of smoked cheese... No matter how you enjoy it, you're geting a great deal. We're selling each six ounce package of six slices for $4.99*, every day. You'll find it in our refrigerated case. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Hickory Smoked Turkey Breast
062667.name: Sliced Turkey Organic Smoked
062667.title: Organic Hickory Smoked Turkey Breast

062668.description: You may be able to find a decent-tasting sliced ham, but it's a more challenging endeavor to find one with all the right attributes. If you care about where your ham comes from and how exactly it's prepared, you'll be delighted to find Trader Joe's Organic Black Forest Ham-and organic is only the beginning¿ Our Black Forest Ham is crate free, which means it comes from pigs not restrained in small "gestation" crates while pregnant-nor are they moved to "farrowing" crates to give birth and nurse their young. Instead, these pigs are free to roam outdoors. And, they're fed an entirely vegetarian diet, which includes no animal by- products. They also receive no hormones (actually, federal regulations prohibit added hormones in pork), and they are given no antibiotics, ever. All this adds up to a pork product that can be certified Organic by the USDA. The Organic pork is seasoned with a gluten free brine of water, sea salt, organic honey & sugars, and organic vinegar-then "tumbled" to distribute the seasonings evenly throughout the meat. Though this brining is a "curing" of sorts, the resulting Ham is actually considered Uncured, since no nitrates or nitrites are used (except those found naturally occurring in cultured celery powder and sea salt). What really brings the flavors together is the final step: a slow, low-heat smoking over hickory coals to impart a delicious, wood-smoked aroma & taste. This step also eliminates that extra moisture you sometimes find in packaged deli meats. Sliced thin, our attribute-packed Ham is ready for anything-sandwiches, eggs, Chicken Cordon Bleu, pizza¿ We're selling the six-ounce package of Trader Joe's Organic Uncured Black Forest Ham for $4.99. You'll find it in our refrigerators with our other deli meats.
062668.name: Sliced Ham Organic Black Forest
062668.title: Organic Uncured Black Forest Ham

067277.description: Whether it's Trader Joe's private label products or the products from other brands that we choose to carry in our stores, we're always on the lookout for improvements. Recently, we came across the opportunity to switch from the conventional Columbus Rotisserie Seasoned Chicken Breast [sku 93901] we've been carrying in our deli section to a version with some notable improvements. The replacement is still called Columbus Rotisserie Seasoned Chicken Breast, and it maintains many of the qualities we loved about its predecessor. For instance, it's made with whole chicken breasts that have been browned in oil and slow-roasted to maintain the best flavor. It's also, still gluten free with no MSG & 0g trans fat per serving. What's new is the fact that this Chicken comes from chickens raised without any antibiotics, ever. It also has no added nitrites or nitrates-except those naturally occurring in sea salt and cultured celery powder. In order to offer this upgraded deli meat at a Trader Joe's value, we've slightly lowered the weight-and correspondingly, the price. Each seven-ounce package of antibiotic free Columbus Rotisserie Seasoned Chicken Breast (with a re-sealable flap, just like the original product) is now $4.49 (versus the previous eight- ounce version at $4.99). Find it every day in our refrigerators with the rest of our delicious deli meats!
067277.name: Sliced Chicken Breast Rotisserie Abf Columbus

068225.description: Whether you're following a specialized diet, you always find yoursef on the go, or you're just looking for something quick and delicious to enjoy for lunch, Trader Joe's Protein Palette is something you'll want to add to your shopping list. It's a simple enough assortment, and we think one you'll return to again and again. Inside each Protein Palette are three individual compartments; one containing a stack of slices of Italian Dry Pepper Coated Uncured Salami, one containing Parmesan Cheese Crisps, and one containing roasted & salted California-grown almonds. It's a savory and satisfying selection of protein and fat-forward foods that you can enjoy in myriad ways - try the components one compartment at a time, or mix and match to combine different flavors in ways most pleasing to your palette! You'll find our Protein Palette in a 3.52 ounce package in our refrigerated case, every day. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Protein Palette
068225.name: Snack Pack Pepper Salami Almond Cheese Bites
068225.title: Protein Palette With Italian Dry Pepper Coated Uncured Salami, Roasted Salted Almonds, And Parmesan Cheese Crisps _______________________ The Descriptor Sentence Needs To Be At Least 1/3 The Height Of The Largest Font On The Pdp

069812.description: Summer just isn't quite summer without a few hot dogs sizzling on the grill. And in order to ensure that our refrigerators stayed well supplied with 'dogs for the remainder of the season, we worked with A&H®, one of the foremost suppliers of kosher deli meats in the country, to bring in a limited supply of their famed Kosher Beef Hot Dogs. Over the course of their over 65 year history, A&H has perfected their kosher meat craft, and you can taste it in every snappy, savory bite of their Kosher Dogs. Made from kosher beef and a blend of spices and seasonings including mustard and paprika, A&H® Kosher Beef Hot Dogs come fully cooked and ready to heat using whichever method you choose. We find the satisfying texture and juicy, all-beef flavor of an A&H Dog hot off the barbecue to be the best, but don't let that limit you: they're also delicious when split, flattened, pan-fried, and served in a sandwich with mustard and a heaping pile of Sauerkraut with Pickled Persian Cucumbers [sku 53094]. While supplies last, we're selling 14-ounce packs of A&H® Kosher Beef Hot Dogs, each pack containing seven Dogs, for $5.99*. Look for them in our deli section, with our other hot dog offerings. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. A&H® Kosher Beef Hot Dogs
069812.name: Hot Dog Kosher Beef A&H

072017.description: A palette is that thin, flat, roundish piece of wood (with thumb-hole for gripping), dotted with primary hues and smeared with a mingling of pigments-at the ready for the color-loving artist. Over time, this tool becomes art itself, with its blending of colors and build up of impasto strokes. Like the artist's palette (and like our previous Salad Palette with Mango [sku 57190]), Trader Joe's Salad Palette Super Greens also begins with vibrant, separated colors-this time cooler shades: crunchy broccoli with a gradient of green; rustic, earth-toned walnuts; smooth light-green edamame and peas; dark-shaded, trimmed, green beans; all surrounding a bright white feta cheese in the center. You (The Artist) are invited to mix and mingle, turn and toss all these fresh ingredients, until they're an edible work of art, worthy of your personal palate (as in: 'sense of taste'). All these colors rest on a canvas of more "greens"-spinach, kale, and other greens... (exact mix may vary by region and season.) Of course, no work of art is complete without a signature; that's our Avocado Citrus Dressing. Like a well-lit painting on the gallery wall, Trader Joe's Salad Palette Super Greens is something to behold, as it beckons to be consumed. The difference is, once your eyes appreciate this Salad's beauty, you also get to appreciate it from another angle-and that's whatever angle your fork happens to enter your mouth. Each fresh, beautiful, delicious, 10 ounce Salad Palette is $4.99. 05.22. 17
072017.name: Tray Salami & Prvlone Citterio
072017.title: Trader Joe All Natural Genoa Salame & Provolone Cheese 6Oz

072671.description: Let's get to the meat of the matter: your choice of deli meat can make or break a sandwich. That's why we find ourselves turning, time and time again, to the Columbus line of lunch meats. Savory, flavorful, and perfectly textured, each pack feels like it's been carved fresh from the deli counter. Take Columbus Peppered Salame, for example: it's delicious, flavorful, Italian-style salame, hand-rolled in coarse-cracked black peppercorns. The spice of the pepper contrasts perfectly with the sumptuous flavor and satisfyingly marbled consistency of the salame, creating an overall flavor profile that adds a real zing to a sandwich or charcuterie plate. Don't be afraid to get experimental: this Peppered Salame can create an interplay of flavors with a surprisingly broad variety of other foods. When added to a sandwich, it accentuates the savoriness of roast beef or ham. When paired with mild cheeses or antipasto, the pepper and delightfully rich salame brings out all kinds of notes you wouldn't find elsewhere. It's almost like a condiment and a protein all at the same time. Next time you're thinking of making of a sandwich or an appetizer platter, think of Columbus Peppered Salame, available at your local Trader Joe's in a ten-ounce resealable bag. You can find them in our deli section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Columbus Peppered Salame
072671.name: Slcd Salami Ppred Columbus
072671.title: Salami Sliced Peppered Columbus

073662.description: Dinner's ready! And what's at the center of the plate? Why, Trader Joe's Sous Vide Turkey Breast Tenderloins, of course! Sous vide (literally "under vacuum" in French) is a cooking method that involves vacuum-sealing food, immersing the sealed package in water, and cooking it at a precisely controlled temperature for a very specific amount of time. This approach always yields a remarkably moist and tender result. And the boneless, skinless, all-white-meat Turkey Tenderloins in our package are no exception! We've done the sous-viding for you, including a simple seasoning of sea salt, and garlic & onion powders. This means the Turkey Breast Tenderloins are ready to eat after only a quick warm-up in your skillet or microwave. It also means they're incredibly versatile, ready to be sauced, skewered, shredded-or served almost any way you fancy. Speaking of fancy, that's exactly how you're going to feel when you announce to your family in your best Franglish that the "Dinde sous vide de Trader Joe's is sur la table!" Sous Vide Turkey Breast Tenderloins
073662.name: Turkey Tender Tips Sous Vide Abf
073662.title: Sous Vide Turkey Breast Tenderloins

074047.description: Dinner's ready! And what's at the center of the plate? Why, Trader Joe's Sous Vide Chicken Thighs, of course! Sous vide (literally "under vacuum" in French) is a cooking method that involves vacuum-sealing food, immersing the sealed package in water, and cooking it at a precisely controlled temperature for a very specific amount of time. This approach always yields a remarkably moist and tender result. And the boneless, skinless Chicken Thighs in our package are no exception! We've done the sous-viding for you, including a simple and subtle seasoning of sea salt. This means that Trader Joe's Sous Vide Chicken Thighs are ready to eat after only a quick warm-up in your skillet or microwave. It also means they're incredibly versatile, ready to be sauced, skewered, shredded-or served any way you fancy. Speaking of fancy, that's exactly how you're going to feel when you announce to your family in your best Franglish that the "Poulet sous vide de Trader Joe's is sur la table!" Sous Vide Chicken Thighs
074047.name: Chicken Thigh Boneless Sous Vide Abf
074047.title: Sous Vide Chicken Thighs

074048.description: After 10 years as one of the MVPs of the TJ's cheese case, one might think that our Unexpected Cheddar's [sku 96923] ability to surprise would have waned, somewhat. Then Trader Joe's Unexpected Cheddar Chicken Sausage came along. Which isn't to say that it's necessarily shocking that cheese and chicken go well together, of course, but the degree to which this Parmesan-like Cheddar pairs with the flavor of savory-seasoned, lightly smoked chicken, sweet bits of caramelized onions and red pepper, and the satisfying snap of a natural pork casing? That's nothing short of astonishing. Fully cooked and ready to reheat, Trader Joe's Unexpected Cheddar Chicken Sausages can be grilled, steamed, or pan-fried, and serve beautifully on a toasty, buttery bun-especially when adorned with Whole Grain Dijon Mustard [sku 99343] or Organic Sweet Pickle Relish [sku 69361]. They're also delicious when sliced into rounds, sautéed, and mixed into hearty soups, breakfast hashes, and creamy pastas dishes. And if you're feeling really spontaneous, or extra cheesy (or both), it's especially tasty when served hot with a sprinkling of melty Shredded Unexpected Cheddar [sku 65191] on top. Unexpected Cheddar Chicken Sausage
074048.name: Sausage Chicken Unexpected Cheddar
074048.title: Unexpected Cheddar Chicken Sausage

074578.description: Meatballs are so much more than just a topping for spaghetti. In fact, they may be one of the more versatile forms of protein around. As Trader Joe's Chicken Meatballs demonstrate (to a decidedly delicious degree, we might add) a good meatball delivers tender texture, deeply savory flavor, and affords the opportunity for all kinds of rich, aromatic seasonings. True to form, Trader Joe's Chicken Meatballs can be enjoyed in all kinds of culinary situations, be it in a stir-fry, sandwich, or soup, or even simply enjoyed on their own, accompanied by your favorite dipping sauce, as a quick and easy appetizer. They're made especially for us by a supplier who uses all natural, ground chicken breast and thigh meat, seasons it with oregano, basil, and black pepper, and hand-crafts it into ideal, one-or-two-bite sized Meatballs before fully cooking them. That means, once they reach your home, all you need to worry about is reheating them, which can be done on your stovetop, or in the microwave, oven, or air fryer in a matter of minutes. Easy, versatile, and delicious? We suppose it's no wonder that these Chicken Meatballs are so well-rounded. Chicken Meatballs
074578.name: Chicken Meatballs Abf

074911.description: Trader Joe's Uncured Apple Smoked Bacon is made without added sodium nitrite or sodium nitrate, two ingredients commonly used in the curing of bacon. This means that our Uncured Apple Smoked Bacon is technically "uncured." Rather than use chemical curing agents, ours is smoked over real applewood, giving it a distinctive, delicious, downright decadent flavor. However, our recipe includes sea salt and celery powder, which contain naturally occurring nitrites. This is thickly sliced bacon that's appropriate with eggs for breakfast, with lettuce and tomatoes for a BLT, in wraps, on salads... You can cook it as you'd cook any bacon, though our current favorite cooking method involves cooking on a foil-lined baking sheet in a 400° oven for about 15 minutes - this nets the most delicious result. (We suggest you place it in a cold oven and let it cook while the oven heats; exact timing will vary, so stay close in the final few minutes to avoid burning.) *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Uncured Apple Smoked Bacon
074911.name: Bacon Applewood Uncu
074911.title: Uncured Apple Smoked Bacon

074967.description: In order to 'pull' meat, it must be cooked low & slow. This patient approach yields a fully cooked protein that is lean, tender, and extra flavorful. And being shredded, it's easy to pile on plates or stack on sandwich buns. Unfortunately, not everyone has the time & tools to make pulled meat themselves. That's why we created Trader Joe's Hardwood Smoked Pulled Chicken. It possesses all the charms of chicken you've smoked & pulled yourself-minus all the hours & effort! To create this authentic Pulled Chicken, our supplier seasons white chicken meat with garlic, paprika, salt & pepper-plus a special seasoning blend that includes ginger, cinnamon, and nutmeg. The seasoned Chicken is then smoked in a small-batch rotisserie smoker, using actual hardwood logs (no wood chips, and no liquid smoke). Once cooked, it's shredded and packaged for Trader Joe's. When you open the package at home, you'll find a pouch inside that you can simply pierce and microwave on a dish for about three minutes. Or if you prefer, you can pour the contents of the pouch onto an oven-safe plate, cover with foil, and pop it in your conventional oven at 350°F for about 20 minutes. Either way, you'll end up with savory, smoky, melt-in-your-mouth Pulled Chicken that's ready in no time to toss with TJ's Organic Kansas City BBQ Sauce [sku 63486] and serve on a TJ's Brioche Bun [sku 61752], or Sweet Pull-Apart Aloha Roll [sku 58641]. Hardwood Smoked Pulled Chicken
074967.name: Hardwood Smoked Pulled Chicken

074968.description: In order to 'pull' meat, it must be cooked low & slow. This patient approach yields a fully cooked protein that is lean, tender, and extra flavorful. And being shredded, it's easy to pile on plates or stack on sandwich buns. Unfortunately, not everyone has the time & tools to make pulled meat themselves. That's why we created Trader Joe's Hardwood Smoked Pulled Pork. It possesses all the pleasures of pork you've smoked & pulled yourself-minus all the hours & effort! To create this authentic Pulled Pork, our supplier seasons the meat with dehydrated garlic, onion powder, sea salt & white pepper-plus a special seasoning blend that includes light brown sugar, molasses, maple syrup, and coffee. The seasoned Pork is then smoked in a small-batch rotisserie smoker, using actual hardwood logs (no wood chips, and no liquid smoke). Once cooked, it's shredded and packaged for Trader Joe's. When you open the package at home, you'll find a pouch inside that you can simply pierce and microwave on a dish for about three minutes. Or if you prefer, you can pour the contents of the pouch onto an oven-safe plate, cover with foil, add three tablespoons of water or sauce, and pop it in your conventional oven at 350°F for about 20 minutes. Either way, you'll end up with savory, smoky, melt-in-your-mouth Pulled Pork that's ready in no time to toss with TJ's Hatch Valley Salsa [sku 53680] and serve in our Organic Stone Ground Yellow Corn Taco Shells [sku 69808], or your favorite TJ's flour tortillas. Hardwood Smoked Pulled Pork
074968.name: Hardwood Smoked Pulled Pork

075270.description: At Trader Joe's, we're somewhat known for our diverse, flavorful assortment of fully-cooked Chicken Sausages, and Trader Joe's Sweet Apple Chicken Sausages have been a Customer fave for fifteen years and counting! Made with minimally processed, flavorful chicken leg meat, large pieces of chopped apples, pure Vermont maple syrup, and a hint of cinnamon spice, sweet-'n-savory TJ's Sweet Apple Chicken Sausages are a perfect addition to a protein-packed breakfast plate (adding 11g of protein to the mix per sausage); great for a light lunch or dinner; and ideal for adding to holiday sides - sausage stuffing, anyone? We're selling each 12-ounce package of five TJ's Sweet Apple Chicken Sausages for $3.99,* every day. Look for them in our refrigerated deli section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Sweet Apple Chicken Sausage
075270.name: Sausage Chicken Sweet Apple
075270.title: Sweet Apple Chicken Sausage

075847.description: The charcuterie board is always enticing, with its array of sliced meats and cheeses, prepped to be piled on assorted biscuits. As impressive as a board can be, the inventor of "rolloni" really took charcuterie snacking up a notch or two. Trader Joe's first embraced this rolled charcuterie concept with our holiday Rolloni Meat & Cheese Tray [sku 63390], and we've now built on that product's popularity with an everyday offering that we call Trader Joe's Prosciutto Wrapped Fresh Mozzarella Cheese. Aside from its obviously charming built-in 'handle,' this stick-shaped antipasto boasts some additional charms. For example, the cheese here is Fresh & silky, replacing the firm mozzarella that is most often used in similar rolled charcuterie. Also, that Fresh Mozzarella is Wrapped in imported, eleven-month aged Prosciutto, presenting a rich, flavorful bite. Whether you're entertaining a crowd, or simply craving quick cheese & charcuterie, our Prosciutto Wrapped Fresh Mozzarella Cheese is a truly handy, no-cracker-required nibble that is sure to please. Deli-icious! Prosciutto Wrapped Fresh Mozzarella Cheese
075847.name: Prosciutto Wrapped Mozzarella
075847.title: Prosciutto Wrapped Fresh Mozzarella Cheese

076253.description: Who doesn't love the meaty bite, savorily seasoned character, and ease of preparation that characterize the hot dog-especially when backyard chefs begin firing up the grill. And when it comes to Trader Joe's Organic Uncured Grass Fed Beef Hot Dogs, that love even extends to what goes into making this beloved tubular meat. Generally speaking, hot dogs are notorious for containing questionable ingredients, but ours have an incredibly attractive and uncomplicated list of ingredients. The very first ingredient is USDA certified Organic Beef that comes from Grass Fed cows, yielding delicious flavor. You'll also find sea salt and celery powder in the ingredients. These serve not so much as flavoring, but to effectively "cure" our Uncured Dogs, allowing us to leave out unwanted preservatives, such as nitrates & nitrites. What else goes into our Organic Uncured Grass Fed Beef Hot Dogs? The rest of the ingredients are all organic seasonings, things like garlic puree, minced onion, paprika, and red pepper flakes. No fillers. No kidding. Organic Uncured Grass Fed Beef Hot Dogs
076253.name: Hot Dog Uncured Beef Organic
076253.title: Organic Uncured Grass Fed Beef Hot Dogs

076779.description: At Trader Joe's, we're often in the enviable position of having products our customers love. Sometimes, that love results in sales volumes that leave our suppliers struggling to keep up with demand. In these situations, we'll often search for additional suppliers, to ensure a more robust supply of product for our customers. That's the story behind Trader Joe's No Sugar Uncured Applewood Smoked Bacon. Our new No Sugar Uncured Applewood Smoked Bacon has an intentionally short ingredient list: pork, water, sea salt, cultured celery root powder. That's it! Made without added sodium nitrite or sodium nitrate (two ingredients commonly used in the curing of bacon), there's also no added sugar. And since our supplier starts with vegetarian-fed pork that was raised crate free and without the use of antibiotics or hormones, and smokes it over real Applewood, when you take a bite of this Bacon, you're going to really taste the Bacon-no sugar, just pure Smoked pork deliciousness. Cook up as few or as many slices of Bacon as you like to your desired level of crispiness for a sensational start to your day. Or pivot to lunch and add a few slices to BLTs, club sandwiches, and burgers. Crumble over baked potatoes, tacos, and pizza. Before throwing a pack of Uncured Beef Hot Dogs [sku 89703] on the grill, wrap each in a slice of No Sugar Uncured Applewood Smoked Bacon for LA-style street dogs in your own backyard! No Sugar Uncured Applewood Smoked Bacon
076779.name: Bacon Abf No Sugar Applewood

076868.description: In addition to developing foods with high-quality ingredients that are combined using exceptional recipes, we are also keen to develop Trader Joe's products that are convenient, time-saving meal solutions for our customers. Trader Joe's Pulled Chicken Salsa Verde is one of those products that checks all the boxes! Similar to Trader Joe's Smoked Pulled Chicken [sku 74967], this Pulled Chicken recipe begins with seasoned, boneless, skinless Chicken breast. But here, the meat isn't smoked. It's seasoned with salt, white pepper, and garlic & onion powders, then slow-cooked in a Salsa Verde that includes roasted tomatillos, green chiles, cilantro, onion and garlic. The fully cooked meat is then shredded, so its really easy to tuck into tacos, burritos, quesadillas, or to pile on top of chips for nachos. And it'll save you time on a busy weeknight, since all it takes to prepare is about four minutes in the microwave. Add a couple more minutes to that if you'd prefer to heat it in a saucepan on the stovetop. Either way, you'll have a terrifically tender & flavorful protein you can use in a wide variety of simple, satisfying ways. There is one more box we like to check on every Trader Joe's product-and that's the value box. What that means for Trader Joe's Pulled Chicken Salsa Verde is that you get a full pound of delicious, heat & eat protein for $8.99. You'll find it in our refrigerators, every day. Pulled Chicken Salsa Verde
076868.name: Pulled Chicken Chili Verde
076868.title: Pulled Chicken Salsa Verde

077697.description: Trader Joe's Traditional Carnitas are a gem sent from up-above. Well, not literally actually. The idea didn't just come from thin air, we were inspired by the people of Michoacán. The Mexican cuisine, Carnitas literally means "little meats" in Spanish. To transform our pork into "little meats", we used a marinate out of water and orange juice to make it moist and tender enough to pull it apart in shreds. The pork is oven roasted and fully- cooked before it hits our stores. This way, all we have to do is heat and serve. You definitely can eat Traditional Carnitas alone, as an entree with some beans and rice. However, we recommend to spice it up with chopped onions, cilantro and shredded cheese drizzled with salsa, all inside Corn Tortillas [sku 92394]. In the mood for something other than tacos, but still have some Carnitas in the fridge? No problem. Mix the shredded meat in a bowl or pan with TJ's Organic Kansas City BBQ Sauce [sku 63486] and slaw stuffed in Sweet Pull Apart Aloha Rolls [sku 58641]. If you're in the mood for something even less traditional, throw it on pizza. You'll find each 12-ounce pack of Trader Joe's Traditional Carnitas in our refrigerated deli meats case. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Traditional Carnitas
077697.name: Pork Carnitas Fully Cooked

078798.description: Columbus Roasted Turkey Breast is a sliced turkey breast made to taste as though a whole turkey breast was carved right before your eyes at your finest neighborhood butcher shop. The only difference is that Columbus is the meat merchant and Trader Joe's is that neighborhood shop. Columbus Roasted Turkey Breast brings the slow-roasted turkey greatness from abattoir to aisles without sacrificing an ounce of premium ingredients and hearty flavor - and even tossing in a sprinkle of convenience, free of charge! Each resealable container-full begins with whole turkey breasts that are slowly roasted to lock in that delightfully fresh and light turkey flavor. The skin is generously seasoned which adds a savory, salty, and paprika-forward note to every slice of the Roasted Turkey Breast. And luckily, when you've grabbed all that you need, the packaging has easy-to-peel and easy-to-seal corners for you to conveniently keep your deli-delights under wraps until you're ready for your next sandwich snacking session. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Columbus Roasted Turkey Breast
078798.name: Slcd Turkey Breast Rsted Columbus

079033.description: While most folks would probably peg the hamburger as the most representative American food, we'd have to throw our support behind the humble hot dog. Aside from its close association with baseball (the American national pastime) and summertime (arguably the most American season, though that's another topic altogether), only pizza comes close to the hot dog in its proliferation of regional variation throughout these United States. Practically every major American state and city has their own specific spin on hot dogs, from the vibrantly vegetal Chicago dog, to the chili-and-onion-smothered dogs of Coney Island, to the bacon-wrapped hot dogs of Los Angeles. And so, to help celebrate the holistically American hot dog, we proudly offer Trader Joe's Uncured Beef Hot Dogs, to be enjoyed in whatever preparation you prefer-from sea to shining sea. Our all-Beef, Uncured Hot Dogs contain no added nitrates or nitrates (except those that occur naturally in sea salt and cultured celery powder), and cook up wonderfully well on the grill, in the frying pan, or immersed in boiling water (or beer, we should add!). Once heated through, they have a fantastically snappy texture to their bite, and take well to all kinds of condiments and fixings. No matter which regional variation you subscribe to, or even if you just enjoy it with a simple drizzle of ketchup and/or mustard, our Hot Dog Buns [sku 98214], and Brioche Hot Dog Buns [sku 66433] will make an invaluable vehicle for them. Uncured Beef Hot Dogs
079033.name: Hot Dog Uncured Beef
079033.title: Uncured Beef Hot Dogs

081594.description: We don't think a quick lunch needs to be at the sacrifice of great flavor, convenience, or premium ingredients. But with so many choices, especially in your local Trader Joe's trading post, the options are daunting! To solve your dilemma, Trader Joe's Oven Roasted Turkey Breast delivers a simple answer to the question, "what's for lunch?" Sourced with family farm raised turkeys that are allowed plenty of space to roam in an enriched environment with a strictly vegetarian diet, Trader Joe's Oven Roasted Turkey Breast offers a minimally processed sandwich meat packaged in a handy tray with easy-to-peel and easy-to-seal corners! Full turkey breasts are tumbled in a short ingredient list of water, sea salt, cane syrup, vinegar, and carrageenan and then roasted to ensure a moist, meaty ribbon of deli sliced turkey breast. After that, what you do with your Oven Roasted Turkey Breast is left down to your cage-free imagination... succulent sandwiches, scrumptious salads, deli dips, fresh cheeses... *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Oven Roasted Turkey Breast
081594.name: Slcd Turkey Rsted
081594.title: Sliced Oven Roasted Turkey Breast

081596.description: We don't think a quick lunch needs to be at the sacrifice of great flavor, convenience, or premium ingredients. But with so many choices, especially in your local Trader Joe's trading post, the options are daunting! To solve your dilemma, Trader Joe's Smoked Turkey Breast delivers a simple answer to the question, "what's for lunch?" Sourced with family farm raised turkeys that are allowed plenty of space to roam in an enriched environment with a strictly vegetarian diet, Trader Joe's Smoked Turkey Breast offers a minimally processed sandwich meat packaged in a handy tray with easy-to-peel and easy-to-seal corners! Full turkey breasts are tumbled in a short ingredient list of water, sea salt, cane syrup, vinegar, and carrageenan and then smoked to ensure a moist, meaty ribbon of deli sliced turkey breast. After that, what you do with your Smoked Turkey Breast is left down to your cage-free imagination... succulent sandwiches, scrumptious salads, deli dips, fresh cheeses... *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Smoked Turkey Breast
081596.name: Slcd Turkey Smkd
081596.title: Smoked Turkey Breast

085919.description: In the early 20th century, immigrants Peter Domenici and Enrico Parducci moved from one coastal region (the Gulf of Genoa, Italy) to another (North Beach neighborhood of San Francisco, U.S.A.) to found the "Columbus® San Francisco Sausage Company." Today, Columbus® Foods is a successful purveyor of fine salame and meats, all made from authentic, Old World Italian recipes with an artisan flair. Columbus Italian Dry Salame is one of several offerings you'll find at Trader Joe's. It's an eight-ounce "chunk" (flat-cut, not round on both ends) made from an adapted, Milano-style salame recipe. Select cuts of pork have been raised without added hormones and combined with cracked black pepper and a signature blend of spices. California red wine has also been added, lending a rich aroma and flavor. And the slow-curing (21 to 33 days) develops a nice, mild bite. Find Columbus Italian Dry Salame in our refrigerators with the rest of our deli meats. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Columbus® Italian Dry Salame
085919.name: Salami Chunk Columbus

086863.description: These three great, old fashioned smoked/cooked meats have sold very well for the past few years in our West Coast stores, and now our supplier of these fine products has increased their production capacity and found a way to supply us nationally at the same great everyday prices! In addition to the great product claims listed above, know that both the Pastrami and Roast Beef are 96% lean, and the Black Forest Ham is 98% lean. The Pastrami and Black Forest Ham have been hickory smoked the old fashioned way - low and slow over real hickory wood chips - and the Roast Beef has been oven roasted in a similar time-honored method.
086863.name: Slcd Ham Black Forest Uncured
086863.title: Uncured Black Forest Ham

087654.description: Columbus Reduced Sodium Turkey Breast is a sliced turkey breast made to taste as though a whole turkey breast was carved right before your eyes at your finest neighborhood butcher shop. The only difference is that Columbus is the meat merchant and Trader Joe's is that neighborhood shop. Columbus Reduced Sodium Turkey Breast brings the slow-roasted turkey greatness from abattoir to aisles without sacrificing an ounce of premium ingredients and hearty flavor - and even tossing in a sprinkle of convenience, free of charge! Each resealable container-full begins with whole turkey breasts that are slowly roasted to lock in that delightfully fresh and light turkey flavor. The skin is generously seasoned which adds a savory and paprika-forward note to every slice of the Reduced Sodium Turkey Breast. However, for those more conscious of their sodium intake, this lunch meat option has 54% less sodium based on USDA turkey breast data. And luckily, when you've grabbed all that you need, the packaging has easy-to-peel and easy-to-seal corners for you to conveniently keep your deli-delights under wraps until you're ready for your next sandwich snacking session. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Columbus Reduced Sodium Turkey Breast
087654.name: Slcd Turkey Breast Ov Rsted Ls Cbs
087654.title: Sliced Oven Rstd Turkey Breast Low Sodium

092894.description: What do you do when you're craving the scrumptiously spicy cucina that ol' nonna used to make when you were a youngster, but looking for a lower fat poultry alternative to your pork sausages? Well, look no further! Trader Joe's Spicy Italian Chicken Sausage is ready to stand up to the heartiest of dishes and even impart its own signature spiciness and classic Italian flavors into whatever your preparing. To get all those classic Spicy Italian Chicken Sausage flavors onto your plate, we start with boneless, skinless chicken that is coarsely ground. Then comes the fun flavor-adding stage where we add a seasoning combination of parsley, salt, fennel, red pepper, mustard, anise, and paprika and blend it all together with the ground chicken. Finally, this Spicy Italian Chicken Sausage mixture is stuffed into a natural hog casing, fully cooked, packaged, and ready to heat and serve once hitting the shelves of your neighborhood Trader Joe's. We fill each package with four three-ounce links to give you enough spicy Italian goodness to last for a few meals or a single family feast! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Spicy Italian Chicken Sausage
092894.name: Sausage Chicken Spicy Ital
092894.title: Spicy Italian Chicken Sausage

094262.description: Whether you're preparing a charcuterie platter or layering on the meats for an Italian-style sub, Daniele® Gourmet Deli Selection will help you get right to the meat of the matter. More specifically, it presents (quite beautifully we might add), mouthwatering slices of Calabrese Salame, Del Duca® Prosciutto, and Capocollo. These lovely slices of pork are crafted in the USA according to time-honored Italian traditions by Daniele, Inc.®, family-owned and -operated since 1945. The Calabrese Salame, dry cured for at least a month, has even marbling and rich, savory flavor. The Del Duca® Prosciutto, crafted using only pork, sea salt and time - lot's of time (aged for a minimum of 9 month), delivers sweet flavor and creamy texture. The Capocollo, made from the solid muscle between the head ("capo") and the shoulder ("collo"), is cured with just the right amount of seasoning and hung to age for up to 4 months, resulting in lean slices with fine marbling and delicate flavor. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Daniele® Gourmet Deli Selection Calabrese Salami, Del Duca® Prosciutto, Capocolla
094262.name: Tray Ital Combo Pack Daniele
094262.title: Tray Italian Combo Pack Daniele

094608.description: While everyone on this side of the Atlantic tends to drool over bacon, maybe a little more attention should be given to their cured pork belly cousin, pancetta. While we often see pancetta in paper-thin slices or a dense rolled slab, Citterio Pancetta Cubetti comes to us with small, cured cubes, ready to be used straight from the package or cooked and tossed into your favorite pork-needing recipes. Citterio Pancetta Cubetti is an all natural, minimally processed selection of meat made from the highest quality of imported lean pork cuts. Citterio takes those pork cuts and dry-rubs them with salt and a proprietary blend of spices then tightly rolls the pork into a salame slab. It is then ready for the cutting board and gets cubed for our convenience. Each bite of Citterio Pancetta Cubetti is bursting with a sweetly spiced goodness that can bring the taste of Italian cooking to all of your dishes. Add to any of our frozen pastas, complete salad kits, enjoy with veggies, or let them be an addition to any combination of ingredients you can find at your local Trader Joe's. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Citterio Pancetta Cubetti
094608.name: Pancetta Cubed Citterio
094608.title: Pancetta Cubes

096953.description: Sprouted Wheat & Honey Muffins Healthy, hearty, and packed with fiber and protein. Just the thing to start one off properly in the a.m. These are mildly sweet with honey, pineapple and raisins all contributing, with the occasionally pleasant pop from poppy seeds scattered throughout. The benefits of sprouted grains are all here! Increased vitamin content, ease of digestion, lower glycemic index, more protein and less starch. But all that aside, it's just a great muffin! We're selling each 19 oz package of 4 Trader Joe's Wheat & Honey Muffins for $4.99. Opens for orders July 4, 2011. Trader Joe's Company Bulletin06/29/2011 page 31 of 34 Confidential NEW ITEM Citterio Prosciutto di Parma Just the Facts... Date: June 29, 2011 Category Leader: Dustin Hopper Buyer: Heather Humble Label Description: Citterio Prosciutto di Parma Category: Deli SKU#: 96958 Pack/Unit Size 12/4 oz. net weight Our Retail: $5.99 Lowest Local
096953.name: Salami Prnti Gna/Prv Citterio
096953.title: Trader Joe'S All Natural Pronti Genoa Salame & Provolone Cheese

096958.description: Citterio sliced Prosciutto di Parma is made in the authentic Italian style, in the Parma region of Italy, where only this type of prosciutto can be made (and called Prosciutto di Parna). This time honored process includes the curing of select full muscle hams in this region's (and supplier's) traditional, unhurried aging program for more than one year¿a minimum of 420 days, to be exact. Prosciutto di Parma has a slightly nutty flavor from the Parmigiano Reggiano whey that is sometimes added to the pigs' diet. This natural product has been minimally processed and contains no artificial ingredients, nitrates/nitrites or other preservatives. Enjoy it all on its own or with crusty bread, pears, figs and melon! Trader Joe's Company Bulletin06/29/2011 page 32 of 34 Confidential
096958.name: Slcd Prosciutto Prma Citterio
096958.title: Prosciutto Sliced Parma Citterio 4 Oz

098857.description: Trader Joe's Smoked, Apple Chardonnay Chicken Sausage is like a warm-weather picnic in a sausage. It combines the flavors of smoked chicken, sweet apples and the citrus acidity of Chardonnay. Already fully cooked, these links need only to be warmed over medium heat. Whether you prepare them in a pan on the stove top, broil them in the oven, or toss them on the grill, in about 12-14 minutes these hearty beauties are ready to enjoy. These sausages are delightful served simply, with a fresh green salad or side of broccoli and a baguette. They are also great sliced and added to a simple dinner sauté (with veggies and your favorite grain of choice), a casserole, soup, or a cheesy one-pan pasta. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Smoked, Apple Chardonnay Chicken Sausage
098857.name: Sausage Chicken Smkd Apple Chardonnay
098857.title: Smoked Apple Chardonnay Chicken Sausage

098860.description: Our Sliced Rosemary Ham is authentic prosciutto cotto (cooked ham) made by a widely known Italian salumi creator, whose been committed to producing the finest quality prosciuttos for over a century. A Maestri Salumieri (master pork butcher) oversees the traditional preparation and deliberate slow roasting of select, full muscle hams in brick ovens. The bronze roasted hams are then rubbed with dried rosemary, garlic and a signature blend of authentic Italian spices to infuse the meat with delicate, aromatic richness. The meat is sliced thinly, making it ideal for mouthwatering sandwiches. But it is also perfect as part of an antipasto platter or cut and sprinkled onto a homemade pizza. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Sliced Rosemary Ham
098860.name: Slcd Ham Rosemary
098860.title: Sliced Rosemary Ham

098861.description: We like to think of prosciutto as ham that's had time to luxuriate in a spa for a year. If you can imagine how much better you'd be after a year in a spa, you can begin to imagine how delightful prosciutto can be. Trader Joe's Sliced Prosciutto lives up to this promise. Our Sliced Prosciutto is crafted for us by a well-known, award-winning Italian salumeri here in the U.S. They begin with full hams that are cured in the traditional Italian style, then allowed to age slowly for 10-12 months. As the hams age, their flavor intensifies and their character builds, resulting in richly-flavored Prosciutto that's outstanding on Panini with arugula & Asiago, a natural with melon for brunch or hors d'oeuvres and super on a pizza - try it with pesto or a cream-based sauce and inch-long cuts of asparagus. We're selling each four ounce package of Trader Joe's Sliced Prosciutto for $3.99, considerably less than you'll pay for comparable Prosciutto elsewhere. You'll find our in our refrigerated case.
098861.name: Slcd Prosciutto
098861.title: Sliced Prosciutto

021420.description: There is a misconception in the world of fresh pasta that we'd like to clear up here and now: it doesn't have to be expensive. There. We said it. If you peruse the refrigerated case at most markets, you'll see plenty of fresh pasta, and it's all overpriced. There. We said it again. Moreover, most of it doesn't even taste very good. Ooh, watch out¿we're on a roll. And now, for the really important part¿Trader Joe's fresh pastas are not expensive, and they taste really good. A taste of Trader Giotto's Cheese Tortellini will confirm this claim. Each bite-size pasta piece is generously filled with a savory blend of ricotta, Romano, and Parmesan cheeses. To encounter this Tortellini is to encounter Tortellini with flavors robust enough to stand on its own, with no sauce at all, yet also shine with a touch of olive oil, cream, or red sauce (like our Three Cheese Pomodoro Sauce [sku 64484], possibly). This is also an excellent choice served cold as the star of a pasta salad. Serve it as a brunch or barbecue-your guests need never know you paid a mere pittance for the pasta at the salad's center. About that price. We weren't joking around when we said not expensive. We never joke about such things. We're selling each 10-ounce package of Trader Giotto's Cheese Tortellini for $2.29, every day. We've looked around, and we don't think you'll find a better everyday value on fresh, filled pasta. You'll find it in our refrigerated case.
021420.name: Pasta Tortellini Cheese
021420.title: Cheese Tortellini

051827.description: We wanted to approach mushroom ravioli from a new angle-three angles to be exact. Trader Joe's Porcini Mushroom & Truffle Triangoli are just like their square cousins in every way-except these little pasta pil- lows have three sides not four. It's something different. And we think they're acute. This isosceles pasta is produced in Italy, exclusively for us. Our supplier mixes unbleached wheat flour, eggs, and durum wheat semolina for smooth and resilient dough that holds up in boiling water, even when rolled very thin. It forms the perfect package to showcase our filling, which consists of both sautéed and dried porcini mushrooms, shaved black truffles, toasted breadcrumbs, and a touch of fresh ricotta cheese. How does it taste? Though mushrooms and truffles are surprisingly unimpressive tasting when raw, introducing heat releases a wonderful earthy aroma and flavor. Three to four minutes in boiling water and you'll get that here! With such a savorful filling, we recommend enjoying this pasta with a lighter sauce. Try tossing freshly boiled al denté Triangoli in a little bit of Trader Joe's Tunisian Organic Unfiltered Olive Oil (sku# 51890). Then, top the hot pasta with a sprinkling of our Shredded Parmesan (sku# 85325). Add a simple green salad and dinner is served! Our 8.8-ounce package of Porcini Mushroom & Truffle Triangoli is $3.49. Find this fresh pasta in our refrigerated case.
051827.name: Pasta Ravioli Italian Porcini & Truffle
051827.title: Porcini Mushroom & Truffle Ravioli Thin Stuffed Pasta With Porcini Mushroom And Truffle

053425.description: During summer, the Italian countryside is blanketed in gold by fields of girasole (GEE-rah-so-LAY), known in English as sunflowers. The eponymous ravioli is cut to resemble the daisy-like flower heads. One might say, then, that Girasoli is the pasta of summer. We thought a summer pasta sounded sensational and wanted our Girasloli to capture the radiance and warmth of its namesake. We turned to our revered Italian pasta makers for a recipe. Committed to preserving regional culinary traditions, they presented us with a fine Ricotta & Lemon Zest Pasta in the style of Sicily, using real Sicilian lemons. It starts with classic, fresh, Italian pasta, made with only three ingredients: soft wheat flour, durum wheat semolina and egg. Tender and rich, the pasta glows golden, courtesy of the egg. Rolled thin and custom cut to resemble a sunflower, it is then filled with fresh ricotta, naturally creamy and slightly sweet, that is mixed with lemon zest and balanced with butter, bread crumbs and salt. The bite captures a sunny, summer day in Sicily. While all of the elements are essential, the lemons paint the picture. Grown in the volcanic soil around Mount Etna, the authentic Sicilian lemons have a bright acidity and distinct sweetness. Their zest gives a clean taste to the ricotta and bright character to the Girasoli. We think Trader Giotto's Girasoli Ricotta & Lemon Zest is best sauced lightly - with a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil and fresh chopped basil. Pair it with an arugula salad and a crisp glass of Mezzacorona Pinot Grigio [sku 00314] for a romantic meal. It is a radiant summer offering at $2.99 for 8.8 ounce package. 8.20.1 4
053425.name: Pasta Ravioli Italian Ricotta & Lemon
053425.title: Ricotta & Lemon Zest Ravioli

056922.description: Though Trader Giotto's Roasted Cauliflower and Cheese Mezzelune is a new product, its story actually begins in Bologna, Italy in 1882 when our supplier first started making stuffed pastas. 134 years later-yes, that long!- and our supplier is still stuffing pastas with the classic ingredients of Italian regional cooking. These little mezzelune (meaning "half moon" in Italian) pastas are stuffed with some of those very ingredients. Carefully mixed and prepared by hand, the filling includes oven-roasted cauliflower grown in Mediterranean fields with a blend of ricotta, mozzarella, and Grada Padano cheeses. While the mezzelune shape is delightful and more unique stuffed pasta shapes, it wasn't chosen for looks; rather, the shape and thickness of the pasta has been especially chosen and perfected to compliment the flavor of the filling.
