Thanks to the flavorful yet versatile stuffing, a multitude of serving possibilities abound. Toss the stuffed pasta in some Genova Pesto [sku 15759] and presto! You've got the perfect pasta dish, ready for eating. It also goes well with gorgonzola and pancetta, and pairs well with a Pinot Grigio-try Villa Sonia Pinot Grigio Venezia DOC [sku 98153]. At only $2.99 for an 8.8 ounce package, Trader Giotto's Roasted Cauliflower and Cheese Mezzelune is just the authentic stuffed Italian pasta you've been longing for. You'll find it in our deli section. 11.14. 16
056922.name: Pasta Ravioli Italian Cauliflower Roasted W/Cheese
056922.title: Roasted Cauliflower & Cheese Ravioli Thin Stuffed Pasta With Roasted Cauliflower And Cheese

058643.description: Not too long ago, pasta options for those avoiding gluten were grim, at best. These days, gluten free eaters can avail themselves of numerous options in our grocery aisle, from our Organic Brown Rice Penne [sku 64058] to our Organic Brown Rice & Quinoa Fusilli [sku 51524]. And now, with the introduction of Trader Joe's Gluten Free Egg Fettuccine Pasta, there's a refrigerated pasta option, too! This Gluten Free Egg Fettuccine Pasta is crafted for us in a certified gluten free facility in Madison, Wisconsin. Our supplier makes these new-fangled noodles using old world techniques, including small-batch production on Italian equipment. They source California-grown brown rice and eggs from Iowa farms. Perhaps the most impressive thing about this Pasta is how it eats - we'll go so far as to say, if you didn't know it was gluten free, you'd never know it was gluten free. That's a testament to just how far gluten free pasta has come, and cause for rejoicing across the land. Our Gluten Free Egg Fettuccine Pasta cooks in about 3-4 minutes (add some time to that for water boiling, of course). You can serve it simply, with olive oil, chopped basil, and Parmesan cheese. Add some diced tomatoes to brighten the flavor and color. Or go full-classic, pairing the Pasta with Trader Joe's Alfredo Sauce [sku 88617]. We're selling each nine ounce pacakge for $3.99, a classic Trader Joe's value. You'll find it in our refrigerated case. 10.23. 17
058643.name: Pasta Fettuccine Gluten Free
058643.title: Gluten Free Egg Fettuccine Pasta

065874.description: Cacio e Pepe [say: kah-cheeoh eh peh-peh] is a deceptively simple Italian pasta dish that you may have seen on the menu the last time you visited a Rome-inspired restaurant. The name just means, "cheese and pepper," and that pretty much sums it up. It is typically served on spaghetti, as it is in our frozen Spaghetti Cacio e Pepe [sku 67549]. But now, we've delivered the flavor of this traditional sauce in an unexpected form: ravioli! Trader Joe's Cacio e Pepe Ravioli is just what you'd imagine if you know the sauce. Our Italian supplier makes girasoli pasta (literally "sunflower" pasta) from durum wheat semolina and includes coarsely ground black pepper in the dough. They worked hard at finding the right grind-large enough to crunch, but not so coarse that it ripped through the rolled out dough. The sun-shaped pockets are filled with a creamy mixture that includes ricotta cheese, cream, and PDO Pecorino Romano. In fact, they whip these ingredients together to ensure a smooth and soft filling. The combination of the filling with the peppery pasta pillows creates a Cacio e Pepe experience, distinctly wrapped in ravioli. Find Trader Joe's Cacio e Pepe Ravioli every day in our refrigerators. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Cacio e Pepe Ravioli
065874.name: Pasta Ravioli Italian Cacio E Pepe
065874.title: Cacio E Pepe Ravioli

071761.description: We'll rave about ravioli all day, if you let us. In fact, we've had a whole shelf dedicated to these effortless entrées in our refrigerators for as long as we can remember. But that doesn't mean that they can't be improved upon. For example, while we adore the savory splendor of a perfectly cheesy raviolo, we recognize that they're not always easy for those who don't cheese to enjoy. Until today, that is. Trader Joe's Vegan Spinach & Cashew Ravioli offers the same gloriously cheesy taste and tender texture of traditional ravioli, but does so without the use of dairy - or any other animal-based products, for that matter. Made for us by a supplier in Italy who's been in the pasta business for over 140 years, each of these sunflower- shaped Vegan Ravioli are made with egg-free semolina pasta, filled with a mix of hearty sautéed spinach, creamy cashew cheese, and just a sprinkling of breadcrumbs for a little extra oomph in each bite. After a brisk three to four minutes in boiling water, they take on a delightful al dente texture and can be served as simply (with a splash of olive oil and a pinch of crushed red pepper) or as sauce-fully (tossed with warm Vegan Kale, Cashew & Basil Pesto [sku 59821], for instance) as you'd like. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Vegan Spinach & Cashew Ravioli
071761.name: Pasta Ravioli Italian Vegan Spinach & Cashew
071761.title: Vegan Spinach & Cashew Ravioli

071762.description: We'll rave about ravioli all day, if you let us. In fact, we've had a whole shelf dedicated to these effortless entrées in our refrigerators for as long as we can remember. But that doesn't mean that they can't be improved upon. For example, while we adore the tender, toothsome texture of a steamy, just-done raviolo, we recognize that they're not always easy for those who don't eat gluten to enjoy. Until today, that is. Trader Joe's Gluten Free Cheese Ravioli provide the same delightfully al dente bite and gloriously cheesy filling of traditional ravioli - they just also happen to not contain any gluten, too. What's the secret? An ingenious mix of eggs, rice, corn, and cauliflower in the pasta dough. By combining the best aspects of these gluten free favorites, our supplier has created one of the truest-to-form gluten free pastas we've ever come across - we find that the inclusion of delicately nutty puréed cauliflower is what really sets it apart. Each of these Ravioli is filled with a creamy blend of ricotta, mozzarella, asiago, Parmesan, and Romano cheese, making it easy to pair with all kinds of sauces and seasonings. Try it tossed with pesto, marinara, Alfredo, or even just a bit of butter and your favorite suite of savory seasonings. Gluten Free Cheese Ravioli
071762.name: Pasta Ravioli Gluten Free Five Cheese
071762.title: Gluten Free Cheese Ravioli

074256.description: We recently took a look at the fresh pasta section of our refrigerators, and couldn't help but notice that a pretty fundamental piece of the puzzle was missing: simple, traditional, classically cheesy ravioli. We immediately set to work with one of our Italian pasta suppliers to remedy this omission, and to say we were thrilled with what they came back with would be a tremendous understatement. Made with delicately thin pasta, wrapped around a luxuriously creamy filling comprised of four Italian cheeses, Trader Joe's 4 Cheese Ravioli have a mild, savory flavor, a satisfyingly tender texture, and, simply put, one of the best filling-to-pasta ratios we've ever encountered. Like our other fresh ravioli options, Trader Joe's 4 Cheese Ravioli make a practically effortless entrée: after just a few minutes in salted, boiling water, they're ready to be drained and dressed with whatever sauces or toppings you prefer. We find that their cheesy flavor profile lends itself well to pairing with our Creamy Tomato Basil Pasta Sauce [sku 50776], or even something as simple as a quick drizzle of olive oil, and bit of shaved Parmesan, and a few shakes of crushed red pepper. In the mood for something a little more involved? Try using them in an Italian Sausage [sku 66728] and ravioli soup. 4 Cheese Ravioli
074256.name: Pasta Ravioli Italian Cheese
074256.title: 4 Cheese Ravioli

074564.description: We'll rave about ravioli all day if you'll let us. Take a simple scan of our refrigerated case, and you'll see that we're big fans of the stuff-or, should we say, of the stuffed? These pasta pockets are also quite popular with our customers, so we're introducing a new ravioli to the roster: Trader Joe's Italian Tomato & Burrata Ravioloni. But wait, Trader Joe's, weren't we talking about ravioli?! Why, yes, we were. And now we're talking about Ravioloni, ravioli's larger, equally craveable cousin. (To complete the picture, ravioli's smaller-in-stature cousin is called ravioletti.) As its name would imply, Trader Joe's Italian Tomato & Burrata Ravioloni is made for us in Italy and double- stuffed with creamy burrata cheese and a trio of tomatoes (crushed, roasted, and dried), plus mozzarella, butter, breadcrumbs, and a bit of basil paste. The pasta itself is delicate, toothsome, and two-toned-one side of each Ravioloni is red, and the other is green, thanks to tomato powder and spinach, respectively. You'll find these bi-colored beauties chilling in our refrigerators, all year long. Italian Tomato & Burrata Ravioloni
074564.name: Pasta Ravioloni Italian Tomato & Burrata
074564.title: Italian Tomato & Burrata Ravioloni

078937.description: Trader Joe's Spinach & Ricotta Raviolini are tiny ravioli that are made for us in Italy by pasta pillow pros. We call them "pros" because it's very challenging to fill and keep closed such small ravioli. After a year of research (no joke!)-and equipped with a new, specially made die to cut the pasta-our Raviolini line was up and running. Each Raviolini is 50% pasta and 50% filling, which is a rare ratio in the stuffed-pasta universe. The pasta is formed from a delicate, egg and durum-wheat flour dough. The filling includes spinach in a creamy, garlicky bechamel sauce, with a rich blend of ricotta & mozzarella cheeses. Given their tiny size, these Spinach & Ricotta Raviolini eat very similar to a plate of tortellini, where you get to enjoy a bunch of them in every bite. They're so delicious on their own, you may simply complement them with a drizzle of TJ's Extra Virgin Olive Oil [sku 01465] and a sprinkle of Shaved Parmigiano Reggiano [sku 83140]. And their slight stature means they're quick cooking and ideal for dropping into a pot of soup just a few minutes before it's finished simmering! You'll find 10-ounce packages of Trader Joe's Spinach & Ricotta Raviolini in our refrigerators, every day. Spinach & Ricotta Raviolini
078937.name: Pasta Raviolini Spinach & Ricotta Minis
078937.title: Spinach & Ricotta Raviolini

094348.description: Imported straight from Italy, these new ravioli and triangoli (we thought this one was pretty cool too!) are the real deal - they're packed with flavor and made with semolina pasta. You'll find this pasta's texture to be smoother and less dense than you might be accustomed to. This is due to how this Italian supplier processes their pasta - a traditional method that leaves the pasta sturdy and resilient when cooked to al-dente, yet still very thin¿.this way you taste more of the quality ingredients - real Parmigiano Reggiano and fresh arugula, creamy goat cheese and sundried tomatoes, and deliciously sweet butternut squash. Buon appetito!
094348.name: Pasta Ravioli Italian Butternut Squash Sweet
094348.title: Butternut Squash Ravioli Thin Stuffed Pasta With Sweet Butternut Squash

095231.description: A plate of tender, tasty tortellini is nothing short of a luxury. And at Trader Joe's, that level of luxury isn't just easily attainable, it's practically effortless in preparation. Indeed, Trader Joe's Spinach Tortellini take only two or three minutes of cooking in boiling water before they're al dente and ready to eat. Inside each artfully folded Tortellino, our supplier has stuffed a flavorful mix of spinach, ricotta, mozzarella and Parmesan-so flavorful, in fact, that once they're done cooking, all they need is a quick drizzle of olive oil and a sprinkling of Parmesan before they're ready to serve. While they're ideal for quick, easy dinner situations, their ease of use also comes in handy for slightly more complex recipes. Try using them as the basis for a hearty, picnic-ready, cold pasta salad with pleny of artichoke hearts and juicy olives. Or, if you're looking for something to warm you up, they work wonders in a steamy, creamy soup with crumbled Italian sausage. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Spinach Tortellini
095231.name: Pasta Tort Spinach
095231.title: Spinach Tortellini

012462.description: This is not the first time we've carried Italian Style Turkey Meatloaf, but it is the first time we've carried this version. You see, some years ago we came out with a similar product, and it was great. But recently, we realized we could make some changes that would make it even better. Many, many recipes and taste tests later, we present the new-and-improved Trader Joe's Italian Style Turkey Meatloaf. We first take tender ground turkey and add a mixture of classic Italian seasonings to it, including garlic, onion, oregano, and basil. Breadcrumbs, Parmesan cheese, and a pinch of salt and pepper round out the recipe and make it ready for the oven. The individual meatloaves (that's a pretty fun plural noun, isn't it?) are formed by hand, baked, and then covered in a thick, flavorful tomato sauce. The deliciousness of this dish is unmatched, and the ease with which it'll be ready is life-altering. Really. Choose your desired preparation method-microwave or conventional oven-and you'll have dinnr done in no time. Turn this into the ultimate comfort meal by slicing and serving it alonside sautéed veggies, potatoes, or even TJ's Diner Mac & Cheese [sku 03655]. We're selling each 24-ounce Trader Joe's Italian Style Turkey Meatloaf for $6.99. One thing's for sure: Nonna would be quite proud of this product. You'll find it in our fresh prepared foods section.
012462.name: Italian Style Turkey Meatloaf

016188.description: We've offered Roasted Rosemary Boneless Chicken Breast (with Wild Rice Pilaf) in the past. This is true; you're not making this up. In fact, our customers quite enjoyed the offering. But, in the true spirit of kaizen, we knew that we could make this meal-in-minutes even better. And that's what we've done-so allow us to proudly [re]introduce Trader Joe's Roasted Boneless Chicken Breast, now featuring a Brown & Wild Rice Blend. Trader Joe's Roasted Boneless Chicken Breast with a Brown & Wild Rice Blend is simple dish. We take a large, slow-roasted, moist, and marinated Chicken Breast (now boneless and skinless!); we season it with rosemary, garlic, paprika, pepper, sea salt, and a dash of lime juice; and we set it atop a bed of Brown & Wild Rice accented with finely chopped mushrooms, carrots, and bell peppers. Once it arrives in your hot (and hungry) little hands, all you have to do is heat it and serve! It's a dish best warmed in the oven, but it can also be microwaved. No dinner? No problem. Trader Joe's Roasted Boneless Chicken Breast with a Brown & Wild Rice Blend is here to bail you out. We're selling each 18-ounce tray-a meal for two-for an easy $6.49. Pick one up in our fresh, prepared foods section today. 01.09. 18
016188.name: Chicken Breast & Wild Rice
016188.title: Roasted Rosemary Boneless Chicken Breast With A Brown & Wild Rice Blend

042981.description: This is not the first time we've carried Meat Lasagna, but it is the first time we've carried this version. You see, some years ago we came out with this product, and it was great. But recently, we realized we could make some changes that would make it even better. Many recipes and taste tests later, we present the new-and-improved Trader Joe's Meat Lasagna. In this dish, you'll find all of the necessary lasagna components assembled into the ideal Meat Lasagna dish- and they've been assembled by hand, to boot. Lasagna noodles have been layered with a robust, flavorful meat sauce. Ricotta cheese, along with mozzarella and Romano, adds a creamy and essential component to these rich layers; how could you have lasagna without cheese, after all? A generous sprinkling of shredded mozzarella and a pinch of parsley finish off the hearty, tasty dish that is TJ's Meat Lasagna. To enjoy this Lasagna, simply choose your preferred heating method (microwave or conventional oven) and prepare for a tasty Italian dinner! Serve pieces with a Complete Caesar Salad [sku 67275] and a warm Organic French Baguette [sku 53835] (okay, we know that's not Italian, per se, but it is delicious bread¿). Each 20-ounce package of Trader Joe's Meat Lasagna is $6.49-an excellent value for a hearty amount of top- notch lasagna any Nonna would be proud of. 05.29. 17
042981.name: Meat Lasagna Layers Of Robust, Italian Style Meat Sauce, Three Cheese Blend, And Delicate Pasta Topped With Mozzarella Cheese And Parsley

058292.description: Enchiladas originally procured their name from the Spanish verb enchilar, "meaning to season with chili." Even with the presence of chili, a truly successful enchilada is so much more than that. Trader Joe's Chicken Enchiladas (Verde) will give you a good idea of just how important that "so much more" really is. Soft, chewy tortillas made from wheat and corn provide the perfect structure to hold these Enchiladas together. We fill them with chicken breast, Monterey jack cheese, and a special green (verde) enchilada filling of crushed tomatillo, onion, green chili peppers, and diced poblano peppers. You'll find green chili sauce both inside and on top of the rolled, stuffed tortillas, along with a generous sprinkling of cotija cheese, green onion, and cilantro on top. Each bite is a cheesy, chili-flavored experience; and while a bite is delicious, the whole enchilada is even better. Serve these Enchiladas with a dollop of Sour Cream [sku 06223], Restaurant Style Tortilla Chips [sku 58073], and some Avocado's Number Guacamole [sku 65355] for the ideal comida Mexicana (Mexican meal). With four Enchiladas per package, this is a great, quick meal for two. We're selling each 17.6-ounce package of four Trader Joe's Chicken Enchiladas (Verde) for $6.99-a fiesta of a price. 02.20. 17
058292.name: Chicken Enchiladas Verde White Chicken Meat, Monterey Jack Cheese And Cotija Cheese With A Mildly Spicy Green Chlii Sauce

061301.description: This is a Pasta Salad that's especially great, and it's especially unique to Trader Joe's. We've wanted to offer a fresh pasta salad, and it turns out the perfect one was right under our noses! The recipe used for Trader Joe's Lemon Basil Pasta Salad is the same recipe made frequently by one of our own Buyers. For years, it's been a hit at every barbecue, potluck, and gathering she's brought it to-and now we're offering it to you! Farfalle-affectionately known as bow tie pasta-fulfills the "pasta" part of this Pasta Salad and is, in our opin- ion, the best shape for a pasta salad. It's just the right size to pair with the accompanying ingredients of peas, shredded zucchini, shredded spinach, and asiago cheese. When tossed in a light basil lemonette (a fancy word for lemon vinaigrette), the pasta holds the perfect amount of dressing. Squeeze the included lemon wedge on top, and you'll have a wonderfully refreshing dish at the ready. As with its inspiration, our Lemon Basil Pasta Salad is perfect to bring along to your next barbecue or potluck. Pack it up with sandwiches and lemonade for a lovely little picnic in the park. Enjoy it for lunch on a warm summer day, or chop up Grilled Chicken Strips [sku 64873] and add for some extra protein. We're selling each 11.5-ounce container of Lemon Basil Pasta Salad for $4.49, every day-and only at Trader Joe's. 03.12. 18
061301.name: Side Lemon Basil Pasta Salad

064873.description: Grilled chicken is a tasty summer staple. But what do you do when it's not summer? Or you just don't feel like ¿ ring up the grill? Look no further than Trader Joe's Grilled Chicken Strips. We've taken care of the grilling; you can take care of the eating. Our Grilled Chicken Strips begin as unadorned, boneless, skinless chicken breast meat. ¿ ey get a bit of pep- per and oil for ¿ avor. And then they're grilled and sliced into strips. It's a simple process that results in simply delicious chicken that's moist, juicy, and tender. And wouldn't you know it¿those strips of moist, juicy, tender chicken are just wonderful on a pizza. Paired with Genova Pesto [sku 15759], some Pignolias [sku 38863], and rounds of Ovoline Fresh Mozzarella [sku 19958], that's a pie we'd like to try! Don't limit yourself to our creations, though; start with Grilled Chicken Strips and construct your own creation, one strip at a time. We're selling each 12-ounce package of Trader Joe's Grilled Chicken Strips for $5.49. You'll ¿ nd them in our refrigerated case.
064873.name: Grilled Chicken Strips
064873.title: Chicken Grilled Strips

064914.description: In the back-to-school scramble of daily breakfast and lunch prep, a freshly prepared, filling dinner is often the end-of-day casualty, relegated to drive-thru on the way home from sports practice, leftovers eaten over the sink, or sometimes skipped altogether. But with a trip to your neighborhood Trader Joe's, you can reclaim your evening meal by stocking up on key building blocks, such as our complete salad kits, frozen rice, and Trader Joe's Grilled Balsamic Vinegar & Rosemary Chicken Breast. This Chicken Breast has it all-savory, tangy notes from the Balsamic Vinegar & Rosemary marinade, slightly smoky, charred goodness from its stint on the grill; and best of all for those busy evenings, it's ready to heat and eat! A lip-smacking center-of-the-plate option alongside the aforementioned rice and salad, it's also excellent thinly sliced and grilled in a panini with TJ's Manchego Cheese [sku 33331], or shredded and added to soups or stir fry. Skip the drive-thru and grab a package or two of Trader Joe's Grilled Balsamic Vinegar & Rosemary Chicken Breast on your next shopping trip. 12-ounce packages are $5.99 each. They're in our refrigerated case.
064914.name: Balsamic Grilled Chicken
064914.title: Grilled Balsamic Vinegar & Rosemary Chicken Breast With Rib Meat

064916.description: Trader Joe's Grilled Lemon Pepper Chicken is marinated in lemon pepper oil and then grilled to perfection. It is high in protein, low in fat and has just 100 calories per serving. Simply heat & serve. For a complete meal, just add a salad and a starch. When sliced, it's great for sandwiches too! We are selling each 12oz Trader Joe's Grilled Lemon Pepper Chicken for $4.99.
064916.name: Lemon Grilled Chicken
064916.title: Grilled Lemon Pepper Chicken

067490.description: Sometimes, a meal just isn't quite complete until you've added a nice piece of protein; something to anchor the dish. In cases like these, we find that chicken breast is always a great option, and grilled chicken breast even more so. That's when we turn to Trader Joe's Organic Grilled Chicken Breast, a conveniently portioned pack of ready-to-serve protein that's also ready to turn any previously-protein-poor salad, sandwich, or stir fry into a complete meal. Starting from organically raised, free range, all vegetarian-fed chicken, our supplie lightly seasons each Chicken Breast with a savory mix of organic garlic & onion powder, salt, and pepper, before grilling them to tender, juicy perfection. With just enough seasoning to complement, rather than overpower, the chicken or the dish you add it to, these pre-sliced pieces of Organic Chicken Breast are as versatile as they are delicious. Add them to soups, burritos, scrambles - anything that might need that extra bit of proteinaceous oomph to tie it all together. And since each six-ounce resealable pouch sells for $3.99*, they're both covenient and cost effective. Look for Trader Joe's Organic Chicken Breast in our refrigerators, with our other fresh, prepared foods. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Grilled Chicken Breast
067490.name: Org Grilled Chx Brst Strips
067490.title: Organic Grilled Chicken Breast With Rib Meat

067594.description: Sure, chicken nuggets are often relegated to the "kids menu." But take another look, and you'll notice they're listed right alongside what are arguably some of the greatest culinary triumphs of the millenium, like mac n' cheese, hot dogs, and hamburgers, to name a few. So, bearing this in mind, allow Trader Joe's Organic Chicken Nuggets to offer an alternative approach: nuggets aren't just for kids... they're for the kid in all of us! Here, here. We already offer some nice, nifty nuggets in our freezers, but when presented with an opportunity to carry them in this organic, fully-cooked, fresh-foods format, we leapt at the chance. Lightly breaded and made with organic chicken breast & rib meat, our Organic Chicken Nuggets crisp up beautifully in the oven or air-fryer, and if you find yourself the victim of a sudden snack attack, you can also microwave them on high and have hot Nuggets in under a minute! (You know what they say-a Nugget a day keeps your hunger at bay¿) Our Organic Chicken Nuggets are, of course, great on their own, but to maximize your young-at-heart, nugget- eating experience, we suggest serving them with a flight of your favorite dipping sauces, like TJ's Incredisauce [sku 73468], TJ's Aioli Garlic Mustard Sauce [sku 27677], TJ's Organic Sriracha & Roasted Garlic BBQ Sauce, TJ's Organic Ranch Dressing [56051], or TJ's Organic Ketchup [55860]. Here's looking at you, kid! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Chicken Nuggets
067594.name: Chicken Organic Nuggets
067594.title: Organic Chicken Nuggets

071055.description: Here at Trader Joe's, our buyers have quietly been on a quest to bring more vegan variations of normally non-vegan foods to our shelves. We do this not just to make more plant-based options available to our vegan customers (although that's certainly part of it), but to showcase how delicious these dishes can be to non- vegans, too. With Trader Joe's Vegan Enchilada Casserole, for instance, we've simply put a vegan spin on the hearty, filling comforts of a homey, weeknight dinner classic, such that it can be enjoyed by carnivores and vegans alike. And believe us, there's a whole lot to enjoy in this melty, saucy, multi-layered meal. Inside each 20-ounce package of Trader Joe's Vegan Enchilada Casserole, our supplier has stacked layer upon layer of soft corn tortillas with a medley of roasted veggies including yams, zucchini, onions, and zesty poblano peppers. They then smother them all in a toasty red chile sauce and top it off with a mix of mozzarella and cheddar-style shredded vegan cheese. Once cooked (either for a few minutes in the microwave, or a little longer in a conventional oven), this savory, stratified Casserole turns gloriously gooey and satisfying, especially when enhanced by your favorite fiery hot sauce or a nice application of our very own Salsa Autentica [sku 01535]. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Vegan Enchilada Casserole
071055.name: Entree Vegan Enchiladas
071055.title: Vegan Enchilada Casserole

077061.description: Though technically a "winter squash," butternut squash is harvested in early fall, heralding the arrival of cool- weather cooking and the rich, hearty flavors that accompany such pursuits. But if you're pressed for prep time, or just want to get cooking off your to-do list, you can still conjure the coziness of the season and satisfy your squashy desires with the help of Trader Joe's Butternut Squash and Caramelized Onion Tart. Like many good things, the base of this circular Tart starts with a flaky, buttery dough. Nestled inside is a creamy, cheesy filling commingled with savory Caramelized Onions that have been seasoned with fragrant sage and a touch of cayenne pepper. The edges of the dough are folded and pleated inward over the filling, leaving the center exposed to highlight the gem-like cubes of earthy Butternut Squash dotted throughout, and then the whole thng is baked to create a golden-brown crust. This rustic, freeform composition gives the Tart a homey, made-from-scratch vibe, but the only work required of you is overseeing a short stint in the oven to reheat and crisp up the crust. Measuring about seven inches in diameter, this Butternut Squash and Caramelized Onion Tart serves four guests (or two hungry ones), and when sliced and served, it's as at home on a dinner plate with a green salad as it is on a brunch buffet or appetizer platter. Butternut Squash and Caramelized Onion Tart
077061.name: Hol Butternut Sq
077061.title: Butternut Squash And Caramelized Onion Tart

083524.description: Whether you're making a quick weeknight dinner, putting together a weekend lunch, or meal-prepping for the week ahead, it's always a good idea to have some pre-cooked chicken breast on hand. In addition to it being a positive powerhouse of protein, chicken breast is also incredibly good at holding on to all kinds of flavors, making it a potential powerhouse of flavor, too. Both of these aspects are particularly present in Trader Joe's Grilled Chili Lime Chicken Breast, a longtime favorite of our Midwest stores, and that can now be found in our East Coast stores, too! Made with a blend of seasonings that includes chili powder, paprika, dried garlic, cumin, as well as a touch of lime juice concentrate, each bite of this pre-cooked, pre-sliced, and ready-to-eat Chicken Breast is bursting with savory and citric notes. It can be enjoyed as a topper for a salad, rice bowl, or pasta, as a filling for a sandwich, burrito, or omelet, and even heated up with sautéed onions and peppers for a super easy fajita meal. And for those watching your macros, here's another reason to be excited: each serving contains a whopping 24g of protein! Grilled Chili Lime Chicken Breast
083524.name: Chili Lime Grilled Chicken
083524.title: Grilled Chili Lime Chicken Breast

090293.description: Trader Joe's Roasted Sliced Turkey Breast is truly simple. We slow roast our turkey breast with just a touch of salt, pepper and olive oil, and then slice it thick to keep it moist and tender. Our simply prepared ready to eat sliced turkey breast is also low in fat and has just 100 calories per serving and .5g of fat. Serve it warm or cold. For a complete meal, just add a salad and a starch. It's great for sandwiches, too! We are selling each 16 oz Trader Joe's Sliced Turkey Breast for $6.99 each. Trader Joe's Company Bulletin9/12/2012 page 34 of 44 Confidential
090293.name: Sliced Roasted Turkey Breast
090293.title: Protein Turkey Breast Sliced

091036.description: Trader Joe's Chicken Parmigiana w/Marinara Sauce Nearly every Italian restaurant has a version of Chicken Parmigiana, so we decided we needed a great version in our fresh prepared case. We searched for a recipe that was made from scratch and found a vendor with an old family recipe. Our Chicken Parmigiana starts with sautéed boneless, skinless chicken breasts that have been dipped in egg and slightly dusted with a mixture of breadcrumbs and Romano cheese. Then, the chicken is topped with a homemade marinara sauce and shredded mozzarella cheese. You'll find that our chicken parm pairs well with just about any pasta. Try serving it with some lightly dressed leafy greens and a crusty baguette for a complete meal... We're selling each 16 ounce package of Trader Joe's Chicken Parmigiana for $5.99. Trader Joe's Company Bulletin7/3/2012 page 39 of 40 Confidential
091036.name: Chicken Parmigiana
091036.title: Chicken Breast Parmigiana With Marinara Sauce

092564.description: Trader Joe's Roasted Sliced Chicken Breast is truly simple. We slow roast our chicken breast with just a touch of salt, pepper and olive oil, and then slice it thick to keep it moist and tender. Our simply prepared ready to eat sliced chicken breast is also low in fat and has just 100 calories per serving. Serve it warm or cold. For a complete meal, just add a salad and a starch. It's great for sandwiches, too! We are selling each 16 oz Trader Joe's Roasted Sliced Chicken for $6.99 each.
092564.name: Protein Simply Roast Chicken Breast

092845.description: Our Trader Joe's Chicken Marsala is a classic Italian-American dish that replicates a restaurant experience at a fraction of the price. A lightly breaded chicken breast is combined with sautéed mushrooms, cream, butter, marsala wine, and then paired with creamy mashed potatoes. It's fully cooked and heats in the microwave in less than three minutes. Who needs a restaurant when dining in tastes so good? We are selling our Chicken Marsala with Mashed Potatoes in a 17 ounce package for $6.49.
092845.name: Chicken Marsala Mash Potato

093370.description: The cozy comforts of a classic Italian pasta dish meet the spice and excitement of Cajun cooking in Trader Joe's Cajun Style Chicken Fettuccine Alfredo! Drawing inspiration from two iconic global cuisines, each batch starts with delightfully al dente fettuccine noodles, to which our supplier adds a creamy Alfredo sauce that's been flavored with sundried tomatoes and Cajun-style seasonings like paprika, garlic, oregano, and cayenne. Then, they top that off with tender, perfectly cooked slices of chicken breast that have also been seasoned with that same blend of Cajun-style herbs and spices. Each bite is lively, comforting, and filling, making this culinary combo a triple threat. Easily preparable in both the conventional oven and the microwave, our fiery, flavorful Cajun Style Chicken Fettuccine Alfredo makes a quick and convenient weekday dinner entrée, especially when paired with a crisp, green salad to cool off between bites. It's also an excellent (and particularly filling) work lunch option, and takes well to a sprinkling of grated Parmesan, a bit of chopped cilantro, or a few dashes of your favorite hot sauce.
093370.name: Cajun Chicken Alfredo
093370.title: Blackened Cajun Chicken Fettuccini Alfredo

093943.description: Perfectly cooked orzo is mixed with spinach, feta cheese, Kalamata olives and sun-dried tomatoes. It's then topped sliced chicken seasoned with garlic and oregano and finished with a splash of lemon and olive oil. Enjoy this Greek-inspired entrée hot, cold, for lunch or dinner. We are selling 18 ounces of Trader Joe's Greek Chicken with orzo for $5.99. You can find it in the Fresh section.
093943.name: Greek Style Chicken W/Orzo

095138.description: We start by marinating white meat chicken breast in our signature Asada sauce. The sauce adds flavor and tenderness to the meat. We then grill it over open flames until it is cooked to perfection. We serve our Asada with a side of grilled poblano peppers, red peppers and onions. Our Chicken Asada can be used in tacos, burritos or served up straight with a side of rice. We are selling 15 ounces of Trader Jose's Chicken Asada with Poblano Peppers and Onions for $5.99. You can find it in the Fresh section.
095138.name: Grilled Chicken Asada

095406.description: Meatloaf evokes the mid-century, American household. But if the culinary historians are correct, it's been around much longer than the 1950s. Apparently the fifth-century Romans had a version of meatloaf, and subsequently, just about every European people-group has developed their own unique loaf of cooked meat. We've incorporated the best of many traditions into our Traditional Meatloaf in a Classic Tomato Sauce recipe. USDA certified, 80/20 ground beef is blended with eggs, milk, and Panko breadcrumbs for binding. It's sea- soned with onions, garlic, organic ketchup, kosher salt, Worcestershire sauce, basil, black pepper, and Italian seasoning. The top is glazed with a classic, sweet-savory tomato sauce that is enhanced by Porcini mushrooms and Burgundy wine. Perhaps the real beauty of this Meatloaf is another tradition it brings to mind-eating together. There are so many realities of 21st-century life that have made the common meal, less than common, not the least of which is the lack of time to prepare the food around which everyone will gather. Thankfully, Trader Joe's Traditional Meatloaf is fully cooked. Steam some green beans or broccoli and microwave our Reduced Guilt Mac & Cheese [sku 95141] while the Meatloaf is heating up in the conventional oven. In less than 20 minutes, you'll have a "traditional" meal for everyone to enjoy. This 16-ounce (1-pound) entrée is $6.99, serving two to four people-depending on how hungry they are! 9.22.1 4
095406.name: Traditional Meatloaf In A Classic Tomato Sauce

097661.description: Chicken Piccata is a timeless Italian- American classic. Our Trader Joe's Chicken Piccata is made just for us using a special family recipe. Boneless, skinless chicken breasts are seasoned and breaded then baked in the oven until crispy. A lemon, caper and white wine pan sauce completes the dish. It is fully cooked and heats in just minutes yet tastes like you made it from scratch. We are selling our Chicken Piccata in a 16 ounce package for $5.99.
097661.name: Trader Giotto'S Chicken Piccata Seasoned Breaded Boneless Skinless Chicken Breasts Baked In A White Wine, Lemon And Caper Sauce

098912.description: Chicken Tikka Masala [sku 99142] first arrived in our freezers circa 2009. It quickly became a favorite, inspiring us to create a "fresh" version, available to our West Coast Customers since about 2015. Now, we've gone national, opening up the refrigerated version to all our Customers across the country! Trader Joe's Chicken Tikka Masala is based on that classic Indian-ish dish. (Was it created in India? Great Britain? No one seems to be quite sure.) Our recipe includes chunks of chicken that have been roasted in a tandoori oven and mixed with a creamy, tomato-based, mildly spicy, curry-flavored sauce. Yogurt, cream, milk, and ghee (clarified butter) all contribute to this Tikka Masala's creaminess. Garlic and ginger contribute loads of flavor in partnership with spices that include: coriander, fenugreek leaves, turmeric, cumin, chili powder, black pepper, cinnamon, cloves, cardamom, and star anise. We've also provided essential cumin-infused basmati rice on the side. All of it heats up in less than five minutes in the microwave, or a few minutes more on the stovetop. Find the 16-ounce package of Chicken Tikka Masala in our refrigerators, every day-and in every store! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Chicken Tikka Masala
098912.name: Chicken Tikka Masala

390293.description: Trader Joe's Roasted Sliced Turkey Breast is truly simple. We slow roast our turkey breast with just a touch of salt, pepper and olive oil, and then slice it thick to keep it moist and tender. Our simply prepared ready to eat sliced turkey breast is also low in fat and has just 100 calories per serving and .5g of fat. Serve it warm or cold. For a complete meal, just add a salad and a starch. It's great for sandwiches, too! We are selling each 16 oz Trader Joe's Sliced Turkey Breast for $6.99 each. Trader Joe's Company Bulletin9/12/2012 page 34 of 44 Confidential
390293.name: Sliced Roasted Turkey Breast
390293.title: Protein Turkey Breast Sliced

057010.description: Wine Country is that group of counties (Sonoma, Napa, Mendocino¿) in Northern California that are official recognized as American Viticultural Areas (AVAs). In other words, good wine comes from here! Wine Country Chicken Salad is our envisioning of a fresh side that might perfectly complement a glass of Napa Chardonnay, on blanket, laid out in sight of a hillside vineyard. This Chicken Salad is made just for us with very large pieces of white meat chicken, celery, dried cranberries, pecans, and poppy seeds. It's mixed together with a scrumptious dressing that includes mayo, honey, vinegar, salt and pepper. We think it's the cranberries that really set this salad apart; They add a sweet-tart flavor that's complemented by the crunch of the pecans and celery. It's so important that we convey this combination of fla- vors in the freshest way possible, we've found a supplier that takes the final Salad (sealed in its package) and sub- jects it to High Pressure Processing (HPP). This cold-pasteurization technique is an environmentally-friendly, and safe way, to preserve flavor and nutrients-and extend shelf life-without adding preservatives. There are so many ways to enjoy this fresh salad¿ Try it nestled on a bed of greens, stuffed into a pita, or in a "chicken salad melt" with sourdough bread and the melting cheese of your choice-our Unexpected Cheddar [sku 96923] is a good, if unexpected, option. We're selling Wine Country Chicken Salad in an 11.5 ounce tub for $3.99. Look for it in our refrigerated cases. Hopefully, this'll be one of those items that causes our customers to say, "Good food comes from here." That "here" being your neighborhood Trader Joe's.) 09.05. 16
057010.name: Wine Country Chicken Salad With White Chicken Meat, Cranberries And Pecans

057824.description: At Trader Joe's, one of our guiding values is that of kaizen. This philosophy of continuous, incremental improvement, popularized in mid-20th century Japan, doesn't just apply to the way we work, it also applies to the food we sell. For example, when our Egg Salad took a brief hiatus from our refrigerators, we took the opportunity to see how we could make it even more delicious. Now returning to our refrigerators with a new look and a new recipe, Trader Joe's Egg Salad might just be one the tastiest examples of kaizen in action you'll ever encounter. Each batch is made with cage-free, hard cooked eggs, which are chopped and mixed with just the right amount of mayonnaise and tangy Dijon mustard to give it a light, yet creamy, consistency. We toss in some diced celery and green onions for good measure (and some added crunch), then add the finishing touches, like sea salt, parsley, white wine vinegar, and a pinch of black pepper. While Trader Joe's Egg Salad is certainly delightful on its own, it truly sings as part of an egg salad sandwich. We suggest using toasted slices of French Brioche [sku 56582] and adding soft, luscious leaves of Little Gem Lettuce [sku 76869]-or you can skip the bread and make egg salad lettuce wraps instead! And if you'd rather not commit to a whole meal, make yourself a snack by spooning this Salad onto some freshly toasted baguette slices and sprinkled with Smoked Paprika [sku 60290]. Egg Salad
057824.name: Egg Salad

058817.description: While fresh tabbouleh always sounds like a great idea, you don't always have the time (or, let's face it, the patience) for the chopping, blitzing and marinating that goes along with its preparation. Sometimes you need to get a meal on the table (or in your lunch bag) right now. That's where Trader Joe's Cauliflower Tabbouleh comes in. Though tabbouleh is traditionally prepared with a base of cooked bulgur or couscous, our newest version is made with bits of riced cauliflower, which, in addition to providing tender crunch and nutty flavor, makes it gluten free! Tangy tomatoes and lemon juice add brightness, while aromatic parsley and mint bring zesty freshness. Tied together with salt, pepper and a balanced blend of olive & canola oils, the end result is a fresh, zingy dish with just six grams of carbs per half-cup serving, ready to become the base-or highlight-of your next meal. Make your own mezze and feature Cauliflower Tabbouleh alongside Mediterranean Hummus, Fully Cooked Falafel, and Dolmas. Use it as the filling for stuffed tomatoes or zucchini boats. Or, spoon it into a bowl and top with grilled 3 Grain Tempeh for a vegan, herb-packed meal. You could even eat it straight out of the con- tainer-it's that good. We're offering 12-ounce tubs of Cauliflower Tabbouleh for $3.69, everyday. You'll only find them at Trader Joe's, in the refrigerated case. 09.11 .17
058817.name: Cauliflower Tabbouleh

061248.description: Curry isn't just one thing. The term covers a variety of dishes of Indian origin that all have a couple things in common: One, curries include of a complex combination of herbs and spices. And, two, curries typically carry some heat. Trader Joe's Curry Chicken Salad includes these qualities, and delivers them in fresh, chicken- salad form. Our Wisconsin supplier-known for good food, made with real ingredients-mixes white-meat chicken, carrots, raisins, green onions, and cashews with a mayo-based dressing that is flavored with traditional Indian spices, including: cumin, coriander, turmeric, ground mustard seed, cardamom, fenugreek seed, and cayenne pepper. It's that last one that gives it a little kick of heat, while the all the other flavors blend into a multi-textured salad with a little chew & a little crunch. The profile is further balanced with some sweet honey, a bit of tart lime juice, and sea salt for a side-salad that'll curry favor with any curry-lover. But, it's not just a side. Wrap it in some Flatbread [sku 93296] for a handy, sweet & spicy sandwich. Scoop it on a mound of Butter Lettuce & Radicchio [sku 55052] for a filling salad. Or, simply enjoy it side-by-side with a cup of our Carrot Ginger Soup [sku 81078]. The 11 oz. tub of Trader Joe's Curry Chicken Salad is available now for $3.99. Find it fresh, everyday, in our refrigerators. 03.26. 18
061248.name: Chicken Salad Curry
061248.title: Curry Chicken Salad

061302.description: As traders on the culinary seas, we often find our inspiration for new products while traveling and exploring international cuisines. The Mediterranean region, with its bright blue waters, white-washed buildings, and idyl- lic weather, is a place bursting with wonderful food, and one that frequently inspires our innovation. Ironically, the idea for Trader Joe's Mediterranean Style Orzo Pasta Salad did not come from such a voyage, but from a family recipe right under our noses... What started out as "Carmen's Famous Orzo Salad," a side served at family gatherings and potlucks, eventually found its way to our tasting panel. The verdict was the same as every other time it had been tried: WOW. Our Mediterranean Style Orzo Pasta Salad, like Carmen's, starts with a pasta salad made up of orzo, crumbled feta cheese, diced red onion, Kalamata olives, and sun dried tomatoes. It's then tossed in a golden balsamic dress- ing and basil pesto and topped with shredded spinach-yes, a pasta salad that actually has some "salad"! The spinach-on-top layering ensures fresh leaves when it comes time to enjoy. Its savory and salty flavors perfectly evoke its regional namesake-it'll be almost as if you traveled there! Such a delicious Orzo Pasta Salad has so many moments to shine. Bring a few containers to that last-minute BBQ your neighbor is throwing, or enjoy it with grilled fish for a tasty lunch. Even better, turn it into the per- fect Mediterranean summertime feast by adding Grilled Lemon Pepper Chicken [sku 64916] and serving with Dolmas [sku 50752], Mediterranean Hummus [sku 90642], and pita bread. Each 12-ounce container of Trader Joe's Mediterranean Style Orzo Pasta Salad for $4.99, every day. 05.21. 18
061302.name: Side Mediterranean Orzo Pasta Salad
061302.title: Mediterranean Style Orzo Pasta Salad

067489.description: If you know udon (those hearty, Japanese, wheat-flour noodles), you probably know udon in the context of soup. Trader Joe's Peanut Udon Noodle Salad brings this pasta to a chilled application-one that is rich with texture and flavor. Authentic udon noodles made with organic wheat flour are boiled and drained then mixed with fresh carrot 'matchsticks.' The soft vs. crisp contrast is crave-able and emphasized with the addition of green and red cabbage, red bell peppers, and dry roasted peanuts. These mild, fresh veggies are paired with the more aromatic flavors of diced green onion and cilantro. Ultimately, it's the peanut-ginger dressing that Thai-s it all together. Peanut butter, soy sauce and rice vinegar make up the dressing base, enhanced by the likes of ginger puree, lemon grass, garlic, lime juice, dried red chili peppers, basil, ground Thai lime leaf, spearmint, and cayenne pepper. Find the 11.75-ounce container of Peanut Udon Noodle Salad in our refrigerated section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Peanut Udon Noodle Salad
067489.name: Side Peanut Udon Noodle Salad

074083.description: Inspired in part by the wide range of bold flavors, alluring aromatics, and satisfying textures offered by chaat cuisine, Trader Joe's Chickpea, Kale, and Crispy Red Rice Salad is a symphony of sensations. It starts with a hearty, savory-seasoned base of chickpeas, chopped onions, bell peppers, currants, and bulgur wheat, all dressed in a zesty avocado herb vinaigrette. From there, our supplier adds a crown of shredded kale, carrots, and broccoli, as well as a handful of juicy diced tomatoes, and as if that weren't enough, also provides a packet of puffed red rice to give it even more crunch. Once mixed togeher, this Salad becomes a journey through a multitude of tastes and textures - no two bites are quite the same. It makes an especially exciting choice for a grab-and-go meal, be it for a time crunched lunch break, a quick road trip pick-me-up, or an easy weekend picnic option. But if you have the time and incliation, it also takes particularly well to modification: a bit of flaked Lightly Smoked Salmon [sku 72663] or even a touch of tart Organic Whole Milk Yogurt [sku 13187] will add a nice boost of protein and complexity, for instance. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Chickpea, Kale and Crispy Red Rice Salad with Avocado Herb Vinaigrette
074083.name: Side Chickpea Kale Chaat Salad

074459.description: Modeled after a popular modern take on the classic recipe, Trader Joe's Lemon Herb Macaroni Salad is not your grandmother's mac. Of course, semolina elbow Macaroni anchors our chilled Salad in nostalgia, and the dressing mimics the creamy, mayo-based version of the past. Beyond these familiarities, though, the recipe departs for a new era, going lighter on the mayo and incorporating buttermilk, which hints at a tanginess that arrives in full with a cucumber, celery, and caper relish in a vinegar, white wine, and lemon juice brine. The inclusion of zest locks in the Lemon profile promised in the name, while the Herb component is distinctly dill-forward, partnering with parsley and a host of spices and aromatics. Harkening back to your grandma's recipe, we have included a touch of sugar (less than one gram of added sugar per serving), which lends a final balance to the zestier components. You'll find the 12-ounce tub of picnic-ready Trader Joe's Lemon Herb Macaroni Salad in our refrigerators, every day. Lemon Herb Macaroni Salad
074459.name: Lemon Herb Macaroni Salad

076629.description: In some parts of the country, a potluck, cookout, or picnic simply isn't complete without potato salad. Now, we truly can't abide the idea of an incomplete feast of any kind, so to ensure you never find yourself in such an unenviable position, we've created Trader Joe's Potato Salad. It's made with a classic, homestyle recipe that starts with soft and tender chunks of potato, then mixes in diced celery and onion for some complementary crunch, and chopped, hard boiled eggs for a touch of richness, finishing with a dreamily creamy dressing that includes mayo, mustard, and just a touch of horseradish to round out its delicately tangy profile. Our Potato Salad is ready to serve, right out of the tub, and makes an especially great partner to sweeter, spicier, or smokier flavors-like a hot link with caramelized onions, a rack of ribs glazed with Trader Joe's Organic Kansas City Style BBQ Sauce [sku 63486], or a Brioche Bun [sku 67152] piled high with Hardwood Smoked Pulled Pork [sku 74968]. And in addition to being an excellent (and affordable) option for bringing along to a barbecue, it's also an excellent side for a quick and easy weekend lunch or weeknight dinner. Potato Salad
076629.name: Potato Salad

076811.description: Brussels sprouts have long been one of our very favorite veggies to serve as a simple, satisfying side dish. And now, with Trader Joe's Kung Pao Brussels Sprouts, they've quickly climbed to the top of our list for sweet, spicy, and saucy side dishes, too! This addition to our refrigerated case is made for us with whole Brussels Sprouts, roasted to a tender, toothsome texture, and are tossed in a zesty, full-flavored sauce made with a mix of hoison, soy sauce, brown sugar, ginger, garlic, and chili peppers. The flavors are big and complex, but never overpowering-in other words, an ideal side for a hearty entrée. While the flavors are complex, preparation couldn't be simpler. Ready in just three minutes in the microwave (or about 20 in the conventional oven), these Kung Pao Brussels Sprouts represent a consumately convenient way to add a tasty veggie to a weeknight dinner, or get your meal prepping done for the week ahead. With their well-balanced blend of spicy and sweet, they're great companions to all kinds of savory proteins-we're especially partial to pairing them with one of our pre-marinated options, like our Sesame Teriyaki Beef Skirt Steak [sku 72321], or something vegan and filling, like our Sriracha Flavored Baked Tofu [sku 56423]. Kung Pao Brussels Sprouts
076811.name: Side Kung Pao Brussels Sprouts

015759.description: Pesto gets its name from the verb pestare, which means "to step on" or "to pound." Pounding-in a deep, marble mortar with a wooden pestle-is the traditional technique used to make the classic Ligurian sauce. Though it's made in blenders (in the United States), Trader Giotto's Genova Pesto closely honors what pesto would have been when it was first pounded out in Genoa, Italy. Fresh basil, Parmesan cheese, and walnuts are blended together with olive oil, garlic, salt, and black pepper. This green sauce is rich and dynamic-aromatically herby, a little nutty, and spicy with garlic. Spoon it over Organic Whole Wheat Penne [sku 31672], mix it with roasted vegetables, or use it to create a "green" pizza. It also makes a vibrant marinade for meat or seafood. Pound for pound, our Genova Pesto is a strong value at just $2.99 for a seven-ounce (about .44 pounds) tub. Find it in our refrigerators!
015759.name: Pesto Genova
015759.title: Genova Pesto

059192.description: Zhoug (pronounced ZOOg) likely originated in Yemen, and is now popular throughout the Middle East. It's a cilantro-based sauce/condiment that's been likened to "Middle Eastern pesto," but we think that description shortchanges the originality of this spicy, fragrant, fabulously flavorful culinary creation. It's a sauce that's taking the internet by storm - from food blogs to social media feeds, Zhoug is having its moment in the digital sun. This really is the ideal time to introduce Zhoug to our stores. Trader Joe's Zhoug Sauce comes to us from a California vendor well-versed in the art and science of Middle Eastern foods. Here, they've put together a very straightforward collection of ingredients - cilantro, canola oil, jalapeño peppers, chile flakes, garlic, cardamom, sea salt, and cumin seeds - to create a sauce/dip/spread/ condiment that bursts with vibrant flavor and color. We call it "very spicy" on our label, and some will find it "very spicy." Those more into spicy foods may find it only moderately spicy. Everyone who tries it will be impressed by how the flavor of every ingredient comes through, even as the flavors blend beautifully into the finished product. Try Zhoug as a dip for vegetable crudités or pita (bread or chips). It makes a delicious sandwich spread, a super sauce for pasta (here's where it's like pesto), and a vibrant addition to a plate of meat or fish. It's traditionally served alongside hummus and falafel, and we're all for sticking to this tradition. Keeping to our tradition of value, we're selling each eight ounce tub for $2.99, every day. You'll find it in our refrigerated case. 12.18. 17
059192.name: Sauce Zhoug Spicy Green
059192.title: Zhoug Sauce

073649.description: A certified staple of Argentinian and Uruguayan cooking, chimichurri is savory, herbaceous, refreshing, and richly aromatic, all at once - truly a consummate condiment, if ever there was one. Though its precise origins are somewhat disputed, food historians generally agree that it rose to prominence as part of Argentinian ranch cuisine, likely sometime in the 19th century, primarily as a way to season grilled beef. Since then, as Trader Joe's Chimichurri Sauce deftly demonstrates, its uses have expanded to include sandwiches and seafood, burgers and kebabs, pastas and potatoes - pretty much anything that's savory and delicious will be even more so with a bit of Chimichurri on top. Starting with a mix of finely chopped parsely and cilantro, our supplier adds in minced garlic, dried cumin, and crushed red pepper, then blends in a mix of oil and vinegar. The resulting Sauce is a compellingly complex mix of herby aromatics, savory spice, silky texture, and even a delicately tart note that serves to wake up the flavors within any entrée it's added to. We especially like it with grilled shrimp on crispy crostini, al pastor tacos with charred pineapple, roasted sweet potatoes with crumbled cotjia, or, of course, a freshly seared steak. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Chimichurri Sauce
073649.name: Sauce Chimichurri
073649.title: Chimichurri Sauce

076296.description: You can find a wide variety of sauces on pizzas these days, including the likes of basil-based pesto, creamy alfredo, and even BBQ sauce. While it's nice to match your sauce with whatever creative toppings are involved (i.e., BBQ sauce with shredded chicken), classic, tomato-based pizza sauces are still the pizza-fan favorite for dressing your dough and pairing with an endless number of topping options. We make Trader Joe's Pizza Sauce with this tomato tradition in mind. It starts with crushed tomatoes (literally the first ingredient), which gives our Pizza Sauce its homemade vibe. The Sauce is seasoned with typical tomato sauce ingredients, including onion, minced garlic, basil, and oregano. And to temper the acidity of the tomatoes, we've added some sugar-not enough to make it taste sweet, but just enough to balance all the flavors. The result is a tangy and tasty spread that won't weigh down your dough, while providing a classic foundation for cheeses, meats, and whatever else you're popping on top! Pizza Sauce
076296.name: Sauce Pizza

058304.description: Who doesn't love soup? Especially when winter is howling, much like it is now. A piping hot bowl of fresh, hearty soup will warm you on the inside when it's cold outside. So grab a tub of Trader Joe's Organic Hearty Minestrone Soup, heat it up, insert a spoon, and feel the warmth. This isn't just any old soup. It's a next-best-thing-to-homemade soup. The stock is made from scratch. The veggies are fresh. It's cooked in small batches. And each ingredient is added to the pot at exactly the right time. This is important, because when making soups, the success of the finished product is all about layering the flavors-and this takes time. Organic Hearty Minestrone Soup is teeming with organic veggies-like carrots, tomatoes, peas, and chopped kale-in a tomato-based broth, plus a bounty of kidney and cannellini beans, plenty of orzo, and copious amounts of herbs and spices. We've offered fresh Organic Hearty Minestrone Soup in winters past, but this year, we've kaizened it to new hygge heights. First of all, we've made it vegan. The only ingredient making our previous incarnation not vegan was beef broth, and as soon as we realized that we could swap the beef broth for veggie broth and get equally rich results, we were happy to do so. Because soup is for everyone. Second, we're using an even tastier, rice-and- quinoa-based orzo this year. It's got great bite, and it doesn't compromise the soup's gluten-free status. Trader Joe's Organic Hearty Minestrone Soup comes in a 20-ounce tub that will serve two, and we're selling each tub for $3.99, every day while the season lasts. You'll find it in our refrigerated case. 01.08. 18 JAN. - MAR.
058304.name: Org Minestrone Soup
058304.title: Organic Hearty Minestrone Soup

058808.description: An excellent bowl of soup should be comforting, warm (unless we're talking gazpacho), and full of flavor. Find- ing-and making-super soups, especially year-round, can be a task, but it's a task we're eager to help you with. Especially when that help comes in the form of Trader Joe's Tomato Feta Soup. Though it diverges slightly from traditional tomato soup, our Tomato Feta Soup does so with flair. Vine rip- ened tomatoes from California are slowly simmered until soft. Then, we add tomato paste, onions, light cream and spices, like sea salt, garlic, parsley, basil, bay leaves, and oregano. However, the preeminent ingredient in this soup is the feta, imported from Greece and crafted using age-old methods. It's crumbly, tangy, and you'll be able to see and taste pieces of it in this Soup. One spoonful and you'll never go back to the canned tomato soup of old. As tasty as our Tomato Feta Soup is on its own, we would be remiss if we didn't suggest enjoying it with a grilled cheese. Try one made on Brioche Bread [sku 56582] with Sliced Provolone [sku 79684]-or go the classic route and use American Slices [sku 99183]. Some Oyster Crackers [sku 42049] are also never a bad idea. Pick up a 20-ounce container of Trader Joe's Tomato Feta Soup for $3.99-super soup for a super value. You'll find it in our refrigerated case. 02.06. 17
058808.name: Tomato Feta Soup

076364.description: Trader Joe's Organic Very Green Soup! is a rich, flavorful, and veritably vegan soup that more than earns its exclamation point. To make each batch, our supplier starts with a base of super creamy coconut milk, to which they add a little bit of miso for some extra umami oomph. They then blend in spinach, kale, and broccoli to give it its gregariously green hue and fresh, vegetal flavor, along with celery, potatoes, garlic, and just a touch of cayenne pepper to bring it all together. It arrives at our store ready to eat, hot or cold, making this Very Green Soup! a very practical choice for practically any meal. In addition to its vegan and organic attributes, Trader Joe's Organic Very Green Soup! is also gluten free-we figure a Soup! this good ought to be enjoyed by as many different folks with different dietary needs as possible. It heats in a manner of minutes in the microwave or on the stovetop, and can be enjoyed as an effortless entrée (it makes an especially hearty work lunch option), or a superb side when paired with a salad or sandwich. And if you're looking for a litte more body or texture, it customizes well with a dollop of yogurt, a bit of Vegan Sour Cream [sku 72573], or sprinkling of Crispy Jalapeño Slices [sku 63959]. Organic Very Green Soup!
076364.name: Soup Org Very Green

076371.description: While we appreciate autumn's brisk temperatures and the oh-so-satisfying crunch of a dry autumn leaf underfoot, we mostly look forward to autumn's arrival because it signals the definitive start to Soup Season, when steamy, full-flavored chowders, bisques, and broths reign supreme¿ like our newest fall offering, Trader Joe's Lobster Bisque. Our Lobster Bisque starts with a rich and aromatic base of lobster stock and cream, accentuated with butter, thyme, and sherry. It's cooked low and slow, allowing all the flavors to come together in a harmonious marriage. All you have to do is heat it up on the stovetop or in the microwave, then submerge your spoon in the bowl to discover the true belle of this Bisque: exquisitely tender pieces of Lobster. This exquisite Bisque elevates any meal with ease (seriously, just open, heat, and serve!) You'll find Trader Joe's Lobster Bisque in our refrigerators, for a limited time. Lobster Bisque
076371.name: Soup Lobster Bisque

093679.description: Sometimes, in life and in cooking, you can just throw things together at random and everything turns out okay. Like last-minute plans with friends or making a meal out of the four remaining ingredients in the fridge. Other times, careful planning and execution is critical to success. Like when making soups. And Trader Joe's Lentil Soup with Ancient Grains is the epitome of such carefully-made soup. This isn't just any old soup. This is a next-best-thing-to-homemade-in-your-own-kitchen soup. The stock is made from scratch, the vegetables are sourced from local suppliers, the soup is cooked in small batches, and we add each ingredient at exactly the right time. This is important, because when making soups, the success of the finished product is all about layering the flavors. Therefore, our Lentil Soup with Ancient Grains has a lot of flavor, thanks to a satisfying blend of lentils, quinoa, amaranth, and millet in a savory broth made with tomato paste, balsamic vinegar, and a variety of spices. Because this soup is so expertly made, it makes an outstanding quick-and warm-meal. Serve it with shredded Parmesan Cheese [sku 85325] sprinkled on top and slices of Organic French Baguette [sku 53835]. Equal parts easy and tasty, you just might never make your own soup again. At just $3.29 for a 20 ounce container, Trader Joe's Lentil Soup with Ancient Grains will warm you on the inside when it's cold outside-and it's only around seasonally, so warm up while you can.
093679.name: Lentil & Ancient Grains Soup
093679.title: Lentil Soup With Ancient Grains - Note: The Statement Of Identity Is Soup. It Must Be Bold, Prominent And At Least Half The Height Of The Largest Type Size Used On The Pdp.

067471.description: Peter Piper picked a peck of pickled peppers... But did Peter Piper palliate the planet's plastic problem by placing his peppers in a polyester produce bag? Probably not, but thanks to Trader Joe's Reusable Produce Bags, you can pick up where Peter left off! Simply place two TJ's Reusable Produce Bags in your purse or pocket, and you'll be perpetually prepared for impromptu produce runs-they're made from lightweight, 100% recycled polyester mesh, so they're perfectly portable. Plus, take a peek at our price: we're selling TJ's Reusable Produce Bags for $1.99* per two-bag pack. Yup, for one hundred ninety-nine pretty pennies, you'll get one small Produce Bag (11.8" x 13.4") and one large Produce Bag (11.8" x 16.9"), so you can pick all the peppers (and peas, potatoes, parsley, plums, pears, etc.) you've been pining for... *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Reusable Produce Bags
067471.name: Bag Reusable Produce
067471.title: Reusable Produce Bags

066709.description: This friendly Trader Joe's Wine Bag is, as its name implies, made from paper. But it's not just made from any paper; it's made from luxurious, leather-like (but vegan!) Supernatural Paper¿-a patented blend of celluose and latex. Supernatural Paper¿ requires less water to produce than cotton, nylon, leather & other petroleum- based materials, and much to any conservationist's delight, for every tree harvested to make produce it, our supplier plants another in its place. But what does this mean for you and for the fortuitous recipient of your Dyonisian gift? Why, it means that the gift bag you've selected is not only stylish, but durable, reusable, and washable, too! Can you say WOW? When it comes time for that Secret Santa exchange, it'll be hard to tell what's really won your giftee's heart-was it the well-chosen TJ's wine, or the sleek, sustainable tote that it came it in? You may never know! And for the non-drinkers, please note, you needn't limit yourself to wine; TJ's Washable Paper Bag is just as perfect for packaging a bottle of TJ's Sparkling Cranberry Juice Beverage [sku 70644], a bottle of TJ's Novello Extra Virgin Olive Oil [sku 96991], or even a beautiful TJ's bouquet that you've trimmed and arranged in a cylindrical vase! This holiday season, we're selling Trader Joe's Washable Paper Wine Bag for $2.99* each. Find them near our wine and/or shelf-stable beverage section, while they last. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Washable Paper Wine Bag
066709.name: Bag Hol Wine Washable Paper

068799.description: Sometimes a bag is nothing more than a bag. But sometimes, that seemingly simple brown paper bag with the handles - you know the one - is that and so much more. Trader Joe's Washable Paper Grocery Bag is the "so much more" of brown paper bags. We worked with our supplier in Vietnam to create a reusable, washable, facsimile of our classic - dare we say iconic- brown paper bag, using the same "supernatural paper" made with cellulose (wood fiber) and latex used for our limited edition Lunch Bag [sku 67396] and Wine Bag [sku 66709]. Your first clue that it's out of the ordinary comes when you touch it. It's so soft! (And it softens even more as you wash it.) Then you'll notice the handles are longer - long enough to sling over your shoulder! When you actually use it, you'll really notice the difference. It can hold significantly more weight than a paper bag, making it great for groceries and anything else you want to tote around. We have limited quantities available. You'll find them with our other reusable bags, while they last. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Washable Paper Grocery Bag
068799.name: Supernatural Paper Tj Grocery Bag
068799.title: Supernatural Paper Tote Bag

073243.description: The idea of washable paper seemed like something out of science fiction, not too long ago, but now, thanks to the advent of our Washable Paper Grocery Bag [sku 68799], they're an everyday sight at your neighborhood Trader Joe's. Since we're so taken with their Supernatural Paper® technology, we've decided to introduce yet another version into the fold: Trader Joe's Washable Paper Big Tote Bag. At a veritably voluminous 18 inches wide by 20 inches tall, they're roomy enough to tote your groceries, carry your books, or pack for a picnic at the beach-and maybe even all at the same time. Made for us by the same supplier in Vietnam behind our other Washable Paper bags, these trendy, versatile Washable Paper Big Tote Bags are made with the same cellulose-based Supernatural Paper¿, and designed with the same emphasis on sustainability. They're almost endlessly reusable and can be easily washed if they get dirty, either by hand or on the delicates setting of your washing machine. And in addition to their practical day-to-day uses, they also work great as a gift-wrap for a goodie bag of groceries as a housewarming present. Washable Paper Big Tote Bag
073243.name: Supernatural Paper Big Tote Bag

075796.description: Tinned fish is going through something of a renaissance these days, and we are emphatically, enthusiastically, exuberantly, even, here for it. As longtime tinned fish fans ourselves, we're more than delighted to see an ordinarily overlooked category of food get its due. To celebrate this period of pronounced piscine popularity, we're finally (emphasis on the fin) introducing this fetching Sardine Bag, decorated with an illustration of a classic tin of sardines on one side, and a handy recipe for a delicious (and easy-to-make!) sardine toast on the other. Great for bringing on Trader Joe's trips, carrying books to and from school, or toting supplies for a picnic in the park, this handsome and sturdy Sardine Bag makes a practical addition to any reusable bag collection. It's spacious enough to carry quite a few items at a time, allowing you to pack in groceries like...well...sardines, we suppose. It also makes an excellent gift for any foodies in your life, especially those with an appreciation for sardines, specifically, or preserved seafood more generally-especially when pre-loaded with a few tins of Lightly Smoked Sardines in Olive Oil [sku 26527]! Sardine Bag
075796.name: Bag Sardines

098216.description: ¿ Product Info: Just in time for summer, our Trader Joe's Red & Black Insulated Bag is perfect for all your shopping needs. This new and improved bag offers high density exterior fabric for extra projection. Keeps frozen and perishable refrigerated foods cold up to 5 hours. Its extra thick insulated core is made of closed cells polyethylene form. Most of all, the leak-proof easy to clean technically makes anyone's shopping experience just that much more fun!
098216.name: Insulated Red And Black Bag

007283.description: The story of the sunflower, or Healianthus Annuus, is almost as interesting as the story of the sun itself. (Okay, fine, that's a reach, but let's go with it.) The wild sunflower was first domesticated by Native Americans, who used sunflower seeds in a variety of applications, but true commercialization of the plant took place in Russia and surrounding territory. By the early part of the 19th century, Russia had some 2 million acres of farmland just covered in sunflowers. Doesn't that sound like a beautiful sight? And think of all those delicious seeds! Sounds pretty sunny for a country known for unforgiving winters... But we digress. Trader Joe's Roasted & Salted Sunflower Seeds are removed from the plant only when they're ready, then shelled and lightly roasted in a bit of-yup!-sunflower oil, then given a light salting to make their flavor truly pop. The slight salty edge makes them a great snack, and the fact that they're already shelled makes them remarkably convenient for ingredient purposes: just grab a handful from the re-sealable bag, and you're good to go. Here's something sunny: We're selling each one-pound bag of Trader Joe's Roasted and Salted Sunflower Seeds for $2.29,* every day. Look for them in our Nuts & Dried Fruit section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Roasted & Salted Sunflower Seeds
007283.name: Roasted & Salted Sunflower Seeds

007995.description: With a mild climate, rich soil, and abundant sunshine, it should be no surprise that California's Central Valley is an ideal place to grow a large chunk of the world's premium almonds. And while we never stop short of sourcing premium products, it should be no surprise that Trader Joe's Raw Almonds are from the beautiful and agriculturally bountiful Central Valley. Trader Joe's Raw Almonds are of the supreme grade, nonpareil variety. French for "no equal", nonpareil almonds are prized for their uniform shape and size, their versatility, and their consistently crunchy texture. Additionally, our Raw Almonds have more than just a crunchy flavorful snack hiding under their shells! Trader Joe's Raw Almonds are teeming with terrific dietary benefits such as heart-healthy unsaturated fats, fiber, protein; and minerals such as calcium, iron, and potassium in every serving! With one ingredient per one-pound package, one ingredient is all you need to get these nutrition and versatile culinary benefits, so snag a bag today. Raw Almonds
007995.name: Raw Almonds

007998.description: Like many foods that we commonly refer to as nuts, technically, Pistachios are not a nut, but rather the seed of the pistachio tree. A distant cousin of the similarly-not-a-nut cashew, Pistachios nonetheless have all the same satisfyingly savory flavor and craveable crunch of a nut, so we will continue to group them in with the other nuts (besides, we don't plan on creating a separate "Seeds" aisle in our stores anytime soon). And Trader Joe's Dry Roasted & Salted Pistachios exhibit everything that have made them such a pervasively popular snack. Grown for us in California's San Joaquin Valley, these particular Pistachios are dry roasted, which means they were cooked without the use of a medium like oil or water. This gives each Pistachio a delightfully chewy texture which interplays impeccably with their naturally mild, buttery flavor profile, which in turn is accentuated by the addition of salt. They're just as fun to crack open as they are delicious, making them a great snack for spectating sports, enjoying with drinks, or simply everyday snacking. And on top of that, Trader Joe's Dry Roasted & Salted Pistachios are a great value. Nut or not, you can find 16-ounce bags every day in our nuts & dried fruit section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Dry Roasted & Salted Pistachios
007998.name: Dry Roasted & Salted Pistachios

007999.description: Trader Joe's Dry Roasted & Unsalted Pistachios currently sit near the top of our must-have snack list. They are grown in the Central Valley of California where weather conditions are ideal for the production of California's finest quality pistachios. We especially love that these tender, green-ish nuts are Roasted and Unsalted in their shells; some days, those little shells are the only thing standing in the way of us inhaling the entire bag in one sitting! These Pistachios are great on their own, unsalted and all, but we wouldn't stop you if you wanted to un- shell and add Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chips [sku 04529], dried Cranberries with Orange [sku 32473] and other nuts like almonds, cashews, and pecans. Hey, while you're at it, even try crumbling on fish, salad, or even ice cream or pie. You'll find each 16-ounce bag of Trader Joe's Dry Roasted & Unsalted Pistachios, every day in our grocery aisle. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Dry Roasted & Unsalted Pistachios
007999.name: Dry Roasted & Unsalted Pistachios

010009.description: As opposed to nuts like almonds, cashews, and other nuts that grow on trees, peanuts grow beneath the soil's surface and are botanically considered legumes. In other words, although we think of peanuts as nuts, they're technically not even classified as one! It's all a bit nutty - especially since peanuts actually have the "nut" in their name - but regardless, people go nuts for Trader Joe's 50% Less Salt Roasted & Salted Peanuts! After being shelled, these Peanuts are roasted in peanut oil, which is how they get their extra-crunchy, never- soggy, golden surfaces. While they're still warm from the roasting, we add the salt - but not too much salt. After all, these are our 50% Less Salt Peanuts, for goodness' sake! It's all about the balance. Keep a bag of Peanuts at work as a satiating snack-at-the-ready. Add them to sweet or savory snack mixes, or even homemade granola bars. Smash them into smaller pieces for use in baking & cooking (perhaps this process could aslo double as an anger management endevor...). We're selling each one-pound bag of Trader Joe's 50% Less Salt Roasted & Salted Peanuts for a nutty $2.99.* *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. 50% Less Salt Roasted & Salted Peanuts
010009.name: Low Sodium Roasted Peanuts
010009.title: 50% Less Salt Roasted & Salted Peanuts

010631.description: As opposed to nuts like almonds, cashews, and other nuts that grow on trees, peanuts grow beneath the surface and are botanically considered legumes. Although we think of peanuts as nuts, they're actually not classified as one. However, the claim is not too far-fetched since the peanuts are very similar in their physical stature, nutritional profile, and use in cuisines. It's all a bit nutty, especially since peanuts actually have the word "nut" in them. Either way, people go nuts for Trader Joe's Roasted & Unsalted Peanuts! The Peanuts are roasted in peanut oil, the reason for its crunchy, golden surface. And, we didn't add any salt, because it really doesn't need any. They're simply good on their own, but also super versatile to jazz up any dessert or dish. They're often seen in brownies, ice cream sundaes, cookies, and trail mix. You can try making your own peanut brittle, granola bars, and chocolate covered peanuts too! You'll find each one-pound bag of Roasted & Unsalted Peanuts in the nuts section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Roasted & Unsalted Peanuts
010631.name: Roasted & Unsalted Peanuts
