For us, that "extra-special attention" comes in the form of our own Roasted Tomatillo Salsa. We make this traditional, south-of-the-border sauce using fresh tomatillos. We roast them to deepen their flavor, adding a hint of smoky goodness. We also roast jalapeños and Anaheim chiles before combining them with the roasted tomatillos and other ingredients-like onions, sea salt, fresh cilantro, dried cumin, and black pepper. The resulting blend of fruit (tomatillos are fruit!), vegetables, and spices has a savory "green" flavor, and a pleasant, medium amount of heat, making our Roasted Tomatillo Salsa the perfect accompaniment for a wide variety of savory dishes. Use it in traditional chilaquiles. Spice up eggs, any-style. Dip your chips in the stuff, or spoon it over a pile of nachos. Allow it to bring some citrus-y zing and spice to grilled fish, chicken, or carne asada. The list goes on! It's important to note that our idea of "extra-special attention" also applies to our price. One twelve-ounce tub of Trader Joe's Roasted Tomatillo Salsa is just $2.99. This not only translates to more green on your food, but also, more green in your pocket. 1.26.1 5
054434.name: Roasted Tomatillo Salsa Verde

057152.description: Our Trader Joe's Homestyle Salsa Especial Medium has more heat than our Mild version, but retains the same great flavor profile. This salsa has a smooth texture and a unique herb flavor. Serve it with eggs, grilled fish, or Mexican cuisine or just eat it by itself with chips. We are selling our Trader Joe's Homestyle Salsa Especial Medium in a 12 ounce container for $2.99.
057152.name: Homestyle Salsa Especial Medium

059417.description: A hyperbole is a figure of speech where exaggeration is used for dramatic effect, like "I ate a million chips today" or "this work day will never end." When we call our new Extra Hot Habanero Ghost Pepper Salsa extra hot, though, we mean it. In this case, there is no hyperbole or exaggeration. It is hot-and also delicious. Ghost chili peppers are some of the spiciest chilies around. Naturally, we turned to these to heat up our spiciest salsa to date-but a little bit goes a long way. The small-but-mighty amount of smoked ghost pepper powder we use is combined with vine-ripened tomatoes, fresh onion, cilantro, habanero peppers, and roasted red bell and poblano peppers. The result? A spicy Salsa that's full of flavor and has that perfect Mexican restaurant-style consistency: not too chunky, and perfectly scoopable. Enjoying the spiciness of this Salsa is as easy as scooping it up with some Tortilla Chips [sku 00553]. Of course, there are about a million other uses (now that's hyperbole). Serve it with Queso Dip [sku 99262] if you want to mellow out that heat a little bit. Or, spoon some on your morning eggs, on quesadillas, on tacos, on Black Bean & Cheese Taquitos [sku 00553]¿ If heat's your thing, pick up a 12-ounce tub of Trader Joe's Extra Hot Habanero Ghost Pepper Salsa for $3.29. You'll find it with our other (less intimidatingly spicy) fresh salsas. 08.21. 17
059417.name: Xhot Habanero Ghost Salsa
059417.title: Extra Hot Habanero Ghost Pepper Salsa

093920.description: Also known in its native home of Mexico as "Salsa Bandera" (after the red, green, and white of the Mexican flag), pico de gallo is an icon in its own right: a perennial favorite for parties, a necessary accessory to nachos, and an absolute essential for any taco Tuesday (or taco any-other-day-of-the-week, for that matter.) Trader Joe's Mild Pico De Gallo is an edible tribute to this scion of salsas, an easy option for when you need fresh pico de gallo, but don't quite have the time for all that chopping. Made in the classic style using diced tomatoes, onions, jalapeños, cilantro, and lemon juice, our Pico De Gallo isn't just an ideal companion to tortilla chips, it's also an excellent (and easy) recipe enhancer. Looking to spice up a bit of pan-fried fish? A layer of chunky Pico De Gallo will add just the right amount of zest. Making a quick Tex-Mex queso? Simply add a tub of Trader Joe's Mild Pico De Gallo to a skillet of melted cheese and milk, and you're there, compadre. Scrambled eggs, omelets, breakfast burritos - pretty much any savory breakfast you can name could do with a little Pico De Gallo, too. In addition to being a great convenience, Trader Joe's Mild Pico De Gallo Salsa is also a great value. You'll find each 12-ounce tub in our deli section for $2.99 - that's a lot of Pico por un poco.
093920.name: Mild Pico De Gallo Salsa
093920.title: Pico De Gallo Salsa Mild

094485.description: ¿ Introducing Trader Jose's Hot Pico de Gallo and Trader Jose's Mild Pico de Gallo. In looking at our salsa selection in the Pacific Northwest, we saw that there were a few mild options but no hot options. In order to make our customer's choices more clear, we decided to find a local vendor to make the best mild and hot pico de gallos they could. These salsas are as authentic as they come with only fresh tomatoes, onions, garlic, cilantro, jalapeno, and lemon juice. The Mild Pico de Gallo has just the slightest bit of spice and the Hot packs a good punch. Eat these salsas with chips, or put them on tacos, burritos, sandwiches, burgers¿ the possibilities are endless. And at $2.49 for a 12 oz tub, the value is endless as well. These will be on your 98710 order and are replacing SKU 34527 PICO DE GALLO 12/CS and SKU 01143 SALSA RED (MILD).
094485.name: Hot Pico De Gallo Salsa

001497.description: Sometimes simplicity is the best route to happiness. To wit: Trader José's Salsa Verde. Traditional salsa verde (green sauce) is a mild, tomato-less alternative to spicy red salsa in Mexican and Southwestern cuisines. Trader José's Salsa Verde, like any self-respecting example of this sauce, is made primarily from tomatillos, fruits that look like cherry-size green tomatoes, but aren't actually tomatoes at all. We use fresh tomatillos, along with fresh jalapeño peppers, to craft this sauce that's been talked about, blogged about, and most importantly, enjoyed in homes all around Trader Joe's country, for more than 30 years. Like most salsas, our Salsa Verde makes a respectable dip for tortilla chips. Don't let the "salsa" moniker stop you from trying it in a wide variety of ways, though. In an enchilada casserole, in a slow cooker with chunks of pork (a chili verde-esqe meal with virtually no work for you at all), with scrambled eggs (a flavorful way to make a Seussian meal), mixed in to add a little boost to your guacamole, as a dipping sauce for bite size chunks of Jalapeño Chicken Sausage¿ We've crafted Trader José's Salsa Verde with quality, vegan-friendly ingredients, without artificial flavors, gluten, or fat. Unlike so many jarred salsas on the market, this one doesn't contain thickening agents - its rich, texture is a result of slow cooking. We're selling each 12 ounce jar for $1.99, every day, the same price it's been for more than 10 years. You'll find it on our grocery shelves.
001497.name: Salsa Verde

001535.description: When it comes to something as simply delicious and purely flavorful as salsa, there's no need to overcomplicate things. That's why, with Trader Joe's Salsa Autentica, we opted for a simple recipe using just six ingredients: tomato puree, yellow chili peppers, salt, vinegar, dried onion, and garlic powder. Combined, these ingredients create an impeccably textured Salsa with plenty of savory spices and tempered heat - a Salsa that pays homage to its culinary tradition and goes well on just about anything - a Salsa that's, simply put, simply Autentica. Our Salsa Autentica's zesty flavor profile not only makes it a natural companion for dipping with your favorite tortilla chip, but it also makes a great condiment to pour over nachos, to spoon into burritos, or to apply generously on savory breakfast items. Don't just take our word for it, its simple, universal appeal has clearly stood the test of time: for close to three decades, and it's set the standard for other salsas on our shelves. You can find 12-ounce jars of Trader Joe's Salsa Autentica for $1.99*, every day. Look for them with our other jarred salsas. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Salsa Autentica
001535.name: Salsa Autentica

020448.description: The chips are in the bowl. The meat has been browned, the lettuce shredded, and the tomatoes diced. Still more chips have been topped with shredded cheese and placed under the broiler. What's that? The salsa's gone missing? Nonsense. We never want you to face a chip-dipping-nacho-topping-taco-filling dilemma, so we've taken extra care to make sure we always have an assortment of snappy salsas in stock. Not sure which one to try? We really do love them all, and Trader Joe's Chunky Salsa is a great place to start. Trader Joe's Chunky Salsa is terrific to have on hand for unexpected entertaining, and makes creating a Mexican-style feast as easy as opening your pantry and twisting a lid. Unlike some salsas, this one is thick & Chunky and bursting with vibrant flavors. It remains relatively mild on the heat scale, with just the slightest kick, meaning that even the faint of taste buds can enjoy delish Salsa flavors without experiencing intense heat. Our Chunky Salsa has been around for a long time. One taste and you'll understand its longevity - and you'll probably want some chips. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Chunky Salsa
020448.name: Salsa Chunky
020448.title: Trader Jose'S Chunky Salsa

050784.description: Legend has it that the Cowboy Caviar concept was originally developed around 1930 for an "all Texas" menu at a high-end department store. The head chef was mandated to include black-eyed-peas on the menu. Since she personally loathed the legumes, to make them palatable, she pickled them with onions, creating a salad-esque salsa -- "Cowboy Caviar" -- that has since become a cult classic. Strap on your spurs, Trader Joe's Cowboy Caviar is now in your town. Since we love cult classics, especially of the crazy, creative culinary concoction class, and we've had good success with our other less- than-ordinary salsas, we decided to create our very own Trader Joe's Cowboy Caviar. Instead of black- eyed peas, however, our "caviar" of choice is black beans that are mixed together with corn, onions and red bell peppers. Pickled in a blend of chipotle peppers, adobo sauce and lime juice, this crunchy, savory salsation carries southwestern character and enough heat to take note. It's a natural partner to tortilla chips and makes a delicious fish taco topping. Gluten-free, fat-free, low in sodium and vegan, Cowboy Caviar has "cult-classic character" written all over it, especially at just $2.49 for a 13 ounce jar. Yee-haw! (This is not the actual jar) CORRECTION: Cowboy Caviar Corn, Black Bean & Pepper Salsa does contain tomato as an ingredient. The information on this sheet has been amended to accurately reflect the correct salsa composition. Thank you.
050784.name: Salsa Cowboy Caviar
050784.title: Cowboy Caviar Salsa

053680.description: We're always looking for something new-not just something "new," but a product with interesting ingredients, fantastic flavor, and a unique heritage. Trader José's Hatch Valley Salsa meets each of these requirements and more. While visiting New Mexico in August, we happened upon the seasonal harvest of Hatch Chiles. The Hatch Chile Festival-in the town of Hatch, New Mexico-can draw up to 30,000 visitors annually. Visitors flock to experience the renowned flavor of peppers that share the town's name. But, these Chiles haven't just inherited the name; they've taken on the characteristics of the distinctive New Mexican terroir-the arid soil and dry climate that yield peppers with incomparable taste. No matter whether it was chance, providence, or just a fluke that we showed up, once we smelled for ourselves the aroma of chiles roasting over the fire, we hatched a plan. That plan has come to fruition in Trader José's Hatch Valley Salsa. The short ingredient list (Hatch Chiles, tomatillos, lime juice, and garlic salt) attests to the impression these peppers can make on one's palate. The handpicked, flame-roasted Chiles are hot-not melt-your-face-off hot, mind you-but definitely not mild. To these, we've added a small amount of tomatil- los and limejuice to round out the flavor, balance the acidity, and tame the heat-ever so slightly. The result is a "sauce" that is excellent with tortilla chips, or to dress up a taco salad. Try hatching an egg (and then scrambling and cooking it) to build a better breakfast burrito with black beans, a little crumbled bacon, and a healthy dose of this Salsa. Add some to your soups, stews, and crock-pot meals to bring the flavorful heat. In case you can't get yourself to the festival, we're bringing Hatch Chiles to you. Keep life spicy with your own 12-ounce jar of low calorie, low sodium, Hatch Valley Salsa for just $2.69. Muchas gracias, Trader José! 9.29.1 4
053680.name: Salsa Hatch Valley
053680.title: Hatch Valley Salsa

062048.description: We're famously infatuated with pumpkin. You could call it our bread and butter. Honestly, you could go even farther and call it our Pumpkin Bread [sku 52484] and Pumpkin Butter [sku 06372]. But we hope that in all the pumpkin craze, we don't overshadow one of the best parts of the pumpkin, the seed. Pumpkin seeds, also known as pepitas, are an exceptionally crunchy, slightly nutty, deliciously flavorful treat that can bring a serious savory factor to pretty much anything they're added to, be it a pesto sauce, trail mix, or Trader Joe's Pepita Salsa. By combining the bright, zesty tomato and pepper flavors of a traditional chunky salsa with the texture and nuttiness of finely chopped pepitas, our Pepita Salsa has created a savory synthesis of seed and spice. Not only do the pepitas add a nice thickness to the Salsa's body, making it even easier to scoop up with a tortilla or corn chip, but their hearty, earthy flavor balances the acidity of the tomatoes and vinegar expertly. On top of that, each bite of Pepita Salsa also carries the delicate sweet heat of puréed bell pepper and chipotle spices, making this one seriously satisfying salsa. Please join us in welcoming Trader Joe's Pepita salsa to our legendary family of pumpkin products. To cel- ebrate, we recommend using it in any situation that calls for salsa, from a classic chips and salsa appetizer (especially our Quinoa and Black Bean Infused Tortilla Chips [sku 97226]), to a topping for tacos (especially with vegetarian Jackfruit [sku 58772] tacos), or as the sauce for homemade chilaquiles. We're selling 12-ounce jars of Trader Joe's Pepita Salsa for $2.99, a remarkable value for such a unique (and uniquely delicious) salsa. 10.08. 18
062048.name: Salsa Pepita
062048.title: Pepita Salsa

062789.description: The name of Trader Joe's Organic Thick & Chunky Salsa does aptly communicate its texture, but what it doesn't convey is the devoted following it's already garnered amongst our tasting panel. One reason for this devotion is its USDA-certified organic status; up until now, TJ's Organic Tomatillo & Roasted Yellow Chili Salsa [sku 98838] has been our lone shelf-stable organic salsa offering. Another reason-the most important reason-is its sheer deliciousness. Made with big chunks of organic diced tomatoes, organic tomato paste, organic onions, and organic jalapeños, then spiced with organic cayenne pepper and organic dehydrated garlic, Trader Joe's Organic Thick & Chunky Salsa is fresh and flavorful, packing just the right amount of medium-level heat. And, boy, is this Salsa versatile. Sure, you can use it as you would any other-in burritos, tacos, and quesadillas, with tortilla chips, etc. But you can also use it in less expected ways. Spoon it atop baked chicken or fish. Pour a few jars into a slow cooker with TJ's Bone-In Skin-On Chicken Thighs [sku 61046] and vegetables. Use it as the sauce on a tasty Mexican-inspired pizza. Or, just scoop it up with TJ's Organic Taza Blues [sku 63102]. We're selling each 16-ounce jar of Organic Thick & Chunky Salsa for $2.49-a fantastic everyday value for a fantastic, everyday salsa. You'll find it in our grocery aisle, near our chips and snacks.
062789.name: Salsa Chunky Organic
062789.title: Organic Thick & Chunky Salsa

079614.description: Perhaps not as corny as the Fearless Flyer, but Trader Joe's Corn & Chile Salsa is definitely corny. In a good way. It's an a-maizing condiment, beginning with a base of sweet corn, and blended with finely diced red bell peppers, onions, jalapeño peppers, and a bit of sugar. By "a base of sweet corn," we mean, "lots and lots of sweet corn." As in, 1.8 ears of corn in every jar - we have taken them off their cobs to make them fit. (We've sold enough of this salsa that over time, this has added up to more than 41,313,173 ears of corn.) It has a little kick, but it's not what we'd call hot. Pile it into tacos or burritos, scoop it up with Organic Corn Dippers [sku 92482], spoon it over salads or chili or soup, use it as a dip for veggies, fold it into scrambled eggs, serve it as a side dish with grilled chicken or fish, blend it into Queso Dip [99262], or even use it in place of traditional relish on a hot dog. You'll really relish our price of $2.49 for each 13.75 ounce jar. Look for Trader Joe's Corn & Chile Salsa in our grocery aisle.
079614.name: Corn And Chile Tomato-Less Salsa

064582.description: Trader Joe's Aussie-style Chocolate Crème Sandwich Cookies are made for us in the Netherlands, and inspired by a classic Australian treat. Silky chocolate crème is sandwiched between two crispy, rectangular chocolate cookies, then entirely enrobed in a smooth chocolate coating. That's triple the chocolate, by our count! Take a bite and experience all the chocolate layers in succession-smooth, then crunchy, then airy light. Or, bite off opposing corners (on opposite ends of the cookie), then dunk one end in some milk, coffee, or hot cocoa, while you suck the other side like a straw until you taste the beverage. As soon as you taste it, put the whole cookie in your mouth to experience the most incredible, creamy, chocolatey, melting sensation! Every day, you'll find 7.05-ounce boxes filled with 11 of these Chocolate Crème Sandwich Cookies above our freezers. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Aussie-style Chocolate Crème Sandwich Cookies
064582.name: Cookie Sandwich Aussie
064582.title: Trader JoeâS Aussie-Style Chocolate Crã¿Me Sandwich Cookies Coated In Chocolate 11 Cookies

065415.description: Have you heard the one about the Sprinkles and the Sandwich Cookie? No?! Okay, so These Sprinkles Walk Into a Sandwich Cookie¿ Actually, let's back it up a bit. Starting over. So, once, there was this squad of sprinkles-rainbow sprinkles, specifically, except they got their colors from veggie juice & plant extracts, not numbered food dyes. Anyway, one day, they were feeling lonely, so they set out in search of a cookie companion. But these serendipitous sprinkles didn't just find any cookie companion. They found a Trader Joe's Sandwich Cookie comprised of two chunky butter cookies and a buttercream filling! Sensing the Sprinkles were sick of their solitude, the Sandwich Cookie summoned the cadre of colorful, confetti-like confections to join the party¿ and the rest is Trader Joe's These-Sprinkles-Walk-Into-a-Sandwich-Cookie history! These sprinkle-saturated Sandwich Cookies are a perfect approximation of classic, birthday-cake flavor. The sprinkles baked into the cookies and mixed into the frosting filling, so they look like little birthday cakes, too! Ready for the punchline? We're selling each six-ounce box of six, one-ounce Cookies for $2.99*-a no-joke value we'll be offering for as long as our limited inventory lasts. Now¿ Let's get this party started! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. These Sprinkles Walk Into A Sandwich Cookie
065415.name: These Sprinkles Walk Into A Sandwich Cookie Butter Cookies Filled With Buttercream Frosting And Sprinkles --------- Note To Design: "Sandwich Cookies" Is The Statement Of Identity, Which Must Be At Least 1/2 The Size Of The Product Name.

070345.description: There's something about summer that makes certain sweets shine a little differently than they do in other seasons. Take a classic strawberry shortcake, for example. Strawberry shortcake is undoubtedly delicious any time of year, but indulging in a creamy, cakey, sweet and slightly tart one on a long, lazy, summer afternoon, it feels downright decadent. Taking inspiration from this seasonal luxury, we set out to create a perfectly portioned (and highly portable!) version in the form of Trader Joe's Strawberry Shortcake Sandwich Cookies. Each Sandwich Cookie is made by pressing together two rich, crumbly, strawberry-bit-studded butter cookies between a dollop of sweet, fluffy buttercream filling. The resulting bite is a remarkable medley of textures, ranging from the flaky, buttery, melt-in-your-mouth goodness of the cookie to the wondrous creaminess of the filling inside, all anchored by the deliciously ripe and fruity flavor of the strawberry bits throughout. It's just the kind of Cookie to enjoy after a satisfying summer brunch, or to bring along as a dessert after a peaceful picnic in the park. But just like the season itself, it won't be around forever - while inventory lasts, look for Trader Joe's Strawberry Shortcake Sandwich Cookies lounging about in our cookie aisle. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Strawberry Shortcake Sandwich Cookies
070345.name: Strawberry Shortcake Sandwich Cookies
070345.title: Strawberry Shortcake Cookies

070377.description: Trader Joe's Chocolate & Peanut Butter Joe-Joe's have a lot going for them. First, they feature the unbeatable flavor-combination of chocolate and peanut butter. And they do it in the form of our eponymous sandwich cookies. It's hard to imagine anything better! Instead of vanilla crème between the biscuits, these two cocoa-flavored cookies are sandwiched around creamy peanut butter. We could have stopped there... but we didn't. Next, we doubled-down on those flavors by entirely enrobing these Joe Joe's in a creamy peanut-butter coating and finishing with a sweet, chocolatey drizzle. Have them with a cold glass of milk or a hot mug of coffee. Or just have them on their own. You really can't go wrong. Find 6.8-ounce boxes of eight Trader Joe's Chocolate & Peanut Butter Joe-Joe's every day among the rest of our cookies. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Chocolate & Peanut Butter Joe-Joe's
070377.name: Joe Joes Peanut Butter
070377.title: Chocolate & Peanut Butter Joe-Joe'S

073022.description: Combining the summery splendor of lemonade stands and strawberry fields with the snackability of a classic sandwich cookie, Trader Joe's Strawberry Lemonade Joe-Joe's are the latest in the hallowed line of special edition, seasonally inspired Joe-Joe's cookies that magically appear on our shelves throughout the year. On the outside, you'll find two, golden, lemon-flavored wafer cookies that are made with dried lemon and natural lemon flavor for extra zesty oomph. Nestled between these tart, snappy wafers is a smooth crème filling bursting with bright strawberry notes, which is further enhanced by the inclusion of actual bits of dried strawberry. If these cookies sound scrumptious, that's because they are-it's an instance where the resulting treat is somehow even more tasty than the sum of its sweetly splendid parts. Fair warning-the magical appearance of this kosher-certified, nostalgic nosh on our cookie shelves is limited, so be sure to grab a box while you can! Strawberry Lemonade Joe-Joe's
073022.name: Joe Joes Strawberry Lemonade
073022.title: Strawberry Lemonade Joe-Joe'S

073609.description: As longtime fans of shortbread, we're always searching high and low for sweet treats that highlight this cookie's beautifully buttery texture. Recently, we found a supplier in the Netherlands who uses an all-butter recipe to produce some of the most satisfyingly sweet and crumbly shortbread we've ever tasted. To make a long story short (or is that a shortbread story long?), as soon as we tried it, we immediately knew how best to showcase it: in these jubilantly jammy All Butter Shortbread Sandwich Cookies with Raspberry Filling! Each bite of a Trader Joe's All Butter Shortbread Sandwich Cookie is an exercise in complementary flavors and textures, starting with the crisp exterior of the shortbread, which quickly gives way to a magnificent, melt-in-your-mouth butteriness, which in turn gives way to the tart, fruity zing of the Raspberry Filling. An excellent option for any kind of after-dinner dessert, midday tea-time, or sweet morning indulgence situation, we especially enjoy pairing one of these Sandwich Cookies with a nice, hot cup of coffee or Organic Earl Grey [sku 62680]. And for those looking to go the extra mile, they can also be enjoyed dipped in melted chocolate, or crumbled and layered into a particularly exquisite parfait. All Butter Shortbread Sandwich Cookies With A Raspberry Filling
073609.name: Shortbread Sandwich Raspberry
073609.title: All Butter Shortbread Sandwich Cookies With Raspberry Filling

075517.description: Two titans of taste come together in a spring-seasonal, candy-coated, cookie collab with Trader Joe's Ube Joe- Joe's! Made for us by the same supplier as our seasonal Ube Pretzels [sku 73660], each Ube Joe-Joe starts with a soft, sweet, and satisfyingly ube-flavored crème, which our supplier sandwiches between two of the same vanilla cookies as can be found in our Vanilla Joe-Joe's [sku 69271]. After that, they're completely covered in a yogurt and ube candy coating, giving every bite a double dose of sweet, lightly coconut-y ube to go with its light, crispy, vanilla cookie crunch. With their soft, pastel purple color and dreamily drizzled stripes, our Ube Joe-Joe's make an eye-catching (in addition to appetite-piquing) addition to any springtime dessert spread or cookie board. That said, they're equally stunning in much less formal contexts, too, as a delicious anytime sweet treat when enjoyed on their own, and even more delectable when paired with a cup of coffee or tea. For an extra special treat, try crumbling them over a bowl of your favorite ice cream, or blending them into an abundantly ube-forward milkshake. Ube Joe-Joe's
075517.name: Joe Joes Ube Coated Ube

076572.description: While our buyers are always on the lookout for the Next Big ThingTM in the cookie department, there's something about a classic recipe, crafted to our stringent cookie standards (among them, delightfulness, deliciousness, and of course, dunkability) that's, quite frankly, irresistible. Case (or cookie, rather) in point: our new and improved Trader Joe's Joe-Joe's Chocolate Vanilla Creme Sandwich Cookies. When this Cookie's predecessor fell out of favor with customers, we partnered with a long-time supplier to create a next-generation Joe-Joe worthy of the name. It starts simply enough with two delightfully crunchy, chocolate cookies, made with rich cocoa powder and a touch of sea salt. Sandwiched between them is a sweet, whipped creme filling, flecked with fragrant, flavorful specks of vanilla bean throughout. It's a timeless- and undeniably delicious-combination of toothsome cookies and velvety creme, ideal for dunking in milk, snacking out of hand, packing in a lunch bag, crumbling into the base of an ice cream cake¿ you get the idea! In addition to the glow-up of the Cookies themselves, we've taken this opportunity to remove the outer box from the equation, opting instead for a resealable film that protects the cookies in their tray while simultaneously maximizing freshness-no cookie jar required! Whether you're a fan of the original or an inquisitive initiate, Joe-Joe's Chocolate Vanilla Creme Sandwich Cookies are sure to become an instant classic in your pantry. You'll find kosher-certified packages on the cookie shelves at-where else?-your neighborhood Trader Joe's. Joe-Joe's Chocolate Vanilla Creme Sandwich Cookies
076572.name: Joe Joes Chocolate Vanilla
076572.title: Chocolate Vanilla Creme Joe-Joe'S

093854.description: Though they may appear humble on the outside, hazelnuts (also known in some circles as filberts) pack a surprising amount of flavor - flavor which just so happens to thoroughly complement the taste of dark chocolate. With Trader Joe's Chocolate Hazelnut Cookies, we've managed to explore this complementary relationship on not one, but two fronts: we start with a light, crispy, craveable butter Cookie that's made with ground hazelnut meal, giving each bite a nice touch of earthy, toasty, hazelnut flavor. We then take two of those hazelnut-infused Cookies and sandwich them around a dollop of Chocolate Hazelnut cream to create a tantalizing, two-pronged chocolate & hazelnut treat. The resulting sandwich Cookie is a marvel of modern munching: crispy, chocolate-y, and lightly nutty with a generous dusting of powdered sugar on top. Great for pairing with a shot of Barista Espresso [sku 65641], placing in school lunches, or just keeping on hand for an anytime snack, you can find these Chocolate Hazelnut Cookies at Trader Joe's (and only at Trader Joe's, we should add) for $3.99* for a ten-ounce box, every day. Look for them with our other cookies. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Chocolate Hazelnut Cookies
093854.name: Choc Hazelnut

066728.description: Trader Joe's is committed to developing products with the very best attributes to satisfy all the desires of our Customers. Of course, this commitment includes our fresh meat selection! We now have several fresh sausage offerings that not only cook up juicy and full of flavor, but that also possess some very attractive characteristics when it comes to how the meat is raised and processed. In the case of Trader Joe's Sweet Italian Sausage Made with Pork, our U.S. supplier starts with pork raised with no antibiotics ever and with no added hormones. This pork is also officially "crate free," which means the animals were not restrained in gestation or farrowing crates. Our Sweet Italian Sausage is also considered "all natural," which means it's been minimally processed with no artificial ingredients. With all these wonderful attributes in mind, you'll be glad to grill or pan fry these links to enjoy on a bun. And, their Italian spice blend lends a traditional flavor that really shines when simmered in your tomato pasta sauces. Find the one-pound package of five Sweet Italian Pork Sausages every day in our refrigerators. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Sweet Italian Sausage Made with Pork
066728.name: Sausage Pork Nat Crate Free Swt Italian
066728.title: Sweet Italian Sausage Made With Pork

066729.description: Trader Joe's is committed to developing products with the very best attributes to satisfy all the desires of our Customers. Of course, this commitment includes our fresh meat selection! We now have several fresh sausage offerings that not only cook up juicy and full of flavor, but that also possess some very attractive characteristics when it comes to how the meat is raised and processed. In the case of Trader Joe's Hot Italian Sausage Made with Pork, our U.S. supplier starts with pork raised with no antibiotics ever and with no added hormones. This pork is also officially "crate free," which means the animals were not restrained in gestation or farrowing crates. Our Hot Italian Sausage is also considered "all natural," which means it's been minimally processed with no artificial ingredients. With all these wonderful attributes in mind, you'll be glad to grill or pan fry these links to enjoy on a bun. And, their Italian spice blend (which includes red pepper for some spicy heat), lends flavor that really kicks when simmered in your tomato pasta sauces. Find the one-pound package of five Hot Italian Pork Sausages every day in our refrigerators. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Hot Italian Sausage Made with Pork
066729.name: Sausage Pork Nat Crate Free Hot Italian
066729.title: Hot Italian Sausage Made With Pork

066730.description: Trader Joe's is committed to developing products with the very best attributes to satisfy all the desires of our Customers. Of course, this commitment includes our fresh meat selection! We now have several fresh sausage offerings that not only cook up juicy and full of flavor, but that also possess some very attractive characteristics when it comes to how the meat is raised and processed. In the case of Trader Joe's Asian Style Chicken Sausage, our U.S. supplier uses chicken raised on all vegetarian feed. The chicken is also raised with no antibiotics ever and no added hormones. Flavor-wise, these Sausages emulate the sweet & savory character of traditional Chinese sausages. A complex mix of seasonings contributes to the flavor, including soy sauce, cinnamon, cloves, mustard, molasses, red miso, garlic powder, char sui powder, fennel, sage, cumin, black pepper, cardamom, anise, turmeric, ginger, and concentrated plum juice. This means they are ideal to pan fry, cut up, and add to fried rice, stir-fries, and all kinds of other Asian dishes. Even so, they're great on a hot dog roll, too! Find one-pound packages of five Trader Joe's Asian Style Chicken Sausages every day in our refrigerators. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Asian Style Chicken Sausage
066730.name: Sausage Nat Asian Style Chicken Sausage

066731.description: Trader Joe's is committed to developing products with the very best attributes to satisfy all the desires of our Customers. Of course, this commitment includes our fresh meat selection! We now have several fresh sausage offerings that not only cook up juicy and full of flavor, but that also possess some very attractive characteristics when it comes to how the meat is raised and processed. In the case of Trader Joe's Chicken Breakfast Sausage, our U.S. supplier uses chicken raised on all vegetarian feed. The chicken is also raised with no antibiotics ever and no added hormones. And, our Chicken Sausages are mildly seasoned with savory spices that bring to mind breakfast down on the farm. (If you haven't been, just trust us!) With all these attributes in mind, you'll be glad to pan fry these links and enjoy them with a big breakfast of eggs, toast, pancakes, waffles... Or, cut them up and put them in all kinds of egg dishes from omelets to casseroles. Find the 12-ounce package of twelve Chicken Breakfast Sausages every day in our refrigerators. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Chicken Breakfast Sausage
066731.name: Sausage Nat Chicken Breakfast
066731.title: Chicken Breakfast Sausage __________________ Note To Design: "Breakfast Sausage" Is The Standard Of Identity. It Must Be Bold, Prominent And At Least Half The Height Of The Largest Type Size Used On Pdp.

066493.description: Mixed nuts are a great snack option when you've grown a little bored of one nut or another at a time. Trader Joe's Olive & Herbs Mixed Nuts not only brings you a mix of three favorite nuts, but also brings in some dried olives and serious seasonings for a truly unique eating experience. The nut-base consists of whole, crunchy, almonds; buttery, cashew kernels; and pecan pieces with their tender crunch. They're all tossed in a herb blend that includes oregano, sage, thyme, basil, marjoram, rosemary-and of course, sea salt. Perhaps the kicker, however, is the addition of Kalamata olives from Greece. The olives have been dehydrated and tossed in sunflower oil and extra virgin olive oil with some sea salt. The softer texture of the olives, along with their pleasantly pungent tang really brings this snack mix to life, not to mention the way the herbs aromatically accent the nutty trio! Find Olive & Herbs Mixed Nuts in our nuts section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Olive & Herbs Mixed Nuts
066493.name: Mixed Nuts Olive & Herb
066493.title: Olive & Herbs Mixed Nuts

066915.description: Just like our famous Everything But the Bagel Seasoning [sku 59137], this new Nut Duo does not include bagels. Donut-sized bread in the bag would make this snack super unwieldy. Thinking better of it, we left out the bagels and went for a mix of whole, meaty almonds and crunchy cashews-together coated in a seasoning blend that echoes that seedy seasoning our Customers have come to love. Black and white sesame seeds, poppy seeds, and sea salt combine with the natural flavors of garlic and onion to complement these nuts. It's a crunchy, nutty sensation with lots of savory flavor and 6g of protein per quarter- cup serving. Everything but the Bagel Nut Duo will definitely bring extra brio to your next party spread, and assuredly ante up your daily snacking routine. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Everything but the Bagel Nut Duo
066915.name: Mixed Nut Duo Everything Bagel
066915.title: Everything But The Bagel Nut Duo

038380.description: Dahlias are one of the most spectacular garden flowers, and have become quite sought after in the last few years. Trader Joe's Dahlias are grown locally within a few hours of our stores. Our West Coast Dahlias are grown in So. CA & WA. Our East Coast Stores are serviced by a grower in New Jersey where the climate is ideal for growing these stunning flowers. Our growers specializes in growing dahlias, and offers us over 30 unique and colorful ball and standard varieties! Our Dahlia selection varies in color through the season. These are a seasonal flower, typically available mid-June through October.
038380.name: Dahlia Bunch

044089.description: These beautiful flowers are grown for Trader Joe's in the fertile land of the Savannah of Bogota, Colombia and the Andean mountain range of Quito, Ecuador. Our Rainforest certified farms grow this rich assortment of flowers specifically for our Trader Joe's customers. These lovely mixes of long-lasting flowers are sure to dazzle as a gift or accent any home décor.
044089.name: Godetia Bunch
044089.title: Godetia Plant

050316.description: Alstroemeria is a flower often referred to by its common names, Peruvian Lily or Lily of the Incas. Fine names, indeed. We prefer the scientific name Alstroemeria, though, because it conjures up images of ethereal beauty in our minds. And these gorgeous flowers certainly do embody that ethereal beauty. Trader Joe's Alstroemeria are high grade flowers shipped directly to us from the grower in Colombia, so they're fresh and beautiful and have terrific "vase life" (especially if you change the water daily; these blooms are thirsty). We have an assortment of vibrant colors (each bunch is of a single color), all on long, straight stems with multiple blooms per stem - they look simply stunning in a clear glass vase. Because our supplier sees a spike in production at this time of year, we have the opportunity to offer an even greater value than our everyday offering, and that opportunity just happens to happen in time for inclusion in the Fearless Flyer - we love it when things come together like this. For a limited time, we are able to offer this 20 Stem Bunch for the astonishing price of $4.99, only a dollar more than our everyday, 9-stem bunch. But get 'em while they last - ethereal beauty like this, at this kind of earthbound price, doesn't stick around forever¿
050316.name: Holiday Lights Alstroemeria

051851.description: Protea is a curious tropical flower that will add novelty and wonder to your home. These are long lasting and hardy. An elegant flower combination. These exotic flowers are guaranteed a long shelf life and a conversation piece sure to impress.
051851.name: Premium Pin Cushion Bqt
051851.title: Protea Bunch (Pin & Safari)

057574.description: Trader Joe's Star of Bethlehem are grown just as Mother Nature intended for them. They love warm days and cool evenings and flower in the early spring. Star of Bethlehem flowers are star-shaped (hence the name) with six white petals and a yellow-green center which measures approximately 1 inch across. Flowers emit a pleasant scent. The genus name is Ornithogalum which is derived from two Greek words - ornithos (bird) and gala (milk) thought to be related to the white color of the flowers. Star of Bethlehem was believed to have originated in southern Europe and Africa and there are more than 50 different species.
057574.name: Star Of Bethlehem Bunch

058735.description: Trader Joe's best-selling Carnation Mini Novelty will have a new Color mix for the next 4 weeks, shipping 11/225 through 12/22.. Beautiful Holiday colors for home decorating and needs.. Lots of Red, Whites and Peppermints along with perennial favorites in Dark Pink, Burgundy, Light Pink and touches of Purples, Yellow, Orange, Lavender and many other Bicolors and novelties to enhance any floral display
058735.name: Carnation Mini Novelty

060000.description: Gypsophila or as more commonly known as Baby's Breath is most recognizable as a popular flower filler used by florist and flower shops due to its attractive and sturdy nature whether fresh or dried. Native to Eurasia and Africa now become naturalized in most other continents including North America. Trader Joe's Gypsophila is coming straight from the fields Andes Mountains in Ecuador. Gypsophila is used in variety of flower arrangements and most recognizable with roses. Very popular in weddings and also in many other innovative and beautiful ways. Each bunch of Baby's Breath Gypsophila is $3.99.
060000.name: Babys Breath Gypsophila
060000.title: Baby'S Breath (Gypsophylla)

060351.description: Trader Joe's premium quality Oriental Lilies feature fragrant, large blooms. Oriental Lilies, sometimes referred to as "Orchid Lilies," range in color from purest white to shades of sweet pinks, rich reds and even bi-colored varieties. Each lily has large 6 - 8" blooms, and the buds open progressively during a period of 14+ days. Our grower specializes in Oriental Lilies, and has several varieties that are exclusive to them. Trader Joe's Oriental Lilies come in an assortment of varieties, including Stargazer, Starfighter, Love Story, Sumatra and more. Watch for varieties to change throughout the year with the change in seasons. Note: Lily pollen can stain clothing and surfaces. Remove the anthers as the blooms open to avoid pollen stains.
060351.name: Oriental Lily Bunch

061769.description: Gerberas are commonly known as African Daisies since they originated from South Africa. In North America you're more likely to hear them referred to as Gerber Daisy or Gerbera Daisy, both being altered versions of the scientific name Gerbera jamesonii. Gerberas are the 5th most popular cut flower in the world. Each stem has a single colorful bloom in colors of white, yellow, peach, orange, red, pink and dozens of novelty bi-color varieties! Gerberas are phototropic. The head will turn towards the strongest light. Store gerberas straight up in a bucket and reinforce the heads.
061769.name: Gerbera Grower Bunch

062047.description: Gerberas symbolize beauty and innocence. They are flowers closely related to friendship and the purity of the first love. They also symbolize closeness to nature, purity and cheerfulness. Think of the possibilities to give smiles!
062047.name: Gerbera Daisy Bunch

062064.description: The Craspedia stands symbol for good health. Just like many flowers, the name comes from the Greek "Kraspedon"means "edging" which is a referral to the silver and feathery foliage that grows at the beginning of the stems.
062064.name: Craspedia Bunch

062098.description: Thanks to the partnership with our rose supplier, we are able to offer this lovely bunch of a dozen white roses for an amazing price of $9.99. Think of the possibilities! Run, don't walk, to stop and smell these roses!
062098.name: Rose Dz Asst. White-Ivory
062098.title: Rose White Dozen

062119.description: Spray Roses are named for the way in which their flowers "spray" off their stems. Each stem has 4 to 6 blossoms close together emanating from lateral branches off the primary stem. This produces a full bunch of sweet little roses! Trader Joe's Spray Roses will come in a mix of bright and vibrant colors. Each case will contain bunches of orange, yellow, hot pink, medium pink, lavender, white, red and bi-color spray roses. Spray Roses are part of the giant genus Rosa in the vast Rosacea family of about 3,100 species encompassing a wide array of blooming and edible plants. The Rosa genus is divided into three main categories -- species (wild) roses, old garden roses and modern roses. All contain kinds with spray blossoms.
062119.name: Spray Roses

062192.description: Trader Joe's Tulips Big Bunch are grown just as Mother Nature intended; in soil. These large soil-grown bulbs produce a sturdy plant with larger buds and darker foliage. Our tulips are cut and shipped in the tight "Dutch Cut" bud stage. The "Dutch Cut" ensures tulips will grow in the vase as they open enhancing the experience and enjoyment! The current bulbs for the fall and holiday periods, come from the Southern Hemisphere so they will be `spring' quality in the winter! Then they are brought to the U.S., where they are tricked into thinking it is spring and it is now time to grow and bloom. Colors change by season, and include an assortment of yellow, orange, red, bicolor, pink, dk pink, white, and purple. All 100% Soil Grown in California (West).
062192.name: Tulips Big Bunch Asst

062535.description: These Red Dozen Roses will bring finesse, softness and a great sensation of beauty during the amazing summer. Think of the possibilities! Run, don't walk, to stop and smell these roses!
062535.name: Rose Dz Red
062535.title: Dozen Red Roses

062676.description: The Trader Joes Premium White & Blue Hydrangea are grown in the mountains of Medellin Colombia. The shade of blue varies depending on the acidity of the soil and the time of year. The color can range from light to a dark blue. The white can appear more creamy yellow when it's cut tight. As the flower drinks water and opens the heads will grow in size and the Hydrangea will turn a more pure white. Hydrangeas make a beautiful base in an arrangements or can elegantly stand alone in a vase. Hydrangeas are available year round.
062676.name: Hydrangea 3 Stem
062676.title: Hydrangea 3-Stem

064689.description: Trader Joe's calla lilies are a true California grown product from the bulbs to the fresh cut flowers. These field grown beauties stem from locally hybridized calla lily bulbs. Trader Joe's calla lily bulbs are grown from seeds. It takes two growing seasons to produce a bulb that is ready for cut flower production. Trader Joe's calla lilies are grown year-round in California's Monterey Bay area. The year round climate in this region provides an excellent environment for producing premium quality fresh cut callas. Trader Joe's calla lilies are available in 10 stem bunches. Colors will vary by season. They are available in shades of orange, purple, pink, peach, red, white and yellow.
064689.name: Lily Calla Mini
064689.title: Calla Lily Mini

065651.description: Transitioning to the Holidays we have a unique Carnation item, rainbow "candy cane" bunches and solid holiday colored bunches.
065651.name: Carnation Big Bunch
065651.title: Carnation Holiday

066750.description: Veronica, also called Speedwell, is a carefree and easy-to-grow perennial with long spikes of small petals in purple, blue, pink, or white. this flower signifies fidelity and love, perfect for such a setting for even as a surprise gift for that special someone
066750.name: Veronica

067337.description: Hypericum androsaemum, also referred to as St. John's Wort, or sweet-amber, is a flowering plant in the family Hypericaceae. The common name was given to the plant because it brings its golden blossoms each year around St. John's Day on June 24. St. John's Wort is also used in traditional medicine as a source of St. John's oil, which is known for its anti-depressive characteristics. Perhaps that's why, in ancient times, hypericum flowers were placed over windows and pictures to protect against evil spirits. The genus' name refers to this ritual by combining the Greek words hyper (above) and eikon (image).
067337.name: Ornamental St.Johns Wort (Hypericum)

067504.description: Hydrangea variety Macrophylla Shamrock is called shamrock variety because the leaves are divided into three leaflet petals that make the bloom. Shamrock Hydrangea are a novelty Hydrangea that comes in solid dark green as well as a white and green variegated variety Both are cut from the same plant. Shamrock Hydrangeas are imported fresh from Colombia on a daily basis. And have a reputation for being one of the longest lasting hydrangeas on the market.
067504.name: Shamrock Hydrangea

068538.description: Everything is coming up roses at our farms in South America. Our hydroponic greenhouses keep our rose plants healthy and growing strong while our strategic location along the equator ensures that these crops have the perfect mix of warm and cool temperatures they need to bloom. This month we have been experiencing some extra sunny days which means we have a lot more of these lovely roses springing up and ready to bring some more beauty into our lives. Thanks to this little extra sunshine we can offer this beautiful 17 stem bouquet. Our classic roses are paired with our stunning spray roses and a touch of greenery in five different color combinations that are sure to have you living la vie en rose. This rose extravaganza usually retails for over twenty dollars but will be available, for a limited time, at the incredible price of $9.99 only at Trader Joe's and at that price you don't need rose colored glasses to know you won't have to pick just one!
068538.name: Rose And Spray Rose Bqt

069897.description: These Dozen Rainbow Roses are a powerful bunch of colors that will bring happiness and a great sensation of beauty during the amazing season. Think of the possibilities! Run, don't walk, to stop and smell these roses!
069897.name: Rainbow Dozen Rose

070240.description: Garden roses have been around for centuries and developing varieties that have longer Vase life has been a challenge. The main difference of this "Country Roses" with regular hybrid tea roses is the shape (Cup shape mainly), fragrance and different coloration on the same flower. Country roses need to be cut "tighter" than regular roses, for them to be able to endure transportation, once they start opening you can appreciate the delicate centers, resembles the shape of a Peony and some like Ranunculus. After 3 days in water you can really appreciate all the attributes of these delicate flowers. Enjoy!
070240.name: Garden Roses
070240.title: Country Garden Rose

070319.description: Trader Joe's Premium Assorted Greens are perfect addition to your stores for any season. With an assortment of Var. Rhamnus, Honey Melaleuca, Grevilia, Ligustrum, Boxwood,Pittosporum, Integrafolia, Ruscus, Curly Pin these Greens reflect nature's bounty. Trader Joe's Premium Assorted Greens come from an array of farmers who use their talents to grow and harvest a variety of premium Greens. Your customers can use these greens as a decoration by themselves in a vase or combine them with other flowers to make lovely bouquets and arrangements to decorate their homes and workplaces.
070319.name: Premium Assorted Greens

070407.description: Jumbo Mum Balls are a delightful touch to any space, symbolizing friendship, happiness, and positivity. Perfect for special occasions, home decor, or thoughtful gifts, Jumbo Mum Balls offer vibrant colors and unparalleled beauty, bringing a touch of nature's splendor into your life, making them the perfect choice for any flower lover. It's a fresh and fabulous choice you won't regret!
070407.name: Jumbo Mum Balls

070810.description: Eryngium, known for being very stern and independent. Strong, but simple in style. The flower that stands alone.
070810.name: Eryngium

070955.description: Grown in our Farms in Ecuador, Green Dragon/Aster Solidago¿ is characterized as an ultimate filler that blends harmoniously and adds volume and quality to any flower arrangement or bouquet. This flower has rich stems with many laterals and has a bright green color.
070955.name: Green Dragon/Aster Solidago
070955.title: Lepidium Bunches

072766.description: The Big bunch of tulips make a great focal flower in an arrangement or bouquet and do great by themselves in a vase bringing the Christmas look to your house or office.
072766.name: Tulips Seasonal Big Bunch
072766.title: Tulips Summer Big Bunch

073054.description: These Hot Pink/Light Pink Dozen Roses will bring finesse, softness and a great sensation of beauty during the amazing summer. Think of the possibilities! Run, don't walk, to stop and smell these roses!
073054.name: Rose Dz Pink/Purple/Bicolor
073054.title: Rose Dz Asst. Pink

073056.description: These Yellow/Orange Dozen Roses will bring shine, happiness and a great sensation of beauty during the amazing summer. Think of the possibilities! Run, don't walk, to stop and smell these roses!
073056.name: Rose Dz Yellow/Orange

073731.description: Enjoy the whimsical heart shaped planter with succulents. Use the gardens as décor in your home, patio, office or as an amazing gift. The vessels are filled with unique shapes, textures and colors of captivating succulents. Succulents look great with minimal care; they will not wilt if you forget to water them and are delightful to collect and use in gardens and containers. The more you know about these intriguing plants, the more you'll enjoy growing and collecting them!
073731.name: Dottie'S Micro Pom

074267.description: These beautiful flowers are grown for Trader Joe's in the fertile land of the Savannah of Bogota, Colombia and the Andean mountain range of Quito, Ecuador. Our Rainforest certified farms grow this rich assortment of flowers specifically for our Trader Joe's customers. These lovely mixes of long-lasting flowers are sure to dazzle as a gift or accent any home décor.
074267.name: Dogwood Rice Flower

074842.description: Grown in our Farms in Ecuador, Sea Lavander Sinensis is a beautiful mix of sinensis varieties. The fine branch structure and fragile flowers give it an exclusive, delicate and playful appearance. Its papery calyxes usually surround the true flowers. The calyxes keep their vibrant color, making the sinensis varieties some of the favorite flowers for dried arrangements.
074842.name: Sea Lavender Sinensis

074864.description: This Unicorn Gypsophila is the perfect color mix of gypso for this Easter season. The colorant that our farms use in Ecuador is 100% vegetable, free of lead and heavy metals. The farm has a water treatment system used before and after the dye process, which allows us to recycle the water for irrigation to support the conservation of the environment. This beautiful filler can be combined in a bouquet with almost any type of flower.
074864.name: Unicorn Gypsophila

075206.description: Memorial Day is an American holiday honoring those who gave their lives while serving in the U.S. military. Many Americans observe Memorial Day by visiting cemeteries, memorials, or holding family gatherings. Memorial Day is Monday, May 30th. The Memorial Day Bqt was created in observance of our national holiday using the traditional patriotic colors of red, white, and blue. This bouquet is available to order from May 23 - May 26.
075206.name: Memorial Day Bqt

075582.description: These little vases will bring the finest decoration to a table, a balcony, or any spot you would like to put it in. These 30cm length flowers have been cropped specially for this concept of a Garden Vase. You will be able to re-use the glass vase countless times; these are not one-time use.
075582.name: Seasonal Garden Vase

075736.description: Wax Flower is native to Western Australia but is grown in all continents with warm and dry climate. During the winter and spring flowers come from northern atmosphere like California and during summer months cut flowers come from Peru or Australia. The slightly waxy feel of its petals is the reason for his popular name. It comes in many different colors like pink, lavender, purple, white. Trader Joe's Wax flower will be perfect accent, peeping from bouquets and arrangements for any occasion or can be used by themselves in the vase. By using Wax flower your customers can add a lot of happiness, joy and creative twist to any floral arrangement.
075736.name: Wax Flower Big Bunch

076000.description: The witches' broom turns darker as the season goes on. This is Sudan grass and it does not need to be in water.
076000.name: Witches Broom

076272.description: Each year an area of rainforest the size of New Jersey is cut and destroyed. The plants and animals that live in these areas either die or must find a new forest to call home. Humans are the main cause of the deforestation. Although deforestation occurs throughout the world tropical forests are especially targeted. If current levels of deforestation continue, the world's tropical forest can disappear completely in as little as 100 years, according to National Geographic. Since 1990, Magic Flowers has been rescuing plant material from the damaged areas of the Amazon rainforest on an ecological Farm located on the coast of Ecuador. The cultivation of native species gives us the opportunity to share a piece of jungle charm with the world.
076272.name: Jumbo Premium Tropical Bqt

078010.description: These beautiful flowers are grown for Trader Joe's in the fertile land of the Savannah of Bogota, Colombia and the Andean mountain range of Quito, Ecuador. Our Rainforest certified farms grow this rich assortment of flowers specifically for our Trader Joe's customers. These lovely mixes of long-lasting flowers are sure to dazzle as a gift or accent any home décor.
078010.name: Green Accent Filler

078012.description: These beautiful flowers are grown for Trader Joe's in the fertile land of the Savannah of Bogota, Colombia and the Andean mountain range of Quito, Ecuador. Our Rainforest certified farms grow this rich assortment of flowers specifically for our Trader Joe's customers. These lovely mixes of long-lasting flowers are sure to dazzle as a gift or accent any home décor.
078012.name: Assorted Aster

080933.description: Chrysanthemums, often called mums or chrysanths, are of the genus Chrysanthemum constituting approximately 30 species of perennial flowering plants in the family Asteraceae which is native to Asia and northeastern Europe. Other members of the Asteraceae family include marigolds, dahlias, and zinneas. Chrysanthemums were first cultivated in China as a flowering herb as far back as the 15th century BC. The flower was brought to Europe in the 17th century. The name Chrysanthemum is derived from the Greek words, chrysos (gold) and anthemon (flower). Trader Joe's Big Bunch Chrysanthemums come in a wide array of colors, and are bred for a long lasting vase life.
080933.name: Chrysanthemums Big Bunch

082968.description: Alstoemeria, also known as the Peruvian Lily or Lily of the Incas, originates from South America. Our Single Color Alstroemeria comes in an array of bright colors. Alstroemeria symbolizes friendship and devotion.
082968.name: Alstroemeria Single Color 1

093283.description: A member of the iris family, gladioli originated from Southern Africa. Known as the sword lily, the botanical name comes from gladius, which is Latin for sword. Gladioli are semi hardy perennial herbs. They grow from rounded symmetrical corms which will reproduce in temperate climates. In colors of white, pink, orange, yellow, purple, green, bi-colors and pastels these stems can be 36- 48" long with 10 - 16 flowers per stem. Trader Joe's Gladiolus is available in 12-stem bunches in single colors. This flower looks stunning arranged on its own in a tall vase. In season July - October. Grown in Michigan.
093283.name: Gladiolus Bunch

098282.description: Matricaria Chamomile is a well-known medicinal plant species from the Asteraceae family often referred to as the "star among medicinal species." Nowadays it is a highly favored and much used medicinal plant in folk and traditional medicine. Its multitherapeutic, cosmetic, and nutritional values have been established through years of traditional and scientific use and research. These plants grown in our farms in Colombia have a strong and aromatic smell.
098282.name: Chamomile Matricaria

098446.description: A member of the iris family, gladioli originated from Southern Africa. Known as the sword lily, the botanical name comes from gladius, which is Latin for sword. Gladioli are semi hardy perennial herbs. They grow from rounded symmetrical corms which will reproduce in temperate climates. In colors of white, pink, orange, yellow, purple, green, bi-colors and pastels these stems can be 36- 48" long with 10 - 16 flowers per stem. Trader Joe's Gladiolus is available in 10-stem bunches in single colors. This flower looks stunning arranged on its own in a tall vase. In season July - October. Grown in Michigan.
098446.name: Jumbo Gladiolus Bunch

099409.description: Ranunculus, also known as Persian Buttercup, is native to the isle of Crete and Southwest Asia. It was first introduced to Europe with the Tulip and the Anemone during the reign of Elizabeth I (1558 to 1603). The name Ranunculus is Late Latin for "little frog," likely referring to many species being found near water, like frogs. Ranunculus is a relative to monkshood, columbine and delphinium. Their delicate looking paper- rose like blooms range from 1 to 4 inches. Colors range from reds and yellows, to pinks and white. We are offering Ranunculus in 10 stem bunches, while in-season through April or early May.
099409.name: Ranunculus Bunch
099409.title: Ranunculus 10 Stem

050130.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
050130.description: When we first introduced Trader Joe's Coconut Body Butter, way back in 2012, we thought it might be something we sold only during the cold weather months, and then took off our shelves during the spring and summer. Turns out, the body likes "butter" on this outside as much as on the inside (excuse the subjective interjection), and Coconut Body Butter has never (intentionally) left our shelves. This is a thick, smooth, buttery, body cream that's made with pure coconut oil and other skin-soothing ingredients, including aloe vera, shea butter and vitamin E. It absorbs into your skin very quickly, and doesn't leave it feeling oily. This particular blend of ingredients is beneficial for all skin types, so if you have eczema or dry skin, or you just like to keep your skin feeling soft and fresh, our Coconut Body Butter is nourishing, gentle, and soothing. We've seen similar products, made with similar ingredients, for as much as $20 in specialty stores. At Trader Joe's, we're selling Coconut Body Butter in an eight ounce jar for the very excellent price of $5.49. Now that's a value!
050130.name: Coconut Oil Body Butter
050130.title: Coconut Body Butter

050634.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
050634.name: Micellar Cleanser & Make Up Remover 20Ct

051150.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
051150.description: Facial Serums have become the "it" items in the world of skincare. And for good reason - unlike creams, moisturizers, and lotions, which are comprised of occlusive (airtight) ingredients and permeate only the first layer of skin, Serums are made of much smaller molecules and actually penetrate the first three layers of skin. With this in mind, we've loaded dermatologist-formulated Trader Joe's Nourish Antioxidant Facial Serum with an abundance of antioxidants (including resveratrol & Vitamin C); Coenzyme Q10; Vitamins A, D3, E, & B5; and plant extracts like coffee seed & green tea. You can use this clear, silky Serum by itself or as a make-up primer-but we highly recommend layering it under your favorite TJ's moisturizer & TJ's sunscreen. If you're already a devotee of our equally high-end TJ's Nourish Hyaluronic Moisture Boost Serum [sku 61136], simply use the Hyaluronic Serum as a base layer, then apply Nourish Antioxidant Facial Serum on top of it. Trader Joe's Nourish Antioxidant Facial Serum is suitable for all skin types, and it'll leave your face feeling velvety-smooth. Serums like this typically come with ridiculous price tags (we're talking up to $50 per ounce!), but we're selling each one-fluid-ounce bottle of Nourish Antioxidant Facial Serum for $9.99. You'll find it sitting pretty in our health & beauty section.
051150.name: Antioxidant Facial Serum

054571.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
054571.description: As its name would suggest, Trader Joe's Ultra Moisturizing Hand Cream is, in fact, ultra-moisturzing. This is because it's made with coconut oil, hemp seed oil, and 20% pure shea butter, along with essential fatty acids and skin-friendly antioxidants like vitamins C & E. We also add sunflower seed oil, sweet almond oil, and linseed extract, which are prized for their skin-soothing/skin-softening abilities. The end result here is a luxuriously thick and rich, paraben-free Hand Cream that will hydrate your dry, wintry hands and leave them smelling enchantingly fresh. Like iso many things, it's what's on the inside of our Ultra Moisturizing Hand Cream that counts-but it doesn't hurt that each trendy metal tube comes packaged in an attractive and easily giftable box. Put a bow on it, and it becomes a très chic, and très thoughtful present for your beloved. Better yet, be your own beloved, and gift this Cream to yourself! Your hands (and feet!) will thank you. We're selling each three-ounce tube of Trader Joe's Ultra Moisturizing Hand Cream for $4.99. It's a high-end Hand Cream without the fancy-schmancy price tag. You'll find this this fantastic value in our health and beauty section. Go grab one today-you've got people to see and hands to shake!
054571.name: Ultra Moisturizing Hand Cream

054838.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
054838.description: If you could save time, money, and water every time you showered and still feel fresh, clean, and rejuvenated when you were finished, would you carpe clean-um? Well, seize the squeeze bottle! Trader Joe's All for One ¿ One for All Shampoo, Conditioner, & Body Wash is here. With this single, miraculous liquid, you can wash your body, cleanse your hair, and leave it feeling soft, smooth, and conditioned. All at once! Rather than paying for three individual products, you can just buy this one. Think of the dollar savings! Rather than wetting, washing, rinsing, conditioning, and rinsing again, you can just do it once. Think of the time and water savings! All for One ¿ One for All is pH balanced, safe for color-treated hair, hypoallergenic, free of parabens and so- dium lauryl and/or lauryl sulfates. It's biodegradable and contains no harsh chemicals. We've blended scents like bergamot, lemon, sage, clary, ginger, and jasmine to produce a clean, fresh, yet subtle scent. We're selling each thirty-two fluid-ounce bottle for $7.99, a price that screams value-nothing subtle there. 8.03.1 5
054838.name: Soap Liquid All For One 3 In One
054838.title: All For One 3 In One Body Care

059702.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
059702.description: You never know just how useful a moist towelette can be until you don't have one when you need it. Whether it's cleaning your hands after an unexpectedly sticky lunch or simply giving your face a quick, invigorating cleanse before or after a nap, a good moist towelette can change your day. And luckily, you can now find a great moist towelette at Trader Joe's in the form of Trader Joe's Cucumber + Citrus Face and Body Wipes. Each pack contains 64 super soft, pre-moistened Wipes, which have been infused with a number of delightfully aromatic botanical extracts, including aloe, cucumber, oat, and lemon. This combination of ingredients not only helps every Wipe remove dirt and oil from the skin, but has a soothing, hydrating, and nicely refreshing effect, too. They're precisely the kind of gentle, paraben-free towelette you'll want to have handy at the office, in the kitchen, and especially when travelling. Take it from us - you never know when a skincare emergency might strike. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Cucumber + Citrus Face And Body Wipes
059702.name: Cucumber Citrus Wipes

061413.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
061413.description: Soap seems so simple, and yet is critical: it cleanses and staves off illnesses, bacteria, and other dirt or grime. Liquid soap didn't even exist until 1865, when William Sheppard was issued the first patent for this liquid form. We're all glad of this creation, especially because it led to Trader Joe's Pink Pomelo Grapefruit Hand Soap. Made with coconut-derived surfactants (the material responsible for soap's lathering, bubbling, and cleansing), our Pink Pomelo Grapefruit Hand Soap is made without synthetic dyes, phthalates, or parabens. Aside from doing its job wonderfully, this Soap smells fantastic. Its scent brings joy to all who use it-and we're thinking soap doesn't usually tend to elicit such strong emotion. It smells of pink pomelo and grapefruit. Pomelo is grapefruit's larger, sweeter cousin, and it lends this soap a slightly floral scent that complements the grapefruit's tartness. Jojoba and argan oils ensure this sudsy Soap leaves your hands smooth and moisturized. You'll find 17-fluid-ounce bottles of Pink Pomelo Grapefruit Hand Soap for $3.99 each, every day. You'll be thankful for such nice-smelling soap, and also thankful for such a great value, found only at Trader Joe's. 11.27. 17
061413.name: Hand Soap Grapefruit

061414.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
061414.description: Rub-a-dub-dub-it's three, naturally-derived ingredients making up the base of one exquisite scrub! That's right- we've got a new, seasonal body scrub arriving in our stores, just in time to slough, soothe, and soften your dry, wintry skin: Trader Joe's Grapefruit Ginger Sugar Scrub. With sugar to exfoliate, grapefruit, ginger root, and pomegranate extracts to rejuvenate, and a mixture of sweet almond, jojoba, and sunflower seed oil to soften, this Scrub has everything you need to get back that long-faded summer glow. It's also free from plenty of typical beauty-product ingredients that you don't need, like parabens, phthalates, and sodium lauryl sulfate. Apply a generous amount of Trader Joe's Grapefruit Ginger Sugar Scrub (to your entire epidermis or just to parts of your body requiring extra de-scaling), massage gently onto wet skin, and rinse. You'll find you're left not only with a newfound softness, but a lingering, fresh scent-think "sweet ginger ale with a splash of citrus." We're selling each 8-ounce tube of Grapefruit Ginger Sugar Scrub for $5.99, which is a sweet deal when you check out the prices of similar scrubs at specialty bath and body stores. You'll find it in our health and beauty section, just in time for the holidays. 12.04 .15
061414.name: Sugar Scrub Grapefruit Ginger

061447.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
061447.description: "Hair is the richest ornament." - Martin Luther Martin Luther may not be the most relevant cultural icon, but, by golly, did he know hair! Just kidding. We're totally making that up. But we do appreciate his 16th-century sentiment; hair is, or certainly can be, an integral part of one's identity-one's ornamental crown, if you will. We're not fans of the concept of "good" and "bad' hair days (because who is the arbiter of such things anyhow?), but we do know that certain environmental factors and elective processes (like dying, perming, straightening, etc.) can leave your hair feeling dry, damaged, and/or vulnerable to the elements. And when this is the case, you'll likely need something a little more intense than regular-old conditioner to bring it back to life - something like Trader Joe's Hair Mask. Infused with shea butter, coconut oil, argan oil, Vitamin E, and a variety of fruit extracts (like blackberry, mulberry, currant, and açai), Trader Joe's Hair Mask is thick, rich, and sure to revive even the dullest of mane. It's also free of parabens, sodium lauryl sulfate, and phthalates, and it's never tested on animals. You can use our Hair Mask as frequently or as infrequently as you like - your hair; your call. After shampooing, simply massage it into your hair from roots to ends (concentrating on the ends rather than the roots if your hair is fine or oily), leave it in for 3 to 5 minutes, then rinse. The coconut-vanilla scent and touchably-soft silkiness will linger, but a heavy, greasy residue will not. Trust us, you're going to love this stuff. Trader Joe's Hair Mask is a salon-quality hair treatment, but we're selling it at an average Joe price - $3.99 per 5.1-fluid-ounce tube. After all, you shouldn't have to be sitting upon a pile of riches to afford the maintenance on your "richest ornament." (Thanks for that one, Luther...) You'll find this Mask in our health and beauty section. 12.26. 17
061447.name: Hair Mask Shea Butter And Coconut Oil
061447.title: Shea Butter & Coconut Oil Hair Mask

061905.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
061905.description: Thanks to the hustle and bustle inherent in modern living, it's easier than ever to forget, as the old saying goes, to stop and smell the roses. Fortunately, Trader Joe's is here to remedy that-both literally and figuratively speaking-with Trader Joe's Rose Water Facial Toner. Equal parts hydrating and refreshing, Trader Joe's Rose Water Facial Toner is formulated with real Damask rose water and Damask rose oil (to bedew and moisturize), witch hazel (to balance and tone), and a bit of Quillaja saponaria (soapbark) extract (to soften and condition). Best of all, it smells exactly like a fresh, blooming rose- so you'll actually smell the roses while you're taking a moment to stop, relax, and¿ smell the roses. Mist Rose Water Facial Toner onto your beautiful face after cleansing (give TJ's Facial Cleansing Oil [sku 58807] a try) or as needed throughout the day for a quick refresher. Pack a bottle in your purse, gym bag, or carry-on for on-the-go toning and/or in-the-air hydrating. The formula is so mild and gentle that there is really no such thing as "too much Toner"-so feel free to spritz this soothingly-scented spray anytime you need a moment of calm. Other rose water facial toners that contain actual rose water and not just rose fragrance sell for anywhere from $10.95 all the way on up to $40 (!) elsewhere. We, however, are selling each four-ounce spray bottle of Trader Joe's Rose Water Facial Toner for a cool, refreshing $3.99. You'll find it in our health and beauty section. 01.31. 18
061905.name: Facial Toner Rose Water
061905.title: Rose Water Facial Toner

062731.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
062731.description: Try as we might to mitigate the messiness of everyday living, the truth remains, as ever, that the world is a relatively dirty place. But that doesn't mean that you have to live in fear - far from it, in fact. With a handy bottle of Trader Joe's Grapefruit & Lemon Hand Sanitizing Spray by your side, you'll be more than ready to take on any grime that may come your way. Made with the same active ingredient as our old Trader Joe's Hand Sanitizing Gel [sku 93286], this Sanitizing Spray ups the ante considerably with the addition of lemon peel oil and grapefruit peel oil to invigorate the senses with every application. Our supplier has also gone the extra step of adding aloe and vitamin E, to ensure that your hands stay soft and moisturized as they're being cleaned. And with the convenient new spray top, it's never been easier to use - simply apply over your hands and until totally wet (ideally, but not necessarily, after washing and drying your hands beforehand), then let them air-dry completely. That's it! Whether you're fending off flu season, need some aid during air travel, or just want to feel a little cleaner and smell a little more citrus-y, Trader Joe's Grapefruit & Lemon Hand Sanitizing Spray has got you covered. We're selling each travel-sized, two-ounce bottle for the value-sized retail of $1.99. You'll find it with our health & beauty products. 12.10. 18
062731.name: Hand Sanitizer Spray Lemon Grapefruit

063666.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
063666.description: A delightfully scented, charmingly packaged set of soaps that just so happen to be shaped like scrumptious, pastel-hued Macarons? Oui oui! Welcome to a new bathtime belle époque, sponsored by Trader Joe's. Trader Joe's Macaron Soaps look exactly like the colorful, little French sandwich cookies you've come to know and love and which, for reference, you can find in our frozen foods section. The Soaps come packaged in a set of three, and although you can't eat them, you'll delight in their wonderful scents: lavender honey (purple), mint (green), and raspberry (pink). Work up a lather, and you'll feel like you've stepped right into some kind of luxurious, French spa-bakery scenario¿ sounds dreamy, doesn't it? Produced for us in South Korea, which is considered by many HABA enthusiasts to be modern skincare mecca, our Macaron Soaps are made with a gentle vegetable glycerin and coconut-derived surfactants. And while they might not be made with, say, flour or egg whites like their edible counterparts, they do still contain sugar and sea salt-ingredients that are almost as good in the bath as they are in the kitchen. The Soap is made without parabens and is never tested on animals, and, perhaps best of all, we're selling each 7.6-ounce, limited-edition, three-Soap set for $4.99-a very sweet deal, indeed. Look for it in our health and beauty section.
063666.name: Hol Macaron Soap Set

064459.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
064459.description: Recently, a few of our office Crew Members admitted to our beauty Buyer that, in spite of their TJ's allegiance, they still shell out the big bucks for a particular name-brand Gel Moisturizer. Eager to see what the fuss was about, our Buyer tried it for herself, and she was instantly sold on its light, aqueous formula. What she was not sold on, however, was its $50 (!) price tag. She knew TJ's could do better, so she contacted one of our favorite high-end skincare producers-a company overseen by a panel of board-certified dermatologists-and the rest is epidermal history. Trader Joe's Ultra Hydrating Gel Moisturizer is the moisturizing deluge your pretty, parched visage has been thirsting for. The water-based Gel formula is packed with skin-soothing ingredients, like aloe leaf juice and green tea, birch leaf, & milk thistle extracts. It also contains the holy grail of modern moisturizing ingredients: sodium hyaluronate, or the salt form of hyaluronic acid, prized for its ability to both "lock in" skin's natural moisture and add to it -with no oily residue. Like an oasis in the desert, our paraben-free, fragrance-free, never-tested-on-animals Ultra Hydrating Gel Moisturizer is here to rehydrate. Simply apply to the face and neck after cleansing with your favorite TJ's face wash, twice a day or as needed, and you'll be glowing in no time. Radiance restored. Since we're equally fond of restoring your wallet, we're selling each 2.5-ounce tub of Ultra Hydrating Gel Moisturizer for $8.99. Look for this outstanding value in our health & beauty section.
064459.name: Moisturizer Ultra Hydrating Gel
064459.title: Ultra Hydrating Gel Moisturizer

064656.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
