064656.description: "Hair is the richest ornament." - Martin Luther Martin Luther may not be the most relevant cultural icon, but...by golly, did he know hair! Okay, we're totally making that up, but we do appreciate his 16th-century sentiment. Hair is is often an integral part of one's identity-one's ornamental crown, if you will. Certain environmental factors and elective processes (like coloring, perming, straightening, relaxing, etc.) can leave your hair feeling dry, damaged, and/or vulnerable to the elements. And when this is the case, you'll likely need a little something extra to help tame frizz and add shine...something like Trader Joe's Hair Serum. Infused with shea butter, coconut oil, argan oil, Vitamin E, Pro-Vitamin B5, keratin and a variety of plant-based extracts (like black currant, açai, & macadamia seed), Trader Joe's Hair Serum is notably silky & moisturizing, yet still lightweight. In other words, it helps add shine and lustre to even the dullest of mane, without weighing it down. It's also free of parabens, sulfates, phthalates, and surfactants (which can strip hair color & affect hair texture) and is never tested on animals. Our Hair Serum is suitable for all hair types, and it's perfect for use before or after heat styling. Simply follow this cinchy, three-step process: 1) distribute a small amount (one pump or less to start) onto hands; 2) smooth it evenly onto dry or damp hair; 3) revel in the Serum's beachy, coconut-vanilla scent and-more importantly-in your newly softened, shiny tresses! You shouldn't have to be sitting upon a pile of riches to afford the maintenance of your "richest ornament." (Thanks for that one, Luther...), so we're selling this salon-quality Hair Serum at an average Joe price-$3.99 for a 2.75-fluid-ounce bottle. You'll find it in our health and beauty section. 06.03. 19
064656.name: Hair Serum Shea Butter And Coconut Oil
064656.title: Shea Butter & Coconut Oil Hair Serum

065167.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
065167.description: "Jeepers Creepers, where'd ya get those peepers? Jeepers Creepers, where'd ya get those eyes?" -Louis Armstrong, Going Places (1938) You know what they say-the eyes are the windows to the soul. If your "windows" are weighed down by, say, sagging blinds or dusty drapes, then grab a tube of new Trader Joe's Supreme Hydrating Eye Cream and get to redecorating! It's time to let the light shine through! (Okay, we're done with the melodramatic extended metaphor. We promise.) Made with sought-after skincare ingredients like hydrolyzed marine collagen, Coenzyme Q10, Manuka honey, hibiscus extract, and almond, argan, rosehip & marula seed oils, Trader Joe's Supreme Hydrating Eye Cream is extra-rich & extra-creamy, without feeling heavy. Unlike some mega-moisturizing eye creams, it also absorbs quickly, leaving the delicate skin around the eyes feeling soft & soothed instead of greasy & irritated. It's truly an Eye Cream for all, and at $5.99* per .53-ounce tube, it's an Eye Cream priced for all, too. Find it in our bath & beauty section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Supreme Hydrating Eye Cream
065167.name: Eye Cream Supreme Hydrating
065167.title: Supreme Hydrating Eye Cream

065863.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
065863.description: Nothing says summer fun like a day at the beach, pool, or park. And nothing says summer bummer like a sunburn. Even if you don't turn lobster-red, sunburns are real vibe-killer-not to mention potentially hazardous to your health. The solution? Why, sunscreen, of course... Trader Joe's Broad Spectrum SPF 40 Zinc Oxide Sunscreen Lotion. Our vegan, PABA-free, hypoallergenic Broad Spectrum SPF 40 Zinc Oxide Sunscreen Lotion is formulated with the mineral zinc oxide, a non-chemical sun protectant that acts as a physical barrier between your skin and the sun. The zinc oxide we use is "non-nano" zinc oxide, which means that its particles aren't nano-sized- or, in other words, its particles are large enough to create a top-of-the-skin barrier that is water resistant for up to 40 minutes. We've blended the zinc oxide with moisturizing jojoba oil, aloe leaf juice, and other inactive ingredients to create a broad spectrum 'screen that's lightweight, glides on smoothly and-unlike most zinc- based sunscreens-doesn't leave behind a chalky-white residue. Trader Joe's Zinc Oxide Sunscreen Lotion is also PABA-free, fragrance-free, and-at $9.99 for a 5-ounce tube-a fantastic value. You'll find it in our health and beauty aisle, but only while the sun is still smiling upon the summer season¿
065863.name: Sunscreen Zinc Spf 40

066539.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
066539.description: For most folks, fall is a season of hectic schedules and hefty responsibilities. As those commitments pile up and as the holiday season looms around the corner, it's a good idea to make a little time for self-care. And for those of us who don't have the time (or the funds) for an autumn day at the spa, Trader Joe's Pumpkin Spice Biocellulose Face Mask makes self-care-in-a-pinch a complete & total cinch. Single-use sheet Masks are still all the rage in the world of at-home skin care, and ours is truly top of the line. For starters, whereas most sheet masks are made from cotton or plant-based cellulose, TJ's Pumpkin Spice Face Mask is made from Biocellulose-a thinner, lab-made, compostable material formed from fermented coconut fiber, that can retain up to four times more fluid than its "regular" cellulose counterpart. This allows the Mask to contour & adhere to your face more securely, bringing even more of the serum in contact with your skin. This, you'll find, is a very good thing, because this skin-soothing, ultra-moisturizing, seasonally-spiced serum contains a bevvy of beneficial ingredients-like pumpkin seed & turmeric root extracts, aloe leaf juice, shea butter esters, colloidal gold, hydrolyzed silk protein, & more. (Plus a blend of clove flower, cinnamon bark, orange peel, & ginger root oils to enhance its Pumpkin Spice-y scent...) For a limited time, while our inventory lasts, we're selling single-use, individually-wrapped Trader Joe's Pumpkin Spice Biocellulose Face Masks (.85 fluid ounces) for $2.99 each. Pumpkin Spice Biocellulose Face Mask
066539.name: Hol Pumpkin Biocellulose Face Sheet Mask

067303.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
067303.description: When the supplier of our original TJ's Midsummer Night's Cream [sku 19806] told us they could no longer produce it for us (unless we significantly raised the price, which we weren't willing to do), we were definitely disappointed. But truth be told, we'd been hoping to update the formula for a while, so instead of sulking, we flipped the script, turning it into an awesome opportunity for an ingredients update! Like its predecessor, Trader Joe's Midsummer Night's Cream Hand & Body Cream is extra-thick & extra- rich; never tested on animals; fragrance-free, paraben-free & sulfate-free. It's still formulated for extra-dry skin and still made with safflower seed, avocado, jojoba, and clary sage oils. But now, it also contains Moroccan argan oil, shea butter, plant-derived squalane, and other plant oils, too! What does that mean for your thirsty epidermis? Sweet, sweet relief... and some silky-soft skin. We're selling each 16-fluid-ounce bottle of TJ's Midsummer Night's Cream for $3.99.* You'll find this upgrade- without-the-exorbitant-upgrade-fee in our HABA (health and beauty aid) section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Midsummer Night's Cream Hand & Body Cream
067303.name: Cream Midsummer Nights
067303.title: Hand & Body Cream With Moroccan Argan Oil

067891.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
067891.description: It's happened to many of us: you've had to run to catch a bus, you had a quick workout on your lunch break or between errands, or you've just finished an unexpectedly long drive. Now your hair is a mess, but you don't have time to take a shower. Wouldn't it be great to be able to give your hair a quick wash, without actually having to work up a literal or figurative lather? With Trader Joe's Dry Shampoo, now you can. Fast, easy, and conveniently sized for travel, this Dry Shampoo is a simple, effectve way to revitalize your hair - no shower required. How does it work? Simply apply a few pumps of the Dry Shampoo onto the roots of your hair, and let it sit for a few seconds to absorb any excess oils. Then, massage or brush it out, give your hair a quick towelling off, and you're ready to face the day. In addition to its on-the-go uses, it also makes a great hair refresher in between more in-depth shampooings. Other brands out there can run into the $10 and $20 range, but we're selling Trader Joe's Dry Shampoo for the refreshingly reasonable everyday retail of $4.99* for each 1.75-ounce bottle. Look for them with our other health and beauty products. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Dry Shampoo
067891.name: Dry Shampoo

068069.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
068069.description: Trader Joe's Peppermint & Tea Tree Shampoo Bar provides a new way to shampoo. Instead of a liquid, packaged in a plastic bottle, our Peppermint & Tea Tree Shampoo is an oval shaped, solid Bar. The base of this Shampoo Bar is saponified oils (oils that have been converted into soap by reaction with alkali) that include coconut oil, olive oil, and castor oil. Added to this base are jojoba, peppermint, tea tree, and eucalyptus oils. There are also some dried mint leaves that give the white bar an attractive, green-flecked appearance. What this Bar doesn't have is parabens or sulfates! This combination not only thoroughly cleans hair, it also creates a truly satisfying shampooing experience. Of course, this satisfaction comes, in part, from the rejuvenating qualities of Peppermint & Tea Tree oils. But it also comes from the knowledge that we've packaged this Shampoo with an FSC-certified mix of cardboard from responsible sources. Find the four-ounce box every day in the aisle with our other health & beauty products. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Peppermint & Tea Tree Shampoo Bar
068069.name: Shampoo Bar Peppermint Tea Tree
068069.title: Peppermint & Tea Tree Shampoo Bar

068620.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
068620.description: Nothing says summer fun like a day in the sun¿ and nothing says summer bummer like a sunburn. Luckily, PABA, paraben, and oxybenzone-free Trader Joe's Zinc Oxide Mineral Sunscreen - SPF 30 is here to save the day & spare your skin. With Zinc Oxide as its active ingredient, this new addition to our line-up of might sun-blockers is what's known as a "mineral" or "physical" sunscreen, rather than a "chemical" sunscreen. In other words, the zinc acts as a physical barrier between the sun's potentially harmful UVA & UVB rays and your ever-important epidermis! But don't worry, unlike some zinc-based sunscreens, our Zinc Oxide Mineral Sunscreen won't leave behind that ghostly white cast-it rubs in clear, it's SPF 30, and it's water resistant for up to 90 minutes. It's also fragrance-free, and formulated with moisturizing, hydrating aloe vera, grapefruit oil, and Vitamin E! Pretty good deal, right? Actually, to answer our own question above, it's not just a pretty good deal; it's a very good deal. Literally. We're selling each six-fluid-ounce, non-aerosol spray cannister of of Trader Joe's Zinc Oxide Mineral Sunscreen for $9.99*-one of the best values on zinc-based sunscreen we've seen in all of physical sunscreen-dom! You'll find it in our health & beauty section, for a limited time, while the sun is still shining. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Zinc Oxide Mineral Sunscreen SPF 30
068620.name: Sunscreen Spray Zinc Oxide Spf 30
068620.title: Zinc Oxide Mineral Sunscreen Spray Spf 30

068654.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
068654.description: Sclerocarya birrea means "hard nut" in Ancient Greek. Scientifically, this name refers to the marula, which is a deciduous tree of medium stature, growing mainly in southern Africa. The marula tree bears a fleshy fruit with seeds (hard nuts) inside. Locally, people like to mix the fleshy fruit with water and allow it to ferment to create a traditional alcoholic beverage; but globally, the marula is known for the cosmetic oil derived from its seeds. Trader Joe's Marula Facial Oil is produced from the first (virgin) cold-pressing of marula seeds, harvested only when the fruit has fallen to the ground. The oil is light-textured and not greasy. It's especially good for hydrating skin. Marula Oil also offers antioxidants to promote a soft radiance-that glowing visage you've been hoping for! It is excellent for daily use, and at $6.99* for the 0.85 fluid-ounce bottle, that's a valuable proposition; especially considering the fact that you can find similarly sized bottles elsewhere from $9 all the way up to $50 and more! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Marula Facial Oil
068654.name: Marula Oil
068654.title: Marula Facial Oil

069364.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
069364.name: Hand Sanitizer Dr Bronners Lavender

070912.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
070912.description: Try as we might to mitigate the messiness of everyday living, the truth remains that, now more than ever, the world is a germy place. But that doesn't mean that you have to live in fear-far from it, in fact. With a handy bottle of Trader Joe's Lavender Hand Sanitizer Spray by your side (or in your purse), you'll be more than ready to take on any grime that may come your way. Made with the same active ingredient as our old Trader Joe's Hand Sanitizing Gel [sku 93286], this Sanitizer Spray ups the ante considerably with the addition of lavender oil to invigorate the senses with every application. Our supplier has also gone the extra step of adding aloe and Vitamin E, to ensure that your hands stay soft and moisturized as they're being cleaned. And with the convenient new spray top, it's never been easier to use- simply apply over your hands and until totally wet (ideally, but not necessarily, after washing and drying your hands beforehand), then let them air-dry completely. That's it! Whether you're fending off flu season or other frightening germs, or you just want to feel a little cleaner and smell a little better, Trader Joe's Lavender Hand Sanitizer Spray has you covered-literally. We're selling each travel- sized, two-ounce bottle for the value-sized retail of $1.99.* You'll find it with our health & beauty products. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Lavender Hand Sanitizer Spray
070912.name: Hand Sanitizer Spray Lavender
070912.title: Lavender Hand Sanitizer Spray

072228.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
072228.description: The latest addition to our very limited and very high quality line of skincare products is a HABA-holic's dream come true. And when we say "dream come true," we mean that (almost) literally, because this complexion companion goes to work while you slumber! Ladies and gentlefolks, from the skincare-centric minds that brought you Trader Joe's Antioxidant Facial Serum [sku 51150] and Trader Joe's Hyaluronic Moisture Boost Serum [sku 61136], we present Trader Joe's Retinol Night Serum with Baobab Seed Oil. In simplest terms, our dermatologist-formulated Retinol Night Serum acts as an exfoliant, sloughing off dead skin cells as you sleep, to reveal a revitalized you come morning. Included in a carefully selected 0.3% concentration, Retinol (vitamin A) is clearly the Serum's star player, but if you take a peek at its ingredients, you'll find an impressive supporting cast, too - skincare superheroes like sodium hyaluronate, vitamins C & E, salicylic acid, and, of course, skin-soothing Baobab Seed Oil. Whether you're a retinol rookie or a seasoned pro, we think you'll be over the moon for this midnight miracle. For best results, we suggest incorporating this new step into your skincare routine slowly - start by applying it once or twice a week, as your skin tolerates it, followed by a generous layer of your favorite TJ's moisturizer. And remember: chemical exfoliants like retinol can increase photosensitivity, so be sure to apply a broad spectrum sunscreen daily. Sweet dreams! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Retinol Night Serum with Baobab Seed Oil
072228.name: Serum Retinol And Baobab
072228.title: Retinol Night Serum

075508.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
075508.description: Since time immemorial, human societies have searched for ways to smell nice. (That's obviously not the only pursuit human societies have been up to, but it's certainly one of the most noble.) As we've learned over the millenia, not every aromatic solution has fit for everyone; some have relied on overpowering scents, or used potentially irritating materials. That's where Trader Joe's Unscented Deodorant comes in. Made with arrowroot powder and zinc ricinoleate to absorb odors, as well as coconut oil and jojoba esters to moisturize, it's designed to keep your underarms feeling fresh all day, all without the use of artificial scents, phtalates, parabens, baking soda, or aluminum. Easy to tote and easy to use, Trader Joe's Unscented Deodorant makes an excellent everyday deodorant: simply apply liberally under the arms prior to work, school, a workout, a hike, or travel of all kinds. Like all of Trader Joe's health and beauty products, you can rest assured that it was never tested on animals. Plus, in keeping with this Deodorant's spare-anything-that's-unnecessary ethos, we're proud to say that the paper exterior of each tube uses significantly less plastic than the average stick of deodorant out there. Unscented Deodorant
075508.name: Deodorant Unscented
075508.title: Unscented Deodorant

075509.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
075509.description: Skin looking a little dull in the face of those howling winter winds? Sounds like it's time to get your gleam back-and Trader Joe's Vitamin C Firming Body Butter is here to help! For our latest seasonal skincare solution, we've taken our classic, mega-moisturizing coconut & shea body butter-base-which also includes heavy-hitters like aloe leaf, orange peel, grapefruit, rosemary, hops, clary, and marshmallow root extracts-and infused it with Vitamin C, glycolic acid, and a bright clementine scent. Vitamin C works to create visibly firmer skin, glycolic acid (an AHA) acts as a gentle exfoliant, and the sweet, citrusy fragrance perks up your senses. Similar skin-firming formulas will set you back upwards of $20 - $45, making Trader Joe's Vitamin C Firming Body Butter an absolute steal. This limited-edition illuminator won't be around for long, though, so get glowing! Vitamin C Firming Body Butter
075509.name: Body Butter Vitamin C

075635.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
075635.description: If you're a fan of Trader Joe's body care products, you know we have a bounty of Body Butters with alluring scents-from our popular, seasonal Brazil Nut Body Butter [sku 71211], to our everyday Coconut Body Butter [sku 50130], and all the scents in between (Pumpkin, Pomegranate, Mango, Grapefruit, Candy Cane...). But sometimes, it makes sense to have no scents. Like if you want to treat your skin to Body Butter, but also plan on wearing perfume. Or, when you'd rather go fragrance free altogether. For these types of scent-narios, we created Trader Joe's Fragrance-Free Body Butter. What our Fragrance-Free Body Butter lacks in scent, it more than makes up for with moisturizing power. Our special formula includes squalane (a plant-derived emollient that helps moisturize and repair dry skin), plus baobab oil (derived from the seeds of that iconic African tree, also helpful in moisturizing and preventing water loss). And these excellent emollients are just the icing on the moisturizing cake, since the base of our Fragrance-Free Body Butter is none other than soothing & softening shea butter. Enjoy Trader Joe's Fragrance-Free Body Butter as a daily lotion that won't interfere with the other scents you may wear. Alternatively, you might take this blank Body-Butter slate as your opportunity to add some essential oils and invent your own, unique, Body Butter scent! Fragrance Free Body Butter
075635.name: Body Butter Unscented
075635.title: Fragrance-Free Body Butter

076921.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
076921.description: Who says moisturizing masks are just for faces? Lips need love, too! Lucky for you, Trader Joe's Vanilla Lip Mask is here to perk up your parched, wintry pout with hydration heavy-hitters like shea butter, coconut oil, and vitamin E. The formula is thick and luxurious, yet still somehow silky and lightweight-in other words, it'll leave your lips feeling soft and supple, not goopy or sticky. Not only does this Lip Mask feel fantastic, it smells and tastes fantastic, too. Vanilla fruit extract is responsible for its distinct warm, Vanilla aroma, and monk fruit extract brings some lip-smacking sweetness to the literal and proverbial pot. Speaking of sweetness, similar lip masks sell elsewhere for around $25, yet we're offering ours for just a fraction of that price! The Trader Joe's Lip Mask might be Vanilla, but the Trader Joe's value is anything but... Vanilla Lip Mask
076921.name: Lip Mask Vanilla
076921.title: Vanilla Lip Mask

091947.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
091947.description: Tea tree oil is known for its fresh, refreshing scent that registers with your olfactory sense somewhere between eucalyptus and mint. At Trader Joe's, we've highlighted this essential oil in the Trader Joe's Tea Tree Tingle line of bath & body products: Shampoo, Conditioner, and Body Wash. All of these refreshing products are made for us with organic botanicals, including tea tree oil, peppermint, eucalyptus, rosemary, and thyme. Their scent is energizing, and their effect on your hair and skin is rejuvenating. The Body Wash will impart a fresh, clean feeling to your skin; the Shampoo adeptly cleans away residue from styling products; and the Conditioner helps smooth your hair and aids in repairing damage from sun and heat. These are salon-caliber formulas that you would pay handsomely for-if you bought them elsewhere, with other, fussier labels on more expensive bottles. At Trader Joe's, we save handsome for our packaging, and keep our prices on the value side. Each of our Tea Tree Tingle bath & body products comes in a 16-fluid ounce bottle for the excellent, everyday value of $3.99*, the same price we've offered since 2008! Ooh, there's nothing like a good value to make us feel all tingly¿ *Prices may change. Please check QIL to confirm most up-to-date price before creating signage. Tea Tree Tingle
091947.name: Tea Tree Tingle Shampoo

095003.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
095003.description: It's that time of year. You can see the sun, sure. You can probably feel it on your skin. But over the colder-weather months, many of us forget about sunscreen. In early autumn we finish up the last of what we used last sum- mer, or we put it somewhere so we won't forget where it is when we need it again. And then we promptly forget where we put it. Luckily for you, Trader Joe's has high quality sunscreen at the ready, at incredibly affordable prices. Namely, Trader Joe's Nourish Spray Sunscreen SPF 50. Let's begin with the spray, which works using BOV pressure technology. Originally created to power turbo- charged engines, it's now used to power the spray pump on our sunscreen. Think of it as turbo-charged sun- screen. How does it work? It's basically a valve that uses air pressure to force the sunscreen out of the can, so you get a smooth, continuous stream of sunscreen every time you press the button atop the can. It's pretty cool. Especially when it's hot. Nourish Spray Sunscreen SPF 50 provides UVA & UVB protection, contains aloe, vitamin E, and coconut oil. It's also water resistant. The spray-top twists to lock, making this convenient to toss into a purse, backpack or beach bag, without fear of accidental sprays-just remember to twist it to the "locked" position! Our price of $5.99 for each six-ounce can of Nourish Spray Sunscreen is one of the best values we've seen in all of sunscreen-dom.
095003.name: Sunscreen Spray Spf 50+

096404.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
096404.name: All In One Facial Cleanser

097068.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
097068.name: Preserve Recycline Toothbrush

097821.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
097821.name: Moisturizer Oil Free

097847.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
097847.description: We liked the idea of our existing lemon kitchen hand soap, but we thought it needed a make over. So we took out all the bad stuff (sulfates, propylene glycol, and artificial colors) and put in some good stuff (lemon peel oil, earth salts and natural plant based surfactants). We also worked on the value proposition to give our customers more product at a better value. Trader Joe's lemon kitchen hand soap is the perfect partner in the kitchen. Providing a burst of fresh citrus fragrance, the natural lemon peel oil is packed with antimicrobial, antiseptic, and antibacterial properties to help eliminate and neutralize common kitchen odors like fish, garlic and onions that like to linger on the hands. Without any harsh sulfates, you can wash your hands again and again without drying out your skin, leaving them clean and smooth.
097847.name: Lemon Kitchen Hand Soap

099200.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
099200.description: It's that time of year. You can see the sun, sure. You can probably feel it on your skin. But over the colder-weather months, many of us forget about sunscreen. In early autumn we finish up the last of what we used last sum- mer, or we put it somewhere so we won't forget where it is when we need it again. And then we promptly forget where we put it. Luckily for you, Trader Joe's has high quality sunscreen at the ready, at incredibly affordable prices. Namely, Trader Joe's Face & Body Sunscreen Lotion SPF 30. So, let's talk about Trader Joe's Face & Body Sunscreen Lotion SPF 30. This is a breathable, lightweight lotion that's non-greasy and fast-drying. It contains vitamins C & E and is non-comedogenic (which means it won't clog your pores), PABA free, paraben free, fragrance free, and oil free. It's water resistant, making it ideal for beach or pool days. To use this Sunscreen Lotion to its full potential, apply liberally to face and body 15 minutes before sun expo- sure. Reapply after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, immediately after towel drying, and at least every two hours. Sunburns don't stand a chance. At $5.99 for a six-fluid-ounce, squeezable bottle, Trader Joe's Face & Body Sunscreen Lotion is a smashing sunscreen value!
099200.name: Sunscreen Spf 30

099228.category: Skin Care and Face Care Products
099228.description: Whoever thinks you can't get your sweet onions, sauerkraut, and skin care routine all in the same place has clearly never been inside a Trader Joe's. And whoever thinks you can't get high quality versions of those things has surely never bought from a Trader Joe's. After trying a moisturizer like our Enrich Moisturizing Face Lotion, you'll be wondering why you didn't hunt for your health and beauty supplies right after swiping a jar of TJ's Sauerkraut with Pickled Persian Cucumbers [sku 53094] sooner. We love our products, and we love our customers, so we love supplying products that keep our customers healthy and satisfied above all else! Trader Joe's Enrich Moisturizing Face Lotion is a formula full of ingredients foraging for a way to keep your face feeling fresh. For starters, we use octinoxate and zinc oxide to bring you broad spectrum SPF 15 coverage. Each dollop of Enrich goes on light, with no greasy residue, making it wonderful for all skin types. Fragrance free, PABA free, non comedogenic, cruelty free, and enriched with vitamins A, C, and E, this Moisturizing Face Lotion is all good with none of the bad. So to all the naysayers about Trader Joe's eclecticism we say: buy your cake, eat it, and buy your heath and beauty, too! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Enrich Moisturizing Face Lotion
099228.name: Enrich Facial Moisturizer

013059.description: We offer a variety of smoked salmon options in our refrigerators. In particular, this Smoked Salmon from Pacific Supreme is a product our Customers have been enjoying for over 20 years. The variety is Atlantic salmon, farm-raised off the coast of Chile in South America. The harvested fish are cured with salt and sugar then smoked over hardwood to impart natural smoke flavor. The red-orange fillets are finally sliced medium-thin to showcase their smooth, tender texture and intensely rich salmon flavor, which includes hints of smoke and moderate saltiness. Given this profile, Pacific Supreme Smoked Salmon is ideal for all kinds of occasions¿ on bagels with cream cheese and capers; in a cold pasta salad; on crackers with a dollop of crème fraiche; mixed with scrambled eggs; on an SLT sandwich; and the list goes on! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Pacific Supreme Smoked Salmon
013059.name: Salmon Smkd 3 Oz
013059.title: Salmon Smoked 3 Oz

036360.description: Hardly a thousand miles north of the Antarctic Circle lies the crystal-clear fjord waters of the Patagonia region of Southern Chile. Sprinkled in the waters of this mystical wonderland of glaciers, mountains, and wildlife is a selection of some of the finest salmon on the planet Earth. Trader Joe's Nova Salmon Pieces aims to capture this beautiful fish amidst these marvelous landscapes and bring the fish from farm to fork for you to enjoy whenever! Our supplier farm-raises all of their salmon to maintain their consistent, high-quality standards and deliver the freshest fish to their smokers. Their catches are filleted and cured in a traditional European style which is followed by a cold-smoking process using only hardwood for the smoking. We think this traditional, yet elegant farming, filleting, and smoking process brings the finest quality Nova Salmon Pieces that can make a fresh, fishy splash to many dishes; try with eggs, fresh veggies, risotto, European Style Whole Grain Bread [sku 49397] with a spread - take your pick - and prepare yourself for a mouth-watering daydream to the cold waters of the Chilean Coast without stepping foot from your neighborhood. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Nova Salmon Pieces
036360.name: Salmon Smkd Nova Pieces 8 Oz
036360.title: Trader Joe'S Nova Salmon Pieces Our Hardwood Cold-Smoked Salmon Pieces Are The Perfect Size For Bagels And A Wide Range Of Appetizers.

050550.name: Smkd Trout Rainbow
050550.title: Trader Joe'S Smoked Rainbow Trout Fillets

053848.description: When questioned about their future, school-age salmon almost never say they want to grow up to be an astronaut. Or a fire fighter. Most of the time, you'll hear them declare a dream of one day becoming a plate of lox. And why not? That lightly brined salmon fillet is enjoyed in delis throughout the world. But, the prepubescent salmon community is not without its rebels. Keep fishing and you're bound to find one or two who have grand ambitions for a more robust afterlife¿ say, as a plate of pastrami. We get it. We, ourselves, are not without a certain rebellious streak. Doing our part to fulfill the dreams of defiant salmon everywhere (actually it's really just the ones in Chile) Trader Joe's introduces Pastrami Style Atlantic Smoked Salmon. This is delicate and buttery, melt-in-your-mouth salmon, combined with bold pastrami seasonings, and a balance of unique smoke flavors. Each premium Atlantic salmon fillet-farm-raised in southern Chile-is first brined in a recipe of salt, sugar, herbs and spices. It's then cold smoked in small batches using a combination of Maine hardwoods (maple and oak) and fruitwoods (cherry and apple). The fillets are then rubbed with Pastrami spices-those familiar flavors of coriander, black pepper, allspice, and paprika. This recipe is accomplished in a Level-3 Safe Quality Food (SQF) facility, which demands the most stringent standards for food quality and safety. With our Pastrami Style Smoked Atlantic Salmon, customers get to experience a tasty and unique salmon flavor profile that works just as well on bagels with cream cheese, as it does mixed into your scrambled eggs. At the same time, juvenile deliquent salmon get to realize a childhood dream. Win-win! Each four-ounce package is priced less than your average pastrami sandwich, at just $4.99. 4.09.1 5
053848.name: Salmon Pstrmi Styl Smkd Atlantic
053848.title: Trader Joe'S Pastrami Style Smoked Atlantic Salmon A Unique Smoke Of Apple, Cherry, Oak And Maple Wood

056648.description: At Trader Joe's, we love our smoked salmon-take one look in our deli case, and you'll see that we indeed carry a sizeable selection. But still, though we already feature a fine formation of fish in our fridges, we simply couldn't turn down the opportunity to offer our customers in the Northeast some of finest Smoked Salmon we've ever tasted. Some salmon-like nova lox-is cold smoked, meaning the salmon is placed in a chamber separate from the burning wood to create a more delicate smokiness. Other salmon, like Trader Joe's Hot Smoked Salmon Fillet, is hot smoked-or, in other words, the salmon is smoked in the same chamber as the burning wood, exposing it to higher temperatures and giving the fish a more cooked, almost ham-like texture. It's flaky, flavorful, and boasts the perfect balance of smokiness to complement the salmon's natural richness and its proprietary, gluten-free brine. Trader Joe's Hot Smoked Salmon Fillet goes beyond the bagel-add it to eggs, salads, sandwiches, or pasta dishes. Since it's rather attractive and ready-to-eat, you can also make it your center-of-the-plate entrée, perhaps alongside some quinoa and greens. We're selling each 6-ounce Hot Smoked Salmon Fillet for $8.99, which comes out to about $1.50 per ounce. Other retailers sell these Fillets for $2.25 per ounce (and up!), so no matter how you choose to enjoy this Smoked Fillet, you can be sure you're getting a smokin' deal. You'll find it in the deli cases at our Northeastern stores. 10.16. 17
056648.name: Salmon Smoked Hot Smoked 6 Oz.
056648.title: Hot Smoked Salmon Fillet Lightly Seasoned Atlantic Salmon, Hot Smoked In Small Batches Over North American Hardwood

060442.description: Sockeye salmon do not have distinctive eyes. They do, however, have distinctive, red-orange colored flesh. In fact, "sockeye" is an Anglicized version of suk-kegh ("red fish") from the language of one of the indigenous peoples of British Columbia. Indeed, our Sockeye Salmon presents this peppy hue. It's wild-caught in the icy waters of the major Northeast Pacific fishing area located west of Canada and south of Alaska. Our supplier dry cures the Wild Sockeye then smokes it very slowly over applewood (from Washington state apple trees) at a relatively low temperature (below 85°F) to yield firm-textured fish with rich salmon flavor, and hints of smoke & salt. The finished fish is already trimmed and boned, ready to top a bagel. Add it to eggs or pasta. Or, mix some with Whipped Cream Cheese [sku 12498] for a swift and superb salmon spread. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Wild Sockeye Smoked Salmon
060442.name: Salmon Smkd Wild Sockeye 4 Oz
060442.title: Wild Sockeye Smoked Salmon

063465.description: There's just something about perfectly-seasoned, tender, smoked salmon that always keeps us coming back for more. Don't get us wrong, we love smoked salmon of all kinds, but every now and then, specially-seasoned sensations like our Pastrami Style Smoked Atlantic Salmon [sku 53848] or our gravlax-inspired holiday sets just give us something extra. That's why, when we decided to bring in another smoked salmon, we knew we didn't want to season it with just anything. Instead, we chose to use everything - but the bagel, that is. Say hello to a little something we call Trader Joe's Everything But the Bagel Seasoned Smoked Salmon! Made using the same mix of spices as our best-selling Everything But The Bagel Sesame Seasoning Blend [sku 59137], Everything But the Bagel Seasoned Smoked Salmon takes the classic combination of smoked salmon and a fully-loaded "everything" bagel, and rolls it into one delicious, brunch-ready treat - minus the actual bagel, of course. Each slice of delicately smoked Atlantic salmon is given a generous dusting of crunchy dried garlic and onion, flavorful poppy seeds, and a mix of delightfully nutty black and white sesame seeds. This combo of savory & smoky, soft & crunchy makes it an elevated alternative for any typical smoked salmon application, be it in hors d'oeuvres, eggs benedict, salads, or your standard brunch spread. Why, you can even top a freshly toasted, cream cheese-covered "everything" bagel with a slice or two - because who doesn't want a little more of everything? We're selling each 4-ounce package of Everything But The Bagel Seasoned Smoked Salmon for $5.49 - in the world of smoked salmon, that's nothing short of a spectacular value. You'll find them in our deli case. 05.20. 19
063465.name: Salmon Smoked Everything But The Bagel
063465.title: Everything But The Bagel Seasoned Smoked Salmon

064085.description: Trader Joe's Wild Nova Smoked Sockeye Salmon is made for us from a family recipe that dates more than seventy years. A combination of the traditions of Native Alaskans and those of the Norwegian immigrants who made their way across the world to this same region, our recipe results in a naturally delightful delicacy. Sprinkled in the waters of this mystical wonderland of icy cold Alaskan glaciers, mountains, and wildlife is a selection of some of the finest salmon. This Smoked Sockeye Salmon aims to capture this beautiful fish amidst these marvelous landscapes and bring the fish from farm to fork for you to enjoy whenever! From the wild, our supplier maintains the Sockeye Salmon at a consistent, high-quality standard and delivers the freshest fish to their smokers. The fish is rubbed with brown sugar and salt, then slowly smoked over native hardwoods. Sounds simple enough, but trust us, smoked salmon of this quality, with this flavor, is rare indeed. Bring Nova Smoked Sockeye Salmon that can make a fresh, fishy splash to many dishes; try with eggs, fresh veggies, risotto, European Style Whole Grain Bread [sku 49397] with a spread - take your pick - and prepare yourself for a mouth-watering daydream to the cold waters of Alaska without stepping foot from your neighborhood. You'll find each 16-ounce, pre-sliced package of Trader Joe's Wild Nova Smoked Sockeye Salmon in our deli meats section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Wild Nova Smoked Sockeye Salmon
064085.name: Salmon Smkd Wild 16 Oz
064085.title: Salmon Smoked Wild

071117.description: You can tell a lot about a piece of smoked salmon by the wood that was used to smoke it. Cherrywood smoked salmon, for instance, tends to have a delicately fruity flavor. Alder smoked salmon, a traditional favorite in the Pacific Northwest, is often mild and well-balanced. Oak smoked salmon, like the kind that can be found in Trader Joe's Oak Smoked Salmon Pieces, is marked by hearty, toasty, even nutty notes - a classic profile that pairs perfectly with a toasted bagel. Made for us by a suppler in the U.K., these Oak Smoked Salmon Pieces are a dependably delicious addition to all kinds of breakfast and brunch fare, bet it a time-honored lox, eggs, and onion scramble, elegantly constructed salmon Benedict, or savory salmon quiche. But that's hardly all: they're also ideal for using in appetizers, salads, and cold noodle dishes, where their deep, oaky smoke notes will add a delightful new dimension of flavor. And since it's from Trader Joe's, you can tell that it's going to be a tremendous value - our retail is about half what you'd pay for imported British smoked salmon at other stores! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Oak Smoked Salmon Pieces
071117.name: Salmon Oak Smoked Pieces 3 Oz
071117.title: Oak Smoked Salmon Pieces Farm Raised Cold Smoked

096987.description: This is no ordinary smoked salmon. In fact, we think it's pretty special. Trader Joe's Wild Smoked Sockeye Salmon is made just for us from a family recipe that dates back more than seventy years. A blending of the traditions of Native Alaskans and those of the Norwegian immigrants who made their way across the world to this same region, our recipe results in a naturally delightful delicacy. Wild caught in the icy cold Alaskan waters, our Salmon is fully cooked, cured in brine and seasoned with lemon, pepper and mustard seed. Then, it's "hot smoked" over alder wood chips, creating a uniquely flavorful fillet. A bagel with cream cheese is an ideal setting for Smoked Salmon, but it can be used for so much more. Lend a little smokiness to seafood chowder or jazz up your otherwise ordinary BLT. Add some pizzazz to scrambled eggs or your favorite pasta dish. Or, serve atop crackers with cheese and capers for fanciful hors d'oeuvres. You'll find each Trader Joe's Wild Smoked Sockeye Salmon package, by the pound in the refrigerated deli meats section. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Wild Smoked Sockeye Salmon
096987.name: Salmon Smkd Wld Al Ht Smkd Flt 18 Pack
096987.title: Hot Smoked Wild Alaskan Salmon

001118.description: A picturesque breakfast can't be complete without a tall glass of Fresh Squeezed Orange Juice; and seeing as Trader Joe's supplies the Pasture-Raised Brown Eggs [sku 62124], the Peppered Applewood Smoked Uncured Turkey Bacon [sku 94355], and Whole Wheat Cracked Sourdough Bread [sku 00197] also found in this picture- perfect breakfast, we think its fitting to also give our shoppers a taste of Trader Joe's Fresh Squeezed Orange Juice to quench their morning thirst! This Orange Juice is the real deal: 100% juice, high in vitamin C with a splash of other nutrients like potassium, calcium, and iron; no added sugars; crafted in small batches; and packaged in a recyclable container. Pleasantly smooth, but with a subtle hint of pulp from the fresh squeezing process means the flavor is no joke, either! The right balance of saccharine sweetness from the naturally occurring sugar paired with the acidity of the citrus makes for a delightful drink. Whether its an afternoon pick-me-up or simply helps you wake up in the morning, Trader Joe's Fresh Squeezed Orange Juice was freshly squeezed for you. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing.
001118.name: Orange Frsh Sqzd Pt Juice
001118.title: Trader Joe'S Fresh Squeezed Orange Juice

012595.description: Trader Joe's Mango 100% Juice Smoothie Fresh pressed juice, made in a family owned facility that has been making juices for over 30 years. They are handcrafted in small batches using solar powered mills. A delicious combination of mango puree and the juices of apples and oranges, blended with banana puree. A luxuriously delicious blend with a smoothie like consistency and fresh flavor. We're selling 2 sizes, 16 fl oz and 32 fl oz of Trader Joe's Mango 100% Juice Smoothie for $2.99 and $4.49.
012595.name: Mango Smoothie Pt
012595.title: Mango 100% Juice Smoothie

012598.description: Like our 32 fluid-ounce Organic Carrot Juice [sku 12599], Trader Joe's Organic Carrot Juice in 16 fluid-ounce bottle is made out of 100% organic carrot juice. That's it. Are we done now? Not too fast! You know us better than that, we have to leave you with something good to take home. You'll want to take home this 100% Carrot Juice that you can of course drink by itself to obtain its wholesome nutritional benefits, excellent source of Vitamin A, 170% of your daily value to be exact, and known "super vision powers". This also makes for a convenient addition to a smoothie with veggies or fruit. Or, if you're craving something sweet, may we suggest blending banana, Unsweetened Vanilla Almond Beverage [sku 94741] and cinnamon. It'll taste just like carrot cake! Take this smaller version to work, for a walk, in a cooler to the beach or park, it's handy and easy to store. Now that we've left you with some good take-aways, you're free to go. Go towards the refrigerated fresh juice section though, that's where you'll find Trader Joe's 100% Organic Carrot Juice in a 16-fluid ounce bottle, every day for $1.99*. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. 100% Organic Carrot Juice
012598.name: Carrot Organic Pt Juice
012598.title: Organic Carrot Juice

012599.description: Trader Joe's Organic Carrot Juice is made out of 100% organic carrot juice. That's it. Are we done now? Not too fast! You know us better than that, we have to leave you with something good to take home. You'll want to take home this Organic Carrot Juice that you can of course drink by itself to obtain its wholesome nutritional benefits, like its excellent source of Vitamin A and known "super vision powers". This makes for a convenient addition to a smoothie with veggies or fruit. Or, if you're craving something sweet, may we suggest blending banana, Unsweetened Vanilla Almond Beverage [sku 94741] and cinnamon. It'll taste just like carrot cake! Now that we've left you with some good take-aways, you're free to go. Go towards the refrigerated fresh juice section though, that's where you'll find Trader Joe's 100% Organic Carrot Juice in a 32-fluid ounce bottle, every day. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. 100% Organic Carrot Juice
012599.name: Carrot Organic Qt Juice
012599.title: Organic Carrot Juice 100% Juice

016195.description: Trader Joe's Very Green 100% Juice Smoothie Fresh pressed juice, made in a family owned facility that has been making juices for over 30 years. They are handcrafted in small batches using solar powered mills. Made with a blend of fruits and vegetables, including mango and kiwi puree, spinach, barley grass, ginger and parsley, our Very Green Smoothies are a perfect blend with natural fruit flavors an excellent source of antioxidant vitamins C & A. Available in 2 sizes, 16 fl oz and 32 fl oz. We're selling each 16 fl oz and 32 fl oz bottles of Trader Joe's Very Green 100% Juice Smoothie for $2.99 and $4.49. Trader Joe's Company Bulletin11/21/2012 page 44 of 54 Confidential
016195.name: Very Green Pt Juice
016195.title: Very Green 100% Juice Smoothie

057004.description: Smoothies are no longer enough¿ people still want their fruits and veggies in drinkable form, but they're now thirsting for fresh juice that has been specially prepared using a "cold press" method. Over the last couple years, we've introduced a number of Cold Pressed Juices, including Green [sku 52902], Red [sku 52903], Yellow [sku 52904], and Watermelon [sku 55374]. This year, we're adding a unique and delicious flavor to the line-up-one we haven't seen anywhere else. Meet Trader Joe's Cold Pressed Cantaloupe Juice. Each 15.2-ounce, 140-calorie bottle contains only cantaloupe juice and lime juice. (That's one-and-a-half pounds of cantaloupe and one-third of a lime to be precise.) We "juice" it in a slow hydraulic press for maximum liquid extraction. Once bottled, our juice goes through a cold, water-pressure method called HPP (High Pressure Processing). This process guarantees a juice that's safe to drink, without reducing its nutritional benefits or fresh flavor. Now, on to more pressing issues... How does it taste? Simply put, Trader Joe's Cold Pressed Cantaloupe Juice tastes fresh and refreshing! The bright orange liquid (it's not thick, like a smoothie) has a fresh-sliced cantaloupe aroma and taste. Yum! In addition to serious refreshment and fantastic flavor, this juice also delivers plenty of vitamins A and C and has no added sugar, colors, flavors, or preservatives. A single question remains: With all the trendy cold pressed juice bars popping up, why choose to buy your juice from Trader Joe's? 15.2 ounces of 100% juice for just $3.99-that's why! You'll be hard-pressed to find Cold Pressed Cantaloupe Juice like this in another store, let alone at such a value. 05.23. 16
057004.name: Cp Cantaloupe Juice
057004.title: Cold Pressed Juice Cantaloupe

057377.description: Trader Joe's formerly carried kombucha only in certain regions where specific local brands have a presence. Now-to the great joy of those who have been asking-we introduce our first national offering. It comes from GT's Kombucha, based in Beverly Hills, California. In 1995, when GT Dave (that's right, "Dave" is his last name) was only 15, he started making kombucha in his family's kitchen. Today, GT's Kombucha is still made the same way: handcrafted in small batches from the original, proprietary S.C.O.B.Y. (Symbiotic Culture of Bacteria and Yeast) he's been using for over two decades. The difference is, now there's a line of seventeen GT's Kombucha flavors, distributed nationally. One of our favorite flavors is Gingerade. It's a 100% organic, gluten free, vegan beverage containing electrolytes, polyphenols, enyzmes, folic acid, and an array of B vitamins. And since it's raw (uncooked), it maintains all its original probiotic value. The light-amber, slightly-bubbly liquid has that classic apple-cider-vinegar aroma and taste, partnered with the fresh-pressed flavor of ginger. As the bottle says, this is "Living food for the living body®!" Each 16 fluid-ounce bottle of GT's Enlightened¿ Kombucha - Gingerade is now available in our stores for $2.99. We've worked hard to deliver this popular product at a price that makes it a real value... always our goal! 04.23. 16
057377.name: Kombucha Gingerade Gts
057377.title: Juice Kombucha Gt Org Gingerade

057389.description: Trader Joe's formerly carried kombucha only in certain regions where specific local brands have a presence. Now-to the great joy of those who have been asking-we introduce our first national offering. It comes from GT's Kombucha, based in Beverly Hills, California. In 1995, when GT Dave (that's right, "Dave" is his last name) was only 15, he started making kombucha in his family's kitchen. Today, GT's Kombucha is still made the same way: handcrafted in small batches from the original, proprietary S.C.O.B.Y. (Symbiotic Culture of Bacteria and Yeast) he's been using for over two decades. The difference is, now there's a line of seventeen GT's Kombucha flavors, distributed nationally. One of our favorite flavors is Triology. It's a 100% organic, gluten free, vegan beverage containing electrolytes, polyphenols, enyzmes, folic acid, and an array of B vitamins. And since it's raw (uncooked), it maintains all its original probiotic value. The red, slightly-bubbly liquid has that classic apple-cider-vinegar aroma and taste, partnered with a trilogy of juices: raspberry, lemon, and ginger. As the bottle says, this is "Living food for the living body®!" Each 16 fluid-ounce bottle of GT's Synergy® Kombucha - Triology is now available in our stores for $2.99. We've worked hard to deliver this popular product at a price that makes it a real value... always our goal! 04.23. 16
057389.name: Kombucha Trilogy Gts
057389.title: Juice Kombucha Gt Org Trilogy

061267.description: According to his thirteen children-a handful of whom grew up to found Perfect Bar®, LLC-Dr. Bud Keith was a health food guy before "health food" was a thing. He was constantly tinkering with healthy recipes to feed his king-sized family. As the story goes, one day, he ground up a bunch of dried fruits and vegetables, mixed them with freshly ground, organic nut butter and honey, took one bite and declared, "It's perfect!" With that, Perfect Bars® were born. Perfect Bars® are sweet, moist, and satisfyingly dense. The Dark Chocolate Chip Peanut Butter Perfect Bar® is made primarily of (you guessed it!) peanut butter, which thickens and binds with the addition of honey, organic nonfat dry milk, organic dried whole egg, organic rice protein, various organic oils, and a blend of or- ganic whole food powders (think: spinach, kelp, apple, orange, etc.) You'll also find that each bar is upgraded with a pinch of sea salt and rich, organic dark chocolate chips. Mmmm, chocolate... Perfect Bars® are gluten free, kosher, and non-GMO. They're cold-pressed (not baked) and don't contain any added preservatives or emulsifiers-and because of this, these bars should be kept in the refrigerator so that their flavor and consistency remain intact. They can last up to one week at room temperature, though, so don't be afraid to toss one in your purse, backpack, or workout bag. We're selling each 2.3-ounce Dark Chocolate Chip Peanut Butter Perfect Bar® for $1.99-less than you'll find these delicious slabs of peanut butter-y goodness anywhere else. 07.05. 17
061267.name: Bar Perfect Peanut Butter Choc Chip
061267.title: Perfect Bar® Dark Chocolate Chip Peanut Butter Protein Bar

066485.description: We've carried GT's Kombucha flavors at Trader Joe's since 2016. We'd like to think that our latest limited-run flavor-this one exclusive to Trader Joe's-brings the taste of summer (if summer had a taste) to our stores. A bit more about GT: In 1995, when GT Dave (that's right, "Dave" is his last name) was only 15, he started making kombucha in his family's kitchen. Today, GT's Kombucha is still made the same way: handcrafted in small batches from the original, proprietary S.C.O.B.Y. (Symbiotic Culture of Bacteria & Yeast) he's been using for over two decades. The difference is, now there's a line of seventeen GT's Kombucha, distributed nationally. In addition to the Organic Gingerade, Cayenneade, Trilogy (raspberry, lemon & ginger), and Watermelon Wonder¿ flavors that we already carry, we're adding GT's Synergy® Strawberry Lemonade to the lineup this summer. You'll be grateful to hear that, like its predecessors, Strawberry Lemonade Kombucha is organic and raw (uncooked) and contains electrolytes, polyphenols, enyzmes, folic acid, and an array of B vitamins. Since it's raw, it maintains all of its original probiotic value. It's a refreshing, effervescent summer drink that has that "classic kombucha," apple-cider-vinegar aroma and flavor-plus plenty of classic, sweet-tart strawberry lemonade flavor, thanks to the inclusion of real strawberry & Meyer lemon juices. We're selling each 16-fluid-ounce bottle of GT's Synergy® Strawberry Lemonade Organic Kombucha for $2.99. Find it in our refrigerators with our other kombuchas & refrigerated juices, only for a limited time. 06.03.19
066485.name: Kombucha Strawberry Lemonade Gts
066485.title: Kombucha Organic Strawberry Lemonade Gts

066557.description: A picturesque breakfast can't be complete without a tall glass of Organic Orange Juice; and seeing as Trader Joe's supplies the Pasture-Raised Brown Eggs [sku 62124], the Peppered Applewood Smoked Uncured Turkey Bacon [sku 94355], and Whole Wheat Cracked Sourdough Bread [sku 00197] also found in this picture- perfect breakfast, we think its fitting to also give our shoppers a taste of Trader Joe's Organic Orange Juice to quench their morning thirst! Our Organic Orange Juice is the real deal: 100% juice, a great source of vitamin C with a splash of potassium, no added sugars, crafted in small batches, and packaged in a recyclable container. Pleasantly smooth, but with a subtle hint of naturally tart citrus acidity means the flavor is no joke, either! The right balance of saccharine sweetness from the naturally occurring sugar paired with the puckering tartness of the citrus makes for a delightful drink. Whether its an afternoon pick-me-up or simply helps you wake up in the morning, Trader Joe's Organic Orange Juice was made from 100% organic juice just for you. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Orange Juice
066557.name: Orange Organic No Pulp 52 Oz Juice
066557.title: Organic Orange Juice

066570.description: Orange Juice looks and tastes like a glass of morning sunshine - bright, sweet, and citrusy. That can be good at any time of day, for any type of meal, but it is especially complimentary to breakfast (sunny-side-up eggs, sizzling bacon and toast (avocado slices optional)). Trader Joe's Orange Juice is made From Concentrate (originating in the United States, Brazil and Mexico) that is reconstituted using filtered water. It pours smoothly because there is No Pulp, and it's been Pasteurized for longer shelf life. Our Orange Juice No Pulp From Concentrate is a bursting-with-value beverage at $2.29 for each 52 fluid ounce carton. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Orange Juice No Pulp From Concentrate Pasteurized
066570.name: Orange Original From Concentrate 52 Oz Juice
066570.title: Orange Juice

066571.description: Here's a 100% Juice blend that's sure to shake up your breakfast time routine. Trader Joe's Orange Peach Mango Juice is a sweet, tart, tangy, orange blend of orange, apple, pineapple, and white grape juices, with peach and mango purées. We named it Orange Peach Mango because those are the flavors that really predominate when you sip, slurp, or gulp it from the glass. This is a natural at the breakfast table. Add it to your smoothies, or blend it with ice for an Orange Peach Mango slushie. It's equally delightful in summertime cocktails. Swap the traditional orange juice with an equal measure of Orange Peach Mango and combine with Blanc de Blancs Sparkling Wine [sku 07124] for a terrific twist on a mimosa. Orange Peach Mango 100% Juice
066571.name: Orange Peach Mango 52 Oz Juice
066571.title: Orange Peach Mango Juice

066654.description: It's happened to all of us: you find yourself rushing the kids out of the house some morning, desperate to be on time yet still give them something healthy to start their day. They need a good source of calcium. And orange juice is always good in the morning. So why not start with a galss of Trader Joe's Orange Juice with Calcium and Vitamin D? Calcium is essential to building and maintaining healthy bones and teeth, and for providing efficient muscle contraction and blood clotting. It's found abundantly and naturally in dairy products, leafy green vegetables, sardines and rhubarb. At breakfast time, though, orange juice seems so much simpler than¿ well, sardines, we suppose. Simple and a great value. An eight fluid ounce serving of Trader Joe's Orange Juice with Calcium and Vitamin D provides 25% of the Daily Value for both nutrients. And at our price of about 46¢ for each 8-ounce serving, it also provides you with exceptional value in every sip. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. 100% Orange Juice with Calcium and Vitamin D
066654.name: Orange W/Calcium 52 Oz Juice
066654.title: 100% Pure Florida Orange Juice

067340.description: A picturesque breakfast can't be complete without a tall glass of Fresh Squeezed Orange Juice; and seeing as Trader Joe's supplies the Pasture-Raised Brown Eggs [sku 62124], the Peppered Applewood Smoked Uncured Turkey Bacon [sku 94355], and Whole Wheat Cracked Sourdough Bread [sku 00197] also found in this picture- perfect breakfast, we think its fitting to also give our shoppers a taste of Trader Joe's Fresh Squeezed Orange Juice to quench their morning thirst! This Orange Juice is the real deal: 100% juice, high in vitamin C with a splash of potassium, no added sugars, crafted in small batches, and packaged in a recyclable container. Pleasantly smooth, but with a subtle hint of pulp from the fresh squeezing process means the flavor is no joke, either! The right balance of saccharine sweetness from the naturally occurring sugar paired with the acidity of the citrus makes for a delightful drink. Whether its an afternoon pick-me-up or simply helps you wake up in the morning, Trader Joe's Fresh Squeezed Orange Juice was freshly squeezed for you. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Fresh Squeezed Orange Juice
067340.name: Orange Fresh Squeezed 52 Oz Juice
067340.title: Trader Joe'S Fresh Squeezed Orange Juice

068172.description: If summer were a drink, it would surely have to be lemonade. Sweet, refreshing, and delightfully tart, a cool, crisp glass of lemonade immediately evokes the very best aspects of the season, and like most juicy drinks, the more freshly squeezed, the better. Now, one could make it from scratch on their own, but who wants to spend their precious summer days sifting through seeds and pulp? That's why, every year, we offer Trader Joe's Fresh Squeezed Lemonade. It's made for us by a third-generation, family-owned grower and manufacturer of fresh- squeezed juices, who provides it to us unpasteurized - a decision that makes all the difference in allowing that pure, sweet-tart, summer-sensation-summoning flavor to shine through. Made with only three ingredients (sugar, water, and lemon juice), our Fresh Squeezed Lemonade's refreshing simplicity allows for even further refreshment via customization. For instance, try muddling it with a bit of fresh mint or rosemary, mixing in your favorite fresh fruit, or finding your perfect ratio of Lemonade to tea. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Fresh Squeezed Lemonade
068172.name: Lemonade Fresh Squeezed 52 Oz
068172.title: Fresh Squeezed Lemonade

161267.description: According to his thirteen children-a handful of whom grew up to found Perfect Bar®, LLC-Dr. Bud Keith was a health food guy before "health food" was a thing. He was constantly tinkering with healthy recipes to feed his king-sized family. As the story goes, one day, he ground up a bunch of dried fruits and vegetables, mixed them with freshly ground, organic nut butter and honey, took one bite and declared, "It's perfect!" With that, Perfect Bars® were born. Perfect Bars® are sweet, moist, and satisfyingly dense. The Dark Chocolate Chip Peanut Butter Perfect Bar® is made primarily of (you guessed it!) peanut butter, which thickens and binds with the addition of honey, organic nonfat dry milk, organic dried whole egg, organic rice protein, various organic oils, and a blend of or- ganic whole food powders (think: spinach, kelp, apple, orange, etc.) You'll also find that each bar is upgraded with a pinch of sea salt and rich, organic dark chocolate chips. Mmmm, chocolate... Perfect Bars® are gluten free, kosher, and non-GMO. They're cold-pressed (not baked) and don't contain any added preservatives or emulsifiers-and because of this, these bars should be kept in the refrigerator so that their flavor and consistency remain intact. They can last up to one week at room temperature, though, so don't be afraid to toss one in your purse, backpack, or workout bag. We're selling each 2.3-ounce Dark Chocolate Chip Peanut Butter Perfect Bar® for $1.99-less than you'll find these delicious slabs of peanut butter-y goodness anywhere else. 07.05. 17
161267.name: Bar Perfect Peanut Butter Choc Chip- 8Pk.
161267.title: Deli Bar Perfect Peanut Butter Choc Chip

066623.description: It's hard to single out our favorite thing about a good snack mix. There's the crunch, of course, the variety, and the balance of savory, sweet, salty and spicy. There's the fact that each bite is a little different than the one before it, and that the mix as a whole is even tastier than the sum of its parts. In fact, we found that there are so many things we like about snack mixes, that that's precisely the ethos we took in creating our own: Trader Joe's Many Things Snack Mix is a tantalizing on the classic snack mix formula that focuses on flavor, variety, and that grander sense of balance that keeps you coming back for more. Inside each pouch of our Many Things Snack Mix, you'll find a familiar array of individual snack pieces, including mini pretzels, bread crisps, corn sticks, and multigrain cereal squares. Where our Mix differs from most, however, is in its embrace of contrasting elements. Trader Joe's Many Things Snack Mix is a little less salty, and a litte more welcoming of sweet and spicy: we've also included honey roasted peanuts, and the cereal squares are divided into spicy and honey butter flavors. Altogether, every bite is a carefully orchestrated, yet gloriously unpredictable, blend of flavors and textures - just the thing to remind you that snacking is a many- splendored thing. Indeed, there's so many things to love about Trader Joe's Many Things Snack Mix, not least of which is the price: we're selling eight-ounce resealable pouches for $2.99*, every day. Look for them with our other snacks. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Many Things Snack Mix
066623.name: Many Things Mix
066623.title: Many Things Snack Mix With Honey Roasted Peanuts, Spicy And Honey Butter Cereal Squares, Corn Sticks, Pretzels & Savory Bread Chips

011155.description: We don't believe for a second that excluding artificial ingredients from our ingredient lists should result in a boring, less flavorful snack when the cravings come calling. Trader Joe's Baked Cheese Crunchies prove that we can fit bold cheesy flavor in a bag without sacrificing a guilt-free production process. These snappy snackers have the great cheesy flavor and the crisp crunch of the cheese puffs of leading brand names. Lucky for you, however, they're made especially for us, and baked, not fried, so they have 40% less fat than the big brand name puffs. Among the ingredients you'll find cheese powder that starts as actual cheddar cheese. And that bright orange glow? That comes from plant-derived sources - annatto extract and turmeric, to be precise. All of this comes together to give you a guilt-free snack anytime you're huntin' for a crunchin'! And if you can't get enough of Trader Joe's Baked Cheese Crunchies during your snacking sessions, try it out in a few of your dishes. They can bring that bold cheesy flavor and crispy texture to anything they're added to, such as sandwiches, burgers, and cheesy pastas galore. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Baked Cheese Crunchies
011155.name: Baked Cheese Crunchies Cheese Flavored Corn Snacks

018099.description: Got a backyard bash on the horizon, but have dietary restrictions to consider? Never fear! Trader Joe's Veggie Sticks are here! Leading the snacking brigade with a bag of gluten free and vegan friendly potato chip alternatives will have you being the hit of the party - at least until everyone gets a load of our Veggie Sticks, that is. Our puffed potato snacks are fried in vegetable oils and dashed with a wonderful seasoning blend of spinach and tomato flavoring. Additionally, they're naturally colored for a fun varied visual while you're reaching into the bag for another handful. Being vegan and gluten free, Trader Joe's Veggie Sticks satisfy that almost french fry flavor with a cheese puff texture that can now be enjoyed by anyone! Pair alongside any of our other gluten free and vegan snack and protein options for an all-inclusive BBQ. But also feel free to start the potato puff party for one by cracking open your own bag and digging in as they are for an anytime snack. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Veggie Sticks
018099.name: Veggie Sticks Potato Snacks

019701.description: Year after year, Trader Joe's Sesame Sticks remain a top contender for "Favorite Snack" in our annual Customer Choice Awards. They may not always crack the Top Five, but just know that they're always trailing right behind-cool, calm & totally unphased by the competition. Their motto? Slow & steady wins the race. And guess what? It's working-our Sesame Sticks have been a TJ's staple since NINETEEN NINETY-SEVEN! If you're familiar with our cycle of discontinuing slow-sellers to make room for new products, you know that a product has to be good if it's hung around our stores for multiple decades. When it comes to these nugget-like, sesame seed-covered, wheat & bulgar snack Sticks, the reason for their longevity is simple: they're crunchy, salty, and super-satisfying-the perfect snack to go with an after-work beer, if you ask us. We're selling each 16-ounce package of Sesame Sticks for $2.49*, every day. Find them in our snack section, buy a bag or two, and then... Open Sesame! Snacking will never be the same. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Sesame Sticks
019701.name: Sesame Sticks

032969.description: A wise person once said, "I've never met a problem that a Cheese Puff couldn't solve." (The identity of this wise person remains a mystery, but we're sure somebody said it. At some point. Like, at least once.) At Trader Joe's, we're inclined to agree with them. We've been known to push the snack-innovation envelope over the years-stocking our stores with exotic eats from around the world-but when all is said and done, there really is something to be said for the classics. And our Reduced Fat Cheese Puffs is a snack for the ages. Trader Joe's Reduced Fat Cheese Puffs were initially conceived as an alternative to those other puffs on the snack scene-you know the ones. We loved those big-brand puffs just as much as the next Joe, but what we didn't love was their ingredients. Inspired, we set out to create a Puff of our very own, made without artificial flavors, artificial preservatives, and MSG, and using colors derived only from naturally available products. We toiled and tinkered to get them just right, and in 1999, our Cheese Puffs as you know and love them were born... Charmingly cheesy, craveably crunchy, and nutritionally reasonable (we're talking 45% less fat than regular cheese puffs here, people), Reduced Fat Cheese Puffs are just the ticket for mindless or mindful munching. They're baked (not fried), and a one-ounce serving (about 35 Puffs!) contains 130 calories. We're selling each 5.5-ounce bag of Reduced Fat Cheese Puffs for the pile-'em-in-your-pantry price of $1.99- the same price we've held for nearly twenty years. Invite these Puffs to hold court at your potluck, liven up your lunchbox, and sustain your Sunday sports-spectating today! You find them in our snack aisle.
032969.name: Reduced Fat Cheese Puffs Cheese Flavored Corn Snacks ------------------------ Note: "Snack" Is Statement Of Identity And Must Be At Least 1/2 The Size Of The Largest Text On Pdp

045948.description: The Lundberg family has been farming rice since 1937, mostly in California. Needless to say, the Lundbergs know their rice, so it comes as no surprise that Lundberg® Organic Brown Rice Cakes are our Customers' rice cake of choice. (Just ask us about the time we tried bringing in another brand...) Made from Lundberg®'s own freshly-milled brown rice to ensure freshness, each Lundberg® Organic Brown Rice Cake contains around twice as much rice as you'd find in other brands' rice cakes. As a result, they taste like they're packed with twice the flavor, too. They aren't those slightly salted styrofoam pucks you're used to- they're light yet hearty, airy yet delicious, and crisp yet crunchy! (Not to mention USDA certified organic, kosher, vegan, and gluten free...) We're selling each 8.5-ounce, 13-cake pack for $2.99* - the best price on Lundberg® Organic Brown Rice Cakes we've ever seen. Find them in our snack aisle. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Lundberg® Organic Brown Rice Cakes
045948.name: Lundberg Org Brown Rice Cake

050898.description: When seeking the true path to snack happiness, one need go no further than Trader Joe's Contemplates¿ Inner Peas. They are deliciously simple and delightfully crunchy. Purists will eat them right out of the bag. They also pair well with creamy dip or crumbled atop a garden salad. Devoted snackers of all ages will enjoy and be rewarded with tasty green pea bliss (remember practice makes perfect).
050898.name: Trader Joe'S Contemplates Inner Peas A Delicately Crunchy, Baked Green Pea Snack =========== Note To Design: "Snacks" Is The Soi And Shall Be In At Least 1/2 The Size Of The Largest Type On The Pdp.

053016.description: Corn Nuts, as we know them in America, were said to be "invented" in 1936 by Albert Holloway as snacks to serve with beer. "Branded" may be a more appropriate term, since a very similar in style toasted corn snack called Cancha has been an ever-present nibble throughout Peru since the era of the Inca empire. Trader Joe's GIANT Peruvian Inca Corn descends from this illustrious corn kernel snacking tradition. And as their all-caps first same suggests, they make a particularly big impression. Yes, the kernels of white Peruvian Corn (AKA Choclo or Cuzco), grown exclusively in the Andean Mountains of Peru, in a place called The Sacred Valley of the Incas in Urubamba, are GIANT. They are almost five times bigger than flatland-grown North American corn to which we are accustomed. Their physical magnitude is matched by their flavor and texture. Robust with corn-y nuttiness, their natural heftiness translates into radical crunch. And because the GIANT Peruvian Inca Corn undergoes to a specialized pressure process before being roasted with salt, that crunch is compellingly more crispy than dense. Salty, nutty, corn-y, compellingly crunchy - these are the kind of snack that you start eating and can't stop. That is to say, every impression they make is positive, and that includes our price. We're selling each eight- ounce bag of GIANT Peruvian Inca Corn for $1.79. Pass the cold beer. 11.13. 14
053016.name: Trader Joe'S Giant Peruvian Inca Corn - Salted

053371.description: These Puffs are made for us with cornmeal that's combined with water and baked to a light, airy, yes, puffy texture, then generously coated with powdered white Cheddar that's (gasp!) made from actual white Cheddar cheese! #truth. They're made in TJ's Too Secret Corn Puff Machine No. 00358. (Not #truth. But the idea of it is great, and we even emblazoned the bag with a very detailed picture of what that machine might look like.) You've likely had "cheese puffs," but unless you've had ours, you've never had the World's Puffiest. They're really cheesy, and that separates them from their competitors, too. Seven ounces, you say? That doesn't sound like much, you say? Ah, but it is. They're the World's Puffiest White Cheddar Corn Puffs, remember? All that puffing makes them big and airy, so they take up a whole bunch of space. This seven ounce bag? It's a big bag, filled with puffy Puffs. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. World's Puffiest White Cheddar Corn Puffs
053371.name: Worlds Puffiest White Cheddar
053371.title: World'S Puffiest White Cheddar Corn Puffs

054672.description: Not all jerky is created equal, so we decided to make Trader Joe's Teriyaki Beef Jerky a cut above the rest. Not only because of our commitment to creating a jerky with minimal processing while leaving out all artificial ingredients, nitrites, added MSG and hormones, but because its, simply put, darn tasty with its smoky flavor and moist texture. Our supplier hand-cuts quality cattle beef cuts and then tosses it in a marinade blend of soy sauce, apple cider vinegar, and seasonings for no less than 24 hours. The marinated beef strips are then laid onto screens, placed in a smoke house and cooked super slowly, at very low temperatures, and finally packaged immediately to retain as much moisture as possible. Cooking it in this fashion allows the beef to cook thoroughly, without drying it out and becoming unpleasantly chewy. Once that packaged Trader Joe's Teriyaki Beef Jerky hits the shelves, have a field day hunting for all the opportunities you could sneak the resealable bag around - in your purse, your office desk drawer, under your sweater into the movies, there are limitless locales to snack in! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Teriyaki Beef Jerky
054672.name: Beef Jerky Teriyaki

055253.description: Shakespeare once stated, "If music be the food of love, play on." We aren't experts in music (or Shakespeare), but we do know something about food, and we want our snacks to sing out to our customers. Based on Will's logic: if medleys are a mixture of music, and music is the food of love, then Trader Joe's Rice Cracker Medley must be a mixture of love. Assuming we're adding up the notes correctly, this snack is exactly what you need to play on... Keeping rhythm with the changing times, we transitioned our old Oriental Rice Crackers [sku 06955] to a new Medley. This freshly improved recipe struck a chord with us, partly because it's gluten free, vegetarian, contains no fat, has 2 grams of protein, and has only 1 gram of sugar per serving. Embracing a Japanese flair, the flavor is right on beat, comprised of a mixture of crisp Rice Crackers flavored with soy, salt, vinegar, and chili. Throughout, you'll also find wasabi green peas, and nori- (seaweed) wrapped crackers. The Asian-inspired flavors, combined with an amusing variety of shapes, colors, and textures-all with a gratifying, crispy crunch- leave your mouth singing. This scrumptious snack is great to munch by itself, but also harmonizes well with our Green Tea [sku 51470]. Pick up the tempo by adding in some of our Wasabi Almonds [sku 96452] for a boost of protein and an additional horseradishy kick. We don't like to sing our own praises, but we're counting off an eight ounce bag of Trader Joe's Rice Cracker Medley for only $1.99. 06.30. 16
055253.name: Rice Cracker Medley A Mix Of Baked Rice Crackers Flavored With Soy Sauce, Salt & Vinegar, And Chili With Spicy Green Peas

056171.description: What makes Lady's Fingers so lovely; you just want to devour them? We aren't talking about the digits of British nobility or, for that matter, sweet-sponge biscuits (that would be ladyfinger, after all). In fact, we're referring to the edible green seed-pods of Okra, better known in many English-speaking parts of the world as "Lady's Fingers." These elegant, phalange-shaped vegetables are a southern cuisine staple, revered for their earthy, green bell pepper-y taste (that is, revered by those, who aren't reviled by the distinct sliminess of the natural juices). Slime? Sorry, no thanks. And this brings us back to our point-we've discovered a manner to make these Lady's Fingers so lovely, you will just want to devour them. We fry them-but not in the deep fryer. Using a method common in Southeast Asia, these veggies are "vacuum fried" in bran oil, and lightly salted. That's all. The result is very Crispy, Crunchy Okra-Lady's Fingers that will have you licking your fingers. Self-control is probably about the last thing that will come to mind when you open up a bag of this Crispy Crunchy Okra. Each enticing bite will leave you wanting another, and another. And that's welcomed, considering these fingers have 11 grams of dietary fiber and 5 grams of protein per serving. Beyond straight snacking, they're also great for dipping, or crumbled and used as croutons on a salad. Trader Joe's Crispy Crunchy Okra are $1.99 for each 1.4 ounce bag-a price that further enhances their loveliness and devourability. 06.17. 16
056171.name: Crispy Crunchy Okra
056171.title: Snack Okra Crispy Crunchy

056990.description: Black Eyed Peas, Cream, Red Hot Chili Peppers, The Smashing Pumpkins, Cake, The Cranberries: all top- notch bands named after top-notch food products. Such successes have inspired us to venture into the music industry, which is why we decided to turn one of our new items into its own rock band: Trader Joe's presents the Crispy Crunchy Mochi Rice Nuggets! We discovered these tasty little Nuggets in an airport in Japan and instantly fell in love. They're made in Japan from the same glutinous rice as mochi, a chewy rice paste. Steamed rice is mechanically kneaded until turned into a silky smooth paste, and then stretched into long ropes, cut into pieces and dried.
