038353.title: Organic Sour Cream

058236.description: Traditional kefir was made by hanging the milk and kefir grain mixture in goatskin bags near doorways to be knocked by passers-by as a way to keep it thoroughly mixed during fermentation. While you won't find mystical goatskin sacks hanging at the sliding door entrance of your Trader Joe's, you will find Trader Joe's Lowfat Plain Kefir bottled, stocked, and waiting for you! Kefir and yogurt are often unfairly lumped together as the same thing, but at Trader Joe's, we keep plenty of both to suit all shopper's needs! Our Lowfat Plain Kefir is fermented at room temperature with a thinner, more drinkable texture, while most yogurt is fermented under heat and historically has a denser consistency. Additionally, Trader Joe's Lowfat Plain Kefir gives you a larger number of different healthy bacteria, making it the perfect pal for your gastrointestinal health! Top off a tall glass alongside a blend of granola and mixed fruit to start your day! This probiotic-packed party is available daily in a 32-fluid-ounce package for $2.99*. Pick up a quart of Trader Joe's Lowfat Plain Kefir amongst our dairy delectables in your neighborhood Trader Joe's refrigerators! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Lowfat Plain Kefir
058236.name: Yogurt Kefir Plain Low Fat
058236.title: Trader Joe'S Low Fat Kefir

069707.description: Foliage has made a comeback as "what's old is new". These lovely plants will bring life and color to any environment. Likewise, foliage plants help absorb the toxins in the air. Great for décor, a perfect gift for others and yourself to promote wellness and bring joy. A gift that keeps on giving!
069707.name: Yogurt Greek Plain 16 Oz
069707.title: Greek Whole Milk Yogurt Plain

077291.description: Trader Joe's Apricot Mango Greek Yogurt is made with Grade A Whole Milk. This might conjure images of super fatty milk in your mind, but in truth, whole milk is just 'milk as it comes from the cow'-with none of its original milk fat removed. And that original milk fat isn't as much as one might think. Whole milk doesn't even contain twice as much milk fat as does 2% milk. Still, it's enough extra fat to give Whole Milk Yogurt a creamier texture-a trait that classic Greek yogurt really showcases. Beyond the thick, creamy mouth feel, we've also included bits of apricot and mango, with additional fruit juices, to give this Yogurt a tinge of tropical flavor. There are also a host of live and active cultures (added after pasteurization) meant to help bolster the presence of "good bacteria" in your gut. Take a tub to work for an easy breakfast. Mix it with some Müesli [sku 56580] for a heartier snack. You can enjoy it anytime since you'll always find Apricot Mango Greek Yogurt in our refrigerators. *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Apricot Mango Greek Whole Milk Yogurt
077291.name: Yogurt Greek Apricot/Mango
077291.title: Apricot Mango Greek Whole Milk Yogurt

081459.description: Ancient Indian records regard a combination of yogurt and honey as "the food of the gods", and the consumption of yogurt alone was praised as necessary for a long, healthy life in many early Mesopotamian and Mediterranean cultures. Agreeing with these accolades, Trader Joe's aims to bring a life of longevity and a taste of Mount Olympus to our customer's refrigerators with our Strawberry & Cream and Bananas & Cream Yogurt Cups. Prepackaged and ready to enjoy, these Strawberry & Cream and Bananas & Cream Yogurt Cups bring a dessert-like quality to any breakfast or packable lunch! Whether you toss one in your children's lunch pails or dig in with a spoon at home, our yogurt cups are an extravagantly easy way to lose yourself in a very-berry, fruit basket fantasy. Let these single-serving yogurt cups become a base for packing more fruit into your diet or combine with your favorite granola for a nutritious snack! We're selling this creamy combo of six, four-ounce cups every day for $2.99*, so forage yourself a fruit snack six pack today! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Strawberries & Cream and Bananas & Cream Yogurt Cups
081459.name: 6 Pck Yogurt Straw Banana 4 Oz
081459.title: Strawberries & Cream, Bananas & Cream Yogurt Cups

091037.description: Trader Joe's Cage-Free 100% Liquid Egg Whites take the hassle out of separating egg whites from their yolk counterparts - fear not broken or wasted yolks, fallen egg shell bits, or all too messy hands; we've got you covered. In a word, simple. Simple ingredient list: 100% Cage-Free Egg Whites. Simple pour spout-equipped carton. Ethically sourced, cage-free hens make for a simply principled purchase. Trader Joe's Cage-Free 100% Liquid Egg Whites are great for anyone looking to have that familiar texture and flavor in their diet, but without the extra fat and cholesterol found in the their yolk brothers. If you're hunting for a path less simple, allow Trader Joe's Cage-Free 100% Liquid Egg Whites to slip into your culinary imagination and whip them into homemade mayonnaise, Hollandaise sauce, Caesar salad dressing, or even add froth to a couple cocktails! We're offering each 16-ounce carton of Trader Joe's Cage-Free 100% Liquid Egg Whites for $3.99* every day, so come find them in our dairy refrigerators! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Cage-Free 100% Liquid Egg Whites
091037.name: Egg White Product Liquid Cage Free
091037.title: Trader Joes Cage Free 100% Liquid Egg Whites

092857.description: Trader Joe's Organic Lowfat Yogurt Strawberry Smoothie is a happy, healthy helping of probiotics, calcium, and vitamin D conveniently blended and bottled for anyone looking for a speedy addition to their workday breakfasts, children's lunch pails, or afternoon pick-me-up! Historically, many cultures have been crafting smoothies for centuries, but the United States didn't hop on the wagon until health food stores on the West Coast began churning them out with the onset of the commercial blender in the 1930s. Leave it to Trader Joe's to take our spin on this nutritious SoCal staple and take it stateside! With convenience and gut-friendly goodies taking the helm, Trader Joe's Organic Lowfat Yogurt Strawberry Smoothie delivers the vitamin D and calcium needed to develop strong bones in both children and adults. We're selling each four pack or six-ounce bottles of Trader Joe's Organic Lowfat Yogurt Strawberry Smoothies for $3.79*. Find them amongst our plethora of probiotic filled yogurts in our dairy fridges today! *Please check QIL to confirm current pricing. Organic Lowfat Yogurt Strawberry Smoothie
